사무국 발자취(2017년) 외
외솔회, 편집부(편집자), [2017]

본 논문에서는 검색엔진을 한번도 접해보지 않은 초보자나 초등학생과 같이 어휘력이 부족하여 키워드 선정에 어려움이 있는 사용자들이 의문대명사가 포함된 질의 문장을 통해 보다 쉽게 웹 문서의 검색이 가능하도록 하기 위하여 의문대명사가 포함된 의문형 구문정보에 기반한 질의 분석 방법을 제안한다. 따라서 정보 검색을 위한 의문대명사형 자연어 질의에 대하여 구문 정보 및 술어 정보에 기반한 질의 분석 및 확장을 통하여 의문대명사를 구체적인 의미의 키워드로 대체하여 사용자의 질의 의도가 보다 명확해 지도록 함으로써 사용자가 원하는 정답 문서가 상위에 랭크되도록 하고자 한다.요약 1. 서론 2. 관련연구 3. 질의처리 4. 실험 및 평가DL 추론과 시간적 추론을 적용한 상황 정보 관리
한국정보과학회, 김제민(Je-Min Kim), [2006]
유비쿼터스 환경에서의 온톨로지 기반 시간 추론
한국정보과학회, 최정화(Junghwa Choi), [2006]
온톨로지와 게임 커뮤니티의 질의/응답 게시글을 이용한 대화형 NPC의 구현
한국정보과학회, 박두경(Doo-Kyung Park), [2006]

사물인터넷 기반 세렌디피티 서비스
한국지능정보시스템학회, 김혜경, [2014]
통합 서버 구매 의사결정 지원 방안
한국지능정보시스템학회, 장성우, [2014]
A Study on the Integrated Nosql DB Development Based on the Polyglot Persistence Theory
한국지능정보시스템학회, 채성욱, [2014]

본 논문은 신문기사를 대상으로 자연어 처리를 통해 구조화된 정보를 추출하는 정보추출 방안을 제시한다. 본 논문에서 제안하는 방안은 형태소 분석된 결과를 바탕으로 개체명을 인식하는 개체명 인식 기술과 특정 도메인 영역에서 추출할 정보를 명세하고 이를 추출하는 템플릿 기반 정보추출 기술로 나누어 수행한다. 실험 결과, 하이브리드 기반 개체명 인식의 정확률은 87.7%를 보였고, 재현율은 91%를 보였다. 또한 템플릿 기반 정보추출은 사건사고 문서에 대해 정확률 80.2%, 재현율 82.3%를 보였고, 경제문서에 대해서 정확률 75.3%, 재현율 76.9%를 보였다.This paper presents an information extraction method which can extract the structured information through natural language processing for newspapers. Our method performs named entity recognition by using the morphological analyzed result and template based information extraction by filling templates of specific domains. As the experimental result, we can find that the hybrid based named entity recognition shows precision rate of 87.7% and recall rate of 91%. The template based information extraction shows precision rate of 80.2% and recall rate of 82.3% on accident newspapers and precision rate of 75.3% and recall rate of 76.9% on economy newspapers.요약 ABSTRACT Ⅰ. 서론 Ⅱ. 관련 연구 Ⅲ. 하이브리드 기반 개체명 인식다자간 VoIP에서 소비전력 분산을 이용한 회의분리 방지 알고리즘

단백질 상호작용에 대한 연구는 생명현상의 전반적인 원리를 규명하는데 필수적이다. 생물학 문헌 데이타베이스로부터 단백질 상호작용 정보를 찾는 것은 많은 시간과 노력이 필요하기 때문에 컴퓨터로 자동화시키는 방법이 요구된다. 문헌으로부터 단백질 상호작용 정보를 추출하는 작업은 단순 문자열 비교를 통한 정보검색으로는 한계가 있으므로 자연어 처리 기법을 이용하여 문장을 트리로 표현한 뒤 가지치기, 병합 들을 통해 추상화된 트리를 패턴과 매칭하는 방법을 제안한다. 그리고 실제 데이타를 이용한 실험 결과를 통해 기존 방법에 비해 더 높아진 정확도를 확인하였다.요약 1. 서론 2. 관련 연구 3. 정보 추출 시스템 4. 성능 평가어플리케이션의 이동성을 기반으로 한 유비쿼터스 시스템

한국정보과학회, 우덕균(Duk-Kyun woo), [2004]
아키텍처 평가 방법을 통합한 아키텍처 설계 방법
한국정보과학회, 고현희(HyonHee Koh), [2004]

Currently users are tend to use multimedia data types in their applications. Main features of multimedia data types are large amount of data compared to conventional data types. In this reason, it's hard to load data into main memory and to search. That is the cause of occur disk input and output frequently, and decrease the system performance. In this paper, we describe to have fast and efficient access to multimedia data using index technique. Index method presented by paper consists of two parts : one is index file part for keywords and the other is posting file part for the list of file names. Of course, we use keyword. But user is not charge of memory for the keywords. Users just use natural language to insert, delete and search data what he or she wants. Internally, System makes keywords from natural language to get access to multimedia data. It provides convenience to users. Using this study to develop one's application for multimedia , one may have a chance for advanced performance of a system and getting a result speedily.오늘날 사용자가 요구하는 데이터 타입은 주로 멀티미디어 데이터 타입들이다. 이들 멀티미디어 데이터 타입의 특성은 기존의 데이터에 비하여 데이터의 크기가 크다는데 있다. 멀티미디어 데이터는 크기가 크기 때문에 멀티미디어 데이터 탐색 연산시 한번에 여러 데이터를 주기억 장치에 가져올 수 없으며, 이것은 많은 입출력 발생과 멀티미디어 데이터 시스템의 성능을 저하시키는 요인이 된다. 그러므로 본 논문에서는 보다 신속한 멀티미디어 데이터 접근을 이루기 위해 인덱스 방법에 관해 살펴보며, 이 기술을 이용하여 멀티미디어 데이터 접근을 많이 요구하는 응용프로그램에 적절하게 대처할 수 있으며, 사용자는 자연어를 사용하여 검색을 수행할 수 있다. 뿐만 아니라 정확한 매칭을 요구하는 키워드 매칭 인덱스 기법보다 자연어를 이용함으로써 사용자의 편리성과 신속한 결과 얻을 수 있도록 성능을 향상 시켰다.OFDM 통신 시스템에서의 간섭 현상에 관한 연구
한국정보통신학회, 이종길, [2004] [KCI등재후보]

이 논문에서는, 데이타 베이스 검색을 위한 한글 자연어 질의문을 입력하여, 이를 분석 한 뒤 동등한 의미를 표현하는 정형 질의어인 SQL로 변환하는 시스템을 개발하였다. 이 시스템에서는 기존의 질의어 생성 시스템에서 처리하지 못했던 부속 질의어 생성 및 보다 다양한 질의어를 처리하기 위하여 질의어 생성 사전을 고안하였다. 또한, 이식성을 고려하여 지식 베이스를 스키마 의존 사전과 스키마 독립 사전으로 나누어 다른 도메인에 적용시킬 때 해당 사전만 그에 맞게 변형시키면 되는 시스템을 구현하였다.요약 1. 서론 2. 실험 데이타 베이스 및 지식 베이스 3. 시스템 구성 및 개요 4. 질의어 처리 및 생성자동 논리 회로도 생성기의 분할과 배치에 관한 연구

질의응답 시스템에서의 질의 분석 과정은 이용자의 자연어 질의 문장에서 질의 의도를 파악하여 그 유형을 분류하고 정답 추출을 위한 정보를 구하는 것이다. 본 연구에서는 복잡한 분류 규칙 집합이나 대용량의 언어 지식 자원 대신 이용자 질의 문장에서 질의 초점 어휘를 추출하고 구문 구조적으로 관련된 단어들의 의미 정보에 기반하여 효율적으로 질의 유형을 분류하는 방법을 제안한다. 질의 초점 어휘가 생략된 경우의 처리와 동의어와 접미사 정보를 이용하여 질의 유형 분류 성능을 향상시킬 수 있는 방법도 제안한다.For question-answering system, question analysis module finds the question points from user’s natural language questions, classifies the question types, and extracts some useful information for answer. This paper proposes a question type classifying technique based on focus words extracted from questions and word semantic information, instead of complicated rules or huge knowledge resources. It also shows how to find the question type without focus words, and how useful the synonym or postfix information to enhance the performance of classifying module.초록

본 논문에서는 EPG 정보 검색을 위한 자연어 대화 시스템에 대해 논한다. 자연어 대화 시스템 구축을 위한, 대화 예제를 이용한 상황 기반 대화 관리 방법론은, 효율적이고 실용적인 대화 시스템 구축을 가능하게 한다. 대화 시스템은 사용자 발화에 대해 적합한 시스템 응답 발화를 출력하는 과정으로 진행되며, 이를 위해, 사용자 발화 의미 분석, 대화 관리, 시스템 응답 발화 생성의 과정을 거친다. 정확하고 신속한 정보의 전달이 중요한 EPG 정 보 검색 도메인의 특성상 EPG 데이터베이스의 관리 및 갱신이 중요한 요소로 작용한다. 이를 위해 웹마이닝 기반의 EPG 데이터베이스 관리자를 구현함으로써 데이터베이스 구축 에 필요한 비용을 최소화하고, 신속하고 정확한 정보를 제공할 수 있었다.요약 1. 서론 2. 대화 예제를 이용한 상황 기반 대화 관리 시스템 3. 한국외국어대학교 언어연구소, Franck, MALIN, [2001] [KCI등재]

자연어 파싱에 많이 사용되는 Earley 파싱 알고리즘은 입력문장에 에러(error)가 있으면 즉시 종료되기 때문에 견고한(robust) 파싱을 구현하기 어렵다. 본 논문에서 우리는 Earley 파싱 알고리즘을 보다 견고한 파싱 기법으로 만드는 방법을 제안한다. Earley 파싱을 하다가 멈추면 파싱 모드를 지역적 양방향 분석으로 전환시킨다. 에러 위치 다음에 나타나는 단어를 아일랜드(island)로 정한다. 아일랜드를 지역적으로 양방향으로 확장시켜 에러 위치까지 도달하게 한 다음 에러의 종류를 파악하고 이를 복구하는 기법을 사용함으로써 견고성을 얻을 수 있다.요약 1. 서론 2. Earley 파싱 및 에러 탐지 3. 지역적 양방향 분석 4. 에러 복구특징 추출에 기반한 신경망 시스템을 이용한 차량 번호판 문자인식
한국정보과학회, 이현숙(Hyun-Sook Lee), [2000]
에너지 차분 흉부 X선 화상에 있어서 폐종류 음영 필터의 평가
한국정보과학회, 김응규(Eung-Kyeu Kim), [2000]
자연 영상에서 문자열 추출
한국정보과학회, 최미화(Mi-Hwa Choi), [2000]

본 논문에서는 자연어로서 한글처리를 위한 전자하 사서 구성의 한 방법을 제안하고, 그에따른 검색 알고리즘을 개발하였다. 사전의 전체 구성은 색인 사전부와 기본어 사전부로 하였으며, 색인 사전부는 선정된 기본어에 대한 한글 합성원리에 따른 통계 결과로서 초성, 중성, 종성 색인부를 두었다. 이에 따라 개발된 알고리즘을 적용한 결과, 기본어에 대한 검색길이가 짧음을 알 수 있었고, 검색코자 하는 기본어에 대해서 필요한 인덱스부와 데이터부의 일부분을 호출할 수 있기 때문에 적은 기억 용량을 갖는 컴퓨터에서도 이용가능하다는 것을 보였다.This applications such as natural language understanding system, speech understanding, machine translations, information retrieval, and question and answer system need the electronic dictionary that contains the words and their concepts, and that represents the knowledges needed in processing natural language. Since the contents of the dictionary are very large, time consuming occurs in searching information. A lot of researches have been proposed for improving search time. We are interested in TRIE structure with a wasteful memory space and complex structure. We proposed a constructing method which consists of index part and data parts. It is the dictionary with three index parts which consists of the first sound letter index, the second and the last by statistical approach. We also improved the searching algorithm in the search process of the dictionary. We evaluated them by theoretical method.白華 梁建植 小說 硏究
동국대학교 경주대학, 郭根, [1989]
意思決定支援시스템의 理論的 考察
동국대학교 경주대학, 朴相範, [1989]
扈衛廳 硏究
동국대학교 경주대학, 崔孝軾, [1989]

In this paper, a chatbot for emotional stress recognition and management using rule-based method and NLP is designed and developed to tackle various emotional stresses of people through questionnaire. For this, Dialogflow as open chatbot development platform and Facebook messenger as chatting platform are used. We can build natural and resourceful conversational experiences through predefined questions by using powerful tools of Dialogflow, and can use developed chatbot on the Facebook page messenger. Developed chatbot perceives emotional stresses of user by user-input which is either text or choice of predefined answer. It also gives user questions according to the user’s feeling, and assess the strength of the emotional stresses, and provide a solution to the user. Further research can improve the developed chatbot by using open Korean NLP library and database of emotions and stresses.Abstract 1. 서론 2. 챗봇과 자연어 처리 3. 스트레스와 건강 4. 감정 스트레스 인지 및 관리용 챗봇250 km/h급 전철설비의 비전기반 검측 기술 구현

Im computergestu¨tzten sprachlichen Verfahren (eng. Natural Language Processing. NLP) gibt es drei Ambiguita¨ten der Wortbedeutung: Ambiguita¨t der Wortart. lexikalische Ambiguita¨t und strukuellle Ambiguita¨t. In dieser Arbeit wurde von diesen die lexikalische Ambiguita¨t betrachtet. Fu¨r die lexikalische Disambiguierung wird als Vorbedingungen im folgenden gefordert:
ㆍKenntnis des Kontexts
ㆍein Mechanismus, der die semantische Assoziation zwischen den benachbarten Wortern findet.
ㆍein Mechanismus. der einen Anhaltspunkt zur syntaktischen Disambiguierung
gibt.
ㆍein Mechanismus. der die Beschra¨nkungen der Auswahl zwischen den ambigen Wo¨rtern kontrolliert.
ein Schlussfolgerung als letzten Schritt
Zur lexikalischen Disambiguierung wurden drei Verfahren, d.h. Vorzugsbedeutung, semantische Entscheidung und Frame und semantische Verbindung in dieser Arbeit betrachtet. Zwar haben diese Verfahren Effektivita¨t bei der lexikalischen Disambiguierung bewiesen. aber es war ungenu¨gend. Deswegen sollte das Studium der semantischen Interpretation in dem computergestu¨tzten sprachlichen Verfahren weiter verfolgt werden.문학텍스트 쓰기를 통한 독일어 학습 방법 연구

한국독일어문학회, 김창우, [2000] [KCI등재]

논리적 데이타 베이스 설계는 일반적으로 두 단계로 구성된다. 즉, 개념적 스키마를 설계하는 단계와 그것을 계층, 네트워크 혹은 관계 스키마로 변환하는 단계이다. E-R(Entity-Relationship) 모델은 개념적 스키마를 서술하는데 사용한다.
본 논문에서는 설계자가 자연어 문답으로 E-R 모델을 형성하고, 이 E-R 모델을 계층 스키마 그리고 단계 스키마로 변환하는 시스템을 설계 및 구현하고 있다. E-R 다이어그램의 표현 모델, 계층 스키마, 네트워크 스키마 그리고 관계 스키마 등은 프롤로그 언어로 표현하였다. 본 시스템은 IBM PC/AT의 MS-DOS상에서 수행되는 Turbo Prolog로 구현되었다.요약 Ⅰ. 서론 Ⅱ. 이론적 배경 및 정의 Ⅲ. 시스템 설계 및 구현 Ⅳ. 결론분산 시스템에서의 Task Allocation을 위한 Petri net 모델에 관한 연구
한국정보과학회, 최찬호(Chan Ho Choe), [1987]
분산 운영체제를 위한 Reliable Multicast Communication의 Modeling
한국정보과학회, 황준(J. Hwang), [1987]
분산 체제에서의 Branch - Bound에 의한 Optimal Task Allocation에 관한 연구
한국정보과학회, 장준영(Jung Young Chang), [1987]

바이오 분야에는 개체 간의 관계에 대한 정보를 얻을 수 있는 방대한 양의 연구 문헌들이 데이터베이스 형태로 저장되어 있다. 그러나, 컴퓨터에 의한 연구 문헌들에 대한 접근에 많은 문제를 겪고 있기 때문에 이처럼 방대한 자료에서 원하는 정보를 효율적으로 찾는 것은 어려운 일이다. 본 논문은 바이오 텍스트로부터 생의학 상호 작용 정보를 자동으로 추출하는 방법을 제안하고 이를 구현한 결과를 제시한다. 제안된 방법은 최대 엔트로피 모형을 사용하여 단백질, 유전자와 같은 바이오 개체명을 인식하고, 그 다음 단계에서 확인된 개체명들 중 INTERACTION 또는 NO-INTERACTION 클래스를 적용하여 상호 작용이 존재하는 개체쌍을 추출한다. 이때 품사 부착, 기본구 인식, 구문 분석, 술어-논항 인식과 같은 자연언어 분석 결과로부터 유용한 정보를 추출하여 사용한다. 특히, 심층 자연언어 분석을 통해 개체명을 논항으로 갖는 동사가 ‘촉진하다(activate)’, ‘억제하다(inhibit)’, ‘감소시키다(diminish)’처럼 상호 작용을 표현하는 동사인지 확인하는 것은 유용하다. 실제 바이오 관련 문헌에 대한 실험을 통해, 자연언어 분석이 바이오 텍스트 마이닝에 기여하는 정도를 보인다. 제안하는 방법은 철자적 특성, 개체명을 구성하는 단어들, 개체명 주변의 문맥 등의 어휘 정보를 사용하는 베이스라인 시스템보다 F1 척도 기준 약 1.4%의 성능 향상을 보이는데, 이는 자연언어 분석을 통해 개체명 주변의 외부 문맥을 효과적으로 사용한 것에 기인한다. 또한, 제안하는 학습 기반 방법이 관계 추출에서 공기 기반 방법과 규칙 기반 방법보다 우수한 성능을 낼 수 있음을 보인다.The vast amount of biomedical literature is an important source for the discovery of biomedical interaction information is stored as a database. However, it is complicated to obtain such interaction information from the text because research articles are not easily readable and understandable by machines. In this paper, we present and implement a method for extracting biomedical interaction information from bio-text. The proposed method labels all possible pairs of recognized biomedical named-entities (NEs) as INTERACTION or NO-INTERACTION by using a maximum entropy (ME) classifier. The features used for the classifier are obtained by applying various natural language processing (NLP) techniques, i.e., part-of-speech (POS) tagging, base phrase recognition, parsing, and predicate-argument recognition. Especially, specific verb predicates (e.g., activate, inhibit, and diminish) and their biomedical NE arguments are very useful features to identify interactive NE pairs. In the experiments, we analyze how much each applied NLP technique improves the extraction performance. The performance of the proposed method is about 1.4% higher in terms of the F1 measure compared to the baseline method exploiting the features from orthographical characteristics, words themselves constituting a term, and words located in the left or the right context of the term. The use of external contextual features around NEs is crucial for the performance enhancement. We also compared the proposed method with the co-occurrence-based and the rule-based methods in the relation extraction task. The result demonstrates that the proposed method is considerably better than such methods.요약 Abstract 1. 서론 2. 관련 연구 3. 자연언어 분석 기반의 텍스트 마이닝USIM 탑재 스마트폰 기반 모바일 신용카드 결제 프로토콜의 안전성 향상
한국정보과학회, 지은화(Eun-Wha Jhee), [2011] [KCI등재]

한국정보과학회, 김상미(SangMi Kim), [2011] [KCI등재]

한국정보과학회, 방초(Chao Fang), [2011] [KCI등재]

초대의 말씀
한국정보과학회, 서정연, [2013]
모바일 응용 서비스의 미래와 전망 워크샵
한국정보과학회, 편집부(편집자), [2013]
CG&I 표준화 워크샵
한국정보과학회, 편집부(편집자), [2013]

실험결과 우리는 기본적인 조사에 대한 정보만으로 문자기본 패턴인식 방식에 의한 자동조사 획득(학습이 없는 획득)은 가능하다는 것을 보여주었다. 51개의 단어로부터 5개의 정확한 조사와 1개의 틀린 조사를 획득하였다. 결과로부터, 입력 데이터의 양이 '어느 정도'까지 증가된다면 더 많은 조사의 획득을 얻을 수 있을 것으로 기대된다. 그러나 조사의 양에는 한계가 있으므로 '어느 정도' 이상의 데이터 양에 대해서는 더 이상의 조사는 획득되지 않을 것이다.
실험을 하는 과정에서 무리는 몇 가지 단점을 발견하였다. 그 중 하나로는, 우리는 주어진 다큐먼트 내의 단어들에서만 실험을 수행하였으므로, 만약 주어진 단어 중에 <표 l>에 나타난 조사가 있다하더라도 그 어간과 일치하는 단어가 입력에 존재하지 않는다면 그 단어의 어간-조사 쌍은 획득될 수 없을 것이다. 즉, 이것은 입력 데이터에 사용된 단어들이 제한되어 있기 때문에 발생하는 경우이다. 또 다른 단점은 조사의 개수는 한글 단어의 개수에 비해 아주 작은 양이므로 획득에는 한계가 있다. 다시 말하면, 어느 정도의 단어들로부터 모든 조사가 획득된 후에는 더 이상 획득할 조사가 없다는 것이다.
추후 더 많은 데이터의 양으로 조사획득을 수행하여 보고, 조사뿐만 아니라 복합어 획득에도 자동획득을 적용시켜보고자 한다. 또한 지식을 첨가하면 더 작은 입력 데이터의 양으로도 조사나 복합어를 획득할 것으로 기대된다.목차 1. 서론=183 2. 이론 및 배경설명=184 2.1 접미사와 조사=184 2.2 입력 데이터=184우리 나라의 전자상거래 현황과 그 효과에 관한 연구
계명문화대학, 이순자, [1999]

In this study, by using the natural language processing of the field of artificial intelligence, automated index was performed. And then, the Natural Language Processor for Constructing Database (NALPDB) has been developed. Furthermore, the Design knowledge Information RElational DataBase (DIREDB) has been also developed, which is designed to interlock the knowledge base. DIREDB processes both the documented design-data, like a concrete standard specification, and the design knowledge from an expert. DIREDB is also simulates the design space of structures accordance with the production rule, and thus it is determined that DIREDB can be used as a engine to retrieve new knowledge and to implement knowledge base that is necessary to the development of automatic design system.간척에 의한 담수호 수자원 확보

멀티 큐 블록 계층에서 큐 구성에 따른 I/O 성능 분석
한국정보과학회, 송용주(Yongju Song), [2019]

The Pritzker Prize, recognized as the highest award in the field of architecture, should be given to selected winners without any controversy. Laureates, that are not only recognized by juries, but also by architects in different countries, related professionals, and others, should be nominated. Therefore it is possible to say that nominated laureates represent architectural trends of the time. The purpose of this study, is largely divided into two. First is to understand the trends of architecture by analyzing the jury citation of each laureates. The second purpose is to easily analyze 38 jury citation by utilizing the natural language processing technology, and to present the possibility of applying this method to the field of architecture. This research has been carried out through the following process. Jury citation have been filtered and analyzed using the 'Stanford Parser’. Also previous studies have been reviewed to establish a suitable research method. Then, main contents of the citation, which can be divided into 9 categories, have been derived and reviewed to understand the trends of architecture. Change in architectural trends have been analyzed based on the categories of expression characteristics and architectural ideas, trends of times, inhabitant, surrounding environment, materials, technologies, light, space and function, and morphological specifics. This research has significance not only in terms of understanding value trends but also in terms of utilizing natural language processing technology, an unfamiliar tool in the field of architecture.Abstract 1. 서론 1.1 연구배경 및 목적 1.2 연구범위 및 방법 2. 조사 및 분석방법다포불전 공포의 외목도리 지지에 관한 연구

본 논문은 자연어에서 어절을 Head, Tail에 의하여 분리하는 방법을 제안하였다. 한국어를 대상으로 하고, 용언은 26종으로, 어미는 11종으로 하여, 어형변화에 대한 결합 마트릭스를 유도하고, 어절의 Head, Tail 처리 앨고리즘을 제시하였다.요약 Ⅰ. 서론 Ⅱ. 어절의 형식화 Ⅲ. Head와 Tail의 분류 Ⅳ. 처리 알고리즘Shallow binding을 이용한 효율적인 인터프리터의 설계및 구현

Intermediate Code Translation for 8 bit Computer
한국정보과학회, 김기태, [1984]

자연어 질의를 입력하고 문서로부터 질의에 대한 정답을 추출하여 제공하는 질의응답 시스템에서는 사용자의 질의 의도를 파악하여 질의 유형을 분류하는 과정이 매우 중요하다. 본 논문에서는 질의 유형을 분류하기 위해 복잡한 분류 규칙이나 대용량의 사전 정보를 이용하지 않고 질의의 의도를 나타내는 어휘들을 추출하고 인접 명사들의 의미 정보를 이용하여 질의 및 정답 유형을 결정할 수 있는 방법을 제안한다. 또 동의어 정보와 접미사 정보를 이용하고， 의문사가 생략된 경우 어 휘 의미 정보를 이용하여 질의 유형 분류기의 성능을 향상시킬 수 있음을 보인다.For question answering system that extracts an answer and output to user’s natural language question, a process of question type classification from user’s natural language query is very important. This paper proposes a question and answer type classifier using the interrogatives and word semantic categories instead of complicated classifying rules and huge dictionaries. Synonyms and postfix information are also used for question type classification. Experiments show that the semantic categories are helpful for question type classifying without interrogatives.Hydrogen Spillover Kinetics - I. Effect of Surface Morphology on [$Pt/MoO_{3}$] Catalyst

정보의 양이 늘어남에 따라 내가 원하는 정보를 찾기 위한 기술과 시간의 양이 늘어나고 있다. 하지만 현재의 보편적인 방법인 단어, 문장으로는 실제 원하는 정보에 도달하는 것은 점점 더 어려워지고 있다. 정보의 검색은 전문가 영역에서 더욱 어려움을 가진다. 일상용어와 전문용어의 gap과 단어/문장을 통한 단편성 질의로는 원하는 결과를 얻을 수 없다. 본 논문은 일상용어의 스토리를 질의로 원하는 전문가 영역의 정보를 취득하는 과정과 사례를 소개한다. 우선은 법률 분야에 대한 사례를 통해 접근 방법과 변화에 대한 유연한 모델과 자가 학습방법을 제시하며, 위 연구의 제한적인 것과 앞으로의 발전방향을 연구해보자.요약 1. 인공 지능의 현주소 2. 전문가 영역 인공지능 사례 3. 법률 인공지능의 적용 방법 4. 결론O2O 서비스모델을 이용한 요식업체의 서비스 확장 방법론에 관한 연구

We present an approach for interpreting natural language commands using ontology as well as an application to robotics. In our approach, we first extract meaningful keywords from the user commands. A structured representation is then built by extracting and arranging meta-data for each keyword. The data is then transformed into an ontological knowledge representation. We implemented an interpretation system and applied it to the user interface of an intelligent mobile robot. The present experiments demonstrate that the coverage of user commands can be easily extended, as the representation is logical and declarative.Abstract Ⅰ. 서론 Ⅱ. 형식 언어 FURRL Ⅲ. 제안된 방법 Ⅳ. 구현 및 실험통신접지에 있어서 보링시설 깊이의 최소화 설계

뉴스와 토픽

과학기술 선진국 길을 열자
한국과학기술단체총연합회, 박긍식, [1998]
식품위생과 사회
한국과학기술단체총연합회, 황한준, [1998]

형태소 분석(Morphological Analysis)과 같은 언어학적 처리에 의존하는 기존의 한국어 문헌에 대한 자동색인 기법들은 품사의 애매모호함이나 복합명사의 처리 등으로 인한 부담(overhead)이 크다. 또한 불용어 처리에 사용되는 불용어 리스트가 대상 문헌의 주제 분야별로 따로 구축되어야 하며 그 크기가 방대하다는 문제점이 있다. 이러한 문제점들을 해결하기 위해, 본 논문에서는 각 문헌의 텍스트에 대해 복합명사 처리나 애매모호함에 대한 엄격한 분석을 수행하지 않는 간단한 형태의 형태소 분석을 수행하며 단순명사들을 추출한다. 그런 후 이들 단순명사들을 이용하여 유한 오토마타(Finite Automata)를 구성하고, 구성된 유한 오토마타와 각 명사의 단어빈도(Term Frequency)에 의해 각 색인어 후보들의 중요도를 계산하는 자동색인 기법을 제안한다. 그 결과 품사의 애매모함에 대한 처리나 복합명사의 처리에 따른 부담을 줄일 수 있었으며, 선정된 색인어들과 수작업으로 선정한 색인어들의 비교 실험에 의해 제안한 자동색인 기법의 성능을 검증하였다.Typical techniques for automatic indexing on Korean documents are having difficulty in linguistic processing such as morphological analysis because a part of speech is vague and the process of complex noun is not easy. Also, a separate stop-word list have to be developed upon each different subject and the size of a stop-word list is hug to control. To solve these problems, this theme proposes an automatic indexing technique which performs simple morphological analysis without analysis upon complex nouns and upon process of ambiguity of a part of speech. After constructing finite automata using simple nouns extracted through a morphological analysis, importance of words in text are figured out according to the term frequency of simple nouns and finite automata. Consequently, overhead upon ambiguity of complex nouns and a part of speech is reduced. This theme investigated performance of a proposed automatic indexing technique in comparison with indexing words extracted through a manual indexing process.분산 및 병렬처리 : 주기성을 이용한 제한된 부하균형 기법
한국정보처리학회, 임종규(Im Jong Kyu), [1998]
분산 및 병렬처리 : 병렬성 검출을 위한 C + + 클래스 설계 및 종속성 분석
한국정보처리학회, 황득영(Hwang Deuk Young), [1998]
분산 및 병렬처리 : 중첩루프에서 병렬화를 위한 자료 종속성제거
한국정보처리학회, 송월봉(Song Weol Bong), [1998]

요약 Abstract 1. 서론 2. 기계번역의 개요 3. 기계번역 유형JMF(Java Media Framework)로 구현한 강의 저작 도구
한국디지털콘텐츠학회, 김일민(Il-Min Kim), [2005] [KCI등재]
모바일 기반의 디지털콘텐츠 사례 전자장부시스템에 관한 연구
한국디지털콘텐츠학회, 송은지(Eun-Jee Song), [2005] [KCI등재]

한국디지털콘텐츠학회, 허문행(Moon-Haeng Huh), [2005] [KCI등재]

한국정보통신기술협회, 양안나, [2017]

인터넷의 발달로 전자문서가 증가함에 따라, 정보검색기술의 중요성도 함께 증가하게 되었다. 본 연구는 비정형 텍스트 웹 문서로부터 사용자가 요구하는 핵심 의미 지식을 추출하기 위하여 LGG (Local Grammar Graph) 구축에 기반 하여 보다 효율적이고 정확한 지식구축을 가능하게 한다. 주가등락이라는 특정 분야의 패턴을 추출하여 만든 패턴 문법을 사용해서 OWL(Web Ontology Language) 기반의 온톨로지를 구축하였다. 특정 분야의 온톨로지를 구축함으로써 기존 검색에서 할 수 없었던 지식의 의미 검색이 가능하며 나아가 사용자가 원하는 질의에 대한 정보의 추론이 가능할 것 이다.요약 Abstract I. 서론 II. 관련연구 1. 온돌로지Wi-Fi 네트워크를 위한 매체적응 MAC 프로토콜
한국인터넷방송통신학회, 김병서, [2009] [KCI등재후보]

한국인터넷방송통신학회, 강우준, [2009] [KCI등재후보]

Smart home system using natural language processing is to control home appliances through language that we use in common life. Now, Software and hardware being producted is not only performance is good but also it pursue convenience and sensitivity. Because performance of computer is very improved, performance is no problem. And it is completed that how to make human can be convenient through plenty of ideas. But it’s somewhat difficult to pursue sensitivity. Smart home we use is able to include performance, convenience and sensitivity like entertainment. Smart home system in Masan make human to feel convenience and entertainment through home automation using speech recognition and natural language processing.
In this paper, we take an appropriate algorithm in smart home not an already proposed natural language analysis. So we research korean interface technology to operate smart home for practical.대학특성변수에 따른 균형성과지표 비교분석
인제대학교, 박주홍, [2009]

인제대학교, 이윤정, [2009]

정보검색의 방법으로 단일 주제어를 키워드로 색인하여 검색하는 방식이 널리 사용되어 왔으나 문서의 내용을 정확히 표현하기 어렵고 검색 결과의 문서 집합 또한 너무 커서 사용자의 만족도가 낮다. 본 논문에서는 자연언어 처리 기술인 구문 분석 모듈을 도입해 단어 이상의 단위인 구 단위를 색인과 검색의 단위로 삼는 구 단위 색인 및 검색 기법을 사용을 제안한다. 웹 문서들 자체가 갖는 다양한 오류들로 인해 현실적으로 충분히 만족할 만할 우수한 성능의 구문 분석 모듈이 구현되기는 어려우므로 상향식 구문 분석 모듈을 구현하여 완전한 구문 분석 결과를 얻지 못하는 많은 문장에 대해서도 구 단위 색인이 가능하며 단일어 색인보다 식별력이 뛰어나 검색 성능이 향상되고 검색 과정의 부하도 줄일수 있다.Information retrieval system with indexing system matching single keyword is simple and popular. But with single keyword matching it is very hard to represent the exact meaning of documents and the set of documents from retrieval is very large, therefore it can't satisfy the user of the information retrieval systems. This paper proposes a phrase-based indexing system based on the phrase, the larger syntax unit than a single keyword. Web documents include lots of syntactic errors, the natural language parser with high Quality cannot be expected in Web. Partial trees, even not a full tree, from fully bottom-up parsing is still useful for extracting phrases, and they are much more discriminative than single keyword for index. It helps the information retrieval system enhance the efficiency and reduce the processing overhead.Improving the quality of Search engine by using the Intelligent agent technolo

영ㆍ유아 안전사고 방지 시스템
한국정보과학회, 우동혁(Dong-Hyuck Woo), [2016]
SSD 내부의 쓰기 버퍼 활용률 분석
한국정보과학회, 이태형(Tae Hyung Lee), [2016]

In this study, by using the natural language processing of the field of artificial intelligence, automated index was performed. And then, the Natural Language Processing Interface for knowledge representation(NALPI) has been developed. Furthermore, the DEsign KnOwledge DataBase(DEKODB) has been also developed, which is designed to interlock the knowledge base. The DEKODB processes both the documented design-data, like a concrete standard specification, and the design knowledge from an expert. The DEKODB is also simulates the design space of structures accordance with the production rule, and thus it is determined that DEKODB can be used as a engine to retrieve new knowledge and to implement knowledge base that is necessary to the development of automatic design system. The application field of the system, which has been developed in this study, can be expanded by supplement of the design knowledge at DEKODB and developing dictionaries for foreign languages. Furthermore, the perfect automation at the data accumulation and development of the automatic rule generator should benefit the unified design automation.온실작물의 관개계획의 수립을 위한 엽온의 활용
한국농공학회, 이남호, [2001]
파이프 골조 온실의 조립 연결구 내력 시험
한국농공학회, 남상운, [2001]
온실 냉방을 위한 히트펌프의 성능 분석
한국농공학회, 윤용철, [2001]

Recently, as the quality of life has been improving, search items in the area of entertainment represent an increasing share of the total usage of Internet portal sites. Information retrieval in the entertainment area is mainly depending on keywords that users are inputting, and the results of information retrieval are the contents that contain those keywords. In this paper, we propose a search method that takes natural language inputs and retrieves the database pertaining to entertainment. The main components of our study are the simple Korean morphological analyzer using case particle information, predicate-oriented token generation, standardized pattern generation coherent to tokens, and automatic generation of the corresponding SQL queries. We also propose an efficient retrieval system that searches the most relevant results from the database in terms of natural language querying, especially in the restricted domain of music, and shows the effectiveness of our system.ABSTRACT 1. 서론 2. 관련연구 3. 연구방법 4. 결론SIFT 기반의 귀 영역을 이용한 개인 식별

한국정보과학회, 송용주(Yongju Song), [2019]

This paper suggests that the methode is realized parsing algorithm of Korean language by coupling value pattern.
This method translates the sentence by the pattern of coupling value on the predicatives that is decided by predicate words, auxiliary words and nouns with meaning properties.
Accordingly, this methode is to use the syntactic transfer methode and semantic transfer methode.周速式 減速機의 齒形과 一般齒車와의 比較 연구

충주대학교, 安重守, [1990]

WIPI를 이용한 인물 배경 합성의 handset 컨텐츠 개발에 관한 연구
한국멀티미디어학회, 가충희(Chung-Hee Ka), [2007]
Most - It: 모바일 메모 관리 시스템 설계 및 구현
한국멀티미디어학회, 김선아(Seon-ah Kim), [2007]

한국멀티미디어학회, 김길호(GilHo Kim), [2007]

In this study, by using the natural language processing of the field of artificial intelligence, automated index was performed. And then, the Natural Language Processing Interface for knowledge representation(NALPI) has been developed. Furthermore, the DEsign KnOwledge DataBase(DEKODB) has been also developed, which is designed to interlock the knowledge base. The DEKODB processes both the documented design-data, like a concrete standard specification, and the design knowledge from an expert. The DEKODB is also simulates the design space of structures accordance with the production rule, and thus it is determined that DEKODB can be used as a engine to retrieve new knowledge and to implement knowledge base that is necessary to the development of automatic design system. The application field of the system, which has been developed in this study, can be expanded by supplement of the design knowledge at DEKODB and developing dictionaries for foreign languages. Furthermore, the perfect automation at the data accumulation and development of the automatic rule generator should benefit the unified design automation.온실작물의 관개계획의 수립을 위한 엽온의 활용
한국농공학회, 이남호, [2001]
파이프 골조 온실의 조립 연결구 내력 시험
한국농공학회, 남상운, [2001]
온실 냉방을 위한 히트펌프의 성능 분석
한국농공학회, 윤용철, [2001]

The most part of the large amounts of information in a variety of fields distributed in the Internet space through a communication network such as SNS representatives are described in the text-based content. An analysis of textual information actually means in this respect is based on a critical analysis of social media. In this paper, we analyzed text extracted by the image that is generated by the smart phone camera. In an effort to build a knowledge base system, we designed a natural language processing system employing the discourse representation theory of machine learning based on previous studies of the natural language processing system.다중 센서에서 생성되는 대용량 데이터가 SNS와 같은 통신을 통해 트위터, 신문, 문자기반의 내용들이 실시간으로 전 세계로 전달되고 있다. 이와 같이 소통되는 소셜 미디어 사용자들의 의견과 이슈를 추적한 후 분석 및 파악하여 사회 현상을 예측하는 작업은 시급히 해결해야 하는 연구 문제 중 하나이다. SNS 등을 대표로 하는 정보통신망을 통해 인터넷 공간에서 유통되는 다양한 분야의 대용량 정보들의 거의 모든 부분은 문자 기반의 내용들로 서술되어 있다. 이러한 측면에서 문자 정보들의 실제적 의미 분석은 소셜 미디어 분석의 중요한 기반이 된다. 본 논문에서는 실제적으론 문자를 추출하고 분석하여 지식 데이터베이스 시스템을 구축하기 위한 노력으로 연구팀의 선행 연구인 기계 학습 기반의 자연어 처리의 연구에 담화 표현 이론을 적용한 시스템을 설계하고 구현하였다.방송통신고등학교 스마트 교육 콘텐츠 표준화 모형 설계
한국창의정보문화학회, 김영천, [2015]
직업별 인터넷 중독 상관관계 분석 연구
한국창의정보문화학회, 전우천, [2015]
플립러닝이 수학 교과의 학업성취도와 수학적 태도에 미치는 영향 분석
한국창의정보문화학회, 이재호, [2015]

멀티미디어 데이터베이스에서의 정보검색
한국데이터베이스진흥원, 김경창, [1996]
하이퍼미디어와 정보검색
한국데이터베이스진흥원, 최윤철, [1996]
데이터베이스 자료의 선택과 음란정보판단기준
한국데이터베이스진흥원, 신각철, [1996]

Recently, the necessity of systems which effectively store and retrieve video data has increased. Conventional video retrieval systems retrieve data using menus or text based keywords. Due to the lack of information, many video clips are simultaneously searched, and the user must have a certain level of knowledge to utilize the system. In this paper, we suggest a natural language based conversational video retrieval system that reflects users' intentions and includes more information than keyword based queries. This system can also retrieve from events or people to their movements. First, an event database is constructed based on meta-data which are generated by domain analysis for collected video in an office environment. Then, a script database is also constructed based on the query pre-processing and analysis. From that, a method to retrieve a video through a matching technique between natural language queries and answers is suggested and validated through performance and process evaluation for 10 users. The natural language based retrieval system has shown its better efficiency in performance and user satisfaction than the menu based retrieval system.최근 동영상을 저장하거나 효과적으로 검색하는 시스템의 필요성이 증가하고 있다. 기존 동영상 검색 시스템은 메뉴나 텍스트 기반의 키워드로 동작하는데, 검색을 위한 정보가 빈약하여 많은 동영상이 동시에 검색되는 경우가 많고, 사용자가 해당 시스템을 사용하기 위한 지식이 필요하다. 본 논문에서는 키워드 기반 질의에 비해 사용자의 의도나 다양한 정보를 포함 할 수 있고 이벤트나 사람 뿐 아니라 인간의 기본적인 행동까지 검색하는 자연어 질의 기반 동영상 검색 시스템을 제안한다. 먼저, 사무실에서 수집된 동영상에 대한 도메인 분석을 통해 메타데이터로 이벤트 데이터베이스를 구축하고, 해당 영역에서의 사용자 질의에 대한 전처리 과정과 분석 작업을 통해 스크립트 데이터베이스를 구축한다. 이렇게 구축된 시스템을 바탕으로 대화형 질의와 답변 쌍 매칭을 통해 동영상을 검색한다. 10명의 사용자를 대상으로 메뉴 기반 검색 시스템과의 성능 평가와 프로세스 평가 비교 검증을 통해, 성능이나 사용자 만족도면에서 제안하는 시스템이 우수함을 보였다.요약 Abstract 1. 서론 2. 관련 연구 3. 제안하는 대화형 동영상 검색 시스템퍼지터치를 이용한 터치스크린에서의 문자 입력 방법에 대한 연구
한국HCI학회, 권성혁(Sung-Hyuk Kwon), [2008]
프랙탈 트리를 이용한 자동 작곡 방법
한국HCI학회, 곽성호(Sung ho Kwak), [2008]
프로그래밍 가능한 그래픽스 하드웨어를 사용한 고품질 전역 조영 생성
한국HCI학회, 차득현(Deukhyun Cha), [2008]

Overall architecture of the Chinese TTS system consists of natural language processing module, grapheme-to-phoneme conversion and prosody prediction module, and speech signal synthesis module. POSTAG/C is a system which combines word segmentation module based on rules and a dictionary with a POS tagging module based on HMM (Hidden Markov Model). The word dictionary was automatically acquired by POS tagged corpus and the system has high portability to serve both GB texts as well as Big5 texts. The word segmenting module is composed of two parts. Input Chinese texts go through a pre-segmenting process at first. The pre-segmenting process splits input texts into short phrases using some special characters that are symbols, numbers, foreign language characters, and mono-character words. Next, we segment in more detailed using four heuristic rules. The two-phase unknown word prediction process extracts candidate boundaries where unknown words possibly occur in a sentence at first. Next, we predict the category of the words with these boundaries using an SVM-based method. The method of our grapheme-to-phoneme conversion is a dictionary-based and rules-based hybrid approach. In this process, our module converts the decided Pinyin strings into more natural forms with standard Chinese phonetic rules.국어 비유어에 나타난 인지사상의 기능과 양상
언어과학회, 이종열, [2004] [KCI등재후보]
석독 입겿문의 동사 ‘삼-’의 의미 기능
언어과학회, 이은규, [2004] [KCI등재후보]
四呼의 名稱考
언어과학회, 정영지, [2004] [KCI등재후보]

대한전자공학회, 이재섭, [1988]
사무용문서교환형식의 변환시스템에 관한 연구 ( A Study on a Translation System of Office Document Interchange Format )
대한전자공학회, 박종훈, [1988]
컬러 자연화 전송 시스템에 관한 연구 ( A Study on the Natural Image Communication System )
대한전자공학회, 오성목, [1988]

Overall architecture of the Chinese `TTS system consists of natural language processing module, grapheme-to-phoneme conversion and prosody prediction module, and speech signal synthesis module. POSTAG/C is a system which combines word segmentation module based on rules and a dictionary with a POS tagging module based on HMM (Hidden Markov Model). The word dictionary was automatically acquired by POS tagged corpus and the system has high portability to serve both GB texts as well as Big5 texts. The word segmenting module is composed of two parts. Input Chinese texts go through a pre-segmenting process at first. The pre-segmenting process splits input texts into short phrases using some special characters that are symbols, numbers, foreign language characters, and mono-character words. Next, we segment in more detailed using four heuristic rules. The two-phase unknown word prediction process extracts candidate boundaries where unknown words possibly occur in a sentence at first. Next, we predict the category of the words with these boundaries using an SVM-based method. The method of our grapheme-to-phoneme conversion is a dictionary-based and rules-based hybrid approach. In this process, our module converts the decided Pinyin strings into more natural forms with standard Chinese phonetic rules.언어적 관철전략과 성별 스테레오타입
언어과학회, 권영수(Young Su Kwon), [2004] [KCI등재]
Syllabification in LuGanda
언어과학회, Gyung Ran Kim(김경란), [2004] [KCI등재]
EVENT 구문의 인지과정에 관한 연구
언어과학회, 서소영(So Young Seo), [2004] [KCI등재]

For question-answering system, question analysis module finds the question points from user’s natural language questions, classifies the question types, and extracts some useful information for answer. This paper proposes a question type classifying technique based on focus words extracted from questions and word semantic information, instead of complicated rules or huge knowledge resources. It also shows how to find the question type without focus words, and how useful the synonym or postfix information to enhance the performance of classifying module.질의응답 시스템에서의 질의 분석 과정은 이용자의 자연어 질의 문장에서 질의 의도를 파악하여 그 유형을 분류하고 정답 추출을 위한 정보를 구하는 것이다. 본 연구에서는 복잡한 분류 규칙 집합이나 대용량의 언어 지식 자원 대신 이용자 질의 문장에서 질의 초점 어휘를 추출하고 구문 구조적으로 관련된 단어들의 의미 정보에 기반하여 효율적으로 질의 유형을 분류하는 방법을 제안한다. 질의 초점 어휘가 생략된 경우의 처리와 동의어와 접미사 정보를 이용하여 질의 유형 분류 성능을 향상시킬 수 있는 방법도 제안한다.디저털 특수자료를 위한 XML 스키마 기반의 메타데이터 표현 체계

한국정보과학회 언어공학연구회, 염은영(Eunyoung Yum), [1995]

“무엇을 도와드릴지 잘 모르겠어요” 다이얼로그 시스템을 사용하다보면 원치 않게 종종 듣게 되는 답변이다. 현재 다이얼로그 시스템은 대화데이터를 학습하여 사용자의 대화 인텐트를 파악하기 때문에 다양한 표현의 학습데이터가 필요하다. 하지만 기존의 학습데이터 방식은 노동집약적 특성을 갖고 있어 많은 대화데이터 수집이 어렵다. 이에 따라 학습데이터 부족으로 인해 빈번한 인텐트 파악 에러가 발생하여 다이얼로그 시스템에 대한 사용자 경험을 저하시키고 있다. 본 연구에서는 태스크 양에 따라 크라우드 소싱 기반 학습데이터 생성 결과에 미치는 영향을 연구하여, 다양한 표현 수집을 위한 크라우드 소싱 태스크 디자인을 제언하고자 한다. 이를 위해 MTurk을 이용하여 문장 의역 태스크를 요청하였으며, 실험 조건에 따라 문장 의역 양을 달리하였다. 실험 결과, 총 560개의 의역 문장이 수집되었으며, 문장 의역 양이 많을수록 수집하고자 한 의미와 다른 경우가 많아지거나 에러비율이 높아지는 것으로 나타났다. 본 연구는 크라우드 소싱 기반의 학습 데이터 생성 태스크 디자인을 함에 있어 태스크 양을 고려하는 가이드를 제시한다는 점에서 연구 의의가 있다.요약문 1. 서론 2. 관련 연구 3. 실험 설계 4. 실험 결과모바일 메신저 환경에서 연인 간에 일어나는 갈등에 대한 분석
한국HCI학회, 고영지(Young-Ji Koh), [2019]

愿怨꾩뿉 ????ㅼ뼇???먯뿰???쒗쁽???ㅻ（??寃껋? 援ъ“ ?뺣낫??????먯뿰??吏덉쓽 ?명꽣?섏씠???곌뎄??以묒슂??臾몄젣 以묒뿉 ?섎굹?대떎. ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪븳 湲곗〈???곌뎄?ㅼ? ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ? ???遺꾩빞???곹빀?섍쾶 援ъ텞?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?섏옉?낆뿉 ?섏〈?섏??? ?대윭???묎렐? ?뚭퇋紐?援ъ“ ?뺣낫??????먯뿰??吏덉쓽 ?명꽣?섏씠??援ъ텞 ???⑥쑉?곸쑝濡??곸슜?????덈떎. ?섏?留?理쒓렐?먮뒗 RDF? OWL怨?媛숈? 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?뺣낫媛 ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ??됱쑝濡??앹꽦?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?섏옉?낆뿉 ?섏〈?섎뒗 ?묎렐???듯빐 ?대윭????됱쓽 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?뺣낫??????먯뿰???명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ? 援ъ텞?섍린?먮뒗 ?대젮????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? ?먯뿰???명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ뿉 ????먯뿰???쒗쁽???ㅼ뼇??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?먮룞?쇰줈 愿怨꾩뿉 ????먯뿰???쒗쁽???섏쭛?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?뺣낫?먯꽌 愿怨꾨뒗 ??媛앹껜瑜??곌껐?섎뒗 ?좎씪???먯?(edge)濡??쒗쁽?쒕떎. ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿? 二쇱뼱吏??먯?濡??곌껐?섎뒗 ?쒕줈 ?ㅻⅨ 媛앹껜 ?띿쓣 留먮춬移?corpus)?먯꽌 寃?됲븯怨?寃?됰맂 媛앹껜 ??二쇰??먯꽌 鍮덈쾲?섍쾶 ?깆옣?섎뒗 ?먯뿰???쒗쁽???섏쭛?쒕떎. ?먮룞?쇰줈 ?섏쭛???먯뿰??吏덉쓽 ?쒗쁽???먯뿰???명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ뿉 ?곸슜??寃곌낵 ?섏옉?낆뿉 ?섏〈?섎뒗 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄?ㅺ낵 鍮꾧탳??留뚰븳 ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵瑜?蹂댁???One of the critical problems in natural language interfaces (NLI) to structured data is to handle the large variability in the way that a relation can be expressed. Existing approaches to solve this problem rely on manual process to adapt NLI to a new domain. The manual approaches can be efficiently applied to small structured data. However, nowadays, large volumes of graph-structured data such as RDF and OWL have been produced from a variety of areas on the web. It is not easy to adapt NLI to such large graph structured data. As a solution of the variability problem in NLI, this paper proposes an automatic method to identify relations in natural language queries for NLI to graph structured data. A relation between two entities is uniquely defined as an edge linking the entities on graph-structured data. The proposed method automatically discovers natural language expressions for given relations by querying entity pairs linked with the relations from a corpus. A relation corresponding to an edge is modeled as a collection of frequently appeared expressions. In the experiment, automatically collected expressions are applied to a NLI and the NLI showed comparable results with manually approaches.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 愿怨꾩뿉 ????먯뿰???쒗쁽 ?먮룞 ?섏쭛 諛⑸쾿?곗튂???뺤긽怨?媛쒖닔???먯쑀濡쒖슫 ?뺤옣??硫?고꽣移섏젣?ㅼ쿂 ?몄떇 諛⑸쾿

However, the methodology of NLP has been considered as a black box in communication studies and not closely verified yet. This study argues that the level of analysis to perform discourse analysis of news articles should be named entities or sentences, not words. ?쁍ewsSource beta?? a news big data analytics system, has functions of NLP including not only morphological analysis and partial parsing, but also sentence boundary disambiguation, named entity recognition, classification of news articles and sentences, and semantic analysis such as word sense disambiguation and coreference resolution. Clustering and ranking algorithm by journalistic values like criticism, is adopted as well. This study explains NLP algorithm of ?쁍ewsSource beta??and shows pilot analysis, and discuss how to improve NLP performance of news articles.1. 臾몄젣?쒓린 2. ?댁뒪 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ쓽 媛쒕뀗怨??덉감 3. ?⑥뼱 以묒떖 ?댁뒪 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ쓽 ?쒓퀎? 媛쒖껜紐?諛?臾몄옣 以묒떖 遺꾩꽍???꾩슂??4. ?댁뒪 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ쓽 ?щ?:?덈돱?ㅼ냼??踰좏??됰? 以묒떖?쇰줈 5. 遺꾩꽍?щ?誘몄꽭癒쇱? ?꾪뿕??????꾨Ц媛? ?쇰컲?몄쓽 ?몄떇李⑥씠? 而ㅻ??덉??댁뀡 ?⑥꽌 ?먯깋

These dependencies cause the discordance between expressions covered by a system and meaning representations of the given domain. This paper proposes a method to generate at least one expression corresponding to a meaningful meaning representation. The proposed method chooses the most appropriate meaning representation by using the generated expressions. The experiment results on question answering for U.S. geography ontology showed that the proposed method outperforms methods of previous studies.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?섎? ?쒗쁽??????먯뿰???쒗쁽 ?앹꽦紐⑥뀡 釉붾윭 諛??꾩썐?쇱씠??泥섎━瑜??듯븳 媛뺤씤??HDR ?곸긽 蹂듭썝 諛⑸쾿

?꾪넻?곸쑝濡??먯뿰??泥섎━??湲고샇二쇱쓽(Symbolism) ?뚮씪?ㅼ엫(paradigm)?섏뿉???곌뎄媛 ?섏뼱 ?붾떎. 理쒓렐?ㅼ뼱 ?깃났?곸쑝濡??묒슜?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?좉꼍留?湲곗닠???섍굅?섏뿬 ?곌껐二쇱쓽(connectionism)媛 ?먯뿰??泥섎━???덈줈???뚮씪?ㅼ엫?쇰줈 ?깆옣?섏??쇰굹 ???뚮씪?ㅼ엫??醫낇빀?곸씠怨?泥닿퀎?곸씤 鍮꾧탳 ?곌뎄???꾩쭅 誘명씉???ㅼ젙?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? ?ы깭源뚯? ?곌뎄???곌껐二쇱쓽 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ ?대줎?ㅼ쓣 湲고샇二쇱쓽 ?대줎?ㅺ낵 泥닿퀎?곸쑝濡?鍮꾧탳 遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 ???뚮씪?ㅼ엫???뱀꽦??醫낇빀?곸쑝濡?怨좎같?쒕떎. ?꾩슱???먯뿰??泥섎━???꾩슂???щ윭 湲곕뒫?ㅼ쓣 ?ㅺ퀎 援ы쁽?섎뒗???덉뼱??媛곴컖???뚮씪?ㅼ엫???곹빀?깆쓣 寃?좏븯???ν썑 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ ?곌뎄瑜??꾪븳 ???뚮씪?ㅼ엫???좏깮?곸씤 ?곸슜??湲곗????쒖떆?쒕떎.Natural language research has long been conducted under the symbol processing paradigm. Even though recent resurrection of neural network introduces a connectionism as a new paradigm for natural language research, a systematic and comprehensive comparative study of both paradigms is still called for. In this paper, previous connectionist natural language research results are analyzed and both paradigms are compared and contrasted. We explain the major features of connectionism and symbolism for knowledge represenation and induce strong and weak features of both paradigms to implement several functionalities of a natural language system.?붿빟 ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?곌껐二쇱쓽 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?곌껐二쇱쓽? 湲고샇二쇱쓽??吏?앺몴?꾩긽???뱀쭠蹂묐젹泥섎━瑜??꾪븳 ?ㅼ뼇???⑥닔???섑뻾諛⑹떇??媛뽰텣 ?쇳빀???꾨줈洹몃옒諛?紐⑤뜽怨??몄뼱

?먯뿰??泥섎━???멸컙-湲곌퀎 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ쓽 二쇱슂???곌뎄 二쇱젣濡??ㅻ（?댁?怨??덉쑝硫? ?ㅼ뼇???곌뎄瑜??듯빐 臾댁씤??났湲??쒖뼱 遺꾩빞源뚯? ?곸슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?꾩옱 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠? ?⑥닚???⑥뼱 ?몄떇 肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲????뷀삎?쒖쓽 臾몄옣源뚯? ?몄떇?섎뒗 ?섏????꾨떖?덈떎. ?섏?留?臾댁씤??났湲??쒖뼱 湲곗닠??愿?⑤맂 ?곌뎄??紐?媛쒖쓽 ?⑥뼱濡?援ъ꽦??媛꾨떒??紐낅졊???몄떇?섎뒗 ?섏???癒몃Т瑜닿퀬 ?덉쑝硫? ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠??臾댁씤湲??쒖뼱???묐ぉ?쒗궓 ?щ???李얠븘蹂닿린 ?섎뱾?? ?댁뿉 ?곕씪 蹂??쇰Ц? ?먯뿰??泥섎━瑜??꾪븳 ?대줎??諛곌꼍 諛?諛⑸쾿怨??щ?瑜??듯븳 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ ?곌뎄 ?숉뼢???뚭컻?섏뿬 臾댁씤??났湲??쒖뼱瑜??꾪빐 ?꾩슂??湲곗닠怨??욎쑝濡쒖쓽 ?곌뎄 諛⑺뼢???쒖떆?쒕떎.Natural Language Processing(NLP) is an important issue in man-machine interface, and has been applied to UAV control area based on its development. Many studies on NLP have been performed, so that it can recognize the series of sentences such as human dialogues. For UAV control, however, a sequence of simple-limited words are used to manage the flight and mission of UAV, and a few research has been done applying NLP to control UAV. In this paper, the background knowldege/methods of NLP and research trends with case study are introduced, and the required NLP technologies and research directions for future works can be obtained.珥덈줉 ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 怨쇱젙?ㅻ┛?뷀삎 PET ?⑷린???섏븬???꾩긽?????PVDF ?쇱꽌瑜??댁슜???숈쟻 蹂?뺣쪧 痢≪젙

???쇰Ц? ?먯뿰???앹꽦??諛⑺뼢?먯꽌 ?묎렐?섏뿬 ?꾩궛 ?댄쐶遺濡쒖꽌 ?몄쥌?ъ쟾??誘몄떆 援ъ“瑜??댄뵾怨? 蹂듭옟??誘몄떆 援ъ“??媛쒕퀎 ?댄쐶 ??ぉ??臾몄옣?앹꽦 怨쇱젙???좏깮?곸쑝濡??쒖슜?섍린 ?꾪븳 寃⑹옄 ?뺤떇?붾? ?쒖븞?쒕떎. 寃⑹옄 ?뺤떇?붾뒗 ?ъ쟾??蹂듭옟??湲곗닠 ?댁슜???⑥닚??援ъ“濡??쒗쁽?섍쾶 ?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?대뒗 媛쒕퀎 ?댄쐶 ??ぉ???꾨땲???щ윭 ?댄쐶 ??ぉ???뺣낫瑜?蹂닿쾶?섍퀬, ?댄쐶遺 ?뺣낫瑜??먯뿰?대줈 ?쎄쾶 援ъ꽦?섍쾶 ?쒕떎. ?뱁엳, ?⑹뼵怨?泥댁뼵?ъ쟾??寃⑹옄 ?뺤떇?붾뒗 ?쒗쁽 援ъ“瑜??쎄쾶 吏쒓쾶 ?쒕떎. 洹몃━怨??대? ?ъ쟾??寃⑹옄 ?뺤떇?붾뒗 ?쒗쁽 援ъ“?먯꽌 ?쒖링 ?뺥깭濡?蹂?섏쓣 ?쎄쾶 ?쒕떎.
?곕━???듯빀 吏??踰좎씠?ㅻ줈???몄쥌?ъ쟾???쒖슜???꾪븳 ?먯뿰???앹꽦???묎렐?쇰줈???몄쥌?ъ쟾??誘몄떆 援ъ“瑜??댄뵾怨? 媛???쒗쁽 援ъ“? ?쒖링?곸씤 ?댄쐶 ?뺥깭???앹꽦???꾪븳 寃⑹옄 ?뺤떇?붾? ?ㅺ퀎?섏??? ???대윭??怨쇱젙???듯빐 ?꾩궛 ?댄쐶遺濡쒖꽌??媛쒖꽑?먯쓣 ?뺣━?섏???Sejong Dictionary is a knowledgebase platform which consists of various kinds of subcategory dictionaries and also a huge synthetic lexicon with morphologica, semantic and syntatic information. Although Sejong dictionary was the product of the project which was oriented to various application uses, it has been approached by a few studies of NLP and there is scarcely an effort to manipulate and use it.
This paper approaches to Sejong dictionary from NLG study and investigates the microstructure of it and then set out to format the lattice structure as a design of information makeup for developing NLG. The lattice formating is to make from the complex structure into the simple structure. This makes us have the information of various lexical entries instead of that of individaul lexical item and also makes it easy to construct natural language expression from lexicon. For one, we show that the representing structure of predicate and argument can be easily composed on lattice formatting. In addition, we show that the surface expressions also can be easily converted from the representing structures on it. Furthermore, in the process of this examination, we figure out the improvements in the macro and micro structure of this dictionary for a computational feasibility.
In all, we approached to Sejong dictionary from NLG perspective. we have examined the micro structure and tried to design the lattice formatting for computationally generating. During these process we arrange the improvements for computational lexicon.?덈꼈由с?1. 癒몃━留?2. ?몄쥌?꾩옄?ъ쟾??愿???곌뎄 3. 寃⑹옄 ?뺤떇?붿? ?먯뿰???쒗쁽 ?앹꽦 4. ?꾩궛 ?댄쐶遺濡쒖꽌??媛쒖꽑?먮꽕?몄썙??遺꾩꽍怨??섏쐞 諛⑹뼵 援ы쉷 ?곌뎄
?쒓??숉쉶, ?뺤꽦??Jung Sung-hoon), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
?쒓뎅???숈뒿?먯쓽 ?묒냽遺???ъ슜 ?묒긽 ?곌뎄
?쒓??숉쉶, ?쒖넚??Han Song-hwa), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
?쒓뎅 ?ㅻЦ???ы쉶???쒓뎅?닿탳???뺤콉 ?쒖븞
?쒓??숉쉶, ?ㅽ븯?(Oh Ha-eun), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒖뒪??媛쒕컻???덉뼱???붽뎄臾몄꽌(requirements document)瑜??앹꽦?섍퀬 ?뺥삎 紐낆꽭瑜??묒꽦?섎뒗 寃껋? ?붽뎄 遺꾩꽍 ?꾨Ц媛? 紐낆꽭 ?꾨Ц媛???섑빐 ?섑뻾?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 留뚯빟 ?붽뎄臾몄꽌 ?앹꽦怨??뺥삎 紐낆꽭 ?묒꽦 怨쇱젙???먮룞???쒕떎硫??쒖뒪??媛쒕컻 鍮꾩슜 諛?湲곌컙???⑥텞?????덇퀬, ?먰븳 ?꾨Ц媛 ?ъ씠???섎せ???댄빐濡??명븳 ?ㅻ쪟瑜?以꾩씪 ???덈떎. ?紐낆궗???몄묶?紐낆궗? 吏?쒕?紐낆궗濡?遺꾨쪟?????덈떎. ?쇰컲?곸쑝濡??붽뎄臾몄꽌???뱀꽦???몄묶?紐낆궗???ъ슜?섏? ?딄린 ?뚮Ц??蹂??쇰Ц? 吏?쒕?紐낆궗??吏?쒖뼱 寃곗젙??珥덉젏???먭퀬 ?덈떎. 吏?쒕?紐낆궗瑜??ы븿?섎뒗 ?붽뎄臾몄꽌?먯꽌 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?湲곕쾿???듯빐 ?뺥삎?붾맂 ?붽뎄?ы빆???먮룞?쇰줈 異붿텧?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?紐낆궗??吏?쒖뼱 寃곗젙??留ㅼ슦 以묒슂?섎떎. 蹂??곌뎄??理쒖쥌 紐⑺몴???먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕쾿???듯븯???먯뿰???붽뎄臾몄꽌濡쒕????쒖뒪??媛쒕컻???꾩슂???뺥삎 紐낆꽭瑜??먮룞?쇰줈 ?앹꽦?섎뒗???덈떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц? ?좏뻾?곌뎄瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?쒓뎅?대줈 湲곗닠???먯뿰???붽뎄臾몄꽌?먯꽌 ?紐낆궗?????吏?쒖뼱瑜?寃곗젙?섎뒗 議곗쓳???댁냼(anaphora resolution) ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. 蹂??쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒕컻???꾪빐 議곗쓳???댁냼瑜??꾪븳 寃쏀뿕 洹쒖튃???뺤쓽?섍퀬, ?대? ?듯빐 10媛쒖쓽 ?붽뎄臾몄꽌??????ㅽ뿕??寃곌낵 ?됯퇏 ?ы쁽??92.45%, ?뺥솗瑜?69.68%???깅뒫??蹂댁???When a system is developed, requirements document is generated by requirement analysts and then translated to formal specifications by specifiers. If a formal specification can be generated automatically from a natural language requirements document, system development cost and system fault from experts' misunderstanding will be decreased. A pronoun can be classified in personal and demonstrative pronoun. In the characteristics of requirements document, the personal pronouns are almost not occurred, so we focused on the decision of antecedent for a demonstrative pronoun. For the higher accuracy in analysis of requirements document automatically, finding antecedent of demonstrative pronoun is very important for elicitation of formal requirements automatically from natural language requirements document via natural language processing. The final goal of this research is to automatically generate formal specifications from natural language requirements document. For this, this paper, based on previous research [3], proposes an anaphora resolution system to decide antecedent of pronoun using natural language processing from natural language requirements document in Korean. This paper proposes heuristic rules for the system implementation. By experiments, we got 92.45%, 69.98% as recall and precision respectively with ten requirements documents.援ъ“愿?諛⑹떇 3李⑥썝 蹂듭썝???꾪븳 媛꾪렪???꾨줈?앺꽣-移대찓??蹂댁젙 湲곗닠

To do this, the analytic skills for data extraction and data processing are required to users. As a user has various kinds of questions for the consumer data analysis, the user should use database language such as SQL. However, for the firm's user, to generate SQL statements is not easy because the accuracy of the query result is hugely influenced by the knowledge of work-site operation and the firm's database. This paper proposes a natural language based database search framework finding relevant database elements. Specifically, we describe how our TableRank method can understand the user's natural query language and provide proper relations and attributes of data records to the user. Through several experiments, it is supported that the TableRank provides accurate database elements related to the user's natural query. We also show that the close distance among relations in the database represents the high data connectivity which guarantees matching with a search query from a user.?⑤씪?몄눥?묐ぐ?먯꽌 援щℓ怨좉컼???몄?遺議고솕媛 遺덈쭔議?諛??ш뎄留ㅼ뿉 誘몄튂???곹뼢??愿???곌뎄 - e-CRM 援ъ꽦?붿냼 以?e-Community瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈 -
?쒓뎅CRM?숉쉶, ?대뱷洹? [2009]

理쒓렐???멸났吏?κ린踰뺤쓣 ?곸슜???먯뿰??泥섎━ ?꾨줈洹몃옩??媛쒕컻?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?곌뎄媛 留롮씠 吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덉쑝???꾩쭅源뚯????먯뿰???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 ?깆뿉 ?遺遺?留롮? ?몃젰??湲곗슱?닿퀬 ?덉쑝硫??뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵瑜??쒖슜?섍린 ?꾪븳 湲곕쾿??????곌뎄媛 遺議깊븳 ?ㅼ젙?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰?댁쓽 ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵? 洹쒖튃 異붾줎 湲곕쾿???쒖슜?섏뿬 寃뚯엫?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 NPC(Non-Player Character)媛 ?ъ슜?먯? ?먯뿰??臾몄옣?쇰줈 ??붾? 媛?ν븯寃??섎뒗 ?먯뿰??????꾨줈洹몃옩??媛쒕컻?섏??? ?대? ?꾪븯??湲곗〈??媛쒕컻?섏뼱 ?덈뒗 洹쒖튃 異붾줎 ?붿쭊??NEO瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?먯뿰?????泥섎━???곹빀??洹쒖튃???쒗쁽怨?援ы쁽 湲곕쾿???쒖븞?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕???꾪븯???ㅼ씠?댄듃??????곷떞????二쇰뒗 NPC瑜?媛?곸쑝濡??ㅼ젙?섏뿬 ?ㅼ씠?댄듃??愿?⑤맂 吏?앹쓣 洹쒖튃怨??ъ떎?ㅻ줈 ?앹꽦?섏??쇰ŉ ?ㅼ씠?댄듃? 愿?⑤맂 蹂댄렪?곸씤 臾몄옣?ㅻ줈 ?꾨줈洹몃옩???섑뻾??寃곌낵 ?먯뿰?ㅻ윭??????댁슜???앹꽦?⑥쓣 ?????덉뿀??Recently, there are many researches about natural language processing programs using artificial intelligence methods. But the researches mostly concentrate on Korean morphological analyses and there are few researches about application of the results of Korean morphological analyses. In this paper, we implemented a natural language conversation program that NPC in games can talk with users by natural language sentences using the results of morphological analyses and a rule-based inference method. We proposed representation and implementation methods of rules suitable for the processing of natural language conversation using NEO, a rule-based inference engine. In the experiment using rules and facts about knowledge of conversation for diet counselor NPC, we could verify that natural conversation results were produced.?곌?踰뺤튃 留덉씠??Association Rule Mining)???댁슜??ANIDS (Advanced Network Based IDS) ?ㅺ퀎

?먯뿰?대줈 ?묒꽦??怨좉컼???붽뎄?ы빆? 媛쒕컻怨쇱젙?먯꽌 紐⑤뜽留??몄뼱濡??ъ옉???쒕떎. 洹몃윭??媛쒕컻??李몄뿬?섎뒗 ?ㅼ뼇??怨꾩링???щ엺?ㅼ? 紐⑤뜽留??몄뼱濡??묒꽦???붽뎄?ы빆???댄빐?섏? 紐삵븯??寃쎌슦媛 留롮씠 諛쒖깮?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??REED(REquirement EDitor)濡??묒꽦???붽뎄?ы빆 紐⑤뜽???먯뿰?대줈 踰덉뿭?섏뿬 媛쒕컻??李몄뿬?섎뒗 紐⑤뱺 怨꾩링???щ엺?ㅼ씠 ?붽뎄?ы빆 紐⑤뜽???댄빐?????덈룄濡??꾩?二쇰뒗 諛⑹븞???쒖떆?쒕떎. ?쒖떆??諛⑸쾿? 3?④퀎濡?援ъ꽦?섏뼱 ?덈떎. 1?④퀎 IORT(Input-Output Relation Tree) ?앹꽦, 2?④퀎 RTT(Requirement Translation Tree) ?앹꽦, 3?④퀎 ?먯뿰?대줈 踰덉뿭???④퀎瑜?嫄곗튇??Customers' requirements written in a natural language are rewritten to modeling language in development phases. In many cases, those who participate in development cannot understand requirements written in modeling language. This paper proposes the translation technique from the requirement model which is written by REED(REquirement EDitor) tool into a natural language in order to help for the customer understanding requirement model. This technique consists of three phases: $1^{st}$ phase is generating the IORT(Input-Output Relation Tree), $2^{nd}$ phase is generating the RTT(Requirement Translation Tree), $3^{rd}$ phase is translating into a natural language.?몃━ 而댄룷?뚰듃 紐⑤뜽 : ?섏씠釉뚮━??硫붿떆吏 ?꾨떖???ъ슜??而댄룷?뚰듃 議고빀

Existing scenario and interview techniques in requirements elicitation cannot solve the consistency and the completeness of requirements. Consequently, reduces the total school-age children, but maladjusted children is increased. To support these maladjusted children, new ways of identifying behavior problems and reducing the number of their occurrences is required. In this research, natural language processing technology from the information technology (IT) field was employed to reduce instances of mediating problematic behaviors. To automatically analyze behavior problem patterns using natural language processing technology, behavior problem area analysis methods were developed, and the efficacy of the pattern analysis methods were evaluated. Characteristics of each behavior problem type were analyzed to establish an electronic dictionary of behavior problem that was required for the natural language processing technology. As a result of developing a behavior problem type analysis method that used six natural language processing technologies by using the electronic dictionary, ?쏿nalysis method 6??displayed an 84% match with experts??classification results. Analysis method 6 decreased the time-demand by 9.9% compared with the existing analysis conducted manually. After experiencing the analysis system developed in this study, all educators who participated in the survey commented that if an online service for mediating behavior problems was developed, they would use it.?? ?쒕줎 210 ?? ?곌뎄 諛⑸쾿 212 ?? ?곌뎄寃곌낵 219 ?? ?쇱쓽 諛??쒖뼵 233?μ븷???대룞蹂댁“湲곌린 ?덉쟾?ш퀬 ?ㅽ깭議곗궗

??臾몄꽌 寃?됱쓣 ?꾪빐 ?ㅼ썙?쒖? 遺덈━???곗궛?앹쓣 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 寃껋뿉 鍮꾪빐 ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽 臾몄옣???낅젰?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿? 寃???쒖뒪???ъ슜?먯뿉寃??⑥뵮 ?댁긽?곸씤 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ씠?? 蹂??쇰Ц? ?ъ슜?먭? ?낅젰?섎뒗 ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽臾몄옣??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 洹?援щЦ 援ъ“??湲곕컲?섏뿬 寃?됱뼱瑜??뺤옣?섎뒗 ?ㅼ쨷 寃??湲곕쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 援щЦ ?몃━瑜??쒗쉶?섏뿬 援ъ“?곸쑝濡??곌???蹂듯빀 紐낆궗瑜?議고빀?섍굅??遺꾪븷?섎뒗 怨쇱젙??嫄곗튂怨? ?댄삎 ?쒓린 諛?異뺤빟?쒓린 ?⑹뼱?ㅼ뿉 ????뺤옣 ?ㅼ쨷 寃?됲븿?쇰줈?????뺣낫 寃???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?ы쁽?④낵 ?뺥솗?꾨? ?믪씪 ???덈떎. <br/>For the users of information retrieval systems. natural language query is the more ideal interface. compared with keyword and boolean expressions. This paper proposes a retrieval technique with expanded keyword from syntactically-analyzed structures of natural language query as user input. Through the steps combining or splitting the compound nouns based on syntactic tree traversal of the query. and expanding the other-formed or shorten-formed into multiple keyword. it can enhance the precision and correctness of the retrieval system.珥덈줉

?뺥삎紐낆꽭???먯뿰?댁쓽 紐⑦샇?⑥쓣 ?녿뒗 紐낅즺???쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎瑜?媛?ν븯寃??쒕떎. ?곹깭李⑦듃? 媛숈? ?뺥삎紐낆꽭 ???붽뎄?ы빆? ?쒕??덉씠?섏씠???뺥삎寃利앹쓣 ?듯빐 ?붽뎄?ы빆???ㅽ뻾?섏뿬 蹂????덉쑝硫? ???섏븘媛 ?щ윭 媛吏 ?뱀꽦???뺥삎寃利앷낵 媛숈? 寃利?湲곕쾿?쇰줈 寃利??????덈떎. ?섏?留??먯뿰???붽뎄?ы빆???곹깭李⑦듃濡?蹂?섑븯???ㅼ뼇???붽뎄?ы빆???뱀꽦??湲곗닠?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?곷떦???몃젰怨?寃쏀뿕???꾩슂濡??섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰???붽뎄?ы빆???곹깭李⑦듃濡?吏곸젒 蹂?섑븯??湲곕쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??湲곕뒫?곸씤 ?붽뎄 ?ы빆???먯뿰?대? 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬, ?먰븳 ?뚰봽?몄썾???붽뎄?ы빆 湲곗닠???곸젅?섎룄濡??곹깭李⑦듃 臾몃쾿???섎?瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎.?붿빟 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?뚰봽?몄썾?댁쓽 ?붽뎄?ы빆 ?뱀꽦 4. ?먯뿰???붽뎄 ?ы빆???곹깭李⑦듃??紐낆꽭?뚮옒??硫붾え由ъ긽??B+?몃━瑜??꾪븳 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?됱씤 踰꾪띁 愿由??뺤콉
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?댄쁽??Hyun-Seob Lee), [2006]
媛쒖꽑???뚯떆??湲곕컲 ?섎?濡좎쟻 ?뺤텞 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 諛뺥삎誘?Hyoungmin Park), [2006]
?곗씠???ㅽ듃由쇱뿉??MJoin???댁슜???ㅼ쨷 議곗씤 吏덉쓽??理쒖쟻??湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?댄뿄二?Hunjoo Lee), [2006]

When a system is developed, requirements document is generated by requirement analysts and then translated to formal specifications by specifiers. If a formal specification can be generated automatically from a natural language requirements document, system development cost and system fault from experts' misunderstanding will be decreased. A pronoun can be classified in personal and demonstrative pronoun. In the characteristics of requirements document, the personal pronouns are almost not occurred, so we focused on the decision of antecedent for a demonstrative pronoun. For the higher accuracy in analysis of requirements document automatically, finding antecedent of demonstrative pronoun is very important for elicitation of formal requirements automatically from natural language requirements document via natural language processing. The final goal of this research is to automatically generate formal specifications from natural language requirements document. For this, this paper, based on previous research [3], proposes an anaphora resolution system to decide antecedent of pronoun using natural language processing from natural language requirements document in Korean. This paper proposes heuristic rules for the system implementation. By experiments, we got 92.45%, 69.98% as recall and precision respectively with ten requirements documents.?쒖뒪??媛쒕컻???덉뼱???붽뎄臾몄꽌(requirements document)瑜??앹꽦?섍퀬 ?뺥삎 紐낆꽭瑜??묒꽦?섎뒗 寃껋? ?붽뎄 遺꾩꽍 ?꾨Ц媛? 紐낆꽭 ?꾨Ц媛???섑빐 ?섑뻾?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 留뚯빟 ?붽뎄臾몄꽌 ?앹꽦怨??뺥삎 紐낆꽭 ?묒꽦 怨쇱젙???먮룞???쒕떎硫??쒖뒪??媛쒕컻 鍮꾩슜 諛?湲곌컙???⑥텞?????덇퀬, ?먰븳 ?꾨Ц媛 ?ъ씠???섎せ???댄빐濡??명븳 ?ㅻ쪟瑜?以꾩씪 ???덈떎. ?紐낆궗???몄묶?紐낆궗? 吏?쒕?紐낆궗濡?遺꾨쪟?????덈떎. ?쇰컲?곸쑝濡??붽뎄臾몄꽌???뱀꽦???몄묶?紐낆궗???ъ슜?섏? ?딄린 ?뚮Ц??蹂??쇰Ц? 吏?쒕?紐낆궗??吏?쒖뼱 寃곗젙??珥덉젏???먭퀬 ?덈떎. 吏?쒕?紐낆궗瑜??ы븿?섎뒗 ?붽뎄臾몄꽌?먯꽌 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?湲곕쾿???듯빐 ?뺥삎?붾맂 ?붽뎄?ы빆???먮룞?쇰줈 異붿텧?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?紐낆궗??吏?쒖뼱 寃곗젙??留ㅼ슦 以묒슂?섎떎. 蹂??곌뎄??理쒖쥌 紐⑺몴???먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕쾿???듯븯???먯뿰???붽뎄臾몄꽌濡쒕????쒖뒪??媛쒕컻???꾩슂???뺥삎 紐낆꽭瑜??먮룞?쇰줈 ?앹꽦?섎뒗???덈떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц? ?좏뻾?곌뎄瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?쒓뎅?대줈 湲곗닠???먯뿰???붽뎄臾몄꽌?먯꽌 ?紐낆궗?????吏?쒖뼱瑜?寃곗젙?섎뒗 議곗쓳???댁냼(anaphora resolution) ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. 蹂??쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒕컻???꾪빐 議곗쓳???댁냼瑜??꾪븳 寃쏀뿕 洹쒖튃???뺤쓽?섍퀬, ?대? ?듯빐 10媛쒖쓽 ?붽뎄臾몄꽌??????ㅽ뿕??寃곌낵 ?됯퇏 ?ы쁽??92.45%, ?뺥솗瑜?69.68%???깅뒫??蹂댁???P2P (Peer-to-Peer) 鍮꾨뵒???ㅽ듃由щ컢???꾪븳 ?ㅼ쨷 鍮꾨뵒???덉쭏 ?몄꽱?곕툕 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 沅뚯쭊諛? [2010] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?꾪씗?? [2010] [KCI?깆옱]
?꾨쿋?붾뱶 ?섍꼍?먯꽌???ㅼ떆媛?由쎈━???쒖뒪??援ы쁽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?뺤꽦?? [2010] [KCI?깆옱]

Deep neural networks with different structures in natural language processing showed different performance results even though they utilize training set with the same corpus. For this reason, before improving the structure of the model, researchers go through the process of finding a model that show good performance in general. In this paper, the accuracy of the deep neural networks is compared in various aspects with different corpus type.
For our experiments, we used three neural networks and three corpus. The first model is CNN and the second model is RNN. Finally, the third model, CNN and RNN combined model. We compared the accuracy of models in terms of different data sizes, different word expressions, and different corpus, so that our work provides guidelines for selecting the appropriate neural network for natural language corpus via three comparison methods.湲곗〈 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?遺꾩빞???ㅻⅨ 援ъ“瑜?媛뽯뒗 ?ъ링 ?좉꼍留앸뱾? 媛숈? 留먮춬移섎? ?숈뒿?덉쓬?먮룄 留먮춬移섏쓽 ?뱀꽦???곕씪?ㅻⅨ ?깅뒫??蹂댁뿬二쇱뿀?? 留먮춬移섎? ?숈뒿?덉쓣 ???쇰컲?곸쑝濡?以?섑븳 ?깅뒫???대뒗 紐⑤뜽??李얘린 ?꾪븯?? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??援ъ꽦???ㅻⅨ ?먯뿰??留먮춬移섎? ?ъ링?좉꼍留앹뿉 ?숈뒿?쒖폒 留먮춬移섎퀎 ?ъ링?좉꼍留앹쓽 ?뺥솗?꾨? ?ㅼ뼇??痢〓㈃?먯꽌 鍮꾧탳?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕???ъ슜???ъ링?좉꼍留앹? ?쇰컲?곸쑝濡?AND, OR, NOT怨?媛숈? ?곗궛?먮? ?ъ슜?섎뒗 遺덈━??吏덉쓽???ъ슜?먯쓽 寃?됱쓽?꾨? ?뺥솗?섍쾶 ?쒗쁽?????덇린 ?뚮Ц??寃???꾨Ц媛?ㅼ? 遺덈━??吏덉쓽瑜??ъ슜?섏뿬 ?믪? 寃?됱꽦?μ쓣 ?삳뒗?ㅺ퀬 ?뚮젮???덉?留? ?쇰컲 ?ъ슜?먮뒗 ?먯떊???먰븯???뺣낫瑜?遺덈━???뺥깭濡??쒗쁽?섎뒗???듭닕?섏? ?딅떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??寃?됱꽦?μ쓽 ?μ긽怨??ъ슜???몄쓽?깆쓣 ?숈떆??留뚯”?섍린 ?꾪븯???ъ슜?먯쓽 ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽瑜??뺤옣 遺덈━??吏덉쓽濡??먮룞 蹂?섑븯??諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. 癒쇱? ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽瑜?踰붿＜臾몃쾿??湲곕컲??援щЦ遺꾩꽍???섑뻾?섏뿬 援щЦ?몃━瑜??앹꽦?섍퀬 ?곗궛??諛??ㅼ썙???뺣낫瑜?異붿텧?섏뿬 援щЦ?몃━瑜?媛꾨왂?뷀븳?? ?ㅼ쓬?쇰줈 媛꾨왂?붾맂 援щЦ?몃━濡쒕??곕챸?ш뎄瑜??⑹꽦?섍퀬 ?ㅼ썙?쒕뱾?????媛以묒튂瑜?遺?ы븳 ??遺덈━??吏덉쓽瑜??앹꽦?섏뿬 寃?됱쓣 ?섑뻾?섎떎. ?먰븳 援щЦ遺꾩꽍???ㅻ쪟濡??명븳 寃?됱꽦????섎? 理쒖냼?뷀븯湲??꾪븯???곸쐞 N媛?援щЦ?몃━?????媛곴컖 遺덈━??吏덉쓽瑜??앹꽦?섏뿬 寃?됲븯??N-BEST average 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?섏??? ?뺣낫寃???ㅽ뿕???곗씠? 紐⑥쓬??KTSET2.0?쇰줈 ?ㅽ뿕??寃곌낵 ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿? ?섎룞?쇰줈 異붿텧??遺덈━??吏덉쓽蹂대떎 8竊????곗닔???깅뒫??蹂댁?怨? 湲곗〈??踰≫꽣怨듦컙 紐⑤뜽??湲곕컲???먯뿰?댁쭏???쒖뒪?쒖뿉 鍮꾪빐 23竊??깅뒫?μ긽??蹂댁???There have been a considerable evidence that trained users can achieve a good search effectiveness through a boolean query because a structural boolean query containing operators such as AND, OR, and NOT can make a more accurate representation of user's information need. However, it is not easy for ordinary users to construct a boolean query using appropriate boolean operators. In this paper, we propose a boolean query formulation method that automatically transforms a user's natural language query into a extended boolean query for both effectiveness and user convenience. First, a user's natural language query is syntactically analyzed using KCCG(Korean Combinatory Categorial Grammar) parser and resulting syntactic trees are structurally simplified using a tree-simplifying mechanism in order to catch the logical relationships between keywords. Next, in a simplified tree, plausible noun phrases are identified and added into the same tree as new additional keywords, Finally, a simplified syntactic tree is automatically converted into a boolean query using some mapping rules and linguistic heuristics. We also propose an N-BEST average method that uses top N syntactic trees to compensate for bad effects of single incorrect top syntactic tree. In experiments using KTSET2.0, we showed that a proposed method outperformed a traditional vector space model by 23%, and surprisingly manually constructed boolean queries by 8%.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 湲곗〈???곌뎄 3. ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽 泥섎━湲??꾩껜援ъ“MLP???⑥닔洹쇱궗???λ젰???댁슜???대룞?듭떊 3李⑥썝 ?꾪뙆 ?먯떎 紐⑤뜽留?
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?댄쁺以(Seomin Yang), [1999]

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?먯닔(Chum Su Kim), [1999]
?쒓났媛??곗씠? 紐⑤뜽 : ?댁썝 ?쒓컙??吏?먰븯???쇱감??援ъ“
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?댁꽦醫?Seong Jong Lee), [1999]

Digital library is the most important database system that needs information retrieval engine for natural language documents and multimedia data. This paper describes the experimental results of information retrieval engine and browser based on natural language processing. It includes lexical analysis, syntax processing, stemming, and keyword indexing for the natural language text. With the experimental database ?쁄arth and Space Science??that has lots of images and titles and their descriptive text in natural language, text-based search engine was tested. Combined with content-based image search engine, it is expected to be a multimedia information retrieval system in digital library?붿????꾩꽌愿? ?먯뿰??臾몄꽌? 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?먮즺??????뺣낫 寃???붿쭊???꾩슂濡??섎뒗 媛??以묒슂???곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠?? ???쇰Ц? ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕쾿???뺣낫 寃???붿쭊怨?釉뚮씪?곗???????ㅺ퀎? ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵瑜??뚭컻?쒕떎. ?먯뿰??臾몄꽌??????뺣낫 寃??怨쇱젙? ?댄쐶 遺꾩꽍, 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍, ?ㅽ뀒諛? 二쇱젣???됱씤 ?깆쓽 怨꾩궛?숈쟻 泥섎━瑜??ы븿?쒕떎. 留롮? ?대?吏? ?대?吏???쒕ぉ, 洹몃━怨??먯뿰?대줈 湲곗닠???ㅻ챸 臾몄꽌瑜??ы븿?섎뒗 ?ㅽ뿕?곸씤 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪 ?쁄arth and Space Science?숇? ?듯빐???먯뿰??臾몄꽌 遺꾩꽍??湲곕컲?섎뒗 ?뺣낫 寃??湲곕뒫???ㅽ뿕?섏??? ?먰븳 ?붿????꾩꽌愿 ?섍꼍?먯꽌??硫?곕??붿뼱 ?뺣낫 寃???댁슜 湲곕컲???대?吏 寃???붿쭊怨?蹂묓뻾?섎뒗 ?뺣낫 寃???쒖뒪?쒖쑝濡쒖꽌??媛?μ꽦??蹂댁뿬以??Bayes ?뺣━??湲곕컲??媛쒖꽑???숉삎?댁쓽??遺꾨퀎 紐⑦뀛

Design of a Module Interconnection Language and Its Processor
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源紐낇샇(Myung Ho Kim), [1985]
?꾨줈洹몃옩 紐낆꽭瑜??꾪븳 Pseudo Code Processor??媛쒕컻

?쇨뎄????쒖쟻??湲곕줉 ?ㅽ룷痢좊줈???섎쭖? 湲곕줉???앹궛?쒕떎. ?대젃寃??앹궛?섏뼱 ?꾩쟻??湲곕줉 ?뺣낫???좎닔?ㅼ쓽 寃쎄린???μ긽???꾩???以?肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲???쇨뎄? 愿?⑤맂 ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞???꾨Ц媛?ㅼ뿉寃뚮룄 ?좎슜?섎떎. 洹몃옒???좎냽?섍퀬 ?몃━?섍쾶 ?쒓났?섏뼱???쒕떎. 洹몃윭???대윭???곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?섍퀬 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗???덉뼱 ?꾩옱 ?쒖뒪?쒖? 蹂듭옟??而⑦듃濡?議곗옉???섑빐 鍮꾪슚?⑥쟻?쇰줈 吏덉쓽?묐떟???산퀬 ?덈떎. ?곕씪??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰?댁쿂由щ? ?ъ슜??吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먯뿰?댁쿂由щ갑?앹? 吏덉쓽臾몄옣 ?앹꽦怨쇱젙??媛꾩냼?붾릺誘濡??좎냽???묐떟???쒓났?????덈떎. 湲곕줉?뺣낫??????좎냽??吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖? 愿?⑥뾽臾댁쓽 ?⑥쑉?깆쓣 ?믪씠怨??ъ슜?먯쓽 ?몃━?깆쓣 利앸??쒗궗 ???덈떎. ?⑥쑉?깆쓣 寃利앺븯湲??꾪빐 ?꾨Ц媛 湲곕줉 ?ъ씠?몄뿉 ?곸슜?대낯 寃곌낵 蹂??쒖뒪?쒖씠 ?쇰컲 而⑦듃濡?寃?됰낫??吏덉쓽臾몄옣 ?앹꽦?④퀎媛 媛먯냼?섏뿬 ?좎냽???묐떟???살쓣 ???덉뿀??Baseball is a typical record sports, which makes lots of records. These records created and accumulated is helpful to boost performance of players and also useful for professionals in various fields for baseball. So they should be provided easily and quickly. However, the current system gets the question and answer inefficiently by complicated control to analyze and collect these data. So, this paper suggests the question answering system by Natural Language Processing. Natural Language Processing has a simple process to create the query sentence so this can response the query quickly. Quick question answering system for records can increase efficiency for related work and convenience for users. When using this system to professional record site in order to verify the efficiency, we can get the answer rapidly because the generating step of query sentence is decreased than general control searching.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿?⑥뿰援??? ?ㅺ퀎 諛?援ы쁽Hiding sensitive information in JPEG
?쒓뎅?뺣낫湲곗닠?숉쉶, Debnath Bhattacharyya, [2011]

?쒓뎅?뺣낫湲곗닠?숉쉶, Eun-suk Cho, [2011]

理쒓렐 ?명꽣?룰낵 ?ㅻ쭏?명룿 ?깃낵 媛숈? 臾댁꽑湲곌린??諛쒕떖濡?媛??꾨Ц 遺꾩빞蹂꾨줈 留롮? ?몄뼱 ?먯썝?ㅼ씠 ?명꽣???깆뿉 ?쒕컻??怨듦컻?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?먰븳 ?대윭???뺣낫?ㅼ씠 ?좎슜?쒖?瑜??먮퀎?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ㅼ뼇???쒖뒪?쒖씠 媛쒕컻?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?대윭???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?곗씠?곗쓽 ?섏쭛, ?먯뿰??泥섎━ ?깆쓽 怨쇱젙???꾩슂?섎떎. 洹몃젃吏留??대윭??怨쇱젙???꾩슂???뚰봽?몄썾??諛??곗씠?곕? ?듯빀?곸쑝濡?愿由ы븯???쒖뒪?쒖? ?꾩옱 誘몃????곹깭?대떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???대윭??怨쇱젙?먯꽌 ?꾩슂???뚰봽?몄썾??諛??곗씠?곕? ?듯빀 愿由ы븯???쒖뒪?쒖씤 uLAMP瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ???쒖뒪?쒖? 寃쎌젣?곸씤 痢〓㈃?먯꽌???뚰봽?몄썾??諛??곗씠???먯썝??以묐났 媛쒕컻 ?먮뒗 ?섏쭛??諛⑹??섏뿬 鍮꾩슜???덇컧?????덉쑝硫? 愿由ъ쟻??痢〓㈃?먯꽌???뚰봽?몄썾??諛??곗씠???먯썝???ы솢?⑹꽦???믪씪 ???덈떎. ?꾩슱?? ?쒖븞?섎뒗 uLAMP???ъ슜??諛??⑥슜???됯?瑜??꾪빐 ?ъ슜???ㅻЦ??吏꾪뻾?섏??쇰ŉ, ?대? ?듯빐 ?곗씠?곗쓽 理쒖떊?깃낵 ?ъ슜???몄쓽??痢〓㈃?먯꽌 ?μ젏??吏?덇퀬 ?덉쓬???????덉뿀??Due to the development of wireless devices such as smart-phone and internet, a lot of linguistic resources actively are opened in each area of expertise. Also, various systems using semantic web technologies are developing for determining whether such information are useful or not. In order to build these systems, the processes of data collection and natural language processing are necessary. But, there is few systems to use of integrating software and data required those processes. In this paper, we propose the system, uLAMP, integrating software and data related to natural language processing. In terms of economics, the cost can be reduced by preventing duplicated implementation and data collection. On the other hand, data and software usability are increasing in terms of management aspects. In addition, for the evaluation of uLAMP usability and effectiveness, user survey was conducted. Through this evaluation, the advantages of the currentness of data and the ease of use are found.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿?⑥뿰援??? uLAMP ?쒖뒪??援ъ“?吏곸엫 ?뺣낫 ?쇰뱶諛깆씠 媛?ν븳 ?묒슜???꾪븳 BER紐⑤뜽???댁슜??怨좎냽 遺꾩궛 鍮꾨뵒??蹂듯샇??湲곕쾿

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??吏꾪솕 ?곗궛 湲곕쾿???댁슜???먯뿰??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 湲곕쾿???쒖떆?쒕떎. 湲곗〈???뺣쪧 臾몃㎘ 臾닿? 臾몃쾿(PCFG)??愿???곌뎄??李⑦듃 ?뚯떛 諛⑸쾿??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 湲곕쾿?쇰줈 媛?뺥븯怨??덈떎. ?섏?留? 李⑦듃 ?뚯떛? 臾몄옣??湲몄씠媛 ?섏뼱?좎닔濡?蹂듭옟?꾧? ?ш쾶 利앷??섎뒗 臾몄젣瑜??덇퀬 ?덈떎. ?곕씪?? 李⑦듃 ?뚯꽌????덉쑝濡쒖꽌 吏꾪솕 ?곗궛 湲곕쾿???ъ슜?섏뿬 ??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섏??? 吏꾪솕 ?곗궛???곹빀???⑥닔濡쒕뒗 ?앹꽦???뚯뒪 ?몃━???뺣쪧???ъ슜?섏??? ?묒? 洹쒕え???먯뿰??臾몄젣???곸슜??寃곌낵, 吏꾪솕 ?곗궛???뚯떛 臾몄젣瑜??깃났?곸쑝濡??닿껐?????덉쓬???뺤씤?????덉뿀???붿빟 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?먯뿰???뚯떛???꾪븳 吏꾪솕 ?곗궛 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁 3. ?ㅽ뿕 諛?寃곌낵 4. 寃곕줎?먭린議곗쭅?붿??꾨? ?댁슜???숈쟻 遺꾨쪟湲??좏깮
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?닿???Kwanhee Lee), [2003]
媛쒕뀗媛??좎궗??痢≪젙???댁슜??媛쒕뀗 湲곕컲 ?대?吏 寃??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 議곕???Mi-Young Cho), [2003]
?띿뒪?몄? ?꾨찓???ㅼ엫???댁슜??硫붿씪 遺꾨쪟
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?먰솕(Wonhwa Kim), [2003]

Mobile devices these days have become an important part of our daily lives. Mobile use has increased rapidly in our daily lives over face-to-face communication with natural language use. This means that most people live as part of Generation Mobile (Gen M). This paper aims to search for the tasks for moral character development (MCD) of Gen M with a focus on the use of natural language. According to the previous study, in the tropism model, moral characteristics of humans develop from subjectivity toward objectivity in cognition, from egoism (self-love) toward altruism (other-love) in affect, and from heteronomy toward autonomy in volition. Moral character, therefore, is closely related to human relations in real life, and human relations are directly related to the use of natural language. Considering this, Gen M may have exhibit a certain amount of retardation in the affective domain of MCD such as emotional development, because mobile-phone addiction among children and youths raises serious problems of moral character. They have less opportunity for face-to-face interaction to develop facets of human relationships including manners, perseverance, and emotional control with the use of natural language as mobile communication reduces face-to-face conversations. Mobile devices may lead to us becoming emotionless robots ourselves. Consequently, it is necessary to increase various educational opportunities and programs of face-to-face interaction with use of natural language in order to develop a sound moral character for Gen M.?ㅻ뒛??紐⑤컮??湲곌린???멸컙 ?띠쓽 以묒슂??遺遺꾩씠 ?섏뿀?? ?먯뿰?대? ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?硫댁쟻 ?섏궗?뚰넻???泥댄븯??紐⑤컮??而ㅻ??덉??댁뀡??湲됱냽??利앷??섏??? ?닿쾬? ?遺遺꾩쓽 ?щ엺?ㅼ씠 M?몃?(Generation Mobile, Gen M)濡??댁븘媛怨??덉쓬???섑??몃떎. 洹몃옒?????곌뎄?먯꽌??M?몃????몄꽦諛쒕떖 怨쇱젣瑜??먯뿰???ъ슜 痢〓㈃?먯꽌 ?먯깋?섏??? 蹂??곌뎄??寃곌낵, ?몄꽦? ?멸컙愿怨꾨? ?꾩젣濡??섎ŉ, ?몄????곸뿭?먯꽌??二쇨??깆쑝濡쒕???媛앷??깆쑝濡?諛쒕떖?대굹媛怨? ?뺤꽌 ?곸뿭?먯꽌???닿린?ъ쑝濡쒕????댄??ъ쑝濡?諛쒕떖?대굹媛硫? ?섏? ?곸뿭?먯꽌????⑥꽦?쇰줈遺???먯쑉?깆쑝濡?諛쒕떖?대굹媛꾨떎. ?대윭???몄꽦? ?쇱긽???멸컙愿怨꾩뿉???쇱뼱?섎뒗 ?꾩긽?닿퀬, ?쇱긽?먯꽌???멸컙愿怨꾨뒗 ?먯뿰?대? ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?대（?댁쭊?? ?대? 怨좊젮?섎㈃ M?몃????硫댁쟻 ?멸컙愿怨?寃쏀뿕??以꾩뼱?쒕뒗 媛?대뜲 ?몄꽦諛쒕떖??吏泥댁뿉 鍮좎쭏 ?곕젮媛 ?덉쑝硫? 紐⑤컮?쇱뿉 以묐룆???꾨룞怨?泥?냼?꾨뱾? ?ш컖???뺤꽌諛쒕떖??臾몄젣瑜??쇱쑝?ㅺ퀬 ?덈떎. ?대뱾? 紐⑤컮??湲곌린媛 ?硫댁쟻 ?섏궗?뚰넻???泥댄븯??媛?대뜲 ??멸낵 ?먯뿰?대? ?ъ슜?섎㈃???덉젅, ?몃궡, 媛먯젙 議곗젅怨?媛숈? ?뺤꽌???몄꽦???щ컮瑜닿쾶 諛쒕떖?쒗궎???곹샇?묒슜??湲고쉶瑜??곸떎?섏??? ?곕씪??M?몃???嫄댁쟾???몄꽦諛쒕떖???꾪븯???먯뿰?대? ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?硫댁쟻 ?곹샇?묒슜??援먯쑁湲고쉶瑜??섎━怨?愿??援먯쑁 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??媛뺥솕???꾩슂媛 ?덈떎.議???댁쓽?롮씤媛?蹂몄꽦怨??됱쐞?륁뿉 ?섑????멸꺽援먯쑁???섎??????媛쒕뀗 遺꾩꽍

蹂듯빀 ???쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?댁슜?섍퀬???섎뒗 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?붽뎄媛 ?섏뼱?섍퀬 ?덉?留??좊퉬荑쇳꽣???섍꼍?먯꽌 ?쇰컲 ?ъ슜?먮뱾???쎄쾶 蹂듯빀 ???쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?ъ슜?????덈뒗 ?섍꼍? 留덈젴?섏? ?딄퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌?????쒕퉬?ㅼ뿉 ???湲곗닠?곸씤 吏?앹씠 ?녿뒗 ?쇰컲?몃뱾???쎄쾶 ?먯떊???붽뎄?ы빆???쒗쁽 媛?ν븳 ?먯뿰??湲곕컲???ъ슜??移쒗솕?곸씤 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ? ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?뱁엳 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?쒗쁽???⑥쑉?곸쑝濡?遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 臾몄옣?쇰줈遺???뺢탳???섏???蹂듯빀?곸씤 ?뚰겕?뚮줈?곕? 異붿텧?섍퀬, 臾몄옣 遺꾩꽍???듯빐 ?곹빀???쒕퉬?ㅻ? 李얜뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?뱁엳 留롮? ?쒖뼱 援щЦ怨?援ъ젅濡??대（?댁쭊 蹂듭옟??臾몄옣?쇰줈遺???뺢탳???섏???異붿긽 ?뚰겕?뚮줈?곕? 異붿텧?쒕떎.With the wide spread of Web services in various fields, there is a growing interest in building a composite Web service, however, it is very difficult for ordinary users to specify how to compose services. Therefore, a convenient interface for generating and invoking composite Web services are required. This paper proposes a natural language interface to invoke services. The proposed interface provides a way to describe users??requests for composite Web Services in a natural language. A user with no technical knowledge about Web services can describe requests for composite Web services through the proposed interface. The proposed method extracts a complex workflow and finds appropriate Web services from the requests. Experimental results show that the proposed method extracts a sophisticated workflow from complex sentences with many phrases and control constructs.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?쒕㎤????援ы쁽??以묒슂???섎떒???⑦넧濡쒖???寃?? 異붾줎, 吏?앺몴?????ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 洹몃윭????援ъ꽦???⑦넧濡쒖?瑜?媛쒕컻?섎뒗 寃껋? ?쒓컙?? 臾쇱쭏?곸쑝濡?留롮? ?먯썝???뚮え?쒕떎. ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜?洹밸났?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??먮룞?쇰줈 援ъ텞?섎뒗 ?쒕룄媛 ?덉뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???먯뿰??臾몄옣?쇰줈遺??吏곸젒 ?⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??먮룞?곸쑝濡??앹꽦?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?뺥깭?뚯? 臾몄옣??援ъ“瑜?遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 ?먯뿰??臾몄옣???쒖닠?대? 李얠븘 ?대떦 ?⑦넧濡쒖? ?쒖닠?대줈 蹂?섎릺寃??섍린 ?꾪븯???섏꽌?좎뼱 ?⑦넧濡쒖?(predicate ontology)?숇? ?먯뼱??遺꾩꽍???먯뿰??臾몄옣???쒖닠?닿? ?곸젅???⑦넧濡쒖? ?쒖닠?대줈 蹂?섎맆 ???덈룄濡??쒕떎. ?멸컙 ?⑦넧濡쒖? 援ъ텞媛? ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿??鍮꾧탳???ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 ?뺥솗?꾩뿉???섏? 寃곌낵瑜?蹂댁???Ontologies, the important implementation tools for semantic web, are widely used in various areas such as search, reasoning, and knowledge representation. Developing well-defined ontologies, however, requires a lot of resources in terms of time and materials. There have been efforts to construct ontologies automatically to overcome these problems. In this paper, ontologies are automatically constructed from the natural languages sentences directly. To do this, the analysis of morphemes and a sentence structure is performed at first. then, the program finds predicates inside the sentence and the predicates are transformed to the corresponding ontology predicates. For matching the corresponding ontology predicate from a predicate in the sentence, we develop the "predicate ontology". An experimental comparison between human ontology engineer and the program shows that the proposed system outperforms the human engineer in an accuracy.?붿빟 ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄 3. ?쒖닠???⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??댁슜???⑦넧濡쒖? ?먮룞援ъ텞?猷곕윭 ?ㅽ넗留덊???泥쒖씠 ?뚮씪誘명꽣瑜??댁슜???곸긽???≪쓬?쒓굅 諛⑸쾿
?쒓뎅硫?곕??붿뼱?숉쉶, 源?쒖꽍(Tai-Suk Kim), [2010] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒓뎅硫?곕??붿뼱?숉쉶, 媛뺣퀝以(Byung Jun Kang), [2010] [KCI?깆옱]

?ㅻ（??蹂댁〈???ㅻ떒怨?紐⑤뜽 ?앹꽦湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?뺤꽍(HyungSeok Kim), [1997]

For effective human-robot interaction, robots need to understand the current situation context well, but also the robots need to transfer its understanding to the human participant in efficient way. The most convenient way to deliver robot?셲 understanding to the human participant is that the robot expresses its understanding using voice and natural language. Recently, the artificial intelligence for video understanding and natural language process has been developed very rapidly especially based on deep learning. Thus, this paper proposes robot vision to audio description method using deep learning. The applied deep learning model is a pipeline of two deep learning models for generating natural language sentence from robot vision and generating voice from the generated natural language sentence. Also, we conduct the real robot experiment to show the effectiveness of our method in human-robot interaction.Abstract 1. ??濡?2. ?먯뿰???ㅻ챸臾멸낵 ?⑹꽦?뚯쓣 ?앹꽦?섎뒗?λ윭??紐⑤뜽 2.1 ?꾩껜 紐⑤뜽 援ъ“ 2.2 濡쒕큸 鍮꾩쟾 鍮꾨뵒???먯뿰???ㅻ챸臾??앹꽦 紐⑤뜽濡쒕큸 罹먮┃?곗????곹샇?묒슜?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?쒖꽑 諛곕텇 遺꾩꽍

?섎룞?뺥깭?뚯쓽 ?쇳빆??吏?꾩뿉 愿?섏뿬
?쒓뎅遺덉뼱遺덈Ц?숉쉶, 援ш린??, [1996] [KCI?깆옱]

This paper proposes a method to generate test cases and test scripts from software requirements written in a controlled natural language, which helps develop reliable embedded software. In the proposed method, natural language requirements are written in a controlled language, the requirements are parsed and then inputs, outputs and operator data are extracted from the requirements. Test cases are generated from the extracted data following test case generation strategies such as decision coverage, condition coverage or modified condition/decision coverage. And then the test scripts, physical inputs of the test cases are generated with help of the test command dictionary. With the proposed method, it becomes possible to directly check whether software properly satisfies the requirements. Effectiveness of the proposed method is verified empirically with an requirement set.蹂??쇰Ц? ?좊ː???덈뒗 ?꾨쿋?붾뱶 ?쒖뒪???뚰봽?몄썾??媛쒕컻???꾪빐 ?쒗븳???먯뿰???뺤떇?쇰줈 ?묒꽦???뚰봽?몄썾???붽뎄?ы빆?쇰줈遺???뚯뒪??耳?댁뒪 諛??뚯뒪???ㅽ겕由쏀듃瑜??앹꽦?섎뒗 諛⑹븞???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿?먯꽌???먯뿰?대줈 湲곗닠???붽뎄?ы빆???쒗븳???먯뿰???뺤떇?쇰줈 ?묒꽦?섍퀬, ?대? ?뚯떛?섏뿬 ?뚯뒪?몄뿉 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?낅젰, 異쒕젰 諛??곗궛?먮? 異붿텧?쒕떎. 異붿텧???뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 Decision Coverage, Condition Coverage, Modified Condition/ Decision Coverage? 媛숈? ?뚯뒪??耳?댁뒪 ?앹꽦 ?꾨왂???곸슜?섏뿬 ?뚯뒪??耳?댁뒪瑜??앹꽦?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?뚯뒪??紐낅졊???ъ쟾???댁슜?섏뿬 ?꾨쿋?붾뱶 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 臾쇰━?곸씤 ?낅젰 媛믪씤 ?뚯뒪???ㅽ겕由쏀듃瑜??앹꽦?쒕떎. ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿???댁슜?섎㈃, 媛쒕컻???뚰봽?몄썾?닿? ?붽뎄?ы빆???곹빀?섍쾶 媛쒕컻?섏뿀?붿?瑜?吏곸젒?곸쑝濡??뚯뒪?명븯??寃껋씠 媛?ν븯?? ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿???④낵???붽뎄?ы빆 ?명듃???곸슜?섏뿬 ?ㅽ뿕?곸쑝濡?蹂댁씤???꾨줈洹몃옒諛??덈젴 吏?먯쓣 ?꾪븳 ?뚯뒪?몄??댁뒪???쒖뼱?먮쫫??湲곕컲???꾨줈洹몃옒諛??ㅽ뙣 ?쇰뱶諛??쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎

[湲곗닠?댁꽕]?멸났吏???곌뎄?쇳꽣 ?ъ뾽?뚭컻 諛??몃?吏?먰쁽??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 議곗젙?? [1994]
[?밸퀎湲곌퀬]媛쒕뀗洹몃옒???뚭컻
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?묎린泥? [1994]

The aim of this dissertion is to reveal the meaning and effect of BaekSeok's words in the relationship between artificial words and natural words during late 30s' Korean poetry. Assuming that 30s' words are understanded as two domains of artificial words and natural words, Lee Sang and Kim Kirim's words should be located on one side, BaekSeok's words on the other side, and Jeong Jiyong and Kim Yeongrang's words on middle of the two sides. While artificial words of Lee Sang and Kim Kirim could be considered as mere conceptual language without concrete object, BaekSeok's natural words could be an opposite of them. Words of Jeong Jiyong and Kim Yeongrang loses their naturality and nearly function as artificial words while 'polishing' the words. Jeong Jiyong finds his words not from the traditional language itself, but through assembling the traditional language with his own sense. Words of Kim Yeongrang goes through 'polishing' process for phonetically elegant and light feeling. BaekSeok discovers the beauty of natural language itself. BaekSeok does not try to lighten the weight of the reality with elegant words, or order the reality with modern conceptual words. He refuses easiness of elegant words, and evades strangeness of conceptual words to discover beauty of language from natural words. His esthetic should be considered independent. Independent consciousness implies recognizing the circumstances as itself. Therefore discovering and choosing the natural language itself should be considered independent also. While Lee Sang and Kim Kirim showed their modern awareness by ordering reality with conceptual words, BaekSeok discovered the strength of natural language hidden under the humble reality and switched them over to the modernity by positioning them at the place of poetic words. BaekSeok noticed the effect of placing a word at the place of poetic words. It is not important that BaekSeok used natural words in his works, but that how freshly and modernly he used his words. It is easy to pose a modern attitude like Kim Kirim or Lee Sang, choosing modern object, phenomenon and words in writing a poem. But it is never easy to observe and recognize the modernity, thus show the modern viewpoint by choosing natural words from the observation. While Jeong Jiyong concentrated in polishing the traditional words with his own esthetic, BaekSeok discovered the words ordering the traditional words with usual awareness. BaekSeok aimed the mental height without distinction between beauty and ugliness, visible and invisible, pure and impure. Thus BaekSeok's sensitivity can accept the most rough things within his consciousness.1. 癒몃━留?2. ?멸났?댁? ?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?섎? 3. ?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?④낵? 諛깆꽍???쒖뼱愿 4. ?멸났?대줈?쒖쓽 ?쒖뼱 5. 留븐쓬留먰븳援?洹쇰? ?쒖씤怨??덉떇誘쇱＜?섏쟻 湲?곌린
?쒓뎅?쒗븰?? ?쒖???Seo Joon-Seop), [2005] [KCI?깆옱]
?쇱젣 媛뺤젏湲??쒖쓽 援먯쑁 ?곸젏怨?諛⑸쾿
?쒓뎅?쒗븰?? ?⑤???Nam Min-Woo), [2005] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒓뎅?쒗븰?? 怨좊큺以(Ko Bong-Jun), [2005] [KCI?깆옱]

?ㅻ뒛???ъ슜?먭? ?붽뎄?섎뒗 ?곗씠????낆? 二쇰줈 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠????낅뱾?대떎. ?대뱾 硫?곕??붿뼱?곗씠????낆쓽 ?뱀꽦? 湲곗〈???곗씠?곗뿉 鍮꾪븯???곗씠?곗쓽 ?ш린媛 ?щ떎?붾뜲 ?덈떎. 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠?곕뒗 ?ш린媛 ?ш린 ?뚮Ц??硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠???먯깋 ?곗궛???쒕쾲???щ윭 ?곗씠?곕? 二쇨린???μ튂??媛?몄삱 ???놁쑝硫? ?닿쾬? 留롮? ?낆텧??諛쒖깮怨?硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫????섏떆?ㅻ뒗 ?붿씤???쒕떎. 洹몃윭誘濡?蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??蹂대떎 ?좎냽??硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠???묎렐???대（湲??꾪빐 ?몃뜳??諛⑸쾿??愿???댄렣蹂대ŉ, ??湲곗닠???댁슜?섏뿬 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠???묎렐??留롮씠 ?붽뎄?섎뒗 ?묒슜?꾨줈洹몃옩???곸젅?섍쾶 ?泥섑븷 ???덉쑝硫? ?ъ슜?먮뒗 ?먯뿰?대? ?ъ슜?섏뿬 寃?됱쓣 ?섑뻾?????덈떎. 肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲???뺥솗??留ㅼ묶???붽뎄?섎뒗 ?ㅼ썙??留ㅼ묶 ?몃뜳??湲곕쾿蹂대떎 ?먯뿰?대? ?댁슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?몃━?깃낵 ?좎냽??寃곌낵 ?살쓣 ???덈룄濡??깅뒫???μ긽 ?쒖섟??Currently users are tend to use multimedia data types in their applications. Main features of multimedia data types are large amount of data compared to conventional data types. In this reason, it's hard to load data into main memory and to search. That is the cause of occur disk input and output frequently, and decrease the system performance. In this paper, we describe to have fast and efficient access to multimedia data using index technique. Index method presented by paper consists of two parts : one is index file part for keywords and the other is posting file part for the list of file names. Of course, we use keyword. But user is not charge of memory for the keywords. Users just use natural language to insert, delete and search data what he or she wants. Internally, System makes keywords from natural language to get access to multimedia data. It provides convenience to users. Using this study to develop one's application for multimedia, one may have a chance for advanced performance of a system and getting a result speedily.OFDM ?듭떊 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒖쓽 媛꾩꽠 ?꾩긽??愿???곌뎄
