吏?ν삎 梨쀫큸????붿쓽 ?섎룄瑜?遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 怨쇱젙? ?낅젰??吏덈Ц 臾몄옣???댁젅???쇰컲?붿떆耳쒖빞 ?섎뒗 ?곗씠??留덉씠?앹씠 湲곕쾿???꾩슂?섎떎. ???쇰컲???섎뒗 怨쇱젙???섎? ?쒓퉭(Semantic Tagging)?대씪怨??섎뒗?? ?섎? ?쒓퉭???섎뒗 怨쇱젙?먯꽌 媛쒖껜紐?Named Entity) ?몄떇 ?ъ쟾???쒖슜?섍쾶 ?쒕떎. 湲곗〈???쒓뎅???먯뿰??泥섎━瑜??꾪빐??媛쒖껜紐??몄떇 ?ъ쟾??愿???곌뎄??袁몄???吏꾪뻾?섏뼱 ?붿쑝???좎“?대굹 ?⑥뀡 愿?⑥뼱?????媛쒖껜紐??몄떇? 遺덇??ν븳 ?섏??대떎. ?곕씪??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???⑥뀡?쇳븨遺꾩빞 媛쒖껜紐??몄떇 ?ъ쟾??援ъ텞?섍퀬 洹?怨쇱젙???쒖떆?쒕떎.Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?대줎??諛곌꼍 3. 紐⑦삎???곸슜 ?덉감 諛??곸슜 寃곌낵 4. 寃곕줎 諛??ν썑 怨쇱젣New Link Prediction Algorithm using Generative Adversarial Network(GAN)
?쒓뎅寃쎌쁺怨쇳븰?? Dongho Jang(?λ룞??, [2018]
Improving the Productivity of Order Picking through the Remodeling of Forward Picking Area in e-commerce Warehouse
?쒓뎅寃쎌쁺怨쇳븰?? 源蹂묎린, [2018]
Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem with Spatial Safety Separation for Deconfliction
?쒓뎅寃쎌쁺怨쇳븰?? 諛뺤꽦?? [2018]

This paper investigates the discourse analysis of Q & A sentences for Question-Answering System. Question-Answering System is a sort of information retrieval system. The efficiency of the system depends on correct analysis of query sentences and characteristics of the speech act. This system is consist of three module: retrieval data analysis, query analysis and answering extraction. The speech act of query sentences for Question-Answering System is requesting answer and this speech act is represented in various mood including an interrogative sentence. The Q & A process for Question- Answering System has the following feature for discourse analysis: various mood, unique speech act, disambiguation, obligation of answering, informativeness of answering, preciseness of answering, coherence of target, adjacency of query-answer, once-only fair of query-answer, singularity of participant.???쇰Ц??紐⑹쟻? 吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉???ъ슜?섎뒗 吏덉쓽臾몄쓽 ?뷀뻾怨?洹??댄솕???뱀꽦???쇱쓽?섎뒗 ???덈떎. ?대윭???쇱쓽瑜??꾪빐 癒쇱? ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?湲곗닠???댁슜??吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 媛쒓??섍퀬, ???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ꽦?섎뒗 ?덉감??????쒖닠?섏??? 吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?깃났?곸쑝濡??쒖옉?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?ъ슜?먮뱾???낅젰?섎뒗 吏덉쓽臾몄씠 ?대뼚???뷀뻾???섑뻾?섎뒗吏, 洹몃━怨??대윭??吏덉쓽? ?묐떟??吏꾪뻾?먯꽌 ?대뼚???댄솕 ?뱀꽦??諛쒓껄?섎뒗吏瑜??곌뎄?섎뒗 ?쇱씠 以묒슂?섎떎. ?섏쭏?섎Ц?숈? ??뎄?곸쑝濡??섏쭏臾??뷀뻾?숈쓣 ?섑뻾?쒕떎???먯뿉?? ?쇱긽?곸씤 ?댄솕?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?섏쓽臾몃Ц?숆낵 紐낅갚??李⑥씠瑜?吏?뚮떎. 吏덉쓽臾몄씠 吏덈Ц ?뷀뻾???섑뻾?섎뒗 ?뺤떇? ?쇱긽?곸씤 吏덈Ц??鍮꾪빐 ?곷??곸쑝濡??붿슧 ?ㅼ뼇?섎떎. ???쇱쓽?먯꽌???먯뿰??吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 吏덉쓽? ?묐떟??吏?덈뒗 ?댄솕 ?뱀꽦?쇰줈 ?섎떎?묓븳 ?뺤떇, ?⑥씪???뷀뻾, 紐⑦샇?깆쓽 ?쒓굅, ?듬???媛뺤젣?? ?듬????뺣낫?? ?듬???紐낇솗?? 臾몄젣???쇨??? 吏덉쓽-?묐떟???몄젒?? 吏덉쓽-?묐떟???⑤컻?? ?⑥씪??吏덉쓽???묐떟?먥??깆쓣 ?쒖떆?섏????쒓뎅洹??꾨?臾명븰?????앸Ъ ?곸쭠 湲고샇瑜??쒖슜??臾명솕肄섑뀗痢?李쎌옉 ?뚯옱濡쒖꽌??媛?μ꽦 ?곌뎄

臾띠뼱???섎굹???띿꽦?쇰줈 ?섑??몃떎. ?ъ슜?먭? ?좏깮??吏덉쓽 ?좏삎???띿꽦由ъ뒪?몃? ?듯빐 ?ъ슜??吏덉쓽 臾?
??踰≫꽣? FAQ ??吏덉쓽臾몃뱾??臾몄옣 踰≫꽣瑜??좎궗??遺꾩꽍???듯븯??鍮꾧탳???? ?대떦 吏덉쓽??媛???곹빀
???듬????좏깮?섍퀬 ?대? ?뚯꽦?⑹꽦???듯빐 ?ъ슜?먯뿉寃??ㅻ젮以??During the university admission period, work burdens of related offices increase steeply due to the
intensiveness of admission related questions. We found that speech recognition and speech synthesis, which
are both open source software, could help to address this problem. In this paper, we implemented an
chatbot dialogue system deals for academic affairs using natural language processing and open source
software. First, the system require the user to select the type of query, and convert user s voice questions
to text sentences by using open source speech recognition API. The sentences are divided into morpheme
units through morphological analysis, and the selected morphemes are used to generate sentence vectors.
The vectors consists of attributes extracted from each question in FAQ corpus categorized by four query
types. Therefore, four types of feature lists were created in advance according to the types of queries. The
features have same meanings are replaced into a representative feature. Then similarity analysis is conducted
between the user query sentence vector and previously collected query sentence vectors. Finally, the user is
informed the answer to the query through speech synthesis.1. ??濡?2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쒖븞 ?쒖뒪??4. ?ㅽ뿕 諛??됯? 5. 寃?濡잸n EOQ Model with Ordering Cost inclusive of a Freight Cost under Condition of Permissible Delay in Payments

NLI瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?낅젰???먯뿰??吏덉쓽瑜?遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪빐??吏덉쓽???ы븿??媛쒖껜紐낆쓣 ?몄떇?섎뒗 寃껋씠 ?꾩슂?섎떎. ?뱁엳, ?뱀젙???곸뿭?????吏덉쓽??寃쎌슦 ?곹빀??媛쒖껜紐?諛?二쇱젣?대? 異붿텧?????덉뼱???쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쇱젙 諛?媛쒖씤?뺣낫 愿由??곸뿭??媛쒖껜紐낆쓣 ?띿꽦 媛쒖껜紐낃낵 ?몄뒪?댁뒪 媛쒖껜紐낆쑝濡?援щ텇?섏뿬, 怨꾩링??媛쒖껜紐??ъ쟾??援ъ텞?섍퀬, ?띿꽦 媛쒖껜紐낆쓽 ?숈쓽???쒗쁽 臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?????덈뒗 媛쒖껜紐??⑦꽩???뺤쓽?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?쇱젙 諛?媛쒖씤?뺣낫 愿由??곸뿭???먯뿰??吏덉쓽?먯꽌 ?먯돺寃?媛쒖껜紐낆쓣 ?몄떇?????덈뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕???듯빐 ?쒖븞??媛쒖껜紐??⑦꽩???댁슜??媛쒖껜紐??몄떇 諛⑸쾿???됯??섏??쇰ŉ, 援ъ텞??怨꾩링??媛쒖껜紐??ъ쟾留뚯쓣 ?댁슜???깅뒫? 72.5%???깅뒫??蹂댁?怨? ?띿꽦 媛쒖껜紐??⑦꽩??異붽???諛⑸쾿? 79.9%???깅뒫?쇰줈 7.4%???깅뒫 ?μ긽???덉뿀??Since the number of people who use mobile devices increase, the user needs about the Natural Language Interface(NLI) has been grown. A efficient named entity recognition is required to analyze the query entered by the NLI. Especially, the named entities in the natural query in a particular domain are efficiently extracted. In this paper, we propose the efficient named entity recognition method in a schedule and a personal information management domain. For this, we generate a hierarchical named entity dictionary by separating the name entity with the attribute type and the instance type. And then, we defined a named entity pattern to solve the problem of the synonym in the attribute named entity. We evaluated the proposed method. As a result, the baseline method achieved 72.5%. And the proposed method achieved 79.9%, which is 7.4% higher performance than the baseline method.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿???곌뎄 ?? ?쒖븞諛⑸쾿媛쒕퀎 ?ы뻾?먮? ?꾪븳 紐⑤컮???ㅺ뎅??媛꾪뙋 ?곸긽 ?덈궡 ?쒖뒪??

The features extracted from text are labeled as Language Expression Axis. Graphic models are designed to accept certain graphical operation such as morphing and texture modification. The graphic operations are labeled as Graphic Expression Axis. In this paper, a data structure interconnecting L.E.A. and G.E.A is proposed, a method of modifying the graphic models from text expression.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. 湲곕낯 援ъ“洹쇱젒 媛먯? 硫?고꽣移??곗튂?⑤뱶瑜??댁슜???ㅻ쭏??TV 梨꾪똿 ?섍꼍?먯꽌 ?몃━?섍쾶 ?ъ슜?????덈뒗 ?쒖떇 蹂寃??쒖뒪泥??명꽣?섏씠??

In accordance with these changes, the wireless internet research available without the restriction of time and space is actively proceeding centering around WAP (Wireless Application Protocol). WML(Wireless Markup Language) can be used and written in order to embody the radio internet environment. In this paper, I will embody the editor which writes WML documents easily only by using the natural language to make users write WML documents much more comfortably and faster, without the knowledge of the complex command structure and tag. This editor is WYSIWYG WML editor based on the use of the natural language which can improve the productivity of the document writing, because we can do jobs with the direct confirmation through the build-in emulator without using the emulator supported by Nokia, Erikson.?섏뿴諛섏쓳???섑븳 鍮꾩젙吏??뚮（誘몃굹???곸쟾??諛?臾쇱꽦?됯?

援먯쑁???꾨줈洹몃옩?먯꽌 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕뒫? 諛섎뱶???꾩슂??湲곕뒫?대ŉ 援먯쑁???꾨줈洹몃옩??援ъ꽦?섎뒗 4媛쒖쓽 紐⑤뱢 以??섎굹??而ㅻ??덉??댁뀡 紐⑤뱢? ?숈깮?쇰줈遺?곗쓽 吏덈Ц???댄빐?섎뒗 ?낅젰 ?댁꽍湲곗? 援먯쑁?섍퀬???섎뒗 ?댁슜??臾몄옣?쇰줈 ?쒗쁽?섎뒗 臾몄옣 ?앹꽦湲곕줈 援ъ꽦?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??LFG grammar formalism??湲곕컲?쇰줈 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 ?뚯꽌? 遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵瑜??섎? ?뺥깭濡?蹂?섑븯???섎?蹂?섍린??援ы쁽諛⑸쾿????섏뿬 湲곗닠?쒕떎.Natural language processing is indispensable to any intelligent tutoring system. The communication module, one of the four components of a intelligent tutoring system, consists of two major components, a input understander that is responsible for translating the input from the student into the semantic form and a output generator that translates the educational contents in the form of semantic form into the sentences.
This papers describes a DCG parser based on the LFG(Lexical Functional Grammar) formalism and a translator that produces simple semantic forms.?붿빟 = 1 abstract = 1 1. ?뚭컻 = 1 2. LFG 臾몃쾿 = 3 2.1 LFG 臾몃쾿???뱀꽦 = 3Human Responses to Existing Information Systems

而댄벂???뚰봽?몄썾?? ?붿???肄섑뀗痢좊벑 ?붿????뺣낫 ?ъ궛沅뚯쓽 蹂댄샇???꾩옱 肉??꾨땲???ν썑 援????援?젰??醫뚯슦?????덉쓣 ?뺣룄濡???⑦엳 二쇱슂??怨쇱젣媛 ?꾨땺 ???녿떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???붿????뺣낫 ?ъ궛沅뚭낵 愿?⑤맂 援?궡?띿쇅 ?곌뎄 ?숉뼢怨??쒖젅??媛먯젙??泥닿퀎?곸쑝濡??됲븯湲??꾪븳 ?뚰봽?몄썾???댁뿉 ???鍮꾧탳?띾텇?앹쓣 ?됲븯怨좎옄 ?쒕떎. 二쇱슂 ?댁슜?쇰줈??JISC??以묒떖?쇰줈 ??援?쇅 媛먯젙 湲곌????ъ뾽 ?숉뼢怨?遺꾩꽍 洹몃━怨?援?궡湲곌??대굹 ?⑥껜???吏곸엫???댄렣蹂닿퀬???쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?먯뿰???쒖젅?대굹 ?꾨줈洹몃옩 ?쒖젅??媛먯젙 ?????덈뒗 S/W?댁뿉 ???鍮꾧탳?띾텇?앹쓣 ?됲븯怨좎옄 ?쒕떎.It is very important to protect digital copyright such as computer software, digital contents, and others because national power is influenced at present and in the future. This paper deals with the trend of domestic and foreign researches related to digital copyright and the comparative analysis of software tools fur being a systematic judge of the piracy. This paper focuses on the foreign trend of judge business based on JISC and the domestic movement. It also comparatively analyses software tools to judge natural language or program piracy.?뚯젅 蹂듭썝 ?꾨낫 吏묓빀???앹꽦怨??꾨낫 媛먯냼??愿???곌뎄

?멸컙???뚯떛 ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?먯뿰???댄빐 ?쒖뒪?쒕뱾?먭쾶 ??臾몄젣瑜??덇꺼 二쇰뒗 紐⑦샇?깆쓣 ??泥섎━?쒕떎. ???먯쓣 ?댁슜?섍퀬??理쒓렐???쒖븞???щ━?숈쓽 ?뚯떛 紐⑤뜽??湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?섏뿬 ?ㅺ퀎???먯뿰???뚯꽌瑜??뚭컻?쒕떎. ???щ━?숈쓽 ?뚯떛 紐⑤뜽???곕Ⅴ硫??щ윭 媛쒖쓽 媛?ν븳 ?뚯떛 寃쎈줈媛 ?숈떆??蹂묐젹濡?異붽뎄?섎굹, ?뚯꽌??洹?以묒뿉??媛???섎??곸쑝濡?醫뗭? 寃껊뱾留??④린怨??섎㉧吏???????덈뒗 ?濡?鍮⑤━ ?쒓굅?쒕떎. ?대윭???뚯떛 紐⑤뜽???꾪빐??媛쒕컻???뚯떛 湲곕쾿?먯꽌??紐⑤뱺 媛?ν븳 ?뚯뒪?ㅼ쓣 ?쒖꽦?붿떆?ㅺ퀬 鍮꾧탳?섏뿬???섎뒗???대뒗 ?⑦꽩怨??≪뀡??媛吏??洹쒖튃???댁슜?섎뒗 ?뚯떛?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 梨꾪깮?섎룄濡??쒕떎. ???뚯떛 ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?꾩쭅 ?꾩꽦?섏? ?딆? ?깅텇???묒갑(attachment), 媛?洹쒖튃???섑븳 ?뚯떛 ?곹깭??議곗궗, 洹몃━怨?attention-shifting?μ튂 ?놁씠 wait-and-see湲곕뒫???ъ꽦 ???덈줈???뱀쭠?ㅼ쓣 媛뽯뒗??The human parsing system is good at handling ambiguities which cause a major problem for natural language understanding systems. This paper introduces a natural language parser designed to follow a recently proposed psychological parsing model. According to this psychological parsing model, all possible parses are pursued in parallel but the parser keeps only those parses with best semantics by removing the semantically bad parses as early as possible. A computational framework for this parsing model is developed. The need of activating and comparing all possible parses leads to a parsing system using pattern-action rules which has some new features such as attaching partially built constituents, testing the parsing state by each rule, and achieving the wait-and-see mechanism without using an attention shifting facility.?붿빟 ABSTRACT ?? ?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?뺣???Min-Soo Jung), [1993] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?쒖씪(Han Il Kim), [1993] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???뺣낫 異붿텧 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?쒗뵆由??앹꽦??吏?먰븯湲??꾪빐 臾몄옣???곹뼢??遺遺?遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?뺣낫 異붿텧 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섎뒗 遺遺??붿냼濡쒖꽌 ?먯뿰??臾몄옣 遺꾩꽍 諛⑹떇?먯꽌 以묒슂???먯? 臾몄옣 遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵??理쒖쥌?곸씤 紐⑹쟻???뺣낫 異붿텧?대씪??寃껋씠?? ?쇰컲?곸쑝濡??뺣낫 異붿텧 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?꾨컲?곸씠 遺?섏? ?좎뿰?깆쓣 怨좊젮?????뺣낫 異붿텧???꾪븳 臾몄옣 遺꾩꽍? 二쇱뼱吏?臾몄옣??????꾨꼍??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍?몃━瑜??앹꽦???꾩슂???녿떎. 遺遺?援щЦ 遺꾩꽍???듯빐 臾몄옣?????遺遺??몃━留뚯쑝濡쒕룄 ?뺣낫 異붿텧?먯꽌 ?꾩슂濡??섎뒗 ?뺣낫瑜??살쓣 ???덈룄濡?援ы쁽?섎뒗 寃껋씠 ?⑥쑉?곸씠?? ??遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿? ?꾩쟾??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍???깃났瑜좎씠 ??븘??以묎컙 怨쇱젙?먯꽌 ?살뼱吏??留롮? 遺遺?援ъ“?ㅻ줈遺??臾몄옣 ?섎? ??븷 ?깅텇???몄떇?섏뿬 ?대? ?댁슜??媛쒕뀗 ?쒖꽦?붿? ?ㅼ젣?붽? 媛?ν븯?ㅻ뒗 寃껋씠 ?μ젏?대떎.?㏃뀍湲곗? 怨듯넻?⑦꽩 怨듭쑀諛⑹떇???ъ슜????꾨젰 IMDCT 援ъ“ ?ㅺ퀎
?곷챸??숆탳 怨듯븰湲곗닠?곌뎄?? ?μ쁺踰?Young Beom Jang), [2003]
?꾨찓??諛?紐⑦떚??寃?됱쓣 ?댁슜???좎쟾??湲곕뒫 遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪??媛쒕컻
?곷챸??숆탳 怨듯븰湲곗닠?곌뎄?? 源湲곕큺(Ki Bong Kim), [2003]
?앺깂 ?붾젰諛쒖쟾?먯꽌 Bottom Ash ?ы솢??怨듭젙??寃쎌젣???됯?
?곷챸??숆탳 怨듯븰湲곗닠?곌뎄?? ?ㅼ꽭?? [2003]

In the big data era, collecting and processing data is the most fundamental and central thing for big data system implementation and utilization. Internet text data is the one of the most representative big data. The demand of collection of these big data and natural language processing thereof is steadily increasing. In the paper, we propose a system for collecting and storing text data of large-scale web documents. The proposed data collection system can collect data from various websites which support no API. In addition, the massive text data can be collected quickly and efficiently through various parallelization methods for performance improvement. The proposed storage system can be applied to various natural language processing modules and the execution speed is improved by using in-memory DBMS for real-time natural language processing. The validity of the proposed system is verified by our experiments to collect actual large web documents.鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 ?쒕???鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 ?쒖뒪??援ъ텞 諛??쒖슜???꾪빐 ?곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?섍퀬 ???諛?泥섎━?섎뒗 ?쇱? 媛??湲곕낯?곸씠硫댁꽌???듭떖?곸씤 ?쇱씠?? ?명꽣???띿뒪???곗씠?곕뒗 ??쒖쟻??鍮낅뜲?댄꽣?닿퀬, ??⑸웾???띿뒪???곗씠???섏쭛 諛?泥섎━? ?먯뿰??泥섎━??????섏슂??吏?띿쟻?쇰줈 利앷??섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???洹쒕え ??臾몄꽌???띿뒪???곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?섍퀬 ??ν븯???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ㅺ퀎?섍퀬 援ы쁽?쒕떎. ?곗씠???섏쭛 遺遺꾩뿉?쒕뒗 API媛 ?쒓났?섏? ?딅뒗 ?ㅼ뼇?????ъ씠?몃줈遺???띿뒪???곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?????덈뒗 ?ㅺ퀎瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?곗씠?곕? 鍮좊Ⅴ怨??⑥쑉?곸쑝濡??섏쭛?섍린 ?꾪븳 蹂묐젹??諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ????쒖뒪?쒖? ?ㅼ뼇???먯뿰??泥섎━ 紐⑤뱢???곸슜?????덇퀬 ?ㅼ떆媛??먯뿰??泥섎━瑜?吏?먰븯湲??꾪빐 ?몃찓紐⑤━ ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪 愿由??쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ъ슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?ㅽ뻾 ?띾룄瑜??μ긽?쒖섟?? 蹂??쇰Ц???ㅽ뿕?먯꽌???ㅼ젣濡???臾몄꽌???洹쒕え ?띿뒪???곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?섍퀬 泥섎━?섎뒗 ?ㅽ뿕???듯빐 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?좏슚?깆쓣 ?뺤씤?섏????뚯뀥?ㅽ듃?뚰겕?먯꽌 ?뺤궛?섎뒗 ?뺣낫???섏쭛 諛?遺꾨쪟瑜??꾪븳 ?꾧뎄

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??EPG ?뺣낫 寃?됱쓣 ?꾪븳 ?먯뿰??????쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ????쇳븳?? ?먯뿰??????쒖뒪??援ъ텞???꾪븳, ????덉젣瑜??댁슜???곹솴 湲곕컲 ???愿由?諛⑸쾿濡좎?, ?⑥쑉?곸씠怨??ㅼ슜?곸씤 ????쒖뒪??援ъ텞??媛?ν븯寃??쒕떎. ????쒖뒪?쒖? ?ъ슜??諛쒗솕??????곹빀???쒖뒪???묐떟 諛쒗솕瑜?異쒕젰?섎뒗 怨쇱젙?쇰줈 吏꾪뻾?섎ŉ, ?대? ?꾪빐, ?ъ슜??諛쒗솕 ?섎? 遺꾩꽍, ???愿由? ?쒖뒪???묐떟 諛쒗솕 ?앹꽦??怨쇱젙??嫄곗튇?? ?뺥솗?섍퀬 ?좎냽???뺣낫???꾨떖??以묒슂??EPG ?뺣낫 寃???꾨찓?몄쓽 ?뱀꽦??EPG ?곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ쓽 愿由?諛?媛깆떊??以묒슂???붿냼濡??묒슜?쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 ?밸쭏?대떇 湲곕컲??EPG ?곗씠?踰좎씠??愿由ъ옄瑜?援ы쁽?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?곗씠?踰좎씠??援ъ텞???꾩슂??鍮꾩슜??理쒖냼?뷀븯怨? ?좎냽?섍퀬 ?뺥솗???뺣낫瑜??쒓났?????덉뿀?? ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵瑜??듯빐 蹂??쒖뒪?쒖씠 EPG ?뺣낫 寃?됱쓣 ?꾪빐 ?곸? 鍮꾩슜?쇰줈 ?믪? ?깅뒫??蹂댁씠怨??덉쓬???뺤씤?쒕떎.In this paper, we present an example-based natural language dialogue system for Electronic Program Guide Information Access.
We introduce an effective and practical dialogue management technique incorporating dialogue examples and situation-based rules. In order to generate cooperative responses to smoothly lead the dialogue with users, our natural language dialogue system consists of natural language understanding, dialogue manager, system utterance generator. and EPG database manager. Each module is designed and implemented to make an effective and practical natural language dialogue system. In particular, in order to reflect the up-to-date EPG information which is updated frequently and periodically, we applied a web-mining technology to the EPG database manager, which builds the content database based on automatically extracted information from popular EPG websites. The automatically generated content database is used by other modules in the system for building their own resources. Evaluations show that our system performs EPG access task in high performance and can be managed with low cost.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ????덉젣瑜??댁슜???곹솴 湲곕컲 ???愿由??쒖뒪??3. 吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒖쓽 吏덉쓽 遺꾩꽍 怨쇱젙? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽 臾몄옣?먯꽌 吏덉쓽 ?섎룄瑜??뚯븙?섏뿬 洹??좏삎??遺꾨쪟?섍퀬 ?뺣떟 異붿텧???꾪븳 ?뺣낫瑜?援ы븯??寃껋씠?? 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??蹂듭옟??遺꾨쪟洹쒖튃 吏묓빀?대굹 ??⑸웾???몄뼱 吏???먯썝 ????ъ슜??吏덉쓽 臾몄옣?먯꽌 吏덉쓽 珥덉젏 ?댄쐶瑜?異붿텧?섍퀬 援ъ“?곸쑝濡?愿?⑤맂 ?댄쐶?ㅼ쓽 ?섎? ?뺣낫??湲곕컲?섏뿬 ?⑥쑉?곸쑝濡?吏덉쓽 ?좏삎??遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?꾩슱??吏덉쓽 珥덉젏 ?댄쐶媛 ?앸왂??寃쎌슦??泥섎━? ?숈쓽?댁? ?묐????뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 吏덉쓽 ?좏삎 遺꾨쪟 ?깅뒫???μ긽?쒗궗 ???덈뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎.For question-answering system, question analysis module finds the question points from user's natural language questions, classifies the question types, and extract some useful information to answer. This paper proposes a question type classifying technique based on focus words extracted from questions and word semantic information, instead of complicated rules or huge knowledge resources. It also shows how to find the question type without focus words, and how useful the synonym or postfix information to enhance the performance of classifying module.Performance Evaluation of Flash Memory-Based File Storages: NAND vs. NOR
?곷챸??숆탳 怨듯븰湲곗닠?곌뎄?? (Min Young Sung), [2006]
?몄쿇吏???곗빟?좎쓽 吏諛섍났?숈쟻 ?뱀꽦
?곷챸??숆탳 怨듯븰湲곗닠?곌뎄?? 源?洹?Dae Kyu Kim), [2006]
?쒕??덉씠?섏쓽 諛쒖쟾 諛⑺뼢??????곌뎄 議곗궗
?곷챸??숆탳 怨듯븰湲곗닠?곌뎄?? 紐⑥갹??Chang Woo Mo), [2006]

To retrieve massive data using relational database management system (RDBMS), it is important to understanding of table schemas and SQL grammar. To address this issue, many studies have recently been carried out to generate an SQL query from a natural language question. However, the existing works suffer mostly from predicting columns at where clause and the accuracy is greatly reduced when there are multiple columns to be predicted. In this paper, we propose a convolutional neural network model with column attention mechanism that effectively extracts the latent representation of input question which helps column prediction of the model. The experiment shows that our model outperforms the accuracy of the existing model (SQLNet) by 6%.愿怨꾪삎 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?洹쒕え???곗씠?곕? 寃?됲븯湲??꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?뚯씠釉??ㅽ궎留?諛?SQL臾몄쓣 ?댄빐?댁빞 ?섎뒗 ?꾩슂?깆씠 ?덈떎. ?대? ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?먯뿰?닿? ?낅젰?쇰줈 二쇱뼱吏??? ?댁뿉 ??묓븯??SQL臾몄쓣 ?앹꽦?섎뒗 ?곌뎄媛 理쒓렐 吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄?먯꽌 媛???대젮??遺遺꾩? Modified New Reduced Sphere Decoder Using Layer Sorting
??쒖쟾?먭났?숉쉶, Eun Sung Jeon, [2006]
?ㅻ???洹몃９ 硫?곗틦?ㅽ듃 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 以묎퀎 硫?곗틦?ㅽ듃 ?꾨줈?좎퐳
??쒖쟾?먭났?숉쉶, ?댁쥌誘?Jong Min Lee), [2006]

Consumers express how they evaluate what they purchased by writing reviews especially when they purchased products online. By analyzing the reviews about a product, it will be possible to find out what the consumers liked and disliked about the product. It will be also possible to identify the general consensus on what matters in purchaing certain product type such as a laptop if many reviews about many instances of a particular product type is analyzed. However, it takes a lot of time to manually analyzing the reviews. Thus, we propose to use two natural language processing oriented computational techniques to analyze a large number of reviews. The techniques are text classification and information extraction. We developed 臾?review analysis system and conducted experiments against the reviews about the laptop computers posted on the Naver information portal.留롮? ?뚮퉬?먮뒗 ?뱁엳 ?⑤씪?몄긽?먯꽌 臾쇨굔??援ъ엯?섍퀬 洹?臾쇨굔????섏뿬 ?먯떊??醫뗭븘?섎뒗 ?먯씠???レ뼱?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?ы븿?섎뒗 ?됯?瑜??뱀뿉 ?щ┛?? ???됯?瑜?遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 ?뚮퉬?먭? 臾쇨굔??援щℓ????臾댁뾿??愿?ъ쓣 媛吏怨?以묒슂?섍쾶 ?ш린?붽?????섏뿬 ???섏엳?? ?먮? ?ㅼ뼱 ?명듃遺곸쓣 援щℓ?????묒꽦???됯?瑜?遺꾩꽍?섎㈃ ?대뼡 湲곕뒫??以묒슂??援щℓ 寃곗젙 ?붿냼?대ŉ ?대뼡 寃껊뱾??怨좎퀜???섎뒗吏????섏뿬 ?????덈떎. ?섏?留?留롮? ?묒쓽 ?먮즺瑜??섎룞?쇰줈 遺꾩꽍?섍린?먮뒗 ?쒓컙??留롮씠 嫄몃┛?? ?곕씪????됱쓽 ?먮즺瑜??쎄쾶 遺꾩꽍?????덈뒗 ??媛쒖쓽 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?湲곕쾿???댁슜???먮룞 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿??援ы쁽?섏??? ??媛吏 諛⑸쾿? ?먮룞 臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟? ?먮룞 ?뺣낫 異붿텧?대떎. ?ㅼ씠踰꾩젙蹂??ы꽭???덈뒗 ?곹뭹?됱쓣 媛쒕컻???쒖뒪?쒖쑝濡?遺꾩꽍?섏?怨??됯? 寃곌낵瑜??꾩텧?덈떎. ?먮룞遺꾩꽍?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?뺥솗?④낵 ?ы쁽??痢〓㈃?먯꽌 ?좎궗???쒖뒪?쒖씠 ?ㅻⅨ ?먮즺?좏삎 遺꾩꽍???곸슜?덉쓣 ?뚯? 鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 鍮꾩듂?섏????붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?먮룞 ?곹뭹???됯? ?쒖뒪??3. ?곹뭹?됯낵 媛먯젙 遺꾨쪟 紐⑤뜽?쇱냼???뱀꽦 遺꾨쪟瑜??듯븳 ?꾨젅?꾩썚??愿???곌뎄

Our method performs named entity recognition by using the morphological analyzed result and template based information extraction by filling templates of specific domains. As the experimental result, we can find that the hybrid based named entity recognition shows precision rate of 87.7% and recall rate of 91%. The template based information extraction shows precision rate of 80.2% and recall rate of 82.3% on accident newspapers and precision rate of 75.3% and recall rate of 76.9% on economy newspapers.?붿빟 ABSTRACT ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿???곌뎄 ?? ?섏씠釉뚮━??湲곕컲 媛쒖껜紐??몄떇?ㅼ옄媛?VoIP?먯꽌 ?뚮퉬?꾨젰 遺꾩궛???댁슜???뚯쓽遺꾨━ 諛⑹? ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?μ옱??Jae-Hyung Jang), [2004]
Qplus ?⑦궎吏 ?먮룞 ?앹꽦 ?꾧뎄 媛쒕컻
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?곕뜒洹?Duk-Kyun woo), [2004]
?꾪궎?띿쿂 ?됯? 諛⑸쾿???듯빀???꾪궎?띿쿂 ?ㅺ퀎 諛⑸쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 怨좏쁽??HyonHee Koh), [2004]

Currently users are tend to use multimedia data types in their applications. Main features of multimedia data types are large amount of data compared to conventional data types. In this reason, it's hard to load data into main memory and to search. That is the cause of occur disk input and output frequently, and decrease the system performance. In this paper, we describe to have fast and efficient access to multimedia data using index technique. Index method presented by paper consists of two parts : one is index file part for keywords and the other is posting file part for the list of file names. Of course, we use keyword. But user is not charge of memory for the keywords. Users just use natural language to insert, delete and search data what he or she wants. Internally, System makes keywords from natural language to get access to multimedia data. It provides convenience to users. Using this study to develop one's application for multimedia , one may have a chance for advanced performance of a system and getting a result speedily.?ㅻ뒛???ъ슜?먭? ?붽뎄?섎뒗 ?곗씠????낆? 二쇰줈 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠????낅뱾?대떎. ?대뱾 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠????낆쓽 ?뱀꽦? 湲곗〈???곗씠?곗뿉 鍮꾪븯???곗씠?곗쓽 ?ш린媛 ?щ떎?붾뜲 ?덈떎. 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠?곕뒗 ?ш린媛 ?ш린 ?뚮Ц??硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠???먯깋 ?곗궛???쒕쾲???щ윭 ?곗씠?곕? 二쇨린???μ튂??媛?몄삱 ???놁쑝硫? ?닿쾬? 留롮? ?낆텧??諛쒖깮怨?硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫????섏떆?ㅻ뒗 ?붿씤???쒕떎. 洹몃윭誘濡?蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??蹂대떎 ?좎냽??硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠???묎렐???대（湲??꾪빐 ?몃뜳??諛⑸쾿??愿???댄렣蹂대ŉ, ??湲곗닠???댁슜?섏뿬 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠???묎렐??留롮씠 ?붽뎄?섎뒗 ?묒슜?꾨줈洹몃옩???곸젅?섍쾶 ?泥섑븷 ???덉쑝硫? ?ъ슜?먮뒗 ?먯뿰?대? ?ъ슜?섏뿬 寃?됱쓣 ?섑뻾?????덈떎. 肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲???뺥솗??留ㅼ묶???붽뎄?섎뒗 ?ㅼ썙??留ㅼ묶 ?몃뜳??湲곕쾿蹂대떎 ?먯뿰?대? ?댁슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?몃━?깃낵 ?좎냽??寃곌낵 ?살쓣 ???덈룄濡??깅뒫???μ긽 ?쒖섟??OFDM ?듭떊 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒖쓽 媛꾩꽠 ?꾩긽??愿???곌뎄

This paper proposes a question type classifying technique based on focus words extracted from questions and word semantic information, instead of complicated rules or huge knowledge resources. It also shows how to find the question type without focus words, and how useful the synonym or postfix information to enhance the performance of classifying module.珥덈줉

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰?대줈???쒓?泥섎━瑜??꾪븳 ?꾩옄???ъ꽌 援ъ꽦????諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?섍퀬, 洹몄뿉?곕Ⅸ 寃???뚭퀬由ъ쬁??媛쒕컻?섏??? ?ъ쟾???꾩껜 援ъ꽦? ?됱씤 ?ъ쟾遺? 湲곕낯???ъ쟾遺濡??섏??쇰ŉ, ?됱씤 ?ъ쟾遺???좎젙??湲곕낯?댁뿉 ????쒓? ?⑹꽦?먮━???곕Ⅸ ?듦퀎 寃곌낵濡쒖꽌 珥덉꽦, 以묒꽦, 醫낆꽦 ?됱씤遺瑜??먯뿀?? ?댁뿉 ?곕씪 媛쒕컻???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???곸슜??寃곌낵, 湲곕낯?댁뿉 ???寃?됯만?닿? 吏㏃쓬???????덉뿀怨? 寃?됱퐫???섎뒗 湲곕낯?댁뿉 ??댁꽌 ?꾩슂???몃뜳?ㅻ?? ?곗씠?곕????쇰?遺꾩쓣 ?몄텧?????덇린 ?뚮Ц???곸? 湲곗뼲 ?⑸웾??媛뽯뒗 而댄벂?곗뿉?쒕룄 ?댁슜媛?ν븯?ㅻ뒗 寃껋쓣 蹂댁???This applications such as natural language understanding system, speech understanding, machine translations, information retrieval, and question and answer system need the electronic dictionary that contains the words and their concepts, and that represents the knowledges needed in processing natural language. Since the contents of the dictionary are very large, time consuming occurs in searching information. A lot of researches have been proposed for improving search time. We are interested in TRIE structure with a wasteful memory space and complex structure. We proposed a constructing method which consists of index part and data parts. It is the dictionary with three index parts which consists of the first sound letter index, the second and the last by statistical approach. We also improved the searching algorithm in the search process of the dictionary. We evaluated them by theoretical method.?썼룾 畑뷴뻠濾?弱뤺お 簾뤹㈅

?덅줇兩?簾뤹㈅
?숆뎅??숆탳 寃쎌＜??? 若붷췁邕? [1989]

In this paper, a chatbot for emotional stress recognition and management using rule-based method and NLP is designed and developed to tackle various emotional stresses of people through questionnaire. For this, Dialogflow as open chatbot development platform and Facebook messenger as chatting platform are used. We can build natural and resourceful conversational experiences through predefined questions by using powerful tools of Dialogflow, and can use developed chatbot on the Facebook page messenger. Developed chatbot perceives emotional stresses of user by user-input which is either text or choice of predefined answer. It also gives user questions according to the user?셲 feeling, and assess the strength of the emotional stresses, and provide a solution to the user. Further research can improve the developed chatbot by using open Korean NLP library and database of emotions and stresses.Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 梨쀫큸怨??먯뿰??泥섎━ 3. ?ㅽ듃?덉뒪? 嫄닿컯 4. 媛먯젙 ?ㅽ듃?덉뒪 ?몄? 諛?愿由ъ슜 梨쀫큸250 km/h湲??꾩쿋?ㅻ퉬??鍮꾩쟾湲곕컲 寃痢?湲곗닠 援ы쁽

Im computergestu짢tzten sprachlichen Verfahren (eng. Natural Language Processing. NLP) gibt es drei Ambiguita짢ten der Wortbedeutung: Ambiguita짢t der Wortart. lexikalische Ambiguita짢t und strukuellle Ambiguita짢t. In dieser Arbeit wurde von diesen die lexikalische Ambiguita짢t betrachtet. Fu짢r die lexikalische Disambiguierung wird als Vorbedingungen im folgenden gefordert:
?뛍enntnis des Kontexts
?뛢in Mechanismus, der die semantische Assoziation zwischen den benachbarten Wortern findet.
?뛢in Mechanismus. der einen Anhaltspunkt zur syntaktischen Disambiguierung
gibt.
?뛢in Mechanismus. der die Beschra짢nkungen der Auswahl zwischen den ambigen Wo짢rtern kontrolliert.
ein Schlussfolgerung als letzten Schritt
Zur lexikalischen Disambiguierung wurden drei Verfahren, d.h. Vorzugsbedeutung, semantische Entscheidung und Frame und semantische Verbindung in dieser Arbeit betrachtet. Zwar haben diese Verfahren Effektivita짢t bei der lexikalischen Disambiguierung bewiesen. aber es war ungenu짢gend. Deswegen sollte das Studium der semantischen Interpretation in dem computergestu짢tzten sprachlichen Verfahren weiter verfolgt werden.臾명븰?띿뒪???곌린瑜??듯븳 ?낆씪???숈뒿 諛⑸쾿 ?곌뎄

However, it is complicated to obtain such interaction information from the text because research articles are not easily readable and understandable by machines. In this paper, we present and implement a method for extracting biomedical interaction information from bio-text. The proposed method labels all possible pairs of recognized biomedical named-entities (NEs) as INTERACTION or NO-INTERACTION by using a maximum entropy (ME) classifier. The features used for the classifier are obtained by applying various natural language processing (NLP) techniques, i.e., part-of-speech (POS) tagging, base phrase recognition, parsing, and predicate-argument recognition. Especially, specific verb predicates (e.g., activate, inhibit, and diminish) and their biomedical NE arguments are very useful features to identify interactive NE pairs. In the experiments, we analyze how much each applied NLP technique improves the extraction performance. The performance of the proposed method is about 1.4% higher in terms of the F1 measure compared to the baseline method exploiting the features from orthographical characteristics, words themselves constituting a term, and words located in the left or the right context of the term. The use of external contextual features around NEs is crucial for the performance enhancement. We also compared the proposed method with the co-occurrence-based and the rule-based methods in the relation extraction task. The result demonstrates that the proposed method is considerably better than such methods.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?먯뿰?몄뼱 遺꾩꽍 湲곕컲???띿뒪??留덉씠?쓀SIM ?묒옱 ?ㅻ쭏?명룿 湲곕컲 紐⑤컮???좎슜移대뱶 寃곗젣 ?꾨줈?좎퐳???덉쟾???μ긽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 吏???Eun-Wha Jhee), [2011] [KCI?깆옱]
?곕뇤湲곕뒫??怨좊젮???쒓컖???숈뒿?먮즺媛 ?숈뾽?깆랬?꾩뿉 誘몄튂???곹뼢 遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?곷?(SangMi Kim), [2011] [KCI?깆옱]
SVM model for Predicting Human Proteins Interacting with HCV Proteins
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 諛⑹큹(Chao Fang), [2011] [KCI?깆옱]

??꾨젰 ?먯떎 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕?먯꽌 ?섏떊 ?좏샇??媛뺣룄瑜??댁슜??留곹겕 ?덉쭏 痢≪젙
?쒓뎅?듭떊?숉쉶, 諛뺤젙以(Jeongjun Park), [2019]

In this study, by using the natural language processing of the field of artificial intelligence, automated index was performed. And then, the Natural Language Processor for Constructing Database (NALPDB) has been developed. Furthermore, the Design knowledge Information RElational DataBase (DIREDB) has been also developed, which is designed to interlock the knowledge base. DIREDB processes both the documented design-data, like a concrete standard specification, and the design knowledge from an expert. DIREDB is also simulates the design space of structures accordance with the production rule, and thus it is determined that DIREDB can be used as a engine to retrieve new knowledge and to implement knowledge base that is necessary to the development of automatic design system.媛꾩쿃???섑븳 ?댁닔???섏옄???뺣낫
?쒓뎅?띻났?숉쉶, 源?꾩쁺, [1999]

?ㅽ뵂 梨꾨꼸 SSD?먯꽌 ?깅뒫 媛꾩꽠 ?쒓굅瑜??꾪븳 ?몄뒪???섏? I/O ?ㅼ?以꾨윭

?좎젏???숈쟻?곗꽑?쒖쐞 ?ㅼ?以꾨쭅 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒖쓽 遺?섏씤吏湲곕컲 鍮꾩＜湲??쒖뒪???ㅼ?以꾨쭅 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?꾩썝蹂?Wonbo Jeon), [2019]
硫????釉붾줉 怨꾩링?먯꽌 ??援ъ꽦???곕Ⅸ I/O ?깅뒫 遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?≪슜二?Yongju Song), [2019]

The Pritzker Prize, recognized as the highest award in the field of architecture, should be given to selected winners without any controversy. Laureates, that are not only recognized by juries, but also by architects in different countries, related professionals, and others, should be nominated. Therefore it is possible to say that nominated laureates represent architectural trends of the time. The purpose of this study, is largely divided into two. First is to understand the trends of architecture by analyzing the jury citation of each laureates. The second purpose is to easily analyze 38 jury citation by utilizing the natural language processing technology, and to present the possibility of applying this method to the field of architecture. This research has been carried out through the following process. Jury citation have been filtered and analyzed using the 'Stanford Parser?? Also previous studies have been reviewed to establish a suitable research method. Then, main contents of the citation, which can be divided into 9 categories, have been derived and reviewed to understand the trends of architecture. Change in architectural trends have been analyzed based on the categories of expression characteristics and architectural ideas, trends of times, inhabitant, surrounding environment, materials, technologies, light, space and function, and morphological specifics. This research has significance not only in terms of understanding value trends but also in terms of utilizing natural language processing technology, an unfamiliar tool in the field of architecture.Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 1.1 ?곌뎄諛곌꼍 諛?紐⑹쟻 1.2 ?곌뎄踰붿쐞 諛?諛⑸쾿 2. 議곗궗 諛?遺꾩꽍諛⑸쾿?ㅽ룷遺덉쟾 怨듯룷???몃ぉ?꾨━ 吏吏??愿???곌뎄
??쒓굔異뺥븰?뚯??뚯뿰?⑺쉶, 源?⑥옣, [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

This paper proposes a question and answer type classifier using the interrogatives and word semantic categories instead of complicated classifying rules and huge dictionaries. Synonyms and postfix information are also used for question type classification. Experiments show that the semantic categories are helpful for question type classifying without interrogatives.Hydrogen Spillover Kinetics - I. Effect of Surface Morphology on [$Pt/MoO_{3}$] Catalyst

硫?곕??붿뼱 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 ?숈쟻 ?ㅼ쨷?쒕퉬???ㅽ듃?뚰겕 ?ㅼ쐞移섏쓽 ?ㅺ퀎
?쒓뎅?명꽣?룹젙蹂댄븰?? ?댄깭吏?Tae-Jin Lee), [2002]

We present an approach for interpreting natural language commands using ontology as well as an application to robotics. In our approach, we first extract meaningful keywords from the user commands. A structured representation is then built by extracting and arranging meta-data for each keyword. The data is then transformed into an ontological knowledge representation. We implemented an interpretation system and applied it to the user interface of an intelligent mobile robot. The present experiments demonstrate that the coverage of user commands can be easily extended, as the representation is logical and declarative.Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? ?뺤떇 ?몄뼱 FURRL ?? ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿 ?? 援ы쁽 諛??ㅽ뿕?듭떊?묒????덉뼱??蹂대쭅?쒖꽕 源딆씠??理쒖냼???ㅺ퀎

?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍(Morphological Analysis)怨?媛숈? ?몄뼱?숈쟻 泥섎━???섏〈?섎뒗 湲곗〈???쒓뎅??臾명뿄??????먮룞?됱씤 湲곕쾿?ㅼ? ?덉궗???좊ℓ紐⑦샇?⑥씠??蹂듯빀紐낆궗??泥섎━ ?깆쑝濡??명븳 遺??overhead)???щ떎. ?먰븳 遺덉슜??泥섎━???ъ슜?섎뒗 遺덉슜??由ъ뒪?멸? ???臾명뿄??二쇱젣 遺꾩빞蹂꾨줈 ?곕줈 援ъ텞?섏뼱???섎ŉ 洹??ш린媛 諛⑸??섎떎??臾몄젣?먯씠 ?덈떎. ?대윭??臾몄젣?먮뱾???닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐, 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??媛?臾명뿄???띿뒪?몄뿉 ???蹂듯빀紐낆궗 泥섎━???좊ℓ紐⑦샇?⑥뿉 ????꾧꺽??遺꾩꽍???섑뻾?섏? ?딅뒗 媛꾨떒???뺥깭???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍???섑뻾?섎ŉ ?⑥닚紐낆궗?ㅼ쓣 異붿텧?쒕떎. 洹몃윴 ???대뱾 ?⑥닚紐낆궗?ㅼ쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?좏븳 ?ㅽ넗留덊?(Finite Automata)瑜?援ъ꽦?섍퀬, 援ъ꽦???좏븳 ?ㅽ넗留덊?? 媛?紐낆궗???⑥뼱鍮덈룄(Term Frequency)???섑빐 媛??됱씤???꾨낫?ㅼ쓽 以묒슂?꾨? 怨꾩궛?섎뒗 ?먮룞?됱씤 湲곕쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 洹?寃곌낵 ?덉궗???좊ℓ紐⑦븿?????泥섎━??蹂듯빀紐낆궗??泥섎━???곕Ⅸ 遺?댁쓣 以꾩씪 ???덉뿀?쇰ŉ, ?좎젙???됱씤?대뱾怨??섏옉?낆쑝濡??좎젙???됱씤?대뱾??鍮꾧탳 ?ㅽ뿕???섑빐 ?쒖븞???먮룞?됱씤 湲곕쾿???깅뒫??寃利앺븯???Typical techniques for automatic indexing on Korean documents are having difficulty in linguistic processing such as morphological analysis because a part of speech is vague and the process of complex noun is not easy. Also, a separate stop-word list have to be developed upon each different subject and the size of a stop-word list is hug to control. To solve these problems, this theme proposes an automatic indexing technique which performs simple morphological analysis without analysis upon complex nouns and upon process of ambiguity of a part of speech. After constructing finite automata using simple nouns extracted through a morphological analysis, importance of words in text are figured out according to the term frequency of simple nouns and finite automata. Consequently, overhead upon ambiguity of complex nouns and a part of speech is reduced. This theme investigated performance of a proposed automatic indexing technique in comparison with indexing words extracted through a manual indexing process.遺꾩궛 諛?蹂묐젹泥섎━ : 二쇨린?깆쓣 ?댁슜???쒗븳??遺?섍퇏??湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?꾩쥌洹?Im Jong Kyu), [1998]

?쒓뎅?명꽣?룸갑?≫넻?좏븰?? 源蹂묒꽌, [2009] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

?쒓뎅?명꽣?룸갑?≫넻?좏븰?? 媛뺤슦以, [2009] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

Smart home system using natural language processing is to control home appliances through language that we use in common life. Now, Software and hardware being producted is not only performance is good but also it pursue convenience and sensitivity. Because performance of computer is very improved, performance is no problem. And it is completed that how to make human can be convenient through plenty of ideas. But it?셲 somewhat difficult to pursue sensitivity. Smart home we use is able to include performance, convenience and sensitivity like entertainment. Smart home system in Masan make human to feel convenience and entertainment through home automation using speech recognition and natural language processing.
In this paper, we take an appropriate algorithm in smart home not an already proposed natural language analysis. So we research korean interface technology to operate smart home for practical.??숉듅?깅??섏뿉 ?곕Ⅸ 洹좏삎?깃낵吏??鍮꾧탳遺꾩꽍

?뺣낫寃?됱쓽 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈 ?⑥씪 二쇱젣?대? ?ㅼ썙?쒕줈 ?됱씤?섏뿬 寃?됲븯??諛⑹떇???먮━ ?ъ슜?섏뼱 ?붿쑝??臾몄꽌???댁슜???뺥솗???쒗쁽?섍린 ?대졄怨?寃??寃곌낵??臾몄꽌 吏묓빀 ?먰븳 ?덈Т 而ㅼ꽌 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 留뚯”?꾧? ??떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰?몄뼱 泥섎━ 湲곗닠??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 紐⑤뱢???꾩엯???⑥뼱 ?댁긽???⑥쐞??援??⑥쐞瑜??됱씤怨?寃?됱쓽 ?⑥쐞濡??쇰뒗 援??⑥쐞 ?됱씤 諛?寃??湲곕쾿???ъ슜???쒖븞?쒕떎. ??臾몄꽌???먯껜媛 媛뽯뒗 ?ㅼ뼇???ㅻ쪟?ㅻ줈 ?명빐 ?꾩떎?곸쑝濡?異⑸텇??留뚯”??留뚰븷 ?곗닔???깅뒫??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 紐⑤뱢??援ы쁽?섍린???대젮?곕?濡??곹뼢??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 紐⑤뱢??援ы쁽?섏뿬 ?꾩쟾??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵瑜??살? 紐삵븯??留롮? 臾몄옣????댁꽌??援??⑥쐞 ?됱씤??媛?ν븯硫??⑥씪???됱씤蹂대떎 ?앸퀎?μ씠 ?곗뼱??寃???깅뒫???μ긽?섍퀬 寃??怨쇱젙??遺?섎룄 以꾩씪???덈떎.Information retrieval system with indexing system matching single keyword is simple and popular. But with single keyword matching it is very hard to represent the exact meaning of documents and the set of documents from retrieval is very large, therefore it can't satisfy the user of the information retrieval systems. This paper proposes a phrase-based indexing system based on the phrase, the larger syntax unit than a single keyword. Web documents include lots of syntactic errors, the natural language parser with high Quality cannot be expected in Web. Partial trees, even not a full tree, from fully bottom-up parsing is still useful for extracting phrases, and they are much more discriminative than single keyword for index. It helps the information retrieval system enhance the efficiency and reduce the processing overhead.Improving the quality of Search engine by using the Intelligent agent technolo

?쒓뎅而댄벂?곗궛?낃탳?≫븰?? ?몄슜援? [2003]

鍮꾩꽑?먰삎 ?쇳빀 ?꾧퀎 ?ㅼ떆媛??쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒖쓽 ?댁썡 ?묒뾽?????遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?ㅼ???Jia Yoon), [2016]
?곥냽?좎븘 ?덉쟾?ш퀬 諛⑹? ?쒖뒪??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?곕룞??Dong-Hyuck Woo), [2016]
SSD ?대????곌린 踰꾪띁 ?쒖슜瑜?遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?댄깭??Tae Hyung Lee), [2016]

In this study, by using the natural language processing of the field of artificial intelligence, automated index was performed. And then, the Natural Language Processing Interface for knowledge representation(NALPI) has been developed. Furthermore, the DEsign KnOwledge DataBase(DEKODB) has been also developed, which is designed to interlock the knowledge base. The DEKODB processes both the documented design-data, like a concrete standard specification, and the design knowledge from an expert. The DEKODB is also simulates the design space of structures accordance with the production rule, and thus it is determined that DEKODB can be used as a engine to retrieve new knowledge and to implement knowledge base that is necessary to the development of automatic design system. The application field of the system, which has been developed in this study, can be expanded by supplement of the design knowledge at DEKODB and developing dictionaries for foreign languages. Furthermore, the perfect automation at the data accumulation and development of the automatic rule generator should benefit the unified design automation.?⑥떎?묐Ъ??愿媛쒓퀎?띿쓽 ?섎┰???꾪븳 ?쎌삩???쒖슜
?쒓뎅?띻났?숉쉶, ?대궓?? [2001]
?뚯씠??怨⑥“ ?⑥떎??議곕┰ ?곌껐援??대젰 ?쒗뿕
?쒓뎅?띻났?숉쉶, ?⑥긽?? [2001]
?⑥떎 ?됰갑???꾪븳 ?덊듃?뚰봽???깅뒫 遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅?띻났?숉쉶, ?ㅼ슜泥? [2001]

Recently, as the quality of life has been improving, search items in the area of entertainment represent an increasing share of the total usage of Internet portal sites. Information retrieval in the entertainment area is mainly depending on keywords that users are inputting, and the results of information retrieval are the contents that contain those keywords. In this paper, we propose a search method that takes natural language inputs and retrieves the database pertaining to entertainment. The main components of our study are the simple Korean morphological analyzer using case particle information, predicate-oriented token generation, standardized pattern generation coherent to tokens, and automatic generation of the corresponding SQL queries. We also propose an efficient retrieval system that searches the most relevant results from the database in terms of natural language querying, especially in the restricted domain of music, and shows the effectiveness of our system.ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?곌뎄諛⑸쾿 4. 寃곕줎SIFT 湲곕컲??洹 ?곸뿭???댁슜??媛쒖씤 ?앸퀎
?쒓뎅硫?곕??붿뼱?숉쉶, 源誘쇨린(Min-Ki Kim), [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?≪슜二?Yongju Song), [2019]

This paper suggests that the methode is realized parsing algorithm of Korean language by coupling value pattern.
This method translates the sentence by the pattern of coupling value on the predicatives that is decided by predicate words, auxiliary words and nouns with meaning properties.
Accordingly, this methode is to use the syntactic transfer methode and semantic transfer methode.?③잌폀 歷쏃잍찣??慂믣숱怨?訝?ч퐩邕딆???驪붻펱 ?곌뎄

In this study, by using the natural language processing of the field of artificial intelligence, automated index was performed. And then, the Natural Language Processing Interface for knowledge representation(NALPI) has been developed. Furthermore, the DEsign KnOwledge DataBase(DEKODB) has been also developed, which is designed to interlock the knowledge base. The DEKODB processes both the documented design-data, like a concrete standard specification, and the design knowledge from an expert. The DEKODB is also simulates the design space of structures accordance with the production rule, and thus it is determined that DEKODB can be used as a engine to retrieve new knowledge and to implement knowledge base that is necessary to the development of automatic design system. The application field of the system, which has been developed in this study, can be expanded by supplement of the design knowledge at DEKODB and developing dictionaries for foreign languages. Furthermore, the perfect automation at the data accumulation and development of the automatic rule generator should benefit the unified design automation.?⑥떎?묐Ъ??愿媛쒓퀎?띿쓽 ?섎┰???꾪븳 ?쎌삩???쒖슜

?⑥떎 ?됰갑???꾪븳 ?덊듃?뚰봽???깅뒫 遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅?띻났?숉쉶, ?ㅼ슜泥? [2001]

The most part of the large amounts of information in a variety of fields distributed in the Internet space through a communication network such as SNS representatives are described in the text-based content. An analysis of textual information actually means in this respect is based on a critical analysis of social media. In this paper, we analyzed text extracted by the image that is generated by the smart phone camera. In an effort to build a knowledge base system, we designed a natural language processing system employing the discourse representation theory of machine learning based on previous studies of the natural language processing system.?ㅼ쨷 ?쇱꽌?먯꽌 ?앹꽦?섎뒗 ??⑸웾 ?곗씠?곌? ?쒓뎅李쎌쓽?뺣낫臾명솕?숉쉶, ?꾩슦泥? [2015]
?뚮┰?щ떇???섑븰 援먭낵???숈뾽?깆랬?꾩? ?섑븰???쒕룄??誘몄튂???곹뼢 遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅李쎌쓽?뺣낫臾명솕?숉쉶, ?댁옱?? [2015]

硫?곕??붿뼱 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪?먯꽌???뺣낫寃??
?쒓뎅?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪吏꾪씎?? 源寃쎌갹, [1996]
?섏씠?쇰??붿뼱? ?뺣낫寃??
?쒓뎅?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪吏꾪씎?? 理쒖쑄泥? [1996]
?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪 ?먮즺???좏깮怨??뚮??뺣낫?먮떒湲곗?
?쒓뎅?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪吏꾪씎?? ?좉컖泥? [1996]

Recently, the necessity of systems which effectively store and retrieve video data has increased. Conventional video retrieval systems retrieve data using menus or text based keywords. Due to the lack of information, many video clips are simultaneously searched, and the user must have a certain level of knowledge to utilize the system. In this paper, we suggest a natural language based conversational video retrieval system that reflects users' intentions and includes more information than keyword based queries. This system can also retrieve from events or people to their movements. First, an event database is constructed based on meta-data which are generated by domain analysis for collected video in an office environment. Then, a script database is also constructed based on the query pre-processing and analysis. From that, a method to retrieve a video through a matching technique between natural language queries and answers is suggested and validated through performance and process evaluation for 10 users. The natural language based retrieval system has shown its better efficiency in performance and user satisfaction than the menu based retrieval system.理쒓렐 ?숈쁺?곸쓣 ??ν븯嫄곕굹 ?④낵?곸쑝濡?寃?됲븯???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?꾩슂?깆씠 利앷??섍퀬 ?덈떎. 湲곗〈 ?숈쁺??寃???쒖뒪?쒖? 硫붾돱???띿뒪??湲곕컲???ㅼ썙?쒕줈 ?숈옉?섎뒗?? 寃?됱쓣 ?꾪븳 ?뺣낫媛 鍮덉빟?섏뿬 留롮? ?숈쁺?곸씠 ?숈떆??寃?됰릺??寃쎌슦媛 留롪퀬, ?ъ슜?먭? ?대떦 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ъ슜?섍린 ?꾪븳 吏?앹씠 ?꾩슂?섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ㅼ썙??湲곕컲 吏덉쓽??鍮꾪빐 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?섎룄???ㅼ뼇???뺣낫瑜??ы븿 ?????덇퀬 ?대깽?몃굹 ?щ엺 肉??꾨땲???멸컙??湲곕낯?곸씤 ?됰룞源뚯? 寃?됲븯???먯뿰??吏덉쓽 湲곕컲 ?숈쁺??寃???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. 癒쇱?, ?щТ?ㅼ뿉???섏쭛???숈쁺?곸뿉 ????꾨찓??遺꾩꽍???듯빐 硫뷀??곗씠?곕줈 ?대깽???곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섍퀬, ?대떦 ?곸뿭?먯꽌???ъ슜??吏덉쓽??????꾩쿂由?怨쇱젙怨?遺꾩꽍 ?묒뾽???듯빐 ?ㅽ겕由쏀듃 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?쒕떎. ?대젃寃?援ъ텞???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ??뷀삎 吏덉쓽? ?듬? ??留ㅼ묶???듯빐 ?숈쁺?곸쓣 寃?됲븳?? 10紐낆쓽 ?ъ슜?먮? ??곸쑝濡?硫붾돱 湲곕컲 寃???쒖뒪?쒓낵???깅뒫 ?됯?? ?꾨줈?몄뒪 ?됯? 鍮꾧탳 寃利앹쓣 ?듯빐, ?깅뒫?대굹 ?ъ슜??留뚯”?꾨㈃?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠 ?곗닔?⑥쓣 蹂댁????붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쒖븞?섎뒗 ??뷀삎 ?숈쁺??寃???쒖뒪?쒗띁吏?곗튂瑜??댁슜???곗튂?ㅽ겕由곗뿉?쒖쓽 臾몄옄 ?낅젰 諛⑸쾿??????곌뎄

?꾨줈洹몃옒諛?媛?ν븳 洹몃옒?쎌뒪 ?섎뱶?⑥뼱瑜??ъ슜??怨좏뭹吏??꾩뿭 議곗쁺 ?앹꽦
?쒓뎅HCI?숉쉶, 李⑤뱷??Deukhyun Cha), [2008]

Overall architecture of the Chinese TTS system consists of natural language processing module, grapheme-to-phoneme conversion and prosody prediction module, and speech signal synthesis module. POSTAG/C is a system which combines word segmentation module based on rules and a dictionary with a POS tagging module based on HMM (Hidden Markov Model). The word dictionary was automatically acquired by POS tagged corpus and the system has high portability to serve both GB texts as well as Big5 texts. The word segmenting module is composed of two parts. Input Chinese texts go through a pre-segmenting process at first. The pre-segmenting process splits input texts into short phrases using some special characters that are symbols, numbers, foreign language characters, and mono-character words. Next, we segment in more detailed using four heuristic rules. The two-phase unknown word prediction process extracts candidate boundaries where unknown words possibly occur in a sentence at first. Next, we predict the category of the words with these boundaries using an SVM-based method. The method of our grapheme-to-phoneme conversion is a dictionary-based and rules-based hybrid approach. In this process, our module converts the decided Pinyin strings into more natural forms with standard Chinese phonetic rules.援?뼱 鍮꾩쑀?댁뿉 ?섑????몄??ъ긽??湲곕뒫怨??묒긽
?몄뼱怨쇳븰?? ?댁쥌?? [2004] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
?앸룆 ?낃꼬臾몄쓽 ?숈궗 ?섏궪-?숈쓽 ?섎? 湲곕뒫
?몄뼱怨쇳븰?? ?댁?洹? [2004] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

Overall architecture of the Chinese `TTS system consists of natural language processing module, grapheme-to-phoneme conversion and prosody prediction module, and speech signal synthesis module. POSTAG/C is a system which combines word segmentation module based on rules and a dictionary with a POS tagging module based on HMM (Hidden Markov Model). The word dictionary was automatically acquired by POS tagged corpus and the system has high portability to serve both GB texts as well as Big5 texts. The word segmenting module is composed of two parts. Input Chinese texts go through a pre-segmenting process at first. The pre-segmenting process splits input texts into short phrases using some special characters that are symbols, numbers, foreign language characters, and mono-character words. Next, we segment in more detailed using four heuristic rules. The two-phase unknown word prediction process extracts candidate boundaries where unknown words possibly occur in a sentence at first. Next, we predict the category of the words with these boundaries using an SVM-based method. The method of our grapheme-to-phoneme conversion is a dictionary-based and rules-based hybrid approach. In this process, our module converts the decided Pinyin strings into more natural forms with standard Chinese phonetic rules.?몄뼱??愿泥좎쟾?듦낵 ?깅퀎 ?ㅽ뀒?덉삤???

?몄뼱怨쇳븰?? ?쒖냼??So Young Seo), [2004] [KCI?깆옱]

For question-answering system, question analysis module finds the question points from user?셲 natural language questions, classifies the question types, and extracts some useful information for answer. This paper proposes a question type classifying technique based on focus words extracted from questions and word semantic information, instead of complicated rules or huge knowledge resources. It also shows how to find the question type without focus words, and how useful the synonym or postfix information to enhance the performance of classifying module.吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒖쓽 吏덉쓽 遺꾩꽍 怨쇱젙? ?댁슜?먯쓽 ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽 臾몄옣?먯꽌 吏덉쓽 ?섎룄瑜??뚯븙?섏뿬 洹??좏삎??遺꾨쪟?섍퀬 ?뺣떟 異붿텧???꾪븳 ?뺣낫瑜?援ы븯??寃껋씠?? 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??蹂듭옟??遺꾨쪟 洹쒖튃 吏묓빀?대굹 ??⑸웾???몄뼱 吏???먯썝 ????댁슜??吏덉쓽 臾몄옣?먯꽌 吏덉쓽 珥덉젏 ?댄쐶瑜?異붿텧?섍퀬 援щЦ 援ъ“?곸쑝濡?愿?⑤맂 ?⑥뼱?ㅼ쓽 ?섎? ?뺣낫??湲곕컲?섏뿬 ?⑥쑉?곸쑝濡?吏덉쓽 ?좏삎??遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 吏덉쓽 珥덉젏 ?댄쐶媛 ?앸왂??寃쎌슦??泥섎━? ?숈쓽?댁? ?묐????뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 吏덉쓽 ?좏삎 遺꾨쪟 ?깅뒫???μ긽?쒗궗 ???덈뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎.?붿????뱀닔?먮즺瑜??꾪븳 XML ?ㅽ궎留?湲곕컲??硫뷀??곗씠???쒗쁽 泥닿퀎

?쒓뎅HCI?숉쉶, 怨좎쁺吏(Young-Ji Koh), [2019]
蹂닿굔愿由ъ옄瑜??꾪븳 ?μ븷??留욎땄??嫄닿컯愿由????댄뵆由ъ??댁뀡 援ы쁽
?쒓뎅HCI?숉쉶, ?몄듅??Seung Hee Ho), [2019]
Development of ?쁋ightMeCup??Prototypes Using Entry-Level 3D Printers
?쒓뎅HCI?숉쉶, Soo Ji Choi(理쒖닔吏), [2019]

Objectives : The purpose of this study is to help select an appropriate word embedding method when analyzing East Asian traditional medicine texts as data.
Methods : Based on prescription data that imply traditional methods in traditional East Asian medicine, we have examined 4 count-based word embedding and 2 prediction-based word embedding methods. In order to intuitively compare these word embedding methods, we proposed a "prescription generating game" and compared its results with those from the application of the 6 methods.
Results : When the adjacent vectors are extracted, the count-based word embedding method derives the main herbs that are frequently used in conjunction with each other. On the other hand, in the prediction-based word embedding method, the synonyms of the herbs were derived.
Conclusions : Counting based word embedding methods seems to be more effective than prediction-based word embedding methods in analyzing the use of domesticated herbs. Among count-based word embedding methods, the TF-vector method tends to exaggerate the frequency effect, and hence the TF-IDF vector or co-word vector may be a more reasonable choice. Also, the t-score vector may be recommended in search for unusual information that could not be found in frequency. On the other hand, prediction-based embedding seems to be effective when deriving the bases of similar meanings in context.??㎫텚????ⓩ떯??愿??簾뤹㈅
??쒗븳?섑븰?먯쟾?숉쉶, 甸듿?渦?Kim Yong-jin), [2019] [KCI?깆옱]

Due to grammatical similarities of both languages, almost all Japanese-Korean MT systems have been developed under the direct MT strategy, in which the lexical disambiguation is essential to high-quality translation. Japanese has a progressive aspectual marker 쨈-te iru쨈 which is difficult to translate into Korean equivalents because in Korean there are two different progressive aspectual markers : 쨈-ko issta쨈 for 쨈action progressive쨈 and 쨈-e issta쨈 for 쨈state progressive쨈. Moreover, the aspectual system of both languages does not quite coincide with each other, so the Korean progressive aspect could not be determined by Japanese meaning of 쨈-te iru쨈 alone. The progressive aspectual meaning may be partially determined by the meaning of predicates and also the semantic meaning of predicates may be partially restricted by adverbials, so all Japanese predicates are classified into five classes : the 1st verb is used only for 쨈action progressive쨈, 2nd verb generally for 쨈action progressive쨈, but occasionally for 쨈state progressive쨈, the 3rd verb only for 쨈state progressive쨈, the 4th verb generally for 쨈state progressive쨈, but occasionally for 쨈action progressive쨈, and the 5th verb for the others. Some heuristic rules are defined for disambiguation of the 2nd and 4th verbs on the basis of abverbs and abverbial phrases. In an experimental evaluation using more than 15,000 sentances from 쨈Asahi newspapers쨈, the proposed method improved the translation quality by about 5%, which proves that it is effective in disambiguating 쨈-te iru쨈 for Japanese-Korean machine translation.湲고쉷?뱀쭛 / ?먯씠?꾪듃 : Vickrey 寃쎈ℓ??湲곗큹???ㅼ쨷 ?먯씠?꾪듃 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒖쓽 ?묒뾽 ?ы븷??

?移?뎄議곕? ?곸슜??Rijndael ?뷀샇 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁
?쒓뎅硫?곕??붿뼱?숉쉶, 源湲명샇(GilHo Kim), [2007]

From the long time ago, many researchers has been researched many kind of information retrieval system for extract information from the huge data. But, not implemented perfect system. Because of, the user's requires is constantly changed and demand new hopes. Add to, the user's cannot searching their wants in a huge data sets.
In this paper, we designed and implemented information retrieval system using by NLP for the Korean language. For this goal, I analysis IRMA(Intelligent Resource-Bounded Machine Architecture), GRATE and PRS systems.
As a conclusion about my system, it is very suitable to adapted Korean language and easy to use. Also, it is to offer exactly information that user's demands.?쒕뭇諛섏＝??臾쇰━???뱀꽦??誘몄튂??臾쇱쓽 ?곹뼢

蹂??쇰Ц? 留먮춬移섏뿉 湲곕컲???곗뼱???먮룞 異붿텧??愿???곌뎄?대떎. ?곗뼱??留먮춬移섎줈遺???⑥뼱???숈궗諛쒖깮鍮덈룄(cooccurrence frequency)? ?곹샇?뺣낫(mutual information)瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 異붿텧?섏??? ?곸뼱?먮뒗 5媛吏 醫낅쪟???곗뼱媛 ?뺤쓽?섏뼱 ?덈떎. ?대뱾? ??숈궗? 紐⑹쟻?? ?먮룞?ъ? 二쇱뼱, ?뺤슜?ъ? 紐낆궗, ?숈궗? 遺??洹몃━怨??뺤슜?ъ? 遺?ъ씠?? ?ш린???숈궗? ?꾩튂?ъ쓽 ?⑥뼱?띿쓣 ?덈∼寃??곗뼱濡??뚯븙?섏뿬 6媛吏 醫낅쪟???곗뼱瑜?異붿텧?섏???This paper describes the automatic extraction of collocations based on corpus. The collocations are extracted from corpus using cooccurrence frequency and mutual information between words. In English, 5 types of collocations are defined. These collocations are transitive verb and object, intransitive verb and subject, adjective and noun, verb and adverb, and adverb and adjective. In this paper another type of collocation is recognized and extracted, which consists of verb and preposition. So 6 types of collocations are extracted based on corpus.遺꾩궛 / 蹂묐젹 泥섎━ : ?ㅽ???而댄벂???ㅽ듃?뚰겕??遺?섍퇏?뺣갑???뺤콉

?ㅼ떆媛??쒖뒪??: ?덉쟾?깆씠 ?붽뎄?섎뒗 ?묒슜遺꾩빞???ъ슜?섎뒗 ?꾨줈洹몃옩 媛?ν븳 ?꾩옄?쒖뒪??

?멸났吏??: ?쒓컖?좉꼍怨꾩쓽 媛쒕뀗???댁슜???꾨줈?뺣낫???뱀쭠異붿텧
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?먯쭊??Sohn Jin Woo), [1994]

In order to produce high quality synthesized speech, it is very important to get an accurate grapheme-to-phoneme conversion and prosody model from texts using natural language processing. Robust preprocessing for non-Korean characters should also be required. In this paper, we analyzed Korean texts using a morphological analyzer, part-of-speech tagger and syntactic chunker. We present a new grapheme-to-phoneme conversion method for Korean using a hybrid method with a phonetic pattern dictionary and CCV (consonant vowel) LTS (letter to sound) rules, for unlimited vocabulary Korean TTS. We constructed a prosody model using a probabilistic method and decision tree-based method. The probabilistic method atone usually suffers from performance degradation due to inherent data sparseness problems. So we adopted tree-based error correction to overcome these training data limitations.BMS ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???댁슜???듭떖??寃異쒓린 嫄곗젅湲곕뒫 ?깅뒫 ?μ긽 ?ㅽ뿕

鍮??붿옄?몄쓽 ??궗? ?ы쉶臾명솕??諛곌꼍??愿???곌뎄
?쒓뎅?붿옄?명븰?? ?쒖긽??Pyo, Sang-Hun), [2017]

A new Programming language, INPLAN, adequate for Natural Language-especially Korean-is defined and implemented.
The basic structures of INPLAN are formalized with 9(test) and 13(action) functions by analizing the the essential operations in natural language processing. A hierarchical natural language processing system can be organized with this basic functions combined functionally. The INPLAN can represents the associative relations of grammartical constituents and semantic structures by using varient data structures based on stack functions of natural language. And the interrelationships between syntatic and semantic structures can be also represented. The INPLAN has the flexible control structure to exclude ungrammartical sentence and perform multiple (test) for transition as well as recursive processing facilities. As INPLAN deals with practical problems in natural language processing, INPLAN can be applied as a effective software tool for research and development of natural language understanding system.
INPLAN is implemented as interpreter with MACRO facllities using LISP1.5. By means of MACRO, INPLAN become a interactive and incremental system with powerful expansion abilities and supporting, for example compiler, easily developed.
The detail implementation method is described and the analysis of the prefinal ending of Korean using INPLAN in also described, which visualize the operations of INPLAN.?ㅻ━肄??⑥쑀 ?뷀빀臾쇨낵 ?덊듃濡??щ젅? 諛섏쓳??諛고뼢?뷀븰怨?諛섏쓳??
泥?＜??숆탳 ?곗뾽怨쇳븰?곌뎄?? ?녔졊?? [1985]

Convolutional Code??畑?솦 Algorithm??愿??簾뤹㈅
泥?＜??숆탳 ?곗뾽怨쇳븰?곌뎄?? ?닻렚燁, [1985]

In this paper we present a consistent semantic model between a natural language and a relational database. The objective of the model is to transform Korean inquires into semantically equivalence SQL expression. We describe the conceptual graph translator, which translates a conceptual graph - the result of semantic analysis to the korean inquires -into a database-suitable conceptual graph. We use a conceptual graph to represent our semantic model of the database. The translator generates a conceptual graph by using a synonym dictionary for queries of various patterns. Beginners are able to retrieve data without knowledge in a specific field. As a result, more practical system with unrestricted inquires can be expected.愿묒꽟???댁쓽 ?곕?愿묒쓣 ?댁슜??遺꾪룷???⑤룄 ?쇱꽌 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 愿???곌뎄

Part-of-speech tagging is the process of assigning the most likely tag to each word in a given sentence. Based on the approach used, we can classify it as follows: Statistical Approach, Rule-Based Approach, Hybrid Approach, and Neural Network Approach. The statistical approach have been widely used for natural language processing. Part-of-speech tagging is one of the field which can be solved by the statistical approach. In this paper, various systems based on the statistical approach are explained and analyzed in terms of its characteristics.?섍꼍?먯꽌 遺꾨━??Extended Spectrum 棺-Lactamases (ESBLs) ?앹궛 E.coli ?댁꽦 ?곌뎄

This paper explains the design and development of morphological analyzer for travel information retrieval system using natural language. It is the first step of query analysis using natural language interface. It will be later integrated into travel information retrieval system. ?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, ?댁??? [2019]

In traditional Korean grammar, Numerals are treated as an independent part of speech. The Numeral has three different functions: with Josa (postposition), it composes a noun phrase; with copular '-i-', of 'ani-', it constitutes a predicate; and sometimes it specifies another noun which follows it. A special class of nouns, so-called classifiers, always takes Numerals as their specifier. However, there are some strict constraints between Numerals and classifiers; some classifiers take only pure Korean Numerals, others only Korean-Chinese Numerals, and yet others both kinds of Numerals. These constraints are very important for the natural language processing of Korean. The purpose of this article is to subcategorize Korean Numerals according to the constraints between Numerals and classifiers.?딂ł耶며틓?욁뗭쓽 ?먫ł遙붼읅獄???
?쒓뎅?멸뎅?대??숆탳 ?멸뎅??醫낇빀?곌뎄?쇳꽣 ?몄뼱?곌뎄?? ?녔솦岳? [1999] [KCI?깆옱]

Other query processing systems tend to analyze only facts and to simply provide structural information for users. In fact, the systems do not have big difference with database systems or text based information processing systems. Therefore, in this research, the method which can provide the inferred information based on axioms is suggested in order to maximize reusability of ontology.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿???곌뎄 ?? ?쒖븞??吏덉쓽 泥섎━ 紐⑤뱢HSI 怨좎쑀移쇰씪 紐⑤뜽怨?遺덈? 紐⑤찘?몃? ?댁슜??援먰넻 ?쒖???寃異?諛⑸쾿

1. ?쒕줎 2. ?쒓? 踰붿쐞? ?ъ쟾???ㅻ챸 3. ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 4. 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 5. ?섎? ?댁꽍怨??섎? 援ъ“???쒗쁽?섏〈 臾몃쾿怨??議??섎?濡좎쓣 ?댁슜???쒓뎅?댁쓽 ?댄쐶??以묒쓽???닿껐 ?쒖뒪??

?쇨뎬?곸긽 遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪??
?쒓뎅?몄?怨쇳븰?? 源遊됯렐(Bong-Keun Kim), [1991] [KCI?깆옱]
?섏젙??Neocognitron???ъ슜???꾧린泥??쒓? ?몄떇
?쒓뎅?몄?怨쇳븰?? 源?吏?Eun-Jin Kim), [1991] [KCI?깆옱]

Twitter users use ?쁅ollowing?? ?쁒etweet??and so on to find tweets that they are interested in. However, it is difficult for users to find tweets that are of interest to them on Twitter, which has more than 300 million users. In this paper, we developed a customized tweet recommendation system to resolve it. First, we gather current trends to collect tweets that are worth recommending to users and popular tweets that talk about trends. Later, to analyze users and recommend customized tweets, the users??tweets and the collected tweets are categorized. Finally, using Web service, we recommend tweets that match with user categorization and users whose interests match. Consequentially, we recommended 67.2% of proper tweet.?몄쐞???ъ슜?먮뒗 ?붾줈?? 由ы듃???깆쓣 ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?먯떊??愿???덉뼱 ?섎뒗 ?몄쐵??李얜뒗?? ?섏?留??ъ슜?먭? 3?듭뿬 紐낆뿉 ?ы븯???몄쐞?곗뿉???ъ슜?먭? 愿???덈뒗 ?몄쐵??李얘린???섎뱺 ?쇱씠?? ?대? ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ъ슜??留욎땄???몄쐵 異붿쿇 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 媛쒕컻?섏??? ?곗꽑, ?ъ슜?먯뿉寃?異붿쿇?????덉쓣 留뚰븳 媛移섍? ?덈뒗 ?몄쐵???섏쭛?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?꾩옱 ?몃옖?쒕? ?섏쭛?섍퀬, ?몃옖?쒖뿉 ????댁빞湲고븯???멸린 ?덈뒗 ?몄쐵?ㅼ쓣 ?섏쭛?쒕떎. ?댄썑 ?ъ슜?먮? 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 留욎땄???몄쐵??異붿쿇?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?몄쐵怨??섏쭛???몄쐵??踰붿＜?뷀븳?? 理쒖쥌?곸쑝濡??뱀꽌鍮꾩뒪瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?ъ슜?먯뿉寃?蹂몄씤怨?移댄뀒怨좊━媛 ?쇱튂?섎뒗 ?몄쐵怨?愿?ъ궗媛 ?쇱튂?섎뒗 ?ъ슜?먮? 異붿쿇?댁??? 寃곌낵?곸쑝濡?67.2%濡??곸젅???몄쐵??異붿쿇?섏????덉쟾???대씪?곕뱶 ?섍꼍???꾪븳 ?뚰봽?몄썾???뺤쓽 寃쎄퀎 湲곕컲???ㅽ듃?뚰겕 蹂댁븞 ?붾（???쒖븞
?쒓뎅?듯빀?숉쉶, 李⑥슧?? [2018] [KCI?깆옱]
Effects of Absorptive Capacity on Technology Innovation and Commercialization Capacities and Management Performance
?쒓뎅?듯빀?숉쉶, 源?곴린, [2018] [KCI?깆옱]
C??媛?뺤뼱由곗씠吏??댁쁺?먯쓽 ?곸쑀?꾧툒???뚮젅瑜닿린 愿由ъ뿉 ????듯빀???곌뎄
?쒓뎅?듯빀?숉쉶, ?댁＜?, [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

The logical database design generally is composed of two stages (designing the conceptual schema and translating it into a hierarchical schema, a network schema, or a relational schema). The entity-relationship model is used to describe the conceptual schema. The entity-relationship approach provides an easy method to understand comprehensive methodology for logical database design independent of storage or efficiency considerations.
This paper describes an experminetal system which assists designers to develop an entity-relationship model in natural language dialog. Also, this paper presents the knowledge representation translating entity-relationship diagram into a hierarchical schema, a network schema and a relational schema. Models of the representation of entity-relationship diagrams, hierarchical schema, network schema and relational schema are described in prolog language.
This approach provides analyst and designer with better understanding for semantic requirements of application domain by using the latural lanuge.?딂뒻瑗щ쭏?쇱쭊?㏓Ъ??野꾤뵟?섎뒗 吏꾨뵒踰뚭낵 ?댁쓽 ?띶칱?잒쐜???쒗븳 簾뤹㈅

A natural Language query interface is useful for general database users not familiar with DB.
The Korean using Sentence Pattern DB query System, a query interface for relational DB, Korean queries into the equivalent SQL queries.
The Natural Language queries Analyzer Korean queries and generates appropriate parsing.
The Semantic Analyzer transforms SQL forms equivalent to input Natural queries, query processing System, SQL queries by utilizing.以묐젰?뚯쫰紐⑤뜽???곕Ⅸ ?꾧퀎怨≪꽑???뺥깭蹂??

Though portraits cover a large percentage of those photos, because of the property rights, near entirety of such photos are unavailable for use by web-page producers, advertising companies, web-designers, and so on, who need a variety of portraits with differing expressions and characteristics. This study offers a search engine that incorporates image characteristics based on natural language index, which can provide a fast and reliable search result. It will create an opportunity for the digital photographers to more easily sell their pictures and simultaneously provide the would-be users of the photos a better and easier way to find the pictures they are looking for. Once the search engine is realized, it will become possible to use not only the nouns as keywords and categories but also verbs in search of portraits revealing feelings, expressions, dressings, and other characteristics.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿???곌뎄 ?? ?대?吏 寃???쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎援먰솚湲??뚰봽?몄썾??媛쒕컻???꾪븳 ?몄뒪??湲곕컲 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪 ?쒕??덉씠?곗쓽 援ы쁽
?쒓뎅而댄벂?곗젙蹂댄븰?? 諛뺤쁺?? [2006] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

臾댁꽑 ?쇱꽌 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕瑜??댁슜??吏?ν삎 ???ㅽ듃?뚰겕 ?쒕퉬???ㅺ퀎
?쒓뎅而댄벂?곗젙蹂댄븰?? ?섏꽑?? [2006] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

Purpose In this study, we propose the special purposed R package named ""new_Noun()" to process nonstandard texts appeared in various social networks. As the Big data is getting interested, R - analysis tool and open source software is also getting more attention in many fields. Design/methodology/approach With more than 9,000 R packages, R provides a user-friendly functions of a variety of data mining, social network analysis and simulation functions such as statistical analysis, classification, prediction, clustering and association analysis. Especially, "KoNLP" - natural language processing package for Korean language - has reduced the time and effort of many researchers. However, as the social data increases, the informal expressions of Hangeul (Korean character) such as emoticons, informal terms and symbols make the difficulties increase in natural language processing. Findings In this study, to solve the these difficulties, special algorithms that upgrade existing open source natural language processing package have been researched. By utilizing the ?쏫oNLP??package and analyzing the main functions in noun extracting command, we developed a new integrated noun processing package "new_Noun()" function to extract nouns which improves more than 29.1% compared with existing package.?대씪?곕뱶 而댄벂?????議곗쭅 ?됰룞???댄빐: 議곗쭅???대씪?곕뱶 而댄벂 援ш낵?뺤뿉 ?μ쓣 誘몄튂???붿냼? 蹂?곸쟻 由щ뜑?쎌쓽 議곗젅?④낵
?쒓뎅?뺣낫?쒖뒪?쒗븰?? 源?곹쁽, [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??援щЦ-?섎? ?숈떆 遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 踰붿＜ 臾몃쾿怨?QLF(quasi logical form)??湲곕컲???곹샇蹂댁셿(synergistic) 援ъ“瑜??쒖떆?쒕떎. 踰붿＜ 臾몃쾿???댁슜?섏뿬 遺遺??먯쑀 ?댁닚, 蹂듭옟??議곗궗, ?대? ?깆쓽 ?뱀꽦??媛뽯뒗 ?쒓뎅??臾몃쾿??紐⑤뜽留곹븯怨? ?쇰━ 援ъ“(logical form)??媛??뺥깭?뚯쓽 ?섎? 援ъ“瑜?紐⑤뜽留곹븳?? ?먰븳, ?ㅼ퐫??scoping)怨?議곗쓳?? ?섎????좊ℓ?깆쓣 ?ㅻ（湲??쎈룄濡?QLF瑜??꾩엯?쒕떎. 紐ы뀒洹??대줎???낃컖???⑹꽦 ?섎?濡좎쓣 ?대줎??諛곌꼍?쇰줈 ?섏뿬 ?ㅼ뼇???뺥깭??踰붿＜???뚮쭪??湲곕낯 QLF?붿냼瑜??쒖븞?섍퀬 ?대? ?ъ쟾??肄붾뵫?쒕떎. ?먭컻??援щЦ 踰붿＜媛 category cancellation ?곗궛???섑빐 寃고빀????洹몄뿉 ?대떦?섎뒗 QLFs??踰붿＜ ?쒖빟怨??섎? ?쒖빟??留뚯”?쒗궎?꾨줉 寃고빀?쒕떎. ???쒖빟留뚯”???섑빐 臾몄옣???섎???援ъ“???좊ℓ?깆씠 ?닿껐?쒕떎. ?뚯떛??寃곌낵濡??앹꽦??QLF???ㅼ퐫???닿껐, 議곗쓳??泥섎━, ?앸왂泥섎━瑜?嫄곗퀜 留덉?留??쇰━ 援ъ“濡?蹂?섎맂??In this paper, we developed a synergistic architecture based on categorial grammar and quasi logical form for syntactic and semantic co-analysis. Categorial grammar declaratively models Korean syntax such as partially free word-order, noun-endings, and complex verb-endings, and the logical form models each morpheme's semantic structure. QLF (quasi logical form) is introduced for convenient handling of scoping, anaphora and semantic ambiguities. Based on the compositional semantics derived from the Montague theory, proper QLFs for various morpheme categories are suggested and coded in the dictionary. When two categories are combined by the category cancellation operations, their QLFs are also combined with categorial and semantic restrictions. These restrictions resolve semantic/structural ambiguities of the sentence. The derived QLF for the sentence is converted into a logical form(LF) through scope, anaphora and ellipsis resolution.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 湲곗〈???곌뎄 3. ?쒓뎅???섎? 遺꾩꽍湲??꾩껜 援ъ“?닿났媛꾩쓽 留ㅺ컻蹂?섑솕? 吏꾪솕 ?꾨줈洹몃옩???댁슜???숈쟻 ?곗긽 硫붾え由ъ쓽 理쒖쟻 ?ㅺ퀎

?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 媛뺤옣臾? [2019]

Objectives : In many cases, patient's symptoms have been recorded on EMR in natural language instead of medical terminologies. It is possible to build a database by analyzing the symptoms of Korean Medicine(KM) that indicates patient's symptoms in natural language. Using the database, when doctors record patient's symptoms on EMR in natural language, conversely it'll be also possible to extract the symptoms of KM from those natural language. The database will enhance the value of EMR as a medical data. Methods : In this study, we aimed to make data structure of the terminologies that represent the symptoms of KM. The data structure is combinations of smallest unit in natural language. We made the database by analyzing morpheme of the natural language to express the symptoms of KM. Results & Conclusions : By classifying the natural language in 15 features, we made the structure of concept and the data available for morphological analysis.?쒖쓽???볣넫耶??먯꽌 ?섍꼍?섑븰(?겼쥊?ュ?)??以묒슂?깆뿉 愿??怨좎같
??쒖삁諛⑺븳?섑븰?? 源?? [2013] [KCI?깆옱]

?뱀쭛 : PC ?듭떊怨??명꽣?룹쓣 ?댁슜???⑤씪?명븰??
?쒓뎅?붿???꾩꽌愿?щ읆, 諛깅몢沅? [1997]

Service development using a conversational agent(chatbot, smart speaker) is becoming popular. A large amount of ?쁟onversation??must be secured to train an agent, but it is not easy to get it in the initial design. To solve the difficulty, various methods for collecting training data are being sought. In this study, we attempted to collect training data using MTurk. We compared the task design elements(task amount, bonus compensation method, explanation method based social proof) to be influenced by how the results were presented to participants. As a result of analysis, the quality of the collected data decreased when the amount of task increased, and the efficiency of collection increased when providing bonus compensation method. Providing explanation method based social proof show that the diversity of the collection results is higher but the efficiency is lowered. This study is meaningful in that it suggests a design guide for task design elements in collecting training data based on crowdsourcing.??뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃(梨쀫큸, ?ㅻ쭏?몄뒪?쇱빱)瑜??댁슜???쒕퉬??媛쒕컻??蹂댄렪?붾릺怨??덈떎. ?먯씠?꾪듃瑜??덈젴?쒗궎湲??꾪빐?쒕뒗 留롮? ?묒쓽 ?섎??붴숆? ?뺣낫?섏뼱???섏?留? 珥덇린 ?붿옄?몄뿉?쒕뒗 ?대? ?뺣낫?섍린媛 ?쎌? ?딅떎. ?대윭???쒖젏???닿껐?섍퀬???ㅼ뼇??諛쒗솕?곗씠???섏쭛?섎뒗 諛⑹븞??紐⑥깋?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???꾨쭏議?誘몄틦?덉뺄?고겕瑜??쒖슜??諛쒗솕?곗씠?곕? 紐⑥쑝???쒕룄瑜??대낫?섎떎. ?섏쭛 寃곌낵媛 李몄뿬?먯뿉寃??쒖뒪?щ? ?대뼸寃??쒖떆?섎뒓?먯뿉 ?곕씪 ?곹뼢??諛쏄린???쒖뒪???붿옄???붿냼(?쒖뒪???? 蹂대꼫??蹂댁긽 諛⑹떇, Social Proof 湲곕컲 ?ㅻ챸 諛⑹떇)瑜?鍮꾧탳???ㅽ뿕??吏꾪뻾?섏??? 遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵, ?쒖뒪???묒씠 留롮븘吏硫??섏쭛???곗씠?곗쓽 吏덉씠 ?⑥뼱議뚯쑝硫? 蹂대꼫??蹂댁긽 諛⑹떇???쒓났?????섏쭛???⑥쑉?깆씠 ?믪븘議뚮떎. ?뚯뀥?꾨（??Social Proof) 湲곕컲 ?ㅻ챸 諛⑹떇? ?섏쭛 寃곌낵???ㅼ뼇?깆? ?믪씠吏留??⑥쑉?깆? ?⑥뼱?⑤━??寃껋쑝濡??섑??щ떎. 蹂??곌뎄???щ씪?곕뱶?뚯떛 湲곕컲???숈뒿?곗씠???섏쭛???덉뼱 ?쒖뒪???붿옄???붿냼??????붿옄??媛?대뱶瑜??쒖뼵?쒕떎???먯뿉???곌뎄 ?섏쓽媛 ?덈떎.?꾩떖??臾댁옣???듯빀????댄꽣 ?붿옄???쒖븞

?쒓뎅?댁젙蹂댄븰?? Liu Kaiying , [2002]
?뱀꽦李⑥썝媛뺥븯? ?좏삎 遺꾨쪟瑜?醫낇빀?댁슜??怨좏슚?⑥꽦 ?쒖옄?몄떇 遺꾨쪟湲곗뿉 ??섏뿬
?쒓뎅?댁젙蹂댄븰?? Zhang Min , [2002]

Objective: Medical narratives entry is a major issue to be solved in developing an electronic medical record system operating in practice, as they are, in large part, described in a free-text format. The issue can be dealt with in three aspects: to improve the reusability by structuring medical narratives, to support clinical pragmatics in medical fields, and to reduce the burden of data entry. With the aspects having in mind, this paper purports to present an ontological method for better way of medical narratives entry. Methods: We developed an ontology for which medical knowledge is structurally represented. Then we can enter medical narrative texts with commands of the controlled natural language operable on the ontology model. Results: Many theoretical studies on free-text entry were reviewed, based on which an authoring and editing tool for natural language description operable on the ontology model has been developed and tested. The performance of the tool is satisfactory within the limit of the domain models we developed here. Conclusion: The results of this paper are contributive for clinicians to make an easy entry of medical narratives as far as the ontology model covers their knowledge domain. It is also expected that the cost in recording medical narratives might be considerably reduced and data quality can be improved. (Journal of Korean Society of Medical Informatics 12-3,261-271, 2006)?섏옄?곸긽 ?꾩넚???꾪븳 Proxy湲곕컲??Transcoder

In dieser Arbeit wird versucht, deutsche lexikalische Eintragung in Natural Language Processing(NLP) mit der Unifikation- Dependenz Grammatik zu untersuchen, weil der lexikalische Eintrag fu짢r die maschinellen U짢bersetzungen sehr wichtig ist. Der Begriff der Unifikation, zuerst allgemein verwendet in der generativen Grammatik in den achtziger Jahren. stellt eine flexible Weise des Kombinierens der grammatischen Richtlinien von unterschiedlichen Quellen zu Einzelspezifikationen des Erzeugnisses einer Ma棺einheit der Grammatik zur Verfu짢gung. Unifikation ist in Bresnan 1982. Gazdar.
Klein. Pullum & Sag 1985 wichtig. um einige Arbeiten zu benennen. die es gebrauchen.
Im zweiten Abschnitt werden zuerst der Vergleich zwischen "Constituency und "Dependency. Lineare Ordnung. die vorhergehende Arbeit uber die Dependenz Grammatik und die Vereinigung erwa짢hnt. Im dritten Abschnitt wird das Lexikon gezeigt. das die Eigenschaft Matrix. die grundlegenden Abteilungen. Kategorie Subtypen und formale Eigenschaften und Inhalt und Wertigkeit umfasst.

On design process, it has been considered as an importancy that the reaction of users delivered to architect becomes the feed-back of the raw~data information.
However, the study and adoption of these parts have been done in limitation. Especially in case of church architecture, the architect has strong desire to deliver his design message to user. So, the importance of feed-back of users reaction mentioned above is strong.
This study is to help architect give understand users on the design process, by analyze users group natural-language vocabulary on the basis of corpus linguistics and by analyze users cognition characteristics to church architecture.?뺤“? ?좊ぉ怨듭궗???섏쓽? ??궗臾명솕?섍꼍?쇰줈??蹂댁〈

?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵濡? 留롮? ?⑥뼱濡쒕???留롮? ?섏쓽 ?묒궗瑜?("?대뒓 ?뺣룄"源뚯???- ?곸뼱?먯꽌???묒궗???섍? ?쒖젙?섏뼱 ?덉쑝誘濡? ?먮룞?띾뱷?쇰줈 ?살쓣 ???덉쓬???????덉뿀??Automatic acquisition of English affixes, loosely motivated by human acquisition, using character-based pattern matching method was possible shown in two papers (Taewoon Yoon, 1999 : Taewoon Yoon & Lucja Iwanska, 1999). From the possibility of unsupervised learning of natural language morphology, this paper observes English affixes acquisition from 168 different-sized word-frequency lists - 80 sets of 1-article list, 80 sets of l0-article list. 7 corpus (l00-article) list, and a single all-corpora list - to view how well affixes are acquired from different word-frequency sets with different threshold values by unsupervised learning. As the results of the experiments, the more input words are given, the better acquisition of affixes will be done by unsupervised learning until a certain point which occurs due to the limited amount of affixes in English.紐⑹감 Abstract, ?붿빟 = 409 ?? ?ㅼ젣 ?댁슜?먮뱾???꾩슂?깆쓣 異⑹”?섎뒗 ?뚯븙?뺣낫 寃???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 媛쒕컻?섎뒗???덉뼱???ㅼ깮?쒖쓽 ?뚯븙 ?뺣낫 吏덉쓽?????遺議깊븳 ?댄빐媛 ?μ븷媛 ?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ???곌뎄???ㅼ깮??吏덉쓽??寃쏀뿕??遺꾩꽍???듯빐 ?댁슜?먮뱾???대뼸寃??뚯븙 ?뺣낫瑜?李얜뒗吏??????대줎?곸씤 ?댄빐瑜??뺢퀬???쒕떎. 洹?以묒뿉?쒕룄 誘몃옒???뚯븙?뺣낫 寃???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?붿옄?? ?뱁엳 ?좎옱?곸씤 ?묎렐?먯쓣 ?좏깮?섎뒗???덉뼱??寃곗젙?곸씤 ?뺣낫瑜??쒓났?섎뒗 ??븷???섍쾶 ???ㅼ깮?쒖쓽 ?뚯븙?뺣낫 吏덉쓽 ?댁뿉???댁슜?먮뱾???쒓났???뺣낫???뺥솗?깆쓣 寃?좏븯怨??덈떎. ???곌뎄???댁슜?먯쓽 ?뺣낫 以??곷떦 遺遺꾩씠 遺?뺥솗???뺣낫?꾩쓣 蹂댁뿬二쇰ŉ, ?대윴 遺?뺥솗?깃낵 遺덊솗?ㅼ꽦?먮룄 遺덇뎄?섍퀬 ?ㅼ닔??吏덉쓽媛 ?깃났?곸엫???뚮젮以?? ?먰븳 ?댁슜濡좎쓽 ?대줎?쇰줈??遺?뺥솗??吏덉쓽???덇린移??딆? ?깃났?????遺遺꾩쟻 ?ㅻ챸???섏???Our limited understanding of real-life music information queries is an impediment to developing music information retrieval (MIR) systems that meet the needs of real users. This study aims to contribute to developing a theorized understanding of how people seek music information by an empirical investigation of real-life queries, in particular, focusing on the accuracy of user-provided information and users??uncertainty expressions. This study found that much of users??information is inaccurate: users made various syntactic and semantic errors in providing this information. Despite these inaccuracies and uncertainties, many queries were successful in eliciting correct answers. A theory from pragmatics is suggested as a partial explanation for the unexpected success of inaccurate queries.ABSTRACT 珥덈줉 1. Introduction 2. Related Works 3. ?숈젣??遺꾩빞???뺣낫?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 ?숈닠吏 ?몄슜 遺꾩꽍??愿???곌뎄
?쒓뎅?뺣낫愿由ы븰?? ?좎냼??So Young Yu), [2008] [KCI?깆옱]

In this paper, some applications of natural language processing techniques for information retrieval have been introduced, but the results are known not to be satisfied. In order to find the roles of some classical natural language processing techniques in information retrieval and to find which one is better we compared the effects with the various natural language techniques for information retrieval precision, and the experiment results show that basic natural language processing techniques with small calculated consumption and simple implementation help a small for information retrieval. Senior high complexity of natural language processing techniques with high calculated consumption and low precision can not help the information retrieval precision even harmful to it, so the role of natural language understanding may be larger in the question answering system, automatic abstract and information extraction.Abstract I. Web?곸뿉?쒖쓽 ?ㅺ뎅?닿컙 湲곌퀎踰덉뿭, ?먯뿰???명꽣?섏씠?? ?먯뿰??寃???쒖뒪?????먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ뿉 愿???꾩슂?깆씠 利앷??⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?먯뿰???앹꽦???꾩슂?깅룄 ?먯뿰??利앷??섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?ㅼ젙?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???몄뼱??湲곕뒫?곸씤 ??븷??湲곗닠??紐⑹쟻?먯꽌 ?꾩깮???쒖뒪?뚮? 臾몃쾿怨?臾몄옣 ?앹꽦怨쇱쓽 ?곌??깆쓣 諛앺??꾩쑝濡쒖꽌 ?쒖뒪?뚮? 臾몃쾿??臾몄옣?앹꽦???꾧뎄濡쒖꽌 ?ъ슜?????덈뒗 諛⑺뼢???쒖떆?섍퀬???쒕떎Natural language generation had been relatively less attention than understanding. However, need for natural language generation is growing rapidly as application systems, especially multi-language machine translation systems on the web, natural language interface systems, natural language query systems need more complex messages to generate. In this paper, we analyze the systemic grammar in terms of language generation. By analyzing the relevance of these two, we can find out how the systemic grammar can be used as a tool of language generation.?ㅻ쭏?몄뭅?쒕? ?댁슜???꾩옄臾몄꽌 ?먮낯 蹂댁〈 ?쒖뒪??

Web?곸뿉?쒖쓽 ?ㅺ뎅?닿컙 湲곌퀎踰덉뿭, ?먯뿰???명꽣?섏씠?? ?먯뿰??寃???쒖뒪?????먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ뿉 愿???꾩슂?깆씠 利앷??⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?먯뿰???앹꽦???꾩슂?깅룄 ?먯뿰??利앷??섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?ㅼ젙?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쇰컲?곸씤 ?몄뼱 ?앹꽦 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???곸슜?????덈뒗 臾몄옣 ?앹꽦?????④퀎 ?덉감?????湲곗닠?섎ŉ ?뱁엳 ??踰덉㎏ ?④퀎??蹂?섍퇋移숈뿉 ???以묒젏?곸쑝濡??쇳븳??In natural language research, the language generation had been relatively less interested than understanding. However, need for natural language generation is growing rapidly as application systems, especially multi-language machine translation systems on the Web, natural language interface systems, natural language query systems need more complex messages to generate. In this paper, a three step procedure for sentence generation is introduced. It is designed to be applied to any language generation algorithm. Specially it focuses on describing the transformation rule of step three.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎(Introduction) 2. 臾몄옣 ?앹꽦 ?덉감 (Sentence Generation Procedures) 3. ?섎? ?꾨젅??援ъ“ (Semantic Frame Structure)湲곗뼲?μ쓣 媛吏??곹빀???쇰뱶諛?

Up to now, many natural language query interfaces have been developed for relational DBMS. However, the field of natural language query interfaces for object-oriented database systems which have recently started to emerge as the new generation DBMS is to be a new research area. In this paper, we design a Korean Interface for Database(KID) which transforms Korean natural language queries into query graphs used in object-oriented data model and propose a technique to process natural language representations of path expressions. The KID adopts a frame-based approach in order to represent the transformation knowledge.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?쒖뒪??媛쒖슂 3. 吏??踰좎씠?ㅼ? 吏덉쓽 ?꾨젅?꾨벑怨좎꽑 吏?꾨줈遺??3李⑥썝 吏?뺤쓽 蹂듭썝???꾪븳 ?섏뒪??湲곕컲 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁

This thesis designs and implements the automatic evaluation system with natural language processing technique. To solve the degradation of general evaluation system, we define the question type and improve the performance of evaluation through the adaptive process for each question type. To evaluate the system, we analyze the correlation between human evaluation and term-based evaluation, and between human evaluation and this system evaluation. We got the better result than term-based evaluation. It needs to expand the question type and improve the adaptive processing technique for each type.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿???곌뎄 ?? 吏덉쓽?좏삎 遺꾩꽍???듯븳 ?쒕떟???먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쏤PS 寃뚯엫?먯꽌??罹먮┃???깃꺽 遺꾩꽍 ?곌뎄

In this paper, we analyze the systemic grammar in the respect of AI problem solving. 嶺녻낅뒗 ??湲?먯꽌 ?볟쐦沃욃???諛쒖쟾???꾪븳 4媛吏 沃꿴죱瑜??먪ㅊ?덈떎. 泥レ㎏, 醫뗭? 簾뤹㈅?낃? ?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗, 訝?ц?沃욃?筌ㅸ쳳, ?얌빰? ?얌빰餓ε뎺???볟쐦沃욎뿉 ????ｅ춼??簾뤹㈅?끻젿? 蘊뉑뼑?끻젿瑜?媛?ν븳 ??留롮씠 湲곗뼲?댁빞 ?섎ŉ ?볟쐦沃욎뿉 ????ｅ춼簾뤹㈅瑜??쎄굅???볟쐦沃욆퀒?숇? 茹?쮱???뚯뿉, 洹몃윭???끻젿瑜??뚧셽???⑴뵪?????덉뼱???쒕떎. ?섏㎏, ?볟쐦沃욃???簾뤹㈅弱띹괌???섌윋?뗨첑?숇뒗 ?섉쮽繹뽭윋?뗨첑?숆? ?꾨땲???섋눎?띈첑濡쒖꽌???볟쐦沃왿숆? 訝산? ?섏뼱???쒕떎. ?뗭㎏, ?쒕줈 ?ㅻⅨ 鼇沃욑ℓ獄뽰쓣 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?대（?댁쭊 ?ｅ춼???볟쐦沃욅죴令띕? ?밧닩?꾩쑝濡?茹?쮱?섏뿬 ?뤻죱容욎쓣 諛쒓껄?섍퀬 洹멸쾬??諛붾줈 ?≪븘???쒕떎. ?룹㎏, 鸚㎩?怨?鸚㎩???걥葉뗭쓽 ?볟쐦沃욃?玉쏁쑴?붺빒?낅뒗 ?섋눎?띈첑濡쒖꽌???볟쐦沃왿?蘊뉑뼑瑜?留롮씠 域사뵪?섏뿬 耶며뵟?ㅼ씠 鼇沃욃늽?먫꺗?쏆쓣 媛吏寃??섍퀬 ?ょ꽫沃욌줈?쒖쓽 ?볟쐦沃욅죴令띕? ?섎룄濡??뉐컣?댁빞 ?쒕떎.This paper proposed four tasks as a way of developing Korean linguistics. Firstly, to be a good Korean linguist, he/she should remember as much information as possible, including general linguistic theories, existing linguistic studies on Korean language, and linguistic data about synchronic and diachronic Korean language. And the information should be considered all together when they read other studies or examine linguistic materials. Secondly, the object of Korean linguistics should be not ?쁲tandard Korean' but ?쁊orean as a natural language of Korea'. Thirdly, existing studies of Korean linguistics, which have made in the frame of several different linguistic theories, should be reviewed critically and we should correct them if any problem is found. Fourthly, lecturers of Korean linguistics in university should train their students to have language analyse ability and guide them to study Korean linguistics through Korean language as natural language.轢℡춻 ?쎄린 沃ㅸК 筌먨엹 ?곌뎄
