?먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ뿉??湲곌퀎?숈뒿???꾪븳 ?숈뒿 留먮춬移섎뒗 留ㅼ슦 以묒슂?섎떎. ?뺤젣????됱쓽 留먮춬移섎뒗 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由??쒖뒪?쒖뿉 吏곸젒 ?곹뼢??以?? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌????됱쓽 留먮춬移??ㅻ쪟瑜??먮룞?쇰줈 ?섏젙?섎뒗 ?덈줈??諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ㅻ쪟 留먮춬移섏? ?뺣떟 留먮춬移섏뿉???щ엺???쒓퉭??臾몄꽌???뱀꽦??諛섏쁺???섏젙 洹쒖튃???먮룞?쇰줈 ?앹꽦?섏??? ?섏젙 洹쒖튃? RDR(Ripple-Down Rules)瑜??ъ슜?섏뿬 ?쒗쁽?섏??? ?섏젙 諛⑸쾿??媛移섎? 蹂댁씠湲??꾪빐 ?덉궗 遺李?留먮춬移섏? 媛쒖껜紐?遺李?留먮춬移섏뿉 ??댁꽌 ?ㅽ뿕?섏??쇰ŉ ??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?좎쓽誘명븳 寃곌낵瑜?蹂댁??? ??諛⑸쾿? ??됱쓽 留먮춬移섎? ?쒖옉?????ㅻ쪟瑜?理쒖냼?뷀븯??諛⑸쾿?쇰줈 ?ъ슜??媛?ν븯??Annotated Corpus is important to understand natural language using machine learning method. In this paper, we propose a new method to automate error reduction of annotated corpora. We use the Ripple-Down Rules(RDR) for reducing errors and Kernel to extend RDR for NLP. We applied our system to the Korean Wikipedia and blog corpus errors to find the annotated corpora error type. Experimental results with various views from the Korean Wikipedia and blog are reported to evaluate the effectiveness and efficiency of our proposed approach. The proposed approach can be used to reduce errors of large corpora.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?쒖븞諛⑸쾿 3. ?ㅽ뿕 諛??좎쓽?섎몼 湲곕컲 ?洹쒕え ?묒뾽 諛곗튂 諛?泥섎━ 湲곗닠 ?ㅺ퀎

湲곗〈 ?쒓뎅???먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠?먯꽌 ?앸왂, ??⑹쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈 ???댄솕 泥섎━ 湲곗닠? 洹??ㅼ슜??臾몄젣濡??명빐 ?꾨찓?몄??앹뿉 ?곷떦???섏〈?곸씤 硫댁쓣 蹂댁씠怨??덈떎. ?대줈 ?명빐 媛??묒슜 ?꾨찓?몃쭏??媛곴린 ?ㅻⅨ ?댄솕 遺꾩꽍湲곕? ?꾩슂濡??섍쾶 ?섏뼱 ?곷떦??鍮꾪슚?⑥꽦??珥덈옒??肉먮뜑???댄솕 遺꾩꽍 湲곗닠 ?먯껜???쇰컲?깆쓣 ?뺣낫?섎뒗???덉뼱?쒕룄 ?쒓퀎媛 ?덉뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???ㅼ젣 ?쒓뎅??援?냼 ?댄솕 遺꾩꽍湲곕? 媛쒕컻?⑥뿉 ?덉뼱 ?곸뿭 ?낅┰?곸씤 ?낆옣??痍⑦뻽?쇰ŉ, ?щ윭 ?묒슜 ?꾨찓?몄뿉?쒕룄 ?쎄쾶 ?댁슜?????덈뒗 ?곹뼢??bottom-up) ?쒓뎅??援?냼 ?댄솕 遺꾩꽍湲곕? 媛쒕컻?섍퀬???쒕떎. 癒쇱? ?대윭???쒓뎅??援?냼 ?댄솕 遺꾩꽍湲곕? 媛쒕컻?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?쒓뎅???댄솕 ?꾩긽???뱀쭠??怨좎같??蹂닿퀬, ?ㅼ젣 ?쒓뎅?댁뿉?쒖쓽 ?앸왂怨?????꾩긽 泥섎━?????援ъ껜?곸씤 諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?쒖떆?쒕떎. ?먰븳 蹂??쒓뎅??援?냼 ?댄솕 遺꾩꽍湲곕? ?먯뿰???뺣낫 寃???쒖뒪?쒖뿉???묒슜??蹂??ㅼ젣 ?덈? ?뚭컻?섍퀬 蹂??댄솕 遺꾩꽍湲곗쓽 ?깅뒫???뺣웾?곸쑝濡?寃利앺빐 蹂닿린 ?꾪빐 3媛쒖쓽 ?묒슜 ?꾨찓?몄쓽 肄뷀띁?ㅻ? ??곸쑝濡????ㅽ뿕寃곌낵瑜??뚭컻?쒕떎.Previous discourse analysis techniques for ellipsis and anaphora resolution heavily utilized domain-dependent knowledge due to their practical usabilities. Therefore, each domain needs different discourse analyzer, which is not only inefficient but also limits the development of general discourse analysis techniques. In this paper, we propose a domain-independent bottom-up technique to develope a Korean local discourse analyzer which can be useful in various application domains. We examine some of the characteristics of Korean discourse phenomena and develope a bottom-up methodology to resolve ellipses and anaphora in Korean discourse. We also apply our Korean local discourse analyzer to a natural language information retrieval application and present some experiment results to verify the performance using the corpus of three practical application domains.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 湲곗〈???곌뎄 3. ?쒓뎅???댄솕?꾩긽??泥섎━?먯쭊?곸쑝濡?異뺤쟻??吏?앹쓣 ?ъ슜??寃???⑥쑉???μ긽

?뚯뀥 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕 ?쒕퉬???댄븯 SNS)???뚯궗??留덉???梨꾨꼸濡??곴레 ?쒖슜?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? ?뚯궗?ㅼ쓽 怨좉컼痢듭뿉 ?곹빀???댁슜怨??댁“瑜??쒖슜?섏뿬 二쇨린?곸쑝濡?SNS 硫붿떆吏瑜??묒꽦?섎뒗 ???쒕컻??留덉??낆쓣 ?쇱튂怨??덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???댁젣源뚯? 媛꾧낵?섏뿀??SNS 硫붿떆吏???댄룷???щ━??嫄곕━??珥덉젏??留욎떠 ?꾪넻?곸씤 肄붾뜑瑜??쒖슜???댁슜 遺꾩꽍(content analysis)怨??먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕쾿 諛?癒몄떊 ?щ떇 諛⑸쾿???쇳빀?섏뿬 ?щ━??嫄곕━瑜?痢≪젙?섎뒗 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿???곌뎄?섏??? SNS 硫붿떆吏???щ━??嫄곕━ 遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 肄붾뜑?ㅼ쓣 ?쒖슜?섏뿬 ?댁슜遺꾩꽍???섑뻾?섏??쇰ŉ, ?댁? 媛숈? 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈 ?덉씠釉붾쭅???곗씠?곕? ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 諛⑸쾿???댁슜?섏뿬 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?섑뻾?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 癒몄떊 ?щ떇 ?섑뻾???꾪븳 ?낅젰 ?곗씠?곕? 留덈젴?섏??? 癒몄떊 ?щ떇 遺꾩꽍踰?以?Support Vector Machine(SVM)???댁슜?섏뿬 SNS 硫붿떆吏? ?щ━??嫄곕━ 媛꾩쓽 愿怨꾨? ?숈뒿?쒖섟?쇰ŉ, 留덉?留됱쑝濡??뚯뒪???곗씠?곕? ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?щ━??嫄곕━瑜??덉륫?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 癒몄떊 ?щ떇 遺꾩꽍???깃낵瑜?寃利앺븯??? ?щ━??嫄곕━ 痢≪젙 諛⑸쾿濡??섑뻾 寃곌낵, 肄붾뜑?ㅼ쓽 ?댁슜遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵媛 ?뱀젙 媛믪쑝濡??명뼢?섏뼱 SVM ?덉륫??誘쇨컧?꾩? ?뺣??꾧? ??? 寃곌낵媛 ?꾩텧?섏뿀?? ?щ━??嫄곕━ ?묐떟 鍮꾩쑉??蹂댁젙?섍퀬 肄붾뜑?ㅼ쓽 1李??댁슜遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵 以??듬????쇱튂???곗씠?곕줈 ?쒖젙吏??癒몄떊 ?щ떇???ㅽ뻾??寃곌낵 ?щ━??嫄곕━ ?덉륫???뺥솗?? 誘쇨컧?? ?뱀씠?? ?뺣???紐⑤몢 ?μ긽?섏뼱 ?щ━??嫄곕━媛 70% ?댁긽 ?덉륫?섎뒗 ?깃낵瑜?蹂댁??? 蹂??곌뎄??SNS 硫붿떆吏???щ━??嫄곕━瑜?痢≪젙?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?낆옄????щ━??嫄곕━瑜??쒖뼱 媛?ν븳 ?꾨왂 ?붿냼濡??쒖슜 媛?ν븯寃???寃껋씠??湲곕??쒕떎.The social network service (SNS) is one of the important marketing channels, so many companies actively exploit SNSs by posting SNS messages with appropriate content and style for their customers. In this paper, we focused on the psychological distances embedded in the SNS messages and developed a method to measure the psychological distance in SNS message by mixing a traditional content analysis, natural language processing (NLP), and machine learning. Through a traditional content analysis by human coding, the psychological distance was extracted from the SNS message, and these coding results were used for input data for NLP and machine learning. With NLP, word embedding was executed and Bag of Word was created. The Support Vector Machine, one of machine learning techniques was performed to train and test the psychological distance in SNS message. As a result, sensitivity and precision of SVM prediction were significantly low because of the extreme skewness of dataset. We improved the performance of SVM by balancing the ratio of data by upsampling technique and using data coded with the same value in first content analysis. All performance index was more than 70%, which showed that psychological distance can be measured well.?붿빟 ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿???곌뎄 2.1 SNS 硫붿떆吏???먯뿰??泥섎━ 2.2 ?щ━??嫄곕━?대윭??留뚯”??利앹쭊???꾪븳 ?먯깋???곌뎄 : ?띿뒪??留덉씠?앷낵 ?명꽣酉??쇳빀諛⑸쾿濡?
?쒓뎅寃쎌쁺?뺣낫?숉쉶, ?댁닚洹? [2019] [KCI?깆옱]

Funciton Point is a software sizing method and widely used as a basis to estimate software development cost. Requirements elicitation and analysis should be performed before function point analysis but function point analysis method doesn?셳 deal with requirements elicitation and analysis. For that reason, Function point extraction method from existing requirements method is needed and if the requirements method has advantage for traceability and elicitation, it is suitable for managing cost. Goal and scenario method is widely used as requirements elicitation and analysis. It has also good traceability. Therefore, this paper discusses a method for extracting function point from requirements text gathered using the goal and scenario based requirements elicitation technique. The proposed method aims to establish and maintain traceability between function point and requirements text. Text based function point extraction guidance rules have been developed. The proposed methodology has been applied to Order Processing System development.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. 紐⑺몴 諛??쒕굹由ъ삤 湲곕컲 ?붽뎄?ы빆?쇰줈遺?곗쓽 湲곕뒫?먯닔 ?꾩텧 諛⑸쾿?⑦넧濡쒖? ?앹꽦怨?怨듭쑀瑜??꾪븳 ?쒕㎤????湲곕컲 ?꾪궎 ?쒖뒪??

蹂??쇰Ц? ?먯뿰??臾몄옣???좎궗?깆쓣 遺꾩꽍?????덈뒗 臾몄옣 ?꾨쿋???먯쭏???먮룞 異붿텧 諛⑸쾿??愿??湲곗닠?쒕떎. 吏덈Ц ?좎궗??遺꾩꽍?대? 吏덉쓽 臾몄옣???댄빐?섍린 ?꾪븯???먯뿰??吏덉쓽 臾몄옣???섎???援ъ“???좎궗?깆쓣 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 ?곌뎄瑜?留먰븯硫? ?대? ?댁슜?섏뿬 吏덉쓽?묐떟 (Q&A) 諛?????쒖뒪?쒖뿉???낅젰 吏덈Ц??????듬???李얜뒗???쒖슜?????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 湲곗닠?섎뒗 臾몄옣???좎궗?깆쓣 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿? ?λ윭??紐⑤뜽???듯빐 異붿텧??臾몄옣 ?꾨쿋??踰≫꽣瑜??먯쭏濡??댁슜?쒕떎. ?뚯젅怨??ㅼ쭏 ?뺥깭?뚯? 媛숈? 臾몄옣 ???쒗쁽???쒖감???뺣낫瑜?諛섏쁺?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?쒗솚 ?좉꼍留?Recurrent Neural Network)???댁슜?섏뿬 ?앹꽦??臾몄옣 踰≫꽣? ?댁닚怨?愿怨꾩뾾???좎궗???쒗쁽???깆옣 ?⑦꽩???뱀쭠?쇰줈 ?↔린 ?꾪븳 蹂듭옟 ?좉꼍留?(CNN)???댁슜?섏뿬 ?앹꽦??臾몄옣 踰≫꽣瑜??ъ슜?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??????쒕퉬?ㅼ? 愿?⑤맂 ???臾몄옣?먯꽌 ?먮룞 異붿텧??臾몄옣 ?꾨쿋???먯쭏???댁슜?섏뿬 臾몄옣 媛??좎궗??遺꾩꽍?덉쓣 ?뚯쓽 ?뺥솗?깃낵 ?덉쭏???됯??쒕떎.This paper describes a method for the automatic extraction of feature vectors that can be used to analyze the similarity among natural language sentences. Similarity analysis among sentences is a necessary aspect of measuring semantic or structural similarity in natural language understanding. The analysis results can be used to find answers in Question and Answer (Q&A) systems and dialogue systems. The similarity analysis uses sentence vectors extracted by two deep learning models: the Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) to reflect sequential information of expressions such as syllables and semantic morphemes, and the Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for characterizing the appearance patterns of similar expressions such as words or phrases. In this paper, we examine the accuracy and quality of the method using sentence vectors that are automatically extracted by the models from dialogues related to banking service. This method can find more similar questions and answers in FAQs than existing methods. The automatic feature extraction method can be used to analyze the similarity of Korean sentences across various application domains and systems.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?좏뻾 ?곌뎄 諛??곌뎄 ?숆린 3. 吏덈Ц ?좎궗??遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 臾몄옣 ?꾨쿋?⑹떖痢??좉꼍留앹쓽 ?곸긽 ?몄떇 遺꾨쪟 ?깅뒫 洹좎씪???μ긽???꾪븳 紐낆떆???곹샇蹂댁셿 ?숈긽釉?援ъ“

?쇱긽???먯뿰?대줈 ?멸컙怨??뚰넻?섎뒗 湲곌퀎媛 ?곕━ 二쇰???梨꾩슦怨??덈떎. ?대뒗 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???몄뼱瑜??댄빐?섎뒗 寃껋쿂??蹂댁씠寃?留뚮뱺?? 臾쇰줎 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???몄뼱瑜??ㅼ젣濡??댄빐?섎뒗 寃껋? ?꾨땲?? 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???몄뼱瑜??댄빐?섎뒗 寃껋쿂??蹂댁씠??源뚮떗? 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???먯뿰?닿? 媛뽮퀬 ?덈뒗 援ъ“? ?댄쐶?ㅼ쓣 ?숈뒿?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?섎?濡좎쟻 援ъ“瑜?紐⑤갑?????덇쾶 ?섏뿀湲??뚮Ц?대떎. ?뺣낫怨듯븰?먯꽌??湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙怨??섏궗?뚰넻?????덈룄濡??뺣낫瑜?援ъ“?뷀븯???묒뾽???섏삩?⑤줈吏(ontology)?숇씪怨?遺瑜몃떎. 理쒓렐 ?뺣낫怨듯븰 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?⑦넧濡쒖????꾩꽕???뺤떇??議댁옱濡좉낵 ?곸뿭 議댁옱濡좎쓽 ?꾨줈?앺듃? 援ъ“?곸쑝濡???⑦엳 ?좎궗?섎떎. ?대뒗 ?뺣낫怨듯븰怨??꾩꽕 ?꾩긽?숈씠 ?쒕줈 ?묒뾽?????덈뒗 ?묒젏???덉쓬???삵븳?? ???쇰Ц? 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???먯뿰?대? ?댄빐?섎뒗 寃껋쿂??蹂댁씠???쇱씠 ?대뼸寃?媛?ν븳吏瑜??댄렣蹂닿퀬 ?꾩긽?숆낵 ?뺣낫怨듯븰???묒뾽?????덈뒗 ?묒젏???쒖궗?섍퀬???쒕떎.It seems not to be strange that we communicate with the machine with ordinary natural language. Could the machine really understand the human natural language? Of course not! It seems, however, to be so. The reason is the machine can simulate the natural language by the machine learning about the semantic structure and words of the natural language. In information science, the ?쐎ntology??means that the structuring of data and informations for the communication between the machine and the human being. This ontology, I believe, is a realization of Husserl?셲 ontological project. In this paper, I tried to show how the machine could seems to be to understand the natural language and that we could find a clue for interdisciplinary studies of information sciences and Husserl?셲 phenomenology.?먯슂?쎈Ц??1. ?앷컖?섎뒗 寃껋쿂??蹂댁씠??湲곌퀎? ?멸컙 洹쒖젙???덈줈??援?㈃ 2. ?뺣낫怨듯븰???⑦넧濡쒖??ㅺ낵 ?꾩꽕??議댁옱濡좎쟻 湲고쉷 3. ?꾩꽕???뺤떇??議댁옱濡좉낵 ?쇱씠?몄썾?댄듃 ?⑦넧濡쒖?(lightweight ontology) 4. ?ㅻ쭏?명븳 湲곌퀎? ?앺솢?멸퀎???섎?濡좎쟻 泥댄뿕誘쇱＜二쇱쓽? ??

?대뒗 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???몄뼱瑜??댄빐?섎뒗 寃껋쿂??蹂댁씠寃?留뚮뱺?? 臾쇰줎 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???몄뼱瑜??ㅼ젣濡??댄빐?섎뒗 寃껋? ?꾨땲?? 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???몄뼱瑜??댄빐?섎뒗 寃껋쿂??蹂댁씠??源뚮떗? 湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???먯뿰?닿? 媛뽮퀬 ?덈뒗 援ъ“? ?댄쐶?ㅼ쓣 ?숈뒿?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?섎?濡좎쟻 援ъ“瑜?紐⑤갑?????덇쾶 ?섏뿀湲??뚮Ц?대떎. ?뺣낫怨듯븰?먯꽌??湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙怨??섏궗?뚰넻?????덈룄濡??뺣낫瑜?援ъ“?뷀븯???묒뾽???섏삩?⑤줈吏(ontology)?숇씪怨?遺瑜몃떎. 理쒓렐 ?뺣낫怨듯븰 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?⑦넧濡쒖????꾩꽕???뺤떇??議댁옱濡좉낵 ?곸뿭 議댁옱濡좎쓽 ?꾨줈?앺듃? 援ъ“?곸쑝濡???⑦엳 ?좎궗?섎떎. ?대뒗 ?뺣낫怨듯븰怨??꾩꽕 ?꾩긽?숈씠 ?쒕줈 ?묒뾽?????덈뒗 ?묒젏???덉쓬???삵븳?? ???쇰Ц?湲곌퀎媛 ?멸컙???먯뿰?대? ?댄빐?섎뒗 寃껋쿂??蹂댁씠???쇱씠 ?대뼸寃?媛?ν븳吏瑜??댄렣蹂닿퀬 ?꾩긽?숆낵 ?뺣낫怨듯븰???묒뾽?????덈뒗 ?묒젏???쒖궗?섍퀬???쒕떎.It seems not to be strange that we communicate with the machine with ordinary natural language. Could the machine really understand the human natural language? Of course not! It seems, however, to be so. The reason is the machine can simulate the natural language by the machine learning about the semantic structure and words of the natural language. In information science, the "ontology" means that the structuring of data and informations for the communication between the machine and the human being. This ontology, I believe, is a realization of Husserl?셲 ontological project. In this paper, I tried to show how the machine could seems to be to understand the natural language and that we could find a clue for interdisciplinary studies of information sciences and Husserl?셲 phenomenology.誘쇱＜二쇱쓽? ?? 誘몄끂 ?숇━??誘쇱＜二쇱쓽 鍮꾪뙋

吏덉쓽?묐떟?쒖뒪?쒖뿉???ъ슜??吏덉쓽濡??낅젰???먯뿰?대Ц?μ쓣 ?꾨꼍?섍쾶 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 寃껋? ?ъ슫 ?쇱씠 ?꾨땲硫? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 吏덉쓽 ?섎룄??遺덈챸?뺤꽦?쇰줈 ?ㅼ썙???щ윭 媛쒖쓽 吏덉쓽臾몄씠 議댁옱?????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??吏덉쓽瑜??섍린 ?꾩뿉 ?ъ슜?먭? ?덇쾶 ?섎뒗 ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽臾몄쓽 ?묒꽦 遺?닿컧??以꾩씠怨? ?ㅼ썙?쒕쭔?쇰줈 ?먯떊???먰븯??吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?좏깮?????덈뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?쒖븞 ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?됱꽌臾몄뿉???먮룞?쇰줈 吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?앹꽦?쒕떎. 吏덉쓽臾??앹꽦? ?λЦ?뺤쭏?섎Ц?앹꽦怨??⑤Ц?뺤쭏?섎Ц?앹꽦?쇰줈 援щ텇?섎ŉ, ?λЦ?뺤쭏?섎Ц? 臾몄옣???꾩껜?뺥깭瑜??좎??섎㈃???뱀젙怨좎쑀紐낆궗瑜?吏덉쓽?섎뒗 寃껋씠怨? ?⑤Ц?뺤쭏?섎Ц? 二쇱뼱吏?怨좎쑀紐낆궗瑜?吏덉쓽?섎뒗 理쒖냼?쒖쓽 ?붿냼瑜?媛뽰텣 ?⑥닚 ?뺥깭??吏덉쓽 臾몄옣?대떎. ?먰븳 ?쒖븞 ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?앹꽦??吏덉쓽臾몄씠 ?좏븳 ?대떟???꾩텧?????덈뒗 ?섎??덈뒗 吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?좊퀎?섎뒗 怨쇱젙???ы븿?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞??諛⑹떇???ъ슜?먯뿉寃??섎??덈뒗 吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?쒖떆?섏뿬二쇨퀬 ?ъ슜?먭? ?먰븯??吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?좏깮?섍쾶 ?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 寃?됱쓽 ?쒓컙?⑥텞怨??먯뿰?대Ц??吏덉쓽???먯껜?????怨좊????댁냼?쒗궗 ???덈떎. ?먰븳 ?대뒗 ?먯뿰??臾몄옣泥섎━???쒓퀎瑜?洹밸났?????덈뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ы쁽?????덈뒗 湲곕컲??留덈젴??寃껋씠???붿빟 1. ?쒕줎 2. 臾몄젣?뺤쓽 3. 吏덉쓽?묐떟?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?꾪븳 吏덉쓽臾??먮룞?앹꽦湲곕쾿 4. ?꾨줈?좏????쒖뒪??援ы쁽?좊Т??留앹뿉?쒖쓽 TCP Westwood ???깅뒫 ?μ긽 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?댁옱??Lee Jaehyung), [2008]
?대룞?몃뱶???띾룄瑜?怨좊젮???좏깮??MAP ?깅줉 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?댁슦??Wooyeob Lee), [2008]
?쇱꽌 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕?먯꽌 ?④낵?곸씤 ?곗씠??蹂닿툒???꾪븳 怨꾩링???쇱슦???꾨줈?좎퐳
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 議곗??(Jieun Cho), [2008]

To innovate, through information technology, the ?쐇mplementation of law??such as its codification, application, and delivery to the public, we can in the first place endeavor to develop the application of natural language processing to law. A lot of difficulties should be overcome, however, for a machine to attain a technical level high enough to render an intelligent and credible judicial judgment based on the information retrieved from traditional legal documents. We thus need to advance the transformation of the legal system to a symbolic logic system, which can be called ?쐌achine-readable law??or ?쐁omputational law,??by enhancing its logicality and consistency. The automated application of law, which may not fully replace a human decision unless we, based on extreme legal formalism, deny
the indeterminacy of legal terms and judicial discretion, could instead enhance lawyers??concentration on the creation of law at borderline cases. The civil law system?셲 tradition of legal conceptualism, which stresses the self-contained and autonomous nature of law, tends to bring a heightened chance of success of this innovation, but such merit is
undermined by outdated dogmas that rather impede innovation. The academia?셲 existing effort to surmount the dogmas can be a starting point for this innovation. Once this preparatory work is done, valuable data can be automatically accumulated so as to efficiently train various statistic models, giving a quantum leap in the application of
artificial intelligence to law. While the application of artificial intelligence is also constrained by ethical issues, it is expected to enhance the consistency and fairness of the judicial proceeding at least in the capacity of an amicus. The steps to realize this innovation can include the systematization of the application of laws, standard contracts, fact-finding, and the assessment of proofs.?뺣낫湲곗닠???듯빐 踰뺤쓽 異뺤“?낆쟻?⒱땯蹂닿툒 ??踰뺤쓽 湲곗닠??援ы쁽怨쇱젙???곸떊?섍린 ?꾪빐?? ?멸났吏??以??뱁엳 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?湲곗닠??踰뺤뿉 ????묒슜??怨좊룄?뷀븯??諛⑹븞??怨좊젮?????덉쑝?? ?멸컙 ?꾨Ц媛??吏?깆뿉 以?섎뒗 ?섏??쇰줈 ?꾪넻??踰뺣쪧臾몄꽌濡쒕????뺣낫

Early ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁??湲곗큹??蹂?뺣맂 李⑦듃 ?뚯떛 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???ъ슜?섏??쇰ŉ Prolog瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 援ы쁽?섏뿀??In order to process natural language, "syntactic analysis" plays the most important role since it is able to be applied to various fields such as natural language query systems, natural language interface systems, text summary systems, and machine translation systems. It is also important to analysis a sentence containing ambiguity. In this paper, we analyze the causes and kinds of ambiguity in Korean language processing and an algorithm to reduce the processing time in case of ambiguity occurs.?쇱꽌 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕 湲곕컲???섏빟??肄쒕뱶泥댁씤 臾쇰쪟?덈툕 ?쒖뒪??

留욎땄???뺣낫 遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠? ?뺥삎???섏뼱 ?덉? ?딆? ?먯뿰???띿뒪?몄뿉???좎슜???뺣낫瑜?異붿텧?섍퀬 怨좉컼???붽뎄?섎뒗 留욎땄???뺣낫濡?媛怨듯븯?? 誘몃옒瑜??덉륫?섍굅??異붾줎?섎뒗???꾩???二쇰뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 留먰븳?? ?대윭???뺣낫 遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ы쁽?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?먯뿰?대? 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠怨??띿뒪?몄뿉???꾩슂??媛쒖껜? 洹멸쾬?ㅼ쓽 愿怨꾨? 李얠븘?대뒗 ?뺣낫 異붿텧 湲곗닠, 異붿텧???곗씠?곕줈遺???뚮젮吏吏 ?딆? ?덈줈???뺣낫瑜?李얠븘?대뒗 ?곗씠??留덉씠??湲곗닠???꾩슂?섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??援?갑 湲곗궗 ?곗씠?곕? ??곸쑝濡?留욎땄???뺣낫 遺꾩꽍???섑뻾?섎뒗 媛?곸쓽 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?섍퀬, ?뺣낫 遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 湲곕컲 湲곗닠?ㅼ쓣 ?뚭컻?쒕떎.Customized information analysis system is a software system that can help to extract useful information from non-structured natural language data, process the information to customized form, and provide future forecast and reasoning information. To implement the information analysis system, we need natural language processing technology to analyze natural language, information extraction technology to detect necessary entity and its relationship from text, and data mining technology to discover new and unknown information from extracting data. This paper suggest virtual customized information analysis system processing national defense news data and introduce base technologies for information analysis.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 留욎땄???뺣낫 遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪???? ?ㅼ젣 ?곗씠??泥섎━ ?덉젣怨듬え?꾩쓣 ?듯븳 吏묐떒吏??湲곕컲???묒뾽???붿????ㅽ넗由ы뀛留?

?쒓뎅肄섑뀗痢좏븰?? 源?ъ쁺(Hee-Young Kim), [2010] [KCI?깆옱]

This paper suggests the logic and rule processing approaches for BIM-enabled automated design assessment. The approaches aim to achieve automated design quality checking by converting natural language (human-readable) into logical units (computer-readable). The automated design assessment-related regulations are usually defined in design guidelines, RFPs, etc, however, the regulations are written in human-readable languages, and sometimes their implicit definitions hinder translating into the explicitly defined computer-readable forms. Therefore, this paper focuses on the development of a translation process of converting Korea Building Act sentences into specific computer-readable forms with logic rule-based mechanism including 1) object/property database, 2) method database, 3) converting mechanism of natural language to computer-readable form.蹂??쇰Ц? BIM湲곕컲 ?ㅺ퀎?덉쭏 ?먮룞寃?좊? ?꾪빐 嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 臾몄옣???쇰━洹쒖튃 泥닿퀎?붾? ?듯븳 而댄벂???ㅽ뻾 媛?ν븳 (Computer-readable) ?뺥깭濡쒖쓽 蹂?섏뿉 ????묎렐 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 嫄대Ъ 紐⑤뜽???ㅺ퀎?덉쭏??寃?좏븯湲??꾪븳 洹쒖젙? 二쇰줈 ?щ엺???묒꽦???ㅺ퀎吏移? ?붿옄??媛?대뱶, ??湲곗? 諛?洹쒖튃 ???먯뿰???뺥깭濡?紐낆떆 ?섏뼱 ?덈떎. ?대줈 ?명빐 媛?洹쒖젙???쒖떆???댁슜 ?댁꽍??遺덈챸?뺥븿怨?湲곗???紐⑦샇???뺤쓽 ?깆뿉 ?섑빐 ?ㅺ퀎?덉쭏 寃?좎쓽 臾닿껐?먯쓣 ?뺣낫?섏? 紐삵븯??寃쎌슦媛 ?덈떎. ?뱁엳 援?궡 嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋??寃쎌슦 ?ы???踰뺤젣?좏삎??鍮꾪빐 ?곷떦??蹂듭옟???낅쾿泥닿퀎濡? 湲곗?媛꾩쓽 ?댁슜???곸씠?섎ŉ ?곌퀎?깆씠 遺議깊븯怨?媛쒕퀎 踰뺣졊???쒌냽媛쒖젙 ?먮뒗 ?먯?媛 鍮덈쾲?섍퀬 誘몃컲???섎뒗 ?깆쓽 臾몄젣?먯씠 ?쒖떆?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 嫄댁텞 ?명뿀媛瑜??꾪븳 嫄대Ъ 紐⑤뜽???ㅺ퀎?덉쭏 寃???쒗뻾???ㅻ쪟瑜?以꾩씠怨? ?뚯슂 ?쒓컙???⑥텞???꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰???뺥깭??嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 臾몄옣???ㅽ뻾 媛?ν븳 猷곗뀑 ?뚯씪濡?蹂?섑븯湲??꾪빐 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪瑜??쒖슜???쇰━洹쒖튃 泥닿퀎 ?꾨줈?몄뒪瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???명뿀媛 愿??嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋瑜???곸쑝濡??덉쭏寃?????媛앹껜 諛??대떦 ?띿꽦 泥닿퀎 湲곕컲???곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪, ?쇰━洹쒖튃???⑥닔 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪, 洹몃━怨?嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 臾몄옣???⑥씪 援щЦ ?꾨줈?몄떛 ?깆쓽 ?쇰━洹쒖튃 泥닿퀎?붾? ?뺣┰?섏뿬 ??湲곕컲??醫낇빀?곸씤 ?쇰━洹쒖튃 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섎뒗 怨쇱젙???ㅻ，?? ?먰븳 猷곗뀑 ?뚯씪濡??앹꽦?섍린 ?꾪븳 KBimLogic ?꾨줈洹몃옩???명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ? 援ы쁽?섏뿬 ??踰꾩쟾怨??낅┰ ?댄뵆由ъ??댁뀡 ?뺥깭濡??쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쇰━洹쒖튃 泥닿퀎???곕씪 媛??명꽣?섏씠???곸뿉???먯뿰???뺥깭??嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 臾몄옣???ㅽ뻾 媛?ν븳 肄붾뱶濡?蹂?섑븯??怨쇱젙??嫄곗튂寃??쒕떎. 蹂??곌뎄??寃곌낵臾쇰줈 ?섑??섎뒗 KBimCode???쇰━洹쒖튃泥닿퀎???섑빐 蹂?섎맂 嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 臾몄옣??肄붾뱶?대ŉ, ?대뒗 猷곗뀑 ?뚯씪濡???λ릺???ㅺ퀎?덉쭏 ?먮룞寃???꾨줈洹몃옩?먯꽌 ?ㅽ뻾?????덈떎.愿묎탳?좊룄???됱콈媛?대뱶?쇱씤???곕Ⅸ ?꾪뙆???몃꼍?됱쓽 ?됱콈 ?대?吏 遺꾩꽍

?쒓뎅?붿옄?몄??앺븰?? ?꾩??? [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

This paper proposed four tasks as a way of developing Korean linguistics. Firstly, to be a good Korean linguist, he/she should remember as much information as possible, including general linguistic theories, existing linguistic studies on Korean language, and linguistic data about synchronic and diachronic Korean language. And the information should be considered all together when they read other studies or examine linguistic materials. Secondly, the object of Korean linguistics should be not ?쁲tandard Korean' but ?쁊orean as a natural language of Korea'. Thirdly, existing studies of Korean linguistics, which have made in the frame of several different linguistic theories, should be reviewed critically and we should correct them if any problem is found. Fourthly, lecturers of Korean linguistics in university should train their students to have language analyse ability and guide them to study Korean linguistics through Korean language as natural language.嶺녻낅뒗 ??湲?먯꽌 ?볟쐦沃욃???諛쒖쟾???꾪븳 4媛吏 沃꿴죱瑜??먪ㅊ?덈떎. 泥レ㎏, 醫뗭? 簾뤹㈅?낃? ?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗, 訝?ц?沃욃? 筌ㅸ쳳, ?얌빰? ?얌빰 餓ε뎺???볟쐦沃욎뿉 ????ｅ춼??簾뤹㈅ ?끻젿? 蘊뉑뼑 ?끻젿瑜?媛?ν븳 ??留롮씠 湲곗뼲?댁빞 ?섎ŉ ?볟쐦沃욎뿉 ????ｅ춼 簾뤹㈅瑜??쎄굅???볟쐦沃?蘊뉑뼑瑜?茹?쮱???뚯뿉, 洹몃윭???끻젿瑜??뚧셽???⑴뵪?????덉뼱???쒕떎. ?섏㎏, ?볟쐦沃욃???簾뤹㈅弱띹괌???섌윋?뗨첑?숇뒗 ?섉쮽繹??볟쐦沃왿숆? ?꾨땲???섋눎?띈첑濡쒖꽌???볟쐦沃왿숆? 訝산? ?섏뼱???쒕떎. ?뗭㎏, ?쒕줈 ?ㅻⅨ 鼇沃?筌ㅸ쳳??諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?대（?댁쭊 ?ｅ춼???볟쐦沃?簾뤹㈅瑜??밧닩?꾩쑝濡?茹?쮱?섏뿬 ?뤻죱容욎쓣 諛쒓껄?섍퀬 洹멸쾬??諛붾줈 ?≪븘???쒕떎. ?룹㎏, 鸚㎩?怨?鸚㎩????롧쮮???볟쐦沃욃? 玉쏁쑴 ?붺빒?낅뒗 ?섋눎?띈첑濡쒖꽌???볟쐦沃왿?蘊뉑뼑瑜?留롮씠 域사뵪?섏뿬 耶며뵟?ㅼ씠 鼇沃??녷옄 ?썲뒟??媛吏寃??섍퀬 ?ょ꽫沃욌줈?쒖쓽 ?볟쐦沃?簾뤹㈅瑜??섎룄濡??뉐컣?댁빞 ?쒕떎.轢℡춻 ?쎄린 沃ㅸК 筌먨엹 ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅?대Ц援먯쑁?곌뎄?? ?뺤꽦誘? [2010] [KCI?깆옱]
?쇨뎅?좎궗 ?뚯옱 <?뺝?閭???遙섌틭???댄쐶 ?붿냼? 洹?鹽뷴봿???쒗븯??
?쒓뎅?대Ц援먯쑁?곌뎄?? 諛뺤옱誘? [2010] [KCI?깆옱]
?뺠찠 ?섎뱾???섎떎?숈쓽 ?뤷뫑?????沃띸윥鼇沃욃????껃캗
?쒓뎅?대Ц援먯쑁?곌뎄?? ?띾떖?? [2010] [KCI?깆옱]

Recently, emerging the notion of big data and social media has led us to enter data?셲 big bang. Social networking services are widely used by people around the world, and they have become a part of major communication tools for all ages. Over the last decade, as online social networking sites become increasingly popular, companies tend to focus on advanced social media analysis for their marketing strategies. In addition to social media analysis, companies are mainly concerned about propagating of negative opinions on social networking sites such as Facebook and Twitter, as well as e-commerce sites. The effect of online word of mouth (WOM) such as product rating, product review, and product recommendations is very influential, and negative opinions have significant impact on product sales. This trend has increased researchers??attention to a natural language processing, such as a sentiment analysis. A sentiment analysis, also refers to as an opinion mining, is a process of identifying the polarity of subjective information and has been applied to various research and practical fields. However, there are obstacles lies when Korean language (Hangul) is used in a natural language processing because it is an agglutinative language with rich morphology pose problems. Therefore, there is a lack of Korean natural language processing resources such as a sentiment lexicon, and this has resulted in significant limitations for researchers and practitioners who are considering sentiment analysis. Our study builds a Korean sentiment lexicon with collective intelligence, and provides API (Application Programming Interface) service to open and share a sentiment lexicon data with the public (www.openhangul.com). For the pre-processing, we have created a Korean lexicon database with over 517,178 words and classified them into sentiment and non-sentiment words. In order to classify them, we first identified stop words which often quite likely to play a negative role in sentiment analysis and excluded them from our sentiment scoring. In general, sentiment words are nouns, adjectives, verbs, adverbs as they have sentimental expressions such as positive, neutral, and negative. On the other hands, non-sentiment words are interjection, determiner, numeral, postposition, etc. as they generally have no sentimental expressions. To build a reliable sentiment lexicon, we have adopted a concept of collective intelligence as a model for crowdsourcing. In addition, a concept of folksonomy has been implemented in the process of taxonomy to help collective intelligence. In order to make up for an inherent weakness of folksonomy, we have adopted a majority rule by building a voting system. Participants, as voters were offered three voting options to choose from positivity, negativity, and neutrality, and the voting have been conducted on one of the largest social networking sites for college students in Korea. More than 35,000 votes have been made by college students in Korea, and we keep this voting system open by maintaining the project as a perpetual study. Besides, any change in the sentiment score of words can be an important observation because it enables us to keep track of temporal changes in Korean language as a natural language. Lastly, our study offers a RESTful, JSON based API service through a web platform to make easier support for users such as researchers, companies, and developers. Finally, our study makes important contributions to both research and practice. In terms of research, our Korean sentiment lexicon plays an important role as a resource for Korean natural language processing. In terms of practice, practitioners such as managers and marketers can implement sentiment analysis effectively by using Korean sentiment lexicon we built. Moreover, our study sheds new light on the value of folksonomy by combining collective intelligence, and we also expect to give a new direction and a new start to the development of Korean natural la...理쒓렐 ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣???쒖슜怨?遺꾩꽍?????以묒슂?깆씠 ??먮맖???곕씪, ?댁뒪湲곗궗? ?볤?怨?媛숈? 鍮꾩젙???곗씠?곗쓽 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠??湲곕컲??媛먯꽦 遺꾩꽍?????愿?ъ씠 ?믪븘吏怨??덈떎. ?섏?留? ?쒓뎅?대뒗 ?곸뼱????щ━ ?먯뿰??泥섎━媛 ?대젮??援먯갑?대줈???뺣낫?붾굹 ?뺣낫?쒖뒪?쒖뿉???쒖슜??誘명씉???ㅼ젙?대떎. ?댁뿉 蹂??곌뎄??媛먯꽦 遺꾩꽍???쒖슜??媛?ν븳 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾??吏묐떒吏?깆쑝濡?援ъ텞?섏?怨? ?꾧뎄???곌뎄? ?ㅻТ???ъ슜?섎룄濡?API?쒕퉬???뚮옯?쇱쓣 媛쒕갑?섏???www.openhangul.com). 吏묐떒吏?깆쓽 ?쒖슜???꾪빐 援?궡 理쒕? ??숈깮 ?뚯뀥?ㅽ듃?뚰겕 ?ъ씠?몄뿉????숈깮?ㅼ쓣 ??곸쑝濡??⑥뼱留덈떎 湲띿젙, 以묐┰, 遺?뺤뿉 ????ы몴瑜?吏꾪뻾?섏??? 洹몃━怨?吏묐떒吏?깆쓽 ?⑥쑉?깆쓣 ?믪씠湲??꾪빐 媛먯꽦???섏젙?섃숆? ?꾨땶 ?섎텇瑜섃숉븯??諛⑹떇????냼?몃????섏궗?뚮뱾???섑븳 遺꾨쪟踰뺚숈씠?쇰뒗 媛쒕뀗???곸슜?섏??? 珥?517,178(+)??援?뼱?ъ쟾 ?⑥뼱 以?遺덉슜???뺥깭瑜??쒖쇅????媛먯꽦 ?쒗쁽??媛?ν븳 紐낆궗, ?뺤슜?? ?숈궗, 遺?щ? ?곗꽑 ?쒖쐞濡??섏뿬, ?꾩옱源뚯? 珥?35,000(+)踰덉쓽 ?⑥뼱??????ы몴瑜?吏꾪뻾?섏??? 蹂??곌뎄??媛먯꽦???ъ쟾? 吏묐떒吏?깆쓽 李몄뿬?먭? ?꾩쟻?⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?좊ː?꾧? ?믪븘吏?꾨줉 ?ㅺ퀎?섏뿬, ?쒓컙??異뺤쑝濡??щ엺?ㅼ씠 ?⑥뼱??????몄??섎뒗 媛먯꽦??蹂?붾룄 ?ъ꽭?섍쾶 諛섏쁺?섎뒗 ?μ젏???덈떎. ?곕씪??蹂??곌뎄???욎쑝濡쒕룄 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾 援ъ텞???꾪븳 ?ы몴瑜?怨꾩냽 吏꾪뻾???덉젙?대ŉ, ?꾩옱 ?쒓났?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾, 湲곕낯??異붿텧, 移댄뀒怨좊━ 異붿텧 ?몄뿉???ㅼ뼇???먯뿰??泥섎━???묒슜??媛?ν븳 API?ㅻ룄 ?쒓났??怨꾪쉷?대떎. 湲곗〈???곌뎄?ㅼ씠 媛먯꽦 遺꾩꽍?대굹 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾??援ъ텞怨??쒖슜?????諛⑹븞???쒖븞?섎뒗 寃껋뿉留??쒖젙?섏뼱 ?덈뒗 寃껉낵???щ━, 蹂??곌뎄??吏묐떒吏?깆쓣 ?ㅼ젣濡??쒖슜?섏뿬 ?곌뎄? ?ㅻТ???쒖슜??媛?ν븳 ?먯썝??援ъ텞?섏뿬 媛쒕갑?섏뿬 怨듭쑀?쒕떎??李⑤퀎?깆쓣 媛吏怨??덈떎. ???섏븘媛, 吏묐떒吏?깃낵 ??냼?몃????뱀꽦??寃고빀?섏뿬 ?쒓? 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾??援ъ텞???덈줈???쒕룄媛 ?ν썑 ?쒓? ?먯뿰??泥섎━??諛쒖쟾???덉뼱 ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?ㅼ쓽 ?듯빀?곸씤 ?곌뎄? ?ㅻТ?곸씤 李몄뿬瑜??대걣??媛쒕갑???묒뾽???덈줈??諛⑺뼢怨??쒖궗?먯쓣 ?쒖떆 ?????덉쓣 寃껋씠??湲곕??쒕떎.A Hybrid Under-sampling Approach for Better Bankruptcy Prediction

?띿뒪?몃쭏?대떇 湲곕컲???⑥쑉?곸씤 ?μ냼 釉뚮옖???대?吏 媛뺣룄 痢≪젙 諛⑸쾿
?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, 理쒖꽍?? [2015] [KCI?깆옱]
Membership Fluidity and Knowledge Collaboration in Virtual Communities:A Multilateral Approach to Membership Fluidity
?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, 諛뺥쁽?? [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

In early modern times, Joseon Language had relations with many different languages. Its dual language situation with Japanese was prominent during the period, when its relations with English, Chinese, French, Russian, and German were not to be missed. Announced by Zamenhof in 1887, Esperanto was an artificial and common international language that played an essential role in the language landscape during the period. Esperanto was examined in its relations with anarchists in many cases, but one can see that it encompasses much more than that in reality by examining its application to Joseon and its operational methods of discourse in it.
The Esperanto movement peaked in Korea in the former half of the 1920s. There were Esperanto lessons all over the nation; books to help learners study the language for themselves were published; and newspapers and magazines had a regular section to teach the language. It was a trend those days that language study was widely spread among laymen that did not specialize in linguistics. The fact that Esperanto is an easy language to learn and use in a short period of time was particularly emphasized. In the second half of the 1920s, linguists that followed the footsteps of Ju Shi-gyeong started to engage in a language movement actively around the Joseon Language Research Institute(Joseon Language Society). There were a couple of common features between the Esperanto movement and the Joseon Language movement: first, the two movements honored and commemorated their respective creators, Zamenhof and Ju Shi-gyeong(King Sejong and Hangul Proclamation Day); and secondly, both of them provided an ongoing series of lessons to teach the two languages.
Esperanto faced a criticism that it did not reflect the life and habits of a people since it was an artificial language. Based on the perception that Joseon Language displayed confusing aspects with no rules as a natural language, there were efforts to equip it with modern language features through grammar and standard language establishment during those days. Esperanto and Joseon Language met each other through a concept of ?쏿rranged natural language.??It was argued that the former was not an artificial language completely but a natural language that had been arranged and that the latter should go through an arrangement process for more convenient acquisition. There was another argument that Esperanto should actively be introduced as a world language since Joseon was a country that was lagging behind other countries and had a history of being colonized, thus needing to introduce a common world language for the reception of the world and globality. The introduction of Esperanto was considered as the realization of directionality for the original texts. The globality that colonized Joseon should reach was a permanent and simplehearted point beyond individuals and peoples. There was a perception that Joseon people and literature would join the world people and literature the moment they used Esperanto.
Entering the 1930s, the patterns of discourse about a natural or artificial language and an ethnic or world language around Esperanto changed. Those changes were attributed to the changes to the perceptions and imagination of the world.洹쇰? 議곗꽑?대뒗 ?щ윭 ?몄뼱???愿???섏뿉???뺤꽦?섏뿀?? ?쇰낯?댁????댁쨷 ?몄뼱 ?곹솴??遺媛곷릺???쒓린?댁?留? ?곸뼱, ?쒖뼱(以묎뎅??, 踰뺤뼱(?꾨옉?ㅼ뼱), ?꾩뼱(?ъ떆?꾩뼱), ?뺤뼱(?낆씪?? ?깃낵??愿?⑤룄 鍮쇰넃?????녿떎. ?먰븳, 1887???먮찘?명봽媛 諛쒗몴???멸났?댁씠??援?젣怨듯넻?댁씤 ?먯뒪?섎?????떆 ???쒓린 ?몄뼱?μ뿉??鍮쇰넃?????녿뒗 ??븷???덈떎. ?먯뒪?섎??좊뒗 ?꾨굹?ㅼ뒪?몄????곌????섏뿉???댄뵾??寃쎌슦媛 留롮?留? ?먯뒪?섎??좎쓽 ?앸?吏 議곗꽑?먯쓽 ?곸슜怨??대줎???묐룞 諛⑹떇???댄뵾硫? ?ㅼ젣濡쒕뒗 ?대낫???⑥뵮 留롮? 遺遺꾩쓣 ?ш큵?쒕떎??寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?????덈떎.

?먯뿰??吏덉쓽 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ뒗 ?ъ슜?먭? ?뺥삎 吏덉쓽?댁뿉 ???蹂꾨룄???꾨Ц 吏???놁씠???곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅻ? ?ъ슜?????덈룄濡??섍린 ?꾪븳 寃껋씠?? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞???쒓뎅???곗씠?踰좎씠??吏덉쓽 ?쒖뒪??K-NLQ)? SQL??吏?먰븯??DBMS???먯뿰??吏덉쓽 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ줈???ъ슜?????덈룄濡??쒓뎅???곗씠?踰좎씠??吏덉쓽瑜?SQL濡?蹂?섑븯???쒖뒪?쒖씠?? ?낅젰???쒓뎅???곗씠?踰좎씠??吏덉쓽???먯뿰??遺꾩꽍湲곗뿉 ?섑빐 ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍怨?援щЦ 遺꾩꽍???대（?댁?怨??섎? 遺꾩꽍 怨쇱젙??嫄곗퀜 ?숈씪???섎?瑜?吏?덈뒗 以묎컙 ?쇰━ ?뺤떇?쇰줈 蹂?섎릺硫? 以묎컙 ?쇰━ ?뺤떇? 吏??踰좎씠?ㅻ? 李몄“??SQL 吏덉쓽濡?蹂?섎맂??A natural language query interface is useful for general database users not familiar with DBMS. The Korean Natural Language DB Query System(K-NLQ), a query interface for relational DBMSs, transforms Korean queries into the equivalent SQL queries. The K-NLQ consists of Natural Language Analyzer, Semantic Analyzer, and SQL Query Generator. The Natural Language Analyzer analyzes Korean queries and generates appropriate parsing trees. The Semantic Analyzer transforms these parsing trees into Intermediate Logical Forms(ILFs) equivalent to input queries. Finally, the SQL Query Generator translates these ILFs into SQL queries by utilizing knowledge bases.?붿빟 ABSTRACT ?? ?쒕줎 ?? ?쒓뎅???곗씠?踰좎씠??吏덉쓽 ?쒖뒪??媛쒖슂 ?? ?쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎諛?援ы쁽?뚯씠?꾨씪???쒖뒪???⑹꽦???꾪븳 硫댁쟻 ?쒖빟議곌굔 ?ㅼ?伊대쭅 ?뚭퀬由щ벉
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 諛뺤옱??Jae Hwan Park), [1993] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

In this work, we use effective Korean input token units to encode Korean sentences for classification problems, such as topic detection. Recurrent and convolutional neural networks for Korean sentence encoding are briefly reviewed, and various Korean input tokens units, including character, morpheme-tag, morpheme, word, subword, syllable window, and hybrids of morpheme and character methods are explored. Extensive experiments on sentimental analysis, topic detection, and intention understanding tasks are conducted to find effective input token units.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 臾몄옣異붿긽?붿뿉 ?쒖슜?섎뒗 ?ъ링?좉꼍留앹냼由??뱀꽦怨?TDoA???댁슜???붾컮?댁뒪 ?꾩튂 ?댄깉 媛먯? 湲곕쾿

As for the representative parsing method, LL parsing and LR parsing, the former preserves the probability information of the original grammar, but the latter does not. A characteristic of a probabilistic parsing automaton has been studied; but, currently, the generating model of probabilistic parsing automata has not been known. The paper provides a model of probabilistic parsing automata based on the single state parsing automata. The generated automaton preserves the probability of the original grammar, so it is not necessary to test whether or not the automaton is probabilistic parsing automaton; defining a probability function for the automaton is not required. Additionally, an efficient automaton can be constructed by choosing an appropriate parameter.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 諛곌꼍吏??3. ?뺣쪧?뚯떛?ㅽ넗留덊넠???앹꽦紐⑤뜽?붽뎄?ы빆 ?섏쭛 ?④퀎?먯꽌 媛蹂??遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 臾몄젣 ?꾨젅??諛?紐⑺몴 紐⑤뜽 ?듯빀 ?꾨젅?꾩썙??

Question Answering (QA) ?쒕퉬?ㅻ뒗 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽????묓븯???뺥솗???듬????쒓났?섎뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠?? 蹂??곌뎄???뱀젙 ?꾨찓?몄뿉 愿?⑦븳 ?ъ슜?먮뱾??吏덈Ц?????QA ?쒕퉬?ㅺ? ?먮룞?쇰줈 ??묓븯??諛⑸쾿??愿???곌뎄?대떎. ?대? ?섑뻾?섍린 ?꾪븯???ъ슜?먯쓽 ?먯뿰??吏덈Ц???댄빐?섍퀬, ?뺥삎 ?곗씠??諛?鍮꾩젙???곗씠?곕줈遺???ъ슜??吏덈Ц???곹빀???듬????꾩텧?섏뿬 ?쒓났?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 top 1 accuracy 68%, top 5 accuracy 77% 寃곌낵瑜??살뿀?? ?먰븳 蹂??쇰Ц? QA ?쒖뒪???대? 紐⑤뱢???꾩껜 accuracy ??誘몄튂???곹뼢????댁꽌??湲곗닠?섏???Question Answering (QA) services can provide exact answers to user questions written in natural language form. This research focuses on how to build a QA system for a specific domain area. Online and offline QA system architecture of targeted domain such as domain detection, question analysis, reasoning, information retrieval, filtering, answer extraction, re-ranking, and answer generation, as well as data preparation are presented herein. Test results with an official Frequently Asked Question (FAQ) set showed 68% accuracy of the top 1 and 77% accuracy of the top 5. The contribution of each part such as question analysis system, document search engine, knowledge graph engine and re-ranking module for achieving the final answer are also presented.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?⑤씪???쒖뒪??援ъ꽦 3. ?ㅽ봽?쇱씤 ?곗씠??泥섎━??⑸웾 寃쎈줈?곗씠??遺꾨쪟??湲곕컲??寃쏀뿕??理쒖꽑 寃쎈줈 異붿쿇

?곗씠??踰좎씠???ㅽ궎留??듯빀? ?뺣낫 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉??留ㅼ슦 以묒슂???댁뒋?대떎. ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀? ?쒓컙怨??몃젰???곷떦??留롮씠 ?꾩슂?섍린 ?뚮Ц??洹몃룞??留롮? ?곌뎄?ㅼ? ?먮룞?붾맂 ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?몃젰?덈떎. ?섏?留?吏湲덇퉴吏???곌뎄?먯꽌??XML???뚯뒪 ?ㅽ궎留덈줈 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?ъ쟾??留롮? 遺遺꾩쓣 ?곗씠??踰좎씠??愿由ъ옄??媛쒖엯???꾩슂?섎룄濡??④꺼?먯뿀?? ?덈? ?ㅻ㈃, ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ??諛쒖깮?섎뒗 愿怨꾨챸 紐낆묶 異⑸룎怨?媛숈? 臾몄젣???곗씠??踰좎씠??愿由ъ옄媛 吏곸젒 媛쒖엯?섏뿬???닿껐?????덉뿀?? ???쇰Ц?먯꽌???ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ??諛쒖깮?섎뒗 愿怨꾨챸 紐낆묶 異⑸룎???닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 愿怨꾨챸???먮룞?쇰줈 ?앹꽦?댁＜???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???뚭컻?쒕떎. ???뚭퀬由ъ쬁? ?명꽣???곗뼱(Collocation) ?ъ쟾怨??곸뼱 ?덈Ц??湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?쒕떎. ?ъ쟾 ?곗씠?곕? 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?섏뿬 異붿텧???덈Ц?ㅼ쓣 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?怨쇱젙???듯빐 遺꾩꽍???????뷀떚???ъ씠??愿怨꾨챸???앹꽦?쒕떎. 諛섏옄?숉솕???ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섏뿬 ???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???뚯뒪?명빐蹂댁븯?쇰ŉ 洹?寃곌낵 ??90%???뺥솗?꾨? ?섑??덈떎. ???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???곸슜?섎㈃ ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ?쒖뿉 ?곗씠??踰좎씠??愿由ъ옄??媛쒖엯??理쒖냼?뷀븷 ???덉쑝硫??대뒗 ?먮룞?붾맂 ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섎뒗 ?곗뿉 ???꾩?????寃껋씠??Database schema integration is a significant issue in information systems. Because schema integration is a time-consuming and labor-intensive task, many studies have attempted to automate it. Researchers typically use XML as the source schema and leave much of the work to be done through DBA intervention, e.g., there are various naming conflicts related to relationship names in schema integration. In the past, the DBA had to intervene to resolve the naming-conflict name. In this paper, we introduce an algorithm that automatically generates relationship names to resolve relationship name conflicts that occur during schema integration. This algorithm is based on an Internet collocation and English sentence example dictionary. The relationship between the two entities is generated by analyzing examples extracted based on dictionary data through natural language processing. By building a semi-automated schema integration system and testing this algorithm, we found that it showed about 90% accuracy. Using this algorithm, we can resolve the problems related to naming conflicts that occur at schema integration automatically without DBA intervention.Business Application of Convolutional Neural Networks for Apparel Classification Using Runway Image

?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, Suhyeon Nam(?⑥닔??, [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

臾몄꽌 ??묎텒?????愿?ш낵 以묒슂?깆씠 ?믪븘吏먯뿉 ?곕씪 臾몄꽌 蹂듭젣???쒖젅??寃異쒖뿉 ????꾩슂?깆씠 利앸??섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?댁? 媛숈? ?댁쑀濡?留롮? ?곌뎄媛 ?대（?댁?怨??덉쑝???먯뿰??泥섎━湲곗닠???쒓퀎媛 ?덉뼱 臾몄꽌???ъ링???쒖젅 寃異쒖뿉 ?대젮????덈떎.蹂??쇰Ц? ?먯뿰??遺꾩꽍??湲곗닠???곸슜???좎궗臾몄꽌 ?먮퀎湲곕? ?ㅺ퀎,援ы쁽?쒕떎. ???쒖뒪?쒖? ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍??湲곗닠怨??④퍡 援щЦ?섎? 遺꾩꽍??湲곗닠, ?鍮덈룄 諛?愿?⑺몴??媛以묒튂???댁슜?섏뿬 ?좎궗臾몄꽌瑜??먮퀎?쒕떎. 蹂??쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫???ㅽ뿕?섍린 ?꾪븯???대㉫ ?먮퀎怨?湲곗〈 ?쒖뒪?? 洹몃━怨??대㉫ ?먮퀎怨??쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?먮퀎怨쇱쓽 ?곴?怨꾩닔瑜?遺꾩꽍?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵, 援щЦ?섎? 遺꾩꽍???쒖슜???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒖꽑?먯쓣 諛쒓껄?????덉뿀?? ?욎쑝濡?臾몄꽌 ?좏삎???뺤쓽?섍퀬 媛??좏삎??留욌뒗 ?먮퀎 湲곕쾿??媛쒕컻???꾩슂媛 ?덈떎.Owing to importance of document copyright the need to detectd ocument duplication and plagiarism is increasing. Many studies have so ught to meet such need, but there are difficulties indocument duplication detection due to technological limitations with the processing of natural language. This thesis designs and implements a discriminator of similar documents with natural language processing technique. This system discriminates similar documents using morphological analysis, syntactic analysis, and weight on low frequency and idiom. To evaluate the system, we analyze the correlation between human discrimination and term-based discrimination, and between human discrimination and proposed discrimination. This analysis shows that the proposed discrimination needs improving. Future research should work to define the document type and improve the processing technique appropriate for each type.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 臾몄꽌 ?댁꽍 湲곗닠 ?? 援щЦ?섎? 遺꾩꽍???댁슜???좎궗臾몄꽌 ?앸퀎 ?쒖뒪?쏯?ㅽ겕由??쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?댁슜???щ줈?ㅻ??붿뼱 ?ㅽ넗由ы뀛留??꾨왂

Multi - scale Image Segmentation Using MSER and its Application

We have identified the facets to represent component characteristics by exchanging information from the component descriptions written in a natural language, composed the software component identifiers from the automatically extracted terms corresponding to each facets, and stored them which the components in the nearest locations according to the semantic similarity of the classified components. In order to retrieve components satisfying user''s requirements, we measured a semantic similarity between the queries and the stored components in the software library. As s result of using the semantic similarity to retrieve reusable components, we could not only retrieve the set of components satisfying user''s queries but also reduce the retrieval time of components of user''s request. And we further improve the overall retrieval efficiency by assigning relevance ranking to the retrieved components according to the degree of query satisfaction.?곗씠?踰좎씠??: ?쒗쁽??利앸?瑜??꾪븳 蹂듯빀 媛앹껜 ??섏쓽 ?ㅺ퀎

Moreover, in order to investigate a 360-degree image on a 2D display, a user has to either click and drag the image with a mouse, or project it to a 2D panorama image, which inevitably introduces severe distortions. In consequence, investigating a 360-degree image and finding an object of interest in such a 360-degree image could be a tedious task. To resolve this issue, this paper proposes a method to find a region of interest and produces a 2D naturally looking image from a given 360-degree image that best matches a description given by a user in a natural language sentence. Our method also considers photo composition so that the resulting image is aesthetically pleasing. Our method first converts a 360-degree image to a 2D cubemap. As objects in a 360-degree image may appear distorted or split into multiple pieces in a typical cubemap, leading to failure of detection of such objects, we introduce a modified cubemap. Then our method applies a Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) network based object detection method to find a region of interest with a given natural language sentence. Finally, our method produces an image that contains the detected region, and also has aesthetically pleasing composition.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁Webized Tangible Space
(???쒓뎅而댄벂?곌렇?섑뵿?ㅽ븰?? 怨좏씗?? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

This study explores reasons for the divergent interpretations on the identity of Megalia, by adopting and modifying the social identity model of deindividuation effects (SIDE) for anonymous online communities. We analyzed the entire 162,893 posts throughout the lifecourse of Megalia from 2015 to 2016, in order to figure out how discourses were differentiated depending on whether the writer"s ID was disclosed (pseudonym) or not (anonym), and to reconstruct the evolvement of collisions between the discourses. Natural language processing techniques (i.e., topic modeling and Word2Vec) were applied. Then, it discovered that topics related to gender discrimination were dominant whereas topics related to internal conflicts were relatively minor. Anonymous-posts, however, exclusively preferred anger-raising topics with Megalian dialect while pseudonymous-posts contained topics related to mobilizing efforts against sexual crimes and discriminations. An observer would see very different faces of Megalia, depending on whether reading anonymous posts, which made up most of posts, or following significant contributors" IDs and their pseudonymous posts. In addition, even a shared discourse between the two types of identities may nurture a conflict by developing either type of termonology exclusive to each identity or differential contexts of a common word. A topic on tolerance toward gender minorities developed both patterns and eventually contributed to massive exits and final decline. We expect to contribute to the development of analytical frameworks that clarify how members in an online community form various identities in response to structural conditions such as levels of anonymity and to foster holistics understanding of the life-course of the community.?? ?ㅼ뼱媛??留??? ?대줎 諛??좏뻾?곌뎄 寃???? ?곌뎄 諛⑸쾿 諛??먮즺 ?? 遺꾩꽍寃곌낵 ?? 寃곕줎?쒓뎅 誘쇱＜?붿슫?숈쓽 ?꾨왂怨??꾨젅??
?쒓뎅?ы쉶?숉쉶, ?띿꽦??Sung-Tai Hong), [2018] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

?몃줎?숆퀎?먯꽌???섏젣?ㅼ젙 ?곌뎄瑜?鍮꾨’?섏뿬 ?곸? ?딆? ?쒓퀎???댁슜 遺꾩꽍 ?곌뎄媛 ?대（?댁죱?? 洹몃룞???쒓퀎??諛⑸쾿濡?痢〓㈃?먯꽌??留롮? 諛쒖쟾???덉뿀吏留??섏옉?낆뿉 ?섏〈?섎뒗 ?꾪넻???댁슜 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈???洹쒕え ?댁슜 遺꾩꽍???쒓???留롮븯?? ???곌뎄??蹂멸꺽?곸씤 ?κ린 ?쒓퀎???곌뎄瑜??섑뻾?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?먯뿰??泥섎━? ?섎??곌껐留?遺꾩꽍??寃고빀???댁뒪 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 遺꾩꽍???쒖슜??寃껋쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먰븳 26?꾩튂(1990節?015) 8媛?以묒븰吏(?덇꼍?μ떊臾멥? ?덇뎅誘쇱씪蹂담? ?덈룞?꾩씪蹂담? ?덈Ц?붿씪蹂담? ?덉꽌?몄떊臾멥? ?덉꽭怨꾩씪蹂담? ?덊븳寃⑤젅?좊Ц?? ?덊븳援?씪蹂담????뺤튂? ?ы쉶硫?湲곗궗 ??100留?嫄댁뿉 ???遺꾩꽍?덈떎. 湲곗궗???쒓뎅?몃줎吏꾪씎?щ떒 ?댁뒪 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 ?쒖뒪?쒖씤 ?섎퉭移댁씤利댿숇? ?쒖슜?섏뿬 ?섏쭛?섍퀬 ?먯뿰??泥섎━????湲곗궗???뺣낫?먭낵 ?몄슜臾?二쇱젣 以묒떖?쇰줈 ?섎??곌껐留?遺꾩꽍???ㅼ떆?섏뿬, 留ㅼ껜蹂꾨줈 ?뺣낫?먭낵 二쇱젣???쒓퀎?댁쟻 蹂?붾? ?댄렣蹂댁븯?? 遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵, ?ы쉶硫?二쇱젣瑜??쒖쇅?섎㈃ 以묒슂??理쒖긽?꾧텒 ?뺣낫?먭낵 二쇱젣??留ㅼ껜 媛?李⑥씠???ъ? ?딆븯??諛섎㈃, ?쒓퀎?댁쟻?쇰줈??2000???꾪썑濡?媛??以묒슂???뺣낫?먭낵 ?몄슜臾?二쇱젣媛 ?꾨㈃?곸쑝濡?蹂?뷀븯???묒긽??蹂댁??? 湲곗궗???뺣낫???섏? 湲곗궗???몄슜臾?二쇱젣 ?섎뒗 留ㅼ껜蹂꾨줈 ?ㅼ냼 李⑥씠???덉?留??泥대줈 ?섎씫?덈떎. ???곌뎄???댁뒪 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 遺꾩꽍???쒖슜???섏쭛???⑤씪??湲곗궗 ?꾩닔?????吏?띿쟻?쇰줈 紐⑤땲?곕쭅?섎㈃???먮룞?붾맂 ?κ린 ?쒓퀎???댁슜 遺꾩꽍 ?곗씠?곕? 異뺤쟻?????덉쓣 肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲?? ?대? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 寃쎌젣吏?????ㅼ뼇???쒓퀎???곗씠?곗? ?뺢탳??鍮꾧탳?곌뎄瑜??????덈뒗 ?좊?瑜?留덈젴?덈떎?????섏쓽瑜?媛뽯뒗??Time series content analysis in communication studies such as agenda setting theory is increasingly popular. There have been methodological advances in time series analysis. However, it is impossible to do content analysis for a large number of news articles with traditional manual techniques. This study suggests news big data analytics for automated time series content analysis in a long term, mixing natural language processing (NLP) and semantic network analysis of news. A pilot study focusing on news sources and quotes??topics is also conducted analyzing news about political or social issues. Around one million news articles for 26 years (1990節?015) are collected from 8 major nationwide Korean dailies including Kyunghyang Shinmun, Kukmin Ilbo, Donga Ilbo, Munhwa Ilbo, Seoul Shinmun, Segye Ilbo, Hankyoreh, and Hankook Ilbo. NLP with ?쁁igKinds?? a news big data analysis database developed by Korea Press Foundation, and semantic network analysis with independent development tools are used. Studies showed that less differences among newspapers and complete time series changes between 1990s and 2000s were found in the most important sources and topics except for topics in society section. The number of sources and topics per article has decreased in general. Sophisticated automated times series content analysis in a long term enables researchers to monitor the press system as a whole and to compare other time series data such as many economic indexes.1. 臾몄젣 ?쒓린 2. ?쒓퀎???댁슜 遺꾩꽍?????湲곗〈 臾명뿄 寃??3. ?댁뒪 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 遺꾩꽍 ?쒖슜 ?κ린 ?쒓퀎???댁슜 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞 4. 遺꾩꽍 ?щ? : 100留?嫄?湲곗궗???뺣낫?먭낵 二쇱젣 遺꾩꽍?쇰줈 蹂??좊Ц 26??5. 寃곕줎 諛??⑥쓽寃뚯엫以묐룆 洹쒖젣踰뺣━?????鍮꾪뙋??怨좎같

泥좏븰?곸쑝濡??⑦넧濡쒖????몄긽??議댁옱?섎뒗 寃껋뿉 ????곌뎄瑜??섎??쒕떎. ?곕씪???뺤씠?곹븰????遺꾩빞瑜??대，?? ?섏?留??멸났?몄? 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?⑦넧濡쒖????몄긽??????곕━??媛쒕뀗?붿쓣 紐낆떆?곸쑝濡??섑??대뒗 寃껋쓣 ?섎??쒕떎. ?뺣낫異붿텧, ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?遺꾩빞???ㅼ뼇???⑦넧濡쒖?媛 ?곌뎄 媛쒕컻?섏뼱 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄??紐⑹쟻? ?쒓뎅???곸뼱援먭낵?쒖뿉 ?섑????뚯옱??愿???곸뿭 ?⑦넧濡쒖?(domain ontology)瑜??대뼸寃?媛쒕컻?????덈뒗 吏瑜?蹂댁뿬二쇨퀬???쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪븯???곸뼱援먯쑁怨쇱젙(2006-75)???쒖떆??19媛吏???곸뼱援먭낵???뚯옱瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 媛??湲곗큹媛 ?섎뒗 媛쒕뀗 ?ㅼ꽢 媛吏瑜??뺥븯??? ?대? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 湲곗큹 ?⑦넧濡쒖?(base ontology)瑜?援ъ꽦?섏??? 洹몃━怨?14醫??곸뼱援먭낵??媛??⑥썝???뚯옱瑜?遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 ?살? ?뚯옱媛쒕뀗?쇰줈 ??湲곗큹 ?⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??뺤옣?섎뒗 諛⑹떇?쇰줈 ?쒓뎅?곸뼱援먭낵?쒖냼???곸뿭 ?⑦넧濡쒖? 援ъ텞 諛⑹븞???쒖떆?섏???Philosophically ontology is the study of being or existence and forms the basic subject matter of metaphysics. In AI, it means an explicit specification of a conceptualization (Gruber 1993). Various types of ontologies have been developed for better results of NLP including information retrieval (Guarino1998, Huang et al 2010). The main purpose of the current study is to show how to develop a domain ontology of themes of English textbooks used in Korea. To this purpose, a list of the themes is made through the analysis of English textbooks, and a base ontology is created based on the concepts for the themes. Furthermore, the current study tries to show how to expand the base ontology into a full-fledged English textbook theme ontology.以묓븰????곸쓽 愿묓빀?깆뿉 愿???좏깮???됯? 諛⑹떇怨?媛쒕갑???됯? 諛⑹떇?먯꽌 ?섑????먯븘 ?⑤뒫媛? ?뺤떊?? 吏?앹쓽 愿?⑥꽦 遺꾩꽍

Foreign policy decision-making processes are classified into three types: cased-based reasoning, model-based reasoning, and explanation-based reasoning. The case-based type relies on the past cases in inductively understanding current problems, while the model-based type uses the top-down deductive method. On the other hand, the explanation-based type takes a middle way between them by assuming multiple causal variables in explaining given problems. This paper argues that the event data system can help the last type of decision-making process improve the quality of foreign policy of a country. Event data systems are accumulated databases of qualitative events collected from everyday news media by transforming the raw data into a manageable, quantitative form for systemic analyses. The revolution in information technologies and its impact on the development of event data systems are also discussed here, particularly in the fields of natural language processing and machine coding.?먰븳湲珥덈줉???? ?ㅼ뼱媛??留??? ?멸탳?뺤콉 寃곗젙怨쇱젙???좏삎 ?? ?대깽?몃뜲?댄꽣 ?쒖뒪?쒓낵 ?멸탳?뺤콉 ?? ?뺣낫?곷챸怨??대깽?몃뜲?댄꽣 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 諛쒖쟾?숇㏏?먯꽌 遺援?컯蹂묒쑝濡?

利앹긽 吏꾨떒 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠???⑥? ?섏옄媛 ?먯떊??利앹긽???ㅻ챸?섍퀬, ?쒖쓽?ш? 利앹긽??留욌뒗 吏덈퀝 吏꾨떒???대━??寃껋쓣 留먰븳?? 利앹긽 吏꾨떒 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?먮룞?뷀븯湲??꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?섏옄???먯뿰?대줈 ?대（?댁쭊 利앹긽 ?ㅻ챸?????遺꾩꽍???꾩슂?섎떎. ?댁뿉 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??利앹긽 ?ㅻ챸????섏뿬 ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍???섑뻾?섍퀬 ?쒖쓽??蹂묒쬆 ?곗씠?곗? 鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 ?곹빀??吏꾨떒???대━?꾨줉 利앹긽 吏꾨떒 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 媛쒕컻?섏??? 利앹긽 吏꾨떒 寃?됱쓽 ?⑥쑉???믪씠湲??꾪빐??Document??NoSQL??MongoDB瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 媛곴컖??蹂묒쬆 ?곗씠?곕? ?섎굹???꾪걧癒쇳듃濡??섍퀬, 洹??덉쓽 ?꾨뱶媛믪쓣 ?좎뿰?섍쾶 愿由ы븷 ???덈룄濡??곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섏??? ?먰븳, 吏꾨떒??洹쇨굅媛 ?섎뒗 ?쒖쓽?ъ쓽 蹂묒쬆 ?ㅻ챸怨??섏옄??利앹긽 ?ㅻ챸?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?⑹뼱??李⑥씠瑜?以꾩씪 ???덈룄濡??섏옄??利앹긽 ?ㅻ챸??異뺤쟻?섍퀬 ?뺤젣?섏뿬 ?쇰컲?몄뿉寃?移쒖닕???⑥뼱濡?援ъ꽦???ㅻ챸?곗씠?곕? ?쒓났?????덇쾶 ?섏???This paper presents the development of the Korean medicine symptom diagnosis system. In the Korean medicine symptom diagnosis system, the patient explains their symptoms and an oriental doctor makes a diagnosis based on the symptoms. Natural language processing is required to make a diagnosis automatically through the patients??reports of symptoms. We use morphological analysis to get understandable information from the natural language itself. We developed a diagnosis system that consists of NoSQL document-oriented databases-MongoDB. NoSQL has better performance at unstructured and semi-structured data, rather than using Relational Databases. We collect patient symptom reports in MongoDB to refine difficult medical terminology and provide understandable terminology to patients.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쒖쓽??利앹긽 吏꾨떒 ?쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎?ㅼ닔 ?щ엺 異붿쟻?곹깭???곕Ⅸ 媛먯떆?곸긽 ?붿빟 ?쒖뒪??

媛먯젙? ?쒖궗 ?앹꽦怨??댄빐 紐⑤몢?먯꽌 以묒슂????븷???쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? ?뚮（移숈쓽 媛먯젙 紐⑤뜽??湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?곹솕 ?蹂몄뿉??8媛吏 媛먯젙 ?쒗쁽??遺꾩꽍?섏??? 癒쇱? 媛??λ㈃蹂??섎룞?쇰줈 媛먯젙???쒓퉭?섏?怨? ????8媛吏 媛먯젙 以?遺꾨끂, 怨듯룷, 洹몃━怨???뚯씠 媛???곗꽭?섍쾶 ?섑??щ뒗?? ?대뒗 ?ㅻ┫???곹솕 ?λⅤ瑜?怨좊젮?????섎??덈떎怨??????덈떎. ?먰븳, ?ㅽ넗由ъ뿉??湲댁옣??媛??怨좎“?섎뒗 ?대씪?대㎘?ㅼ뿉???ㅼ뼇??媛먯젙??蹂듯빀?곸쑝濡??섑??쒕떎怨?媛?뺥븯?怨? ?蹂??곸뿉??3 遺遺꾩쓽 ?대씪?대㎘?ㅻ? ?뺤씤?????덉뿀?? 洹??ㅼ쓬?쇰줈 ?뚯씠??Python) ?꾨줈洹몃옒諛??몄뼱 湲곕컲 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由??꾧뎄??NLTK (Natural Language ToolKit)??媛먯꽦 遺꾩꽍 ?꾧뎄瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?섎룞 媛먯젙 ?쒓퉭怨?鍮꾧탳??寃곌낵, 遺꾨끂? 怨듯룷 媛먯젙?먯꽌 ?믪? ?쇱튂?⑥쓣, 洹몃━怨???? 湲곕?, ?먯삤 媛먯젙?먯꽌????? ?쇱튂?⑥쓣 蹂댁엫???뺤씤?섏???Emotion plays a key role in both generating and understanding narrative. In this article we analyzed the emotions represented in a movie script based on 8 emotion types from the wheel of emotions by Plutchik. First we conducted manual emotion tagging scene by scene. The most dominant emotions by manual tagging were anger, fear, and surprise. It makes sense when the film script we analyzed is a thriller-genre. We assumed that the emotions around the climax of the story would be heightened as the tension grew up. From manual tagging we could identify three such duration when the tension is high. Next we analyzed the emotions in the same script using Python-based NLTK VADERSentiment tool. The result showed that the emotions of anger and fear were most matched. The emotion of surprise, anticipation, and disgust, however, scored lower matching.[?붿빟] [Abstract] ?? Introduction ?? Related Work ?? ?쒖뒪??媛쒕컻諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 吏?먰븯???먮룞?붾룄援щ? 留뚮뱾湲??꾪빐???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?됱쐞???ъ슜???됱쐞瑜??먯뿰??紐낆꽭濡?湲곗닠?섍퀬 ?대? 泥섎━?섎뒗?????留롮? ?곌뎄媛 吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??媛앹껜 吏???뚰봽?몄썾??媛쒕갑 諛⑸쾿??IFM(InFormation Modeling)??湲곕컲?쇰줈 ???쒓? 吏덉쓽 泥섎━湲곕? ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ??吏덉쓽 泥섎━湲곕뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?낅젰???먯뿰???뺥깭???쒓? 紐낆꽭濡?SQL濡?蹂?섑븯??泥섎━?섎ŉ, ?쒓????ъ슜?섎뒗 ?ъ슜?먯뿉寃??몃━瑜??쒓났?섏뿬 ?쒖뒪???쒖슜?꾨? ?믪씠湲??꾪빐 怨좎븞?섏뿀?? ???쒓? 吏덉쓽 泥섎━湲곕뒗 ?쒓?濡??낅젰???ъ슜?먯쓽 ?붽뎄瑜?諛쏆븘?ㅼ뿬 泥섎━?섎?濡? ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?듭닕?섏? ?딆? ?ъ슜?먮룄 ?꾨Ц媛???꾩? ?놁씠 吏곸젒 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?묎렐?????덉쑝硫? ?쒓뎅???ъ슜?먮뱾???쒖뒪??媛쒕컻???λ룞?곸쑝濡?李몄뿬?섏뿬 ?쒖뒪??媛쒕컻 ?쒓컙??以꾩씪 ???덈뒗 ?μ젏???덈떎.To assist the system development methodologies, there have been a lot of researches for treatment of natural language specification, which represents system behavior and user behavior. In this paper, we suggest Hangul Query Processor based on IFM(InFormation Modeling) which is one of the Object-Oriented software development methods. This Hangul query processor translates the Korean language specification to SQL and response query result. And it is designed to improve system usability by providing convenience to Korean language users. The advantages are The Hangul Query Processor affect higher system usability of and users in that it solves user''s Korean language specification without help of the expert. And the software development contained query processor has result to be more participation of users and to reduce the system development time.?λ낫蹂댁븞 : ?섏궗 ?쒕뜡移섑솚???댁슜???ㅼ쨷?덈꺼 ?ㅻ텇諛?

?곗씠??踰좎씠???ㅽ궎留??듯빀? ?뺣낫 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉??留ㅼ슦 以묒슂???댁뒋?대떎. ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀? ?쒓컙怨??몃젰???곷떦??留롮씠 ?꾩슂?섍린 ?뚮Ц??洹몃룞??留롮? ?곌뎄?ㅼ? ?먮룞?붾맂 ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?몃젰?덈떎. ?섏?留?吏湲덇퉴吏???곌뎄?먯꽌??XML???뚯뒪 ?ㅽ궎留덈줈 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?ъ쟾??留롮? 遺遺꾩쓣 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪 愿由ъ옄??媛쒖엯???꾩슂?섎룄濡??④꺼?먯뿀?? ?덈? ?ㅻ㈃, ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ??諛쒖깮?섎뒗 愿怨꾨챸 紐낆묶 異⑸룎怨?媛숈? 臾몄젣???곗씠??踰좎씠??愿由ъ옄媛 吏곸젒 媛쒖엯?섏뿬???닿껐?????덉뿀?? ???쇰Ц?먯꽌???ㅽ궎留덊넻????諛쒖깮?섎뒗 愿怨꾨챸 紐낆묶 異⑸룎???닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 愿怨꾨챸???먮룞?쇰줈 ?앹꽦?댁＜???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???뚭컻?쒕떎. ???뚭퀬由ъ쬁? ?명꽣???곗뼱(Collocation) ?ъ쟾怨??곸뼱 ?덈Ц??湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?쒕떎. ?ъ쟾 ?곗씠?곕? 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?섏뿬 異붿텧???덈Ц?ㅼ쓣 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?怨쇱젙???듯빐 遺꾩꽍???????뷀떚???ъ씠??愿怨꾨챸???앹꽦?쒕떎. 諛섏옄?숉솕???ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섏뿬 ???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???뚯뒪?명빐蹂댁븯?쇰ŉ 洹?寃곌낵 ??90%???뺥솗?꾨? ?섑??덈떎. ???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???곸슜?섎㈃ ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ?쒖뿉 ?곗씠??踰좎씠??愿由ъ옄??媛쒖엯??理쒖냼?뷀븷 ???덉쑝硫??대뒗 ?먮룞?붾맂 ?ㅽ궎留??듯빀 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섎뒗 ?곗뿉 ???꾩?????寃껋씠??Database schema integration is a significant issue in information systems. Because schema integration is a time-consuming and labor-intensive task, many studies have attempted to automate it. Researchers typically use XML as the source schema and leave much of the work to be done through DBA intervention, e.g., there are various naming conflicts related to relationship names in schema integration. In the past, the DBA had to intervene to resolve the naming-conflict name. In this paper, we introduce an algorithm that automatically generates relationship names to resolve relationship name conflicts that occur during schema integration. This algorithm is based on an Internet collocation and English sentence example dictionary. The relationship between the two entities is generated by analyzing examples extracted based on dictionary data through natural language processing. By building a semi-automated schema integration system and testing this algorithm, we found that it showed about 90% accuracy. Using this algorithm, we can resolve the problems related to naming conflicts that occur at schema integration automatically without DBA intervention.1. Introduction 2. Methodologies for semi-automated schema integration 3. An algorithm for finding a relationship between entities 4. Semi-Automated Schema Integration 5. EvaluationBusiness Application of Convolutional Neural Networks for Apparel Classification Using Runway Image

Online Document Mining Approach to Predicting Crowdfunding Success
?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, Suhyeon Nam(?⑥닔??, [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

??됱쓽 留먮춬移?corpus)濡쒕???援щЦ ?뺣낫???섎? ?뺣낫瑜?而댄벂?곕? ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?먮룞?쇰줈 諛쒖톸?섎젮???곌뎄媛 ?쒕컻?섎떎. 洹몃윭???ㅼ슜?곸씤 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由??쒖뒪?쒖씠 ?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?꾩슂??留앸씪??coverage)怨?寃ш퀬??robustness)??媛뽮린 ?꾪빐 ?대뒓 ?뺣룄 洹쒕え??留먮춬移섍? ?꾩슂?쒖???????곌뎄??洹뱁엳 誘몃퉬?섎떎. 蹂??곌뎄??'?곕━留??곗궗?? ?곸쓽 二쇱슂 4 媛吏 ?덉궗???랁븯???⑥뼱?ㅼ쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈 ?곸씠 ?⑥뼱(different words) ?섏? 留먮춬移??ш린媛꾩쓽 ?곴? 愿怨꾨? ?듦퀎?곸쑝濡?怨좎같?섏뿬 ?섑븰???덉륫?⑥닔(estimating functions)瑜?援ы븳?? 洹몃━怨??대? ?듯빐 ?먮즺 鍮덉빟??data sparseness) ?꾩긽????뱁븳 ?섏??쇰줈 媛먯냼?쒖폒 留먮춬移?湲곕컲 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ쓽 ?좊ː?꾨? ?믪씠湲??꾪빐 ?붽뎄?섎뒗 留먮춬移??ш린瑜??덉륫?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?덉륫??留먮춬移??ш린瑜?洹쇨굅濡??⑸━?곸씤 留먮춬移?援ъ텞 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎.Much work has been done to automatically extract syntactic and semantic information from a large corpus. However, there are few attempts to estimate the corpus size that can afford NLP systems the coverage and robustness, which are required for them to be practical. This study finds mathematical estimating functions by statistically investigating various mutual relations between the number of different words and the size of a corpus with respect to the words that belong to four major parts-of-speech in 'Ulimal Keun Dictionary'. Hence, we estimate the size of a corpus needed so as to enhance the reliability of corpus-based NLP by reducing the phenomenon of data sparseness to a reasonable degree. Also, we suggest a reasonable method for building a corpus on the basis of the estimated corpus size.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 諛?臾몄젣??3. ?몄뼱 ?먮즺 諛??뺥깭??遺꾩꽍湲곗쓽誘몄냽?깆뿉 湲곕컲???쒓뎅??紐낆궗 ?섎? 泥닿퀎

?명꽣???댁슜???섍? 利앷??⑥뿉 ?곕씪 媛??ъ씠?몄뿉?쒕뒗 ?섎쭖? ?뺣낫??以묒뿉???ъ슜?먭? ?먰븯???뺣낫瑜??④낵?곸쑝濡??쒓났?댁빞 ???꾩슂?깆씠 利앷??섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?댁뿉 ?곕씪 ?ъ슜?먯? ?먯뿰?대줈 ?뺣낫瑜?二쇨퀬 諛쏆쑝硫??ъ씠?몄쓽 媛???由ъ옄 ??븷???섑뻾?????덈뒗 ??뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃??愿???곌뎄媛 ?쒕컻??吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?섏?留??遺遺꾩쓽 ?먯씠?꾪듃?ㅼ씠 ?⑥닚???⑦꽩 留ㅼ묶 湲곕쾿???ъ슜?섍린 ?뚮Ц??留뚯”?ㅻ윭???듬????쒓났?댁＜吏 紐삵븯怨??덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ъ씠?몄뿉 ????ъ슜?먯쓽 移쒕??꾨? ?믪씪 ???덈룄濡??섍린 ?꾪빐, ?먯뿰?대줈 ?쒓났?섎뒗 ?ъ슜??吏덉쓽?????洹??섎룄瑜??뚯븙?????댁뿉 ????ㅼ뼇???듬????섑뻾?섎뒗 ??뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ??????붿쓽 吏?μ꽦怨??ㅼ뼇?깆쓣 蹂댁옣?섍린 ?꾪븯??GA瑜??댁슜??learning classifier system???꾩엯?섏뿬 二쇱뼱吏??곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪濡쒕????덈줈??臾몄옣??留뚮뱾???ㅼ뼇???듬????????덈룄濡??쒕떎. ?곌뎄?ㅼ쓣 ?뚭컻?섎뒗 媛꾨떒??臾몄젣???곸슜?섏뿬, 洹?媛?μ꽦 諛?媛쒖꽑?먯쓣 ?뚯븙?쒕떎.?붿빟 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 而댄벂???뚰봽?몄썾?? ?붿???肄섑뀗痢????붿????뺣낫 ?ъ궛沅뚯쓽 蹂댄샇???꾩옱 肉??꾨땲???ν썑 援????援?젰??醫뚯슦?????덉쓣 ?뺣룄濡???⑦엳 二쇱슂??怨쇱젣媛 ?꾨땺 ???녿떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???붿????뺣낫 ?ъ궛沅뚭낵 愿?⑤맂 援?궡?띿쇅 ?곌뎄 ?숉뼢怨??쒖젅??媛먯젙??泥닿퀎?곸쑝濡??됲븯湲??꾪븳 ?뚰봽?몄썾???댁뿉 ???鍮꾧탳?띾텇?앹쓣 ?됲븯怨좎옄 ?쒕떎. 二쇱슂 ?댁슜?쇰줈??JISC??以묒떖?쇰줈 ??援?쇅 媛먯젙 湲곌????ъ뾽 ?숉뼢怨?遺꾩꽍 洹몃━怨?援?궡湲곌??대굹 ?⑥껜???吏곸엫???댄렣蹂닿퀬???쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?먯뿰???쒖젅?대굹 ?꾨줈洹몃옩 ?쒖젅??媛먯젙 ?????덈뒗 S/W?댁뿉 ???鍮꾧탳?띾텇?앹쓣 ?됲븯怨좎옄 ?쒕떎.Protection of digital properties such as computer S/W, digital contents is the most important topics. For this, this paper describes the domestic and foreign trends for protecting digital properties and S/W tools for inspecting of plagiarism is compared and analyzed. The analysis of research activities of foreign inspection institutes such as JISC and domestic institutes and communities has done. Also, S/W tools for inspecting of natural language plagiarism is analyzed. Having been speed development of The Content Technology.?붿빟

?遺遺꾩쓽 ?곸뾽???뺣낫寃???쒖뒪?쒖? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 吏덉쓽 ?뺥깭濡?遺덈━??吏덉쓽瑜?梨꾩슜?덈떎. 遺덈━??吏덉쓽??鍮좊Ⅸ 寃?됱쓣 ?꾩슂濡??섎뒗 寃?됱뿏吏꾩뿉???좎슜?좎??쇰룄 遺덈━???곗궛?먮줈 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?붽뎄瑜??뺥솗?섍쾶 ?쒗쁽?섍린???대졄?? ?곕씪???ъ슜?먯뿉寃??몃━???먯뿰??吏덉쓽瑜??댁슜?섎뒗 寃???붿쭊??????곌뎄媛 ?덉뼱?붾떎 臾몄꽌瑜?寃?됲븯湲??꾪빐???ъ슜?먮뒗 ?먯떊???붽뎄瑜??뺥솗?섍쾶 ?쒗쁽?댁빞 ?섎ŉ ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?붽뎄???곸젅?댁빞 ?쒕떎. ?곕씪??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰?대? ?댁슜????뷀삎 吏덉쓽 泥섎━ ?먯씠?꾪듃瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ???먯씠?꾪듃???ъ슜?먯? ?먯쭊?곸씤 ??붾? ?듯빐 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?붽뎄瑜??뺥솗?섍쾶 ?쒗쁽?쒕떎. ?ъ슜?먭? ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽瑜??낅젰?섎㈃ ?먯씠?꾪듃??吏덉쓽瑜?遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 ?곸젅???ㅼ썙?쒕? 異붿텧?섏뿬 遺덈━??吏덉쓽?대? ?앹꽦?쒕떎. 異붿텧???ㅼ썙?쒓? ?숈쓽?댁씠嫄곕굹 ?ㅼ쓽?댁씠硫??ъ슜?먯? ??붾? ?듯빐???ㅼ썙?쒕? ?쒖젙?섍굅???뺤옣?쒕떎. ?대젃寃??⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?붽뎄瑜?蹂대떎 援ъ껜?곸쑝濡??쒗쁽?섏뿬 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫???μ긽?쒗궓?? ?곕씪??蹂??쒖뒪?쒖? ?뺣낫寃?됱뿉???뺥솗瑜좎쓣 ?μ긽?쒗궗 ???덈떎.Generally, most commercial retrieval engines adopt boolean query as user's query type. Although boolean query is useful to retrieval engines that need fast retrieval, it is not easy for user to express his demands with boolean operators. So, many researches have been studied for decades about information retrieval systems using natural language query that is convenient for user. To retrieve documents that are suitable for user's demands, they have to express their demands correctly, So, this thesis proposes interactive query process agent using natural language. This agent expresses demands concrete through gradual interaction with user, When users input a natural language Query, this agent analyzes the query and generates boolean query by selecting proper keyword and feedbacks the state of the keyword selected. If the keyword is a synonymy or a polysemy, the agent expands or limits the keyword through interaction with user. It makes user express demands more concrete and improve system performance. So, this agent can improve the precision of Information Retrieval.?밴린諛??뺣낫寃?됱쓣 ?꾪븳 ?먯뿰???ㅼ썙???됱씤??愿???곌뎄

Improving the quality of Search engine by using the Intelligent agent technolo

?쒓뎅???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍? 援먯갑???뱀꽦???쒖씠?꾧? ?믪? ?묒뾽?대떎. 洹?以묒뿉???뺥깭?뚯쓽 ?먰삎 蹂듭썝?묒뾽? 洹쒖튃?대굹 湲곕텇???ъ쟾 ?뺣낫 ?깆쓣 ?쒖슜?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿??二쇰줈 ?곌뎄?섏뿀?? 洹몃윭???대윭??諛⑸쾿?ㅼ? ?댄쐶?섏???臾몃㎘ ?뺣낫瑜?蹂댁? 紐삵븯湲??뚮Ц???먰삎 蹂듭썝???쒓퀎媛 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??理쒓렐 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ뿉 ?곌뎄?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 湲곌퀎?숈뒿 諛⑸쾿?????щ떇(deep learning)???ъ슜?섏뿬 ?뺥깭?뚯쓽 ?먰삎 蹂듭썝 臾몄젣???닿껐???쒕룄?섏??? 臾몃㎘ ?뺣낫瑜?蹂닿린 ?꾪빐 ?⑥뼱 ?쒗쁽(word embedding)???ъ슜?섏뿬 湲곗〈??諛⑸쾿??蹂대떎 ?믪? ?깅뒫??蹂댁??? ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?섎뱾/VV?숆낵 ?섎뱽/VV?숈쓽 蹂듭썝 臾몄젣????댁꽌 97.97%濡?湲곗〈???먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ뿉 ?곗씠??湲곌퀎?숈뒿 諛⑸쾿 以??섎굹??SVM(Support Vector Machine)??96.22% 蹂대떎 1.75% ?믪? ?깅뒫??蹂댁???Korean Morphological Analysis is a difficult process. Because Korean is an agglutinative language, one of the most important processes in Morphological Analysis is Morpheme Recovery. There are some methods using Heuristic rules and Pre-Analyzed Partial Words that were examined for this process. These methods have performance limits as a result of not using contextual information. In this study, we built a Korean morpheme recovery system using deep learning, and this system used word embedding for the utilization of contextual information. In ?섎뱾/VV??and ?섎뱽/VV??morpheme recovery, the system showed 97.97% accuracy, a better performance than with SVM(Support Vector Machine) which showed 96.22% accuracy.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ???щ떇???댁슜???뺥깭?뚯쓽 ?먰삎 蹂듭썝 ?ㅻ쪟 ?섏젙?④낵?곸씤 紐⑤뜽 湲곕컲 ?덈뱶濡쒖씠??GUI ?뚯뒪?낆쓣 ?꾪븳 GUI ?곹깭 鍮꾧탳 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 諛깆쁺誘?Youngmin Baek), [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?≪쁺湲?Yeongkil Song), [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

The approaches aim to achieve automated design quality checking by converting natural language (human-readable) into logical units (computer-readable). The automated design assessment-related regulations are usually defined in design guidelines, RFPs, etc, however, the regulations are written in human-readable languages, and sometimes their implicit definitions hinder translating into the explicitly defined computer-readable forms. Therefore, this paper focuses on the development of a translation process of converting Korea Building Act sentences into specific computer-readable forms with logic rule-based mechanism including 1) object/property database, 2) method database, 3) converting mechanism of natural language to computer-readable form.誤곭큵 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?좏뻾 ?곌뎄 諛?媛쒕컻 ?щ? 3. 嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 諛?媛앹껜 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪?좎쭊 ?⑥뀡?붿옄?대꼫???묒꽦???꾪븳 援?궡쨌???뺤콉 鍮꾧탳 諛?遺꾩꽍

?⑥쐞 痍⑥빟??atomic vulnerability)? 湲곗〈??痍⑥빟?먯쓽 ?쒗쁽諛⑸쾿??媛뽯뒗 紐⑦샇?깆쓣 媛쒖꽑?섏뿬, 痍⑥빟?먯쓣 ?쒖뒪?쒖쟻?쇰줈 ?쒗쁽?섍린 ?꾪븳 痍⑥빟?먯쓽 ?덈줈???뺤쓽?대떎. ?⑥쐞 痍⑥빟?먯? 痍⑥빟?먯쓽 ?좏삎, ?꾩튂, 寃곌낵 ?깆뿉 ?곕씪 蹂대떎 ?몃텇?뷀븯?? 痍⑥빟?먯쓣 ?섎?瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 ???????꾩슂???뺣낫濡쒖꽌, 湲곗〈??痍⑥빟?먯? 紐?媛쒖쓽 ?⑥쐞 痍⑥빟???앸퀎?먯쓽 議고빀?쇰줈 ?쒗쁽?쒕떎. ?꾩옱 媛????쒖쟻?쇰줈 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 痍⑥빟???뺣낫??CVE(Common Vulnerability Exposure)??寃쎌슦, 痍⑥빟?먯쓽 ?듭떖?곸씤 ?댁슜???먯뿰???뺥깭???ㅻ챸(description)???듯빐 ?쒖떆?쒕떎. ?대윭??CVE???ㅻ챸 ?뺣낫?? ?뺥삎?붾릺???덉? ?딆븘???⑥쐞 痍⑥빟??遺꾩꽍???꾪빐?쒕뒗 湲곗〈??CVE ?ㅻ챸 ?뺣낫?먯꽌 ?뱀젙 ?⑥뼱?ㅼ쓣 寃?됲븯???곗씠?곕? 遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 ?먯뿰??寃??諛??먮떒 湲곕쾿???꾩슂?섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰??寃??湲곕쾿???댁슜?섏뿬 ?⑥쐞 痍⑥빟??遺꾩꽍???쒖슜?????덈뒗 ?뚰봽?몄썾?대? ?ㅺ퀎?섍퀬 ?대? ?ㅼ젣 援ы쁽??寃곌낵瑜??뚭컻?섍퀬???쒕떎. 蹂??곌뎄??湲곗뿬?먯? ?ㅻ챸?꾩＜??痍⑥빟???쒗쁽???뺥삎?붾맂 ?뺥깭濡?蹂?섑빐 二쇰뒗 ?뚰봽?몄썾???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒕컻???덈떎.AV (Atomic Vulnerability) is a conceptual definition representing a vulnerability in a systematic way. AVs are defined with respect to its type, location, and result. It is important information for meaning based vulnerability analysis method. Therefore the existing vulnerability can be expressed using multiple AVs. CVE (common vulnerability exposures) which is the most well-known vulnerability information describes the vulnerability exploiting mechanism using natural language. Therefore, for the AV-based analysis, it is necessary to search specific keyword from CVE`s description and classify it using keyword and determination method. This paper introduces software design and implementation result, which can be used for atomic vulnerability analysis. The contribution of this work is in design and implementation of software which converts informal vulnerability description into formal AV based vulnerability definition.臾댁꽑 TCP ?깅뒫利앸?瑜??꾪븳 ?μ긽?????룺 痢≪젙 諛⑸쾿

The proposed object identification system is divided into two parts: image processing and text mining. The image processing part uses the Grabcut algorithm to extract the object from background in the area of interest. The extracted objects are analyzed through a text mining part. The implementation of the text mining part is divided
internally into two parts: crawling and filtering, and natural language processing. Crawling and filtering takes the HTML DOM of the page as a result of performing a Google image search and extracts and filters the necessary data. Natural language processing extracts the desired keywords by analyzing the filtered data. Finally, keywords that are related to the identified object and the object are displayed to induce the user to recognize the corresponding object through related keywords.2, 3李⑥썝 怨듦컯?뺣낫, ?숈쟻 ?쇱꽌?뺣낫?겹뀬 ?듯빀 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 ?ㅽ뵂?뚮옯???ㅺ퀎 諛⑹븞 ?곌뎄

Entering the 4th Industrial Revolution, real-world information is digitally converted, stored in cloud servers in the cyber world, and analyzed by artificial intelligence technology. In this study, the Sports Cyber Physical System (CPS) is proposed, where digital transformation takes place, based on the 4th Industrial Revolution. Although ICT is already being introduced and used in sports, sports CPS features deep learning for smarter data analysis. Since deep learning methods were announced in 2012, they have produced remarkable results in natural language processing and video signal processing areas such as voice recognition, voice synthesis, machine translation, document summary, and communication systems. In this paper, we presented convergence technologies that apply deep learning techniques that are continuously developing in natural language processing to sports data analysis. While detailed and accurate perception of sports behavior is the ultimate goal through sports CPS, research using deep learning is now at the beginning stage. We investigate methods to recognize human behavior in daily life and sports actions in specific domain. This paper also discusses studies on the team motion recognition and applications using deep learning.?뱀닔?쒖쟻吏瑜??댁슜??沅뚯킑?덈젴?꾨줈洹몃옩 媛쒕컻

?띾젰諛쒖쟾 怨좎옣寃異쒖쓣 ?꾪븳 ?좉꼍留?湲곕컲??怨좎옣寃異쒓린踰뺤쓽 鍮꾧탳 ?곌뎄

理쒖쟻 ?덉꽑吏?먯떆?ㅽ뀥??愿??湲곗큹 ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅吏?μ떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, ?뺤갹??Chang-Hyun Jung), [2012]

As real time information interchange through Internet increases, chatting language appeared by new research field of natural language processing. Chatting language must include together information interchange and conversation situation as function of fast information transmission media and written language. In the case of chatting language the number of vocabulary increases because a word of a meaning according to chatter's intention is various. This paper wishes to present lexical analysis way to computerize various vocabulary that is used in chatting.?명꽣?룹쓣 ?듯븳 ?ㅼ떆媛??뺣낫援먮쪟媛 ?섏뼱?섎㈃??梨꾪똿?몄뼱???먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ쓽 ?덈줈???곌뎄 遺꾩빞濡??깆옣?섏??? 梨꾪똿?몄뼱???좎냽???뺣낫?꾨떖 留ㅼ껜??湲곕뒫怨?臾몄옄?몄뼱濡쒖꽌 ?뺣낫援먮쪟? ????곹솴???④퍡 ?댄룷?댁빞 ?쒕떎. 梨꾪똿?몄뼱??寃쎌슦 諛쒗솕?먯쓽 媛쒖꽦???곕씪 ???섎????⑥뼱???쒓린踰뺤씠 ?ㅼ뼇?섏뿬 ?댄쐶?섍? 留롮븘吏꾨떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??梨꾪똿?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?ㅼ뼇???댄쐶瑜?而댄벂?곕줈 泥섎━?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?댄쐶 遺꾩꽍 諛⑹븞???쒖떆?섍퀬???쒕떎.二쇱슂?⑹뼱 : 梨꾪똿?몄뼱, ?먯뿰?댁쿂由? ?댄쐶遺꾩꽍.LS-SVM???뺤젣???쒗룷??踰≫꽣瑜??댁슜???덉륫援ш컙

?쒓뎅?먮즺遺꾩꽍?숉쉶, 議곗옣?? [2003] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

For high quality of software, it should be necessary for defining and analyzing the exact requirements at the early stage of software development. But readability and understandability of most natural language requirements are inaccurate and difficult for identifying use cases. The requirements are duplicated for objects or temrs with the same meaning. To solve this problem, it should need an effective way of requirement analysis based on linguistic and semantic textual analysis. In this paper, we propose to improve a semantic analysis method adopted with a linguist Fillmore?셲 linguistic mechanism. This method may expect to analyze easily readable and exactly understandable requirements specifications through modeling the goal oriented use cases with natural language based requirements.怨좏뭹吏덉쓽 ?뚰봽?몄썾?대? 媛쒕컻?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 媛쒕컻 珥덇린?④퀎???뺥솗???붽뎄?ы빆 ?뺤쓽 諛?遺꾩꽍???꾩슂?섎떎. 洹몃윭???遺遺꾩쓽 ?먯뿰??湲곕컲???붽뎄?ы빆 臾몄옣 ?쒗쁽? 遺?뺥솗?깃낵 ?댄빐???대젮???ㅼ젙?대떎. ?먰븳 ?붽뎄?ы빆? 媛숈? ?섎?瑜쇨?吏?媛앹껜???⑹뼱?ㅼ씠 以묐났 ?앸퀎?쒕떎. ?대? ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 怨좉컼 ?붽뎄?ы빆???몄뼱?숈쟻 諛??섎???臾몃㎘ 遺꾩꽍???듯븳 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?붽뎄?ы빆 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿???꾩슂?섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???붽뎄怨듯븰 ?몄뼱?숈옄??Fillmore???섎?濡좎쟻 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿???붽뎄怨듯븰???묐ぉ?섍퀬, ?섎?濡좎쟻 遺꾩꽍 媛쒖꽑 諛⑹븞???쒖븞?쒕떎. ??諛⑸쾿? ?먯뿰??湲곕컲???붽뎄?ы빆??Goal Oriented Use Case Modeling ?듯빐 ?쎄쾶 ?쎄퀬 ?댄빐 媛?ν븳 ?붽뎄 ?ы빆 遺꾩꽍??湲곕??쒕떎.LBS? 吏???뺣낫瑜??댁슜??誘몄븘諛⑹? ?쒕퉬?ㅼ뿉 愿???곌뎄

?쒓뎅?명꽣?룸갑?≫넻?좏븰?? ?⑹젙?? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒓뎅?명꽣?룸갑?≫넻?좏븰?? ?댁썝?? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

Dialog system is becoming a new dominant interaction way between human and computer. It allows people to be provided with various services through natural language. The dialog system has a common structure of a pipeline consisting of several modules (e.g., speech recognition, natural language understanding, and dialog management). In this paper, we tackle a task of domain classification for the natural language understanding module by employing machine learning models such as convolutional neural network and random forest. For our dataset of seven service domains, we showed that the random forest model achieved the best performance (F1 score 0.97). As a future work, we will keep finding a better approach for domain classification by investigating other machine learning models.??붿떆?ㅽ뀥? ?멸컙怨?而댄벂?곗쓽 ?곹샇?묒슜???덈줈???⑤윭?ㅼ엫???섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?먯뿰?대줈???곹샇?묒슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?멸컙? 蹂대떎 ?먯뿰?ㅻ읇怨??몃━?섍쾶 媛곸쥌 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾨┫ ???덇쾶 ?섏뿀?? ??붿떆?ㅽ뀥??援ъ“???쇰컲?곸쑝濡??뚯꽦 ?몄떇, ?먯뿰???댄빐, 臾몃㎘ ?뚯븙 ?깆쓽 ?щ윭 紐⑤뱢???뚯씠?꾨씪?몄쑝濡??대쨪吏?붾뜲, 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???먯뿰???댄빐 紐⑤뱢???꾨찓??遺꾨쪟 臾몄젣瑜??湲??꾪빐 convolutional neural network, random forest ?깆쓽 湲곌퀎?숈뒿 紐⑤뜽??鍮꾧탳?섏??? ?щ엺??吏곸젒 ?쒓퉭??珥?7媛??쒕퉬???꾨찓???곗씠?곗뿉 ??섏뿬 媛?臾몄옣???꾨찓?몄쓣 遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 ?ㅽ뿕???섑뻾?섏?怨?random forest 紐⑤뜽??F1 score 0.97 ?댁긽?쇰줈 媛???믪? ?깅뒫???ъ꽦??寃껋쓣 蹂댁??? ?ν썑 ?ㅻⅨ 湲곌퀎?숈뒿 紐⑤뜽?ㅼ쓣 異붽? ?ㅽ뿕?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?꾨찓??遺꾨쪟 ?깅뒫 媛쒖꽑??吏?랁븷 怨꾪쉷?대떎.?덈퉬?곸쑀?꾧탳?ъ쓽 李쎌쓽쨌?몄꽦 ?⑥뼇???꾪븳 媛뺤쥖 媛쒕컻???꾪븳 ?몄떇 諛??붽뎄??議곗궗

以묒냼湲곗뾽?듯빀?숉쉶, ?닿꼍?? [2019] [KCI?깆옱]

This paper deals with the analysis and application of sports data using deep learning. Entering the 4th Industrial Revolution, real-world information is digitally converted, stored in cloud servers in the cyber world, and analyzed by artificial intelligence technology. In this study, the Sports Cyber Physical System (CPS) is proposed, where digital transformation takes place, based on the 4th Industrial Revolution. Although ICT is already being introduced and used in sports, sports CPS features deep learning for smarter data analysis. Since deep learning methods were announced in 2012, they have produced remarkable results in natural language processing and video signal processing areas such as voice recognition, voice synthesis, machine translation, document summary, and communication systems. In this paper, we presented convergence technologies that apply deep learning techniques that are continuously developing in natural language processing to sports data analysis. While detailed and accurate perception of sports behavior is the ultimate goal through sports CPS, research using deep learning is now at the beginning stage. We investigate methods to recognize human behavior in daily life and sports actions in specific domain. This paper also discusses studies on the team motion recognition and applications using deep learning.蹂??쇰Ц? ?ъ링?숈뒿???댁슜???ㅽ룷痢??곗씠??遺꾩꽍怨??묒슜????댁꽌 ?ㅻ，?? 4李??곗뾽?곷챸?쒕????묒뼱?ㅻ㈃???꾩떎 ?멸퀎???뺣낫媛 ?붿??몃줈 蹂?섎릺???ъ씠踰??멸퀎???덈뒗 ?대씪?곕뱶 ?쒕쾭????λ릺怨? ?멸났吏??湲곗닠???섑빐 遺꾩꽍, 泥섎━?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??4李??곗뾽?곷챸湲곗닠??湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?ㅽ룷痢?遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?붿???蹂?섏씠 ?쇱뼱?섎뒗 ?ㅽ룷痢?CPS(Cyber Physical System)瑜??쒖븞?섏??? ?대? ?ㅽ룷痢좊텇?쇱뿉?쒕룄 ?뺣낫?듭떊湲곗닠???꾩엯?섏뼱 ?쒖슜?섏뼱 ?붿?留? ?ㅽ룷痢?CPS?먮뒗蹂대떎 吏?μ쟻???곗씠??遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 ?ъ링?숈뒿???꾩엯?섎뒗 寃껋씠 ?뱀쭠?대떎. 2012???ъ링?숈뒿 諛⑸쾿??諛쒗몴???댄썑 ?ъ링?숈뒿? ?뚯꽦?몄떇, ?뚯꽦?⑹꽦, 湲곌퀎踰덉뿭, 臾몄꽌?붿빟, ??붿떆?ㅽ뀥 ?깆쓽 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?遺꾩빞? ?곸긽?좏샇泥섎━ 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 愿꾨ぉ?좊쭔???깃낵瑜??닿퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰?댁쿂由?遺꾩빞?먯꽌 吏?띿쟻?쇰줈 諛쒖쟾?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?ъ링?숈뒿 湲곗닠???ㅽ룷痢??곗씠??遺꾩꽍???곸슜?섎뒗 ?듯빀湲곗닠???쒖떆?섏??? ?ъ링?숈뒿???댁슜???곌뎄???댁젣 留??쒖옉 ?④퀎?닿릿 ?섏?留? ?곌뎄??沅곴레?곸씤 紐⑺몴???ㅽ룷痢?CPS瑜??듯븳 ?몃??섍퀬 ?뺥솗???ㅽ룷痢??숈옉 ?몄떇?대씪 ?????덈떎. ?곗꽑 ?쇱긽?앺솢?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섎뒗?멸컙?됰룞 ?몄떇諛⑸쾿???댄렣蹂닿퀬, 踰붿쐞媛 ?쒖젙???곹솴?먯꽌???ㅽ룷痢??숈옉?몄떇?쇰줈 ?뺣??쒕떎. ?댁뼱??? ?숈옉?몄떇?쇰줈?뺤옣???щ??ㅺ낵 ?ъ링?숈뒿???댁슜???묒슜?ㅻ룄 ?쒖떆?쒕떎.?뱀닔?쒖쟻吏瑜??댁슜??沅뚯킑?덈젴?꾨줈洹몃옩 媛쒕컻

This paper proposes a retrieval system with expanded keyword from syntactically-analyzed structures of user?셲 natural language query based on natural language processing technique. Agglutinative languages provide a good ground for the syntactic tree-based natural language watermarking because syntactic constituent order is relatively free. Our proposed natural language watermarking method consists of seven procedures. First, we construct a syntactic dependency tree of unmarked text. Next, we perform clausal segmentation from the syntactic tree. Third, we choose target syntactic constituents, which will move within its clause. Fourth, we determine the movement direction of the target constituents. Then, we embed a watermark bit for each target constituent. Sixth, if the watermark bit does not coincide with the direction of the target constituent movement, we displace the target constituent in the syntactic tree. Finally, from the modified syntactic tree, we obtain a marked text. From the experimental results, we show that the coverage of our method is 91.53%, and the rate of unnatural sentences of marked text is 23.16%, which is better than that of previous systems. Experimental results also show that the marked text keeps the same style, and it has the same information without semantic distortion.?ㅺ낸 諛⑺뼢?깆쓣 怨좊젮???곸쓳???곸긽蹂듭썝
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?꾩슦?? [2009] [KCI?깆옱]

蹂멸퀬???꾧컻???ㅼ쓬怨?媛숈? 諛⑹떇?쇰줈 ?대（??吏꾨떎. ??1?μ뿉?쒕뒗 ?곕━媛 ?먮즺 遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 ?대줎??諛곌꼍?쇰줈 ?쇱쓣 蹂댄렪臾몃쾿??臾몃쾿泥닿퀎? ?깅┰ 諛곌꼍????섏뿬 ?뚯븘蹂닿퀬???쒕떎. ??2?μ뿉?쒕뒗 珥덇린 ?앹꽦臾몃쾿 (吏諛?寃곗냽?대줎)???대줎 ?댁뿉???섎Ц?ш뎄 ?대룞 洹쒖튃???대뼸寃??곸슜?섏뿀?붿?瑜??댄렣蹂대ŉ, 3?μ뿉?쒕뒗 珥덇린 洹쒖튃 泥닿퀎濡??ㅻ챸?섎뜕 ?섎Ц?ш뎄 ?대룞???앹꽦臾몃쾿??理쒓렐 ?대줎??理쒖닔二쇱쓽(Chomsky 1998,1999)?댁뿉???щ텇?앺빐蹂닿퀬?먰븳?? ???μ뿉?쒕뒗 2, 3?μ쓽 遺꾩꽍???듯븳 寃곕줎???꾩텧?섍퀬???쒕떎.En este articulo vamos a comparar el movimiento del sintagma Qu- del espaiiol y del coreano cuyo proceso se difiere uno al otro. El espaiiol, inchso el mglk y el franc&, es una lengua que siempre tiene el sintagma Qu- en la posici6n inicial de la oracibn; en cambio, en el coreano el sintagma Qu- no se mueve en su posici6n de base, lo cud1 tambikn se observa en el chino y el japonts. Segh la GramLica Universal, esta aparente diferencia se puede explicar de manera unitaria si captamos el mecanismo del movimiento Qu- que ofrece su teoria.
Para el anhlisis, tomaremos dos oraciones bkicas en las cuales el sintagma Qu- es el objeto del verbo: iQu6 compr6 Juan?; Chulsuga muutsl sanni?. Como es sabido, en las dos oraciones el objeto (qut y muut) se genera en la posicih del complement0 del verbo. si aceptamos que la oracion se proyecta hasta SComp (Chomsky 19811, el Espec del SComp ocupa el elemento Qu-, en este sentido el objeto Qu- del verbo comprar y sada debe rnoverse a la posicih del Espec del SComp. Pero, se puede preguntar porqut en coreano el sintagma Qu- no se mueve a esa posd6n.
Planteada esta pregunta, revisaremos la regla del movimiento Qu- desde el sistema de Chomsky (1981) hasta la dltima teoria del minimismo (Chomsky 1998, 1999). Criticaremos el mecanismo de la gramitica en base de las reglas y adoparemos el sistema de Cotejo (Checking) o Acuerdo (Agree) de 10s rasgos no interpretables del minimismo para poder explicar adecuadamente. Mediante este nuevo sistema de Cotejo (Acuerdo) el ndcleo C tiene el rasgo no interpretable y debe ser eliminddo bajo el Acuerdo con el rasgo interpretable que tiene el elemento Qu- que se encuentra en la oracih. En este caso, C de las dos lenguas elimina s u rasgo no interpretable con el elemento Qu- de manera unitaria, y la lrnica diferencia del orden de palabras que se observa en las dos se debe al rasgo W E del C. Chomsky (1998, 1999) afirma que el PPE es un rasgo no interpretable que se satisface por el rnovimiento de una categoria. A diferencia del PPE del I que es obligatorio, el PPE del C y del v es optional, asi que la diferencia mostrada en las dos lenguas s61o se debe al rasgo PPE del C. El sisterna de Acuerdo tiene la ventaja de simplificar las cornplejidades operativas puesto que todas las operaciones sintkticas se reduce en este sistema eliminando asi tanto el rnovirniento explicito corno el implicito.泥?끝 ?덊삎愿 援먯닔 ?뺣뀈?댁엫 湲곕뀗??: 泥?끝 ?덊삎愿 援먯닔 ?쎈젰

We extract keywords from the question using characteristic of question and keywords that are used in answer documents. And we assign differentiated weight to each keyword. Finally, we rank documents in order that answer documents can be ranked in high position using frequency of keywords and weight of documents. In experiment, we tested the number of answer documents that are ranked in top 5 for 20 questions. Experimental results show that the average number of answer documents that are ranked in top 5 was 3.05 and the accuracy of the proposed method was improved comparing with the existing method using frequency and proximity of keywords.?μ튂 諛?誘몃뵒??愿由щ? ?듯븳 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕 湲곕갑 諛깆뾽 諛?蹂듦뎄

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰??泥섎━???대젮????닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ㅼ썙?쒖? 遺덈━???곗궛???댁슜???꾨줈洹몃옒諛??몄뼱 ?먮룞 梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ㅺ퀎?섍퀬 援ы쁽?섏뿬 ?ㅽ뿕?쒕떎. ?꾨줈洹몃옒諛??몄뼱???뺥솗??臾몃쾿 泥댁젣? ?ㅼ썙?쒓? 議댁옱?쒕떎. ?대윭???뱀쭠???댁슜?섏뿬 蹂??쇰Ц? ?ㅼ썙?쒖? 遺덈━???곗궛???댁슜???꾨줈洹몃옒諛??몄뼱 ?먮룞 梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ㅺ퀎?섍퀬 援ы쁽?섏뿬 ?ㅽ뿕?쒕떎. ?꾨줈洹몃옒諛??몄뼱瑜??뺣떟 ?좏삎蹂꾨줈 7媛吏濡??섎늻怨??ㅼ썙???낅젰 ???묒냽?щ? ?뱀닔臾몄옄瑜??댁슜???낅젰?섍쾶 ?섏뿬 ?쇰━?앹쓣 諛붾줈 留뚮뱾???댁뼱 ?쎄쾶 ?곗궛??媛?ν븯寃??쒕떎. ?쒖븞???먮룞 梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 二쇨???梨꾩젏??媛앷??곸쑝濡???泥섎━?⑥쓣 蹂댁씠湲??꾪빐 而댄벂?곌났???꾧났 ?숈깮 10紐?????곸쑝濡?媛숈? ?쒗뿕???쒗뿕吏? ?뱀뿉 ?숈씪?섍쾶 ?묒떆?섍쾶 ???? 3紐낆쓽 ?대떦 援먯닔?먭쾶 梨꾩젏???섎ː?섍퀬 媛쒕컻???쒖뒪?쒖쑝濡?梨꾩젏?섏뿬 寃곌낵瑜?鍮꾧탳 遺꾩꽍?쒕떎. 二쇨???梨꾩젏?먯꽌 ?쒖슜?섎뒗 諛⑸????먯뿰??泥섎━瑜?諛곗젣?????덈룄濡??ㅼ썙?쒖? 遺덈━???곗궛???댁슜??諛⑹떇???쒖븞?섎?濡?援ы쁽???⑥쑉?깆쓣 ?믪씠怨?梨꾩젏???뱀쑝濡??닿??⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 梨꾩젏?먯쓽 二쇨???媛쒖엯??諛곗젣?섍퀬 寃곌낵瑜?鍮좊Ⅴ寃??쇰뱶諛??댁＜??媛앷??깃낵 ?좎냽?깆쓣 ?믪씠?붾뜲 紐⑹쟻???덈떎.The purpose of this paper is to design, implement and test the automatic marking system for programming languages using key-words and boolean operations to solve the processing problems of natural languages. There are accurate grammar systems and key-words in programming languages. Using these characteristics, We have designed, programmed竊?and tested automatic marking system for programming languages through key-words and boolean operations in this paper. We have categorized programming languages into 7 types as the type of answer and when a professor input any key-words, the system make him put conjunction with the special character. It can be logical expressions instantly so that the system easily operates. We asked 10 students who are majoring in computer engineering to take a test on the paper and web to show how well automatic marking system that we have programmed works. Then We requested 3 professors if the subject problems marked objectively. As a result , automatic marking system proved to be appropriate. We have proposed the way of using key-words and boolean operation for prohibiting huge natural language processing in marking of subjective question. It promotes efficiency rate of programming, objectivity and speed through the transferal to the web for marking since the system prohibits marker to include personal opinion on marking and gives feedback quickly.?붿빟 ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. 湲곗〈???꾨줈洹몃옩 ?먮룞 梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪??3. ?꾨줈洹몃옒諛??몄뼱???먮룞 梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒕??곕??붿뼱 ?듭떊???꾪븳 RTP ?⑦궥 湲곕컲???뺣????ㅻ뵒??鍮꾨뵒???숆린??湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅硫?곕??붿뼱?숉쉶, ?쒓킅??Kwang-deok Seo), [2009] [KCI?깆옱]

吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 吏덈Ц??????듭쓣 李얠븘二쇰뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖쑝濡? 湲곗〈??寃?됱뿏吏꾩씠 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 吏덉쓽?????愿?⑤맂 臾몄꽌??留곹겕留뚯쓣 李얠븘二쇰뒗 諛섎㈃ 吏덈Ц?????理쒖쥌?곸씤 ?듭쓣 李얠븘以?ㅻ뒗 李⑥씠?먯씠 ?덈떎. ?뱀젙 遺꾩빞??援?븳?섏? ?딄퀬 ?ㅼ뼇??吏덈Ц??泥섎━?댁＜???ㅽ뵂 ?꾨찓??吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?꾩슂???곌뎄?ㅼ씠 理쒓렐 ?먯뿰??泥섎━, ?멸났吏?? ?곗씠??留덉씠?????숆퀎???ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?ㅼ뿉???④굅??愿?ъ쓣 諛쏄퀬?덈떎. ?섏?留?愿???곌뎄?먯꽌???숈뒿 ?곗씠?곗뿉???놁뿀???⑥뼱?ㅼ씠 吏덈Ц??????뺥솗???듦낵 ?좎궗???ㅻ떟??援щ퀎?대궡?붾뜲 寃곗젙?곸씤 ??븷???????덉쓬?먮룄, ?대윭??泥섏쓬 蹂대뒗 ?⑥뼱?ㅼ쓣 紐⑤몢 ?⑥씪 ?좏겙?쇰줈 移섑솚?대쾭由щ뒗 臾몄젣媛 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??臾몃㎘ ?뺣낫瑜??듯빐 ?대윭??紐⑤Ⅴ???⑥뼱?????踰≫꽣瑜?怨꾩궛?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 洹몃━怨???Ц?뚮퉰??媛以묒튂瑜??쒖슜?섏뿬 臾몃㎘?뺣낫瑜????⑥쑉?곸쑝濡?泥섎━?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?띾????ㅽ뿕???듯빐 吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 紐⑤뜽 ?숈뒿 ?띾룄 諛??뺥솗?깆씠 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄??鍮꾪빐 ?μ긽?⑥쓣 ?뺤씤?섏???Question answering system (QA system) is a system that finds an actual answer to the question posed by a user, whereas a typical search engine would only find the links to the relevant documents. Recent works related to the open domain QA systems are receiving much attention in the fields of natural language processing, artificial intelligence, and data mining. However, the prior works on QA systems simply replace all words that are not in the training data with a single token, even though such unseen words are likely to play crucial roles in differentiating the candidate answers from the actual answers. In this paper, we propose a method to compute vectors of such unseen words by taking into account the context in which the words have occurred. Next, we also propose a model which utilizes inverse document frequencies (IDF) to efficiently process unseen words by expanding the system?셲 vocabulary. Finally, we validate that the proposed method and model improve the performance of a QA system through experiments.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 臾몄젣 ?뺤쓽SURE-based ?-Trous Wavelet Filter for Interactive Monte Carlo Rendering
