The aim of a conversational agent in mobile environment is to provide natural language interface and enable more natural interaction between a human and an agent. Constructing such an agent, it is required to develop various natural language understanding components and effective utterance generation methods. To understand spoken style utterance, we perform morphosyntactic analysis, shallow semantic analysis including modality classification and predicate argument structure analysis, and to generate a system utterance, we perform example based search which considers lexical similarity, syntactic similarity and semantic similarity.P2P ?섍꼍?먯꽌 蹂듯빀 ?ㅽ듃由??쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?ㅻ쾭?덉씠 硫?곗틦?ㅽ듃 ?ㅼ?以꾨쭅

Twitter is one of the most popular micro-blogging service and social media with a limit of 140 characters. If a user follows Twitter accounts continuously, the user may subscribe information more than the user can process. In this paper, we apply TextRank algorithm to alleviate information overload in Twitter user's timeline. After modeling user timeline as a graph, we apply graph-based ranking algorithm to the graph of timeline. Based on the score of each vertex, we apply concept of summit to summarizing user timeline. The experimental results show that proposed method summarizes user timeline more effectively than existing method that rely mainly on frequency based method.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?띿뒪????겕 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁愿怨?猿띿쭏???듯븳 ?곗씠??以묒떖 ?묎렐?쒖뼱 : SNS瑜??꾪븳 吏꾨낫???꾨씪?대쾭??紐⑤뜽

臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟 臾몄젣???ㅻ옖 湲곌컙 ?숈븞 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?곌뎄?섏뼱 ?붾떎. ?곕━??湲곗〈 而⑤낵猷⑥뀡 ?좉꼍留앹쓣 ?댁슜?덈뜕 ?곌뎄?먯꽌 ?섏븘媛, ?쒗솚 ?좉꼍留앹뿉 湲곕컲????臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟瑜??섑뻾?섏?怨?洹?寃곌낵瑜?醫낇빀?섏뿬 ?쒖떆?섎젮 ?쒕떎. 而⑤낵猷⑥뀡 ?좉꼍留앹? ?⑥링 而⑤낵猷⑥뀡 ?좉꼍留앹쓣 ?ъ슜?덉쑝硫? ?쒗솚 ?좉꼍留앹? 媛???깅뒫??醫뗫떎怨??뚮젮???덈뒗 ?κ린-?④린 湲곗뼲 ?좉꼍留앷낵 ?뚮줈???쒗솚 ?좊떅???쒖슜?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, 遺꾨쪟 ?뺥솗?꾨뒗 Multinomial Na챦ve Bayesian Classifier < SVM < LSTM < CNN < GRU???쒖꽌濡??섑??щ떎. ?곕씪???띿뒪??臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟 臾몄젣???쒗?ㅻ? 怨좊젮?섎뒗 寃?蹂대떎??臾몄꽌??feature瑜?異붿텧?섏뿬 遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 臾몄젣??媛源앸떎??寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?????덉뿀?? 洹몃━怨?GRU媛 LSTM蹂대떎 臾몄꽌??feature 異붿텧?????곹빀?섎떎??寃껋쓣 ?????덉뿀?쇰ŉ ?곸젅??feature? ?쒗???뺣낫瑜??④퍡 ?쒖슜????媛???깅뒫?????섏삩?ㅻ뒗 寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?????덉뿀??The classification problem in the field of Natural Language Processing has been studied for a long time. Continuing forward with our previous research, which classifies large-scale text using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), we implemented Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN), Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) and Gated Recurrent Units (GRU). The experiment?셲 result revealed that the performance of classification algorithms was Multinomial Na챦ve Bayesian Classifier < Support Vector Machine (SVM) < LSTM < CNN < GRU, in order. The result can be interpreted as follows: First, the result of CNN was better than LSTM. Therefore, the text classification problem might be related more to feature extraction problem than to natural language understanding problems. Second, judging from the results the GRU showed better performance in feature extraction than LSTM. Finally, the result that the GRU was better than CNN implies that text classification algorithms should consider feature extraction and sequential information. We presented the results of fine-tuning in deep neural networks to provide some intuition regard natural language processing to future researchers.?붿빟 Abstract 1. Introduction 2. Background 3. DatasetLarge-Scale Text Classification with Deep Neural Networks

?뺣낫寃?됱쓽 ?깃났?щ????곸젅??寃?됱뼱???좎젙???щ젮?덈떎怨??대룄 怨쇱뼵???꾨땲?? ?뱁엳 CD-ROM?대굹 ?⑤씪?몃ぉ濡앹떆?ㅽ뀥?먯꽌 二쇱젣寃?됱떆 遺꾨쪟?? 二쇱젣紐낃낵 媛숈? ?듭젣?댁? ?먯뿰????鍮꾪넻?쒖뼱??鍮꾧탳 ?곗쐞 臾몄젣???꾩쭅???쇰????섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂멸퀬?????쒖뒪?쒖쓽 寃?됲슚?⑥꽦??鍮꾧탳?섍린 ?꾪븯???뱁엳 ?ㅼ뼵???섍꼍?섏뿉?쒖쓽 寃?됱뼱 ?ъ슜??以묒젏???먭퀬 ?ㅼ뼇???뺥깭??寃?됱뼱?섎? 議곗궗 遺꾩꽍?섏???The purpose of this paper is to investigate search efficiency of controlled vocabulary versus uncontrolled vocabulary subject access in online catalog systems. The question of the effectiveness of controlled versus uncontrolled vocabulary in information retrieval has been raised in many literatures. A debate continues in the Library and Information Science Professions over the relative merit, appropriateness, and efficiency of uncontrolled vocabulary subject access in online catalog systems. Actually users used to combine uncontrolled vocabulary subject searching with controlled vocabulary subject searching. But the success of user's subject search depends on his choice of search terms. Also the technical developments that facilitate cooperation among information services in general make it increasingly possible for such cooperation to take place on an international level. In this study, several common types of vocabularies on online catalog systems are described and compared, especially usages of vocabularies in multilingual environment are analyzed.泥닿퀎?곸씤 ?뺣낫議곗궗 諛⑸쾿濡좎뿉 愿???곌뎄 -湲곗뾽?먯꽌???뺣낫?섏쭛 諛?遺꾩꽍??以묒떖?쇰줈-
?쒓뎅怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺣낫?곌뎄??怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺣낫?쇳꽣, 諛뺤쿋洹? [1995]
?⑤씪???곸슜 ?뺣낫寃?됱떆?ㅽ뀥??湲곕뒫遺꾩꽍 諛?ISO 8777怨쇱쓽 ?좎궗???됯? ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺣낫?곌뎄??怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺣낫?쇳꽣, ?꾩쁺誘? [1995]
怨쇳븰?≪???誘몃옒 : 怨쇨굅濡쒕???援먰썕
?쒓뎅怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺣낫?곌뎄??怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺣낫?쇳꽣, Schaffer, Ann C., [1995]

Much effort has been done to develop language translation system since translation work tends to be exceedingly boring and tedious. Therefore. it seems an obvious candidate for computerization. The objective of this study is to review overall and technical aspects for natural language processing and then to design one simple case model of English-French machine translation system by using turbo prolog For this purpose, lexical analysis, syntactic analysis and grammatical analysis has been done to construct the Structured English tree which works as a intermediate form of English-French sentence translation This Structured tree has been implemented and evaluated to see if it will work for translation from simple english sentence into simple french sentence. The results of the implementation come out to be successful, more or less. But the limitations of the model still exist One immediate limitation is the simplicity of the English and French grammars and vocabularies. Perhaps a more fundamental limitation of this study is its inability to understand the language it is processing. So for translating human language, or natural language, the program developed in this study still has a long way to go. Indeed, if the ultimate goal was to be able to translate full natural language, perhaps a radically different approach would be called for. However the approach used in this study is definately useful for processing artificial language: in particular, languages which are used to communicate with computers.紐⑹감 ?? ?쒖뼵 = 229 ?? ?먯뿰??泥섎━湲곗닠??媛쒖슂 = 231 ?? ?곷텋湲곌퀎踰덉뿭湲곗쓽 ?ㅺ퀎 諛?遺꾩꽍 = 246 ?? ?곷텋湲곌퀎踰덉뿭湲곗쓽 ?ㅽ뻾怨??됯? = 266?쒕뜡???대줎怨??烏볡쉪 ?녷옄

?섏〈 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍? ?먯뿰??臾몄옣??援ъ“??愿怨꾨? ?뚯븙?섎뒗 ?몄뼱 遺꾩꽍?????④퀎?대떎. ?섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 湲곕낯 紐⑤뜽? ?좏뻾 ?곌뎄?먯꽌 ?믪? ?깅뒫??蹂댁씠怨??덈뒗 ?ъ씤???ㅽ듃?뚰겕瑜??ъ슜?섏??? 洹몃━怨??섏〈 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍? ?섏〈 愿怨?諛??섏〈 愿怨꾨챸???숈떆??遺李⑺빐???섎?濡? 硫???쒖뒪??湲곕컲 ?숈뒿??吏꾪뻾?섏??? ?섏〈 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 ?깅뒫 媛쒖꽑???꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 寃껋? task specific ???먯쭏???뺥깭?? ?뚯젅 ?⑥쐞???쒓렇 遺꾪룷瑜??ъ슜?섏뿬 媛쒖꽑?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?뺥깭?? ?뚯젅 ?⑥쐞???쒓렇 遺꾪룷媛 ?⑥뼱瑜??쒗쁽?⑥뿉 ?덉뼱 留롮? ?뺣낫瑜?媛吏怨??덇린 ?뚮Ц???쒓렇 遺꾪룷瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?⑥뼱 ?쒖긽???뺤옣?섏??? 洹몃옒??踰좎씠?ㅻ씪???쒖뒪??蹂대떎 ?깅뒫 硫댁뿉??媛쒖꽑??UAS 90.93%, LAS 88.29%???뺥솗?꾨? 媛吏??紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎.Dependency parsing is a step in language analysis that predicts the syntax of sentences. For dependency parsing, the basic model used in this paper is the pointer network, which has performed well in previous research. Since dependency parsing requires to one attach the dependency pointing and dependency relation label at the same time, we apply a multitask learning technique to our dependency parsing. In order to improve the performance of dependency parsing, we propose to use the distributions of a task-specific morpheme and syllable-based relation labels. Since morphemeand syllable-based relation-label distributions have a lot of information in expressing words, we can extend the word representation by using the relation-label distribution. As a result, we propose a model that has better performance, UAS 90.93% and LAS 88.29%, than the baseline systems.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 蹂몃줎?⑤씪??寃뚯엫 ???좎? 媛??곹샇?묒슜 遺꾩꽍???듯븳 ?좎? ?댄깉 ?덉륫

蹂??쇰Ц? 寃뚯엫 ?꾨찓?몄뿉????肄뷀띁?ㅻ? ?댁슜?섏뿬 媛먯꽦?ъ쟾??援ъ텞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿怨?援ъ텞??媛먯꽦?ъ쟾???됯? 寃곌낵瑜?湲곗닠?쒕떎. 媛먯꽦?ъ쟾 援ъ텞???꾪빐 癒쇱? ?몄쐞???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍湲곕? ?댁슜??援?궡 ???ы꽭 ?ъ씠?몄쓽 寃뚯엫 愿????臾몄꽌瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?댄쐶瑜??섏쭛?섏뿬 媛먯꽦 ?ъ쟾 ?댄쐶 紐⑸줉??留뚮뱾?덇퀬, 紐⑸줉???덈뒗 ?⑥뼱??以??숈궗? ?뺤슜???덉궗???⑥뼱?ㅼ뿉 ???媛먯꽦 ?ъ쟾??援ъ텞?섏??? 援ъ텞??媛먯꽦 ?ъ쟾???됯?瑜??꾪빐 ?곸뼱 湲곕컲??Senti-word Net(SWN)???쒓?濡?踰덉뿭???쒓뎅??SWN???댁슜?섏뿬 ?뺣??꾩? ?ы쁽??媛믪쓣 怨꾩궛?섏??? ?됯? 寃곌낵 湲띿젙怨?遺??媛먯꽦??F-1媛믪뿉 ????됯퇏???뺤슜?ъ쓽 寃쎌슦 0.85, ?숈궗?????0.77??媛곴컖 蹂댁뿬 二쇱뿀??This paper describes an approach to building and evaluating a sentiment dictionary using a Web corpus in the game domain. To build a sentiment dictionary, we collected vocabulary based on game-related web documents from a domestic portal site, using the Twitter Korean Processor. From the collected vocabulary, we selected the words whose POS are tagged as either verbs or adjectives, and assigned sentiment score for each selected word. To evaluate the constructed sentiment dictionary, we calculated F1 score with precision and recall, using Korean-SWN that is based on English Senti-word Net(SWN). The evaluation results show that average F1 scores are 0.85 for adjectives and 0.77 for verbs, respectively.????ABSTRACT 1. ??濡?2. 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄 2.1 ?먯뿰??泥섎━Access Record瑜??쒖슜??寃뚯엫 遊뉕낵 ?좎? ?댄깉???곴?愿怨?遺꾩꽍

This paper proposes a retrieval system with expanded keyword from syntactically-analyzed structures of user's natural language query based on natural language processing technique. Through the steps combining or splitting the compound nouns based on syntactic tree traversal, and expanding the other-formed or shorten-formed keyword into multiple keyword, it shows that precision and correctness of the retrieval system was enhanced.臾댁꽑?명꽣???곗씠???쒕퉬??怨쇨툑 泥닿퀎 媛쒖꽑 ?곌뎄

First, We get extract utterance adjacency pairs from dialog corpus and show that the pair model is useful for dialog management. And, We investigated the pattern of travel agent?셲 response utterances to customer and suggest how machine can response to man as well as human agent for reaching dialog goal. Second, We experimented how semantic representation of man utterance can be made automatically and show it is also useful for increasing tagged corpus. 媛쒕뀗 洹몃옒?꾨뒗 媛쒕뀗 援ъ“(conceptual structures)瑜?洹몃옒?꾨줈 ?쒗쁽???쇰━ ?쒖뒪?쒖쑝濡??먯뿰??泥섎━???곹빀???щ윭 ?뱀꽦??吏?덇퀬 ?덈떎. 洹몃윭?? 媛쒕뀗 援ъ“??洹몃옒???쒗쁽? 媛쒕뀗 洹몃옒?꾩뿉 ????곗궛??蹂듭옟?꾨? 利앷??쒗궎怨??섎? ?쒗쁽???쇨???consistency)怨??좎씪??uniqueness)???껉쾶 ?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??媛쒕뀗 洹몃옒?꾩쓽 ?대윭??臾몄젣?먯뿉 ????먯꽭???댄렣蹂닿퀬 ?대? ?닿껐??媛쒕뀗 ?몃━???쒗쁽 諛⑸쾿??蹂댁씤?? ?쒗쁽???좎씪?깆쓣 ?꾪빐, 媛쒕뀗 ?몃━??以묒떖???좏뻾 ?쒗쁽(preorder expression)???섑빐 ?쒖빟?쒕떎. ?먰븳, ?쒗쁽???쇨??깆쓣 ?꾪빐 吏묓빀 李몄“???set referents)???뺤옣?섍퀬 ?대? ?ㅻ（湲??꾪븳 set join ?곗궛???ъ젙?섑븳?? ?곕━??媛쒕뀗 ?몃━媛 ?먯뿰??臾몄옣??????쒗쁽?μ쓣 ?좎??섎㈃???⑥쑉?곸엫??蹂댁씤??Conceptual graphs, which are a logic system and represent conceptual structures with graphs, have properties suitable for natural language processing. The graph representation of conceptual structures, however, increases the complexity of operations with conceptual graphs and loses the consistency and uniqueness of meaning representation. In this paper, we present these problems in detail and then we give representations in conceptual trees for resolving the problems. For the uniqueness, conceptual trees are restricted by preorder expression. For the consistency, we extend set referents and redefine the operation set join for manipulating them. We show that conceptual trees are efficient, keeping expressive power for natural language sentences.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 媛쒕뀗 洹몃옒?꾩쓽 ?몃━ ?쒗쁽 3. 媛쒕뀗 ?몃━??湲곕낯 ?쒗쁽怨??곗궛C++-based OODBPL?먯꽌 ?대옒?ㅼ쓽 遺꾨━瑜?吏?먰븯湲??꾪븳 援ы쁽 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 議곗??? [1999]

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯쭏 湲곕컲 援?援ъ“ 臾몃쾿 ?뺤떇???먯뿰??臾몃쾿 媛쒕컻???꾩슂???섍꼍???쒓났?섎뒗 GrammE瑜??뚭컻?쒕떎. 臾몃쾿 媛쒕컻 ?④퀎?먯꽌???띿뒪???뺤떇??臾몃쾿???명꽣?꾨━?명븯??援щЦ 遺꾩꽍???섍린 ?뚮Ц??臾몃쾿 ?섏젙 ??諛붾줈 臾몃쾿???뚯뒪?명븷 ???덉뼱 臾몃쾿 媛쒕컻???⑹씠??吏꾨떎. ?쇰떒 臾몃쾿 媛쒕컻???앸굹硫?GrammE???ы븿??臾몃쾿 而댄뙆?쇰윭瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 C++濡??곗뿬吏?援щЦ 遺꾩꽍湲??꾨줈洹몃옩???앹꽦?????덈떎. ?대젃寃??댁꽌 留뚮뱾?댁쭊 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍湲곕뒗 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍???꾩슂濡??섎뒗 ?щ윭 媛吏 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?쒖슜?????덈떎. GrammE???몄뼱 ?낅┰?곸씤 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠硫? ?꾩옱源뚯? ?쒓뎅??臾몃쾿怨?以묎뎅??臾몃쾿??媛쒕컻?섎뒗 ???ъ슜?섏뿀??This paper presents GrammE, a grammar development environment for feature-based APSG. At the stage of a grammar development, analysis are be done by interpreting the grammar under development, given in a text format, it is relatively easy to diagnose the grammar. Once developed, the grammar is compiled, by using the embedded grammar compiler, into a parser program written in C++. The parser program can be used in various types of natural language processing systems requiring syntactic analysis. GrammE is language-independent, and so far has been used for the development of Korean and Chinese grammars.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. GrammE??援ъ“ 3. 臾몃쾿 媛쒕컻 ?섍꼍紐⑤뱢吏꾪솕瑜??댁슜???⑥쑉?곸씤 吏꾪솕 ?섎뱶?⑥뼱 ?ㅺ퀎
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?⑷툑??Keum-Sung Hwang), [2004] [KCI?깆옱]

?명꽣?룹쓽 諛쒕떖濡??뱀긽???섎쭖? 臾몄꽌? ?뱀꽌鍮꾩뒪媛 湲됯꺽??利앷??섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?명꽣???ъ슜?먮뱾? ?뱀뿉???먰븯???뺣낫? ?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?띾뱷?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 媛곸쥌 釉뚮씪?곗??먯꽌 ?щ윭 ?④퀎???꾨줈洹몃옩 議곗옉 ?덉감瑜?諛섎났?섍퀬 ?ъ씠?몃쭏??怨좎쑀???쒕퉬??援ъ“?ㅼ쓣 ?댄빐???곹깭?먯꽌 ?щ윭 踰덉쓽 諛⑸Ц ?덉감?ㅼ쓣 嫄곗퀜???쒕떎. ?대윭???덉감?ㅼ? ?ъ슜?먯뿉寃?瑗??꾩슂???좏뻾 ?묒뾽?대ŉ, ?ъ슜?먭? ?ㅼ젣濡??쒕퉬???띾뱷??嫄몃━???쒓컙蹂대떎???좏뻾 ?묒뾽???뚯슂?섎뒗 ?쒓컙??????寃??꾩떎?대떎. ?대윭???쒓컙?뚯슂瑜?洹밸났?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?⑥닚 諛섎났?곸씤 ?묒뾽??蹂대떎 泥닿퀎?뷀븯怨??⑥닚?뷀븯湲??꾪븳 諛⑹븞?쇰줈 ?룻걧?대━ 湲곕컲????뷀삎 寃???먯씠?꾪듃瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞?섎뒗 ?먯씠?꾪듃???ъ슜?먯쓽 而댄벂?곗뿉???먯뿰??紐낅졊???ы븿?섎뒗 ?룻걧?대━瑜??듯빐 ?명꽣???ъ씠?멸? ?쒓났?섎뒗 ?ㅼ뼇???쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?띾뱷?섎뒗???뚯슂?섎뒗 ?щ윭 ?덉감?ㅼ쓣 ??됲븯寃??섍퀬, ?ㅼ닔???뱀궗?댄듃?????蹂묐젹 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ뱾 ?먰븳 ??됲븯寃??쒕떎. ???먯씠?꾪듃??IE? 媛숈? 踰붿슜 釉뚮씪?곗? ?댁뿉 ?뚮윭洹??몃릺???룻걧?대━瑜??대룆?섎ŉ, ?먯껜 ?꾨줈洹몃옩???듯븯?ъ꽌???ъ슜?먭? 吏?쒗븳 ?룻걧?대━瑜?遺꾩꽍?섏뿬, 蹂듭닔???먯껜釉뚮씪?곗??ㅼ쓣 ?듯빐 ?쒕퉬??寃곌낵瑜??띾뱷?섎룄濡?援ъ꽦?섏???Due to the development of Internet, number of online documents and the amount of web services are increasing dramatically. However, there are several procedures required, before you actually find what you were looking for. These procedures are necessary to Internet users, but it takes time to search. As a method to systematize and simplify this repetitive job, this paper suggests a DotQuery based interactive search agent. This agent enables a user to search, from his computer, a plenty of information through the DotQuery service, which includes natural languages, and it executes several procedures required instead. This agent also functions as a plug-in service within general web browsers such as Internet Explorer and decodes the DotQuery service. Then it analyzes the DotQuery from a user through its own program and acquires service results through multiple browsers of its own.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿?⑥뿰援?諛?媛쒖꽑諛⑹븞 ?? ?쒖븞 寃???먯씠?꾪듃???먯뿰??寃??泥섎━ 援ъ“紐⑤컮???쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 ?듯빀?뺣낫?쒖뒪?쒓낵 ??숈“吏??깃낵??愿???ㅼ쬆 ?곌뎄

諛⑸????묒쓽 ?곗씠?곕줈遺???뺣낫異붿텧???뺥솗?꾨? ?μ긽?쒗궎湲??꾪븳 留롮? 諛⑸쾿??媛쒕컻?섏뼱 ?붾떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌?봏ER(named entity recognition), 臾몄옣 異붿텧, ?ㅽ뵾移??쒓퉭怨?媛숈? ?щ윭 媛吏???먯뿰??泥섎━ ?묒뾽???듯빀?섏뿬 ?띿뒪?몃? 遺꾩꽍?섏??? ?곗씠?곕뒗 ?꾨찓?몄뿉 ?뱁솕???곗씠??異붿텧 ?먯씠?꾪듃瑜??ъ슜?섏뿬 ?뱀뿉???섏쭛???띿뒪?몃줈 援ъ꽦?섏?怨? ?꾩뿉???멸툒???먯뿰??泥섎━ ?묒뾽???ъ슜?섏뿬 鍮?援ъ“?붾맂 ?곗씠?곕줈遺???뺣낫瑜?異붿텧?섎뒗 ?꾨젅???뚰겕瑜?媛쒕컻?섏??? 議곗쭅 援ъ“???먯깋???꾪븳 ?앹뒪??異붿텧 諛?遺꾩꽍 愿?먯뿉???곌뎄???깅뒫???쒕??덉씠?섏쓣 ?듯빐 遺꾩꽍?섏??쇰ŉ, ?쒕??덉씠??寃곌낵, ?뺣낫異붿텧?먯꽌 MUC 諛?CoNLL怨?媛숈? ?ㅻⅨ NER 遺꾩꽍湲?蹂대떎 ?깅뒫???곗닔?⑥쓣 蹂댁???Many methods had been developed to improve the accuracy of extracting information from a vast amount of data. This paper combined a number of natural language processing methods such as NER (named entity recognition), sentence extraction, and part of speech tagging to carry out text analysis. The data source is comprised of texts obtained from the web using a domain-specific data extraction agent. A framework for the extraction of information from unstructured data was developed using the aforementioned natural language processing methods. We simulated the performanceof our work in the extraction and analysis of texts for the detection of organizational structures. Simulation shows that our study outperformed other NER classifiers such as MUC and CoNLL on information extraction.紐⑤컮???곗씠?곗꽌鍮꾩뒪?????吏遺덉쓽?ш툑??異붿젙
?쒓뎅?명꽣?룹젙蹂댄븰?? 怨좎갹??( Chang Youl Ko ), [2012] [KCI?깆옱]
SLM 湲곕컲??OFDM ?듭떊 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?꾪븳 怨꾩궛 蹂듭옟???媛?湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?명꽣?룹젙蹂댄븰?? 議곗닔踰?( Soobum Cho ), [2012] [KCI?깆옱]
?ы겢?쇱씠?명듃 ?섍꼍?먯꽌 ?대씪?곕뱶 而댄벂?낆쓣 ?댁슜??N-Screen ?몄뀡 愿由?湲곕컲??N-Screen ?쒕퉬???꾨젅?꾩썙??
?쒓뎅?명꽣?룹젙蹂댄븰?? ?꾩씠留뚯븬?섎씪?뚯궗?뚮Ⅴ ( Aymen Abdullah Alsaffar ), [2012] [KCI?깆옱]

We are facing Paradigm Shift proceeding from computing?릀entered Internet environment to human ?릀entered and natural language?릀entered ubiquitous computing age. Native Language Internet Address(NLIA) has the appearance of a gigantic infrastructure which is necessary to establish the human?릀entered and information?릓riented life environment by using Natural Language that is naturally used in the human daily life as the actual name. In this paper, I will investigate the developmental direction for future Internet address, deal with its background, its process and services. I will also discuss about Native Language Internet Address as the new concept Internet address and its influences on Internet Accessibility and Usability resolving and providing a solution method for information gap between the industrialized and under?릁eveloped nations. Moreover, I am going to suggest that Native Language Internet Address as one of the top core task of national policies for reinforcement of its ability to meet ubiquitous computing age for their citizens. Natural / Native Language Internet Address(NLIA) is providing the Internet address environment which Internet users can easily access to Internet information the users want by using their native language, not Domain Name which is difficult to memorize which consists of English and dot(.) extensions. The NLIA guarantees its strong points, that is, the uniqueness of the Internet address by output of constant uniformed results, regardless of users' Internet environment. Also, this guarantees compatibility with the existing domain system to maximum so that it can be used without modification or the need for change of an application, or installment of a new program. Native Language Internet Address System policy has to be considered in three aspects: These three factors ??the possibility for the world wide use from users' perspective ??making real name into Internet address and ??word and sentence of non?릈ierarchic form but flat form are main core items to success in taking a secure position as more user?릃riendly Internet address than the existing domain system. Meaning and Roles of Native Language Internet Address as Viewpoint of Korean Language and Korea : Making natural language into Internet address' has very important meaning in the aspects of language, culture, society, economy, race, nation, industry because it have grafted a language into IT technology. The NLIA represents not only the progress in web address technology and increase in userfriendly service but it also represents significant meaning in nationalism and culture for each of the countries around the globe. Korean Internet address symbolizes just how significant their own language ties to their national heritage, culture, and history. Korean Internet address also will play a significant part in closing the language difference occurring between South and North Korea due to the division of one race into two countries. The NLIA has great strength points. This will provide the motive to increase Internet users in the world again like the after effects of domain industry had made a new gigantic enterprise. It is natural that the native language Internet address will take a secure position as the human?릃riendly Internet address necessary to IPv6 times and ubiquitous times. If the NLIA is activated, Internet users will be extended to all classes regardless of sex, age and status. And it is possible that Native Language Internet Address Project will be the most proper solution for the achievement because all people who know the native language address can easily access to Internet by NLIA. If a nation accepts NLIA and uses it as a motive for development of the national future industry, it will go into a situation where the foundation of Internet users is expanded while the related industries will be developed and the national economic growth in geometric progression. It is expected that in our social classes, the solution for informational gap and the realization of the Electronic Government will make a contribution in the formation of South and North Korea Community. Maybe we can solve the barrier of 50 years in Internet age with Hangul as a medium because Internet address window is the input window for sharing 'Spirit of Korean' with Hangul. Recently, Hangul Internet address has been used in places such as in Hawaii and Yanbian, China. Hangul Internet address has firmly played a role as the infrastructure to tie Korean People with 'Hangul'. With the distribution of Native Language Internet Address into the global market in 21st century, we can assist in leading the global effort of ubiquitous computer generation.Abstract 1. ?ㅼ뼱媛??留?2. ?명꽣?룹＜?뚯쓽 蹂泥?2.1 而댄벂?곗쨷?ъ떆? ?명꽣?룹＜??2.2 ?꾨찓?몃꽕?꾧낵 ?먭뎅?댁씤?곕꽬二쇱냼?듭씪 U?륦orea 嫄댁꽕???꾪븳 怨쇱젣?먰쁽?⑷낵 ??묐갑??

怨좏뭹吏덉쓽 ?뚰봽?몄썾?대? 媛쒕컻?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 媛쒕컻 珥덇린?④퀎???뺥솗???붽뎄?ы빆 ?뺤쓽 諛?遺꾩꽍???꾩슂?섎떎. 洹몃윭???遺遺꾩쓽 ?먯뿰??湲곕컲???붽뎄?ы빆 臾몄옣 ?쒗쁽? 遺?뺥솗?깃낵 ?댄빐???대젮???ㅼ젙?대떎. ?먰븳 ?붽뎄?ы빆? 媛숈? ?섎?瑜?媛吏?媛앹껜???⑹뼱?ㅼ씠 以묐났 ?앸퀎?쒕떎. ?대? ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 怨좉컼 ?붽뎄?ы빆???몄뼱?숈쟻 諛??섎???臾몃㎘ 遺꾩꽍???듯븳 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?붽뎄?ы빆 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿???꾩슂?섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???붽뎄怨듯븰 ?몄뼱?숈옄??Fillmore???섎?濡좎쟻 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿???붽뎄怨듯븰???묐ぉ?섍퀬, ?섎?濡좎쟻 遺꾩꽍 媛쒖꽑 諛⑹븞???쒖븞?쒕떎. ??諛⑸쾿? ?먯뿰??湲곕컲???붽뎄?ы빆??Goal Oriented Use Case Modeling ?듯빐 ?쎄쾶 ?쎄퀬 ?댄빐 媛?ν븳 ?붽뎄 ?ы빆 遺꾩꽍??湲곕??쒕떎.For high quality of software, it should be necessary for defining and analyzing the exact requirements at the early stage of software development. But readability and understandability of most natural language requirements are inaccurate and difficult for identifying use cases. The requirements are duplicated for objects or temrs with the same meaning. To solve this problem, it should need an effective way of requirement analysis based on linguistic and semantic textual analysis. In this paper, we propose to improve a semantic analysis method adopted with a linguist Fillmore's linguistic mechanism. This method may expect to analyze easily readable and exactly understandable requirements specifications through modeling the goal oriented use cases with natural language based requirements.AHP瑜??댁슜??紐⑤컮??硫붿떊???二쇱슂 ?깃났?붿냼 ?됯?

For this, in this paper, a survey of technical methods for inspecting of program source code plagiarism, analysis of natural languages plagiarism types and existing inspection methods are accomplished. Also, author verification system and plagiarism detection about ancient literatures or art works is proposed because of ancient literatures or art works are important in the aspect of cultural properties control, protecting of author's intellectual property and owner's property estimation.?붿빟

But, natural language requirements of a client have ambiguity, inaccuracy, and inconsistency. To solve these problems, natural language requirements are modeled with modeling language such as UML and Simulink. During a modeling phase, the requirements are rearranged and retranslated in use-case. These activities are disadvantages of modeling. In this paper, we propose the technique, which is how to model a embedded system requirement into a model without rearranging and retranslating. This technique 1) represent a embedded system requirement with graphical language, and 2) model a requirement into a model. Because this technique only describes "what-to-do" of the requirement, this technique is useful to not only the low-level requirements but also the high-level requirements. We show some example systems modeled by REED, which has adopted this technique.XForms ?섏씠吏???묎렐?쒖뼱瑜??꾪븳 怨듭쑀 議곌굔?앹쓽 ?⑥쑉??怨꾩궛 諛⑸쾿

The natural language processing is one of the aspects of HCl. This paper presents the method of design and implementation of SENKOV( Semantic Networks for Korean Verbs) System, which deals with isa hierarchies of Korean verbs for the natural language processing. The system``s architecture is based on the differential theory and Levin verb classes. This paper selects about 600 Korean verbs which are commonly used in the daily life, and implements the SENKOV System. The experiments show that SENKOV has 44 top nodes and depth of about 2.35. In addition this paper applied the SENKOV System to co-occurrence constraint relationship among a adverbs and verbs, and proves the validity of the system. This paper is important in that it has made the first trial to classify Korean verb concept for HCl.?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?됱씤??異붿텧???꾪븳 ?⑹꽦紐낆궗 ?앹꽦 諛⑹븞??????곌뎄

湲곗〈???곗씠?踰좎씠???쒖뒪?쒕뱾? 臾닿껐??洹쒖튃???쒗쁽???꾪븳 ?몄뼱瑜??쒓났?섍퀬 ?덉쑝???遺遺??쇱감 ?쇰━?앹쓽 ?쒗쁽 諛⑹떇怨??좎궗???뺥깭濡??쒗쁽?댁빞?섎뒗 ?대젮???寃れ뼱?붾떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???대? ?꾪빐 ?ъ슜?섍린 ?명븯硫?諛곗슦媛 ?쎄퀬 ?뱁엳 ?쒓? ?먯뿰?댁뿉 湲곕컲?????쒓? ?쇰━ ?몄뼱瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒓? ?쇰━ ?몄뼱???뺤떇 ?몄뼱媛 媛뽮퀬 ?덈뒗 紐낇솗?깃낵 鍮꾨え?몄꽦 洹몃━怨??먯뿰?닿? 媛뽮퀬 ?덈뒗 ?좎슜?깆쓣 紐⑤몢 媛뽮퀬 ?덈떎. ?먰븳 踰붿쐞 ?쒗븳???쇱감 ?쇰━?앹쓽 ?뱀쭠??媛뽮퀬 ?덉쑝硫??댁뿉 ???利앸챸???쒖떆?쒕떎. ?쒓? ?쇰━ ?몄뼱瑜??ㅼ젣 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?ъ슜?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?쇱감 ?쇰━?앹씠??湲고? 臾닿껐??洹쒖튃 ?쒗쁽 ?몄뼱濡쒖쓽 踰덉뿭???꾩슂?섎ŉ ??以??쇱감 ?쇰━?앹쑝濡쒖쓽 踰덉뿭???꾪븳 踰덉뿭湲곕? 媛쒕컻?섏???Previous database systems provide languages for describing ICs (integrity constraints), but most of which resemble the first order logic formula, and so people generally find it hard to express their thoughts using them. In this paper, we propose Korean-like logic language which is based on Korean syntax and is easier to use and learn. The proposed language is a formal user language which is definite and unambiguous, and can be used friendly like natural languages. We also show that the proposed language always have the same semantics as the range-restricted first-order logic. To use this language in practical systems, it is required to translate the sentences written in this language into first order logic or other IC description languages. And we have developed a translation module that translates the proposed language into the first order logic.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. IC ?쒗쁽 ?몄뼱 3. ?쒓? ?쇰━ ?몄뼱硫?곕??붿뼱 DBMS ALPHA瑜??꾪븳 ?대━?ㅽ떛 吏덉쓽 泥섎━ ?ㅽ궡

蹂??쇰Ц? ?⑦넧濡쒖? ?ㅽ궎留??몃━?뚯쓽 ?섎?瑜??ы븿?섎뒗 臾몄옣?섏쭛 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?⑦넧濡쒖????ㅽ궎留??몃━?뚯쓣 ?곕Ⅴ???ㅻ웾???몄뒪?댁뒪 ?몃━?뚯씠 ?덇퀬, ?대뱾 ?몄뒪?댁뒪 ?몃━?뚯? ?ㅼ꽭怨꾩뿉???먯뿰??臾몄옣?뺥깭濡??깆옣?????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???대윭???몄뒪?댁뒪 ?몃━???뺣낫瑜??쒖슜?섏뿬 二쇱뼱吏??ㅽ궎留??몃━?뚯쓽 ?섎?瑜??ы븿?섎뒗 臾몄옣???섏쭛?쒕떎. ?몄뒪?댁뒪 ?몃━?뚯씠 ?먯뿰??臾몄옣?쇰줈 ?쒗쁽?????뱀젙 ?쒗쁽???ㅼ뼇???섎?瑜??ы븿?섍굅???섎굹???섎?媛 ?ㅼ뼇???뺥깭濡??쒗쁽?섎뒗 紐⑦샇?깆씠 ?덈떎. ?대윭??紐⑦샇??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?⑦넧濡쒖?? 臾몄꽌媛꾩쓽 紐낆떆?곸씤 ?곌껐?뺣낫? ?ㅻ웾???몄뒪?댁뒪 ?몃━???뺣낫瑜??쒖슜?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕?먯꽌??DBpedia瑜??쒖슜?섏??쇰ŉ, ?쒖븞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿??湲곗〈 ?곌뎄??鍮꾪빐 ?믪? ?뺥솗瑜좉낵 ?ы쁽瑜좎쓣 蹂댁???This paper proposes a method for collecting sentences which entail ontology schema triple. Many of instance triples conform to the schema triple of an ontology, these instance triples can present in the form of natural language sentences on the real world. In this paper, we use the information of instance triples for collecting sentences containing meaning of a schema triple. When instance triples are represented as the natural language form, there are several ambiguities which have multiple meanings, or the meaning of an expression appears in various forms. In order to solve these ambiguities, our method uses the explicit connection information between an entity of an instance triple and a document, and also makes full use of instance triples information. We experimented with the DBpedia. The result showed that as the instance triples increase, it was possible to collect the various predicate expressions and it showed the improved recall and precision compared with existing method of research.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 媛쒖껜??紐⑦샇???닿껐???꾪븳 ?묎렐怨쇱젙?⑦넧濡쒖???鍮꾨끉由ъ쟻 媛쒕뀗???좊컻?섎뒗 怨듬━ ?먯? 湲곕쾿

理쒓렐 ???곗씠?곕? 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?먮룞?곸쑝濡?吏?앸쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿?ㅼ씠 ?곌뎄?섍퀬 ?덉?留? ?밸뜲?댁??곗쓽 遺덉셿?꾩꽦?쇰줈 ?명빐 ?쇰? ?곗씠?곌? ?꾨씫?섍굅???ㅻⅨ ?곗씠?곗????곌껐??遺議깊븳 寃쎌슦媛 諛쒖깮?쒕떎. ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄?ㅼ? ?먯뿰???꾨쿋?⑹쓣 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?멸났 ?좉꼍留앹쓣 ?듯빐 ?숈뒿?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿?ㅼ쓣 ?쒖븞?덈떎. ?섏?留??ㅼ젣濡??ъ슜?섎뒗 留롮? 吏?앸쿋?댁뒪??寃쎌슦 ?먯뿰??留먮춬移섍? 議댁옱?섏? ?딆븘 ?뷀떚???꾨쿋?⑹뿉 ?대젮????덈떎. ?곕씪??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???대윭??臾몄젣?먯쓣 ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 吏??踰좎씠?ㅼ쓽 RDF ?곗씠?곕? 臾몄옣 ?뺥깭??RDF-Sentence濡?蹂?????꾨쿋?⑹뿉 ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?⑥뼱 踰≫꽣瑜??앹꽦?섍퀬 ?좉꼍留앹쓣 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 吏???꾩꽦 湲곕쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쒖븞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???깅뒫??痢≪젙?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?몃━??遺꾨쪟 ?ㅽ뿕??吏꾪뻾?덈떎. 湲곗〈 NTN 紐⑤뜽怨?鍮꾧탳 ?ㅽ뿕???섑뻾?섏?怨? 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄蹂대떎 ?됯퇏?곸쑝濡?15% ?믪? ?뺥솗?꾨? ?살뿀?? ?먰븳, ?쒓뎅??理쒕? 吏??踰좎씠?ㅼ씤 WiseKB 吏??踰좎씠?ㅼ뿉 ?곸슜?섏뿬 88%???뺥솗?꾨? ?살뿀??In recent years, a number of studies have been conducted for the purpose of automatically building a knowledge base that is based on web data. However, due to the incomplete nature of web data, there can be missing data or a lack of connections among the data entities that are present. In order to solve this problem, recent studies have proposed methods that train a model to predict this missing data through an artificial neural network based on natural language embedding, but there is a drawback to embedding entities. In practice, natural language corpus is not present in many knowledge bases. Therefore, in this paper, we propose a knowledge completion method that converts the knowledge base of RDF data into an RDF-sentence and uses embedding to create word vectors. We conducted a triple classification experiment in order to measure the performance of the proposed method. The proposed method was then compared with existing NTN models, and on average, 15% accuracy was obtained. In addition, we obtained 88%accuracy by applying the proposed method to the Korean knowledge base known as WiseKB.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?곌뎄 ?댁슜Nested Kernel??而ㅻ꼸肄붾뱶 諛?硫붾え由щ낫??痍⑥빟??遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?꾩씡(Hyunik Kim), [2018] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

蹂멸퀬?먯꽌??Culioli???쒖닠쨌?몄닠?곗궛?묒슜?대줎?먯꽌 ?몄뼱?숈쓽 ??? ???④퀎 ?쒖긽泥닿퀎, 臾댁쓽?앹쟻 硫뷀??몄뼱?쒕룞, 遺덈????깆쓽 紐?紐?媛쒕뀗???대줎?곸쑝濡?怨좎같??蹂대뒗 寃껋쓣 洹?紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?쒕떎. `?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?ㅼ뼇?깆쓣 ?듯빐 ?뚯븙???몄뼱?쒕룞??怨쇳븰?곸씤 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈 ?곌뎄?섎뒗 ?숇Ц`?대씪怨??몄뼱?숈쓣 ?덈∼寃??뺤쓽?섎㈃?? ?몄뼱?쒕룞???몄뼱?숈쓽 ??곸뿉 ?ы븿?쒗궎怨??덈떎. ?뺤떊???쒖긽泥닿퀎??1?④퀎, ?몄뼱?숈쟻 ?쒖긽泥닿퀎??2?④퀎, 硫뷀??몄뼱 ?쒖긽泥닿퀎??3?④퀎濡??섏뼱 ?덈뒗 ???④퀎???쒖긽泥닿퀎瑜??쒖떆?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥, ?몄뼱?숈쓽 吏?꾨? ???뺤쓽?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?몄닠???섎?瑜??ъ갑?섍린 ?꾪빐???몄뼱?쒕룞???섎뒗 二쇱껜媛 ?먯떊???ъ갑?섍린 留ㅼ슦 ?대젮???몄닠 ?앹궛 ?쒕룞??臾댁쓽?앹쟻 硫뷀??몄뼱?쒕룞???쒕떎. ??臾댁쓽?앹쟻 硫뷀??몄뼱?쒕룞???대뼸寃?湲곕뒫?섎뒗媛瑜??댄렣蹂대뒗 寃껋씠 諛붾줈, ?몄뼱??湲곕뒫??蹂몄쭏???ㅻ챸??二쇨퀬 ?몄뼱??議댁옱???댁쑀?먯껜瑜??ㅻ챸??二쇰뒗 寃껋씠???섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?ㅼ뼇?깃낵 ?뱀닔?깆쓣 怨좊젮?섎㈃??硫대???愿李곗쓣 ?듯빐???먯뿰???덉뿉 ?ㅼ뼱?덈뒗 遺덈??뚮? 李얠쑝?ㅺ퀬 ?섎뒗 寃껋씠 ?쒖닠쨌?몄닠?곗궛?묒슜?대줎??紐⑹쟻?꾩쓣 ?댄렣蹂댁븯??The purpose of this study is to examine theoretically the basic concepts of Culioli`s predicative and enunciative operation theory (theorie des operations predicatives et enonciatives), including objects of linguistics, phased representation activities, unconscious meta activities and `invariants`. Culioli returns the language activity to the object of linguistics by newly defining linguistics as the scientific study of language activities apprehended with the diversity of natural languages. He also redefines the status of linguistics by suggesting three stages of representation activities: the mental representation stage; the linguistic representation stage (the trace of mental representation); and the metalanguage representation system. He explains this in order to examine how `epilinguistique` is possible for the `enonciateur`, which is very difficult to pick up, even for himself, thereby revealing the fundamental functions of the language and the reason for its existence.
The ultimate purpose is to discern the `invariant` in natural language by close observation, with attention to the diversity and uniqueness of natural languages.
Reviews and discussions are set forth in sections of this study with respect to Culioli`s predicative and enunciative operation theory.?롮삤?濡쒌륁뿉 ?섑???吏덊닾???щ━??

洹몃９?섏궗寃곗젙吏?먯떆?ㅽ뀥? ?щ윭 ?곹솴?먯꽌 洹몃９???⑥쑉怨?留뚯”??利앷??쒗궎硫댁꽌 ?뚯쓽???쒓컙??以꾩뿬二쇰뒗 寃껋쑝濡??섑??섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?ㅼ쓬怨?媛숈? 吏꾨낫??湲곗닠??寃고빀???듯빐??洹몃９???⑥쑉? ?붿슧 利앷???寃껋씠?? 1) ?щ윭 ?몄뼱瑜??ъ슜?섎뒗 洹몃９???꾪븳 ?먯뿰??踰덉뿭 湲곗닠, 2) ?⑤씪???곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪濡쒕????뺣낫瑜?寃?됲빐?닿퀬 ?뚯쓽 ?숈븞 ?앹꽦??吏꾩닠?대굹 ?쇳룊??紐⑥븘???뺣━?섍린 ?꾪븳, 吏???由ъ씤???뺥깭濡?媛쒕컻???먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠, 3) 湲?? ?뚮━, 洹몃옒?? 洹몃━怨?洹멸쾬?ㅼ쓽 議고빀怨?媛숈? 寃껊뱾濡????띾???誘몃뵒???먯썝?쇰줈遺???뺣낫瑜?寃?됲빐?대뒗 ?섎떒?쇰줈?쒖쓽 ?섏씠?쇰??붿뼱 湲곗닠, 4) ?붿슧 ?ъ슫 肄붾찘???낅젰怨???붾? ?꾪븳 ?뚯꽦?몄떇 湲곗닠, 洹몃━怨?5) 癒?嫄곕━??嫄몄튇 遺꾩궛???섍꼍????붿떆?ㅽ뀥?먯꽌 ?붿슧 鍮좊Ⅴ怨??띾?????붾? ?꾪븳 吏꾨낫???먭굅由ы넻??湲곗닠. ?대윭??湲곗닠?ㅼ? 洹몃９ ?묒뾽???⑥쑉???믪뿬以?肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲??洹몃９?섏궗寃곗젙?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?⑥젏??洹밸났?????덇쾶 ?쒕떎. ???쇰Ц????먮? ?ы븿?섎뒗 誘몄떆?쒗뵾 ??숈쓽 ?곌뎄?먮뱾??媛源뚯슫 ?λ옒??洹몃９?섏궗寃곗젙吏?먯떆?ㅽ뀥??寃고빀??紐?媛쒖쓽 吏꾨낫??湲곗닠?ㅼ쓣 媛쒕컻?섍퀬 ?ㅽ뿕?섏??? 洹?寃곌낵濡쒖꽌 吏?κ렇猷뱀쓽?ш껐?뺤??먯떆?ㅽ뀥???뺥깭媛 ?쒖븞?섏뿀?? ?ㅻⅨ 湲곗닠?ㅻ룄 洹몃９?섏궗寃곗젙吏?먯떆?ㅽ뀥??寃고빀?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?곌뎄?섏뿀?? 誘몃옒???대윭??湲곗닠?ㅼ씠 洹몃９?섏궗寃곗젙吏?먯떆?ㅽ뀥???묐ぉ??寃껋씠?? ???곌뎄???대윭??媛곴컖??湲곗닠?ㅺ낵 洹?湲곗닠?ㅼ씠 誘몃옒??洹몃９?섏궗寃곗젙吏?먯떆?ㅽ뀥???쒓린???쇱젏?ㅼ뿉 ??섏뿬 遺꾩꽍?쒕떎. ???곌뎄???먰븳 ?대윭??媛곴컖??湲곗닠?ㅺ낵 洹?湲곗닠?ㅼ씠 誘몃옒??洹몃９?섏궗寃곗젙吏?먯떆?ㅽ뀥???쒓린???쇱젏?ㅼ뿉 ??섏뿬 遺꾩꽍?쒕떎. ???곌뎄???먰븳 ?대윭???붿슧 吏꾨낫??湲곗닠?ㅼ씠 ?⑸퀝???꾨줈?좏???洹몃９?섏궗寃곗젙吏?먯떆?ㅽ뀥???쒖븞?쒕떎.Group decision support systems (GDSSs) has been shown to reduce meeting time while increasing group effectiveness and satisfaction in many situations. Further increases in effectiveness may be achieved via the incorporation of advanced technologies such as: 1) natural language translation for multilingual groups, 2) natural language processing in the forms of intelligent agents for retrieving information from on-line databases, and consolidating comments generated during the meeting; 3) hypermedia as a means of retrieving information from richer media sources such as text, sound, graphics, or a combination of these; 4) speech recognition for easier comment entry and communication; and 5) advanced telecommunication for faster and richer distributed communication over long distances. These technologies might also give a way to overcome limitations in GDSSs. Some of the advanced technologies that will be incorporated with GDSSs in the near future were developed and experimented by the author of this paper and researchers at the University of Mississippi. The results propose intelligent GDSSs. The others have been studied to be combined with GDSSs. These technologies promise the future of GDSSs. This paper discusses each of these technologies and the issues that they bring to the future of group decision support systems. This paper also proposes prototype GDSSs incorporated with these more advanced technologies.?깆옣, ?ъ옄湲고쉶吏묓빀怨??щТ?뺤콉???곹샇愿?⑥꽦??愿???ㅼ쬆???곌뎄
?몄궛??숆탳, ?좊쾾以, [1998]
Entry Mode Selection by Korean FDI Firms
?몄궛??숆탳, Huh, Young-Doh, [1998]
Comparison of Sales Response Models
?몄궛??숆탳, Kim, Doyle, [1998]

This paper explores the various types of referring expressions and the method of resolving them in a man-machine dialogue system. The types of anaphora include the pronominal, definite noun phrase, count noun, bound noun, and anaphoric verb. Anaphora used in a dialogue refer to the information that a speaker and a hearer share. Specifically, we show unrecent anaphoric phenomena in the task-oriented dialogue, and propose a anaphora processing method for natural language processing in the level of discourse.?묒냽遺??"洹몃윭?????섎?

?명꽣???ъ씠?몄쓽 ?뺣낫?됱씠 利앷??⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?뺣낫?쒓났???꾩슂?깆씠 而ㅼ?怨??덉쑝?? ?遺遺꾩쓽 ?ъ씠?몄뿉???쒓났?섎뒗 ?듭떖?댁쓽 遺덈━??議고빀??湲곕컲?????뺣낫寃?됯린踰뺤? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?섎룄瑜??쒕?濡??쒗쁽?섍린 ?대졄湲??뚮Ц??吏?섏튂寃?留롪굅???섎룄?섏? ?딆? 寃?됯껐怨쇰? ?산린 ?쎈떎??臾몄젣媛 ?덈떎. ???쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰????붾? ?듯븯???ъ슜?먯뿉寃?蹂대떎 ?뺥솗?섍퀬 移쒖젅?섍쾶 ?뺣낫瑜??쒓났?????덈뒗 ??뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ???먯씠?꾪듃???먯뿰??吏덉쓽???좏븳?곹깭 ?ㅽ넗留덊?瑜??곸슜?섏뿬 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 吏덉쓽?섎룄瑜??뚯븙?섍퀬 ?대? ?듬?吏?앹쓽 援ъ“???⑦꽩留ㅼ묶???쒖슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥, ?댁닚蹂?붿뿉 媛뺢굔?섍퀬 吏덉쓽?섎룄??遺?⑺븯???듬????쒓났?쒕떎. ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?좎슜?깃낵 媛?μ꽦???뚯븘蹂닿린 ?꾪븯??媛꾨떒?????섏씠吏瑜??뚭컻?섎뒗 臾몄젣???곸슜??寃곌낵, ?먯씠?꾪듃媛 ?뺥솗?섍퀬 移쒓렐?섍쾶 ?묐떟?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?????덉뿀??As the amount of information on Internet sites increases, it becomes more necessary to provide information in efficient ways. However, information search methods based on Boolean combination of keywords that most sites provide are difficult to express user's intention adequately so that there are numerous unexpected search results. This paper proposes a conversational agent that provides users with accurate information in a friendly manner through natural language conversation. The agent recognizes user's intention by applying finite state automata to natural language queries, utilizes the intention for structured pattern matching with response knowledge, and thus provides answers that are robust against changes in word order and consistent with the user's intention. To show its practical utility, the agent is applied to the problem of introducing a Web site. The results show that the conversational agent has the ability to provide accurate and friendly responses.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?諛?媛쒖꽑諛⑹븞 3. ??뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃 ?쒖뒪?쒖궗?⑹옄 ?뺣낫??湲곕컲??XML臾몄꽌 ?꾨떖 ?쒖뒪??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?좎긽??Sang Won Yoo), [2003] [KCI?깆옱]

?명꽣???ъ씠?몄쓽 ?뺣낫?됱씠 利앷??⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?뺣낫?쒓났???꾩슂?깆씠 而ㅼ?怨??덉쑝?? ?遺遺꾩쓽 ?ъ씠?몄뿉???쒓났?섎뒗 ?듭떖?댁쓽 遺덈━??議고빀??湲곕컲?????뺣낫寃?됯린踰뺤? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?섎룄瑜??쒕?濡??쒗쁽?섍린 ?대졄湲??뚮Ц??吏?섏튂寃?留롪굅???섎룄?섏? ?딆? 寃?됯껐怨쇰? ?산린 ?쎈떎??臾몄젣媛 ?덈떎. ???쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰????붾? ?듯븯???ъ슜?먯뿉寃?蹂대떎 ?뺥솗?섍퀬 移쒖젅?섍쾶 ?뺣낫瑜??쒓났?????덈뒗 ??뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ???먯씠?꾪듃???먯뿰??吏덉쓽???좏븳?곹깭 ?ㅽ넗留덊?瑜??곸슜?섏뿬 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 吏덉쓽?섎룄瑜??뚯븙?섍퀬 ?대? ?듬?吏?앹쓽 援ъ“???⑦꽩留ㅼ묶???쒖슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥, ?댁닚蹂?붿뿉 媛뺢굔?섍퀬 吏덉쓽?섎룄??遺?⑺븯???듬????쒓났?쒕떎. ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?좎슜?깃낵 媛?μ꽦???뚯븘蹂닿린 ?꾪븯??媛꾨떒?????섏씠吏瑜??뚭컻?섎뒗 臾몄젣???곸슜??寃곌낵, ?먯씠?꾪듃媛 ?뺥솗?섍퀬 移쒓렐?섍쾶 ?묐떟?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?????덉뿀??As the amount of information on Internet sites increases, it becomes more necessary to provide information in efficient ways. However, information search methods based on Boolean combination of keywords that most sites provide are difficult to express user's intention adequately so that there are numerous unexpected search results. This paper proposes a conversational agent that provides users with accurate information in a friendly manner through natural language conversation. The agent recognizes user's intention by applying finite state automata to natural language queries, utilizes the intention for structured pattern matching with response knowledge, and thus provides answers that are robust against changes in word order and consistent with the user's intention. To show its practical utility, the agent is applied to the problem of introducing a Web site. The results show that the conversational agent has the ability to provide accurate and friendly responses.?숈쟻 ?ш뎄?깃???DES???ㅺ퀎 諛?寃利?

理쒓렐 ?명꽣??湲곗닠??諛쒖쟾?⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?ㅼ뼇???꾨줈洹몃옩?ㅼ씠 留뚮뱾?댁?怨??덇퀬 ?댁뿉 ?곕씪 ?ㅼ뼇??肄붾뱶?ㅼ씠 留롮? ?щ엺?ㅼ쓣 ?듯빐 留뚮뱾?댁쭊?? ?대윭??痢〓㈃???댁슜?섏뿬 ?뱀젙 ?묒꽦?먭? ?묒꽦??肄붾뱶??洹몃?濡?媛?멸? ?먯떊???묒꽦??寃껋쿂??蹂댁뿬二쇨굅?? 李멸퀬??肄붾뱶?ㅼ뿉 ????뺥솗???쒓린 ?놁씠 洹몃?濡??ъ슜?섏뿬 ?댁뿉 ???蹂댄샇媛 ?먯감 ?대젮?뚯?怨??덈떎. ?곕씪??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???묒꽦??遺꾩꽍 ?대줎怨??⑹꽦怨??좉꼍留?湲곕컲 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 諛⑸쾿???곸슜???묒꽦???앸퀎 ?꾨젅?꾩썙?щ０ ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?묒꽦??遺꾩꽍 ?대줎???곸슜?섏뿬 ?뚯뒪 肄붾뱶?먯꽌 ?묒꽦???앸퀎???곹빀???뱀쭠?ㅼ쓣 異붿텧?섍퀬 ?대? ?띿뒪??留덉씠?앹뿉???ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?뱀쭠?ㅺ낵 寃고빀?섏뿬 湲곌퀎?숈뒿 湲곕컲???묒꽦???앸퀎???섑뻾?쒕떎. 洹몃━怨??⑹꽦怨??좉꼍留?湲곕컲 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 諛⑸쾿???뚯뒪 肄붾뱶???곸슜?섏뿬 肄붾뱶 ?묒꽦??遺꾨쪟瑜??섑뻾?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???묒꽦??遺꾩꽍?대줎怨??⑹꽦怨??좉꼍留앹쓣 ?곸슜???묒꽦???앸퀎 ?꾨젅?꾩썙?щ? ?듯빐 ?묒꽦?먮? ?앸퀎?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?묒꽦???앸퀎留뚯쓣 ?꾪븳 ?뱀쭠?ㅼ씠 ?꾩슂?섎떎??寃껉낵 ?⑹꽦怨??좉꼍留?湲곕컲 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 諛⑸쾿???뚯뒪 肄붾뱶?깃낵 媛숈? ?뱀닔??泥닿퀎瑜?媛뽰텛怨??덈뒗 ?몄뼱?먯꽌???곸슜??媛?ν븯?? ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 ?묒꽦??遺꾩꽍 ?대줎 湲곕컲 ?묒꽦???앸퀎 ?뺥솗?꾨뒗 95.1%??쇰ŉ CNN???곸슜??寃곌낵 諛섎났?잛닔媛 90踰??댁긽??寃쎌슦 98% ?댁긽???뺥솗?꾨? 蹂댁뿬以щ떎.Recently, Internet technology has developed, various programs are being created and therefore various codes are being made through many authors. On this aspect, some author deceive a program or code written by other particular author as they make it themselves and use other writers' code indiscriminately, or not indicating the exact code which has been used. Due to this makes it more and more difficult to protect the code. In this paper, we propose author identification framework using Authorship Analysis theory and Natural Language Processing(NLP) based on Convolutional Neural Network(CNN). We apply Authorship Analysis theory to extract features for author identification in the source code, and combine them with the features being used text mining to perform author identification using machine learning. In addition, applying CNN based natural language processing method to source code for code author classification. Therefore, we propose a framework for the identification of authors using the Authorship Analysis theory and the CNN. In order to identify the author, we need special features for identifying the authors only, and the NLP method based on the CNN is able to apply language with a special system such as source code and identify the author. identification accuracy based on Authorship Analysis theory is 95.1% and identification accuracy applied to CNN is 98%.Examining the Relationships Between Instagram Use, Perceived Social Support, and Psychological Well-Being

?쒓뎅?ъ긽臾명솕?숉쉶, ?뺥삙?? [2006] [KCI?깆옱]

This paper describes the plagiarism inspection supporting system of typical cultural contents or properties such as game programs, cultural contents of natural language documents and art works and proposes the cultural contents the plagiarism inspection supporting system For this, firstly, a survey of plagiarism inspection methods and tools for supporting Plagiarism inspection about programs, cultural contents of natural language documents are discussed. Secondly, the technical method for supporting plagiarism inspection of cultural art works by analyzing the drawing characteristics of authors is proposed. Finally, the experimental results show the effectiveness of this paper蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌????쒖쟻??臾명솕肄섑뀗痢좎씤 寃뚯엫 ?깃낵 媛숈? ?꾨줈洹몃옩, ?먯뿰???ㅽ걧硫섑듃 臾명솕肄섑뀗痢?洹몃━怨?以묒슂???ㅽ봽?쇱씤 臾명솕肄섑뀗痢좎씤 臾명솕?덉닠?덉뿉 ????대? ?붿??명솕?섏뿬 ?쒖젅怨??꾩옉 ?щ? ?깆쓣 ?먯젙?섍린 ?꾪븳 湲곗닠??諛⑸쾿濡좎뿉 ???怨좎같怨??대? 吏?먰븯湲??꾪븳 ?덈줈??諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?쒖븞?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 ?꾨줈洹몃옩 ?뚯뒪 肄붾뱶, ?먯뿰???ㅽ걧硫섑듃 臾명솕肄섑뀗痢좎뿉 ????쒖젅 寃異?諛⑸쾿濡좉낵 ?댁쓽 媛먯젙 ???꾩???二쇨린 ?꾪븳 ???깆뿉 ????댄렣蹂닿퀬???쒕떎. ?앹쑝濡?臾명솕?덉닠?덉쓽 ?쒖젅 諛??꾩옉 媛먯젙 ???꾩???二쇨린 ?꾪븳 湲곗닠??諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?묒옄???쒕줈???뺥깭 遺꾩꽍???섑빐 ?쒖븞?섍퀬???섎ŉ ?ㅽ뿕???섑빐 蹂??쇰Ц???좎슜?깆쓣 ?낆쬆?섍퀬???쒕떎.JMF 湲곕컲???ㅼ떆媛??먭꺽 怨듭젙 媛먯떆 諛??쒖뼱 ?쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎 諛?援ы쁽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 源?쇰！, [2004] [KCI?깆옱]
UML???곸슜??OHT ?쒖뼱 ?쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?ш컩?? [2004] [KCI?깆옱]
?붿옣???쒖옣 ?좏넻留앹쓣 ?꾪븳 e鍮꾩쫰?덉뒪 ?ы깉 ?쒖뒪??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?꾪솉?? [2004] [KCI?깆옱]

There are a variety of entities in natural language such as people, organizations, places, and products. These entities can have many various meanings. The ambiguity of entity is a very challenging task in the field of natural language processing. Entity Linking(EL) is the task of linking the entity in the text to the appropriate entity in the knowledge base. Pairwise based approach, which is a representative method for solving the EL, is a method of solving the EL by using the association between two entities in a sentence. This method considers only the interdependence between entities appearing in the same sentence, and thus has a limitation of global interdependence. In this paper, we developed an Entity2vec model that uses Word2vec based on knowledge base of RDF type in order to solve the EL. And we applied the algorithms using the generated model and ranked each entity. In this paper, to overcome the limitations of a pairwise approach, we devised a pairwise approach based on comprehensive interdependency and compared it.?먯뿰???쒗쁽?먮뒗 ?몃Ъ, 議곗쭅, ?μ냼, ?쒗뭹 ?깆쓽 ?ㅼ뼇??媛쒖껜?ㅼ씠 議댁옱?쒕떎. ?대윭??媛쒖껜???ㅼ뼇???섎?瑜?媛吏????덈떎. ?대윭??媛쒖껜媛 媛뽯뒗 以묒쓽??臾몄젣???먯뿰??泥섎━ 遺꾩빞???덉뼱 留ㅼ슦 ?꾩쟾?곸씤 怨쇱젣?대떎. 媛쒖껜 留곹궧(Entity Linking)?대? ?띿뒪?몄뿉 ?깆옣??媛쒖껜紐낆쓣 吏?앸쿋?댁뒪 ?댁쓽 ?곸젅??媛쒖껜濡??곌껐?댁＜???묒뾽?대떎. 媛쒖껜 留곹궧???꾪븳 ??쒖쟻??諛⑸쾿濡좎씤 吏??곌껐 ?묎렐踰?Pairwise based method)? ??臾몄옣?먯꽌 ?깆옣??媛쒖껜媛 ??媛??댁긽??寃쎌슦 ?쒕줈???곌??깆쓣 ?댁슜??媛쒖껜 留곹궧???섎뒗 諛⑸쾿?대떎. ??諛⑸쾿? ?숈씪 臾몄옣?먯꽌 ?깆옣?섎뒗 媛쒖껜??媛꾩쓽 ?곹샇?섏〈??interdependence)留뚯쓣 怨좊젮?섍퀬 ?덉뼱 ?ш큵?곸씤 ?곹샇?섏〈??Global interdependence)??遺議깊븯?ㅻ뒗 ?쒓퀎瑜?媛뽮퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??媛쒖껜 留곹궧???꾪빐 RDF ?뺥깭??吏?앸쿋?댁뒪 ?뺣낫瑜?諛뷀깢?쇰줈 Word2vec???쒖슜??Entity2vec 紐⑤뜽???앹꽦?섏??? 洹몃━怨??앹꽦??紐⑤뜽???ъ슜?섏뿬 媛?媛쒖껜???????궧???섏??? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??吏??곌껐 ?묎렐踰뺤쓽 ?쒓퀎?먯쓣 蹂댁셿?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ш큵?곸씤 ?곹샇?섏〈?깆쓣 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 吏??곌껐 ?묎렐踰뺤쓣 怨좎븞?섍퀬 援ы쁽 諛??ㅽ뿕???듯빐 湲곗〈??吏??곌껐 ?묎렐踰뺢낵 鍮꾧탳?섏???CTC瑜??곸슜??CRNN 湲곕컲 ?쒓뎅???뚯냼?몄떇 紐⑤뜽 ?곌뎄

?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?ㅺ꼍?? [2019] [KCI?깆옱]
臾몄옣 諛??댁젅 ?좎궗?꾨? ?댁슜???쒖젅 ?먯? ?쒖뒪??援ы쁽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 留뱀＜?? [2019] [KCI?깆옱]

This paper describes a method for the automatic extraction of feature vectors that can be used to analyze the similarity among natural language sentences. Similarity analysis among sentences is a necessary aspect of measuring semantic or structural similarity in natural language understanding. The analysis results can be used to find answers in Question and Answer (Q&A) systems and dialogue systems. The similarity analysis uses sentence vectors extracted by two deep learning models: the Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) to reflect sequential information of expressions such as syllables and semantic morphemes, and the Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for characterizing the appearance patterns of similar expressions such as words or phrases. In this paper, we examine the accuracy and quality of the method using sentence vectors that are automatically extracted by the models from dialogues related to banking service. This method can find more similar questions and answers in FAQs than existing methods. The automatic feature extraction method can be used to analyze the similarity of Korean sentences across various application domains and systems.蹂??쇰Ц? ?먯뿰??臾몄옣???좎궗?깆쓣 遺꾩꽍?????덈뒗 臾몄옣 ?꾨쿋???먯쭏???먮룞 異붿텧 諛⑸쾿??愿??湲곗닠?쒕떎. 吏덈Ц ?좎궗??遺꾩꽍?대? 吏덉쓽 臾몄옣???댄빐?섍린 ?꾪븯???먯뿰??吏덉쓽 臾몄옣???섎???援ъ“???좎궗?깆쓣 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 ?곌뎄瑜?留먰븯硫? ?대? ?댁슜?섏뿬 吏덉쓽?묐떟 (Q&A) 諛?????쒖뒪?쒖뿉???낅젰 吏덈Ц??????듬???李얜뒗???쒖슜?????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 湲곗닠?섎뒗 臾몄옣???좎궗?깆쓣 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿? ?λ윭??紐⑤뜽???듯빐 異붿텧??臾몄옣 ?꾨쿋??踰≫꽣瑜??먯쭏濡??댁슜?쒕떎. ?뚯젅怨??ㅼ쭏 ?뺥깭?뚯? 媛숈? 臾몄옣 ???쒗쁽???쒖감???뺣낫瑜?諛섏쁺?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?쒗솚 ?좉꼍留?Recurrent Neural Network)???댁슜?섏뿬 ?앹꽦??臾몄옣 踰≫꽣? ?댁닚怨?愿怨꾩뾾???좎궗???쒗쁽???깆옣 ?⑦꽩???뱀쭠?쇰줈 ?↔린 ?꾪븳 蹂듭옟 ?좉꼍留?(CNN)???댁슜?섏뿬 ?앹꽦??臾몄옣 踰≫꽣瑜??ъ슜?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??????쒕퉬?ㅼ? 愿?⑤맂 ???臾몄옣?먯꽌 ?먮룞 異붿텧??臾몄옣 ?꾨쿋???먯쭏???댁슜?섏뿬 臾몄옣 媛??좎궗??遺꾩꽍?덉쓣 ?뚯쓽 ?뺥솗?깃낵 ?덉쭏???됯??쒕떎.?뺤텞 湲곕컲 ?뚯씪 ?쒖뒪???곗씠???쇨????좎? 湲곕쾿

紐⑤컮???낅젰???먭린 ?좎궗?꾨? ?댁슜??留ㅽ겕濡??먯? 諛⑹븞
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?μ??? [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

Owing to importance of document copyright the need to detect document duplication and plagiarism is increasing. Many studies have sought to meet such need, but there are difficulties in document duplication detection due to technological limitations with the processing of natural language. This thesis designs and implements a discriminator of similar documents with natural language processing technique. This system discriminates similar documents using morphological analysis, syntactic analysis, and weight on low frequency and idiom. To evaluate the system, we analyze the correlation between human discrimination and term-based discrimination, and between human discrimination and proposed discrimination. This analysis shows that the proposed discrimination needs improving. Future research should work to define the document type and improve the processing technique appropriate for each type.臾몄꽌 ??묎텒?????愿?ш낵 以묒슂?깆씠 ?믪븘吏먯뿉 ?곕씪 臾몄꽌 蹂듭젣???쒖젅??寃異쒖뿉 ????꾩슂?깆씠 利앸??섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?댁? 媛숈? ?댁쑀濡?留롮? ?곌뎄媛 ?대（?댁?怨??덉쑝???먯뿰??泥섎━湲곗닠???쒓퀎媛 ?덉뼱 臾몄꽌???ъ링???쒖젅 寃異쒖뿉 ?대젮????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? ?먯뿰??遺꾩꽍??湲곗닠???곸슜???좎궗臾몄꽌 ?먮퀎湲곕? ?ㅺ퀎, 援ы쁽?쒕떎. ???쒖뒪?쒖? ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍??湲곗닠怨??④퍡 援щЦ?섎? 遺꾩꽍??湲곗닠, ?鍮덈룄 諛?愿?⑺몴??媛以묒튂???댁슜?섏뿬 ?좎궗臾몄꽌瑜??먮퀎?쒕떎. 蹂??쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫???ㅽ뿕?섍린 ?꾪븯???대㉫ ?먮퀎怨?湲곗〈 ?쒖뒪?? 洹몃━怨??대㉫ ?먮퀎怨??쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?먮퀎怨쇱쓽 ?곴?怨꾩닔瑜?遺꾩꽍?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵, 援щЦ?섎? 遺꾩꽍???쒖슜???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒖꽑?먯쓣 諛쒓껄?????덉뿀?? ?욎쑝濡?臾몄꽌 ?좏삎???뺤쓽?섍퀬 媛??좏삎??留욌뒗 ?먮퀎 湲곕쾿??媛쒕컻???꾩슂媛 ?덈떎.N?ㅽ겕由??쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?댁슜???щ줈?ㅻ??붿뼱 ?ㅽ넗由ы뀛留??꾨왂

Multi - scale Image Segmentation Using MSER and its Application
?쒓뎅肄섑뀗痢좏븰?? Jin-Seon Lee(?댁쭊??, [2014] [KCI?깆옱]
怨꾩링??硫붾え由?援ъ꽦???곕Ⅸ GPU ?깅뒫 遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅肄섑뀗痢좏븰?? 理쒗솉以(Hongjun Choi), [2014] [KCI?깆옱]

The purpose of this study is to examine theoretically the basic concepts of Culioli?셲 predicative and enunciative operation theory (th챕orie des op챕rations pr챕dicatives et 챕nonciatives), including objects of linguistics, phased representation activities, unconscious meta activities and ?쁦nvariants?? Culioli returns the language activity to the object of linguistics by newly defining linguistics as the scientific study of language activities apprehended with the diversity of natural languages. He also redefines the status of linguistics by suggesting three stages of representation activities: the mental representation stage; the linguistic representation stage (the trace of mental representation); and the metalanguage representation system. He explains this in order to examine how ?샖쯲ilinguistique??is possible for the ?샖쯰onciateur?? which is very difficult to pick up, even for himself, thereby revealing the fundamental functions of the language and the reason for its existence.
The ultimate purpose is to discern the ?쁦nvariant??in natural language by close observation, with attention to the diversity and uniqueness of natural languages.
Reviews and discussions are set forth in sections of this study with respect to Culioli?셲 predicative and enunciative operation theory.蹂멸퀬?먯꽌??Culioli???쒖닠節μ뼵?좎뿰?곗옉?⑹씠濡좎뿉???몄뼱?숈쓽 ??? ???④퀎 ?쒖긽泥닿퀎, 臾댁쓽?앹쟻 硫뷀??몄뼱?쒕룞, 遺덈????깆쓽 紐?紐?媛쒕뀗???대줎?곸쑝濡?怨좎같??蹂대뒗 寃껋쓣 洹?紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?쒕떎. ?섏옄?곗뼱???ㅼ뼇?깆쓣 ?듯빐 ?뚯븙???몄뼱?쒕룞??怨쇳븰?곸씤 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈 ?곌뎄?섎뒗 ?숇Ц?숈씠?쇨퀬 ?몄뼱?숈쓣 ?덈∼寃??뺤쓽?섎㈃?? ?몄뼱?쒕룞???몄뼱?숈쓽 ??곸뿉 ?ы븿?쒗궎怨??덈떎. ?뺤떊???쒖긽泥닿퀎??1?④퀎, ?몄뼱?숈쟻 ?쒖긽泥닿퀎??2?④퀎, 硫뷀??몄뼱 ?쒖긽泥닿퀎??3?④퀎濡??섏뼱 ?덈뒗 ???④퀎???쒖긽泥닿퀎瑜??쒖떆?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥, ?몄뼱?숈쓽 吏?꾨? ???뺤쓽?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?몄닠???섎?瑜??ъ갑?섍린 ?꾪빐???몄뼱?쒕룞???섎뒗 二쇱껜媛 ?먯떊???ъ갑?섍린 留ㅼ슦 ?대젮???몄닠 ?앹궛 ?쒕룞??臾댁쓽?앹쟻 硫뷀??몄뼱?쒕룞???쒕떎. ??臾댁쓽?앹쟻 硫뷀??몄뼱?쒕룞???대뼸寃?湲곕뒫?섎뒗媛瑜??댄렣蹂대뒗 寃껋씠 諛붾줈, ?몄뼱??湲곕뒫??蹂몄쭏???ㅻ챸??二쇨퀬 ?몄뼱??議댁옱???댁쑀?먯껜瑜??ㅻ챸??二쇰뒗 寃껋씠???섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?ㅼ뼇?깃낵 ?뱀닔?깆쓣 怨좊젮?섎㈃??硫대???愿李곗쓣 ?듯빐???먯뿰???덉뿉 ?ㅼ뼱?덈뒗 遺덈??뚮? 李얠쑝?ㅺ퀬 ?섎뒗 寃껋씠 ?쒖닠節μ뼵?좎뿰?곗옉?⑹씠濡좎쓽 紐⑹쟻?꾩쓣 ?댄렣蹂댁븯???뚯쑀?붽린?겹? 湲곗씠?깃낵 ?以묒꽦???쒗닾瑜?寃고빀
?깆떊?ъ옄??숆탳 ?몃Ц怨쇳븰?곌뎄?? ?ъ튂?? [2017] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
?쒖궗 怨듦컙?쇰줈?쒖쓽 ?뚮쭏?뚰겕 ?곌뎄 - 濡?뜲?붾뱶瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈 -
?깆떊?ъ옄??숆탳 ?몃Ц怨쇳븰?곌뎄?? 源紐낆꽍, [2017] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
?롮삤?濡쒌륁뿉 ?섑???吏덊닾???щ━??
?깆떊?ъ옄??숆탳 ?몃Ц怨쇳븰?곌뎄?? 源?곹쁽, [2017] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

In developing question-answering (QA) systems, it is hard to analyze natural language questions syntactically and semantically and to find exact answers to given query questions. In order to avoid these difficulties, we propose a new style of question-answering system that automatically generate natural language queries and can allow to search queries fit for given keywords. The key idea behind generating natural queries is that after significant sentences within text documents are applied to the named entity recognition technique, we can generate a natural query (interrogative sentence) for each named entity (such as person, location, and time). The natural query is divided into two types: simple type and sentence structure type. With the large database of question-answer pairs, the system can easily obtain natural queries and their corresponding answers for given keywords. The most important issue is how to generate meaningful queries which can present unambiguous answers. To this end, we propose two principles to decide which declarative sentences can be the sources of natural queries and a pattern-based method for generating meaningful queries from the selected sentences.吏덉쓽?묐떟?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섎뒗???덉뼱???ъ슜??吏덉쓽濡??낅젰???먯뿰??臾몄옣??臾몃쾿???먮뒗 ?섎??곸쑝濡??꾨꼍?섍쾶 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 ?묒뾽怨?洹?吏덉쓽??????뺥솗???듬???李얠븘?대뒗 ?묒뾽? ?ъ슫 ?쇱씠 ?꾨땲?? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??吏덉쓽?묐떟?쒖뒪??援ъ텞???쒖젣瑜?洹밸났?섍린 ?꾪빐, 臾몄꽌 留먮춬移섏뿉 湲곕컲?섏뿬 吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?먮룞 ?앹꽦, ??ν븯???대? ?ㅼ썙?쒕줈 寃?됲븯???덈줈??諛⑹떇???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. 吏덉쓽臾??앹꽦???꾪븳 湲곕낯 ?꾩씠?붿뼱???섏쭛 臾몄꽌??二쇱슂 臾몄옣?????怨좎쑀紐낆궗?몄떇 湲곗닠???쒖슜?섏뿬 ?щ엺, ?щЪ, ?μ냼, ?쒓컙 ?깆쓽 怨좎쑀紐낆궗瑜??몄떇???? 媛?怨좎쑀紐낆궗???대떦?섎뒗 ?먯뿰??吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?앹꽦?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? 吏덉쓽臾몄? ?먭?吏 ?좏삎???⑥닚??諛?臾몄옣援ъ“?좎???吏덉쓽臾몄쑝濡?援щ텇?쒕떎. ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?대졒寃?以鍮꾨맂 吏덉쓽臾??곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪瑜?媛吏怨??낅젰??寃???ㅼ썙?쒖뿉 ??섏뿬 愿??吏덉쓽臾멸낵 ?듬????쎄쾶 ?살쓣 ???덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄??愿嫄댁? ?앹꽦??吏덉쓽臾몄씠 紐낇솗???대떟???꾩텧?????덈뒗 ?섎??덈뒗 吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?앹꽦?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?대? ?꾪빐 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??吏덉쓽臾몄쓽 ?먯쿇???섎뒗 ?됱꽌臾몄옣???좊퀎?섎뒗 ?먯튃怨??좊퀎???됱꽌臾몄쑝濡쒕????섎??덈뒗 吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?앹꽦?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?쒖떆?쒕떎.???＜?뚯닔 ?곸뿭 湲곕컲 ?뺤??곸긽 ?앸퀎??
?쒓뎅?붿??몄퐯?먯툩?숉쉶, 諛뺤젣?? [2010] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
?쒖껌?먯쓽 TV ?쒖껌 ?됲깭瑜?怨좊젮??硫?곕??붿뼱 ?붿???諛⑹넚?곗씠??諛⑹넚 ?쒖? 湲곕컲??TV??寃???쒕퉬??
?쒓뎅?붿??몄퐯?먯툩?숉쉶, 怨좉킅?? [2010] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
OGRE ?붿쭊???댁슜????궗 援먯쑁??湲곕뒫??寃뚯엫 媛쒕컻
?쒓뎅?붿??몄퐯?먯툩?숉쉶, ?대㈃?? [2010] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

The importance of the call center as a contact point for the enterprise is growing. However, call centers have difficulty with their operating agents due to the agents' lack of knowledge and owing to frequent agent turnover due to downturns in the business, which causes deterioration in the quality of customer service. Therefore, through an N-bank call center case study, we developed a system to reduce the burden of keeping up business knowledge and to improve customer service quality. It is a "real-time agent advisor" system that provides agents with answers to customer questions in real time by combining AI technology for speech recognition, natural language processing, and questions & answers for existing call center information systems, such as a private branch exchange (PBX) and computer telephony integration (CTI). As a result of the case study, we confirmed that the speech recognition system for real-time call analysis and the corpus construction method improves the natural speech processing performance of the query response system. Especially with name entity recognition (NER), the accuracy of the corpus learning improved by 31%. Also, after applying the agent advisor system, the positive feedback rate of agents about the answers from the agent advisor was 93.1%, which proved the system is helpful to the agents.湲곗뾽???怨좉컼 ?묒젏?쇰줈??肄쒖꽱?곗쓽 以묒슂?깆? 而ㅼ?怨??덈떎. ?섏?留? 肄쒖꽱?곕뒗 ?곷떞?ъ쓽 吏??遺議깃낵 ?낅Т 遺?곸쓳???곕Ⅸ ??? ?댁쭅?쇰줈 ?명빐 ?곷떞???댁쁺???대졄怨? ?대줈 ?명븳 怨좉컼 ?쒕퉬???덉쭏 ??섏쓽 臾몄젣瑜??덇퀬 ?덈떎. ?댁뿉 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???곷떞?ъ뿉寃??낅Т 吏?앹뿉 ???遺?섎? 以꾩씠怨??쒕퉬???덉쭏???μ긽 ?쒗궎湲??꾪빐 ?뚯꽦 ?몄떇 湲곗닠怨??먯뿰??泥섎━ 諛?吏덉쓽?묐떟??吏?먰븯??AI 湲곗닠怨?PBX, CTI ?깆쓽 肄쒖꽱???뺣낫?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 寃고빀?섏뿬 ?ㅼ떆媛꾩쑝濡??곷떞?ъ뿉寃?怨좉컼??吏덉쓽 ?댁슜??????듬????쒓났?댁＜???쒖떎?쒓컙 ?곷떞 ?꾩슦誘멤??쒖뒪??媛쒕컻 諛⑹븞?????N???肄쒖꽱???щ?瑜??듯빐 ?곌뎄?섏??? ?щ??곌뎄 寃곌낵, ?ㅼ떆媛??듯솕 遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 ?뚯꽦?몄떇 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 援ъ꽦諛⑹븞怨? 吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由??깅뒫 ?μ긽???꾪븳 留먮춬移?援ъ텞 諛⑹븞???뺤씤?????덉뿀?쇰ŉ, ?뱁엳 媛쒖껜紐??몄떇湲곗쓽 寃쎌슦 ?꾨찓?몄뿉 留욌뒗 留먮춬移??숈뒿 ???뺥솗?꾧? 31% ?μ긽?⑥쓣 ?뺤씤?섏??? ?먰븳, ?곷떞 ?꾩슦誘??쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?곸슜?????곷떞 ?꾩슦誘몄쓽 ?듬???????곷떞?щ뱾??湲띿젙???쇰뱶諛?鍮꾩쑉??93.1%濡쒖뜥 異⑸텇???곷떞???낅Т???꾩???二쇨퀬 ?덉쓬???뺤씤?섏???嫄댁“踰뺤뿉 ?곕Ⅸ 而ㅽ뵾諛?怨좏삎?곕즺???뱀꽦 怨좎같 ?곌뎄

?섑븰?숈닠臾명뿄?먮뒗 ?대??숈쟻 議곗쭅?대굹 湲곌?紐낆씠 醫낆뼇, 吏덊솚 ?먮뒗 媛먯뿼 ?⑹뼱?ㅺ낵 ?쒕줈 議고빀?섏뿬 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?몄뼱???뱀꽦??媛吏怨??덈떎. ?섑븰?숈닠臾명뿄??寃?됲븷 ???곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪媛 ?쒓났?섎뒗 ?듭젣?댄쐶?꾧뎄??Medical Subject Headings (MeSH)瑜??쒖슜?섎㈃ ?⑹꽦?? ?숈쓽?? 洹몃━怨?愿?⑥뼱瑜?異붽?濡?寃?됲븷 ???덉뼱 寃?됲슚?⑥씠 ?믩떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???꾩븫(Stomach Neoplasms) ?댄쐶援곗쓣 寃?됱슜 ?꾪꽣濡?異붽??섎뒗 諛⑸쾿怨??숈떆異쒗쁽?⑹뼱??嫄곕━瑜?痢≪젙?섏뿬 ?⑥뼱?몄젒?먯깋 湲곕쾿?쇰줈 寃?됲슚?⑥꽦???μ긽?쒗궎???곌뎄瑜??섑뻾?섏??? 寃?됱슜 MeSH??異붽????댄쐶援곗쓣 寃곗젙?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ㅽ뿕?곗씠?곕줈 PubMed?먯꽌 以묒떖二쇱젣?닿? "Stomach Neoplasms"??2007??2016???쇰Ц 8,625?몄쓣 ?대젮 諛쏆븘 ?쇰Ц?쒕ぉ?쇰줈遺??Stomach? Neoplasms 愿???⑹뼱???숈떆異쒗쁽?щ?瑜?遺꾩꽍?섏??? 寃?됲슚?⑥꽦? KoreaMed?먯꽌 寃?됰릺??MEDLINE ?숈닠吏瑜???곸쑝濡?"Stomach Neoplasms"媛 MeSH濡??됱씤?섏뼱 ?덈뒗 277?몄쑝濡?寃利앺븯??붾뜲 MEDLINE MeSH, MeSH on Demand, 洹몃━怨?KoreaMed MeSH Indexer??"Stomach Neoplasms" ?됱씤??異붿텧?щ?? 寃?됱슜 ?꾪꽣濡??댄쐶援곗쓣 ?곸슜?덉쓣 ?? 洹몃━怨??숈떆異쒗쁽 ?⑹뼱???⑥뼱?몄젒寃??湲곕쾿???곸슜?덉쓣 ??"Stomach Neoplasms"??留ㅼ묶?щ?瑜?鍮꾧탳?섏??? 媛??異쒗쁽鍮덈룄媛 ?믪? ?⑹뼱??"Gastric Cancer"濡?2,780??異쒗쁽?섏??? "Gastric Adenocarcinoma", "Gastric MALT Lymphoma" ?깃낵 媛숈씠 "Stomach" ?⑹뼱? "Neoplasms" 愿??議곗쭅?숈쟻 ?⑹뼱媛 議고빀??寃쎌슦??7,376媛?88.51%)??? ?숈떆異쒗쁽 嫄곕━媛 2?⑥뼱???⑹뼱??"Stomach"? "Neoplasms"???⑹꽦?대줈 5,234媛?70.95%)??? ?곌뎄 寃곌낵 MeSH?⑹뼱瑜??쒖쇅?섍퀬 973媛쒖쓽 ?⑹뼱瑜??꾨낫?댄쐶援곗쑝濡??좎젙?섏??? MEDLINE MeSH? KoreaMed MeSH Indexer??MeSH 留ㅼ묶瑜좎? 209??75.5%)?댁뿀?붾뜲 寃?됲븘?곕? ?곸슜??寃곌낵 263??94.9%)?쇰줈, ?숈떆異쒗쁽 ?⑹뼱??13?⑥뼱 ?⑥뼱?몄젒?먯깋 湲곕쾿???곸슜??寃쎌슦 268??96.7%)?쇰줈 留ㅼ묶瑜좎씠 ?μ긽?섏뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄瑜??듯빐 ?먯뿰??寃?됱뿉 ?덉뼱??寃?됲슚?⑥쓣 ?μ긽?쒗궎???섎떒?쇰줈 寃?됱슜 ?쒖냼?ъ뒪瑜??ъ슜?섎㈃ ?됱씤鍮꾩슜?????遺?댁씠 ?곴퀬, ?듭젣?댁쓽 留앸씪???μ젏怨??먯뿰?닿? 媛吏???⑹뼱???뱀젙?깆쓣 ?좎??????덉쓬??利앸챸?섏??? ?먰븳 遺덈━??寃?됰낫?ㅻ뒗 ?⑥뼱?몄젒?먯깋 湲곕쾿???쒖슜?섎㈃ ?뺥솗瑜좎쓣 ?믪씪 ???덉뼱 寃???⑥쑉?깆씠 ?μ긽?⑥쓣 ?????덉뿀??This study examined the method for adding related to "stomach neoplasms" as filters to the Medical Subject Headings (MeSH) for search as well as a method for improving the search efficiency through a word-proximity search by measuring the distance of co-occurring terms. A total of 8,625 articles published between 2007 and 2016 with the major topic terms "stomach neoplasms" were downloaded from PubMed article titles. The vocabulary to be added to the MeSH for search were analyzed. The search efficiency was verified by 277 articles that had "Stomach Neoplasms" indexed as MEDLINE MeSH in KoreaMed. As a result, 973 terms were selected as the candidate vocabulary. "Gastric Cancer" (2,780 appearances) was the most frequent term and 7,376 compound words (88.51%) combined the histological terms of "stomach" and "neoplasm", such as "gastric adenocarcinoma" and "gastric MALT lymphoma". A total of 5,234 compounds words (70.95%), in which the co-occurring distance was two words, were found. The matching rate through the MEDLINE MeSH and KoreaMed MeSH Indexer was 209 articles (75.5%). The search efficiency improved to 263 articles (94.9%) when the search filters were added, and to 268 articles (96.7%) when the 13 word-proximity search technique of the co-occurring terms was applied. This study showed that the use of a thesaurus as a means of improving the search efficiency in a natural language search could maintain the advantages of controlled vocabulary. The search accuracy can be improved using the word-proximity search instead of a Boolean search.Maskless Lithography system???댁슜??TSP 寃????micro bump ?쒖옉??愿???곌뎄.

A total of 8,625 articles published between 2007 and 2016 with the major topic terms ?쐓tomach neoplasms??were downloaded from PubMed article titles. As a result, 973 terms were selected as the candidate vocabulary. ?쏥astric Cancer??(2,780 appearances) was the most frequent term and 7,376 compound words (88.51%) combined the histological terms of ?쐓tomach??and ?쐍eoplasm?? such as ?쐅astric adenocarcinoma??and ?쐅astric MALT lymphoma?? The search accuracy can be improved using the word-proximity search instead of a Boolean search.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?곌뎄 諛⑸쾿 3. 寃곌낵 遺꾩꽍The Effect of Fixing Agents and Softner on Sericin Fixation of Trimethylolmelamine
?쒓뎅?고븰湲곗닠?숉쉶, 諛뺢굔?? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]
CNG 踰꾩뒪??NGOC??CH???媛??깅뒫 ?μ긽???꾪븳 ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅?고븰湲곗닠?숉쉶, ?쒖땐湲?Choong-Kil Seo), [2017] [KCI?깆옱]
?붿썝 ?꾩튂???곕Ⅸ 吏??蹂듯빀 諛쒖쟾 ?뚮옖?????댁쑀???뱀꽦 ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅?고븰湲곗닠?숉쉶, ?깃굔??Kun Hyuk Sung), [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

As artificial intelligence is actively studied, it is being applied to various fields such as image, video and natural language processing. The natural language processing, in particular, is being studied to enable computers to understand the languages spoken and spoken by people and is considered one of the most important areas in artificial intelligence technology. In natural language processing, it is a complex, but important to make computers learn to understand a person?셲 common sense and generate results based on the person?셲 common sense. Knowledge graphs, which are linked using the relationship of words, have the advantage of being able to learn common sense easily from computers. However, the existing knowledge graphs are organized only by focusing on specific languages and fields and have limitations that cannot respond to neologisms. In this paper, we propose an intelligent chatbotsystem that collects and analyzed data in real time to build an automatically scalable knowledge graph and utilizes it as the base data. In particular, the fine-tuned BERT-based for relation extraction is to be applied to auto-growing graph to improve performance. And, we have developed a chatbot that can learn human common sense using auto-growing knowledge graph, it verifies the availability and performance of the knowledge graph.?멸났吏?μ씠 ?쒕컻?섍쾶 ?곌뎄?섎㈃???대?吏, ?곸긽, ?먯뿰??泥섎━? 媛숈? ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞???곸슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?뱁엳 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 遺꾩빞???щ엺??留먰븯怨??곕뒗 ?몄뼱?ㅼ쓣 而댄벂?곌? ?댄빐?????덈룄濡??섍린 ?꾪븳 ?곌뎄?ㅼ씠 吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덇퀬 ?멸났吏??湲곗닠?먯꽌 留ㅼ슦 以묒슂???곸뿭 以??섎굹濡??ш꺼吏꾨떎. ?먯뿰??泥섎━?먯꽌 而댄벂?곗뿉寃??щ엺???곸떇???댄빐?????덈룄濡??숈뒿?쒗궎怨??щ엺???곸떇??湲곕컲?쇰줈 寃곌낵瑜??앹꽦?섎룄濡??섎뒗 寃껋? 蹂듭옟?섏?留?以묒슂??湲곗닠?대떎. ?⑥뼱?ㅼ쓽 愿怨꾨? ?댁슜???곌껐??吏??洹몃옒?꾨뒗 而댄벂?곗뿉寃??쎄쾶 ?곸떇???숈뒿?쒗궗 ???덈떎???μ젏???덈떎. ?섏?留?湲곗〈??怨좎븞??吏??洹몃옒?꾨뱾? ?뱀젙 ?몄뼱??遺꾩빞?먮쭔 吏묒쨷??援ъ꽦?섏뼱 ?덇굅???좎“???깆뿉????묓븯吏 紐삵븯???쒓퀎?먯쓣 媛뽮퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ㅼ떆媛꾩쑝濡??곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛 諛?遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 ?먮룞?쇰줈 ?뺤옣 媛?ν븳 吏??洹몃옒?꾨? 援ъ텞?섍퀬, ?대? 湲곕컲 ?곗씠?곕줈 ?쒖슜?섎뒗 梨쀫큸 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?뱁엳 ?먮룞 ?뺤옣 洹몃옒?꾩뿉 BERT 湲곕컲??愿怨?異붿텧 紐⑤뜽???곸슜?쒖폒 ?깅뒫???μ긽?쒗궎怨좎옄 ?쒕떎. ?먮룞 ?뺤옣 吏??洹몃옒?꾨? ?댁슜???곸떇???숈뒿?섏뼱 ?덈뒗 梨쀫큸??援ъ텞?섏뿬 吏??洹몃옒?꾩쓽 ?쒖슜 媛?μ꽦怨??깅뒫??寃利앺븳???ъ옄???щ씪?곕뱶??⑹쓽 ?깃났 ?곹뼢 ?붿씤 ?ㅼ쬆遺꾩꽍: ?낆쥌怨??좏삎蹂?遺꾨쪟瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈
?쒓뎅?꾩옄嫄곕옒?숉쉶, 源醫낆쑄, [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]
釉붾줉泥댁씤???ㅻ쭏?멸퀎?쎌쓣 ?댁슜??肄쒕뱶泥댁씤 ?쒕퉬???덉쭏 痢≪젙 諛⑹븞??????곌뎄
?쒓뎅?꾩옄嫄곕옒?숉쉶, 源李쏀쁽, [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]
?쒕??덉씠?섏쓣 ?쒖슜??援?갑?섏넚臾쇰쪟??誘쇄ㅺ뎔 ?듯빀 ?댁쁺 諛⑹븞 ?섎┰
?쒓뎅?꾩옄嫄곕옒?숉쉶, Juthatip Suraraksa, [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

Development of technologies in artificial intelligence has been rapidly increasing with the Fourth Industrial Revolution, and researches related to AI have been actively conducted in a variety of fields such as autonomous vehicles, natural language processing, and robotics. These researches have been focused on solving cognitive problems such as learning and problem solving related to human intelligence from the 1950s. The field of artificial intelligence has achieved more technological advance than ever, due to recent interest in technology and research on various algorithms. The knowledge-based system is a sub-domain of artificial intelligence, and it aims to enable artificial intelligence agents to make decisions by using machine-readable and processible knowledge constructed from complex and informal human knowledge and rules in various fields. A knowledge base is used to optimize information collection, organization, and retrieval, and recently it is used with statistical artificial intelligence such as machine learning. Recently, the purpose of the knowledge base is to express, publish, and share knowledge on the web by describing and connecting web resources such as pages and data. These knowledge bases are used for intelligent processing in various fields of artificial intelligence such as question answering system of the smart speaker.
However, building a useful knowledge base is a time-consuming task and still requires a lot of effort of the experts. In recent years, many kinds of research and technologies of knowledge based artificial intelligence use DBpedia that is one of the biggest knowledge base aiming to extract structured content from the various information of Wikipedia. DBpedia contains various information extracted from Wikipedia such as a title, categories, and links, but the most useful knowledge is from infobox of Wikipedia that presents a summary of some unifying aspect created by users. These knowledge are created by the mapping rule between infobox structures and DBpedia ontology schema defined in DBpedia Extraction Framework. In this way, DBpedia can expect high reliability in terms of accuracy of knowledge by using the method of generating knowledge from semi-structured infobox data created by users. However, since only about 50% of all wiki pages contain infobox in Korean Wikipedia, DBpedia has limitations in term of knowledge scalability. This paper proposes a method to extract knowledge from text documents according to the ontology schema using machine learning. In order to demonstrate the appropriateness of this method, we explain a knowledge extraction model according to the DBpedia ontology schema by learning Wikipedia infoboxes. Our knowledge extraction model consists of three steps, document classification as ontology classes, proper sentence classification to extract triples, and value selection and transformation into RDF triple structure. The structure of Wikipedia infobox are defined as infobox templates that provide standardized information across related articles, and DBpedia ontology schema can be mapped these infobox templates. Based on these mapping relations, we classify the input document according to infobox categories which means ontology classes. After determining the classification of the input document, we classify the appropriate sentence according to attributes belonging to the classification. Finally, we extract knowledge from sentences that are classified as appropriate, and we convert knowledge into a form of triples. In order to train models, we generated training data set from Wikipedia dump using a method to add BIO tags to sentences, so we trained about 200 classes and about 2,500 relations for extracting knowledge. Furthermore, we evaluated comparative experiments of CRF and Bi-LSTM-CRF for the knowledge extraction process. Through this proposed process, it is possible to utilize structured knowledge by extracting knowledge according to the ontology schema fro...理쒓렐 4李??곗뾽?곷챸怨??④퍡 ?멸났吏??湲곗닠??????곌뎄媛 ?쒕컻??吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? ?댁쟾??洹??대뒓 ?뚮낫?ㅻ룄湲곗닠??諛쒖쟾??鍮좊Ⅴ寃?吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 異붿꽭?대떎. ?대윭???멸났吏???섍꼍?먯꽌 ?묒쭏??吏?앸쿋?댁뒪???멸났吏??湲곗닠???μ긽 諛??ъ슜??寃쏀뿕???믪씠湲??꾪븳 湲곕컲 湲곗닠濡쒖뜥 以묒슂????븷???섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?뱁엳 理쒓렐?먮뒗 ?멸났吏???ㅽ뵾而ㅻ? ?듯븳 吏덉쓽?묐떟怨?媛숈? ?쒕퉬?ㅼ쓽 湲곕컲 吏?앹쑝濡??쒖슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?섏?留?吏?앸쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섎뒗 寃껋? ?щ엺??留롮? ?몃젰???뷀븯硫? ?대줈 ?명빐 吏?앹쓣 援ъ텞?섎뒗??留롮? ?쒓컙怨?鍮꾩슜???뚮え?쒕떎. ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린?꾪빐 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??湲곌퀎?숈뒿???댁슜?섏뿬 吏?앸쿋?댁뒪??援ъ“???곕씪 ?숈뒿???섑뻾?섍퀬, ?대? ?듯빐 ?먯뿰??臾몄꽌濡쒕???吏?앹쓣 異붿텧?섏뿬 吏?앺솕?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿??????쒖븞?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?대윭??諛⑸쾿???곸젅?깆쓣 蹂댁씠湲??꾪빐DBpedia ?⑦넧濡쒖???援ъ“瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?숈뒿???섑뻾?섏뿬 吏?앹쓣 援ъ텞??寃껋씠?? 利? The construction of Knowledge Base is prerequisite for AI system implementation. Recently the theory of neural network is more applicate for the Knowledge Base construction. However, conventional inference technique is applicate as yet.

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?앹쨷(Seong-Joong Kim), [1992]

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ъ궗?깆쓽 ?먯튃???댁슜??寃곗젙???쒓뎅???섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍??蹂댁셿?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?곕━??寃곗젙???섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍???ъ궗?깆쓽 ?먯튃???댁슜?섏뿬 ?섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍???ㅻ쪟 瑜?李얠븘?닿퀬 ?ъ궗?깆쓽 ?먯튃??留뚯”?섎룄濡??섏젙?섏뿬 ?ㅻ쪟瑜?媛쒖꽑?섏??? ?쒖븞?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽? 湲?議댁쓽 寃곗젙???섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍??鍮꾪빐 ?믪? ?뺥솗瑜좎쓣 ?쒓났?섍퀬 寃곗젙???섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍???μ젏 ???좎??????덈떎. ?먰븳 ?곕━??以묎컙 遺꾩꽍寃곌낵瑜??댁슜???먯쭏紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?섏??? ?곕━???ㅽ뿕???듯븯???쒖븞???섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍 紐⑤뜽??湲곗〈???섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍 紐⑤뜽?ㅼ뿉 鍮꾪빐 ?깅뒫???μ긽?⑥쓣 蹂댁???In this paper, we propose a modified deterministic Korean dependency parser using a projectivity, The modified parser is improved by finding errors, such as cross dependency, from the original parsing results and correcting them according to the projecrivity and head-final principles. Our parser also uses parsing history information in addition to rich features, which only a deterministic algorithm can use. Results on the modified parser for ETRI(2006) corpus, that consists of complex sentences, show that our parser outperforms other parsers.?쒕줎 愿???곌뎄 ?쒓뎅???섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍 紐⑤뜽 ?ㅽ뿕 寃곕줎?ㅽ듃猷?媛꾩꽠???ъ꽍 諛?以묐났 ?④낵

?먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ뿉 ???щ떇???곸슜?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 Word embedding? ?⑥뼱瑜?踰≫꽣 怨듦컙?곸뿉 ?쒗쁽?섎뒗 寃껋쑝濡?李⑥썝異뺤냼 ?④낵? ?붾텋???좎궗???섎????⑥뼱???좎궗??踰≫꽣 媛믪쓣 媛뽯뒗?ㅻ뒗 ?μ젏???덈떎. ?대윭??word embedding? ??⑸웾 肄뷀띁?ㅻ? ?숈뒿?댁빞 醫뗭? ?깅뒫???살쓣 ???덈떎. 洹몃윭??湲곗〈???먯＜ ?ъ슜?섎뜕 word2vec 紐⑤뜽? ??⑸웾 肄뷀띁???숈뒿???꾪빐 紐⑤뜽???⑥닚???섏뿬 ?⑥뼱???깆옣 鍮꾩쑉??二쇰줈 ?숈뒿?섍쾶 ?섏뼱 ?⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 ?곷????꾩튂?뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏? ?딅뒗?ㅻ뒗 ?⑥젏???덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??湲곗〈??word embedding ?숈뒿 紐⑤뜽???⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 ?곷????꾩튂?뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?숈뒿?????덈룄濡??섏젙?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 ?⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 ?곷????꾩튂?뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 word embedding???숈뒿 ?섏???寃쎌슦 word-analogy???깅뒫???μ긽?섏뿀??In Word embedding, which is used to apply deep learning to natural language processing, a word is expressed on a vector space. This has the advantage of dimension reduction, whereby similar words have similar vector values. Word embedding needs to learn large-scale corpus to get achieve good performance. However, the word2vec model, which has frequently been used in the past, has a disadvantage in that it does not use relative position information between words because it largely learns the word appearance rate by simplifying the model for large capacity corpus learning. In this paper, we modified the existing word embedding learning model to enable it to learn using relative position information between words. Experimental results show that the performance of the word-analogy of the proposed modified word embedding learning model is improved when word embedding is learned using relative position information between words.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 ?곷????꾩튂?뺣낫瑜??댁슜??Word EmbeddingNested Kernel??而ㅻ꼸肄붾뱶 諛?硫붾え由щ낫??痍⑥빟??遺꾩꽍

?먯뿰?댁쿂由ъ뿉?쒕뒗 ?꾩뼱?곌린 紐⑤뱢怨??덉궗 ?쒓굅 媛숈? 紐⑤뱢?ㅼ씠 ?뚯씠?꾨씪??諛⑹떇?쇰줈 ?곌껐?섏뼱 留롮씠 ?ъ슜?섎굹, ??寃쎌슦 ???④퀎???ㅻ쪟媛 ???④퀎???꾩쟻?섎뒗 臾몄젣媛 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???뚯씠?꾨씪??諛⑹떇??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?쇰컲?곸씤 寃고빀 紐⑤뜽???뺤옣?섏뿬, ???묒뾽???숈떆???쒓퉭???숈뒿 ?곗씠?곕퓧留??꾨땲?????묒뾽留??쒓퉭???숈뒿?곗씠?곕룄 ?숈떆???숈뒿???ъ슜?????덈뒗 寃고빀 ?숈뒿 紐⑤뜽??Latent Structural SVM???뺤옣?섏뿬 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?쒓뎅???꾩뼱?곌린? ?뚯씠?꾨씪??諛⑹떇?쇰줈 ?곌껐???덉궗?쒓퉭 ?깅뒫? 96.77%?怨? 湲곗〈???쒓뎅???꾩뼱?곌린? ?덉궗 ?쒓퉭 寃고빀 紐⑤뜽???덉궗 ?쒓퉭 ?깅뒫??96.99%??쇰굹, 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 寃고빀 ?숈뒿 紐⑤뜽???댁슜?섏뿬 ??⑸웾???쒓뎅???꾩뼱?곌린 ?숈뒿?곗씠?곕? 異붽?濡??숈뒿??寃곌낵 ?덉궗 ?쒓퉭 ?깅뒫??97.20%源뚯? ?μ긽 ?섏뿀??Typically, a Korean Part-of-speech (POS) tagger takes the inputs that are produced by a separate Korean word spacer. However this pipeline approach has an obvious flaw of error propagation, since the POS tagger cannot correct word spacing errors. In this paper, we describe a jointly learning model for Korean word spacing and POS tagging using modified latent structural SVM to avoid error propagation and improve word spacing by utilizing POS information and additional word spacing training data. In the case of a pipeline approach, we could achieve a 96.77% morpheme-based F-measure for POS tagging. Using the previous joint model, we could achieve a 96.99% morphemebased F-measure for POS tagging. Using the jointly learning model, we could achieve a 97.20% morpheme-based F-measure for POS tagging. Experimental results show that the jointly learning model outperforms the pipeline approach and the previous joint model.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?앹쓽?숇텇?쇱뿉??臾명뿄???쒓린??媛쒖껜瑜??몄떇?섍린 ?꾪빐 湲몄씠?곗꽑留ㅼ묶湲곕쾿??鍮덈쾲???ъ슜?쒕떎. 湲몄씠?곗꽑留ㅼ묶湲곕쾿? ?ъ쟾???댁슜??媛쒖껜?몄떇湲곕쾿?쇰줈 醫뗭? ?ъ쟾留?援ъ텞?섏뼱 ?덈떎硫?鍮좊Ⅴ怨??뺥솗?섍쾶 媛쒖껜瑜?李얠븘?????덈떎???μ젏??媛吏꾨떎. 洹몃윭??媛쒖껜媛 ?섏뿴?섍퀬 以묐났???⑥뼱媛 ?앸왂??寃쎌슦?먮뒗 湲몄씠?곗꽑留ㅼ묶湲곕쾿???댁슜??寃쎌슦 ?깅뒫???꾩????⑥뼱吏寃??쒕떎. ?곕━???대윭???몄떇?깅뒫臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 遺遺꾨ℓ移?린踰뺤쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞??遺遺꾨ℓ移?린踰뺤? ?앸왂??諛쒖깮?????덈떎??寃껋쓣 媛?뺥븯???ㅼ닔???꾨낫媛쒖껜瑜?留뚮뱾???닿퀬 洹??꾩뿉 理쒖쟻???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???듯빐 ?ㅼ닔??媛쒖껜?꾨낫 以묒뿉??媛????뱁빐 蹂댁씠??媛쒖껜瑜??좏깮?쒕떎. ?곕━???앹쓽?숇텇?쇱쓽 媛쒖껜 以묒뿉???섏뿴?섎뒗 寃쎌슦媛 鍮덈쾲??HLA ?좎쟾?? HLA ??썝, HLA ?由쎌쑀?꾩옄 媛쒖껜?ㅼ쓣 ??곸쑝濡?湲몄씠?곗꽑留ㅼ묶湲곕쾿怨??쒖븞??遺遺꾨ℓ移?린踰뺤쓽 媛쒖껜?몄떇?깅뒫??遺꾩꽍?섏??? 3醫낆쓽 HLA 媛쒖껜?ㅼ쓣 ?몄떇?섍린 ?꾪빐??癒쇱? ?뺤옣?ъ쟾怨??쒓렇湲곕컲?ъ쟾??援ъ텞?섏??쇰ŉ, 洹???援ъ텞???ъ쟾???댁슜??湲몄씠?곗꽑留ㅼ묶怨?遺遺꾨ℓ移?쓣 ?섑뻾?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵???곕Ⅴ硫?湲몄씠?곗꽑留ㅼ묶湲곕쾿? HLA ??썝 媛쒖껜?먯꽌 醫뗭? ?깅뒫??蹂댁??쇰ŉ 遺遺꾨ℓ移?린踰뺤? ?앸왂???쒗쁽??鍮덈쾲??HLA ?좎쟾??媛쒖껜, HLA ?由쎌쑀?꾩옄 媛쒖껜?먯꽌 醫뗭? ?깅뒫??蹂댁??? 遺遺꾨ℓ移?린踰뺤? HLA ?由쎌쑀?꾩옄 媛쒖껜瑜???곸쑝濡?95.59%???믪? F-score瑜??살뿀??In the biomedical domain, the longest matching method is frequently used for recognizing named entity written in the literature. This method uses a dictionary as a resource for named entity recognition. If there exist appropriated dictionary about target domain, the longest matching method has the advantage of being able to recognize the entities of target domain quickly and exactly. However, the longest matching method is difficult to recognize the enumerated named entities, because these entities are frequently expressed as being omitted some words. In order to resolve this problem, we propose the partial matching method using a dictionary. The proposed method makes several candidate entities on the assumption that the ellipses may be included. After that, the method selects the most valid one among candidate entities through the optimization algorithm. We tested the longest and partial matching method about HLA entities: HLA gene, antigen, and allele entities, which are frequently enumerated among biomedical entities. As preparing for named entity recognition, we built two new resource, extended dictionary and tag-based dictionary about HLA entities. And later, we performed the longest and partial matching method using each dictionary. According to our experiment result, the longest matching method was effective in recognizing HLA antigen entities, in which the ellipses are rare, and the partial matching method was effective in recognizing HLA gene and allele entities, in which the ellipses are frequent. Especially, the partial matching method had a high F-score 95.59% about HLA alleles.濡쒕큸?쒖슜?섏뾽???숈깮???숈뒿紐곗엯 ?μ긽??誘몄튂???④낵

?먯뿰??泥섎━ 遺꾩빞?먯꽌???ъ링 ?좉꼍留?湲곗닠??二쇰ぉ?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? 理쒓렐?먮뒗 convolutional neural network (CNN)湲곕컲???ъ링?좉꼍留?援ъ“媛 ?대?吏 遺꾨쪟肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲???먯뿰??泥섎━??臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟?먯꽌??醫뗭? ?깅뒫???낆쬆?섏뿀?? ?섏?留?convolutional neural network (CNN)???댁슜??臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟 ?곌뎄?먯꽌??臾몄옣???됯퇏 ?⑥뼱 ?섍? 16媛쒕줈 ?대（?댁쭊 吏㏃? 臾몄옣???쒗븯???곸슜?섏뿀?쇰ŉ, 援щЦ ?꾩껜? ?섎?濡좎쟻 愿怨꾧? 蹂듭옟???꾩껜 臾몄옣???ㅻ（湲??대졄?ㅻ뒗 ?⑥젏??媛吏怨??덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄???쒓퀎?먯쓣洹밸났?섍퀬 ???뺥솗??臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟 ?깅뒫???꾪븯??word2vec瑜??쒖슜??recurrent neural network (RNN)湲곕컲???ъ링 ?좉꼍留앹쓽?묎렐踰뺤쓣 ?덈∼寃??쒖븞?쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 ?κ린 ?섏〈??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐??long short-term memory (LSTM)???ъ슜?섏뿬 湲??쒗?ㅼ쓽?낅젰?먯꽌???④낵?곸씤 臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟媛 媛?ν븯?꾨줉 ?섏?怨? ?쒖븞 諛⑹떇???⑥쑉?깆쓣 寃利앺븯湲??꾪빐 ?곷Ц ?곗씠??肉??꾨땲???쒓뎅?댁쁺??由щ럭 ?곗씠?곗뿉 ??댁꽌???ㅽ뿕???섑뻾?섏??? 洹?寃곌낵 ?λЦ???ы븿?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?곷Ц ?좊Ц 湲곗궗?먯꽌??87%, ?⑤Ц?쇰줈援ъ꽦???곷Ц ?곹솕 由щ럭 臾몄꽌?먯꽌??90%, ?쒓뎅???곹솕 由щ럭?먯꽌??88%??臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟 ?뺥솗?꾨? 蹂댁??짣eep neural network based methods have obtained remarkable progress on natural language processing (NLP) task. Recently, convolutional neural network (CNN) based approaches often outperform not only in image classification, but also in document classification. However, convolutional neural network (CNN) based methods is applied only to a short sentence composed of 16 words in average, and it has a disadvantage that it is difficult to deal with a sentence having a complicated semantic relationship with the whole sentence. In this paper, we propose a new method based on recurrent neural network (RNN) using word2vec to overcome the limitations of previous related work and to get much higher accuracy of document classification. By using long short-term memory (LSTM) to solve the long-term dependency problem, effective document classification is also possible for long sequence input. To validate performance of our proposed method in various data, we tested our proposed method both with English sentence and Korean movie review dataset. As a result, 87% of the English newspaper articles containing the long texts, 90% of the English movie review and 88% of the Korean movie reviewsh owed the accuracy of document classificationIntelligent PID Controller for Smart Building Comfort Temperature Control Basedon Fuzzy Logic and Neural Networks

蹂??쇰Ц? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 諛쒗솕 ?섎룄瑜?遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?뷀뻾, 媛쒕뀗 ??洹몃━怨??몄옄???ъ씠???곌??깆쓣 怨좊젮???ъ슜??諛쒗솕 ?섎룄 遺꾩꽍 湲곕쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞??紐⑤뜽??諛쒗솕 ?섎룄 遺꾩꽍 怨쇱젙? 2?④퀎濡?援ъ꽦?쒕떎. 1?④퀎?먯꽌??媛쒕뀗 ?? ?몄옄, ?뷀뻾 遺꾩꽍???쒖감?곸쑝濡??섑뻾?섍퀬, 2?④퀎?먯꽌??1?④퀎??遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵瑜??먯쭏濡??ъ슜?섏뿬 ???숈뒿???섑뻾?쒕떎. ???숈뒿怨쇱젙?먯꽌???곹샇?곌??곸씤 ?뱀꽦??媛뽯뒗 媛??붿냼??1?④퀎 遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵瑜?異붽??먯쭏濡??ъ슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 諛쒗솕 ?섎룄 遺꾩꽍 ?깅뒫???μ긽?쒗궓?? ?ㅽ뿕???듯븯???쒖븞?????숈뒿 紐⑤뜽怨?湲곕낯 紐⑤뜽??鍮꾧탳瑜??듯빐 媛쒕뀗 ?? ?몄옄 洹몃━怨??뷀뻾 遺꾩꽍?먯꽌 媛곴컖 7.45%p, 14.78%p 洹몃━怨?5.84%p??遺꾩꽍 ?ㅻ쪟 媛먯냼?⑥쓣 蹂댁엫?쇰줈??諛쒗솕 ?섎룄 遺꾩꽍 ?깅뒫??媛쒖꽑?섏뿀?뚯쓣 ?뺤씤?섏???This paper proposes an integrated analysis method that estimates user intention in utterance by considering the correlative characteristic between each constituent (speech act, concept sequence, and arguments) of the user intention. The proposed method comprises two distinctive steps. In the first step, each constituent of the user intention is analyzed in sequence, the results of which are taken as input for analysis in the second step. In this step, estimation accuracy for user intention can be improved because the correlative characteristic of speech act, concept sequence, and arguments have been considered. Experiment showed that the proposed model improves user intention estimation over the conventional model with error rate reductions in concept sequence, speech act, and arguments by 7.45%p, 14.78%p and 5.84%p respectively.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?곹샇 ???숈뒿???댁슜???ъ슜??諛쒗솕 ?섎룄遺꾩꽍??냼?몃? 湲곕컲?먯꽌 遺꾩쐞湲??쒓렇? ?뚯븙 AV ?쒓렇瑜??댁슜???뚯븙寃??諛⑸쾿
