?뺣낫 寃?됱씠? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?뺣낫 ?붽뎄瑜?留뚯”?섎뒗 愿???뺣낫瑜?寃?됲븯??寃껋씠?? 洹몃윭???뺣낫 寃???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?섎굹????븷? 愿???뺣낫??吏묓빀?ㅼ쓣 ?⑥닚???쒖떆?섎뒗 寃껋씠 ?꾨땲??二쇱뼱吏??붽뎄 ?ы빆??媛??媛源뚯슫 臾몄꽌瑜?寃곗젙?섎뒗???꾩???二쇰뒗 寃껋씠?? 理쒓렐???щ윭 媛吏 ?띿뒪??遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪?쒕뱾?먯꽌 ?댁슜???몄떇?섍린 ?꾪빐 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿 ?ъ슜???쒕룄?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 遺덊뻾?덈룄 ?⑤룆??援щЦ ?댄빐 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈???꾩쓽???띿뒪???덈뱾? ?꾨꼍?섍쾶 遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪빐 遺덉땐遺꾪븳 寃껋쑝濡??뚮젮吏怨??덈떎. ???쇰Ц?먯꽌??2?④퀎 臾몄꽌 ?쒖쐞??湲곕컲??臾몄꽌 ?쒖쐞 寃곗젙 諛⑸쾿????섏뿬 ?쇳븳?? 1?④퀎??臾몄꽌瑜?寃?됲븯湲??꾪빐 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 2?④퀎??寃?됰맂 臾몄꽌瑜??ъ닚?쒗솕?섎뒗???ъ슜?쒕떎. 1?④퀎?먯꽌 ?댁슜??二쇳궎?뚮뱶??臾몄꽌瑜?援щ퀎?????덈뒗 醫뗭? ?λ젰??媛吏??紐낆궗??蹂듯빀紐낆궗濡쒖꽌 ?뺤쓽?????덈떎. 2?④퀎?먯꽌 ?댁슜??遺 ?ㅼ썙?쒕뒗 二쇳궎?뚮뱶??湲곕뒫?닿? ?꾨땶 ?뺤슜?щ굹 遺???먮뒗 ?숈궗濡??뺤쓽?????덈떎. ?ㅽ뿕? 23,113 ??ぉ??媛吏???쒓뎅??諛깃낵?ъ쟾怨??쇰컲 ?ъ슜?먮뱾濡쒕????섏쭛??161媛쒖쓽 ?쒓뎅???먯뿰?몄뼱 吏덉쓽濡쒕????대（?댁죱?? ?먯뿰?몄뼱 吏덉쓽??85%媛 遺 ?ㅼ썙?쒕? 媛吏怨??덉뿀?? 2?④퀎 臾몄꽌 ?쒖쐞 諛⑸쾿? ?쇰컲 臾몄꽌 ?쒖쐞 諛⑸쾿蹂대떎 ?꾧꺽??寃???⑥쑉???μ긽???쒓났?쒕떎.An Information Retrieval(IR) is to retrieve relevant information that satisfies user's information needs. However a major role of IR systems is not just the generation of sets of relevant documents, but to help determine which documents are most likely to be relevant to the given requirements. Various attempts have been made in the recent past to use syntactic analysis methods for the generation of complex construction that are essential for content identification in various automatic text analysis systems. Unfortunately, it is known that methods based on syntactic understanding alone are not sufficiently powerful to produce complete analyses of arbitrary text samples. In this paper, we present a document ranking method based on two-level ranking. The first level is used to retrieve the documents, and the second level to reorder the retrieved documents. The main keywords used in the first level can be defined as nouns and/or compound nouns that possess good document discrimination powers. The sub-keywords used in the second level can be also defined as adjectives, adverbs, and/or verbs that are not main keywords, and function words. An empirical study was conducted from a Korean encyclopedia with 23,113 entries and 161 Korean natural language queries collected by end users. 85% of the natural language queries contained sub-keywords. The two-level document ranking methods provides significant improvement in retrieval effectiveness over traditional ranking methods.而댄벂?곗떆?ㅽ뀥 : ?ㅼ떆媛??뚰봽?몄썾?댁쓽 議곗젅???⑥쐞???댄빐 諛⑸쾿 : ARSU ( Architecture - based Software Understanding ) ? SRE ( Software Re / reverse - engineering Environment )
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?대Ц洹?Lee Moon Kun), [1997]
而댄벂?곗떆?ㅽ뀥 : 李몄“ ?쒓컙 媛꾧꺽 ?뺣낫瑜??쒖슜?섎뒗 踰꾪띁 援먯껜 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 怨좎젙援?Koh Jeong Gook), [1997]
?붿긽 諛??뚯꽦泥섎━ : 釉붾줉 洹쇱궗?붿떇???곸쓳???좏깮???댁슜???꾨옓???곸긽 遺?명솕
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 諛뺤슜湲?Park Yong Ki), [1997]

紐⑤뱺 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由??쒖뒪?쒖? 洹?紐⑹쟻??留욌뒗 ?몄뼱泥섎━???ъ쟾???ъ슜?섎ŉ, 洹?以묒슂?깆? ?쒖뒪??援ы쁽???덉뼱??60~70竊낅? 李⑥??쒕떎怨??뚮젮???덈떎. 洹몃윭?? ?꾩＜ ?곸? ?묒쓽 ?ㅼ젣 ?몄뼱 ?곗씠?곕? ??곸쑝濡??ㅼ닔???멸컙???섏옉?낆뿉 ?섑빐 ?ъ쟾??媛쒕컻???섑뻾?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?꾩껜?곸쑝濡?蹂???留됰????몃젰怨?鍮꾩슜???ъ옄?⑥뿉??遺덇뎄?섍퀬 ?ъ쟾 ?곗씠?곗쓽 鍮꾩씪愿?깃낵 鍮꾪슚?⑥꽦??吏?곷릺???붾떎. 洹몃윭?? 理쒓렐?먮뒗 蹂묐젹 肄뷀띁?ㅼ쓽 ?뺣낫媛 怨쇨굅??鍮꾪빐 ?⑹씠?섍쾶 ?⑥뿉 ?곕씪 湲곌퀎踰덉뿭, ?ㅺ뎅???뺣낫 寃?????몄뼱泥섎━ ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?ъ슜?섍린 ?꾪븳 ????ъ쟾 援ъ텞???꾧뎄濡쒖꽌 ?뺣젹(Alignment) 湲곕쾿??????곌뎄媛 ??먮릺?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??湲곗〈???쒓뎅?닳뺤씪蹂몄뼱 蹂묐젹 肄뷀띁?ㅻ? ?댁슜???뺣젹 湲곕쾿?먯꽌 臾몄젣?먯쑝濡?吏?곷맂 遺?곹빀??????꾨낫 臾몄옄??異붿텧 臾몄젣瑜?理쒖냼???섎뒗 湲곕쾿???쒖븞?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?쒓뎅?닳뺤씪蹂몄뼱 ????ъ쟾 ?먮룞 援ъ텞???꾪븳 ?먮룞 ?뺣젹 湲곕쾿???μ긽??愿?섏뿬 ?쇳븳??All natural language processing systems use dictionaries proper for the purpose of the systems. Dictionaries for natural language processing systems play an important role. It costs beyond 50竊?of system development expense to develop the dictionaries. But the dictionaries have been being developed manually using the human tuition based on the microscopic analysis of small amount of real data. The low performance of the natural language processing systems is basically caused by the lack of consistency and generality of dictionary data which are constructed by this method. To solve this problem, it needs a knowledge acquisition method which is able to get consistent and general dictionary data from large amount of real linguistic data.
This paper presents a method for automatic generation of Japanese-Korean bilingual lexicon by applying enhanced alignment technology on large amount of parallel corpora which is sentence aligned and used in real world. This method is able to construct the bilingual lexicon of verbal words and frozen expressions.?? ?쒕줎 ?? ?쒓뎅???쇰낯???뺣젹 湲곕쾿 2.1 ?쒓뎅???쇰낯?댁쓽 鍮꾧탳 2.2 ?쇰낯???쒓뎅?닿컙 ?먮룞 ?뺣젹 2.3 1李??뺣젹?앶??띷쐿 ?숁콆?몄쓽 ?몄갔

吏?앸쿋?댁뒪???먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕컲???ㅼ뼇???묒슜 ?쒖뒪???깅뒫???곹뼢??誘몄튂??以묒슂???붿냼?대떎. ?곸뼱沅뚯뿉?쒕뒗 WordNet, YAGO, Cyc, BabelNet怨?媛숈? 吏?앸쿋?댁뒪?ㅼ씠 ?먮━ ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???꾪궎諛깃낵? YAGO濡쒕???YAGO ?뺤떇???쒓뎅??吏?앸쿋?댁뒪(?댄븯 K-YAGO)瑜??먮룞 援ъ텞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞 ?쒖뒪?쒖? YAGO? ?꾪궎諛깃낵 ?명룷諛뺤뒪媛꾩쓽 媛꾨떒??留ㅼ묶???듯빐 珥덇린 K-YAGO瑜?援ъ텞???? 湲곌퀎?숈뒿???댁슜?섏뿬 珥덇린 K-YAGO瑜??뺤옣?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?쒖븞 ?쒖뒪?쒖? 珥덇린 K-YAGO 援ъ텞 ?ㅽ뿕?먯꽌 0.9642???좊ː?꾨? 蹂댁?怨? K-YAGO ?뺤옣 ?ㅽ뿕?먯꽌 0.9468???뺥솗?꾩? 0.7596??留ㅽ겕濡?F1 泥숇룄瑜?蹂댁???The performance of many natural language processing applications depends on the knowledge base as a major resource. WordNet, YAGO, Cyc, and BabelNet have been extensively used as knowledge bases in English. In this paper, we propose a method to construct a YAGO-style knowledge base automatically for Korean (hereafter, K-YAGO) from Wikipedia and YAGO. The proposed system constructs an initial K-YAGO simply by matching YAGO to info-boxes in Wikipedia. Then, the initial K-YAGO is expanded through the use of a machine learning technique. Experiments with the initial K-YAGO shows that the proposed system has a precision of 0.9642. In the experiments with the expanded part of K-YAGO, an accuracy of 0.9468 was achieved with an average macro F1-measure of 0.7596.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. 二쇱떇 ?쒖옣??????덉륫? ?ㅻ옖 湲곌컙 留롮? ?대뱾??轅덉씠?덈떎. ?섏?留??섎쭖? ?몃젰?먮룄 遺덇뎄?섍퀬 二쇱떇 ?쒖옣???뺥솗?섍쾶 ?덉륫?섍린? ?ъ슫 ?쇱씠 ?꾨땲?덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄??二쇱떇 ?쒖옣??諛⑺뼢?깆뿉 二쇰ぉ?섏뿬 ??諛⑺뼢?깆쓣 ?덉륫?????덈뒗 媛먯꽦?ъ쟾??援ъ텞?섎뒗 ?덈줈??諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 2015??1??1?쇰???2017??12??31?쇨퉴吏 3?꾧컙??利앹떆 ?댁뒪 25,000??嫄댁쓽 ?곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?섏뿬, 臾몃㎘??怨좊젮?섍린 ?꾪븳 Word2Vec???곸슜?섏??? ?대? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?댁뒪??媛먯꽦遺꾩꽍???ㅼ떆?섏뿬 KOSPI 醫낃? 吏?섎? ?덉륫??蹂댁븯??Stock market prediction has been long dream for researchers as well as the public. Forecasting ever-changing stock market, though, proved a Herculean task. This study proposes a novel stock market sentiment lexicon acquisition system that can predict the growth (or decline) of stock market index, based on economic news. For this purpose, we have collected 3-year's economic news from January 2015 to December 2017 and adopted Word2Vec model to consider the context of words. To evaluate the result, we performed sentiment analysis to collected news data with the automated constructed lexicon and compared with closings of the KOSPI (Korea Composite Stock Price Index), the South Korean stock market index based on economic news.肄섑뀗痢좎쓽 怨듦툒?먯? ?뚮퉬?먮줈 ?대（?댁쭊 UGC ?뚮옯?쇱쓽 珥덇린 ?쒖꽦??諛⑹븞??????먯깋???곌뎄 : ?쒖뒪?쒕떎?대궡誘뱀뒪瑜??댁슜??珥덇린 ?ㅽ??몄뾽??UGC ?뚮옯?쇱쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈

吏湲덇퉴吏 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?ㅼ뼇???⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋??紐⑤뜽 諛??깅뒫 寃利?諛⑹떇???쒖븞?섏뼱 ?붿?留? ?遺遺꾩? ?곸뼱???곸슜?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?곕씪???쒓뎅???⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋??紐⑤뜽???됯??섎뒗 ?遺遺꾩쓽 寃쎌슦, ?곸뼱 ?⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋??紐⑤뜽???곸슜?섎뒗 ?깅뒫 寃利?諛⑹떇???⑥닚??踰덉뿭???듯빐 ?ъ슜???붾떎. ?섏?留??쒓뎅?댁? ?곸뼱??臾몃쾿??李⑥씠媛 ?ш린 ?뚮Ц?? ?대윴 蹂?뺤뿉???곷떦???쒓퀎媛 議댁옱?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц??紐⑺몴???쒓뎅???⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋??紐⑤뜽???됯??섍린???곹빀???좎텛 寃???명듃瑜??쒖븞?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?대? ?꾪빐, 理쒓렐 留롮씠 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋??紐⑤뜽 以??섎굹??word2vec 紐⑤뜽??湲곗〈 ?좎텛 寃???명듃瑜??쒓뎅??怨좎쑀???뱀꽦??諛섏쁺?섎룄濡??뺤옣?덈떎. ?쒓뎅???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍湲곗쓽 ?깅뒫???뺣웾?곸쑝濡?鍮꾧탳?섎뒗 ???곸슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ??寃???명듃???⑥슜???뺤씤?덈떎. ?ㅼ뼇???쒓뎅???⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋??紐⑤뜽???섏씠?쇳뙆?쇰??곕? 理쒖쟻?뷀븯怨좎옄 ???? ?쒓뎅???좎텛 寃???명듃瑜??쒖슜?????덉쓣 寃껋쑝濡?湲곕??쒕떎.A variety of word embedding models and their evaluation methods in natural language processing have been proposed. However, most of them are applied to English. Thus in most cases where word embedding models for Korean are to be evaluated, people have utilized evaluation methods that are adjusted through simple translation from those applied to word embedding models for English. However, since Korean is quite different from English in grammatical aspects, there exist certain limits to these modified methods. This paper aims to suggest a new analogy test set suitable to evaluate word embedding models for Korean. For this purpose, the existing analogy test set for word2vec models, which are recently gaining popularity as word embedding models, has been extended to reflect features intrinsic to Korean. The utility of this modified test set has been confirmed by applying it to the quantitative comparison between capabilities of Korean morphological analyzers. It is expected that the Korean analogy test set proposed in the paper will be employed in hyperparameter optimization for various word embedding models for Korean.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? ?ㅼ뼇??臾몃쾿?ㅼ씠 ?먯뿰??泥섎━???곌뎄?먯꽌 ?몄뼱??遺꾩꽍 諛??앹꽦???곸슜?섏뼱 ?붿쑝??留롮? 遺遺꾩씠 ?몄뼱??遺꾩꽍??吏묒쨷?섏뼱?붾떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? ?몃━ ?뺥빀 臾몃쾿(TAG: Tree Adjoining Grammars)怨??ㅽ궎留??몃━ ?뺥빀 臾몃쾿(S-TAG: Schema-Tree Adjoining Grammars)??臾몃쾿??援ъ“ 諛??뱀꽦, 洹몃━怨?臾몃쾿??媛뽯뒗 洹쒖튃?뱀꽦??鍮꾧탳 遺꾩꽍?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 TAG? S-TAG媛 ?몄뼱???앹꽦???대뼸寃??곸슜?????덈뒗媛瑜?蹂댁뿬 以??Natural language generation had been relatively less attention than understanding. In this paper, I analyze TAG(Tree Adjoining Grammars: TAG) and S-TAG(Schema-Tree Adjoining Grammars) in term of language generation. By analyzing the structures, characteristics, and grammatical rules of these grammars, I can find out how they can be used as a tool of language generation.肄섑뀗痢좎쓽 ?щ같?щ? 吏?먰븯??DRM ?쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎

?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, ?댁쭊諛?Jin Baek Yi), [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

?섎???寃곗젙? ?먯뿰??臾몄옣???쒖닠?댁? 洹??쒖닠?댁뿉 ?랁븯???쇳빆???ъ씠???섎?愿怨꾨? 寃곗젙?섎뒗 臾몄젣?대떎. ?쇰컲?곸쑝濡??섎???寃곗젙???꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?쒖닠???몄떇(Predicate Identification, PI), ?쒖닠??遺꾨쪟(Predicate Classification, PC), ?쇳빆 ?몄떇(Argument Identification, AI) ?쇳빆 遺꾨쪟(Argument Classification, AC) ?④퀎媛 ?섑뻾?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쒓뎅???섎???寃곗젙 臾몄젣瑜??꾪빐 Korean Propbank瑜??섎???寃곗젙 ?숈뒿 留먮춬移섎줈 ?ъ슜?섍퀬, ?섎???寃곗젙 臾몄젣瑜?Sequence Labeling 臾몄젣濡?諛붽씀????臾몄젣?먯꽌 醫뗭? ?깅뒫??蹂댁씠??Structural SVM???댁슜?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵 ?쒖닠???몄떇/遺꾨쪟(Predicate Identification and Classification, PIC)?먯꽌??97.13%(F1)???깅뒫??蹂댁?怨? ?쇳빆 ?몄떇/遺꾨쪟(Argument Identification and Classification, AIC)?먯꽌??76.96%(F1)???깅뒫??蹂댁???Semantic role labeling (SRL) systems determine the semantic role labels of the arguments of predicates in natural language text. An SRL system usually needs to perform four tasks in sequence: Predicate Identification (PI), Predicate Classification (PC), Argument Identification (AI), and Argument Classification (AC). In this paper, we use the Korean Propbank to develop our Korean semantic role labeling system. We describe our Korean semantic role labeling system that uses sequence labeling with structured Support Vector Machine (SVM). The results of our experiments on the Korean Propbank dataset reveal that our method obtains a 97.13% F1 score on Predicate Identification and Classification (PIC), and a 76.96% F1 score on Argument Identification and Classification (AIC).?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 湲곗〈?곌뎄 3. Korean Propbank 蹂?섏뼹援??몄떇???꾪븳 ?곕┰ ?媛곹솕? 援?? ?좏삎 ?꾨쿋??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源???Eun-Sol Kim), [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

The toolkit consists of two test-beds for technical entity recognition and relation extraction engines, which are capable of identifying technical entities and predicting semantic relation types between the entities. With using the introduced toolkits, users and developers can efficiently perform the execution monitoring and error analysis of the technical text analysis engines.?붿빟 Abstract I. ?쒕줎 II. 湲곗닠臾명뿄遺꾩꽍 ?뚮옯??諛??뚯뒪?몃쿋??媛쒖슂 III. 湲곗닠臾명뿄遺꾩꽍 ?뚯뒪?몃쿋?쒓??곹쁽???띿쓽 ?곹솴 ?쒗쁽???꾪븳 ?쒓났媛?洹몃옒??

?쒓뎅肄섑뀗痢좏븰?? 諛뺥삎二? [2012] [KCI?깆옱]

Korean is a complex subtle language. Many Korean users upload personal stories to the Internet, but Korean language in the field of natural language processing is not developed due to the relatively low number of users. In this paper, we investigated the possibility of using Opinion Mining as a Post-Occupancy Evaluation method. The focus of this study is on how we can translate customer - provided housing experiences into useful information in data analysis. We analyzed the articles posted in the online community using the Python package called ?쁊oNLPy?? In this process, I felt the difficulty of Korean language processing. In Korean natural language processing packages, it is possible to break up into an eulogy unit, but it is not possible to grasp the meaning of the correct word or to classify it into a proper morpheme. The construction industry in Korea is very conservative and it will not be easy to apply Opinion Mining to the practical stage. However, if the vocabulary network related to the residence experience is established and the skill level of observing the tendency of the people through the social network analysis is increased, the utilization of the natural language processing in the construction industry is expected to be very high.Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?낅젰?먮즺 ?섏쭛 諛?諛⑸쾿 ?좎젙 3. ?먮즺 遺꾩꽍 4. 寃곕줎 諛??곌뎄 吏꾪뻾 怨꾪쉷?꾩떆嫄댁텞 怨듦컙援ъ꽦?먯꽌 ?쇨꺼&洹몃씪?대뱶湲곕쾿???듯빐 ?섑????붾━?쒖? 蹂댁씠??蹂묒슜怨듦컙??愿???곌뎄
??쒓굔異뺥븰?? 源?곴퇏(Kim, Sang-Kyun), [2017]
?꾩떖???뚭퇋紐?怨듬룞二쇳깮?먯꽌 怨듭쑀怨듦컙 ?쒖꽦?붿뿉 愿???곌뎄
??쒓굔異뺥븰?? 議곗썒??Cho, Ung-Hui), [2017]
移섏쑀?섍꼍 湲곕뒫???곸슜???꾩떆???몄씤蹂듭?二쇳깮 怨꾪쉷
??쒓굔異뺥븰?? 諛곗???Bae, jun-young), [2017]

Significant progress has been made in machine translation since the introduction of the Neural-based Machine Translation (NMT) algorithms. For Korean-English translation, there is growing evidence that the machine translation engines are rendering more and more acceptable translations with time through deep learning. The progress inevitably raises the question of whether human expertise will eventually be replaced by machines. This question depends on whether and how much of the inter-lingual mediation process depends on inherently human capabilities. To understand the potential boundaries of machines translation, this study draws on the role of cognitive complements in face-to-face communication, focusing on spoken as opposed to the commonly researched written texts. The first part of the study discusses the role of cognitive complements in human communication. Then to illustrate the important role played by cognitive complements in human communication, the second part of the study explains the errors made by NMT from the perspective of cognitive complements, based on a sample text analysis using Google Translate. The analysis indicate that applying the current engine to face-to-face encounters has serious pragmatic risks. From the perspective of machine translation, therefore, the ability to apply cognitive complements like human beings, with the ability to draw on extra-linguistic context may be the key to making NMT ready for real-world applications as far as the processing of spoken texts is concerned. While effort is underway to relate sensory experience to text processing, enormous computing power requirement may be another obstacle before human interpreters can be replaced completely. Pedagogic implications of this study for post-graduate interpreting programs are discussed in the final part of the paper.1. Introduction 2. Theoretical Background 2.1. How Human Communication Works 2.2. How Machine Translation WorksHow nominal definiteness is interpreted from Korean to English

However, it is not easy to construct a NE dictionary manually since human annotation is time consuming and labor-intensive. To save construction time and reduce human labor, we propose a semi-automatic system for the construction of a NE dictionary. The proposed system constructs a pseudo-document with Wiki-categories per NE class by using an active learning technique. Then, it calculates similarities between Wiki entries and pseudo-documents using the BM25 model, a well-known information retrieval model. Finally, it classifies each Wiki entry into NE classes based on similarities. In experiments with three different types of NE class sets, the proposed system showed high performance(macro-average F1-score of 0.9028 and micro-average F1-score 0.9554).?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?뺣낫寃??湲곕컲 媛쒖껜紐??ъ쟾 援ъ텞?④낵?곸씤 紐⑤뜽 湲곕컲 ?덈뱶濡쒖씠??GUI ?뚯뒪?낆쓣 ?꾪븳 GUI ?곹깭 鍮꾧탳 湲곕쾿

?띿뒪??遺꾨쪟???먯뿰?댁쿂由?遺꾩빞???꾪넻?곸씤 臾몄젣?대떎. 湲곗〈??RNN 諛?CNN 湲곕컲 ?띿뒪??遺꾨쪟 紐⑤뜽?ㅼ? ?쒖감?곸씤 ?⑥뼱 援ъ“???섏〈?섍린 ?뚮Ц???몄젒?섏? ?딆?留?愿?⑥꽦???믪? ?⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 愿怨꾨? ?좎텛?섍린 ?대졄?ㅻ뒗 臾몄젣?먯씠 ?덈떎. 諛섎㈃ GCN(Graph Convolutional Network)? 洹몃옒?꾩쓽 ?뺥깭濡??곗씠?곕? ?낅젰諛쏄린 ?뚮Ц??臾몄옣???쒖감??援ъ“??????섏〈?꾨? 以꾩씪 ???덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??臾몄꽌??鍮꾩닚李⑥쟻??愿怨꾨? 洹몃옒?꾨줈 ?댁븘?댁뼱 ?붿슧 ?④낵?곸쑝濡??뚯븙?섍퀬 遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 ?멸났?좉꼍留?紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. 臾몄꽌瑜?洹몃옒?꾨줈 ?쒗쁽?섍린 ?꾪빐 媛??⑥뼱瑜?洹몃옒?꾩쓽 ?몃뱶濡?蹂?섑븯怨? ?⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 愿怨꾨? 怨꾩궛???ｌ?濡??뺤쓽?쒕떎. 理쒓렐???쒖떆??GCN 援ъ“瑜??듯빐 ?⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 愿怨꾧? 諛섏쁺???⑥뼱 踰≫꽣瑜?怨꾩궛???? ?댄뀗??湲곕컲 ?붿빟 ?⑥닔瑜??듯빐 臾몃떒??二쇱뼱吏??대옒?ㅻ줈 遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?덈∼寃??쒖떆??紐⑤뜽??RNN 諛?CNN 湲곕컲 ?띿뒪??遺꾨쪟 紐⑤뜽蹂대떎 醫뗭? ?깅뒫??蹂댁???Text classification is an important task in natural language processing, and most of the recent approaches employ neural networks to learn and classify the texts. RNN and CNN based models, which are widely used for solving the task, involve reading and processing the text in a sequential manner. This creates inefficiency in learning dependencies between far-apart words. On the contrary, Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) architecture is capable of processing more complex graph-structured data, thus having potential to recognize and learn from complex linguistic structures.
In the present work, we transform text sequences into graphs by assigning each word in the text as a node and representing the relationship between words as edges. We then propose a method for solving text classification that uses recent GCN architectures to take the transformed text-graph as input, learn hidden representations, and output a single hidden representation for classification. In our experiments, our proposed model outperformed RNN and CNN based models with regards to various text classification tasks.A Low-Latency, Traffic-Aware Edge-Cloud Broker Model Underlaying IoT Applications

蹂??쇰Ц? ?뺥삎?붾맂 援ъ“瑜?吏?덈뒗 吏??踰좎씠???몃━??Knowledge Base Triples) ?곗씠?곕? ?쒖슜?섏뿬 ?먯뿰???뺥깭??臾몄옣 ?앹꽦 ?곌뎄瑜?吏꾪뻾?섏??? ?몃━?뚯쓣 援ъ껜?곸쑝濡??쒗쁽?섎뒗 臾몄옣 ?앹꽦???꾪빐 LSTM(Long Short-term Memory Network) ?몄퐫??Encoder)-?붿퐫??Decoder) 援ъ“瑜??쒖슜, 二쇱쓽吏묒쨷 硫붿빱?덉쬁(Attention Mechanism)???곸슜?섏??? ?뚯뒪???곗씠?곗뿉 ???BLEU, ROUGE ?ㅼ퐫??媛곴컖 42.264 (BLEU-1), 32.441(BLEU-2), 26.820(BLEU-3), 24.446(BLEU-4), 47.341(ROUGE-L) ?깅뒫??蹂댁??쇰ŉ, ?숈씪 ?곗씠?곗쓽 鍮꾧탳 紐⑤뜽?????0.8%(BLEU-1) ?곸듅???깅뒫??蹂댁??? ?먰븳 ?곸쐞 10媛쒖쓽 ?뚯뒪???곗씠??BLEU ?ㅼ퐫???됯퇏 痢≪젙 寃곌낵 99.393(BLEU-1)濡??믪? ?ㅼ퐫?대? 湲곕줉?섏뿬, ?대? ?듯빐 臾몄옣 ?앹꽦 寃곌낵媛 ?좎쓽誘명븿???뺤씤?섏???In this paper, we have investigated the generation of natural language sentences by using Knowledge Base Triples data with a structured structure. In order to generate a sentence that expresses the triple, a LSTM (Long Short-term Memory Network) encoder-decoder structure is used along with an Attention Mechanism. The BLEU score and ROUGE score for the test data were 42.264 (BLEU-1), 32.441 (BLEU-2), 26.820 (BLEU-3), 24.446 (BLEU-4), and 47.341 and 0.8% (based on BLEU-1) for the data comparison model. In addition, the average of the top 10 test data BLEU scores was recorded as 99.393 (BLEU-1).?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽?ъ링 ?좉꼍留앹쓽 ?곸긽 ?몄떇 遺꾨쪟 ?깅뒫 洹좎씪???μ긽???꾪븳 紐낆떆???곹샇蹂댁셿 ?숈긽釉?援ъ“

3D DEM???댁슜??吏곸젒?꾨떒 ?ㅽ뿕 紐⑥궗?먯꽌???섏튂?댁꽍??二쇱슂?몄옄 怨좎같
??쒗넗紐⑺븰?? ?ㅽ깭??Yun, Taeyoung), [2018]

In this paper, we proposed a method that can control mobile devices by grasping a user?셲 intention and extracting useful information from the speech through natural language processing. The user?셲 speech input to a mobile device is transcribed to texts using the Speech Input API, and then the transcription is sent to a web server where it is processed and analyzed. Since the natural language processing is based on the database, we proposed an easy way of adding new patterns to the database. Various speech patterns which are not enrolled in the database are saved and assorted while the input speech is processed through natural language processing. In case of simple and limited scenarios, natural language processing is carried out only by simple morpheme classification.1. ?쒕줎 2. ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 3. ?ㅼ뼇???⑦꽩???먯뿰?대? 異붽??섍린 ?꾪븳 援ъ“ 4. 泥섎━ 寃곌낵 5. 寃곕줎援먯쑁???섏슜媛???ㅼ튂?섎뒗 ?꾨젰??μ옣移섏쓽 理쒖쟻?⑸웾 ?곗젙湲곕쾿??愿???곌뎄

蹂??쇰Ц? 而댄벂??湲곕컲???먮룞 梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ㅼ슜?곸쑝濡??쒖슜?????덈룄濡??먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠???댁슜?섏뿬 梨꾩젏 湲곗????묒꽦 怨쇱젙???쎄쾶 ?섍퀬 ?섏옉??梨꾩젏 鍮꾩슜???덇컧 諛?梨꾩젏 湲곌컙???⑥텞?쒗궎??諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먮룞 梨꾩젏??湲곗????섎뒗 ?뺣떟 ?쒗뵆由우? ?숈깮?ㅼ씠 ?묒꽦???듭븞?ㅻ줈遺???쎄퀬 ?몃━?섍쾶 ?묒꽦?????덈룄濡??섏??쇰ŉ, 梨꾩젏 ?뺥솗?꾨? ?μ긽?쒗궎怨?梨꾩젏 ?ㅻ쪟瑜?理쒖냼?뷀븯???좊ː?꾨? ?믪씠怨좎옄 ?섏??? ?섏옉??梨꾩젏 ??좎뿉 ?먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?꾩엯?섏?????洹??⑥슜?깆쓣 寃利앺븯湲??꾪븯??2014?꾨룄 援???섏? ?숈뾽?깆랬???됯????ы쉶怨쇰ぉ ?듭븞??????먮룞 梨꾩젏???섑뻾?섏???This paper proposes a computer-based practical automatic scoring system for Korean short answers through student answer analysis and natural language processing techniques. The proposed system reduces the overall scoring time and budget, while improving the ease-of-use to write answer templates from student answers as well as the accuracy and reliability of automatic scoring system. To evaluate the application of the automatic scoring system and compare to the human scoring process, we performed an experiment using the student answers of social science subject in 2014 National Assessment of Educational Achievement.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?쒕떟???듭븞???좏삎 遺꾩꽍 3. ?먮룞 梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?ㅺ퀎 諛?援ы쁽媛蹂 ?섑뵆 ?ш린???댁궛 肄붿궗??蹂?섏쓣 ?쒖슜???쒓퀎???곗씠???뺤텞 湲곕쾿

鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 ?쒕?瑜?留욎븘 ?ㅼ뼇???꾨찓?몄뿉???섏뾾??留롮? ?곗씠?곕뱾???앹궛?섎㈃???곗씠???ъ씠?몄뒪媛 ?以묓솕 ?섏뿀怨? ?곗씠?곗쓽 ?섏씠 怨?寃쎌웳?μ씤 ?쒕?媛 ?섏뿀?? ?뱁엳 ???멸퀎 ?곗씠?곗쓽 80% ?댁긽??李⑥??섎뒗 鍮꾩젙???곗씠?곗뿉 ???愿?ъ씠 遺媛곷릺怨??덈떎. ?뚯뀥 誘몃뵒?댁쓽 諛쒖쟾怨??붾텋??鍮꾩젙???곗씠?곗쓽 ?遺遺꾩? ?띿뒪???곗씠?곗쓽 ?뺥깭濡?諛쒖깮?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? 留덉??? 湲덉쑖, ?좏넻 ???ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 以묒슂????븷???섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?섏?留??대윭???뚯뀥 誘몃뵒?대? ?쒖슜???띿뒪??留덉씠?앹? ?섏튂???곗씠?곕? ?쒖슜???곗씠??留덉씠??遺꾩빞??鍮꾪빐 ?묎렐???대졄怨?蹂듭옟??湲곕???鍮꾪빐 洹??쒖슜?꾧? ?믪? 紐삵븳 ?ㅼ젙?대떎. ?댁뿉 蹂??곌뎄???꾨줈洹몃옒諛??몄뼱??怨좎궗???섎뱶?⑥뼱???붾（?섏뿉 ?섏〈?섏? ?딄퀬, ?쎄퀬 媛꾪렪???뚯뀥 誘몃뵒???띿뒪??留덉씠?앹쓣 ?꾪븳 ?듯빀 ?좏뵆由ъ??댁뀡?쇰줈 Korean Natural Language Application(KoALA)??媛쒕컻?섍퀬???쒕떎. KoALA???뚯뀥 誘몃뵒???띿뒪??留덉씠?앹뿉 ?뱁솕???좏뵆由ъ??댁뀡?쇰줈, ?쒓?, ?곷Ц??媛由ъ? ?딄퀬 遺꾩꽍 媛?ν븳 ?듯빀 ?좏뵆由ъ??댁뀡?대떎. ?곗씠???섏쭛?먯꽌 ?꾩쿂由? 遺꾩꽍, 洹몃━怨??쒓컖?붿뿉 ?대Ⅴ????怨쇱젙??泥섎━?댁??? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???붿옄???ъ씠?몄뒪(design science) 諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?쒖슜??KoALA ?좏뵆由ъ??댁뀡???붿옄?? 援ы쁽, ?곸슜?섎뒗 怨쇱젙????댁꽌 ?ㅻ，?? 留덉?留됱쑝濡?釉붾줉泥댁씤 鍮꾩쫰?덉뒪 愿???щ?瑜??ㅼ뼱 KoALA???ㅼ젣 ?쒖슜諛⑹븞????댁꽌 ?ㅻ，?? 蹂??쇰Ц???듯빐 ?뚯뀥 誘몃뵒???띿뒪??留덉씠?앹쓽 ?以묓솕? ?ㅼ뼇???꾨찓?몄뿉???띿뒪??留덉씠?앹쓽 ?ㅻТ?? ?숈닠???쒖슜??湲곕???蹂몃떎.In the Big Data era, data science has become popular with the production of numerous data in various domains, and the power of data has become a competitive power. There is a growing interest in unstructured data, which accounts for more than 80% of the world's data. Along with the everyday use of social media, most of the unstructured data is in the form of text data and plays an important role in various areas such as marketing, finance, and distribution. However, text mining using social media is difficult to access and difficult to use compared to data mining using numerical data. Thus, this study aims to develop Korean Natural Language Application (KoALA) as an integrated application for easy and handy social media text mining without relying on programming language or high-level hardware or solution. KoALA is a specialized application for social media text mining. It is an integrated application that can analyze both Korean and English. KoALA handles the entire process from data collection to preprocessing, analysis and visualization. This paper describes the process of designing, implementing, and applying KoALA applications using the design science methodology. Lastly, we will discuss practical use of KoALA through a block-chain business case. Through this paper, we hope to popularize social media text mining and utilize it for practical and academic use in various domains.?붿빟 ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 媛쒕뀗??諛곌꼍 2.1 ?뚯뀥 誘몃뵒??Social Media) 2.2 ?띿뒪??留덉씠??Text Mining)癒몄떊 ?щ떇???쒖슜???뚯궗 SNS 硫붿떆吏???댄룷???щ━??嫄곕━ 異붿텧 ?곌뎄

??湲??紐⑹쟻? ?섑븳援?뼱?쇺숆낵 ?섑븳援?뼱 諛⑹뼵?쇺숈쓽 臾몄젣?먯쓣 吏?곹븯怨?洹???덉쓣 ?쒖떆?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?섏씪諛섏뼵?댄븰?숆낵 ?숈씪?섍쾶, ?섑븳援?뼱?쇺숈? ?섑븳援?뼱?숈쓽 泥닿퀎??????몄뼱?숈쟻 ?곌뎄瑜?紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?댁빞 ?쒕떎. 洹몃━怨??섏씪諛?諛⑹뼵?쇺숆낵 ?숈씪?섍쾶, ?섑븳援?뼱 諛⑹뼵?쇺숈? ?쒓뎅?댁쓽 諛⑹뼵?ㅼ쓽 洹쒕챸怨?洹쒕챸????諛⑹뼵?????泥닿퀎 ?꾩껜???곌뎄, ???댁긽??諛⑹뼵媛꾩쓽 愿怨꾩? 洹몄? 愿?⑤릺??臾몄젣, 洹몃━怨?諛⑹뼵(?? ?꾩껜瑜???곸쑝濡???諛⑹뼵(????遺꾪솕 諛??몄뼱 ?붿냼????궗???곌뎄瑜?紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?댁빞 ?쒕떎. ?대윭??紐⑹쟻怨쇰뒗 ?щ━, ?섑븳援?뼱?쇺숈? ?섑븳援?뼱???쒖??닳숇굹 以묐?諛⑹뼵????곸쑝濡????곌뎄媛 嫄곗쓽 ?遺遺꾩씠怨??섑븳援?뼱 諛⑹뼵?쇺숈? 吏??뼱??????몄뼱泥닿퀎???쇰???????곌뎄媛 嫄곗쓽 ?遺遺꾩씠?? 洹몃윭誘濡??섑븳援?뼱?쇺숈? ?섑몴以?닳숆? ?꾨땶 ?섏옄?곗뼱?숇줈?쒖쓽 ?쒓뎅?댁뿉 ???泥닿퀎???곌뎄, 利??섏쓬?대줎?? ?섑삎?쒕줎?? ?섑넻?щ줎???깃낵 媛숈? ?섏뼵?댄븰???곌뎄?숇줈 ?꾪솚?댁빞 ?섎ŉ ?섑븳援?뼱 諛⑹뼵?쇺숈? ?쒓뎅?댁뿉 ????섎갑?멸뎄?띾줎?? ?섎갑?몃텇?붾줎?? ?섏?由щ갑?몃줎?? ?섎?鍮꾨갑?몃줎?? ?섎퉬援먮갑?몃줎???깃낵 媛숈? ?섎갑?명븰???곌뎄?숇줈 ?꾪솚?댁빞 ?쒕떎.The purpose of this paper is to discuss the problems with Korean linguistics and Korean dialectology, and to show my opinions as a suitable alternative. Korean linguistics are to study the system of Korean as a natural language, because it is a part of general linguistics which is to study the system of languages. And naturally, Korean dialectology is a study just like the general dialectology which is to compart dialects of a language or sub-dialects of a dialect, to study the system of a dialect of them, to compare and find relations in more than two dialects, and to discuss differentiation of a language or a dialect and the history of a certain linguistic element of a language or a dialect.
Unlike this general purpose of linguistic studies, Korean linguistic studies have focused almost on Korean standard language or central dialect and Korean dialectology has dealt with one of sub-system, such as phonology, morphology, syntax etc. in a certain regional language. Therefore, the Korean linguistics should change to study the system of Korean language as a natural language not focusing on so called standard language, and Korean dialectology should change to general dialectological study such as studies in the division of dialects, geo-dialectology, contrast dialectology, and comparative dialectology etc.1. ?쒕줎 2. ?섑븳援?뼱?쇺숆낵 ?섑븳援?뼱 諛⑹뼵?쇺숈쓽 ?곹샇愿怨?3. ?섑븳援?뼱?쇺숈쓽 ?뺤쓽? ?곌뎄??곴낵 ?곌뎄遺꾩빞 4. ?섑븳援?뼱 諛⑹뼵?쇺숈쓽 ?뺤쓽? ?곌뎄??곴낵 ?곌뎄遺꾩빞 5. ?섑븳援?뼱?쇺숆낵 ?섑븳援?뼱 諛⑹뼵?쇺숈쓽 臾몄젣?먭낵 洹???덀딅룞援?젙?담뗫났?섏쓬??臾명뿄 ???⑥씪???묒긽

?섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍? 臾몄옣??援ъ“??以묒쓽?깆쓣 ?댁냼?섎뒗 臾몄젣濡? 理쒓렐 ?ㅼ뼇???λ윭??湲곗닠???곸슜?섏뼱 ?믪? ?깅뒫??蹂댁씠怨??덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? ?λ윭?앹쓣 ?댁슜???섏〈援щЦ遺꾩꽍???ш쾶 3媛吏 ?④퀎濡?援щ텇?섏뿬 ?댄렣蹂댁븯?? 泥?踰덉㎏???섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍???⑥쐞媛 ?섎뒗 ?댁젅?????踰≫꽣 ?쒗쁽 ?④퀎, ??踰덉㎏??媛??댁젅??二쇱쐞 ?댁젅 ?뺣낫瑜?諛섏쁺?섎뒗 臾몃㎘ 諛섏쁺 ?④퀎, 留덉?留됱? 臾몃㎘ 諛섏쁺???댁젅 ?뺣낫??湲곕컲??吏諛곗냼 諛??섏〈愿怨??몄떇 ?④퀎?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???댁젅 ?쒗쁽 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈 CNN 紐⑤뜽?먯꽌 留롮씠 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 max-pooling 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?섍퀬, 臾몃㎘諛섏쁺???꾪븯??LSTM, GRU蹂대떎 ?곸? 怨꾩궛?됱쓣 媛吏??Minimal-RNN Unit???곸슜?섏??? 留덉?留됱쑝濡?吏諛곗냼 ?몄떇???꾪븯??媛??댁젅 ?ъ씠???곷? 嫄곕━ ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 諛섏쁺??Self-Attention 吏諛곗냼 ?몄떇 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?섍퀬, ?섏〈愿怨??덉씠釉??몄떇???꾪븯??吏諛곗냼 ?몄떇 紐⑤뜽怨??숈떆???숈뒿???섑뻾?섎뒗 multi-task learning???곸슜?섏??? ?됯?瑜??꾪븯???몄쥌怨꾪쉷 援ш뎄議?援щЦ遺꾩꽍 留먮춬移섎? TTA ?쒖? ?섏〈 援ъ“ 媛?대뱶?쇱씤???곕씪 蹂?섑븯?怨? ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵 ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽??UAS 93.38%, LAS 90.42%??援щЦ遺꾩꽍 ?뺥솗?꾨? 蹂댁???Dependency parsing is the problem solving of structural ambiguities of natural language in sentences. Recently, various deep learning techniques have been applied and shown high performance. In this paper, we analyzed deep learning based dependency parsing problem in three stages. The first stage was a representation step for a word (eojeol) that is a unit of dependency parsing. The second stage was a context reflecting step that reflected the surrounding word information for each word. The last stage was the head word and dependency label recognition step. In this paper, we propose the max-pooling method that is widely used in the CNN model for a word representation. Moreover, we apply the Minimal-RNN Unit that has less computational complexity than the LSTM and GRU for contextual representation. Finally, we propose a Self-Attention Head Recognition Model that includes the relative distance embedding between each word for the head word recognition, and applies multi-task learning to the dependency label recognition simultaneously. For the evaluation, the SEJONG phrase-structure parsing corpus was transformed according to the TTA Standard Dependency Guideline. The proposed model showed the accuracy of parsing for UAS 93.38% and LAS 90.42%.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쒖븞 ?섏〈 援щЦ遺꾩꽍 紐⑤뜽Unbalanced U-Net怨?GAN(Generative Adversarial Networks)???댁슜???쒓뎅???고듃 ?먮룞 蹂??

理쒓렐 ?댁쨷 ?몄뼱 ?꾨쿋??bilingual word embedding) 愿???곌뎄?ㅼ씠 媛곴킅??諛쏄퀬 ?덈떎. 洹몃윭???쒓뎅?댁? ?뱀젙 ?몄뼱濡?援ъ꽦??蹂묐젹(parallel-aligned) 留먮춬移섎줈 ?댁쨷 ?몄뼱 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?섎뒗 ?곌뎄??吏덉씠 ?믪? 留롮? ?묒쓽 留먮춬移섎? 援ы븯湲??대젮??誘濡??쒕컻???대（?댁?吏 ?딄퀬 ?덈떎. ?뱁엳, ?뱀젙 ?곸뿭???ъ슜?????덈뒗 濡쒖뺄 ?댁쨷 ?몄뼱 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋??local bilingual word embedding)??寃쎌슦???곷??곸쑝濡????ъ냼?섎떎. ?먰븳 ?댁쨷 ?몄뼱 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?섎뒗 寃쎌슦 踰덉뿭 ?띿씠 ?⑥뼱??媛쒖닔?먯꽌 ?쇰?????묒쓣 ?대（吏 紐삵븯??寃쎌슦媛 留롫떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??濡쒖뺄 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?꾪빐 ?쒓뎅???곸뼱濡?援ъ꽦???쒓뎅 踰뺣쪧 ?⑤씫 868,163 媛쒕? ?щ·留?crawling)?섏뿬 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?섏?怨?3媛吏 ?곌껐 ?꾨왂???쒖븞?섏??? 蹂??꾨왂? ?욎꽌 ?멸툒??遺덇퇋移숈쟻 ???臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍퀬 ?⑤씫 ?뺣젹 留먮춬移섏뿉??踰덉뿭 ?띿쓽 吏덉쓣 ?μ긽?쒖섟?쇰ŉ 踰좎씠?ㅻ씪?몄씤 湲濡쒕쾶 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋??global bilingual word embedding)怨?鍮꾧탳?섏?????2諛곗쓽 ?깅뒫???뺤씤?섏???Recently, studies about bilingual word embedding have been gaining much attention. However, bilingual word embedding with Korean is not actively pursued due to the difficulty in obtaining a sizable, high quality corpus. Local embeddings that can be applied to specific domains are relatively rare. Additionally, multi-word vocabulary is problematic due to the lack of one-to-one word-level correspondence in translation pairs. In this paper, we crawl 868,163 paragraphs from a Korean-English law corpus and propose three mapping strategies for word embedding. These strategies address the aforementioned issues including multi-word translation and improve translation pair quality on paragraph-aligned data. We demonstrate a twofold increase in translation pair quality compared to the global bilingual word embedding baseline.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 2.1 Word Embedding?먭린二쇱옣?덈젴 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??媛꾪샇?ъ쓽 遺?뺤쟻 ?됯???????먮젮?, ?먭린二쇱옣?됰룞 諛??섏궗?뚰넻??誘몄튂???④낵??愿???듯빀 ?곌뎄

?⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋?⑹? 而댄벂?곌? ?먯뿰?대? ?몄떇?????덈룄濡??섎뒗 蹂??湲곕쾿?쇰줈 湲곌퀎踰덉뿭, 媛쒖껜紐??몄떇 ??湲곌퀎?숈뒿??諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?섎뒗 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?ㅼ뼇?섍쾶 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?앹꽦?섎뒗 ?ㅼ뼇???⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋??紐⑤뜽?ㅼ씠 議댁옱?섏?留??대윭??紐⑤뜽?ㅼ쓣 ?숈씪??議곌굔?먯꽌 ?깅뒫??鍮꾧탳 遺꾩꽍???곌뎄媛 誘몃퉬?섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쒓뎅???뺥깭???⑥쐞 ?꾩뼱?곌린瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?섏뿬 ?쒕컻?섍쾶 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 紐⑤뜽??Word2Vec??Skip-Gram怨?CBOW, GloVe, FastText???깅뒫??鍮꾧탳 遺꾩꽍?쒕떎. ?댁뒪 ??⑸웾 留먮춬移?諛??몄쥌 留먮춬移섎? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?ㅽ뿕??寃곌낵 FastText媛 媛???믪? ?깅뒫???뺤씤?????덉뿀??Word embedding is a transformation technique that enables a computer to recognize natural language. It is used in various fields of natural language processing based on machine learning such as machine translation and named-entity recognition. Various word-embedding models are available; however, few studies have compared the performance of these models under similar conditions. In this paper, we compare and analyze the performance of Word2Vec Skip-Gram, CBOW, Glove, and FastText, which are actively used according to Korean morpheme spacing. Based on experimental results with large news corpus and Sejong corpus, FastText yielded the best performance among CBOW, Skip-gram, Glove, and FastText of Word2Vec.GTLC????낅낫議댁뿉 ???湲곌퀎利앸챸

?곗냽 ?뚯꽦 ?몄떇 寃곌낵瑜??먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠怨??묐ぉ?쒗궎湲??꾪빐 泥섎━?댁빞 ???먭?吏 臾몄젣?먯씠 ?덈떎. 泥レ㎏??留먰븯???⑥쐞? 臾몄꽌???꾩뼱?곌린 ?⑥쐞媛 ?쇱튂?섏? ?딅뒗?ㅻ뒗 寃껋씠怨? ?섏㎏??諛쒖쓬???뺥깭???대? 諛??뺥깭??媛꾩뿉 ?뚯슫 蹂???꾩긽???앷릿?ㅻ뒗 寃껋씠?? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌?????먭?吏 臾몄젣瑜??댁젅?앹꽦湲곗? ?뚯젅蹂듭썝湲곕줈 ?닿껐?섍퀬, ?앹꽦??寃곌낵?ㅼ쓣 ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 ?ㅽ뙣??寃곌낵?ㅼ? 援먯젙湲곕? ?듯빐 援먯젙?섎뒗 ?곗냽 ?뚯꽦 ?몄떇 ?꾩쿂由??쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ы쁽?섏??? ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?ㅽ뿕? ??醫낅쪟???뚯꽦 留먮춬移?竊? 援먭낵???뚯꽦 留먮춬移섏? ?ъ꽕 ?뚯꽦 留먮춬移섎? ???쑝濡??섑뻾?섏??? 媛?留먮춬移섏뿉 ????깃났瑜좎? 媛곴컖 93.72%, 92.26% ?怨? ???ㅽ뿕?쇰줈 ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖? ?뚯꽦 留먮춬移섏쓽 醫낅쪟??誘쇨컧?섏? ?딅뒗 ?덉젙???쒖뒪?쒖엫???????덉뿀??There are two problems which will be processed to graft a continuous speech recognition results into natural language processing technique. First, the speaking's unit isn't consistent with text's spacing unit. Second, when it is to be pronounced the phonological alternation phenomena occur inside morphemes or among morphemes. In this paper, we implement the postprocessing system of a continuous speech recognition that above all, solve two problems using the eo-jeol generator and syllable recoveror and morphologically analyze the generated results and then correct the failed results through the corrector. Our system experiments with two kinds of speech corpus, i.e., a primary school text book and editorial corpus. The successful percentage of the former is 93.72%, that of the latter is 92.26%. As results of experiment, we verified that our system is stable regardless the sorts of corpus.FFR?먯꽌???꾧퀎-??寃쎈줈瑜??댁슜???⑥쑉?곸씤 ?뚯뒪???앹꽦

?뚯꽦 ?몄뼱 ?댄빐???먯뿰???뚯꽦?쇰줈遺??而댄벂?곌? 泥섎━?????덈뒗 ?뺥깭???섎?瑜???ν븯???섎? 援ъ“瑜?異붿텧?섎뒗 臾몄젣瑜??ㅻ，?? ?遺遺꾩쓽 ?뚯꽦 ?몄뼱 ?댄빐 ?쒖뒪?쒕뱾? ?뷀뻾 遺꾩꽍怨?媛쒖껜紐?遺꾩꽍??援щ텇?섏뿬 泥섎━?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄?먯꽌???대윭????媛吏 臾몄젣瑜??낅┰?곸씠嫄곕굹 ?쒖감?곸씤 諛⑹떇?쇰줈 泥섎━?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?섏?留??쒖감???쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒕뒗 ?뷀뻾怨?媛쒖껜紐낆씠 ??諛⑺뼢?쇰줈留??곹뼢??二쇨쾶 ?섎뒗 ?⑥젏??議댁옱?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???뷀뻾怨?媛쒖껜紐낆쓣 ?숈떆??泥섎━?섍린 ?꾪빐 Triangular-chain CRF?쇰뒗 ?덈줈??寃고빀 ?뚯꽦 ?몄뼱 ?댄빐 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?뚯꽦 ????곗씠?곕? ?댁슜???ㅽ뿕???듯빐 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 寃고빀 紐⑤뜽???낅┰ 諛??쒖감??諛⑸쾿怨?鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 ?깅뒫???μ긽?⑥쓣 ?쒖떆?쒕떎.Spoken language understanding (SLU) addresses the problem of mapping natural language speech into semantic frame for structure encoding of its meaning. Most of the SLU systems separate out the dialog act (DA) identification from the named entity (NE) recognition to generate the semantic frames. In previous works, these two subtasks are treated by independent or cascaded approaches. In the cascaded systems, however, DA and NE influence only to one side, rather than to both sides. In this paper, we develop a new joint SLU model with a triangular-chain conditional random field (CRF) to encode inter-dependence between DA and NE. On four real dialog data, we show that our joint approach outperforms both independent and cascaded
approaches.?붿빟 Abstract 1. Introduction 2. Motivation 3. Method?⑥뼱?щ툝 ?섍꼍???곹빀??紐⑤컮??RFID 誘몃뱾?⑥뼱 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?ㅺ퀎 諛?援ы쁽

泥?냼?꾧낵 ?쇰━ ?대떟?곗쓽 ?ㅽ룷痢?諛??뷀꽣?뚯씤癒쇳듃 ?쒕룞???꾪븳 裕ㅼ쭅 ?ы궥 ?붿옄???곌뎄
?쒓뎅李⑥꽭?而댄벂?낇븰?? 沅뚯긽?? [2008] [KCI?깆옱]

The purpose of this study is to suggest a basis for exterior space improving in university campus in terms of upgrading the quality of university education environment by analysing user's cognition and physical feature about campus exterior space. For this, this study was survey six major university students in Busan city about perception of campus exterior space, and analyzes the user's cognition by using natural-language vocabulary analysis for qualitative approach. Next, this study analyzes the physical feature of campus exterior space by investigating user's intensive using spaces and preferred, non-preferred spaces in their universities, then propose the improved direction of campus exterior space by comparing the analyzed data of user's cognition and physical feature. A SPSS20 program is used for the data analysis and the sample sizes are 171 college students.?곴뎅??DQIfS瑜??ы븿???ъ슜?먯갭?ъ꽕怨꾧낵??UPDP)???곸슜?곌뎄

However, existing document summary research methods rely on overly simple statistics, so there is insufficient research on multiple document summaries for ambiguity of sentences and meaningful sentence generation. In this paper, we investigate semantic connection and preprocessing process to process unnecessary information. Based on the vocabulary semantic pattern information, we propose a multi-document summarization method that enhances semantic connectivity between sentences using VAE. Using sentence word vectors, we reconstruct sentences after learning from compressed information and attribute discriminators generated as latent variables, and semantic connection processing generates a natural summary sentence. Comparing the proposed method with other document summarization methods showed a fine but improved performance, which proved that semantic sentence generation and connectivity can be increased. In the future, we will study how to extend semantic connections by experimenting with various attribute settings.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?2.1 湲곗〈???ㅼ쨷 臾몄꽌 ?붿빟 ?곌뎄A Study on 360째 Image Production Method for VR Image Contents

?띿뒪?몃쭏?대떇 湲곗닠??諛쒖쟾? ?뺤콉?숈쓣 鍮꾨’???ы쉶怨쇳븰 ?곸뿭?먯꽌 ?띿뒪?몃? ?쒖슜???곌뎄媛 利앷??섎뒗??湲곗뿬???붿쑝硫? 洹???쒖쟻 ?덇? ?띿뒪??遺꾩꽍???ㅽ듃?뚰겕 遺꾩꽍???묐ぉ???뺤콉 ?꾨젅??遺꾩꽍?대떎. ?섏?留??띿뒪?몃뒗 ??쒖쟻??鍮꾩젙???곗씠?곗씠硫? ?곕씪???대? 遺꾩꽍 媛?ν븳 ?뺥깭濡?蹂?섑븯湲??꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?ㅼ뼇???붿씤??????듬났?⑹쟻 怨좊젮媛 ?꾩슂?섎떎. 洹몃읆?먮룄 ?ы쉶怨쇳븰 ?곸뿭?먯꽌 ?띿뒪?몃? ?곗씠?곕줈 ?ъ슜??湲곗〈 援?궡 ?곌뎄??寃쎌슦, ?먮즺?뺣━ 怨쇱젙??????먯꽭??紐낆떆?섏? ?딆븯?ㅻ뒗 ?쒓퀎瑜?蹂댁씠怨??덈떎. ?댁뿉 ?곕씪 蹂??곌뎄???ы쉶?꾩긽??遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪빐 ??⑸웾???띿뒪???먮즺瑜??ъ슜?섎뒗 寃쎌슦??珥덉젏??留욎텛?? ?띿뒪???먮즺?뺣━ 諛⑹떇 諛??덉감???뺥삎?붾? ?쒕룄?섏??? ?대? ?꾪빐 1) ?띿뒪???먮즺?뺣━ 怨쇱젙?먯꽌??怨좊젮?붿씤??醫낇빀?섍퀬, 2) 遺꾩꽍 ????띿뒪?몄쓽 5% 誘몃쭔???대떦?섎뒗 ?섑뵆??臾댁옉??異붿텧?섏뿬 ?곌뎄?먯쓽 ?먮즺?뺣━ 寃곌낵瑜??꾨줈洹몃옩???듯븳 ?먮즺?뺣━ 寃곌낵? 鍮꾧탳?섎뒗 諛⑹떇???쒖떆?섏??쇰ŉ, ?대븣 3) 鍮꾧탳怨쇱젙??諛섎났???듯빐 ?먮즺?뺣━ 寃곌낵???ㅻ쪟瑜?媛쒖꽑???섍컝 ???덈뒗 諛⑹븞 ??떆 ?쒖븞?섏??? ?댁? 媛숈? 諛⑹떇 諛??덉감???곕씪 ?띿뒪???먮즺瑜??뺣━??寃곌낵, ?먮즺?뺣━ 寃곌낵???곷????ㅻ쪟瑜??곷떦遺臾?媛먯냼?쒗궗 ???덈떎???ъ떎???뺤씤?????덉뿀??珥덈줉 ?? 臾몄젣?쒓린 ?? 臾명뿄寃???? ?곌뎄?ㅺ퀎 ?? 遺꾩꽍寃곌낵?됱젙??遺꾩빞??濡쒖??ㅽ떛 ?뚭?遺꾩꽍 ?쒖슜 ?덉감? ?곸젏

鍮??곗씠?곕뒗 ?щ윭 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?ㅼ뼇?섍쾶 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?덈? ?ㅼ뼱, 而댄벂?고븰怨??ы쉶?숈뿉??鍮??곗씠?곗뿉 ????쒕줈媛꾩쓽 ?묎렐諛⑸쾿?????李⑥씠???덇쿋吏留?鍮??곗씠?곗쓽 遺꾩꽍???듯븳 ?쒖슜 痢〓㈃?먯꽌??怨듯넻?곸씤 遺遺꾩쓣 媛뽯뒗?? ?곕씪???遺遺꾩쓽 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 鍮??곗씠?곗뿉 ????섎? ?덈뒗 遺꾩꽍怨??쒖슜? ?꾩슂?섍쾶 ?쒕떎. ?듦퀎?숆낵 湲곌퀎?숈뒿? 鍮??곗씠?곗쓽 遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 ?ㅼ뼇??諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?쒓났?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??鍮??곗씠?곕텇??怨쇱젙????섏뿬 ?뚯븘蹂닿퀬 ?섏쭛??鍮낅뜲?댄꽣???먯쿇?먯꽌遺??遺꾩꽍??嫄곗퀜 理쒖쥌?곸쑝濡?遺꾩꽍寃곌낵瑜??쒖슜?섎뒗 ?꾩껜 怨쇱젙???꾪븳 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 鍮??곗씠??遺꾩꽍諛⑸쾿????섏뿬 ?곌뎄?쒕떎. ?뱁엳, 鍮??곗씠?곗쓽 ?뱀꽦??媛뽯뒗 ?щ윭 ?곗씠??以??섎굹???뱁뿀臾몄꽌 ?곗씠?곗뿉 ??섏뿬 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣遺꾩꽍???곸슜?섏뿬 ?④낵?곸씤 ?뱁뿀遺꾩꽍???섑뻾?섍퀬 ??寃곌낵瑜??곌뎄媛쒕컻 湲고쉷???곸슜?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿濡좎뿉 ??섏뿬 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞諛⑸쾿??????ㅼ젣?곸슜???꾪븯?????멸퀎 ?뱁뿀?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪濡쒕????ㅼ젣 湲곗뾽???꾩껜 異쒖썝, ?깅줉 ?뱁뿀臾몄꽌瑜??섏쭛, 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 ?곌뎄媛쒕컻 ?낅Т???쒖슜?섎뒗 ??怨쇱젙??????щ??곌뎄瑜??섑뻾?섏???Big data has been used in diverse areas. For example, in computer science and sociology, there is a difference in their issues to approach big data, but they have same usage to analyze big data and imply the analysis result. So the meaningful analysis and implication of big data are needed in most areas. Statistics and machine learning provide various methods for big data analysis. In this paper, we study a process for big data analysis, and propose an efficient methodology of entire process from collecting big data to implying the result of big data analysis. In addition, patent documents have the characteristics of big data, we propose an approach to apply big data analysis to patent data, and imply the result of patent big data to build R&D strategy. To illustrate how to use our proposed methodology for real problem, we perform a case study using applied and registered patent documents retrieved from the patent databases in the world.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 鍮??곗씠???꾩쿂由?3. 鍮??곗씠???꾩쿂由щ? ?꾪븳 ?듦퀎???띿뒪??留덉씠?앹쁺?곴린諛?臾쇱껜異붿쟻???섑븳 ?뚰삎 荑쇰뱶濡쒗꽣???먯꽭異붿젙 ?깅뒫?μ긽

LDA ?좏뵿 紐⑤뜽留곸쓣 ?쒖슜?섍린??諛⑸????묒쓽 ?곗씠?곕? ?쎄쾶 遺꾩꽍 媛?ν븯?ㅻ뒗 寃껉낵 湲곗〈???ш굔 ?먯??먯꽌???뚯븙?섍린 ?대젮?좊뜕 ?ш굔 媛?愿?⑥꽦??二쇱젣 ?숈떆異쒗쁽???듯빐 ?뚯븙?????덈떎???먯뿉??湲곗〈???ш굔 ?먯? 諛⑸쾿怨?李⑤퀎?붾맂??News articles are the most suitable medium for examining the events occurring at home and abroad. Especially, as the development of information and communication technology has brought various kinds of online news media, the news about the events occurring in society has increased greatly. So automatically summarizing key events from massive amounts of news data will help users to look at many of the events at a glance. In addition, if we build and provide an event network based on the relevance of events, it will be able to greatly help the reader in understanding the current events.
In this study, we propose a method for extracting event networks from large news text data. To this end, we first collected Korean political and social articles from March 2016 to March 2017, and integrated the synonyms by leaving only meaningful words through preprocessing using NPMI and Word2Vec. Latent Dirichlet allocation (LDA) topic modeling was used to calculate the subject distribution by date and to find the peak of the subject distribution and to detect the event. A total of 32 topics were extracted from the topic modeling, and the point of occurrence of the event was deduced by looking at the point at which each subject distribution surged. As a result, a total of 85 events were detected, but the final 16 events were filtered and presented using the Gaussian smoothing technique. We also calculated the relevance score between events detected to construct the event network. Using the cosine coefficient between the co-occurred events, we calculated the relevance between the events and connected the events to construct the event network. Finally, we set up the event network by setting each event to each vertex and the relevance score between events to the vertices connecting the vertices. The event network constructed in our methods helped us to sort out major events in the political and social fields in Korea that occurred in the last one year in chronological order and at the same time identify which events are related to certain events.
Our approach differs from existing event detection methods in that LDA topic modeling makes it possible to easily analyze large amounts of data and to identify the relevance of events that were difficult to detect in existing event detection. We applied various text mining techniques and Word2vec technique in the text preprocessing to improve the accuracy of the extraction of proper nouns and synthetic nouns, which have been difficult in analyzing existing Korean texts, can be found.
In this study, the detection and network configuration techniques of the event have the following advantages in practical application. First, LDA topic modeling, which is unsupervised learning, can easily analyze subject and topic words and distribution from huge amount of data. Also, by using the date information of the collected news articles, it is possible to express the distribution by topic in a time series. Second, we can find out the connection of events in the form of present and summarized form by calculating relevance score and constructing event network by using simultaneous occurrence of topics that are difficult to grasp in existing event detection. It can be seen from the fact that the inter-event relevance-based event network proposed in this study was actually constructed in order of occurrence time. It is also possible to identify what happened as a starting point for a series of events through the event network.
The limitation of this study is that the characteristics of LDA topic modeling have different results according to the initial parameters and the number of subjects, and the subject and event name of the analysis result should be given by the subjective judgment of the researcher. Also, since each topic is assumed to be exclusive and independent, it does not take into account the relevance between themes. Subsequent studies need to calculate the relevance between events that are1. ?쒕줎 2. ?좏뻾?곌뎄 3. ?곗씠???섏쭛 諛??꾩쿂由?怨쇱젙 4. ?ш굔?먯? 怨쇱젙 5. ?ш굔 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕 援ъ꽦 寃곌낵?⑦넧濡쒖? 吏??湲곕컲 ?뱀꽦移섎? ?쒖슜??Bidirectional LSTM-CRF 紐⑤뜽???쒗???쒓퉭 ?깅뒫 ?μ긽??愿???곌뎄
?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, 吏꾩듅??Seunghee Jin), [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

GSN? ?쒖뒪?쒖씠 ?덉쟾?섎떎??寃껋쓣 愿?④린愿??利앸챸?섍린 ?꾪븳 Safety Case ?묒꽦?먯꽌 ?곹빀?깆쓣 ?몄젙諛쏄퀬 ?덈뒗 ?쒓린踰뺤쑝濡?湲곕뒫紐⑺몴, Safety Evidence ?깆쓣 ?쒗쁽?쒕떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???덉쟾 ?꾩닔 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?붽뎄?ы빆??紐낆꽭?섍린???곹빀?섎룄濡??ㅺ퀎???쒖?臾몄븞怨?GSN 紐⑤뜽???댁슜?섏뿬 ?붽뎄?ы빆 紐낆꽭?④퀎?먯꽌遺??寃고븿???쎄쾶 ?앸퀎?섍퀬, Safety Evidence????곌껐???듯빐 ?덉쟾?곹빀?깆쓣 利앸챸?????덈떎. ?먰븳 ??怨쇱젙?먯꽌 諛쒓껄???붽뎄?ы빆??寃고븿???섏젙?섏뿬 ?덉쟾???덈뒗 ?뚰봽?몄썾?대? 媛쒕컻?????덈떎.In safety-critical systems, software defects may have serious consequences. Therefore, defects should be considered during the requirements specification process, which is the first step of a software development lifecycle. Stakeholder requirements that are usually written in natural language are difficult to derived, and there may also be defects due to ambiguity and inaccuracy. To address these issues, we propose a requirement specification method using a standardized Boilerplate and a GSN Model. The Boilerplate is a semi-standard language that follows a predefined format. Due to its ability to provide a consistent representation of the requirements, boilerplate helps stakeholders avoid ambiguities about what they mean and to define the exact meaning of the requirement. Meanwhile, GSN is recognized notation to prepare a Safety Case to prove to authorities that a system is safe. It can be expressed as a functional goal, e.g., Safety Evidence, etc. The proposed study allows an analyst to easily identify a fault from the early stage of the software development lifecycle. The Boilerplate and GSN Model are designed to specify the requirements of safety critical systems and to prove safety conformity through a connection with Safety Evidence. In addition, the proposed approach is also useful to develop secure software by correcting deficiencies in the requirements found during this process.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쒖븞諛⑸쾿HTML5 罹붾쾭?ㅻ? ?쒖슜?섎뒗 ???댄뵆由ъ??댁뀡???ㅻ깄??湲곕컲 ?곗궛 ?ㅽ봽濡쒕뵫

?쇰컲?곸쑝濡??쒓뎅???덉궗 ?쒓퉭? ?⑥뼱 ?⑥쐞濡??꾩뼱?곌린媛 ?꾨즺??臾몄옣???낅젰?쇰줈 諛쏅뒗?? 留뚯씪 ?꾩뼱?곌린媛 ?쒕?濡??섏? ?딆? 臾몄옣??泥섎━?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?ㅻ쪟瑜??섏젙?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?먮룞 ?꾩뼱?곌린 泥섎━媛 ?좏뻾?섏뼱???쒕떎. 洹몃윭???먮룞 ?꾩뼱?곌린 泥섎━? ?덉궗 ?쒓퉭???쒖감?곸쑝濡??섑뻾?섎㈃ 媛??④퀎?먯꽌 諛쒖깮?섎뒗 ?ㅻ쪟濡??명빐 ?ш컖???깅뒫 ????꾩긽??諛쒖깮?????덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???먮룞 ?꾩뼱?곌린? ?덉궗 ?쒓퉭???숈떆???섑뻾?????덈뒗 ?듯빀 紐⑤뜽??援ъ텞?섏뿬 ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?몃??곸쑝濡?Bidirectional LSTM-CRF 紐⑤뜽??諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?뚯젅 湲곕컲???꾩뼱?곌린 諛??덉궗 ?쒓퉭???곷낫?곸쑝濡??숈떆???섑뻾?????덈뒗 ?듯빀 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒓뎅??臾몄뼱 ?덉궗 遺李?留먮춬移섎? ?댁슜???ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?꾩뼱?곌린媛 ?꾩쟾??臾몄옣????댁꽌??98.77%???덉궗 ?쒓퉭 ?깅뒫??蹂댁??쇰ŉ, ?꾩뼱?곌린媛 ?꾪? ?섏뼱 ?덉? ?딆? 臾몄옣 吏묓빀????댁꽌??97.92%???뺥깭???⑥쐞 F1-measure ?깅뒫???섑??댁뿀??In general, Korean part-of-speech tagging is done on a sentence in which the spacing is completed by a word as an input. In order to process a sentence that is not properly spaced, automatic spacing is needed to correct the error. However, if the automatic spacing and the parts tagging are sequentially performed, a serious performance degradation may result from an error occurring at each step. In this study, we try to solve this problem by constructing an integrated model that can perform automatic spacing and POS(Part-Of-Speech) tagging simultaneously. Based on the Bidirectional LSTM-CRF model, we propose an integrated model that can simultaneously perform syllable-based word spacing and POS tagging complementarily. In the experiments using a Sejong tagged text, we obtained 98.77% POS tagging accuracy for the completely spaced sentences, and 97.92% morpheme accuracy for the sentences without any word spacing.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?ъ링?숈뒿 湲곕컲 ?뚯젅 ?⑥쐞 ?쒓뎅???덉궗 ?쒓퉭 諛??꾩뼱?곌린 ?듯빀 紐⑤뜽?대씪?곕뱶 而댄벂???섍꼍?먯꽌 ?몄쬆?뚯씠釉붿쓣 ?댁슜??ARP ?ㅽ뫖??諛⑹뼱湲곕쾿

OQL 泥섎━湲곕뒗 ?ㅽ궎留?愿由ш린瑜?李몄“?섏뿬 ???愿由ш린濡쒕????곗씠?瑜?寃?됲븳?? ?쒓뎅??吏덉쓽 泥섎━湲곕뒗 ?쒓뎅??吏덉쓽瑜?OQL 紐낅졊臾몄쑝濡?蹂?섑븯湲??꾪빐 ?꾨젅??湲곕컲 吏덉쓽 遺꾪빐 湲곕쾿???ъ슜?쒕떎. ?ъ슜?먯뿉 ?섑빐 ?낅젰???쒓뎅??吏덉쓽???쒓뎅???뚯꽌???섑빐 ?뚯뒪 ?몃━濡?蹂?섎릺怨? ???뚯뒪 ?몃━???ㅼ떆 吏덉쓽援щ줈 遺꾪빐?쒕떎. ?대젃寃?遺꾪빐??吏덉쓽援щ뒗 吏덉쓽 ?꾨젅?꾩쑝濡?蹂?섎릺硫? ??吏덉쓽 ?꾨젅?꾩쑝濡쒕???紐⑺몴 OQL 紐낅졊臾몄씠 ?앹꽦?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?쒓뎅??吏덉쓽 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫 ?됯?瑜??꾪빐 ?ㅼ뼇??吏덉쓽瑜??섏쭛?섏뿬 ?섑뻾??寃곌낵 ??87%??吏덉쓽媛 ?щ컮瑜닿쾶 OQL 紐낅졊臾몄쑝濡?蹂?섎릺?덈떎.A natural language query interface is an efficient retrieval tool for users who don't have enough knowledge about computers and databases. In this paper, we describe a design and implementation of a Korean query system. The Korean query processor transforms Korean queries into OQL (Object Query Language) statements and transfers them to OQL processor. The OQL processor retrieves data from the storage manager by referring the schema manager. The Korean query processor employs a frame-based query decomposition method to transform Korean queries into OQL statements. A Korean query is transformed into a predicate argument structure as its parsing result, which is decomposed into several query phrases. The decomposed query phrases are transformed into query frames, from which the target OQL statements are generated. We collect a large number of sample queries for the performance evaluation and about 87% of the queries are correctly transformed.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?쒓뎅??吏덉쓽 ?쒖뒪??3. 吏덉쓽 蹂??怨쇱젙愿怨꾪삎 ?곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ쓽 媛앹껜吏?μ쟻 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 寃뚯씠?몄썾?댁쓽 ?ㅺ퀎 諛?援ы쁽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 諛뺤긽?? [1997] [KCI?깆옱]
?대씪?댁뼵???쒕쾭 DBMS瑜??꾪븳 硫?곕??붿뼱 ?뺤옣 SQL CLI??媛쒕컻
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 媛뺤?吏(Eunji Kang), [1997] [KCI?깆옱]

To gather training data, we collected 990 sentences from science education journals that illustrate the results of coding elements of argumentation according to Toulmin?셲 argumentation structure framework. We extracted 483 sentences as a test data set from the transcription of students??discourse in scientific argumentation activities. The words and morphemes of each argument were analyzed using the Python ?쁊oNLPy??package and the ?쁊kma??module for Korean Natural Language Processing. After constructing the ?쁝rgument?븁orpheme:class??matrix for 1,473 sentences, five machine learning techniques were applied to generate predictive models relating each sentences to the element of argument with which it corresponded. The accuracy of the predictive models was investigated by comparing them with the results of pre-coding by researchers and confirming the degree of agreement. The predictive model generated by the k-nearest neighbor algorithm (KNN) demonstrated the highest degree of agreement [54.04% (觀 = 0.22)] when machine learning was performed with the consideration of morpheme of each sentence. The predictive model generated by the KNN exhibited higher agreement [55.07% (觀 = 0.24)] when the coding results of the previous sentence were added to the prediction process. In addition, the results indicated importance of considering context of discourse by reflecting the codes of previous sentences to the analysis. The results have significance in that, it showed the possibility of automating the analysis of students??argumentation activities in Korean language by applying machine learning.珥덈벑?숆탳 怨쇳븰?섏뾽?먯꽌 ?숈깮???ъ쟾吏덈Ц 遺꾩꽍? 媛쒕컻 諛??곸슜

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌????湲곕컲???곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪??????먯뿰??寃?됱쓣 紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 踰좎뒪?몃ℓ移??먯깋?뚭퀬由ъ쬁??援ы쁽?섏??? ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???④낵瑜??됯??섍린 ?꾪빐 ?뺣쪧??踰좎뒪??留ㅼ묶?⑥닔瑜??ъ슜?섎뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉???곹빀???뺣낫媛 臾명뿄??寃?됱닚??寃곗젙??誘몄튂???곹뼢???뚯뒪?명븯??? ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵, ?ㅽ깭諛띾맂 ?쒓? ?띿뒪??諛?吏덉쓽?댁뿉 ???踰좎뒪?몃ℓ移??먯깋?먯꽌???뚯닔???곹빀???뺣낫??寃?됲슚?⑥쓣 媛쒖꽑?섎뒗???곹뼢??二쇰뒗 寃껋쑝濡?諛앺?議뚮떎.This paper presents the application of best match search algorithm in the client/server system for natural language. access to Web-based database. For this purpose, the procedures to process Korean word variants as well as to execute probabilistic: weighting scheme: have been implemented in the client/server system. The experimental runs have been done using a Korean test set which includes documents, queries and relevance judgements. The experimental results demonstrate that best match retrieval with relevance information is better than the retrieval without it.1. Introduction 2. Experimental Background 3. Experiments 4. 理쒓렐 ?뺣낫???ы쉶?먯꽌???⑥닚 ?붽린蹂대떎??臾몄젣 ?닿껐 ?λ젰怨?醫낇빀?곸씤 ?ш퀬?μ쓣 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 李쎌쓽?곸씤 ?앷컖???????덈뒗 ?몄옱瑜??붽뎄?쒕떎. ?댁뿉 ?곕씪 援먯쑁怨쇱젙???숈깮?ㅼ쓽 醫낇빀?곸씤 ?ш퀬?μ쓣 ?먮떒?????덈뒗 ?쒕떟??臾명빆???섎━??諛⑺뼢?쇰줈 蹂?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 洹몃윭???쒕떟??臾명빆??寃쎌슦 梨꾩젏?먯쓽 二쇨????섏〈?섏뿬 梨꾩젏??吏꾪뻾?섍린 ?뚮Ц?? 梨꾩젏 寃곌낵???쇨??깆쓣 ?뺣낫?섍린 ?대졄?ㅻ뒗 ?⑥젏???덈떎. ?대윴 ?먯쓣 ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?댁쇅?먯꽌??湲곌퀎?숈뒿???댁슜???먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 梨꾩젏 ?꾧뎄濡??ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?쒓뎅?대뒗 ?곸뼱? ?몄뼱?숈쟻?쇰줈 ?ㅻⅨ 遺꾨쪟???랁븯誘濡??곸뼱沅뚯뿉???ъ슜?섎뒗 ?먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒓뎅?댁뿉 洹몃?濡??곸슜?????녿떎. ?곕씪???쒓뎅??泥닿퀎??留욌뒗 ?먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒕컻???꾩슂?섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??湲곌퀎?숈뒿 遺꾨쪟湲곗쓽 ?덉륫?뺣쪧怨?留뚯옣?쇱튂 諛⑸쾿???ъ슜???쒓뎅???쒕떟??臾명빆 ?먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?뚭컻?섍퀬, ?먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?댁슜??梨꾩젏 寃곌낵? 援먭낵?꾨Ц媛??梨꾩젏 寃곌낵瑜?鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 ?먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?ㅼ슜?깆쓣 寃利앺븳?? 蹂??쇰Ц???ㅽ뿕???꾪빐 2014??援???섏? ?숈뾽?깆랬???됯???援?뼱, ?ы쉶, 怨쇳븰 援먭낵???쒕떟??臾명빆???ъ슜?덈떎. ?됯? 泥숇룄濡??쇱뼱???곴?怨꾩닔? 移댄뙆怨꾩닔瑜??ъ슜?덈떎. 梨꾩젏?먭? 媛쒖엯?덉쓣 ?뚯? 媛쒖엯?섏? ?딆븯???뚯쓽 ?곴?怨꾩닔 紐⑤몢 0.7 ?댁긽?쇰줈 媛뺥븳 ?묒쓽 ?곴?愿怨꾨? 蹂댁??? ?대뒗 ?먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠 援먭낵 ?꾨Ц媛媛 梨꾩젏??寃곌낵? ?좎궗??諛⑺뼢?쇰줈 ?듭븞???먯닔瑜?遺?ы븳 寃껋씠誘濡??먮룞梨꾩젏 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 梨꾩젏 蹂댁“?꾧뎄濡쒖꽌 異⑸텇???ъ슜?????덉쓣 寃껋씠??The emergent information society requires the talent for creative thinking based on problem-solving skills and comprehensive thinking rather than simple memorization. Therefore, the Korean curriculum has also changed into the direction of the creative thinking through increasing short-answer questions that can determine the overall thinking of the students. However, their scoring results are a little bit inconsistency because scoring short-answer questions depends on the subjective scoring of human raters. In order to alleviate this point, an automated scoring system using a machine learning has been used as a scoring tool in overseas. Linguistically, Korean and English is totally different in the structure of the sentences. Thus, the automated scoring system used in English cannot be applied to Korean. In this paper, we introduce an automated scoring system for Korean short-answer questions using predictability and unanimity. We also verify the practicality of the automatic scoring system through the correlation coefficient between the results of the automated scoring system and those of human raters. In the experiment of this paper, the proposed system is evaluated for constructed-response items of Korean language, social studies, and science in the National Assessment of Educational Achievement. The analysis was used Pearson correlation coefficients and Kappa coefficient. Results of the experiment had showed a strong positive correlation with all the correlation coefficients at 0.7 or higher. Thus, the scoring results of the proposed scoring system are similar to those of human raters. Therefore, the automated scoring system should be found to be useful as a scoring tool.而⑤낵猷⑥뀡 ?좉꼍留앹쓣 ?댁슜??吏?ν삎 ?붿옱 ?숈뒿 諛??먯? ?쒖뒪??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 理쒓꼍二?( Kyungjoo Cheoi ), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 諛뺢린吏?( Kiejin Park ), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

蹂??곌뎄???꾨Ц?섏? ?④퍡 ?섎즺 臾명뿄??珥덈줉??遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 ?섎즺臾몄꽌?먯꽌???덉감??吏?앹쓣 紐⑤뜽留곹븯怨??띿뒪??留덉씠??湲곕쾿???곸슜?섏뿬 ?덉감??吏?앹쓣 異붿텧?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿濡좎뿉 ???湲곗닠?쒕떎. ?덉감??吏?앹? 紐⑹쟻怨??대쾿??臾띠쓬?쇰줈, ?대쾿? ?ㅼ떆 ?⑥쐞 ?덉감 吏?앹쓽 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕濡??뺤쓽 ?섏?怨? 紐⑹쟻怨??대쾿 臾몄옣 異붿텧怨??대떦 臾몄옣?먯꽌 ?덉감??吏??異붿텧???꾪빐, ?덉궗?쒓퉭, 援щЦ遺꾩꽍, ?좎뼱-?쇳빆 援ъ“, ?⑦넧濡쒖? ?⑹뼱留ㅽ븨 ?뺣낫 ?깆뿉 湲곕컲??湲곌퀎?숈뒿 諛⑸쾿???ъ슜?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕???꾪빐 ?꾨Ц?섏? ?④퍡 ?꾩븫怨?泥숈텛吏덊솚?????1309 臾몄꽌???덉감??吏???쒓퉭???섑뻾?섏?怨? ??臾몄꽌 吏묓빀??湲곕컲?쇰줈 紐⑹쟻/?대쾿 異붿텧, ?덉감??媛쒖껜(??곸쭏蹂??됱쐞/?곸슜諛⑸쾿)異붿텧, ?⑥쐞 ?덉감 援ъ꽦, 洹몃━怨?媛쒖껜媛?愿怨?異붿텧 ?깆쓽 ?ㅽ뿕???섑뻾?섏뿬, ?④퀎 蹂꾨줈 62%?먯꽌 82%??F-measure 媛믪쓣 ?살뿀??We propose a procedural knowledge extraction on medical abstracts including procedural knowledge modeling. Procedural knowledge in medical documents consists of two main sections, purpose and solution sections. The purpose and solution section is considered as combinations of one or more unit processes which are triples of Target, Action, and Method. In order to extract procedural knowledge in those sections, we applied machine learning approaches like CRFs and SVMs, and utilized part-of-speech tagging, parsing, predicate-argument structuring, and terminology mapping information as their features. In the end, we achieved 62%-82% Fscores in the internal steps.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 蹂몃줎?대㉫ ?ㅽ뵾?덉뼵 ?먮룞 遺꾨쪟 ?쒖뒪??援ы쁽???꾪븳 鍮꾧껐???ㅽ뵾?덉뼵 ?뺤슜??援щЦ 泥섎━

?멸났?좉꼍留앹쓣 ?뺤텞???곸슜?섏뿬 ???믪? ?뺤텞 ?깅뒫??蹂댁씠湲??꾪븳 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁?ㅼ씠 紐?媛吏 ?곌뎄?섏뼱 ?덈떎. 洹몃윭??洹몃룞???대윭???뚭퀬由ъ쬁?ㅼ? ?쒖젙??怨꾩궛 ?λ젰???섎뱶?⑥뼱瑜?媛吏怨??덇린???묒? ?ш린???좉꼍留앹쓣 ?ъ슜???섎컰???놁뿀?쇰ŉ ?곸슜?섎뒗 ?????떆 ?ㅼ젣濡??ъ슜?섍린?먮뒗 ?덈Т ?묒? ?ш린???뚯씪?ㅼ씠?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??GPGPU??怨꾩궛?λ젰???좉꼍留??숈뒿???댁슜?섏뿬 留뚮뱺 ?띿뒪??臾몃㎘ 湲곕컲 臾몄옄 ?깆옣?뺣쪧 ?덉륫湲곗? ?④퍡 ?덊봽留?遺?명솕???깅뒫???믪씪 ???덈뒗 蹂??諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?쒕떎. ?욌㉨???좉꼍留앷낵 GRU?뚭? ?좉꼍留앹뿉 ????ㅽ뿕???섑뻾?섏??쇰ŉ, ?뚭? ?좉꼍留?紐⑤뜽? ?욌㉨???좉꼍留앹뿉 鍮꾪빐 ?곗뼱???덉륫 ?깃났瑜좉낵 ?뺤텞瑜좎쓣 蹂댁???Several methods have been proposed to apply artificial neural networks to text compression in the past. However, the networks and targets are both limited to the small size due to hardware capability in the past. Modern GPUs have much better calculation capability than CPUs in an order of magnitude now, even though CPUs have become faster. It becomes possible now to train greater and complex neural networks in a shorter time. This paper proposed a method to transform the distribution of original data with a probabilistic neural predictor. Experiments were performed on a feedforward neural network and a recurrent neural network with gated-recurrent units. The recurrent neural network model outperformed feedforward network in compression rate and prediction accuracy.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?뺣쪧 ?덉륫湲곕줈?쒖쓽 ?멸났?좉꼍留?3. ?뺣쪧 ?덉륫湲곕? ?ъ슜???뷀듃濡쒗뵾 蹂?섍린遺꾩꽍 ?댁젅 ?ъ쟾怨??뚯젅 ?⑥쐞???뺣쪧 紐⑤뜽???댁슜???쒓뎅???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍湲?蹂듭젣

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??媛쒖젙??濡쒕쭏???쒓린踰뺤뿉 ?쇱튂?섎뒗 ?쒓???濡쒕쭏???쒓린 ?앹꽦???꾪븳 ?쒓?-濡쒕쭏???쒓린 蹂?섑몴???앹꽦??愿???곌뎄瑜??섑뻾?섏??? 濡쒕쭏???쒓린踰뺤쓽 洹쇨컙???섎뒗 ?쒖? 諛쒖쓬踰뺢낵 濡쒕쭏???쒓린踰뺤쓣 ?섑븰?곸쑝濡?遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪븯???섑듃由щ꽬 紐⑤뜽???댁슜???먯뿰 ?몄뼱???섑븰??遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿???꾩엯?섏??? ?섑듃由щ꽬 紐⑤뜽???댁슜??遺꾩꽍??諛⑸쾿?쇰줈 ?쒓? 濡쒕쭏???쒓린 蹂???쒕? ?앹꽦?섍린 ?꾪븳 諛⑹븞怨?濡쒕쭏???쒓린踰뺤쓽 ?섑듃由???紐⑤뜽留곸쓣 ?듯븯??洹??ㅼ쭏?곸씤 ?덈? 蹂댁뿬 ?쒓뎅?댁쓽 ?섑븰??紐⑤뜽留?諛⑹븞怨??곸슜諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?쒕떎. ?앹꽦???쒓?-濡쒕쭏???쒓린 蹂?섑몴瑜?寃利앺븯湲??꾪븯???덈룄??湲곕컲 ?묒슜 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??媛쒕컻?섍퀬 濡쒕쭏???쒓린 ?⑸??ъ쟾??濡쒕쭏???쒓린? ?묒슜 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??寃곌낵瑜?鍮꾧탳?섏???In this paper, we proposed the formation of Korean-Roman alphabet notation conversion table for the generation of Korean-Roman alphabet notation that also meets revised Roman alphabet notation. Introduced a mathematical analyzing method of the natural language which used a petrinet model so that a base of Roman alphabet notation analyzed standard pronunciation and Roman alphabet notation to work mathematically. It display the practical example through a petrinet modeling of a plan and Roman alphabet notation to create a Korean Roman alphabet notation conversion table with the method of the analysis that used a petrinet model, and present a mathematical modeling plan and application method of Korean. We developed application program based on window in order to verify a created Korean-Roman alphabet notation conversion table, and compared the result of an application program with Roman alphabet notation of an Roman alphabet notation example dictionary.Kernel Relaxation怨??숈쟻 紐⑤찘?몃? 議고빀??Support Vector Machine???숈뒿 ?깅뒫 ?μ긽

In this work, WordNet is used for two different purposes: one as a dictionary and the other as an ontology, containing the hierarchical structure, representing hypernym-hyponym relations. The advantage of this approach is twofold. First, it provides a very simple method that is easily implemented. Second, we do not suffer from the lack of large corpus data which would have been necessary in a statistical method. In the future this can be extended to incorporate other relations, such as synonyms, meronyms, and antonyms.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쒖븞??以묒쓽???댁냼 諛⑹떇援ш컙?쒖뼱湲곕쾿???댁슜???꾧린 ?먮룞李⑥쓽 ?뺤냽二쇳뻾???띾룄?쒖뼱湲곗쓽 ?ㅺ퀎

People used writing instruments to write before computer was commercialized. However, today a growing number of them are using computers to write instead. Computerized word processing helps write faster and reduces fatigue of hands than writing instruments, making it better fit to making long texts. However, word processing programs are more likely to cause spelling errors by the mistake of users. Spelling errors distort the shape of words, making it easy for the writer to find and correct directly, but those caused due to users' lack of knowledge or those hard to find may make it almost impossible to produce a document free of spelling errors. However, spelling errors in important documents such as theses or business proposals may lead to falling reliability. Consequently, it is necessary to conduct research on high-level spelling error correction programs for the general public. This study was designed to produce a system to correct sentence-level spelling errors to normal words with Korean alphabet similarity algorithm. On the basis of findings reported in related literatures that corrected words are significantly similar to misspelled words in form, spelling errors were extracted from a corpus. Extracted corrected words were replaced with misspelled ones to correct spelling errors with spelling error detection algorithm.Investigating Product Uncertainties in Online Shopping: Evidence from Kenya

The current technologies for generating Korean image captions contain errors associated with object concurrence attributed to dataset translation from English datasets. In this paper, we propose a model of image caption generation employing attention as a new loss function using the extracted nouns of image references. The proposed method displayed BLEU1 0.686, BLEU2 0.557, BLEU3 0.456, BLEU4 0.372, which proves that the proposed model facilitates the resolution of high-frequency word-pair errors. We also showed that it enhances the performance compared with previous studies and reduces redundancies in the sentences. As a result, the proposed method can be used to generate a caption corpus effectively.Java ?꾨줈洹몃옩 ?⑥쐞 ?뚯뒪??肄붾뱶?먯꽌 諛쒖깮?섎뒗 寃고븿??遺꾨쪟? ?⑦꽩 ?뺤쓽

Graph-based disambiguation has built a semantic graph based on words collocated in context or sentence. However, building such a graph over all ambiguous word lead to unnecessary addition of edges and nodes (and hence increasing the error). In contrast, our work uses Word2Vec to consider the most similar words to an ambiguous word in the context or sentences, to rebuild a graph of the matched words. As a result, we show a higher F1-Measure value than the previous methods by using Word2Vec.?쒕줎 愿???곌뎄 Word2Vec???댁슜??諛섎났???묎렐 諛⑹떇??洹몃옒??湲곕컲 ?⑥뼱 以묒쓽???댁냼 諛⑸쾿 ?ㅽ뿕 諛??됯? 寃곕줎Predictability effects on speech perception in noise (SPIN) in Korean

?뷀뻾(speech act)?대? ?붿옄??諛쒗솕瑜??듯빐 ?섑??섎뒗 ?붿옄???섎룄瑜?媛瑜댄궎硫??먯뿰?대줈 ??諛쒗솕瑜??댄빐?섍퀬 ?댁뿉 ????묐떟???앹꽦?섍린 ?꾪빐 以묒슂???붿냼?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쒓뎅???뷀뻾 寃곗젙???깅뒫???믪씠湲??꾪빐 ???④퀎 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 泥?踰덉㎏ ?④퀎???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍寃곌낵留뚯쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 異붿텧??臾몄옣?먯쭏怨??댁쟾 ?뷀뻾???댁슜?섏뿬 異붿텧??臾몃㎘?먯쭏 以??뺣낫?됱씠 ?믪? ?먯쭏???좏깮?섎뒗 ?④퀎?대떎. ???④퀎?먯꽌???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?꾩껜 ?먯쭏??援ъ꽦?섍퀬 臾몄꽌遺꾨쪟 遺꾩빞???먯쭏 ?좏깮?먯꽌 ?믪? ?깅뒫??蹂댁씤 移댁씠?쒓낢 ?듦퀎?됱쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?④낵?곸씤 ?먯쭏 ?좏깮?쒕떎. ??踰덉㎏ ?④퀎???좏깮???먯쭏怨??좉꼍留앹쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?뷀뻾??遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 ?④퀎?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖떆??諛⑸쾿? ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵留뚯쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?먮룞?곸쑝濡??뷀뻾??寃곗젙?????덈뒗 媛?μ꽦???쒖떆?섏??쇰ŉ ?④낵?곸씤 ?먯쭏 ?좏깮???듯빐 ?먯쭏???섎? 媛먯냼?쒗궎怨??뺣낫?됱씠 ?믪? ?먯쭏???ъ슜?섏뿬 ?띾룄? ?깅뒫???μ긽 ?쒖섟?? 蹂??쇰Ц? ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ㅼ젣 ?곸뿭?먯꽌 ?섏쭛?섏뼱 ?꾩궗??10,285媛쒖쓽 諛쒗솕? 17媛쒖쓽 ?뷀뻾?쇰줈 ?대（?댁쭊 ???肄뷀띁?ㅼ뿉 ????ㅽ뿕?섏??? 蹂??쇰Ц? ??肄뷀띁?ㅼ뿉??8,349媛?諛쒗솕瑜??숈뒿 肄뷀띁?ㅻ줈 ?ъ슜?섏뿬, ?ㅽ뿕 肄뷀띁?ㅼ쓽 1,936媛?諛쒗솕?????1,709媛쒖뿉 ????뺥솗???뷀뻾???쒖떆?섏뿬, 88.3%???뺥솗?꾨? 蹂댁??? ?대뒗 ?먯쭏 ?좏깮???섏? ?딆븯????蹂대떎 ??8%媛 利앷???寃곌낵?대떎.Speech act is the speaker's intentions indicated through utterances. It is important for understanding natural language dialogues and generating responses. This paper proposes the method of two stage that increases the performance of the korean speech act decision. The first stage is to select features from the part of speech results in sentence and from the context that uses previous speech acts. We use2 statistics(CHI) for selecting features that have showed high performance in text categorization. The second stage is to determine speech act with selected features and Neural Network. The proposed method shows the possibility of automatic speech act decision using only POS results, makes good performance by using the higher informative features and speed up by decreasing the number of features. We tested the system using our proposed method in Korean dialogue corpus transcribed from recording in real fields, and this corpus consists of 10,285 utterances and 17 speech acts. We trained it with 8,349 utterances and have test it with 1,936 utterances, obtained the correct speech act for 1,709 utterances(88.3 %). This result is about 8% higher accuracy than without selecting features.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?꾩껜 ?쒖뒪??援ъ“ 3. ?먮룞 ?뷀뻾 遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪?쏹se-Case 湲곕컲 媛앹껜吏???꾨줈?앺듃 ?ㅼ?以꾨쭅 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?덉쭊??Jin Sun Her), [2003] [KCI?깆옱]
?됯??⑥닔???섑빐 ?쇳빀???ㅼ닔??遺꾪븷 諛⑸쾿???곸슜??Visible Human 而щ윭 ?곸긽??遺꾪븷
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?쒖쁺(Hanyoung Kim), [2003] [KCI?깆옱]
踰좎씠吏??異붿젙移섍? 遺?щ맂 ?좎궗??媛以묒튂? ?곌? ?ъ슜??援곗쭛???댁슜???좏샇???덉륫 ?쒖뒪??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?뺢꼍??Kyung-Yong Jung), [2003] [KCI?깆옱]

蹂??쇰Ц? BIM 湲곕컲 ?ㅺ퀎?덉쭏 ?먮룞寃??援ы쁽???꾪빐 ?먯뿰???뺥깭??踰뺢퇋 臾몄옣??而댄벂?곗뿉???ㅽ뻾 媛?ν븳 ?뺥깭濡?蹂?섏떆?ㅺ린 ?꾪븳 ?쇰━洹쒖튃???⑥닔瑜?媛쒕컻?섏??? ?쇰━洹쒖튃???⑥닔??踰뺢퇋臾몄옣???쒖닠遺瑜?紐낇솗???뺥깭濡?蹂?섑븯硫? 寃?좎젣?쎌“嫄댁쓣 ?섑??대뒗 ALU ???ъ슜?섏뼱 理쒖쥌?곸쑝濡?KBimCode 瑜?援ъ꽦?섎뒗 ?붿냼濡??쒖슜?쒕떎. ???踰뺢퇋臾몄옣 833 媛쒕줈遺??60 醫낆쓽 ?쇰━洹쒖튃???⑥닔媛 ?꾩텧?섏뿀?쇰ŉ, 異뷀썑 ???踰뺢퇋??踰붿쐞瑜??뺣??섏뿬 愿묐쾾?꾪븳 ?명뿀媛 愿??諛?愿??嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋瑜?蹂?섑븷 ???덈룄濡??⑥닔??醫낅쪟? 遺꾨쪟泥닿퀎瑜??뺤옣??寃껋씠??Building Information Modeling (BIM) is expanding its influence in various field of architecture, engineering, construction and facility management (AEC-FM) industry. As one of promising direction of BIM application, automated code compliance checking has been available and explored by several domain experts. This paper mainly focuses on the development of high-level methods for rule-making, which is essential process done in the initial stage of the automated code compliance checking. Requirements for the compliance checking is documented in natural language rules, thus translation is needed to convert them into explicit computable rules. The high-level methods translate verbal phrases in building sentences and represent condition, properties and action of objects in computable form. This paper analyzes building permit related code in Korea to define, classify and demonstrates the high-level methods within the computable rule called KBimCode. The findings are expected to be useful as a guideline for the development of computable rule for an automated building permit system in Korea.ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. 嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 遺꾩꽍 諛??쒖닠遺 ?좏삎??3. ?쇰━洹쒖튃???⑥닔 媛쒕컻 4. ?쇰━洹쒖튃???⑥닔???쒖슜Research of Virtual Surgery Procedure using CAD software for TKA

However, this task has many important applications, such as early childhood education, image retrieval, and navigation for blind. In this paper, we describe a Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) model for generating image captions, which takes image features extracted from a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN). We demonstrate that our models produce state of the art results in image caption generation experiments on the Flickr 8K, Flickr 30K, and MS COCO datasets.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. CoreNet怨?SUMO瑜?留ㅽ븨?섍린 ?꾪빐 媛꾩젒 留ㅽ븨怨?吏곸젒 留ㅽ븨 諛⑸쾿??紐⑤몢 ?ъ슜?섏??붾뜲, CoreNet-KorLex-PWN-SUMO???대Ⅴ??媛꾩젒 留ㅽ븨 ?묒뾽???듯븯???쒓뎅??以묒떖??CoreNet怨??곸뼱濡?湲곗닠??SUMO???몄뼱 媛?蹂?섏쓽 ?대젮????꾪솕?섍퀬 CoreNet 媛쒕뀗????묓븯??SUMO ?대옒?ㅼ쓽 ?ы쁽?⑥쓣 洹밸??뷀븯???CoreNet is a valuable resource to use in the domain of natural language processing including Korean-Chinese-Japanese multilingual text analysis, and translation among natural languages. CoreNet is mapped to SUMO in order to encourage its application in broader fields and enhance its international status as a multilingual lexical semantic network. To do this, indirect and direct mapping methodologies are used. Through the indirect mapping among CoreNet-KorLex-PWN-SUMO, we alleviate the difficulty of translating CoreNet concept terms in Korean into SUMO concepts in English, and maximize recall of SUMO concepts corresponding to the concept of CoreNet.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. RFID 紐⑤컮??媛쒖씤 ?뺣낫 蹂댁븞 ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅?고븰湲곗닠?숉쉶, 理???Choi, Sung), [2008]
RFID/USN ?뺣낫 蹂댁븞 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁
?쒓뎅?고븰湲곗닠?숉쉶, 理???Choi, Sung), [2008]

This paper introduces a computerized version of the Korean Standard Pronunciation Rules that can be used in speech engineering systems such as Korean speech synthesis and recognition systems. For this purpose, we build Petri net models for each item of the Standard Pronunciation Rules, and then integrate them into the sound conversion table. The reversion of the Korean Standard Pronunciation Rules regulates the way of matching sounds into grammatically correct written characters. This paper presents not only the sound conversion table but also the character conversion table obtained by reversely converting the sound conversion table. Malting use of these tables, we have implemented a Korean character into a sound system and a Korean sound into the character conversion system, and tested them with various data sets reflecting all the items of the Standard Pronunciation Rules to verify the soundness and completeness of our tables. The test results show that the tables improve the process speed in addition to the soundness and completeness. (Dongguk University)肄뷀띁??鍮덈룄 ?뺣낫 ?쒖슜???꾪븳 ?곸젙 ?듦퀎 紐⑦삎 ?곌뎄: 肄뷀띁??洹쒕え???곕Ⅸ ????좏겙???⑥닔愿怨?以묒떖?쇰줈
?쒓뎅?몄뼱?뺣낫?숉쉶, ?묎꼍?? [2003] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

?뷀뻾(speech act)?대? ?붿옄??諛쒗솕瑜??듯빐 ?섑??섎뒗 ?붿옄???섎룄瑜?媛瑜댄궎硫??먯뿰?대줈 ??諛쒗솕瑜??댄빐?섍퀬 ?댁뿉 ????묐떟???앹꽦?섍린 ?꾪빐 以묒슂???붿냼?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쒓뎅???뷀뻾 寃곗젙???깅뒫???믪씠湲??꾪빐 ???④퀎 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 泥?踰덉㎏ ?④퀎???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍寃곌낵留뚯쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 異붿텧??臾몄옣?먯쭏怨??댁쟾 ?뷀뻾???댁슜?섏뿬 異붿텧??臾몃㎘?먯쭏 以??뺣낫?됱씠 ?믪? ?먯쭏???좏깮?섎뒗 ?④퀎?대떎. ???④퀎?먯꽌???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?꾩껜 ?먯쭏??援ъ꽦?섍퀬 臾몄꽌遺꾨쪟 遺꾩빞???먯쭏 ?좏깮?먯꽌 ?믪? ?깅뒫??蹂댁씤 移댁씠?쒓낢 ?듦퀎?됱쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?④낵?곸씤 ?먯쭏 ?좏깮?쒕떎. ??踰덉㎏ ?④퀎???좏깮???먯쭏怨??좉꼍留앹쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?뷀뻾??遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 ?④퀎?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖떆??諛⑸쾿? ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵留뚯쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?먮룞?곸쑝濡??뷀뻾??寃곗젙?????덈뒗 媛?μ꽦???쒖떆?섏??쇰ŉ ?④낵?곸씤 ?먯쭏 ?좏깮???듯빐 ?먯쭏???섎? 媛먯냼?쒗궎怨??뺣낫?됱씠 ?믪? ?먯쭏???ъ슜?섏뿬 ?띾룄? ?깅뒫???μ긽 ?쒖섟?? 蹂??쇰Ц? ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ㅼ젣 ?곸뿭?먯꽌 ?섏쭛?섏뼱 ?꾩궗??10,285媛쒖쓽 諛쒗솕? 17媛쒖쓽 ?뷀뻾?쇰줈 ?대（?댁쭊 ???肄뷀띁?ㅼ뿉 ????ㅽ뿕?섏??? 蹂??쇰Ц? ??肄뷀띁?ㅼ뿉??8,349媛?諛쒗솕瑜??숈뒿 肄뷀띁?ㅻ줈 ?ъ슜?섏뿬, ?ㅽ뿕 肄뷀띁?ㅼ쓽 1,936媛?諛쒗솕?????1,709媛쒖뿉 ????뺥솗???뷀뻾???쒖떆?섏뿬, 88.3%???뺥솗?꾨? 蹂댁??? ?대뒗 ?먯쭏 ?좏깮???섏? ?딆븯????蹂대떎 ??8%媛 利앷???寃곌낵?대떎.Speech act is the speaker's intentions indicated through utterances. It is important for understanding natural language dialogues and generating responses. This paper proposes the method of two stage that increases the performance of the korean speech act decision. The first stage is to select features from the part of speech results in sentence and from the context that uses previous speech acts. We use 2 statistics(CHI) for selecting features that have showed high performance in text categorization. The second stage is to determine speech act with selected features and Neural Network. The proposed method shows the possibility of automatic speech act decision using only POS results, makes good performance by using the higher informative features and speed up by decreasing the number of features. We tested the system using our proposed method in Korean dialogue corpus transcribed from recording in real fields, and this corpus consists of 10,285 utterances and 17 speech acts. We trained it with 8,349 utterances and have test it with 1,936 utterances, obtained the correct speech act for 1,709 utterances(88.3 %). This result is about 8% higher accuracy than without selecting features.而댄룷?뚰듃 ?됱쐞 而ㅼ뒪?곕쭏?댁젣?댁뀡 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源泥좎쭊, [2003] [KCI?깆옱]

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?쒖쁺, [2003] [KCI?깆옱]

Thus, the recognition of a time expression is an important factor in the field of information extraction. However, most previously designed systems consider only a specific domain, because time expressions do not have a regular form and frequently include different ellipsis phenomena. We present a two-level recognition method consisting of extraction and transformation phases to achieve generality and portability. In the extraction phase, time expressions are extracted by atomic time units for extensibility. Then, in the transformation phase, omitted information is restored using basis time and prior knowledge. Finally, every complete atomic time unit is transformed into a normalized form. The proposed system can be used as a general-purpose system, because it has a language- and domain-independent architecture. In addition, this system performs robustly in noisy data like SMS data, which include various errors. For SMS data, the accuracies of time-expression extraction and time-expression normalization by using the proposed system are 93.8% and 93.2%, respectively. On the basis of these experimental results, we conclude that the proposed system shows high performance in noisy data.?쒕줎 愿???곌뎄 ?ㅽ뿕 諛?寃곌낵 寃곕줎 李멸퀬臾명뿄Invulnerable negative compatibility effect for direction of colored double-headed arrows

Multimodal media content contains heterogeneous data, accordingly, user requires much time and effort to select preferred content. Therefore, in this paper we propose multimodal media content classification using keyword weighting for recommendation. The proposed method extracts keyword that best represent contents through keyword weighting in text data of multimodal media contents. Based on the extracted data, genre class with subclass are generated and classify appropriate multimodal media contents. In addition, the user's preference evaluation is performed for personalized recommendation, and multimodal content is recommended based on the result of the user's content preference analysis. The performance evaluation verifies that it is superiority of recommendation results through the accuracy and satisfaction. The recommendation accuracy is 74.62% and the satisfaction rate is 69.1%, because it is recommended considering the user?셲 favorite the keyword as well as the genre.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?2.1 ?띿뒪??遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 ?먯뿰??泥섎━?꾧뎄???쇱긽?앺솢??珥덉젏????蹂듯빀?몄?以묒옱 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??移섎ℓ怨좎쐞?섍뎔 ?몄씤?먭쾶 誘몄튂???곹뼢 : ?덈퉬?곌뎄

?좏뵿 異붿텧? 臾몄꽌 吏묓빀?쇰줈遺??洹?臾몄꽌 吏묓빀????쒗븯???좏뵿???먮룞 異붿텧?섎뒗 湲곗닠?대ŉ ?먯뿰??泥섎━??以묒슂???곌뎄 遺꾩빞?대떎. ??쒖쟻???좏뵿 異붿텧 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈???좎옱 ?붾━?대젅 ?좊떦怨??⑥뼱 援곗쭛??湲곕컲 ?좏뵿 異붿텧諛⑸쾿???덈떎. 洹몃윭???대윭??諛⑸쾿??臾몄젣?먯쑝濡쒕뒗 ?좏뵿 以묐났 臾몄젣? ?좏뵿 ?쇱옱 臾몄젣媛 ?덈떎. ?좏뵿 以묐났 臾몄젣???뱀젙 ?좏뵿???щ윭 媛쒖쓽 ?좏뵿?쇰줈 異붿텧?섎뒗 臾몄젣?대ŉ, ?좏뵿 ?쇱옱 臾몄젣??異붿텧???섎굹???좏뵿 ?댁뿉 ?щ윭 ?좏뵿???쇱옱?섏뼱 ?덈뒗 臾몄젣?대떎. ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪븯??蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???좏뵿以묐났 臾몄젣?????媛뺢굔???좎옱 ?붾━?대젅 ?좊떦?쇰줈 ?좏뵿??異붿텧?섍퀬 ?⑥뼱 媛??좎궗?꾨? ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?좏뵿 遺꾨━ 諛??좏뵿 蹂묓빀???④퀎瑜?嫄곗퀜 理쒖쥌?곸쑝濡??좏뵿??蹂댁젙?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 ?쒖븞 諛⑸쾿???좎옱 ?붾━?대젅 ?좊떦 諛⑸쾿??鍮꾪빐 醫뗭? ?깅뒫??蹂댁???Topic extraction is a technology that automatically extracts a set of topics from a set of documents, and this has been a major research topic in the area of natural language processing. Representative topic extraction methods include Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) and word clustering-based methods. However, there are problems with these methods, such as repeated topics and mixed topics. The problem of repeated topics is one in which a specific topic is extracted as several topics, while the problem of mixed topic is one in which several topics are mixed in a single extracted topic. To solve these problems, this study proposes a method to extract topics using an LDA that is robust against the problem of repeated topic, going through the steps of separating and merging the topics using the similarity between words to correct the extracted topics. As a result of the experiment, the proposed method showed better performance than the conventional LDA method.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쒖븞 諛⑸쾿LSI瑜??댁슜??李⑥썝 異뺤냼 ?대윭?ㅽ꽣 湲곕컲 ?ㅼ썙???곌?留??먮룞 援ъ텞 湲곕쾿

蹂??곌뎄???덉젣 湲곕컲 ????쒖뒪?쒖뿉???묐떟??寃곗젙?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?듭떖 ?붿냼 湲곗닠 以??섎굹??諛쒖감媛??좎궗??痢≪젙 諛⑸쾿??媛쒖꽑??????쇳븳?? ?쇰컲?곸씤 臾몄옣媛??좎궗??痢≪젙怨쇰뒗 ?щ━, ??붿뿉??諛쒖감媛??좎궗??痢≪젙? ?⑥뼱 遺꾪룷媛??좎궗??肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲?? 臾명삎, ?쒖젣, 湲?遺?? ?묓깭??????먯뿰?ㅻ윭???寃곗젙?섎뒗 臾몄옣???ㅼ뼇???몄뼱???붿냼 ??떆 以묒슂?섍쾶 怨좊젮?섏뼱???쒕떎. 洹몃윭??湲곗〈 ?곌뎄?먯꽌???댁뿉 ???怨좊젮媛 遺議??덈뜕 寃껋씠 ?ъ떎?대ŉ, ?곕씪??蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??媛쒖꽑 諛⑹븞?쇰줈??諛쒗솕???뺥깭???좎궗??肉??꾨땲???ㅼ뼇???몄뼱???먯쭏?ㅼ쓣 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 ?대? ?좎궗??痢≪젙??諛섏쁺?섏뿬 ?뺥솗?꾨? ?μ긽?쒗궎???덈줈???좎궗??痢≪젙 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먰븳, 諛쒖감???먯쭏蹂??좎궗?꾨? 怨좊젮?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥, ?쒖젙???섏쓽 ?덉젣?ㅼ쓽 ?쒖슜?꾨? ?믪씪 ???덈뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿??湲곗〈 諛⑹떇??鍮꾪빐 10%p ?댁긽 ?뺥솗???깅뒫 ?μ긽???덉뿀??This paper presents an improved method measuring inter-utterance similarity in an example-based dialogue system, which searches the most similar utterance in a dialogue database to generate a response to a given user utterance. Unlike general inter-sentence similarity measures, the inter-utterance similarity measure for example-based dialogue system should consider not only word distribution but also various linguistic features, such as affirmation/negation, tense, modality, sentence type, which affects the natural conversation. However, previous approaches do not sufficiently reflect these features. This paper proposes a new utterance similarity measure by analyzing and reflecting various linguistic features to improve performance in accuracy. Also, by considering substitutability of the features, the proposed method can utilize limited number of examples. Experimental results show that the proposed method achieves 10%p improvement in accuracy compared to the previous method.?뺤옱???댁쓬???됯컖湲곗쓽 ?ㅽ깮 ?⑤룄援щ같??????곌뎄

In general, query formulation method and operators are variety, not easy to formulate query in information retrieval system or web based retrieval engine. In this paper, we propose 쨈Concept Wizard쨈 to support query formulation with concept term expansion in natural language query information retrieval system. These types of methods, while featuring high performances, can only extract relations limited to a single sentence or so. The inability to extract these kinds of data is a terrible amount of information loss. To tackle this problem this paper presents an Augmented External Memory Neural Network model to enable Global Relation Extraction. the proposed model?셲 Global relation extraction is done by first gathering and analyzing the mention level relation extraction by the Augmented External Memory. Additionally the proposed model shows high level of performances in korean due to the fact it can take the often omitted subjects and objectives into consideration.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 2.1 愿怨?異붿텧 (Relation Extraction)?ㅻ궡 ?꾩튂 痢≪쐞 ?⑥쑉??遺꾩꽍???꾪븳 鍮꾩퐯 ?좏샇 ?뱀꽦 ?곌뎄

蹂??곌뎄???대찓?쇱뿉 ?섑???媛먯꽦?뺣낫 硫뷀??곗씠??異붿텧???덉뼱 ?먯뿰?몄뼱泥섎━??湲곕컲??諛⑹떇???곸슜?섏??? ?ъ옄遺꾩꽍媛? 怨좉컼 ?쒖븘??二쇨퀬諛쏆? ?대찓?쇱쓣 ?듯븯??媛쒖씤???뺣낫瑜?異붿텧?섏??? 媛쒖씤?붾? ?댁슜?먯뿉寃?媛쒖씤?곸쑝濡??섎? ?덈뒗 諛⑹떇?쇰줈 肄섑뀗痢좊? ?쒓났?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?⑤씪???곸뿉??愿怨꾨? ?앹꽦?섍퀬, ?깆옣?쒗궎怨? 吏?띿떆?ㅻ뒗 寃껋쓣 ?섎??쒕떎. ?꾩옄?곴굅?섎굹 ?⑤씪???곸쓽 鍮꾩쫰?덉뒪 寃쎌슦, 蹂??곌뎄????됱쓽 ?뺣낫?먯꽌 媛쒖씤?먭쾶 ?섎? ?덈뒗 ?뺣낫瑜??좊퀎?섏뿬 媛쒖씤???쒕퉬?ㅼ뿉 ?쒖슜?????덈룄濡? ?대찓?쇱씠???좊줎寃뚯떆??寃뚯떆臾? 梨꾪똿湲곕줉 ?깆쓽 ?띿뒪?몃? ?먯뿰?몄뼱泥섎━ 湲곕쾿???섑븯???먮룞?곸쑝濡?硫뷀??곗씠?곕? 異붿텧?????덈뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ы쁽?섏??? 援ы쁽???쒖뒪?쒖? ?⑤씪??鍮꾩쫰?덉뒪? 媛숈씠 而ㅻ??덉??댁뀡??以묒슂?섍퀬, ?곹샇 援먰솚?섎뒗 硫붿떆吏???섎룄???곷?諛⑹쓽 媛먯젙???뚯븙?섎뒗 寃껋씠 以묒슂??寃쎌슦??洹몃윭??媛먯꽦?뺣낫 愿??硫뷀??곗씠?곕? ?먮룞?쇰줈 異붿텧?섎뒗 ?쒕룄瑜??덈떎???먯뿉???곌뎄??媛移섎? 李얠쓣 ???덈떎.This paper describes a metadata extraction technique based on natural language processing (NLP) which extracts personalized information from email communications between financial analysts and their clients. Personalized means connecting users with content in a personally meaningful way to create, grow, and retain online relationships. Personalization often results in the creation of user profiles that store individuals' preferences regarding goods or services offered by various e-commerce merchants. We developed an automatic metadata extraction system designed to process textual data such as emails, discussion group postings, or chat group transcriptions. The focus of this paper is the recognition of emotional contents such as mood and urgency, which are embedded in the business communications, as metadata.ABSTRACT 珥덈줉 1. Introduction 2. ?멸컙???ㅻ（?댁빞 ???뺣낫媛 湲고븯湲됱닔?곸쑝濡?利앷??섎뒗 臾몄젣瑜??ㅻ（湲??꾪빐 ?꾩궛?몄뼱??諛??먯뿰?댁쿂由?而ㅻ??덊떚?먯꽌??臾몄꽌 ?붿빟???먮룞??湲곕쾿???곌뎄?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 1950?꾨?遺???쒖옉???먮룞 臾몄꽌 ?붿빟 ?곌뎄???щ윭 ?좏삎??臾몄꽌瑜??ㅻ（硫댁꽌 ?⑥씪/?ㅼ쨷 臾몄꽌 ?붿빟, 吏덉쓽 愿???ㅼ쨷 臾몄꽌 ?붿빟 ?깆쓽 ?ㅼ뼇???쒖뒪?ъ뿉 ?곸슜?섍린 ?꾪븳 異붿텧 諛?異붿긽 諛⑹떇 ?붿빟 湲곕쾿???쒕룄???붾떎. ???쇰Ц? 異붿텧 諛⑹떇??以묒떖?쇰줈 ?띿뒪???먮룞 ?붿빟 湲곗닠???꾪솴???쒖떆?섍퀬 ?붿빟 ?됯? 諛⑸쾿怨??洹쒕え ?먮룞 ?붿빟 ??뚯뿉 ???媛쒓큵 諛??ν썑 怨쇱젣?????湲곗닠?쒕떎.Information that human should read grows exponentially. To deal with this problem, computational linguistics and natural language processing communities have attempted to automate summarizing text. Since its start in 1950`s, automated text summarization has handled single-/multi-document summarization using extracting and abstracting techniques, and nowadays specialized its tasks to query-focused multi-document summarization. This paper gives the current state of automatic text summarization techniques focusing on robust, practical extraction-based methods, and describes evaluation methodologies and large-scale summarization evaluation conferences. Finally, future issues are discussed.?뚰넻, 移섏쑀, 怨듭〈??援?뼱援먯쑁 -?몄씤 由ы꽣?ъ떆瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈-
