?뱀젙 遺꾩빞???⑹뼱瑜??쒗쁽?섎뒗 ?꾨Ц?⑹뼱 ?ъ씠??怨꾩링愿怨꾨? ?숈뒿?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿? 洹쒖튃湲곕컲?숈뒿諛⑸쾿, ?듦퀎湲곕컲?숈뒿諛⑸쾿 ?깆씠 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??臾몄꽌?먯꽌 異붿텧???쇱??⑹뼱 ?뺣낫瑜?諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ???⑦넧濡쒖? 援ъ“瑜?移댄뀒怨좊━?뷀븯???쇱??⑹뼱???꾨Ц?깆쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 二쇱뼱吏??쇱??⑹뼱???곸쐞???꾨낫瑜??덈꺼?뷀븳 ???쇱??⑹뼱 ?섎??좎궗?꾨? 怨꾩궛?섏뿬 ?좏깮???꾨낫??以묒뿉??理쒖쟻???곸쐞?댄썑蹂대? 寃곗젙?쒕떎. 利? ?쇱??⑹뼱???꾨Ц?깆쓣 ?덈꺼?뷀븯湲??꾪븳 ?뺤옣??AHP諛⑸쾿? ?쇱??⑹뼱?ъ씠??鍮꾧탳瑜??듯빐 媛以묒튂???곷???以묒슂?깆쓣 寃곗젙?????쇱?吏묓빀??Min?곗궛?먯? ?ㅼ씠?ㅺ퀎?? Min+?ㅼ씠?ㅺ퀎?섎갑踰뺣뱾??鍮꾧탳?쒕떎. ??諛⑸쾿?ㅼ? ?쇱??⑹뼱 ?섎??좎궗?꾩뿉 ?곕씪 臾몄꽌?ㅼ씠 媛吏???섎?濡좎쟻 ?댁슜怨?愿怨꾩쓽 ?앸퀎??諛뷀깢?쇰줈 蹂대떎 ???뺥솗?섍쾶 臾몄꽌瑜?遺꾨쪟?????덇퀬 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由???留롮? 遺꾩빞???쒖슜?????덉쓣 寃껋씠??There are rule-based learning method and statistic based learning method and so on which represent learning method for hierarchy relation between domain term. In this paper, we propose to leveling and similarity measure using the extended AHP of fuzzy term in Information system. In the proposed method, we extract fuzzy term in document and categorize ontology structure about it and level priority of fuzzy term using the extended AHP for specificity of fuzzy term. the extended AHP integrates multiple decision-maker for weighted value and relative importance of fuzzy term and compute semantic similarity of fuzzy term using min operation of fuzzy set, dice's coefficient and Min+dice's coefficient method. and determine final alternative fuzzy term. after that compare with three similarity measure. we can see the fact that the proposed method is more definite than classification performance of the conventional methods and will apply in Natural language processing field.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쇱??⑹뼱???꾨Ц?깃낵 ?섎??좎궗?껿he Properties of Fuzzy Relations
?쒓뎅吏?μ떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, 怨좎젙誘? [2009] [KCI?깆옱]
On the Minimax Disparity Obtaining OWA Operator Weights
?쒓뎅吏?μ떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, ?띾뜒?? [2009] [KCI?깆옱]

Its achievement is based on the use of deep neural network system, a branch of machine learning. Machine learning is used in Web search, spam filters, recommender systems, ad placement, credit scoring, fraud detection, stock trading, drug design, and many other applications. Machine Learning is also applied to AR Drone quadrotor helicopter. Neural network system spreads into every day life- they are used to analyze and recommend financial transactions(robo-adviser), classifying images of digit, detecting cancer from mass spectrometry data on protein profiles and so on.
The advent of AI Lawyer astonished the whole world. ROSS is the first artificially intelligent attorney to help people power through legal research. It is sort of a legal expert system to solve expensive and time consuming legal research tasks. Legal expert system is defined as a system that provides answers to legal questions which resemble the answers one might expect from a lawyer. Legal expert system belongs legal analysis systems. The area of artificial intelligence and law has a special interest for both computer scientists and the legal profession.
What role will legal expert systems play in the practice of law? This article addresses a requisite for expert systems as tools in the legal profession. Legal expert system should provide a highly relevant answer to question posed in natural language, not keyword. And It should emulates the most creative legal work but not just a repetitive simple work. But lawyer can?셳 be replaced by the expert system.援?Ц珥덈줉 I. ?쒕줎 ?? ?멸났吏?κ낵 踰뺣쪧???묒젏??利앷? ?? 踰뺣쪧?꾨Ц媛 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒕컻 ?숉뼢 ?? 踰뺣쪧?꾨Ц媛 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 援ъ긽?? 餓곮뜼鸚㎩???力뺝?簾뤹㈅? ?㎬쫸 ??
?명븯??숆탳 踰뺥븰?곌뎄?? ?몄쭛遺(?몄쭛??, [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

遺?숈궛 ?댁쨷留ㅻℓ 留ㅻ룄?몄뿉 ????뺤궗梨낆엫???몄젙??愿??踰뺤젙梨낆쟻 寃??
?명븯??숆탳 踰뺥븰?곌뎄?? 媛뺣룞??KANG, Dong-Wook), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

Information that human should read grows exponentially. To deal with this problem, computational linguistics and natural language processing communities have attempted to automate summarizing text. Since its start in 1950?셲, automated text summarization has handled single-/multi-document summarization using extracting and abstracting techniques, and nowadays specialized its tasks to query-focused multi- document summarization. This paper gives the current state of automatic text summarization techniques focusing on robust, practical extraction- based methods, and describes evaluation methodologies and large-scale summarization evaluation conferences. Finally, future issues are discussed.?멸컙???ㅻ（?댁빞 ???뺣낫媛 湲고븯湲됱닔?곸쑝濡?利앷??섎뒗 臾몄젣瑜??ㅻ（湲??꾪빐 ?꾩궛?몄뼱??諛??먯뿰?댁쿂由?而ㅻ??덊떚?먯꽌??臾몄꽌 ?붿빟???먮룞??湲곕쾿???곌뎄?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 1950?꾨?遺???쒖옉???먮룞 臾몄꽌 ?붿빟 ?곌뎄???щ윭 ?좏삎??臾몄꽌瑜??ㅻ（硫댁꽌 ?⑥씪/?ㅼ쨷 臾몄꽌 ?붿빟, 吏덉쓽 愿???ㅼ쨷 臾몄꽌 ?붿빟 ?깆쓽 ?ㅼ뼇???쒖뒪?ъ뿉 ?곸슜?섍린 ?꾪븳 異붿텧 諛?異붿긽 諛⑹떇 ?붿빟 湲곕쾿???쒕룄???붾떎. ???쇰Ц? 異붿텧 諛⑹떇??以묒떖?쇰줈 ?띿뒪???먮룞 ?붿빟 湲곗닠???꾪솴???쒖떆?섍퀬 ?붿빟 ?됯? 諛⑸쾿怨??洹쒕え ?먮룞 ?붿빟 ??뚯뿉 ???媛쒓큵 諛??ν썑 怨쇱젣?????湲곗닠?쒕떎.臾몄꽌 ?먮룞 ?붿빟 湲곗닠??諛쒖쟾???꾪븳 ?숈젣???묎렐???꾩슂?깃낵 怨쇱젣

蹂??쇰Ц? 鍮꾧탳留덉씠??comparison mining)???쇳솚??鍮꾧탳 臾몄옣 ?좏삎 ?먮룞 遺꾨쪟??愿?섏뿬 ?곌뎄?쒕떎. 鍮꾧탳留덉씠?앹? ?띿뒪??留덉씠?앹쓽 ??遺꾩빞濡쒖꽌 ??⑸웾???띿뒪?몃? ??곸쑝濡?鍮꾧탳 愿怨꾨? 遺꾩꽍?섎ŉ, ?ш쾶 ???④퀎??怨쇱젙??嫄곗튂寃??섎뒗??泥?踰덉㎏ ?④퀎????⑸웾??臾몄꽌?먯꽌 鍮꾧탳 臾몄옣留뚯쓣 ?앸퀎 ??異붿텧???대뒗 怨쇱젙?닿퀬, ??踰덉㎏ ?④퀎??異붿텧??鍮꾧탳 臾몄옣?ㅼ쓣 鍮꾧탳 ?좏삎蹂꾨줈 遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 怨쇱젙?대ŉ, ?욎쓽 ???좏뻾 怨쇱젙???앸굹硫??좏삎蹂꾨줈 鍮꾧탳 ?띿꽦??異붿텧 諛?鍮꾧탳 愿怨꾨? 遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 ??踰덉㎏ ?④퀎瑜??섑뻾?섍쾶 ?쒕떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??蹂??湲곕컲 ?숈뒿(transformation-based learning) 湲곕쾿???댁슜?섏뿬 鍮꾧탳 臾몄옣?ㅼ쓣 ?쇨낢 媛吏???좏삎?쇰줈 ?먮룞 遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 ??踰덉㎏ 怨쇱젣瑜??섑뻾?쒕떎. ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 遺꾩빞 ?щ윭 遺臾몄뿉???ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 蹂?섍린諛??숈뒿? ?ㅻ쪟瑜?媛먯냼?쒗궎??理쒖쟻??洹쒖튃???먮룞?쇰줈 ?앹꽦?섏뿬 ?뺣떟??李얠븘媛??洹쒖튃 湲곕컲 ?숈뒿 諛⑸쾿?대떎. ?뱀긽???ㅼ뼇???꾨찓?몄뿉??異붿텧??鍮꾧탳 臾몄옣?ㅼ쓣 ??곸쑝濡??좏삎 遺꾨쪟瑜??섑뻾??寃곌낵 ?뺥솗??80.01%???깅뒫?쇰줈 ?쇨낢 媛吏 ?좏삎??遺꾨쪟?????덉뿀??This paper proposes a method for Korean comparative sentence classification which is a part of comparison mining. Comparison mining, one area of text mining, analyzes comparative relations from the enormous amount of text documents. Three-step process is needed for comparison mining - 1) identifying comparative sentences in the text documents, 2) classifying those sentences into several classes, 3) analyzing comparative relations per each comparative class. This paper aims at the second task. In this paper, we use transformation-based learning (TBL) technique which is a well-known learning method in the natural language processing. In our experiment, we classify comparative sentences into seven classes using TBL and achieve an accuracy of 80.01%.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 鍮꾧탳 臾몄옣???쇨낢 ?좏삎援щЦ ?몃━ 媛吏移섍린 諛??뚮㈇ ?몄옄 議곗젙???듯븳 ?몃━ 而ㅻ꼸 湲곕컲 ?⑤갚吏?媛??곹샇?묒슜 異붿텧 ?깅뒫 ?μ긽

?꾩튂 湲곕컲 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?먯떊??諛⑸Ц???μ냼?????湲띿젙 ?뱀? 遺?뺤쟻 ?섍껄??由щ럭濡??④린??寃껋씠 ?쇱긽?붾릺怨??덈떎. ?ㅼ젣 諛⑸Ц?먭? ?묒꽦???μ냼 由щ럭?????媛먯꽦遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵???좎옱???뚮퉬?먮퓧 ?꾨땲??湲곗뾽?먭쾶???좎슜???뺣낫瑜??쒓났?????덈떎. ?μ냼?????媛먯꽦遺꾩꽍???ㅼ떆?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 媛먯꽦遺꾩꽍??湲곗????섎뒗 ?댄쐶??????ъ쟾???꾩슂?섎떎. 洹몃윭???꾩옱源뚯? ?μ냼瑜??쒗쁽?섎뒗 怨듦컙 媛먯꽦?댁뿉 ????ъ쟾??援ъ텞??諛??녿떎. ?댁뿉 蹂??곌뎄???ㅼ젣 諛⑸Ц?먭? ?쒓뎅?대줈 ?묒꽦???μ냼 由щ럭 ?곗씠?곕? 遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 怨듦컙 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾??援ъ텞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?섎ŉ, ?щ윭 ?μ냼 移댄뀒怨좊━ 以??뚮쭏怨듭썝????곸쑝濡?怨듦컙 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾??援ъ텞?섏??? ?대? ?꾪빐 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕쾿怨??듦퀎??湲곕쾿???쒖슜?섏??쇰ŉ, ?ъ쟾???ы븿?섎뒗 怨듦컙 媛먯꽦?대뒗 媛먯꽦??洹뱀꽦??????뺣낫? 洹뱀꽦???뺣룄??????뺣쪧?먯닔瑜??ы븿?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌 援ъ텞??怨듦컙 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾? 3媛쒖쓽 ?뚯씠釉?SSLex_SS, SSLex_single, SSLex_combi)濡?援ъ꽦?섎ŉ, 珥?219媛쒖쓽 ?댄쐶瑜??ы븿?쒕떎. ?대? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?몄쐞?곗뿉???뚮쭏怨듭썝??????묒꽦??湲????곸쑝濡?媛먯꽦遺꾩꽍???ㅼ떆?섏??쇰ŉ, 媛먯꽦??洹뱀꽦 遺꾨쪟??????꾩껜 ?뺥솗?꾧? 0.714濡??곗텧?⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?ъ쟾???좏슚?깆쓣 ?뺤씤?????덉뿀??Leaving positive or negative comments of places where he or she visits on location-based services is being common in daily life. The sentiment analysis of place reviews written by actual visitors can provide valuable information to potential consumers, as well as business owners. To conduct sentiment analysis of a place, a spatial sentiment lexicon that can be used as a criterion is required; yet, lexicon of spatial sentiment words has not been constructed. Therefore, this study suggested a method to construct a spatial sentiment lexicon by analyzing the place review data written by Korean internet users. Among several location categories, theme parks were chosen for this study. For this purpose, natural language processing technique and statistical techniques are used. Spatial sentiment words included the lexicon have information about sentiment polarity and probability score. The spatial sentiment lexicon constructed in this study consists of 3 tables(SSLex_SS, SSLex_single, SSLex_combi) that include 219 spatial sentiment words. Throughout this study, the sentiment analysis has conducted based on the texts written about the theme parks created on Twitter. As the accuracy of the sentiment classification was calculated as 0.714, the validity of the lexicon was verified.誤곫뿨 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?대줎??怨좎같 3. 怨듦컙 媛먯꽦???ъ쟾 援ъ텞 諛⑸쾿Timesat ?꾨줈洹몃옩???섑븳 ?쒕컲???쒖뿽?섏쓽 吏??퀎 MODIS LAI 諛?NDVI ?⑦꽩 遺꾩꽍
??쒓났媛꾩젙蹂댄븰?? ?쒕?援?Seo, Dae Kyo), [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

As one tool for patent analysis, patent maps visualize the overall relationship between patents and allow various patent-based analyses such as patent vacuum identification, patent infringement analysis and patent cluster analysis. Although there has been the patent maps based on keyword occurrence, citation or technology category, they do not show the internal similarity between patents. Therefore, this paper proposes a new patent map using Subject-Action-Object(SAO)-based semantic patent similarity measurement. In a patent, these ordered syntactic structures explicitly represent the relationship between technological factors and are even considered as the invention key concepts or the inventor`s know-how. The patent map is developed through 1)collecting patents, 2)extracting SAO structures from patent text using natural language processing, 3)generating a patent dissimilarity matrix by measuring semantic similarities between SAO structures of patents, and 4)visualizing the matrix using multidimensional scaling. The proposed method is illustrated using patents related to silicon-based thin film solar cells.釉붾줈洹?肄섑뀗痢??쒖옉 ?섎룄???곹뼢 ?붿씤??????곌뎄 ?뺥뙆??釉붾줈嫄곗? ?쇰컲 釉붾줈嫄곗쓽 鍮꾧탳瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈

However, extracting features for categorical data are rarely researched. We study online incremental associative feature construction method, which can treat categorical data. This method repeats two processes as follows; one is extracting features according to probabilistic distribution of input data. The other is learning the weight of features and removing useless features. We apply our method to natural language process and music prediction problem to verify our proposed method is useful. Experimental results show that our proposed methods performed well for both tasks, and illustrate that extracting useful features is important.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 諛곌꼍 ?대줎 3. ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁?섎え???먯깋 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???댁슜???뚰봽?몄썾???좊ː???깆옣 紐⑤뜽??留ㅺ컻蹂??異붿젙 湲곕쾿

However, the current ontology authoring tools are not operating on the Web, which makes it difficult to distribute ontologies directly to the Web and to create and edit them collaboratively with other people. This paper proposes a framework that facilitates the ontology construction and sharing, realizing easy distribution of ontologies to the Web. Wiki is one of the frameworks for collaborative construction and sharing of knowledge on the Web, and Wiki contents consist of natural language texts and simple markup language for visualization. For better collaboration in creating and sharing ontologies, this paper suggests the Semantic Wiki that embodies the Semantic Web features to the existing Wiki system. The Semantic Wiki framework facilitates the collaboration in ontology co-authoring and sharing for people, and at the same time, makes it possible for the agent software to easily manage the ontology information. Eventually, the Semantic Wiki system accomplishes various tasks including the semantic view, the semantic navigation, and the semantic query.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?쒕㎤???꾪궎???ㅺ퀎湲곌퀎?숈뒿??湲곕컲???앹쓽?숇텇???꾨Ц?⑹뼱???먮룞 ?몄떇

UniBAS??MSR(Mining Software Repositories) ?곌뎄 怨쇱젙?먯꽌????μ냼 異붿텧, ?곗씠??媛怨듭씠??紐⑤뜽 ?앹꽦怨?媛숈? 怨듯넻?곸씤 諛섎났 ?묒뾽??以꾩씠怨? 愿???곌뎄?먭? ?곸쐞 ?섏????곌뎄??蹂대떎 吏묒쨷?????덈룄濡??⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?대떦 ?곌뎄 ?섑뻾??諛쒖깮?섎뒗 蹂듭옟?꾩? 鍮꾩슜??以꾩뿬以?? ?먰븳, UniBAS???곗씠??異붿텧 肉??꾨땲??吏덉쓽 湲곕컲 遺꾩꽍???꾩슂???뚯씠釉? 酉?諛?????꾨줈?쒖? ?깆쓣 ?먮룞 ?앹꽦?섎ŉ, ?섏쭛???곗씠??愿由ъ? ?몃? ?꾧뎄????곕룞???꾪빐 ?ㅼ뼇???뺤떇???뚯씪???앹꽦?????덈떎. ?щ? ?곌뎄濡?UniBAS???좎슜?깆쓣 寃利앺븯湲??꾪빐 Mozilla?ъ씠?몄쓽 Firefox?꾨줈?앺듃瑜???곸쑝濡??ㅼ젣 以묐났 踰꾧렇 由ы룷?몃? ?먯??섎뒗 ?ㅽ뿕??吏꾪뻾?섏??? ??怨쇱젙?먯꽌 ?먮룞 異붿텧???먮즺瑜???곸쑝濡?吏덉쓽? 遺꾩꽍???좎뿰?섍쾶 ?대（?댁쭏 ???덉뿀?쇰ŉ, ?ㅼ뼇???먯뿰??泥섎━ ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁 ?곸슜???듯빐 ?좏슚???ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵瑜??살쓣 ???덉뿀??In this paper, we propose UniBAS(Unified Bug Analysis System) to provide a unified repository model by integrating the extracted data from the heterogeneous bug tracking systems. The UniBAS reduces the cost and complexity of the MSR(Mining Software Repositories) research process and enables the researchers to focus on their logics rather than the tedious and repeated works such as extracting repositories, processing data and building analysis models. Additionally, the system not only extracts the data but also automatically generates database tables, views and stored procedures which are required for the researchers to perform query-based analysis easily. It can also generate various types of exported files for utilizing external analysis tools or managing research data. A case study of detecting duplicate bug reports from the Firfox project of the Mozilla site has been performed based on the UniBAS in order to evaluate the usefulness of the system. The results of the experiments with various algorithms of natural language processing and flexible querying to the automatically extracted data also showed the effectiveness of the proposed system.吏??궗?뚯꽌鍮꾩뒪 ?댁슜?먯쓽 ?ы쉶?쒕퉬???ш뎄留??섎룄??誘몄튂???곹뼢

?뚯븙? ?꾧뎄???쎄쾶 利먭만 ???덈뒗 臾명솕????醫낅쪟濡쒖꽌, ?뱁엳 ?以?媛?붾뒗 ?뱀떆 ?쒕? ?곹솴???곹뼢??媛뺥븯寃?諛쏆쑝硫?媛?ъ뿉??洹몃윭???댁슜?ㅼ씠 ?⑥텞?곸쑝濡??닿꺼?덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???대윭??援?궡 ?以묎??붾? 遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?뚯썝 ?ㅽ듃由щ컢 ?쒕퉬?ㅼ뿉???쒓났?섎뒗 ?몃옯留??곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?섍퀬 ?곌뎄?섏??? 媛?섎쭏???깅줉???뚯썝 ??遺꾪룷?먯꽌 硫깊븿??踰뺤튃(power law)???깅┰?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?섏??? ??怨≪뿉???④퍡 ?묒뾽??媛?섏? ?묒궗媛瑜??댁뼱 媛???볦옉?ш????묒뾽 ?대텇 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕(bipartite network)瑜?留뚮뱾怨??ш린?먯꽌??硫깊븿?섏쓽 踰뺤튃???깅┰?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?섏??? ?대븣 吏?섎뒗 -3?쇰줈 泥숇룄?녿뒗 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕(scale free network)???좏샇???곌껐(preferential attachment)濡??ㅻ챸?????덈뒗 寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?섏??? ?몃옯留먯쓽 ?먯뿰??泥섎━(natural language processing)???듯빐 媛?ъ뿉?쒕룄 Zipf's law? Heap's law媛 紐⑤몢 ?깅┰?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?뺤씤?섏??? 肄붿궗???좎궗??cosine similarity)瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?묒궗媛 ?ъ씠???묒궗 ?ㅽ????좎궗?꾨? 援ы븯怨??묒궗媛 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕瑜?留뚮뱾??援?궡 ?以묎??붿뿉???묒궗媛?ㅺ컙???곌껐援ъ“瑜??댄렣蹂댁븯??Music is one of the most important aspects of culture that people can easily enjoy. Especially, pop music is influenced by the lifestyle of the people at that time, and lyrics implicitly contain much information on that lifestyle. In this study, we collect and quantitatively analyze Korean-pop (K-pop) lyrics provided by a music streaming service. We find that the K-pop consuming market exhibits a power-law distribution in the number of released songs for each artist. We create an artist-writer collaboration network by using a bipartite network between artists and writers who collaborate on a song and measure the network properties that obey the power laws in this network. All exponents of the power laws are -3, which can be explained by using a preferential attachment, the rich get richer. We found that both Zipf's law and Heap's law hold for K-pop lyrics even in different music styles and genres, and we created a style-similarity network among K-pop writers by incorporating the cosine similarity of word frequencies to uncover the relationships between K-pop writers.?ㅼ썙??遺꾩꽍???쒖슜???뚮퉬???뺤콉 ?몃젋??怨좎같: ??? ??듬졊??以묒떖?쇰줈 (1993~2017)
?쒓뎅臾쇰━?숉쉶, ?κ꼍?? [2018] [KCI?깆옱,SCOPUS]
Classification of Writing Style by Using a Morpheme Network Analysis
?쒓뎅臾쇰━?숉쉶, ?뺤옣洹? [2018] [KCI?깆옱,SCOPUS]
Hybrid Genetic Algorithm for Optimizing the Closed-Loop Supply Chain Model with Direct Shipment and Delivery
?쒓뎅臾쇰━?숉쉶, ?ㅼ쁺?? [2018] [KCI?깆옱,SCOPUS]

The main cause of this phenomenon can be found in the significant increase of unstructured data, as the use of smart devices enables users to create data in the form of text, audio, images, and video. In various types of unstructured data, the user?셲 opinion and a variety of information is clearly expressed in text data such as news, reports, papers, and various articles. Thus, active attempts have been made to create new value by analyzing these texts.
The representative techniques used in text analysis are text mining and opinion mining. These share certain important characteristics; for example, they not only use text documents as input data, but also use many natural language processing techniques such as filtering and parsing. Therefore, opinion mining is usually recognized as a sub-concept of text mining, or, in many cases, the two terms are used interchangeably in the literature. Suppose that the purpose of a certain classification analysis is to predict a positive or negative opinion contained in some documents. If we focus on the classification process, the analysis can be regarded as a traditional text mining case. However, if we observe that the target of the analysis is a positive or negative opinion, the analysis can be regarded as a typical example of opinion mining. In other words, two methods (i.e., text mining and opinion mining) are available for opinion classification. Thus, in order to distinguish between the two, a precise definition of each method is needed. In this paper, we found that it is very difficult to distinguish between the two methods clearly with respect to the purpose of analysis and the type of results.
We conclude that the most definitive criterion to distinguish text mining from opinion mining is whether an analysis utilizes any kind of sentiment lexicon. We first established two prediction models, one based on opinion mining and the other on text mining. Next, we compared the main processes used by the two prediction models. Finally, we compared their prediction accuracy. We then analyzed 2,000 movie reviews. The results revealed that the prediction model based on opinion mining showed higher average prediction accuracy compared to the text mining model. Moreover, in the lift chart generated by the opinion mining based model, the prediction accuracy for the documents with strong certainty was higher than that for the documents with weak certainty. Most of all, opinion mining has a meaningful advantage in that it can reduce learning time dramatically, because a sentiment lexicon generated once can be reused in a similar application domain. Additionally, the classification results can be clearly explained by using a sentiment lexicon.
This study has two limitations. First, the results of the experiments cannot be generalized, mainly because the experiment is limited to a small number of movie reviews. Additionally, various parameters in the parsing and filtering steps of the text mining may have affected the accuracy of the prediction models. However, this research contributes a performance and comparison of text mining analysis and opinion mining analysis for opinion classification. In future research, a more precise evaluation of the two methods should be made through intensive experiments.1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. ?띿뒪??留덉씠??湲곕컲 ?ㅽ뵾?덉뼵 遺꾨쪟紐⑤뜽怨??ㅽ뵾?덉뼵 留덉씠??湲곕컲 ?덉륫紐⑤뜽??鍮꾧탳 4. ?ㅽ뿕 5. 寃곕줎Multimodal Emotional State Estimation Model for Implementation of Intelligent Exhibition Services

?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, Tsoy, Anzhela, [2014] [KCI?깆옱]
The Brand Personality Effect: Communicating Brand Personality on Twitter and its Influence on Online Community Engagement
?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, Ruth Angelie B. Cruz, [2014] [KCI?깆옱]

?곗씠??以묐났? 怨쇱쨷????κ?由щ퉬?⑹쓣 ?좊컻??肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲?? ?뺣낫?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 吏덉쟻 ??섎? 珥덈옒?쒕떎. 遺덊뻾?덈룄, ?낅Т 洹쒖젙???곹빀?섏? ?딆? ?곗씠?곕? 諛⑹??섍린 ?꾪빐?? ?낅Т??異⑹떎??媛쒕뀗???ㅺ퀎瑜??꾪븳 ?쒓컙怨??몃젰???ъ옄?섎뒗 湲곗뾽??洹뱀냼?섏뿉 遺덇낵?섎떎. 利? ?遺遺꾩쓽 湲곗뾽?ㅼ? ?곗씠???덉쭏??????몄떇??愿?ъ쓣 媛뽰? ?딅뒗?? ?곕━ ?곌뎄??二쇱슂 ??湲곕뒗, ?낅Т??????ъ쟾吏?앹씠 ?놁씠 ?낅Т??異⑹떎??湲곗뾽?꾩궗 ?곗씠?곕? ?ㅺ퀎?섎뒗 諛⑹떇???곌뎄?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? 蹂??쇰Ц???쒕뒗 ?낅Т湲곗닠?쒖뿉 ?섏삩 媛?臾몄옣 ?댁쓽 媛앹껜??媛꾩쓽 ?곌??깆쓣 ?댁슜?댁꽌, ?곗씠?곗꽕怨꾨? ?먮룞?뷀븯???곗씠?곗꽕怨꾨갑踰뺣줎???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먮룞???ㅺ퀎?꾧뎄瑜??꾪빐 ?쒖븞???먯씠?꾪듃???먯뿰???곹깭???낅Т?ㅺ퀎?쒕쭔???낅젰 諛쏆븘, ?뱀젙??洹쒖튃???댁슜?섏뿬 媛쒖껜愿怨꾨룄瑜??ㅺ퀎?쒕떎. ?곕━??蹂??먯씠?꾪듃???꾩껜 踰붿쐞? ?먯꽭???덉감瑜??쎄컙???덈? 媛吏怨??ㅻ챸????寃껋씠怨? 洹??ㅼ쓬??媛앹껜 媛꾩뿉 異붿텧???곌??깆쓽 ?곷쾿?깆쓣 寃利앺븷 寃껋씠?? ?먰븳, 怨좎븞???먯씠?꾪듃???ㅻТ ?곸슜?깆쓣 ?됯??섍린 ?꾪븳 ?щ??곌뎄瑜?吏꾪뻾??寃껋씠??Data redundancy is problematic in that it not only induces heavy storage management cost but also could bring critical degradation of information systems. Unfortunately, to our knowledge, only few enterprises willingly afford time and efforts for the faithful conceptual design to prevent the degree of inappropriate data as much as they could, while most of enterprises pay rare attention to the notion of that sort of data quality. Wondering if there would be any other way to design the enterprise-wide data design without prior knowledge about business works is our major motivation for this study. In this paper, we present our data modeling methodology in which associations among objects in each sentences of a business job descriptions are treated as the focal point in database design. A proposed agent for automated design tool simply takes a business job description written in natural language as an input, and then designs an entity relationship diagram with some smart rules. We introduce the scope of the proposed agent and its detailed logics with several examples. And then, we verify the appropriateness of the resulted associations among objects. Lastly, we perform case studies to evaluate the devised agent's applicability to a business field.1. Introduction 2. Related Works 3. Association-Based Conceptual Agentfor Entity Relationship Modeling 4. Practical Applications of Association-Based Conceptual Modeling 5. ?꾩쭅 諛쒖쟾 以묒씤 癒몄떊?щ떇 ?멸났吏?μ씠 ?뚭눼???곸떊?쇰줈 遺媛곷릺怨??덈뒗 寃껋? 踰뺣쪧遺꾩빞??湲곗닠??諛쒖쟾??2008??湲덉쑖?꾧린 ?댄썑 洹몃룞??誘멸뎅 濡쒖뒪荑?援먯쑁???ㅻТ???꾨Ц??遺議깆쓣 硫붿썙二쇰뜕 ??뺣줈?뚯쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈 ??誘멸뎅??踰뺣쪧?곗뾽 ?깆옣援ъ“媛 2008??湲덉쑖?꾧린 ?댄썑 ?좉퇋蹂?몄궗???섏슂媛먯냼瑜??뱀쭠?쇰줈 ?섎뒗 留덉씠?덉뒪 ?깆옣???쇱쑝?????먯씤?쇰줈 吏紐⑸릺硫?癒몄떊?щ떇 ?멸났吏?μ? ?꾩떎?붾맆 寃쎌슦 洹??뚭툒?곹뼢????湲곗닠?닿린 ?뚮Ц?대떎. 癒몄떊?щ떇 ?멸났吏?μ쓽 遺媛곸뿉 ?곕씪 誘멸뎅 踰뺣쪧?곗뾽 援ъ“??蹂?붿? 洹몄뿉 ?鍮꾪븳 濡쒖뒪荑?援먯쑁???곸떊???붽뎄?섎뒗 ?吏곸엫??誘멸뎅?먯꽌 ??멸퀬 ?덈떎.
?쒓뎅??寃쎌슦 ?좊룄?곸쑝濡?癒몄떊?щ떇 ?멸났吏?μ쓣 踰?遺꾩빞???곸슜??媛?μ꽦? ?щ윭 媛吏 ?ш굔???ъ? ?딅떎. 嫄곌씀濡??대뒗 誘멸뎅?먯꽌 IBM??Watson怨?媛숈씠 ?꾩옱 踰뺣쪧?곗뾽??吏꾩엯???쒕룄 以묒씤 癒몄떊?щ떇 ?멸났吏?μ씠 ?꾩꽦???뺥깭濡??섏엯?섏뿀?????꾨Т???鍮??놁씠 踰뺣쪧?곗뾽???대? 留덉＜??媛?μ꽦???믨퀬 ?곷??곸쑝濡??ㅻТ???꾨Ц?깆씠 痍⑥빟???쒓뎅??踰뺣쪧援먯쑁泥닿퀎???붿슧 ???곹뼢??諛쏆쓣 ???덈떎.The possibility of replacing lawyer"s role by Artificial Intelligence(hereafter "AI") has remained in curiosities till recent days. However, recent developments of Machine Learning which refers to the computer program able to learn from experience and improves performance over time based on the Big Data makes it real cases called as ?쐂isruptive innovation??in law.
This article introduces concept and limits of Machine Learning in law area including supervised model which has been main and imminently surging unsupervised model represented by ?쐂eep learning?? After that, this article articulates current status, future developments, legal and technological barriers, and court opinions in the U.S. the leading country in this area, including predictive coding currently applied in discovery, legal search focusing on natural language search and predictive analytics similar to human legal reasoning but still undeveloped.
The rise of Machine Learning AI as disruptive innovation coming from adoption of present technology is one of main causes of so called Great Recession in U.S. Legal industry after 2008 financial crisis which featured declining role of big law firms in it and reduced demand of entry level lawyer. This leads to the crisis of law school education and spreads to the reform of it.
Korea has not much future possibility to the status of leading country of Machine Learning AI in law considering technological background and market condition. Reversely, this will make abrupt encountering of completed and developed Machine Learning AI by imports from U.S. such as IBM"s Watson trying to be introduced in U.S. now. The near future may be a really shocking moments to Korea"s legal education.?쇰Ц?붿? ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 誘멸뎅?먯꽌 癒몄떊?щ떇 ?멸났吏?μ쓽 諛쒖쟾怨?踰?遺꾩빞 ?곸슜?꾪솴 ?? 誘멸뎅?먯꽌 癒몄떊?щ떇 ?멸났吏?μ씠 踰뺤“?몃젰 援ъ“(礪뗩? 諛?踰뺣쪧援먯쑁??誘몄튌 ?곹뼢 ?쇱쓽? 洹?諛곌꼍 ?? ?쒓뎅?먯쓽 ?쒖궗?먰뿄踰뺣?移???議곗뿉 ????щ줎

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源以醫?Jun-Jong Kim), [1998]

In order to jointly utilize research infrastructure and to build efficient construction, which are essential in science and technology research and development process. Although various classification methods have been introduced for efficient utilization of registered information, functions that can be directly utilized such as similar research infrastructure search is not yet been implemented due to limitations of collection information. In this study, we analyzed the similar search technique so far, presented the methodology for the calculation of similarity of research infrastructure, and analyzed the learning result. Study suggested that a technique can be use to extract meaningful keywords from information and analyze the similarity between the research infrastructure.?곌뎄媛쒕컻怨쇱젙?먯꽌???꾩닔?붿냼???곌뎄?λ퉬??怨듬룞?쒖슜 諛??⑥쑉?곸씤 援ъ텞???꾪빐 ?쒓뎅?먯꽌??援???덉궛?쇰줈 援ъ텞???λ퉬?뺣낫瑜??꾩닔?곸쑝濡??깅줉?섎룄濡??섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?깅줉?뺣낫???ㅼ뼇???쒖슜(以묐났??寃?? ?깅뒫?덉륫, ?泥댁옣鍮꾩텛泥????꾪빐 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???꾩옱 ?좎궗?λ퉬寃?됯린踰뺤뿉 ???遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 ?좎궗???곗텧 諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?섏??? ?대? ?듯빐 ?먯뿰???곹깭???λ퉬?뺣낫?먯꽌 ?ㅼ썙?쒕? 異붿텧?섏뿬 LSA 湲곕쾿???곸슜?섎㈃ ?ㅼ썙?쒓컙???좎궗?꾩궛異?諛??λ퉬?뺣낫 媛??좎궗??遺꾩꽍??媛?ν븿???뺤씤?섏??쇰ŉ ?ν썑 ?곌뎄?λ퉬遺꾨쪟?뺣낫瑜??묐ぉ?섏뿬 ?곸슜??寃쎌슦 ?섎??덈뒗 ?좎궗???곗텧 諛??대? ?쒖슜???ㅼ뼇???쒕퉬?ㅺ? 媛????寃껋쑝濡??덉륫?쒕떎.RNN???댁슜???숈옉湲곕줉 留덉씠??湲곕컲??異붿쿇 諛⑸쾿

愿怨?異붾줎 ?ъ링 ?좉꼍留?紐⑤뜽???깅뒫媛쒖꽑 ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?댄쁽?? [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

Multi-resolution RNN is a method of modeling parallel sequences as RNNs. Coreference resolution is a natural language processing task in which several words representing different entities present in a document are defined as one cluster and can be solved by a pointer network. The encoder input sequence of the coreference resolution becomes all the morphemes of the document using the pointer network, and the decoder input sequence becomes all the nouns present in the document. In this paper, we propose three multi-resolution pointer network models that encode all morphemes and noun lists of a document in parallel and perform decoding by using both encoded hidden states in a decoder. We have solved the coreference resolution based on the proposed models. Experimental results show that Multi-resolution1 of the proposed model has 71.44% CoNLL F1, 70.52% CoNLL F1 of Multi-resolution2 and 70.59% CoNLL F1 of Multi-resolution3.Multi-resolution RNN? ?낅젰??蹂묐젹 ?쒗?ㅻ? 援?갑 ?ъ씠踰?臾쇰━ ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?꾪븳 ?좎냽???꾩넚 ?뺤콉 愿由щ? 吏?먰븯???뚰봽?몄썾???뺤쓽 ?ㅽ듃?뚰궧 湲곗닠
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?닿만?? [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

As one of empirical research and developments on BIM applications to improve design quality and productivity of building, efforts have been devoted to automated compliance checking of building design for building permit. KBimLogic is a mechanism that translate Korean Buidling Act to the computational language called KBimCode. KBimCode aims to standardized and neutral language that can be applied to various design rules. This paper focuses on testing expandability of KBimCode by appling it on Chinese Building Act. We analyzed Chinese national regulation on fire protection and evacuation, based on 1) Object쨌property, 2) function for predicate processing, 3) relationship of sentences. As a result, Chinese Building Act were successfully translated to KBimCode with some important implications for further application. Based on the finding of the paper, KBimCode is expected to be applicable to kinds of design rules.嫄댁텞臾??ㅺ퀎?덉쭏 諛??앹궛?깆쓣 ?μ긽?쒗궎湲??꾪븳 ?ㅼ뼇??BIM湲곕컲 ?ㅼ쬆???곌뎄媛쒕컻??吏꾪뻾以묒씠硫? ?명뿀媛?④퀎 ?꾪썑濡?嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 ?먮룞寃?좎뿉 愿???곌뎄 諛?媛쒕컻??洹?以??섎굹?대떎. ?대떦 ?곌뎄 媛쒕컻???깃낵臾?以??섎굹濡쒖뜥, 嫄댁텞臾??ㅺ퀎 ?곷쾿???먮룞寃?좊? ?꾪빐 ?먯뿰?대줈 湲곗닠??嫄댁텞踰뺤쓣 而댄벂?곗뿉???ㅽ뻾 媛?ν븳 猷곗뀑(KBimCode)?쇰줈 蹂?섑븯??硫붿빱?덉쬁(KBimLogic)??媛쒕컻?섏뿀?? A Case Study of Online Part-Time Job Culture: Alba Chunkuk's Current Role in the Culture and the Experience It Aims to Provide
?붿옄?몄쑖蹂듯빀?숉쉶(援??쒓뎅?명룷?붿옄?명븰??, ?댁??? [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
怨듦났?꾩꽌愿 ?붿??몄꽌鍮꾩뒪???곕Ⅸ ?붿??몄옄猷뚯떎 怨듦컙怨꾪쉷 ?뱀꽦 ?곌뎄
?붿옄?몄쑖蹂듯빀?숉쉶(援??쒓뎅?명룷?붿옄?명븰??, ?꾩??? [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

Learning user's preference is a key issue in intelligent system such as personalized service. The study on user preference model has adapted simple user preference model, which determines a set of preferred keywords or topic, and weights to each target. In this paper, we recommend multi-perspective user preference model that factors sentiment information in the model. Based on the topicality and sentimental information processed using natural language processing techniques, it learns a user's preference. To handle time-variant nature of user preference, user preference is calculated by session, short-term and long term. User evaluation is used to validate the effect of user preference learning and it shows 86.52%, 86.28%, 87.22% of accuracy for topic interest, keyword interest, and keyword favorableness.媛쒖씤???쒕퉬?ㅼ? 媛숈? 吏?μ젙蹂??쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?ъ슜???좏샇?꾩쓽 ?숈뒿? 以묒슂???곌뎄 遺꾩빞?대떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??梨꾪똿 ?꾨찓?몄뿉?쒖쓽 ?ъ슜???좏샇?꾨? ?숈뒿?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?섎ŉ, 湲곗〈???됰㈃?곸씤 ?ъ슜???좏샇??紐⑤뜽??臾몄젣?먯쓣 ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?ъ슜???좏샇??紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ъ슜?먭? ?좏샇???숈뒿????곸뿉 ??섏뿬 ?쇰쭏??愿?ъ씠 ?덈뒗媛瑜??섑??대뒗 愿?щ룄? ??곸뿉 ???媛먯꽦???섑??대뒗 ?멸컧?꾨씪???붿냼濡?紐⑤뜽留??????덈떎. ?먯뿰??泥섎━瑜??듯빐 ?꾩옱 ??붿뿉?쒖쓽 二쇱젣 ?먯?? ?멸컧??遺꾩꽍???섍퀬, ?대? ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?좏샇?꾩? ?멸컧?꾨? ?숈뒿?쒕떎. ?쒓컙???먮쫫???곕씪 蹂?섎뒗 ?ъ슜???좏샇?꾩쓽 ?뱀쭠??怨좊젮?섏뿬, ?ъ슜???좏샇?꾨? ?몄뀡, ?④린, ?κ린 ?좏샇?꾨줈 ?섎늻??怨꾩궛?쒕떎. ?ъ슜???좏샇???숈뒿????곸씠 ?섎뒗 ?ㅼ썙?쒖? 二쇱젣????섏뿬 ?쒓컙???곕씪 蹂?섎뒗 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?좏샇??蹂?붾? 怨좊젮?섏뿬 ?좏샇??寃곗젙???쒕떎. ?ъ슜???좏샇???숈뒿 ?④낵??寃利앹쓣 ?꾪븯???ъ슜???됯?瑜??섏??쇰ŉ 二쇱젣 ?좏샇?? ?ㅼ썙???좏샇?? ?ㅼ썙???멸컧?꾩뿉 ??섏뿬 媛곴컖 86.52%, 86.28%, 87.22%???깅뒫??蹂댁??????쒕쾭 ?곕룞???ㅼ떆媛??붿????뺣낫 ?붿뒪?뚮젅???쒖뒪??

?꾩뿭 理쒖쟻 寃쎈줈媛 ?μ긽?섏? ?딅뒗 諛섎났 ?먯깋 ?잛닔瑜?怨좊젮??媛쒕? 吏묐떒 ?쒖뒪??
?쒓뎅而댄벂?곗젙蹂댄븰?? ?댁듅愿(Seung-Gwan Lee), [2009] [KCI?깆옱]

Human languages are highly productive, and new words such as proper nouns, foreign words, and technical terms are being generated. Since existing corpus and dictionaries cannot contain all these words in advance, it is essential to recognize unknown words for efficient processing of natural language. In this paper, we propose a probabilistic model that can cover various information that has been used in previous researches related to unknown word identification. The proposed model estimates the probability that candidate words are unknown words by using the features of the functional morpheme sequences appearing after the noun, the linkage between these and the unknown word candidates, the frequency of unknown word candidates on the web, and the occurrence of unknown word candidates in the document to be processed. Experiments on general news and economic news show that the proposed model has good performance.?멸컙???몄뼱???앹궛?깆씠 ?믪븘 怨좎쑀紐낆궗, ?몃옒?? ?꾨Ц?⑹뼱 ???ㅼ뼇???덈줈???⑥뼱?ㅼ씠 ?앹꽦?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 湲곗〈??留먮춬移? ?ъ쟾 ?깆씠 ?대윴 紐⑤뱺 ?⑥뼱瑜?誘몃━ ?ы븿?섍퀬 ?덉쓣 ???놁쑝誘濡??④낵?곸씤 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由щ? ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 誘몃벑濡앹뼱 ?몄떇???꾩닔?곸씠?? 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??誘몃벑濡앹뼱 ?몄떇怨?愿?⑤맂 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄?ㅼ뿉???쒖슜?섏뼱 ?붾뜕 ?ㅼ뼇???뺣낫?ㅼ쓣 ?ш큵?????덈뒗 ?뺣쪧 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽? 紐낆궗 ?ㅼ뿉 ?깆옣?섎뒗 ?뺤떇 ?뺥깭?뚯뿴???뱀쭠, ?대뱾怨?誘몃벑濡앹뼱 ?꾨낫 媛꾩쓽 寃고빀 愿怨? 誘몃벑濡앹뼱 ?꾨낫????異쒗쁽 鍮덈룄, 誘몃벑濡앹뼱 ?꾨낫??泥섎━ ???臾몄꽌?먯꽌??異쒗쁽 鍮덈룄 ?깆쓣 ?쒖슜?섏뿬 ?꾨낫 ?⑥뼱媛 誘몃벑濡앹뼱???뺣쪧??異붿젙?쒕떎. ?쇰컲 ?댁뒪? 寃쎌젣 ?댁뒪?먯꽌 ?ㅽ뿕??寃곌낵 ?쒖븞??紐⑤뜽???곗닔???깅뒫??蹂댁???寃뚯엫???묎??깃낵 寃뚯엫 罹먮┃?곗쓽 肄섑뀗痢??뱀꽦?곌뎄

???곌뎄?먯꽌??遺덉셿?꾪븳 媛먯궗?낅Т???곭틠?귡뼋 ?덉륫??洹쇨굅?섏뿬 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 媛먯궗?낅Т???η쮮??⒴뙑瑜??ъ꽦?????덈뒗 紐⑦삎???쒖떆?섏??? 援ъ껜?곸쑝濡??ｆ읅雅븐쓣 鍮꾨’???꾨Ц媛?ㅼ쓽 ?먯뿰???쒗쁽??怨꾨웾?뷀븯?붾뜲 ?곗뼱???λ젰??吏??寃껋쑝濡??낆쬆???쇱?畑곭릤瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?ｆ읅鼇덂뒅??audit scheduling model)???쒖떆?섏???
媛?媛먯궗?낅Т???꾨즺?쒓컙???쇱?溫딀빖???????щ윭 ?낅Т瑜??숈떆??吏꾪뻾?대굹媛???곹솴???ㅼ젙?섏뿬 媛?媛먯궗?몃퀎濡?蹂묐ぉ?앸갑??bottleneck indentification procedure)??洹쇨굅?섏뿬 怨꾪쉷???섎┰?섎뒗 ?덉감瑜??댄렣蹂댁븯?? 洹몃━?섏뿬 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 媛먯궗?먯썝諛곕텇???대（?댁??꾨줉 ?몃젰?섏???Proper estimation of the time required for completing each auditing activity is important not only for meeting schedules and deadlines but also for cost control and cost reduction. Such estimation, however, is not an easy task especially when the audit times to be estimated pertain to an audit of a new corporate client.
Currently auditing firms often utilize the PERT/CPM techniques to determine audit schedules. In spite of their wide usage, these techniques have been under constant evaluative scrutiny. Of importance to this study is that the subjective time estimates by auditors may not necessarily bear a close relation to actual time required to complete audit processes, and an auditor's estimated time needed for each process does not necessarily follow any known probability distribution.
The quality of auditing is quite frequently related to the time taken in completing the auditing project, but at the same time a signigicant time of auditors are wasted during slack time. In an effort to solve this problem, this paper proposes a methods that utilizes a fuzzy probability approach to optimize audit scheduling process. The bottleneck identification procedure proposed in this paper is expected to enhance the audit quality, reduce the slack time and costs in the long run.Forecastiong Technological Manpower Requirements in Knowledge Based Economy
以묒븰??숆탳 ?곗뾽寃쎌쁺?곌뎄?? Cha, Ghelo-Ho, [2002]
??뺥븷?몄젏怨??덊띁留덉폆???곹샇 寃쎌웳?④낵??愿???ㅼ쬆???곌뎄
以묒븰??숆탳 ?곗뾽寃쎌쁺?곌뎄?? ?쒖꽦臾? [2002]
?멸퀎 二쇱슂援????湲곗뾽吏諛곌뎄議곗뿉 ???怨좎같
以묒븰??숆탳 ?곗뾽寃쎌쁺?곌뎄?? 理쒖젙?? [2002]

News data is often used as raw data in the field of natural language processing such as information analysis, information extraction, and reasoning. In recent years, a model has been proposed that not only automatically extracts features through distributed representation using deep learning, but also expresses the relationship between words and semantic information using context information of the text. This paper proposes a method for extracting structured data from news data and constructing features by applying the relationship between words and semantic information in the model. We extracted the events from unstructured news data through dependency parsing. The extracted events are applied to the Neural Tensor Network to construct the document feature of the news data. Also, we evaluated the composed document features by document clustering. Consequently, although the event embedding method performed better clustering than using the sum of word vectors, there was a limit to be used as a feature of representing the category of the entire document.?댁뒪 ?곗씠?곕뒗 ?뺣낫 遺꾩꽍 諛??뺣낫 異붿텧, 異붾줎 ?깆쓽 ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?먯떆 ?곗씠?곕줈 留롮씠 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 理쒓렐 ?λ윭?앹쓣 ?댁슜??遺꾩궛 ?쒗쁽???듯빐 ?먮룞?쇰줈 ?먯쭏??異붿텧??肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲???띿뒪?몄쓽 臾몃㎘ ?뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 愿怨? ?섎? ?뺣낫瑜??쒗쁽?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?섏뿀?? 蹂??쇰Ц? ?댁뒪 ?곗씠?곕줈遺??援ъ“?붾맂 ?곗씠?곕? 異붿텧?섍퀬 ?⑥뼱 媛꾩쓽 愿怨꾩? ?섎??곸씤 ?뺣낫瑜?紐⑤뜽??諛섏쁺?섏뿬 ?댁뒪 ?곗씠?곗쓽 ?먯쭏??援ъ꽦?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. 鍮꾩젙???댁뒪 ?곗씠?곗뿉???섏〈 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍???듯빐 ?대깽?몃뱾???먮룞?쇰줈 異붿텧?쒕떎. 異붿텧???대깽?몃뱾???좉꼍?먯꽌留?湲곗닠???곸슜?섏뿬 ?댁뒪 ?곗씠?곗뿉 ????먯쭏??援ъ꽦?쒕떎. ?먰븳, 援ъ꽦???먯쭏???덉쭏???됯??섍린 ?꾪빐 援곗쭛?붾? ?섑뻾?섏??? 寃곌낵瑜?蹂댁븯???? ?대깽???꾨쿋??諛⑹떇???⑥뼱 踰≫꽣???⑹쓣 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 寃껊낫??援곗쭛?붾? ?????섑뻾 ?섏?吏留? 臾몄꽌 ?꾩껜??移댄뀒怨좊━瑜???쒗븯???먯쭏濡??ъ슜?섍린?먮뒗 ?쒓퀎?먯씠 ?덉뿀??A Low-Latency, Traffic-Aware Edge-Cloud Broker Model Underlaying IoT Applications

湲곗닠濡쒕뱶留?(Technology RoadMap: TRM)? ?꾨왂??湲곗닠湲고쉷 諛?愿由щ? ?꾪븳?꾩닔?곸씤 ?꾧뎄?대떎. 理쒓렐 湲됱냽??湲곗닠蹂?붿? ?쒖옣寃쎌웳???ы솕濡??명빐 TRM? ?먯감 以묒슂?쒕릺怨??덈뒗?? ?대뒗 TRM??湲곗뾽???꾨왂??紐⑹쟻怨?湲곗닠???곌퀎?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?κ린?곸쑝濡??꾩슂??湲곗닠?ㅼ쓣 ?뺣낫?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?쇱쥌??吏????븷???섍린 ?뚮Ц?대떎. 洹몃윭??TRM??媛쒕컻?섍퀬 ?좎??섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 湲곗닠 ?꾨Ц媛???뺤꽦???몃젰???곕Ⅸ 留롮? 鍮꾩슜怨??쒓컙???섎컲?⑥쑝濡??명빐, 湲곗닠臾몄꽌???먮룞?붾맂 遺꾩꽍???듯빐 TRM 媛쒕컻 ?앹궛?깆쓣 ?믪씠??諛⑸쾿??????곌뎄媛 湲곗뾽怨??뺣?湲곌??ㅼ쓽 理쒓렐 二쇱슂 愿?ъ궗 以묒쓽 ?섎굹?대떎. 鍮꾨줉 TRM 媛쒕컻???꾪빐 ?ㅼ썙??湲곕컲???묎렐諛⑸쾿(Keyword-based Patent Analysis)???쒖떆??諛??덉쑝?? ??諛⑸쾿? 誘몃━ ?뺤쓽???ㅼ썙?쒖쓽 異쒗쁽?뺣낫?먮쭔 湲곕컲?섎?濡?湲곗닠?붿냼?ㅺ컙??紐낆떆???곌?愿怨꾨? ?댁? 紐삵븳?? 利? ?ㅼ썙??湲곕컲???묎렐? 湲곗닠??紐⑹쟻, 援ъ꽦, ?④낵 (Objective, Structure, Effect: OSE)??????뺣낫瑜??쒓났?섏? 紐삵븯湲??뚮Ц??湲곗닠濡쒕뱶留듯븨 ??湲곗닠?뺣낫???쒖슜??痢〓㈃?먯꽌 ?쒓퀎?먯쓣 吏?뚮떎. ?댁뿉, 蹂??곌뎄??湲곕뒫 (Function) 湲곕컲???묎렐踰뺤쓣 ?쒖슜??湲곗닠濡쒕뱶留듯븨 諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?쒕떎. 湲곕뒫?대? 湲곗닠??OSE ?뺣낫瑜??닿퀬 ?덉쑝硫?Subject-Action-Object (SAO) 援ъ“濡??쒗쁽?????덇린 ?뚮Ц?? 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌 ?쒖떆?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿? 湲곗닠臾몄꽌???먯뿰?댁쿂由щ텇?앹쓣 ?듯빐 湲곗닠??OSE ?뺣낫瑜?異붿텧?섏뿬 TRM??媛쒕컻?????덈룄濡??쒕떎. 蹂??곌뎄??諛⑸쾿???곌뎄媛쒕컻 湲고쉷?④퀎???곸슜?⑥쑝濡??? TRM 媛쒕컻???곕Ⅸ 鍮꾩슜怨??쒓컙???덇컧??媛?ν븯硫? ?쒗뭹?대굹 湲곗닠 OSE??????곌뎄媛쒕컻 湲고쉷?꾨Ц媛???쒖빞瑜??볧? 蹂대떎 ?④낵?곸씤 ?섏궗寃곗젙??媛?ν븷 寃껋쑝濡?湲곕??쒕떎.Technology roadmaps (TRMs) are considered to be the essential tool for strategic technology planning and management. Recently, rapidly evolving technological trends and severe technological competition are making TRM more important than ever before. That is because TRM plays a role of "map" that align organizational objectives with their relevant technologies. However, constructing and managing TRMs are costly and time-consuming because they rely on the qualitative and intuitive knowledge of human experts. Therefore, enhancing the productivity of developing TRMs is one of the major concerns in technology planning. In this regard, this paper proposes a technology roadmapping approach based on function of which concept includes objectives, structures and effects of a technology and which are represented as Subject-Action-Object structures extractable by exploiting natural language processing of patent text. We expect that the proposed method will broaden experts` technological horizons in the technology planning process and will help to construct TRMs efficiently with the reduced time and costs.?쇰컲?쇰Ц : ?덉땐援먯뿭 怨꾩빟 ?뚯슂湲곌컙 ?곹뼢?붿씤
湲곗닠寃쎌쁺寃쎌젣?숉쉶, ?띿꽍??( Seok Soo Hong ), [2012] [SCOPUS,KCI?깆옱]
?쇰컲?쇰Ц : ?묒넀?≪씠 ?쒗쑕(Ambidextrous Alliance)媛 湲곗뾽 ?깃낵??誘몄튂???곹뼢
湲곗닠寃쎌쁺寃쎌젣?숉쉶, ?뺣룄踰?( Do Bum Chung ), [2012] [SCOPUS,KCI?깆옱]
?쇰컲?쇰Ц : 湲곗뾽???щТ???뱀꽦蹂?섍? R&D ?ъ옄? 湲곗뾽媛移섍컙??愿怨꾩뿉 誘몄튂???곹뼢
湲곗닠寃쎌쁺寃쎌젣?숉쉶, ?좊???( Min Shik Shin ), [2012] [SCOPUS,KCI?깆옱]

As the volume of real-time information exchange through the Internet increases, an Internet chatting language has emerged as a new research field. This dissertation is research about goods information DB design that become query relationship which present to search goods of most suitable that purchaser wants from several electron shop in Internet.When purchaser does not know correct trade name, in case present query of natural language type that analogize by knowledge connected with characteristic of goods, wish to analyze this query and draw key that search goods.This dissertation is research via Korean goods search. Therefore, wish to analyze characteristic on Korean's trade name or query's expression than simple string comparison search of Korean trade name.For this purpose, Wish to design efficient Goods information DB's schema to draw trade name and attribute in query that purchaser presents from Goods information DB.蹂??곌뎄???명꽣?룹긽???щ윭 ?꾩옄?곸젏????곸쑝濡?援щℓ?먭? ?먰븯??理쒖쟻???곹뭹??寃?됲븯湲??꾪빐 援щℓ?먭? ?쒖떆??吏덉쓽臾?遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 湲곕컲???섎뒗 ?곹뭹 ?뺣낫 DB ?ㅺ퀎??愿???곌뎄?대떎.援щℓ?먭? ?뺥솗???곹뭹紐낆쓣 ?뚯? 紐삵븳 ?곹깭?먯꽌 ?곹뭹???뱀쭠怨?愿?⑥??앹쑝濡??좎텛???먯뿰???뺥깭??吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?쒖떆??寃쎌슦, ??吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 ?곹뭹寃???ㅻ? 異붿텧?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?뱁엳 ???곌뎄?먯꽌???쒓뎅???곹뭹 寃?됱쓣 湲곗??쇰줈 ???곌뎄?대?濡??쒓뎅???곹뭹紐낆쓽 ?⑥닚??臾몄옄??鍮꾧탳寃?됰낫?ㅻ뒗 ?쒓뎅?댁쓽 ?곹뭹 吏移?씠??吏덉쓽???쒗쁽 ?뱀쭠??遺꾩꽍?섍퀬???쒕떎. ??遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 ?ъ쟾???묒꽦???곹뭹?뺣낫 DB瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 援щℓ?먭? ?쒖떆??吏덉쓽臾몄뿉???곹뭹紐낃낵 ?띿꽦媛믪쓣 異붿텧?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?⑥쑉?곸쑝濡??ъ슜???곹뭹?뺣낫DB???ㅽ궎留덈? ?ㅺ퀎?섍퀬???쒕떎.媛꾪샇???곌뎄?먯꽌 鍮꾨룞?깆꽦 ?議곌뎔 ?꾪썑 ?ㅺ퀎???섑븳 ?좎궗?ㅽ뿕 ?먮즺???듦퀎??怨좎같

???쇰Ц? 1920-30?꾨? ?앸?吏 議곗꽑?먯꽌 紐낅갚???섎굹???꾩긽?댁뿀???먯뒪?섎???臾명븰???꾪솴怨?洹멸쾬??異붽뎄?덈뜕 臾명븰??諛⑺뼢???댄룉?? ?앸?吏 議곗꽑???먯뒪?섎???臾명븰????댁꽌???곌뎄??諛??녿뒗?? ?대뒗 ?먯뒪?섎??좉? ``?멸뎅??`媛 ?꾨땲??``援?젣 怨듯넻??`?닿린 ?뚮Ц??援?? ?⑥쐞??臾명븰 遺꾨쪟 泥닿퀎???쇱뼱???먮━媛 留덈븙移??딆븯湲??뚮Ц?대떎. ?쒓뎅???먯뒪?섎???臾명븰? ?낆옄?ㅼ씠 ?묓븯???몄뼱瑜?湲곗??쇰줈 1) ?먯뒪?섎??좊줈 吏곸젒 ?쒖떆?섎뒗 寃쎌슦, 2) ?쒓뎅???먯뒪?섎???踰덉뿭???④퍡 ?쒖떆?섎뒗 寃쎌슦濡??섎늻?대낵 ???덈떎. 1) ?먯뒪?섎???臾명븰? 踰덉뿭 ?놁씠 ?먯뒪?섎??좊줈留??뚭컻?섍린???섏??? ?먯뒪?섎????대룞? ``1援?? 2?몄뼱``???댁긽??媛뺤“?섏??붾뜲, ?먯뒪?섎???吏곸젒 ?쒖떆??洹??댁긽???ㅽ쁽?섎뒗 ?곸쭠???됱쐞濡??ш꺼議뚮떎. ?대뒓 ?섎씪??臾명븰?댁뿀??洹멸쾬?ㅼ씠 ?대? ??李⑤? ?먯뒪?섎??좊줈??``踰덉뿭``??嫄곗퀜 ?몄뼱? 援?쟻???덊뵾?섎㈃?? ?앸?吏 議곗꽑?먮뒗 ``?멸퀎臾명븰``?대씪???뺥깭濡??꾪빐議뚮떎. ?먯뒪?섎???吏곸젒 ?쒖떆???몄뼱 ?〓떒??鍮꾨?移?꽦(?몄뼱???ъ씠???몄뼱 ??븰?? ?ъ긽?? ?뺤튂??鍮꾨?移?꽦)???곗뼱?섎룄濡?留뚮뱾?덈떎. 2) ?쒓뎅 臾명븰???먯뒪?섎??좊줈 踰덉뿭?섍굅?? ?먯뒪?섎???臾명븰???쒓뎅?대줈 踰덉뿭?섍린???섏??? ?섎굹???먯뿰?대? ?ㅻⅨ ?먯뿰?대줈 踰덉뿭?섎뒗 寃껋?, ??誘쇱”?댁쓽 ``?먯뿉 諛뺤? ?ъ긽怨??쒗쁽``???ㅻⅨ 誘쇱”?댁쓽 ``?먯뿉 諛뺤? ?ъ긽怨??쒗쁽``?쇰줈 ??린??寃껋씠?? ``怨좎쑀??愿???대쾿????`???먯뒪?섎??좊뒗 ``蹂댄렪??媛먯젙怨??ъ긽``??洹몃┫ ???덈뒗 ?몄뼱濡??ш꺼議뚯쑝?? ?먯뒪?섎??좊줈??踰덉뿭???꾪빐 戮묓엺 ?쒓뎅 ?묓뭹?ㅼ? ?쒓뎅 臾명븰??李⑥썝?먯꽌???대? 議곗꽑???랁넗瑜?諛섏쁺?섏????딅뒗 寃껊뱾?댁뿀??This study set out to examine the state of Esperanto literature, which was clearly a phenomenon in colonized Joseon in the 1920s and 1930s, and the literary directions it sought after. The vogue of Esperanto in colonial Joseon started with interest in literature written in the language. But there are no studies that shed light on the ways Esperanto literature was distributed and enjoyed in Korea probably because there is no suitable place for it in the literary classification system by the ethnic group and nation units since Esperanto is not a "foreign language" but a "common international language. Based on the languages that the readers were exposed to, there were three types of Esperanto literature distributed in Korea during the colonial days: 1) the type that was presented directly in Esperanto, 2) (with including the type that was presented both in Esperanto and Korean translation) the type that was presented in Korean translation. 1) Korean papers introduced Esperanto literature in full scale with no Korean translation. The Esperanto Movement highlighted the ideal of "one nation, two languages"(using the mother tongue in the nation and using Esperanto, the common language, in international exchanges). Introducing Esperanto literature in Korean papers with no Korean translation was considered as a symbolic act to fulfill the ideal. The literary works of other countries were "translated" in Esperanto and thus broke from the boundary of language and nationality, and they were delivered in the form of "world literature" to colonial Joseon. It was considered that Esperanto literature practiced the immediacy of the original work as it was, thus overcoming the translingual asymmetry or dynamic, ideological, and political asymmetry between the language to be translated and the one to translate. 2) There were cases in which Korean literature was translated in Esperanto or Esperanto literature in Korean. One of the special linguistic merits of Esperanto is "no unique idiomatic expressions." Translating a natural(ethnic) language in another natural(ethnic) language is moving from the "stereotyped ideas and expressions" of an ethnic group to those of another ethnic group. Esperanto, which is considered to reflect no such limitations of ethnic language, can depict universal emotions and ideas with no ethnic characteristics. The works of Korean literature selected to be translated in Esperanto, however, did not reflect the climate of Joseon already even in the dimension of Korean literature.[?뱀쭛: ???섏? 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽瑜??꾪븳 ?뺤튂泥좏븰] : 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽? ?멸컙 沅뚮━???뺤튂: ?대줈??瑜댄룷瑜?C. Lefort)??誘쇱＜二쇱쓽 援ъ꽦怨??뺤옣

媛쒖껜紐??몄떇(Named Entity Recognition) ?쒖뒪?쒖? 臾몄꽌?먯꽌 ?몃챸(PS), 吏紐?LC), ?⑥껜紐?OG)怨?媛숈? 媛쒖껜紐낆쓣 媛吏???⑥뼱???닿뎄瑜??대떦 媛쒖껜紐낆쑝濡??몄떇?섎뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠?? 媛쒖껜紐??몄떇???섍린?꾪븳 ?꾪넻?곸씤 ?곌뎄諛⑸쾿?쇰줈??hand-craft???먯쭏(feature)??湲곕컲?쇰줈 紐⑤뜽???숈뒿?섎뒗 ?듦퀎 湲곕컲??紐⑤뜽???덈떎. 理쒓렐?먮뒗 ?λ윭??湲곕컲??RNN(Recurrent Neural Networks), LSTM(Long-short Term Memory)怨?媛숈? 紐⑤뜽???댁슜?섏뿬 臾몄옣???쒗쁽?섎뒗 ?먯쭏??援ъ꽦?섍퀬 ?대? 媛쒖껜紐??몄떇怨?媛숈씠 ?쒖꽌 ?쇰꺼留?sequence labeling) 臾몄젣 ?닿껐???댁슜???곌뎄媛 ?쒖븞?섏뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???쒓뎅??媛쒖껜紐??몄떇 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫 ?μ긽???꾪빐, end-to-end learning 諛⑹떇??媛?ν븳 ?λ윭??湲곕컲??紐⑤뜽??誘몃━ 援ъ텞?섏뼱 ?덈뒗 hand-craft???먯쭏?대굹 ?덉궗 ?쒓퉭 ?뺣낫 諛?湲곌뎄異??ъ쟾(lexicon) ?뺣낫瑜?異붽?濡??쒖슜?섏뿬 ?먯쭏??蹂닿컯(augmentation)?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???곕씪 ?먯쭏??蹂닿컯???쒓뎅??媛쒖껜紐??몄떇 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫 ?μ긽???뺤씤?섏??? ?먰븳 蹂??곌뎄??寃곌낵瑜??쒓뎅???먯뿰?댁쿂由?NLP) 諛?媛쒖껜紐??몄떇 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?곌뎄?섎뒗 ?곌뎄?먮뱾怨쇱쓽 ?ν썑 ?묒뾽 ?곌뎄瑜??꾪빐 github瑜??듯빐 怨듦컻?섏???The Named Entity Recognition system is a system that recognizes words or phrases with object names such as personal name (PS), place name (LC), and group name (OG) in the document as corresponding object names. Traditional approaches to named entity recognition include statistical-based models that learn models based on hand-crafted features. Recently, it has been proposed to construct the qualities expressing the sentence using models such as deep-learning based Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN) and long-short term memory (LSTM) to solve the problem of sequence labeling. In this research, to improve the performance of the Korean named entity recognition system, we used a hand-crafted feature, part-of-speech tagging information, and pre-built lexicon information to augment features for representing sentence. Experimental results show that the proposed method improves the performance of Korean named entity recognition system. The results of this study are presented through github for future collaborative research with researchers studying Korean Natural Language Processing (NLP) and named entity recognition system.?먮룞李??꾧??μ튂???뺤쟻?ㅺ퀎?몄옄 怨꾩궛???꾪븳 ?꾨줈洹몃옩 媛쒕컻??愿???곌뎄
?쒓뎅?듯빀?숉쉶, 源愿묒꽍, [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

移⑥긽???몄껜媛먯?瑜??꾪븳 ?먭꺽 ?ㅻ쭏???쒖뼱 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 愿???곌뎄
?쒓뎅?듯빀?숉쉶, 諛뺤듅?? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

Referring expressions are natural language constructions used to identify particular objects within a scene. In this paper, we propose a new deep neural network model for referring expression comprehension. The proposed model finds out the region of the referred object in the given image by making use of the rich information about the referred object itself, the context object, and the relationship with the context object mentioned in the referring expression. In the proposed model, the object matching score and the relationship matching score are combined to compute the fitness score of each candidate region according to the structure of the referring expression sentence. Therefore, the proposed model consists of four different sub-networks: Language Representation Network(LRN), Object Matching Network (OMN), Relationship Matching Network(RMN), and Weighted Composition Network(WCN). We demonstrate that our model achieves state-of-the-art results for comprehension on three referring expression datasets.李몄“ ?쒗쁽?대? ?λ㈃ ?곸긽 ?댁쓽 ?뱀젙 臾쇱껜瑜?媛由ы궎???먯뿰??臾몄옣?ㅼ쓣 ?섎??쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??李몄“ ?쒗쁽 ?댄빐瑜??꾪븳 ?덈줈???ъ링 ?좉꼍留?紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽? ?λ㈃ ?곸긽 ?????臾쇱껜???곸뿭??李얠븘?닿린 ?꾪빐, 李몄“ ?쒗쁽?먯꽌 ?멸툒?섎뒗 ???臾쇱껜肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲??蹂댁“ 臾쇱껜, 洹몃━怨????臾쇱껜? 蹂댁“ 臾쇱껜 ?ъ씠??愿怨꾧퉴吏 ?띾????뺣낫瑜??쒖슜?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽?먯꽌???곸긽 ??媛??꾨낫 ?곸뿭???곹빀??怨꾩궛???꾪빐 臾쇱껜 ?곹빀?꾩? 愿怨??곹빀?꾨? 李몄“ ?쒗쁽??臾몄옣 援ъ“???곕씪 寃고빀?쒕떎. ?곕씪?? 蹂?紐⑤뜽? ?ш쾶 珥???媛吏 ?쒕툕 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕?ㅻ줈 援ъ꽦?쒕떎: ?몄뼱 ?쒗쁽 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕(LRN), 臾쇱껜 ?뺥빀 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕(OMN), 愿怨??뺥빀 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕(RMN), 洹몃━怨?媛以?寃고빀 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕(WCN). 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌????媛吏 ?쒕줈 ?ㅻⅨ 李몄“ ?쒗쁽 ?곗씠?곗쭛?⑸뱾???댁슜???ㅽ뿕???듯빐, ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽???꾩〈 理쒓퀬 ?섏???李몄“ ?쒗쁽 ?댄빐 ?깅뒫??蹂댁씤?ㅻ뒗 寃껋쓣 ?낆쬆?섏???Redundant Parallel Hopfield Network Configurations: A New Approach to the Two-Dimensional Face Recognitions

?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, 源?뱁쁺, [2006]
CT ?곸긽?먯꽌??媛??곸뿭 異붿텧 諛?媛?醫낆뼇 遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, Do-Won Jang(?λ룄??, [2006]

The purpose of this study is to provide a systematic foundation regarding how to apply phenomenology to social science researches with a particular focus on policy studies. Phenomenological methodology has been paid scant attention as it is founded upon a philosophical foundation which is too difficult to be learned and dealt with by social scientists. It makes the methodology apart from being effectively utilized for the rigorous applications to empirical studies. Bearing this in mind, this research consciously discusses three topics such as (1) ?쏻hat is the concept and need for a phenomenological perspective in policy research and what is the relevance of the qualitative research??? (2) ?쏻hat is the logical structure of phenomenological epistemology and how is it suitable for phenomenological qualitative studies??? and (3) ?쏻hat are the processes of data collection and data analysis of phenomenological qualitative studies???By discussing the three topics, this research aims at offering the solid guideline for qualitative researchers.蹂??곌뎄???ы쉶怨쇳븰?곌뎄???덉뼱???섏쭏?곸뿰援щ갑踰뺤쑝濡쒖꽌 ?꾩긽?쇺숈쓽 ?묒슜?깃낵 ?곸슜?깆쓣 ?믪씠湲??꾪븳 ?⑥큹瑜?留덈젴?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? ?뱁엳 ?섏젙梨낆뿰援р??곸뿭??臾닿쾶以묒떖???먭퀬 ?쇱쓽瑜??꾧컻?섏??? ?꾩긽?숈? ?뺤콉-?됱젙 ?곌뎄?먮뱾???μ닕?섍쾶 ?ㅻ０ ???녿뒗 泥좏븰???대줎??湲곕컲??諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? ?대뒗 洹몃룞???쒗쁽?곹븰??吏덉쟻?곌뎄???ㅼ젣 ?섑뻾???덉뼱???곌뎄?먯뿉寃??대뼚???듭같??以????덉쑝硫??대뼚???곌뎄二쇱젣? 遺꾩꽍湲곕쾿怨?愿?⑥쓣 媛吏?붿??앹뿉 ???泥닿퀎?????쇱쓽瑜?媛濡쒕쭑?꾩솕?? ?대윭??臾몄젣?섏떇?먯꽌 蹂??곌뎄???꾩긽?숈쓽 ?묒슜???以묓솕??紐⑹쟻?먯꽌 ?섎룄濡??섏씪?곸쟻 ?덉떆?숈? ?섏옄?곗뼱?숇? ?듯빐 ?ㅼ쓬????媛吏 二쇱젣瑜??쇱쓽?섏??? ?쒓뎅?뺤콉?숉쉶, ?꾨??? [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
鍮꾩옄諛쒖쟻 湲곗닠?섏슜?섍꼍?먯꽌??怨듬Т???꾩옄?뺣? ?섏슜 ?곹뼢?붿씤??愿???곌뎄 - ?깅턿援?怨듬Т?먯쓽 ?쒖젙?뺣낫?섏쭛 ?쒖뒪???몄떇??以묒떖?쇰줈 -
?쒓뎅?뺤콉?숉쉶, ?꾩쁺?? [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
異뺤냼?뺤콉?먯꽌??遺?뺤꽦 ?명뼢怨?鍮꾨궃?뚰뵾??愿???곌뎄 -?덉궛?덇컧 ?붽뎄?????吏諛⑹젙遺 ??묒쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈-
?쒓뎅?뺤콉?숉쉶, ?댁?誘?( Eunmi Lee ), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

In this study, we have developed and evaluated an information extracting module based on the named entity recognition technique. For the given purpose in this paper, the module was designed to apply to the problem dealing with extraction of postal address information from arbitrary documents without any prior knowledge on the document layout. From the perspective of information technique practice, our approach can be said as a probabilistic n-gram (bi- or tri-gram) method which is a generalized technique compared with a uni-gram based keyword matching. It is the main difference between our approach and the conventional methods adopted in natural language processing that applying sentence detection, tokenization, and POS tagging recursively rather than applying the models sequentially. The test results with approximately two thousands documents are presented at this paper.蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??紐낅챸???ㅼ껜 ?몄떇 湲곕쾿??湲곗큹???뺣낫 異붿텧 紐⑤뱢??媛쒕컻?섍퀬 ?됯??섏??? 蹂??쇰Ц???쒖떆??紐⑹쟻???꾪빐, 紐⑤뱢? ?ъ쟾 吏???놁씠 ?꾩쓽??臾몄꽌?먯꽌 ?고렪 二쇱냼 ?뺣낫瑜?異붿텧?섎뒗 臾몄젣???곸슜?섎룄濡??ㅺ퀎?섏뿀?? ?뺣낫 湲곗닠 ?ㅻТ??愿?먯뿉?? ?곕━???묎렐諛⑹떇? ?좊땲洹몃옩 湲곕컲 ?ㅼ썙??留ㅼ묶怨?鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 ?쇰컲?붾맂 湲곕쾿???뺣쪧濡좎쟻 n-gram(諛붿씠?ㅺ렇???먮뒗 ?몃━洹몃옩) 諛⑸쾿?대씪怨?留먰븷 ???덈떎. 紐⑤뜽???쒖감?곸쑝濡??곸슜?섏? ?딄퀬 臾몄옣寃異? ?좏겙?? ?쒓뎅李쎌쓽?뺣낫臾명솕?숉쉶, ?꾩슜二? [2019] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

?쒓뎅李쎌쓽?뺣낫臾명솕?숉쉶, 諛깆쭊?? [2019] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
珥댟룹쨷?깊븰援먯뿉???깃났?곸씤 SW援먯쑁 ?뺤갑???꾪븳 諛⑹븞 紐⑥깋 - 珥덉쨷???숈깮 諛?援먯궗??SW援먯쑁??????몄떇??以묒젏?쇰줈 -
?쒓뎅李쎌쓽?뺣낫臾명솕?숉쉶, ?쒖닚?? [2019] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

Sentiment analysis using deep learning requires a large-scale train set labeled sentiment.
However, direct labeling of sentiment by humans is time and cost-constrained, and it is not easy to collect the required data for sentiment analysis from many data. In the present work, to solve the existing problems, the existing sentiment lexicon was used to assign sentiment score, and when there was sentiment transformation element, the sentiment score was reset through dependency parsing and morphological analysis for automatic generation of large-scale train set labeled with the sentiment. The Top-k data with high sentiment score was extracted. Sentiment transformation elements include sentiment reversal, sentiment activation, and sentiment deactivation. Our experimental results reveal the generation of a large-scale train set in a shorter time than manual labeling and improvement in the performance of deep learning with an increase in the amount of train set. The accuracy of the model using only sentiment lexicon was 80.17% and the accuracy of the proposed model, which includes natural language processing technology was 89.17%. Overall, a 9% improvement was observed.?λ윭?앹쓣 ?댁슜??媛먯꽦遺꾩꽍?먯꽌??媛먯꽦???덉씠釉???留롮? ?묒쓽 ?숈뒿?곗씠?곌? ?꾩슂?섎떎. 洹몃윭???щ엺??吏곸젒 媛먯꽦???덉씠釉??섎뒗 寃껋? ?쒓컙怨?鍮꾩슜???쒖빟???덇퀬 留롮? ?곗씠?곗뿉??媛먯꽦遺꾩꽍???곹빀??異⑸텇???묒쓽 ?곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?섎뒗 寃껋? ?쎌? ?딅떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???대윭??臾몄젣?먯쓣 ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 湲곗〈??媛먯꽦?ъ쟾???쒖슜?섏뿬 媛먯꽦?먯닔瑜?留ㅺ릿 ??媛먯꽦 蹂???붿냼媛 議댁옱?섎㈃ ?섏〈 援щЦ 遺꾩꽍 諛??뺥깭??遺꾩꽍???섑뻾??媛먯꽦?먯닔瑜??ъ꽕?뺥븯??媛먯꽦???덉씠釉?????⑸웾 ?숈뒿?곗씠?곕? ?먮룞 ?앹꽦?섎뒗 諛⑹븞???쒖븞?쒕떎. 媛먯꽦蹂???붿냼濡쒕뒗 媛먯꽦 諛섏쟾, 媛먯꽦 ?쒖꽦?? 媛먯꽦 鍮꾪솢?깊솕媛 ?덉쑝硫?媛먯꽦?먯닔媛 ?믪? ?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?댁닔吏? [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

The purpose of this study is to develop the local tax chatbot. Gyeonggi provincial government introduced local tax chatbot. Local tax chatbots provide local tax information to taxpayers' questions.The performance of the local tax chatbot is not enough for the level of conversation the taxpayer wants.Therefore, this study proposed the adoption of the local tax brains system as an alternative.
It is necessary to organize the interactive tax knowledge information when constructing the local tax brains system. And it is necessary to participate in local tax experts to build local tax brains system. Local tax experts should teach chattbot the interpretation of local taxation and precedents. The ongoing teaching of local tax experts can improve the functioning of the chatbot.
This study suggests a systematic AI - based local tax brains system to develop Gyeonggi local tax chatbot. Korea Institute of Local Finance should contribute the development of chatbots by integrating Local Tax Information System on local laws and local tax knowledge. To prepare for the fourth industrial revolution era, local tax experts should focus on building and developing an intelligent local tax brain system.蹂??곌뎄??ICT湲곕컲 怨듦났遺꾩빞 ?뺣낫???ъ뾽 以?4李??곗뾽?곷챸怨?愿?⑥씠 源딆? 吏?ν삎 ?곷떞遊뉗쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈 怨듦났遺꾩빞??AI湲곕컲 吏諛⑹꽭釉뚮젅?몄떆?ㅽ뀥 援ъ텞 諛⑹븞????댁꽌 ?곌뎄?섏??? ?뱁엳 蹂??곌뎄??怨듦났遺꾩빞 AI湲곕컲 ?곷떞遊뉗쓽 ?꾩엯怨쇱젙怨?洹??깃낵臾쇱쓣 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬 ?ы쉶 媛?遺꾩빞?륚I湲곕컲 ?곷떞泥닿퀎媛 ?쒖꽦?붾릺湲??꾪븳 ?좉껐怨쇱젣媛 臾댁뾿?닿퀬 ?대뼸寃?媛쒕컻???섍컝 寃껋씤吏?먮???諛쒖쟾諛⑹븞??紐⑥깋??蹂댁븯?? ?먰븳 吏諛⑹꽭 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 4李??곗뾽?곷챸??留욌뒗 ?멸났吏???⑹꽭?먯꽌鍮꾩뒪 ?꾪븳 吏諛⑹꽭釉뚮젅?몄떆?ㅽ뀥 援ъ텞 諛⑹븞???쒖떆?섏???

?ы쉶?곷퉬??異붿젙???듯븳 吏諛⑹꽭 怨쇱꽭 諛⑹븞 紐⑥깋-??곗꽍?좏솕?숇떒吏瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈-
?쒓뎅吏諛⑹꽭?숉쉶, ?대??? [2017] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

This paper explores a method of text watermarking for agglutinative languages and develops a syntactic tree-based syntactic constituent movement scheme. Agglutinative languages provide a good ground for the syntactic tree-based natural language watermarking because syntactic constituent order is relatively free. Our proposed natural language watermarking method consists of seven procedures. First, we construct a syntactic dependency tree of unmarked text. Next, we perform clausal segmentation from the syntactic tree. Third, we choose target syntactic constituents, which will move within its clause. Fourth, we determine the movement direction of the target constituents. Then, we embed a watermark bit for each target constituent. Sixth, if the watermark bit does not coincide with the direction of the target constituent movement, we displace the target constituent in the syntactic tree. Finally, from the modified syntactic tree, we obtain a marked text. From the experimental results, we show that the coverage of our method is 91.53%, and the rate of unnatural sentences of marked text is 23.16%, which is better than that of previous systems. Experimental results also show that the marked text keeps the same style, and it has the same information without semantic distortion.???쇰Ц? ?쒓뎅??臾몄옣????곸쑝濡?援щЦ?붿냼???꾩튂瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ??臾몄꽌 ?뚰꽣留덊궧 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒓뎅?댁? 媛숈? 援먯갑?대뒗 援щЦ?붿냼???쒖꽌媛 ?먯쑀濡?린 ?뚮Ц??援щЦ ?몃━ 湲곕컲???먯뿰???뚰꽣留덊궧???꾪븳 醫뗭? ?섍꼍???쒓났?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 ?먯뿰???뚰꽣留덊궧 諛⑸쾿? 7?④퀎濡?援ъ꽦?섏뼱 ?덈떎. 泥レ㎏, 臾몄옣??援щЦ遺꾩꽍???섑뻾?쒕떎. ?ㅼ쓬?쇰줈, 援щЦ?붿냼媛 ?대떦 ?덉쓽 踰붿쐞 ?덉뿉?쒕쭔 ?꾩튂?섎룄濡?踰붿쐞瑜??쒖젙?섍린 ?꾪븯??援щЦ ?몃━濡쒕???媛??덉쓣 遺꾪븷?쒕떎. ??踰덉㎏濡? ?꾩튂瑜??꾪븳 紐⑺몴 援щЦ?붿냼瑜??좏깮?쒕떎. ??踰덉㎏, 紐⑺몴 援щЦ?붿냼???꾩튂 ?꾩뿉??臾몄옣???섎???臾몄껜??蹂?붽? 理쒖냼?붾릺?꾨줉 媛???먯뿰?ㅻ윭???꾩씠?꾩튂瑜?寃곗젙?쒕떎. 洹??? 紐⑺몴 援щЦ?붿냼??????뚰꽣留덊겕 鍮꾪듃瑜??쎌엯?쒕떎. ?ъ꽢 踰덉㎏ ?④퀎濡? ?뚰꽣留덊겕 鍮꾪듃媛 紐⑺몴 援щЦ?붿냼???꾩튂 諛⑺뼢怨??곸쓳?섏? ?딆쑝硫?援щЦ ?몃━?먯꽌 紐⑺몴 援щЦ?붿냼瑜??꾩튂?쒕떎. 留덉?留됱쑝濡?蹂?섎맂 援щЦ ?몃━?먯꽌 ?뚰꽣留덊궧??臾몄꽌瑜??삳뒗?? ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵瑜??듯빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿???곸슜瑜좎? 91.53%?닿퀬, 理쒖쥌 ?뚰꽣留덊궧??臾몄옣??以?遺?먯뿰?ㅻ윭??臾몄옣??鍮꾩쑉? 23.16%濡쒖꽌 湲곗〈 ?쒖뒪?쒕뱾蹂대떎 醫뗭? 寃곌낵瑜?蹂댁뿬以?? ?먰븳 ?뚰꽣留덊궧??臾몄옣???먯떆 臾몄옣怨?媛숈? 臾몄껜瑜??좎??섍퀬, ?섎??곸씤 ?쒓끝 ?놁씠 媛숈? ?뺣낫瑜??섑??닿퀬 ?덈떎.?좏빐???꾪꽣留곴낵 SVM???댁슜???좏빐 臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟 ?쒖뒪??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?댁썝?? [2009] [KCI?깆옱]
3李⑥썝 痢≪젙?먯쑝濡쒕??곗쓽 媛앹껜 ?먮룞?몄떇
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?덉꽦以, [2009] [KCI?깆옱]
?ㅺ낸 諛⑺뼢?깆쓣 怨좊젮???곸쓳???곸긽蹂듭썝
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?꾩슦?? [2009] [KCI?깆옱]

This study is an examination about whether mental health chatbots using leading-edge AI technology in the fourth industrial revolution can incorporate a selection of algorithms producing human interactive data for Seon encounter dialogues (SEDs). This comes from the finding that such similarities as simplicity, goal-directedness, and optimization exist between SEDs and algorithms. Thus, ?쐊eywords??scanned from the vast SED-oriented conversational patterns could be algorithmized by using ?쐂eep learning.??It can, then, be clustered to build data sets. The possible domains of such mental ?쐔elepathy??may encompass algorithms that provide examples of non-logical mental representation, algorithms that provide metaphorical examples and algorithms that provide conversation topics (Hwadu). This data group might show individually unique dialogue patterns inclusive of psychotherapy effectiveness.
The current chatbot metrics rely on natural language processing within the established database system; however, SED-specific algorithms reply with more creative keywords. This goes beyond conventional quasi-stereotyped response patterns. This means that SED algorithm?럓owered mental health chatbot can offer more effective counseling based on much more data, making them access the wisdom of meditation masters in the traditional Seon Buddhism.???쇰Ц? ??李??곗뾽?곷챸?쒕????듭떖湲곗닠濡쒖꽌 二쇰ぉ諛쏄퀬 ?덈뒗 ?멸났吏?μ쓣 ?댁슜???щ━移섎즺 ?곷떞?섏콟遊뉍숈뿉 ??섏뿬 ?좊Ц???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???곗씠?곕? 援ъ텞?좎닔 ?덉쓣 吏??????쇱쓽?대떎. ?좊Ц?듦낵 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁 ?ъ씠?먮뒗 ?⑥닚?? 紐⑺몴吏?μ꽦, 理쒖쟻?붿꽦?대씪???좎궗?깆씠 ?덈떎. ?댁뿉 李⑹븞?섏뿬 ?섎뵦?щ떇?숆린?좎쓣 ?듯빐 諛⑸????좊Ц?듭쓽 ??뷀뙣?댁뿉 ?섑듅吏뺢컪?숈쓣 ?꾩텧?쒖폒 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁?뷀븯怨?洹멸쾬?ㅼ쓣 遺꾨쪟, 踰붿＜?붿떆耳??곗씠?곕? 援ъ텞?????덈떎??寃껋씠?? 洹?踰붿＜?붿쓽 ?덈줈???щ━移섎즺?④낵瑜?湲곕??????덈뒗 ?댁냼?뚭퀬由ъ쬁, ??좎븣怨좊━利? ?붾몢?뚭퀬由ъ쬁 ?깆쓣 ?쒖떆?????덈떎. 媛?踰붿＜濡?遺꾨쪟???곗씠?곕뱾? ?щ━移섎즺?④낵媛 ?댄룷??怨좎쑀????뷀뙣?댁쓣 蹂댁뿬以?? ?꾩옱???щ━移섎즺 梨쀫큸湲곗닠? 湲곗〈???곗씠???쒖뒪???덉뿉?쒕쭔 ?먯뿰???숈뒿怨??쒖슜???섎뒗 諛⑹떇?대떎. 洹몃윭???좊Ц???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???곗씠?곕? ?듯빐 洹??쇱긽???듬? ?⑦꽩???섏뼱?쒕뒗 李쎌쓽???듬??⑦꽩???좊Ц?듭쓽 ?쇰쾿?쇰줈遺??李⑥슜?????덈떎. ?대? ?듯빐 ?щ━移섎즺 梨쀫큸? 愿묐쾾?꾪븳 ?곗씠?곕? ?뺣낫?섏뿬 蹂대떎 ?④낵?곸씤 ?곷떞???????덇퀬, ?댁슜?먮뱾? ?좊텋援??꾪넻 ???좎궗?ㅼ쓽 吏?쒖뿉 蹂댄렪???묎렐??媛?ν빐吏?寃껋씠???롪툑媛뺣컲?쇨꼍?뚣륁쓽 ???寃쎈줈 ?ш퀬李???泥쒗깭吏?섏쓽 ??좊줈 ?꾪빐吏???롪툑媛뺣컲?쇨꼍?뚣륁? 湲몄옣?뚢땯?뱀“二쇱쓽 愿怨???

?쒓뎅遺덇탳?숉쉶, 媛뺥삎泥? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]
4李??곗뾽湲곕컲??遺덇탳嫄댁텞 ?쒖슜諛⑹븞
?쒓뎅遺덇탳?숉쉶, ?μ옱吏? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

Opinion mining is widely used for various field to analyze opinions, attitudes, and emotions.
However, studies concerned with opinion mining for restaurant reviews of delivery applications are
few. We conducted opinion mining using a trained machine learning model in another field or
already built sentiment lexicon. But it can degrade accuracy. Therefore, in this paper, trains
support vector machine model with restaurant reviews and then conducts Opinion Mining by
classifying it based on the rating of reviews. To apply the SVM algorithm to reviews consisting of
text, convert it to numerical data using natural language processing and text mining. Consider each
rating as a class, classify reviews. And then, compare error between original rating and classified
rating. As experimental result, approximately 63% of reviews were correctly classified, and 24% of
reviews were classified with error size of 1. In addition, several terms that have close relation with
the delivery applications were found.?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?ㅽ뵾?덉뼵 留덉씠?앹쓣 ?쒖슜?섏?留?諛곕떖 紐⑤컮???좏뵆由ъ??댁뀡???뚯떇??由щ럭??????щ???嫄?

?좎븘援먯쑁?꾩옣?먯꽌???뺣낫?듭떊湲곗닠(ICT) ?쒖슜 ?ㅽ깭 遺꾩꽍

?귛뀱??吏묐떒?멸? 踰붿＜?멸?
?몄젣??숆탳, 源?깆쿋 , [2004]

Word Embedding is important in natural language processing, and word2vec is known as a representative algorithm. Word2vec and many other dictionary based word-imbedding algorithms have limitations in creating word vectors only for words used in learning, because they does not use the words??morphological feature. FastText is a proposed algorithm to solve this problem, word embedding in a combination of sub-words, thus creating a word vector for words that have never been used in learning. Because FastText uses morphological features, it has strengths in syntactic and weekness in semantic compared to word2vec. In this paper, the method of improving FastText is presented by using the inverse document frequency of the subword, and was intended to overcome the weakness in the semantic part of FastText. The results of the experiment show that there has been improvement in semantic tests with little loss in syntactic tests. this method can be applied to any word embedding algorithms using subwords. The probabilistic FastText designed to distinguish multi-sense words and was also tested with the inverse document frequency, and the results confirmed that the performance is improved.?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑹? ?먯뿰?댁쿂由?遺꾩빞?먯꽌 以묒슂??湲곗닠濡? word2vec????쒖쟻???뚭퀬由ъ쬁?쇰줈 ?뚮젮???덈떎. word2vec??鍮꾨’???ъ쟾湲곕컲???뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋???뚭퀬由ъ쬁?ㅼ? ?⑥뼱???뺥깭?뚰듅吏뺤쓣 ?ъ슜?섏? ?딅뒗 諛⑹떇, 利??⑥뼱瑜??섎굹??媛쒖껜濡??ъ슜?섍린 ?뚮Ц???숈뒿???ъ슜???⑥뼱????댁꽌留??⑥뼱 踰≫꽣瑜?留뚮뱾 ???덈뒗 ?쒓퀎瑜?媛吏怨??덈떎. FastText????臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?쒖븞???뚭퀬由ъ쬁?쇰줈, 遺?띾떒?대뱾??議고빀?쇰줈 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?섎ŉ, ?댁뿉 ?곕씪 ?숈뒿???ъ슜???곸씠 ?녿뒗 ?⑥뼱????댁꽌???⑥뼱 踰≫꽣瑜?留뚮뱾 ???덈떎. FastText???뺥깭?뚯쟻 ?뱀쭠???ъ슜?섍린 ?뚮Ц?? word2vec 諛⑹떇??鍮꾪븯??援щЦ??遺遺꾩뿉?쒕뒗 媛뺤젏???덇퀬, ?섎???遺遺꾩뿉?쒕뒗 ?쎌젏???덈떎. ???쇰Ц?먯꽌??遺?띾떒?댁쓽 ??Ц?쒕퉰?꾨? ?댁슜?섏뿬 FastText瑜?媛쒖꽑?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖떆?섎ŉ, FastText媛 媛吏怨??덈뒗 ?섎???遺遺꾩뿉?쒖쓽 ?쎌젏??洹밸났?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵??援щЦ??遺遺꾩뿉?쒖쓽 ?먯떎??嫄곗쓽 ?놁씠 ?섎??곷?遺꾩뿉??媛쒖꽑???덉뿀?뚯쓣 蹂댁뿬以?? ?먰븳 ??諛⑸쾿? 遺?띾떒?대? ?댁슜???뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑹뿉 紐⑤몢 ?곸슜?????덈떎. 以묒쓽?대? 援щ퀎?섏뿬 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑺븯湲??꾪빐 怨좎븞???뺣쪧??FastText?먮룄 ??Ц??鍮덈룄瑜??곸슜 ?ㅽ뿕?섍퀬, 寃곌낵瑜??듯빐 ?깅뒫???μ긽?섏뿀?뚯쓣 ?뺤씤?섍퀬???쒕떎.?⑥쑉?곸씤 媛?곹솕 ?쒖뒪???꾨줈?뚯씪留곸쓣 ?꾪븳 ?깅뒫痢≪젙 ?꾨젅?꾩썙??

EEG 湲곕컲 媛먯젙?몄떇???꾪븳 二쇱꽍 ?덉씠釉붾쭅怨?EEG Topography ?덉씠釉붾쭅 湲곕쾿??鍮꾧탳 怨좎같
?쒓뎅李⑥꽭?而댄벂?낇븰?? 瑜섏젣?? [2019] [KCI?깆옱]
Subcortical Features based Alzheimer?셲 disease diagnosis using Support vector machine
?쒓뎅李⑥꽭?而댄벂?낇븰?? Yubraj Gupta, [2019] [KCI?깆옱]

Nowadays, an accuracy of interpretation and translation system, which are based on a natural language, are quotidianly increasing, because a big data processing method has been dramatically progressed. However, there are still some lacks for an user who is needed a colloquial style interpretation and translation. To this end, we propose an interpretation and translation system for the user, which are using a location information based on big data analysis. When the proposed system collect data, the system is preferentially gathering the data which are generated in the near regions, and which are related with the regions. At this time, the criteria of data gathering process are each data location information. And then, the system will configure various data set by their data type. The configured data set, which it will be used pre-learning parameters in a deep neural network. Based on these parameters for the pre-learning process, the proposed system carry out a deep learning process. By doing this, the system provide a improved interpretation and translation result for colloquial style. To verify an excellence of the system, we compare with an existing system. In the performance evaluation, the proposed system show enhanced results about 10% than the existing system.理쒓렐 ?ㅼ뼱 ?ъ링?숈뒿 湲곕컲 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 泥섎━諛⑹븞??湲됯꺽??諛쒖쟾?쇰줈 ?명빐, ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕컲???돠룸쾲???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?뺥솗?깆씠 ?섎궇???믪븘吏怨??덈떎. 洹몃윭?? ?꾩쭅源뚯? ?뚰솕泥??꾩＜???돠룸쾲??씠 ?꾩슂???ъ슜?먮뱾???ъ슜?섍린?먮뒗 遺議깊븳 寃껋씠 ?ъ떎?대떎. ?대? ?꾪빐, 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ъ슜???꾩튂 湲곕컲 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 遺꾩꽍???쒖슜???돠룸쾲???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞?섎뒗 ?돠룸쾲???쒖뒪?쒖? ?곗씠???섏쭛 ?쒖뿉 ?꾩튂 ?뺣낫瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?대떦 ?꾩튂??洹쇱쿂??諛쒖깮???곗씠?곕? ?곗꽑?곸쑝濡??섏쭛?섏뿬, ?대? 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?곗씠??吏묓빀???앹꽦?섍퀬, ?ㅼ젣 ?돠룸쾲??쓽 ?섑뻾 ???대떦 ?곗씠?곗쓽 吏묓빀???ъ링 ?좉꼍留??숈뒿???ъ쟾 ?숈뒿 ?뚮씪誘명꽣濡??ъ슜?섏뿬 援ъ뼱泥댁뿉 ????돠룸쾲??寃곌낵???뺥솗?꾨? ?μ긽?쒗궗 ???덈뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠?? ?쒖븞 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?곗닔??寃利앹쓣 ?꾪빐, 湲곗〈 ?쒖뒪?쒓낵??鍮꾧탳瑜??섑뻾?섏??쇰ŉ, ?깅뒫?됯? 寃곌낵 湲곗〈 ?쒖뒪???鍮???10%???깅뒫?μ긽???섑??댁뼱 ?쒖븞 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?곗닔?깆쓣 ?낆쬆?섏???遺?뺥솗 ?⑤씪???ㅼ?伊대쭅?먯꽌 ?좏깮???쒖뒪?щ뱾??吏?곗젙?꾩뿉 ?곕Ⅸ ?④낵

?좎쟾???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???댁슜??寃쎌쑀?잛닔 ?쒖빟???덈뒗 理쒕떒 寃쎈줈 ?먯깋
?쒓뎅吏?앹젙蹂닿린?좏븰?? ?대㈃?? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]
Design of User Profile-based Personalized Recommendation Service for Sport Commerce
?쒓뎅吏?앹젙蹂닿린?좏븰?? ?덉쿋臾? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

With the rapid evolution of the Internet and mobile environments, text including spelling errors such as newly-coined words and abbreviated words are widely used. These spelling errors make it difficult to develop NLP (natural language processing) applications because they decrease the readability of texts. To resolve this problem, we propose a spelling error correction model using a spelling error correction dictionary and a newspaper corpus. The proposed model has the advantage that the cost of data construction are not high because it uses a newspaper corpus, which we can easily obtain, as a training corpus. In addition, the proposed model has an advantage that additional external modules such as a morphological analyzer and a word-spacing error correction system are not required because it uses a simple string matching method based on a correction dictionary. In the experiments with a newspaper corpus and a short message corpus collected from real mobile phones, the proposed model has been shown good performances (a miss-correction rate of 7.3%, a F1-measure of 97.3%, and a false positive rate of 1.1%) in the various evaluation measures.?명꽣??諛?紐⑤컮???섍꼍??鍮좊Ⅸ 諛쒖쟾怨??④퍡 ?좎“?대굹 以꾩엫留먭낵 媛숈? 泥좎옄 ?ㅻ쪟?ㅼ쓣 ?ы븿?섎뒗 ?띿뒪?몃뱾???쒕컻???듭슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?대윭??泥좎옄 ?ㅻ쪟?ㅼ? ?띿뒪?몄쓽 媛?낆꽦???⑥뼱?⑤┝?쇰줈???먯뿰?댁쿂由??묒슜?ㅼ쓣 媛쒕컻?섎뒗??嫄몃┝?뚯씠 ?쒕떎. ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??泥좎옄?ㅻ쪟 援먯젙?ъ쟾怨??좊Ц湲곗궗 留먮춬移섎? ?댁슜??泥좎옄 ?ㅻ쪟 援먯젙 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽? 援ы븯湲??ъ슫 ?좊Ц湲곗궗 留먮춬移섎? ?숈뒿 留먮춬移섎줈 ?ъ슜?섍린 ?뚮Ц???곗씠??援ъ텞鍮꾩슜???ъ? ?딅떎???μ젏???덈떎. ?먰븳 援먯젙?ъ쟾 湲곕컲???⑥닚 留ㅼ묶 諛⑸쾿???ъ슜?섍린 ?뚮Ц???꾩뼱?곌린 援먯젙 ?쒖뒪?쒖씠???뺥깭??遺꾩꽍湲곗? 媛숈? 蹂꾨룄???몃? 紐⑤뱢???꾩슂 ?녿떎???μ젏???덈떎. ?좊Ц湲곗궗 留먮춬移섏? ?ㅼ젣 ?대??곗뿉???섏쭛??臾몄옄 硫붿떆吏 留먮춬移섎? ?댁슜???ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽? ?ㅼ뼇???됯? 泥숇룄?먯꽌 鍮꾧탳???믪? ?깅뒫(?ㅺ탳?뺣쪧 7.3%, F1-泥숇룄 97.3%, ?꾩뼇?깆쑉 1.1%)??蹂댁??????숈옉 ?몄떇???듯븳 ?멸컙 - 而댄벂???명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ슜 ?媛??鍮꾩＜??紐⑥뀡 ?곗씠??湲?щ툕
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?쒖쁺紐? [2009] [KCI?깆옱]
?ㅼ떆媛??먮룞???몄떇???꾪븳 ?숈옉 ?됰㈃ 異붿젙
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?뺤듅?, [2009] [KCI?깆옱]
?⑤갚吏?3李⑥썝 援ъ“??吏??쟻 ?좎궗?깆쓣 ?댁슜??Flexible ?⑤갚吏?援ъ“ ?뺣젹??愿???곌뎄
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 諛뺤갔?? [2009] [KCI?깆옱]

The purpose of this study is to determine the direction of the local architecture award and to expand the understanding of local identity and regionality by analyzing user?셲 cognition characteristics of the regionality in local architecture award-winning works.
A questionnaire survey was conducted on the appropriateness and regionality expression factors of the 16 works received the Grand Prize and the Gold Prize in the Busan Architecture Award for the residents of Busan area and other areas. The responses of questionnaires are extracted by natural-language vocabulary, and classified into descriptive vocabulary and architectural vocabulary.
Cross-comparisons of response characteristics of each building and response characteristics of each vocabulary are examined.
As a result, Busan residents' cognition characteristics of the regionality can be classified into the following four categories: Practical architecture with familiarity, simple and terrestrial conformity that is related to the image of a people city; Landmark architecture representing a new and famous area associated with the image of a film and culture city; A beautiful, clean, white architecture harmonized with the ocean associated with the image of a maritime city; A harmonious and person-smelling architecture with the surrounding nature associated with the image of tourist city.蹂??쇰Ц??紐⑹쟻? 吏??嫄댁텞?곸씠 ?섏븘媛?諛⑺뼢???뺥븯?붾뜲 ?꾩???二쇨퀬 吏???뺤껜?? 吏??꽦??????댄빐瑜??뺤옣?섍린 ?꾪빐 嫄댁텞 ?댁슜?먮뱾??吏??二쇰??ㅼ쓣 ??곸쑝濡??섏뿬 吏??嫄댁텞?곸쓽 ?곸젅?깃낵 吏??꽦??????몄떇 ?뱀꽦???뺤씤?섍퀬???섎뒗 ???덈떎.

怨쇳븰湲곗닠 援?젣???섍꼍遺꾩꽍 諛???묐갑??
怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺤콉?곌뎄?? ?대챸吏? [2002]
遺곹븳 怨쇳븰湲곗닠?꾪솴 諛??뺤콉?숉뼢 遺꾩꽍
怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺤콉?곌뎄?? ?띿꽦踰? [2002]

The purpose of the study is to analyze how South Koreans perceive refugees through Yemenis who have entered Jeju Island. I analyzed comments from Naver News regarding Yemenis who entered Jeju Island through text-mapping techniques. The period to be analyzed was from June 1, 2016 to Jan. 30, 2019.
They used ?쁉eju Refugee,???쁚emen Refugee,???쁉eong Woo-sung Refugee,??and ?쁅ake News of Refugees??as search terms.
The collected comment data was pre-processed using KoNLPy, a Korean natural language processing package. Frequency analysis, Topics analysis, and Emotional analysis were performed.
First, many South Koreans have a negative view of Yemenis who have entered Jeju Island en masse.
Second, there is a strong tendency to view the acts of Yemenis who collectively entered Jeju Island as a challenge to sacred sovereignty.
Third, as an agreement member of the Refugee Convention, the Korean government is also hoping negatively for the basic role it should play.
Fourth, they openly abhor those who offer a positive stance toward Yemenis entering Jeju Island, such as ?쏦angeolle?? ?쏫iregi??and ?쏮unjoein??or criticize them through personal attacks, as seen by actor Jung Woo-sung.
Fifth, the emotional analysis of Yemenis entering Jeju was observed to have more negative comments than positive ones in quantitative terms as well as positive ones.
The study has limitations on looking at the overall Korean society's perception of refugees that surrounds Yemenis entering Jeju Island.
However, it is meaningful in that the public has tried to establish the public's perception of the ?쏳efugees??issue, which has emerged as one of the important political agenda items in Korean society based on the Yemeni entry into Jeju Island, by analyzing comments through text-minning techniques.???곌뎄??紐⑹쟻? ?쒖＜?꾩뿉 ?낃뎅???덈찘?몃뱾??怨꾧린濡??쒓뎅?몃뱾? ?쒕????대뼸寃??몄떇?섍퀬 ?덈뒗媛瑜?遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?대? ?꾪빐 ?꾩옄???쒖＜?꾩뿉?낃뎅???덈찘?몃뱾怨?愿?⑤맂 ?ㅼ씠踰??댁뒪???볤????띿뒪?몃쭏?대떇 湲곕쾿???듯빐 遺꾩꽍?섏??? 遺꾩꽍 ???湲곌컙? 2016??6??1?쇰???2019??1??30?쇨퉴吏??? 寃?됱뼱濡쒕뒗 ?섏젣二쇰룄 ?쒕??? ?섏삁硫??쒕??? ?섏젙?곗꽦 ?쒕??? ?섎궃誘?媛吏쒕돱?ㅲ?瑜??ъ슜?섏???

節?떎臾명솕 ?ы쉶? ?꾨룞蹂듭?節?援먯쑁????숈깮???꾨룞沅뚮━ ?몄떇??誘몄튂???④낵
以묒븰??숆탳 臾명솕肄섑뀗痢좉린?좎뿰援ъ썝, ?⑹??? [2019] [KCI?깆옱]

To improve English communication skills, comprehensive education of reading, writing, listening, and speaking is required. However, many people in Korea have difficulties in writing English because writing education is not successful. In addition, it is financially and temporally limited to receive individual education for English writing. Conventional aiding systems for English writing recommend only words without consideration of grammar. Furthermore, existing systems are inconvenient because they need to have a separate program installation. In this paper, we propose an aiding system for English writing for users of English as a second language. The proposed system suggests a next word and the part of speech of the word in real time as users write an English sentence. To do this, English sentences with high grammatical accuracy are collected, analyzed through natural language processing, and stored as an XML document, which represents syntax trees. Based on the word sequence inputted by the user, XQuery, an XML query language, is used to obtain parts of speech and words to be recommended. In addition, our system allows users to search sentences with desired syntactic structure. Because the system is web-based, there is no need to install a program separately, and it is easy for users to access. Experiments using 550,000 sentence databases and 1000 test sentences showed that the accuracy of our system was 60% for the average and 95% for the nouns. The recommendation process can be done within 1.5 seconds using a PC server.?곸뼱 ?섏궗?뚰넻?λ젰???μ긽?쒗궎湲??꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?쎄린, ?곌린, ?ｊ린, 留먰븯湲곗쓽 醫낇빀?곸씤 援먯쑁???꾩슂?섎굹 ?곕━?섎씪?먯꽌???곌린 援먯쑁???쒕?濡??대（吏吏 ?딆븘 ?곸뼱 ?묐Ц???대젮???寃る뒗 ?щ엺?ㅼ씠 留롫떎. ?먰븳 ?곸뼱 ?묐Ц?????媛쒕퀎 援먯쑁??諛쏅뒗 寃껋? 湲덉쟾?? ?쒓컙?곸쑝濡??쒓퀎媛 ?덈떎. 湲곗〈???곸뼱 ?묐Ц 蹂댁“ ?쒖뒪?쒕뱾? 臾몃쾿??怨좊젮?섏? ?딆? 梨??⑥뼱留뚯쓣 異붿쿇?섎ŉ 蹂꾨룄???꾨줈洹몃옩???ㅼ튂?댁빞 ?섎뒗 遺덊렪?⑥씠 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???곸뼱媛 ???멸뎅?댁씤 ?ъ슜?먮뱾???꾪븳 ?곸뼱 ?묐Ц 蹂댁“ ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞?섎뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?ъ슜?먭? ?곸뼱 臾몄옣???묒꽦?????ㅼ쓬?????덉궗? ?⑥뼱瑜??ㅼ떆媛꾩쑝濡?異붿쿇?댁??? ?대? ?꾪빐 臾몃쾿???뺥솗?꾧? ?믪? ?곸뼱 臾몄옣?ㅼ쓣 ?섏쭛?섍퀬 ?먯뿰??泥섎━瑜??듯빐 遺꾩꽍????援щЦ ?몃━瑜??쒗쁽?섎뒗 XML 臾몄꽌濡???ν븳?? ?ъ슜?먭? ?낅젰???⑥뼱 ?곗냽??湲곕컲?쇰줈 XML 吏덉쓽 ?몄뼱??XQuery瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 異붿쿇???덉궗? ?⑥뼱瑜?援ы븳?? ?먰븳 ?먰븯??援щЦ 援ъ“瑜?媛吏?臾몄옣?ㅼ쓣 ?쎄쾶 寃?됲븷 ???덉쑝硫? ??湲곕컲?쇰줈 援ы쁽?섏뼱 蹂꾨룄???꾨줈洹몃옩 ?ㅼ튂媛 ?꾩슂 ?녾퀬 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?묎렐???쎈떎. ??55留뚭컻??臾몄옣 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪? 1000媛쒖쓽 ?뚯뒪??臾몄옣???댁슜?섏뿬 ?ㅽ뿕??寃곌낵, ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?뺥솗?꾨뒗 ?됯퇏 60%, 紐낆궗????댁꽌??95%?댁뿀怨? 鍮??뺣젹 ?댁궛 ?곗씠??怨듦컙?먯꽌 嫄곕━湲곕컲??怨듦컙 蹂?섏쓣 ?꾪븳 ?곗씠???낅┰?곸씤 鍮덊떚吏?ъ씤???앹꽦 湲곕쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源?곴렐, [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

In diesem Beitrag soll unterscuht werden, ob und wie Gesch채fte mit Hilfe autonomer, intelligenter Softwareagenten rechtswirksam abgesch- lossen werden k철nnen. Dabei soll gekl채rt werden, wie das Handlen autonomer, intelligenter Softwareagenten im Rahmen eines Vertrags- schlusses aus juritischer Sicht zu beurteilen ist. Zu beanworten ist auch, ob die Voraussetzungen f체r die Einbeziehung von AGB in Vertr채ge auch bei agentenbasierten Vertr채gen erf체llt werden k철nnen. Der Nutzer des Agenten bekommt lediglich den Erfolg oder Misserfolg eines Vertragsabschlusses gemeldet, ist aber in den Abschluss des Vertrags nicht pers철nlich involviert. Die Geltung von allgemeinen Gesch채ftsbedin- gungen (AGB) ist nur dann gew채hrleistet, wenn der Kunde auf die AGB des Unternehmers angezeigt wurde und der diese akzeptiert hat. Zudem muss der Unternehmer gegen체ber der Kunde wichtige Inhalte der AGB aufkl채ren. Diese Geltungsvoraussetzungen sind jedoch beim Vertragsschluss mittels intelligenten Agenten fraglich, da ausschlie횩lich der intelligenten Agent mit dem Unternehmer bzw. mit dessen Agenten in Verbindung tritt. Es stellt sich daher die Frage, ob und in welcher Weise auch eine Einbeziehung von AGB beim Vertragsschluss mit Verbrauchern 체ber Agenten m철glich ist.
Jenseits der Einbeziehung von AGB stellen sich beim Einsatz von Agenten weitere Rechtsfragen im Bereich des Verbraucherschutzes. Dabei werden die Besonderheiten des Verbraucherschutzes dann relevant, wenn der Agent anstelle des Verbrauchers auftritt. Informationspflichten vor oder bei Vertragsschluss nicht in der gleichen Weise, wie bei sonstigen Vertr채gen im E-Commerce, erf체llt werden, wenn der Vertrag auf Seiten des Verbrauchers mittels Agenten geschlossen wird. Denn der Agent trifft eigenst채ndige Entscheidungen und der Verwender ist am eigentlichen Vertragsschluss sowie den vorausgegangenen Vertrags- verhandlungen gar nicht pers철nlich beteiligt. In diesem Beitrag wird deshalb der Frage nachzugehen sein, inwieweit die bestehenden gesetz- lichen Schutzmechanismen zum Schutz des Verbrauchers Anwendung finden, wenn dieser sich beim Vertragsschluss eines Agenten bedient. Da Agenten ihren Benutzer aber gerade davon entlasten sollen, umfangreiche Informationen zu begutachten, stellt sich die Frage, welche Informationspflichten in diesem Fall 체berhaupt noch sinnvoll sind, und wen die Informationen 체bermittelt werden sollen.?ъ쟻 ?곸뿭?먯꽌 ?멸났吏?μ쓣 ?ъ슜??怨꾩빟泥닿껐??利앷??섎㈃???곕━ ?щ쾿(燁곫퀡)?숈뿉 ??섏뿬 留롮? 怨쇱젣瑜??섏졇二쇨퀬 ?덈떎. ?섏?留??멸났吏??湲곕컲 怨꾩빟泥닿껐???뱀닔?깆쓣 怨좊젮???ъ링?곸씤 ?곌뎄??援?궡?먯꽌 理쒓렐?먯빞 ?쒖옉?섏뿀?? ?댁뿉 蹂??곌뎄???멸났吏?μ쓽 ?쇱쥌??吏?ν삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃瑜??듯빐 ?ъ뾽?먯? ?뚮퉬???ъ씠??怨꾩빟(B2C 怨꾩빟)??泥닿껐????諛쒖깮?섍쾶 ?섎뒗 ??媛吏 二쇱슂 臾몄젣, 利?(1) ?쎄????몄엯臾몄젣 諛?(2) ?뺣낫?쒓났?섎Т???댄뻾諛⑸쾿????섏뿬 ?댄렣蹂댁븯?쇰ŉ, 寃?좎쓽 二쇱슂 寃곌낵???ㅼ쓬怨?媛숇떎.
