It aims to provide intelligent one-to-one English conversation tutoring instead of old fashioned language education with static multimedia materials. This system can understand poor expressions of students and it enables green hands to engage in a dialogue in spite of their poor linguistic ability, which gives students interesting motivation to learn a foreign language. And this system also has educational functionalities to improve the linguistic ability. To achieve these goals, we have developed a statistical natural language understanding module for understanding poor expressions and an example-based dialogue manager with high domain scalability and several effective tutoring methods.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?숈뒿??諛쒗솕 ?섎룄 ?몄떇 紐⑤뜽 3. ?덉젣 湲곕컲 ???紐⑤뜽援щЦ ?몃━ 媛吏移섍린 諛??뚮㈇ ?몄옄 議곗젙???듯븳 ?몃━ 而ㅻ꼸 湲곕컲 ?⑤갚吏?媛??곹샇?묒슜 異붿텧 ?깅뒫 ?μ긽

Approximately 80% of Bumwoo's sentences consist of less than 30. His writing became clearer over the years. It is verified from the mean and standard deviation of the number of words in a sentence are decreasing.
Bumwoo emphasized the structure in mathematics, and he was a strong advocate of importancy on axiom, topolized and category as the characteristics of modern mathematics. In particular, it can be seen that the relations between ?쁬athematics???쁝xiom', ' structure', 'Euclid', 'axiomatic system' and 'set?셷ere his main topic.2007???댄썑 援?궡 ?쇰Ц 寃곌낵??洹쇨굅???섑븰??紐⑤뜽留??먯깋

?щТ ?곗씠??愿由щ? ?꾪븳 ?먮룞?붾맂 鍮꾩??덉뒪 ?쒕쪟 ?곸긽 泥섎━ ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉???レ옄 ?뺣낫 寃??以?諛쒖깮???ㅻ쪟???ш컖?섏뿬 洹??쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛?⑹꽦 諛??깅뒫??寃곗젙?쒕떎. 洹??숈븞 ?먮룞 留욎땄踰?援먯젙??愿??諛⑸쾿濡좊뱾??媛쒕컻?섏뼱 ?뺣낫 寃???쒖뒪??媛쒕컻??以묒슂????븷???댁솕?쇰굹 ?대윭??留욎땄踰?援먯젙? ?뚰뙆踰???湲곌퀎?숈뒿??媛?ν븯怨??ъ쟾 ?뺥깭濡?蹂닿???媛?ν븳 湲고샇???쒖젙?섏뼱?붾떎. 諛섎㈃???쒖닔??留덉퐫???섏뿴??遺덇낵???レ옄?ㅼ쓽 ?쒖뿴?ㅼ? 留욎땄踰?援먯젙???꾪븯???ъ쟾???뺥깭濡?蹂닿??섏뿬 ?쒖슜?섎뒗 寃껋씠 遺덇????섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???뺣쪧濡좎쟻 ?뺣낫 寃???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???좊??꾩뿉 ?쒗븳??臾몃㎘ ?몄떇怨?蹂듭닔???ㅽ듃由쇱쓣 ?곸슜???덈줈???뺥깭???レ옄 ?뺤젙 OCR 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?섏??? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞???レ옄 ?뺤젙 紐⑤뜽? 湲곗〈???≪옣 臾몄꽌 泥섎━ ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 援ы쁽?섏??쇰ŉ ?쒖븞???レ옄 ?뺤젙 紐⑤뜽???④낵瑜??뺤씤?섍린 ?꾪빐 鍮꾧탳 ?뚯뒪?몃? ?ㅽ뻾?섏?怨??뚯뒪??寃곌낵 ?곷떦???깅뒫??媛쒖꽑?섏뿀?뚯쓣 蹂댁뿬 二쇱뿀??On an automated business document processing system maintaining financial data, errors on query based retrieval of numbers are critical to overall performance and usability of the system. Automatic spelling correction methods have been emerged and have played important role in development of information retrieval system. However scope of the methods was limited to the symbols, for example alphabetic letter strings, which can be reserved in the form of trainable templates or custom dictionary. On the other hand, numbers, a sequence of digits, are not the objects that can be reserved into a dictionary but a pure markov sequence. In this paper we proposed a new OCR model for spelling correction for numbers using the multiple streams and the context based correction on top of probabilistic information retrieval framework. We implemented the proposed error correction model as a sub-module and integrated into an existing automated invoice document processing system. We also presented the comparative test results that indicated significant enhancement of overall precision of the system by our model.?멸컙 湲곗뼲 ?몄텧 怨쇱젙???묒슜?섏뿬 ?ㅺ퀎??ACT-R 湲곕컲 ?섏씠吏 援먯껜 ?뺤콉
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?명솉李? [2011] [KCI?깆옱]

Text-to-speech ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉???먯뿰?ㅻ읇寃??뚯꽦???⑹꽦?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?댁쑉怨?湲몄씠?????泥섎━媛 ?좏뻾?섏뼱???쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐?? ?먯뿰??泥섎━???섑빐 遺꾩꽍??臾몄옣?ㅼ뿉 ????듭뼇 洹쒖튃???곸슜???? 諛섎났?곸씤 ?ㅽ뿕???듯빐 ?댁쑉 諛?湲몄씠 ?뺣낫瑜?異붿텧?섏??? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???대윭???뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 Text-to-speech ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉???먯뿰?깆쓣 ?μ긽?쒗궗 ???덈뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섍퀬 援ы쁽??臾댁젣??Text-to-speech ?쒖뒪?쒖씠 ?대윭???뺣낫?ㅼ쓣 ?ъ슜?섏? ?딅뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒓낵 鍮꾧탳?댁꽌 ???먯뿰?ㅻ읇寃?臾몄옣?ㅼ쓣 ?⑹꽦???몃떎??寃껋쓣 蹂댁???To produce more natural speech in a Text-to-speech system, the processing of the prosody and duration must be preceded. For this, we applied a sequence of intonation rules to the sentences analyzed by natural language processing in advance, and then extracted the prosody and duration information by means of trial-and-error experiments. In this paper, a method is proposed to improve the naturalness in a Test-to-speech using this information. As the results, the Text-to-speech system proposed and implemented in this paper showed more natural speech synthesis than the system, which do not use this information, did.硫?곕??붿뼱 : 3李⑥썝 ?섎즺?곸긽 湲곕컲???먭꺽 吏꾨떒?뚯쓽 ?쒖뒪??

Teaching Korean language cannot be simply comprehended by the traditional binary concept due to the fast diversification of its subjects and multi-layered traits in the diversity. However, we still teach Korean Language based on the frame and the perspective centering on the traditional space and subjects of ?쁊orea?? ?쁲chool?? ?쁊orea Language Speaker as a single homogeneous society?? and ?쁲tudents in their adolescent periods.??It has been always ineffective to deal with the current meaningful requests from the Korean Language Learners and rapidly changing environments with the old framework. So the study suggests it?셲 time to stop prescribing public solution and build a new fundamental framework.
To achieve the purpose, the study suggests a frame of concept to cover the whole phenomena of Korea Language Teaching using two axis of time and space. Therefore, it provides a principal idea of solution for ?쁔eaching Korean language??to cover the Korean language subjects that are unbounded crossing the boundaries of Korea, a nation, peoples, and blood line.?덇뎅臾몄큹濡앫?1. ?쒓뎅?대? 援먯쑁?쒕떎??寃?: 紐낅챸(?썲릫)怨??섎???臾몄젣 2. ?덈줈??? ?ㅼ젙???꾪븳 湲곕낯 ?ㅺ퀎 : ?몄뼱 二쇱껜???낆껜??諛섏쁺??媛?ν븳 援щ룄 3. ?쒓뎅?댁쓽 援먯쑁: ?쒓컙 異?4. ?쒓뎅?댁쓽 援먯쑁: 怨듦컙 異뺤쨷援??⑤룞(訝방씝)吏??쓽 ?쒓뎅???뚯슫濡??곌뎄

?뱀쓽 鍮꾧뎄議?臾몄꽌濡쒕????먮룞?쇰줈 ?몄뒪?댁뒪瑜??앹꽦?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?ㅼ뼇???곌뎄媛 ?쒖븞?섏뿀?? ?곸뼱沅뚯쓽 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄?ㅼ뿉?쒕뒗 媛꾨떒??洹쒖튃怨??뺢퇋??湲곕컲???⑦꽩???쒖슜?섏??? ?곸뼱?먯꽌???⑥닚???뺢퇋??湲곕컲???⑦꽩留뚯쑝濡쒕룄 異⑸텇???믪? ?뺥솗?꾨? 蹂댁뿬 二쇱뿀吏留? ?쒓뎅?대뒗 ?곸뼱? ?ㅻⅨ ?몄뼱?곸씤 ?뱀꽦?쇰줈 ?명븯??湲곗〈???뺢퇋???뺥깭???⑦꽩?쇰줈???곹빀???⑦꽩???앹꽦?????녿떎. ?댁뿉 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쒓뎅?댁뿉 ?곹빀???⑦꽩 諛??몄뒪?댁뒪 ?앹꽦 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿? ???臾몄옣???섏〈 愿怨꾨? 怨좊젮?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?믪? ?뺥솗?꾨? 媛吏???⑦꽩 吏묓빀???앹꽦?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?몄뒪?댁뒪??二쇱뼱(subject)? 紐⑹쟻??object) ?먮퀎???꾪븯??議곗궗 ?뺣낫瑜??④퍡 ?쒖슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?쒓뎅?댁쓽 ?먯쑀濡쒖슫 ?댁닚?쇰줈遺???ㅻ뒗 ?쒖빟???닿껐?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵???곕Ⅴ硫?蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞???⑦꽩 ?앹꽦 諛⑸쾿???⑥닚 ?댁닚留뚯쓣 怨좊젮?섏뿬 ?앹꽦???⑦꽩?ㅼ뿉 鍮꾪븯?????믪? ?뺥솗瑜좎쓣 蹂댁뿬二쇱뼱, ?쒓뎅??????먮룞 ?몄뒪?댁뒪 ?앹꽦???곹빀?⑥쓣 ?뺤씤?섏???There are various researches which proposed an automatic instance generation from freetext on the web. Existing researches that focused on English, adopts pattern representation which is generated by simple rules and regular expression. These simple patterns achieves high performance, but it is not suitable in Korean due to differences of characteristics between Korean and English. Thus, this paper proposes a novel method for generating patterns and instances which focuses on Korean. A proposed method generates high quality patterns by taking advantages of dependency relations in a target sentences. In addition, a proposed method overcome restrictions from high degree of freedom of word order in Korean by utilizing postposition and it identifies a subject and an object more reliably. In experiment results, a proposed method shows higher precision than baseline and it is implies that proposed approache is suitable for self-knowledge learning system.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?쒓뎅???먭? 吏???숈뒿???꾪븳 ?먯뿰???⑦꽩 諛?吏???앹꽦媛곷룄 ?ㅽ봽?뗭쓽 ?쇱?蹂댁긽???듯븳 ?몃컮???대룞 濡쒕큸??洹좏삎?쒖뼱

蹂??쇰Ц? ?뺥삎?붾맂 援ъ“瑜?吏?덈뒗 吏??踰좎씠???몃━??Knowledge Base Triples) ?곗씠?곕? ?쒖슜?섏뿬 ?먯뿰???뺥깭??臾몄옣 ?앹꽦 ?곌뎄瑜?吏꾪뻾?섏??? ?몃━?뚯쓣 援ъ껜?곸쑝濡??쒗쁽?섎뒗 臾몄옣 ?앹꽦???꾪빐 LSTM(Long Short-term Memory Network) ?몄퐫??Encoder)-?붿퐫??Decoder) 援ъ“瑜??쒖슜, 二쇱쓽吏묒쨷 硫붿빱?덉쬁(Attention Mechanism)???곸슜?섏??? ?뚯뒪???곗씠?곗뿉 ???BLEU, ROUGE ?ㅼ퐫??媛곴컖 42.264 (BLEU-1), 32.441(BLEU-2), 26.820(BLEU-3), 24.446(BLEU-4), 47.341(ROUGE-L) ?깅뒫??蹂댁??쇰ŉ, ?숈씪 ?곗씠?곗쓽 鍮꾧탳 紐⑤뜽?????0.8%(BLEU-1) ?곸듅???깅뒫??蹂댁??? ?먰븳 ?곸쐞 10媛쒖쓽 ?뚯뒪???곗씠??BLEU ?ㅼ퐫???됯퇏 痢≪젙 寃곌낵 99.393(BLEU-1)濡??믪? ?ㅼ퐫?대? 湲곕줉?섏뿬, ?대? ?듯빐 臾몄옣 ?앹꽦 寃곌낵媛 ?좎쓽誘명븿???뺤씤?섏???In this paper, we have investigated the generation of natural language sentences by using Knowledge Base Triples data with a structured structure. In order to generate a sentence that expresses the triple, a LSTM (Long Short-term Memory Network) encoder-decoder structure is used along with an Attention Mechanism. The BLEU score and ROUGE score for the test data were 42.264 (BLEU-1), 32.441 (BLEU-2), 26.820 (BLEU-3), 24.446 (BLEU-4), and 47.341 and 0.8% (based on BLEU-1) for the data comparison model. In addition, the average of the top 10 test data BLEU scores was recorded as 99.393 (BLEU-1).?뺤텞 湲곕컲 ?뚯씪 ?쒖뒪???곗씠???쇨????좎? 湲곕쾿

?좎옄???뚰봽?몄썾??媛쒕컻 諛⑹떇?먯꽌 ?붽뎄?ы빆 蹂?붿뿉 ?좎뿰?섍쾶 ?泥섑븷 ???덈룄濡??섍린 ?꾪빐 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 ?ъ슜???ㅽ넗由щ뒗 ?ъ슜?먯뿉 ?섑빐 鍮꾩젙?뺤쟻???먯뿰?대줈 ?곗뿬吏꾨떎. ?ъ슜???ㅽ넗由щ뒗 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 寃쏀뿕怨?吏?앹쓣 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 媛숈? 媛쒕뀗??????ㅼ뼇???몄뼱濡??곗씠怨? 湲곕뒫 ?붽뎄?ы빆??鍮꾧린???붽뎄?ы빆???щ윭 ?붽뎄?ы빆???곗옱?섏뼱 ?섑??쒕떎. ?곕씪??鍮꾧린???붽뎄?ы빆 異붿텧???덉뼱???붽뎄怨듯븰 ?붿??덉뼱??吏?앷낵 寃쏀뿕???붿슧 ?섏〈?곸씪 ?섎컰???녿떎. ???ㅻⅨ 臾몄젣?먯쑝濡??좎옄??諛⑸쾿濡좎? 珥덇린 ?붽뎄?ы빆?쇰줈遺???뚰봽?몄썾???덉쭏??醫뚯슦?섎뒗 ?뚰봽?몄썾???꾪궎?띿쿂瑜?怨좊젮?섎뒗???덉뼱???뚰??섎떎??寃껋씠?? ?곕씪??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???덉쭏 ?띿꽦????쒗븷 ???덈뒗 ?ㅼ썙?쒕? 異붿텧?섍퀬, 異붿텧???ㅼ썙?쒕? 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?숈쓽?대뱾濡?援ъ꽦???쒖냼?ъ뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섏??? ?대젃寃?援ъ텞???쒖냼?ъ뒪瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 媛??덉쭏 ?띿꽦 移댄뀒怨좊━??留욌뒗 鍮꾧린???붽뎄?ы빆???먮룞?쇰줈 遺꾨쪟 ?????덈뒗 諛⑹븞???쒖븞?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 珥덇린???꾪궎?띿쿂瑜?怨좊젮?????덈룄濡??섏???User In the agile software development method, the user story, which is used to cope with the requirement change flexibly, is written by a user in a form of unstructured natural language. The user story is written in various languages with regard to the same notion based on the user experience and knowledge while the non-functional requirements are found scattered in several requirements. Accordingly, with respect to the extraction of non-functional requirements, the knowledge and experience of requirement engineers should be getting more and more dependable. The other problem is that the agile methodology pays little attention to the consideration of software architecture which decides software quality from the initial requirements.
Therefore, in this paper, the keyword extraction technique of information search is used and the keyword given with the weighted value, which is capable of representing quality attributes, is extracted. And the thesaurus consisting of synonyms is constructed based on the extracted keywords. The method enabling automatic classification of non-functional requirements, which are suitable to each category of quality attributes, is proposed to make it possible to consider the architecture from the initial stage using the constructed thesaurus. In order to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed classification method for non-functional requirements, the user stories collected from 10 projects are cross-experimented to analyze the results.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 鍮꾧린???붽뎄?ы빆 異붿텧 ?꾨줈?몄뒪Tag Refinement瑜??댁슜???대?吏 ?대끂?뚯씠??
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 李⑥옱?? [2012] [KCI?깆옱]

?ㅻ쭏?명룿???뚯꽦 寃?됱뿉???쇱? 荑쇰━瑜?泥섎━?섎뒗 寃껋? 媛???대젮??臾몄젣 以묒쓽 ?섎굹?대떎. ?대뒗 ?먯뿰?댁뿉 ?댁옱???먯쑀?꾩? 蹂듭옟?깆뿉 二쇰줈 湲곗씤?쒕떎. ?ㅻ쭏?명룿???뚯꽦 寃?됱뿉???쇱? 荑쇰━???먯쑀?꾩? 蹂듭옟?깆쓣 以꾩씠湲??꾪빐 ?띿꽦媛믪뿉 湲곕컲????諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먰븳, ?쇱? 荑쇰━ 泥섎━瑜??꾪븳 ?띿꽦媛믪뿉 湲곕컲?????덈줈???섏씠吏 ?깃툒 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?대뒗 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 寃???섎룄??湲곕컲?????꾩튂湲곕컲??媛쒖씤?붾맂 ?섏씠吏 ?깃툒???ㅻ쭏?명룿 ?ъ슜?먯뿉寃??쒓났?????덈떎. ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿? ?ㅻ쭏?명룿 ?ъ슜?먮? ?꾪븳 ?꾩튂湲곕컲??媛쒖씤?붾맂 ??寃?됱쓽 吏꾩씪蹂댄븳 諛⑸쾿?대씪怨??????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ㅻ쭏?명룿???뚯꽦 寃?됱뿉???쇱? 荑쇰━ 泥섎━瑜??꾪븳 ?꾨줈?좏???紐⑤뜽???ㅺ퀎?섍퀬, 湲곗〈 ?ㅻ쭏?명룿怨?鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿???깅뒫 ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵瑜??쒖떆?쒕떎.Handling fuzzy query in voice search on smartphones is one of the most difficult problems. It is mainly derived from the complexity and the degree of freedom of natural language. To reduce the complexity and the degree of freedom of fuzzy query in voice search on smartphones, attribute-driven approach for fuzzy query is proposed. In addition, a new page ranking algorithm based on the values of attributes for handling fuzzy query is proposed. It provides a smartphone user with location-based personalized page ranking based on user's search intentions. It is a further step toward location-based personalized web search for smartphone users. In this paper, we design a prototype model for handling fuzzy query in voice search on smartphones and show the experimental results of the proposed approach compared to existing smartphones.?뷀꽣?꾨씪?댁쫰 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉???④낵?곸씤 ?쒕퉬??紐⑤땲?곕쭅???꾪븳 蹂듯빀 ?대깽??紐⑤뜽???ㅺ퀎
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 湲덈뱷洹? [2011] [KCI?깆옱]

蹂??곌뎄???꾪솕?듯솕???섑빐 ?앹꽦???곗씠?곗뿉 ???鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 遺꾩꽍 ?묎렐???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?꾪솕?듯솕 ?곗씠?곗쓽 遺꾩꽍紐⑦삎? ?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?댄쐶?앸퀎???꾪븳 PVPF(Parallel Variable-length Phrase Finding) ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁怨??ㅼ썙?쒖쓽 ?ъ슜鍮덈룄 痢≪젙???꾪븳 ?뚮뱶 移댁슫???뚭퀬由ъ쬁?쇰줈 援ъ꽦?쒕떎. ?쒖븞??遺꾩꽍紐⑦삎?먯꽌??癒쇱? PVPF ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???섑빐 ?곌퀎 ?⑥뼱 異붿텧???듯빐 ?댄쐶瑜??앸퀎?섎ŉ, MapReduce???뚮뱶 移댁슫???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???ъ슜?섏뿬 ?앸퀎???댄쐶 諛??⑥뼱???ъ슜鍮덈룄瑜?痢≪젙?쒕떎. 洹?寃곌낵???ㅼ뼇??愿?먯뿉???댁꽍?????덈떎. ?쒖븞 遺꾩꽍紐⑦삎???④낵?깆쓣 蹂댁씠湲??꾪빐 HDFS(Hadoop Distributed File System)瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 遺꾩꽍紐⑦삎???ㅺ퀎 援ы쁽?섏??쇰ŉ, ?꾪솕?듯솕 ?곗씠?곕? ?ㅽ뿕 ?곸슜?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵, ?ㅼ썙???곴?愿怨?遺꾩꽍 諛??ъ슜鍮덈룄 蹂??遺꾩꽍???듯빐 ?좎쓽誘명븳 寃곌낵瑜??꾩텧?쒕떎.This paper proposes an approach to big data analytics for phon call data. The analytical models for phon call data is composed of the PVPF (Parallel Variable-length Phrase Finding) algorithm for identifying verbal phrases of natural language and the word count algorithm for measuring the usage frequency of keywords. In the proposed model, we identify words using the PVPF algorithm, and measure the usage frequency of the identified words using word count algorithm in MapReduce. The results can be interpreted from various viewpoints. We design and implement the model based HDFS (Hadoop Distributed File System), verify the proposed approach through a case study of phon call data. So we extract useful results through analysis of keyword correlation and usage frequency.援?갑硫뷀??곗씠??湲곕컲 ?꾪궎?띿쿂硫뷀?紐⑤뜽(AMM)???쇰━?곗씠?곕え??OV-7c) ?쒖븞
?쒓뎅?뷀꽣?꾨씪?댁쫰?꾪궎?띿쿂?숉쉶, 諛뺣쾾?? [2013] [KCI?깆옱]
Pattern-based Business Process Change Management in Dynamic Business Environment
?쒓뎅?뷀꽣?꾨씪?댁쫰?꾪궎?띿쿂?숉쉶, 源?숈닔, [2013] [KCI?깆옱]
Articles : Pattern-based Business Process Change Management in Dynamic Business Environment
?쒓뎅EA?숉쉶(援??쒓뎅ITA?숉쉶), ( Dong Soo Kim ), [2013] [KCI?깆옱]

?쇰컲??LR(Generalized LR, ?댄븯 GLR) ?뚯떛? ?좏삎 ?ㅽ깮???ъ슜?섎뒗 ?꾪넻?곸씤 LR ?뚯떛 諛⑹떇???쒓퀎瑜?洹밸났?섎룄濡?留뚮뱾?댁쭊 LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿???섎굹濡쒖꽌, LR 湲곕쾿???щ윭 媛吏 留ㅼ빱?덉쬁???듯빀?섏뿬 ?먯뿰???뚯떛???묒슜?섎뒗 ?묒뾽???좊?媛 ?섏뼱 ?붾떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??湲곗〈???뺣쪧??LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿??媛吏怨??덈뒗 臾몄젣瑜?媛쒖꽑??議곌굔遺 ?곗궛 紐⑤뜽(Conditional Action Model)???쒖븞?쒕떎. 湲곗〈???뺣쪧??LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿? 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?ㅽ깮??蹂듭옟?깆쑝濡??명빐 ?곷??곸쑝濡??쒗븳??臾몃㎘ ?뺣낫留뚯쓣 ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?붾떎. ?쒖븞??紐⑤뜽? 遺遺??앹꽦 ?뚯뒪???쒗쁽???꾪븯???쒖링 援щЦ ???Surface Phrasal Type)???ъ슜?섏뿬 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?ㅽ깮???ㅼ뼱 ?덈뒗 援щЦ 援ъ“瑜?湲곗닠?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 醫 ???몃텇??援ъ“???좏샇?꾨? ?뚯꽌??諛섏쁺?쒗궗 ???덈떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?댄쐶瑜?怨좊젮?섏? ?딄퀬 ?숈뒿??議곌굔遺 ?곗궛 紐⑤뜽濡?援ы쁽??蹂?GLR ?뚯꽌??湲곗〈??諛⑹떇蹂대떎 ??6-7%???뺥솗???μ긽??蹂댁??쇰ŉ, 蹂?紐⑤뜽???듯빐 ?띾????ㅽ깮 ?뺣낫瑜??뺣쪧??LR ?뚯꽌??援ъ“??以묒쓽???닿껐???④낵?곸쑝濡??ъ슜?????덉쓬??蹂댁???Generalized LR parsing is one of the enhanced LR parsing methods so that it overcome the limit of one-way linear stack of the traditional LR parser using graph-structured stack, and it has been playing an important role of a firm starting point to generate other variations for NL parsing equipped with various mechanisms. In this paper, we propose a conditional Action Model that can solve the problems of conventional probabilistic GLR methods. Previous probabilistic GLR parsers have used relatively limited contextual information for disambiguation due to the high complexity of internal GLR stack. Our proposed model uses Surface Phrasal Types representing the structural characteristics of the parse for its additional contextual information, so that more specified structural preferences can be reflected into the parser. Experimental results show that our GLR parser with the proposed Conditional Action Model outperforms the previous methods by about 6-7% without any lexical information, and our model can utilize the rich stack information for syntactic disambiguation of probabilistic LR parser.?쒓??꾧린泥댁쓽 援ъ“???뱀쭠???댁슜???⑥쑉??湲곗슱湲?蹂댁젙
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?좊?洹? [2003] [援?KCI?깆옱(?듯빀)]

?쇰컲??LR(Generalized LR, ?댄븯 GLR) ?뚯떛? ?좏삎 ?ㅽ깮???ъ슜?섎뒗 ?꾪넻?곸씤 LR ?뚯떛 諛⑹떇???쒓퀎瑜?洹밸났?섎룄濡?留뚮뱾?댁쭊 LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿???섎굹濡쒖꽌, LR 湲곕쾿???щ윭 媛吏 留ㅼ빱?덉쬁???듯빀?섏뿬 ?먯뿰???뚯떛???묒슜?섎뒗 ?묒뾽???좊?媛 ?섏뼱 ?붾떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??湲곗〈???뺣쪧??LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿??媛吏怨??덈뒗 臾몄젣瑜?媛쒖꽑??議곌굔遺 ?곗궛 紐⑤뜽(Conditional Action Model)???쒖븞?쒕떎. 湲곗〈???뺣쪧??LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿? 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?ㅽ깮??蹂듭옟?깆쑝濡??명빐 ?곷??곸쑝濡??쒗븳??臾몃㎘ ?뺣낫留뚯쓣 ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?붾떎. ?쒖븞??紐⑤뜽? 遺遺??앹꽦 ?뚯뒪???쒗쁽???꾪븯???쒖링 援щЦ ???Surface Phrasal Type)???ъ슜?섏뿬 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?ㅽ깮???ㅼ뼱 ?덈뒗 援щЦ 援ъ“瑜?湲곗닠?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 醫 ???몃텇??援ъ“???좏샇?꾨? ?뚯꽌??諛섏쁺?쒗궗 ???덈떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?댄쐶瑜?怨좊젮?섏? ?딄퀬 ?숈뒿??議곌굔遺 ?곗궛 紐⑤뜽濡?援ы쁽??蹂?GLR ?뚯꽌??湲곗〈??諛⑹떇蹂대떎 ??6-7%???뺥솗???μ긽??蹂댁??쇰ŉ, 蹂?紐⑤뜽???듯빐 ?띾????ㅽ깮 ?뺣낫瑜??뺣쪧??LR ?뚯꽌??援ъ“??以묒쓽???닿껐???④낵?곸쑝濡??ъ슜?????덉쓬??蹂댁???Generalized LR parsing is one of the enhanced LR parsing methods so that it overcome the limit of one-way linear stack of the traditional LR parser using graph-structured stack, and it has been playing an important role of a firm starting point to generate other variations for NL parsing equipped with various mechanisms. In this paper, we propose a Conditional Action Model that can solve the problems of conventional probabilistic GLR methods. Previous probabilistic GLR parsers have used relatively limited contextual information for disambiguation due to the high complexity of internal GLR stack. Our proposed model uses Surface Phrasal Types representing the structural characteristics of the parse for its additional contextual information, so that more specified structural preferences can be reflected into theparser. Experimental results show that our GLR parser with the proposed Conditional Action Model outperforms the previous methods by about 6~7% without any lexical information, and our model can utilize the rich stack information for syntactic disambiguation of probabilistic LR parser.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 議곌굔遺 ?곗궛 紐⑤뜽???ъ슜??GLR ?뚯떛EJB ?먯꽌 鍮꾩쫰?덉뒪 ?ㅽ띁?덉씠?섏쓽 ?ㅺ퀎 湲곕쾿 諛??⑦꽩

理쒓렐 ?뺣낫??蹂듭옟?깃낵 ?ㅼ뼇??諛?諛⑸????묒쓽 媛???뺣낫媛 利앷??⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?洹쒕え ?곗씠?곕줈遺???섎? ?덈뒗 寃??寃곌낵瑜?異붿텧?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿?쇰줈???⑦넧濡쒖??????愿?ш낵 ?꾩슂?깆씠 利앷??섍퀬 ?덈떎. 二쇱뼱吏??먯뿰???띿뒪?몃줈遺???⑦넧濡쒖?瑜?異붿텧?섎뒗 留롮? 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?섏뿀吏留? ?꾩옱 ?遺遺꾩쓽 諛⑸쾿? ?⑦넧濡쒖???援ъ“???쇱튂?섎룄濡?異붿텧?섏? 紐삵븯???ㅼ젙?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???⑦넧濡쒖?瑜?援ъ텞?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?꾩슂???⑹뼱瑜??뱀젙 ?꾨찓?몄뿉??二쇱뼱吏??띿뒪?몄? 援щ퀎?섍퀬 ?⑦꽩 湲곕컲 諛⑸쾿??湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?⑹뼱 ?ъ씠???ㅼ뼇??愿怨꾨? 異붿텧?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?⑹뼱??媛꾩쓽 愿怨꾨? 異붿텧?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?쇱튂 ?⑦꽩 吏묓빀??怨좊젮?섍퀬 議곗씤 吏묓빀 媛쒕뀗怨??⑦꽩???뺣젹???곌껐?섏뿬 寃??怨듦컙???ш린瑜?以꾩씠??諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. 洹?寃곌낵 ??諛⑸쾿??寃??怨듦컙?쇰줈遺???좎슜???대뼡 ?⑦꽩???쒓굅?섏? ?딄퀬 50-95% ?뺣룄濡?寃??怨듦컙???ш린瑜?以꾩씠??寃곌낵瑜?蹂댁???With recent increase in complexity and variety of information and massively available information, interest in and necessity of ontology has been on the rise as a method of extracting a meaningful search result from massive data. Although there have been proposed many methods of extracting the ontology from a given text of a natural language, the extraction based on most of the current methods is not consistent with the structure of the ontology. In this paper, we propose a method of automatically creating ontology by distinguishing a term needed for establishing the ontology from a text given in a specific domain and extracting various relationships between the terms based on the pattern-based method. To extract the relationship between the terms, there is proposed a method of reducing the size of a searching space by taking a matching set of patterns into account and connecting a join-set concept and a pattern array. The result is that this method reduces the size of the search space by 50-95% without removing any useful patterns from the search space.PL/SQL ?묒슜?꾨줈洹몃옩 ?꾪솚???꾪븳 ?먮룞???꾧뎄 ?ㅺ퀎

理쒓렐 ?곕━?섎씪???ы쉶???붿씤???섑븳 ?щ궃??鍮덈쾲?섍쾶 諛쒖깮?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?대뼡 ?꾧린媛 ?꾩떆誘쇰뱾???꾪삊?좎? ?덉륫?섍린 ?대젮???곕젮媛 ?믪븘吏怨??덈떎. ?곕씪??蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??Python?몄뼱 湲곕컲 Tweepy ?뚮윭洹몄씤???곸슜?섏뿬 ?몄쐵 ?곗씠?곕? 痍⑤뱷?섎뒗 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??媛쒕컻?섍퀬, ?먯뿰??泥섎━ ??R Studio?꾨줈洹몃옩?먯꽌 ?띿뒪???대윭?ㅽ꽣留?遺꾩꽍怨??ㅽ뵾?덉뼵 留덉씠??遺꾩꽍???듯븯???쒕??ㅼ쓽 嫄닿컯???곹뼢??誘몄튂???깅텇??寃異쒕맂 ?섏삦?쒋숈? ?쒕??ㅼ뿉寃?留롮? 怨듯룷媛먯쓣 二쇱뿀???섎Щ吏留?踰붿즲?숈? 媛숈? ?ы쉶???щ궃??????뺤떊??異⑷꺽怨?遺덉븞媛먯쓣 ?됯??섏??? ?띿뒪???대윭?ㅽ꽣留?遺꾩꽍?먯꽌 ?섏삦?쒋??ш굔? ?섏젙遺???泥섎뒫?μ씠 ?몄썡???ш굔怨쇱쓽 ?곌??기? ?섏삦?쒖젣?덉쓽 泥좎닔吏?쒖뿉???ъ쟾???먮ℓ???깆씠 媛???믪? 愿?щ룄瑜?蹂댁??? 洹몃━怨??섎Щ吏留?踰붿즲???ш굔? ?섏뒪?щ┛ ?꾩뼱 ?ш굔, ?몄썡???ш굔 ???덉륫 紐삵븯???ш굔??????뺣?????? ?梨끸? ?섍컯?⑥뿭, 遺?곗쓽 踰붿즲媛 ?ъ꽦?먯삤濡??명븳 寃꺿??깆씠 媛???믪? 愿?щ룄瑜?蹂댁??? ?먰븳, ??踰붿즲瑜?鍮꾧탳 遺꾩꽍 ?섏?????臾살?留?踰붿즲??????쒕? 媛먯꽦???됯퇏 吏?섍? 11.61%p ??遺?뺤쟻?대씪??寃껋쓣 ?????덉뿀??Recently, disaster caused by social factors is frequently occurring in Korea. Prediction about what crisis could happen is difficult, raising the citizen?셲 concern. In this study, we developed a program to acquire tweet data by applying Python language based Tweepy plug-in, regarding social disasters such as ?쁍onspecific motive crimes??and ?쁎xy??products. These data were used to evaluate psychological trauma and anxiety of citizens through the text clustering analysis and the opinion mining analysis of the R Studio program after natural language processing. In the analysis of the ?쁎xy??case, the accident of Sewol ferry, the continual sale of Oxy products of the Oxy had the highest similarity and ?쁍onspecific motive crimes?? the coping measures of the government against unexpected incidents such as the ?쁦ncident??of the screen door, the accident of Sewol ferry and ?쁍onspecific motive crime??due to misogyny in Busan, had the highest similarity. In addition, the average index of the Citizens sentiment score in Nonspecific motive crimes was more negative than that in the Oxy case by 11.61%p. Therefore, it is expected that the findings will be utilized to predict the mental health of citizens to prevent future accidents.誤곫뿨 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?띿뒪???대윭?ㅽ꽣留곴낵 ?ㅽ뵾?덉뼵 留덉씠??3. ?몄쐵 ?곗씠???띾뱷 諛?遺꾩꽍釉뚯씠?붾뱶 3D 吏???쒕퉬???깅뒫 ?μ긽???꾪븳 3D ????곸슜 諛⑹븞 ?곌뎄

蹂??쇰Ц? ?ъ떆?꾩뼱, 遺덇?由ъ븘??洹몃━怨??쒓뎅?댁쓽 紐⑥쓬 泥닿퀎? 媛쒕퀎 紐⑥쓬 ?뚯냼?ㅼ뿉 ????듭떆?? 怨듭떆???곌뎄??寃곌낵臾쇱씠?? ?듭떆?곸씤 痢〓㈃?먯꽌 ?ъ떆?꾩뼱? 遺덇?由ъ븘?댁쓽 紐⑦깭?댁씤 怨듯넻?щ씪釉뚯뼱? 怨좊? 援먰쉶 ?щ씪釉뚯뼱?먯꽌??紐⑥쓬 泥닿퀎? 洹?蹂???묒긽???댄렣 蹂댁븯怨? ?쒓뎅??紐⑥쓬??15?멸린 ?댄썑??蹂?붾? 泥닿퀎?뷀븯???쒕줈 諛앺엳怨??덈떎. 怨듭떆??痢〓㈃?먯꽌???꾨? ?ъ떆?꾩뼱, 遺덇?由ъ븘?댁뿉?쒖쓽 5紐⑥쓬, 6紐⑥쓬泥닿퀎???뱀쭠怨?洹몃뱾??媛뺤꽭????곴? 愿怨꾨? 怨좎같??蹂댁븯?? ?쒓뎅?댁쓽 寃쎌슦 10紐⑥쓬 泥닿퀎?먯꽌 6紐⑥쓬 泥닿퀎???대Ⅴ???ㅼ뼇??吏??쟻 諛⑹뼵???뚭컻?섍퀬 ?ν썑 蹂?붿쓽 諛⑺뼢???덉륫??蹂댁븯?? ?먰븳 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???꾩쓽 3媛吏 ?몄뼱?먯꽌 ?섑??섎뒗 紐⑥쓬 ?뚯냼???뚯꽦?숈쟻 ?뱀꽦???댄렣蹂댁븯?? 紐⑥쓬???뚯꽦?숈쟻 ?뱀꽦? ?щ㉫???섏튂???섑빐???섑??섎뒗 ???대뱾 ?섏튂??鍮꾧탳瑜??듯븯???쒓뎅??紐⑥쓬??議곗쓬 ?꾩튂媛 ?ъ떆?꾩뼱,遺덇?由ъ븘?댁쓽 紐⑥쓬 議곗쓬 ?꾩튂? ?곸씠?섍쾶 ?섑??⑥쓣 洹몃옒?꾨? ?듯븯??諛앺엳怨??덈떎. 蹂몃줎??留덉?留??μ뿉?쒕뒗 ?대뱾 3?몄뼱??紐⑥쓬???뺤떇 臾몃쾿?뷀븯??蹂?
?섎떎. ?대윭???뺤떇 臾몃쾿 紐⑤뜽? ?멸뎅??援먯쑁 痢〓㈃?대굹 ?꾩궛?몄뼱?숈쟻 泥섎━遺遺꾩뿉??二쇱슂???먮즺 ??븷????寃껋씠??This paper aims to describe the phonological and phonetic vowel features in Russian, Bulgarian and Korean. First of all, the author attempts the comparative analysis between bulgarian and russian vowel system from the view points of synchronism and diachronism. As it is described above, Bulgarian has 6 vowel phonemes(/i, e, a, o, ?, u/) while the Russian has 5 (/i, e, a, o, u/). As it is well known, Bulgarian and Russian have the same mother language(Common Slavic and Old Church Slavonic), but now they have different vowel system. This is caused from the different phonetic status of vowel in their language. So the author compares the acoustic feature(mainly, their formant 1, 2, 3), and gets the results as follows. As it is shown in the table, every figure of Bulgarian vowel formant(except /E/) is higher than Russian. It means that positions of Bulgarian vowel are located more back and more high in the oral cavity. This oral condition makes Bulgarian vowel be
more independent than Russian and easy to pronounce the hard consonants. This also can be clue to explain the productive Russian soft consonants(because of their tounge positions - front and low and oral cavity).
In the middle of main chapter, the author describes Korean vowel features and Formant value for the purpose of correct transcription and language learning. And also analysis it's rich phonetic system. The positions of Korean vowel are located more front and more high in the front vowel and the same position in the back vowel
with Russian and Bulgarian vowels. In the end of main chapter, the author attempts to make the formal grammar
model with the help of "Generalized Feature System and Unification Grammar" tools. For example:
/?? = {LAN 1}{CAT 1}{ROOT l}{FORM1 200}{FORM2 2100} /逵/ = {LAN 2}{CAT 1}{ROOT A}{FORM1 755}{FORM2 1360}

???щ떇(Deep learning)? 湲곗〈 ?멸났 ?좉꼍留???怨꾩링 ?섎? 利앷??쒗궡怨??숈떆???④낵?곸씤 ?숈뒿 諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 ?쒖떆?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 媛앹껜/?뚯꽦 ?몄떇 諛??먯뿰??泥섎━ ??怨좎닔以 臾몄젣 ?닿껐???덉뼱 愿꾨ぉ?좊쭔???깃낵瑜?蹂댁씠怨??덈떎. 洹몃윭???숈뒿???꾩슂???쒓컙怨?由ъ냼?ㅺ? ?щ떎???쒓퀎瑜?吏?덇퀬 ?덉뼱, ?대? 以꾩씠湲??꾪븳 ?곌뎄媛 ?쒕컻??吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???꾪뙆移??ㅽ뙆??湲곕컲 ?대윭?ㅽ꽣 而댄벂???꾨젅?꾩썙???곸뿉?????щ떇??遺꾩궛?뷀븯????媛吏 ??DeepSpark, SparkNet)???깅뒫???숈뒿 ?뺥솗?꾩? ?띾룄 痢〓㈃?먯꽌 痢≪젙?섍퀬 遺꾩꽍?섏??? CIFAR-10/CIFAR-100 ?곗씠?곕? ?ъ슜???ㅽ뿕?먯꽌 SparkNet? ?숈뒿 怨쇱젙???뺥솗??蹂????씠 ?곸? 諛섎㈃ DeepSpark???숈뒿 珥덇린 ?뺥솗?꾨뒗 蹂????씠 ?ъ?留??먯감 蹂????씠 以꾩뼱?ㅻ㈃??SparkNet ?鍮???15% ?믪? ?뺥솗?꾨? 蹂댁?怨? 議곌굔???곕씪 ?⑥씪 癒몄떊蹂대떎???믪? ?뺥솗?꾨줈 蹂대떎 鍮좊Ⅴ寃??섎졃?섎뒗 ?묒긽???뺤씤?????덉뿀??By piling up hidden layers in artificial neural networks, deep learning is delivering outstanding performances for high-level abstraction problems such as object/speech recognition and natural language processing. Alternatively, deep-learning users often struggle with the tremendous amounts of time and resources that are required to train deep neural networks. To alleviate this computational challenge, many approaches have been proposed in a diversity of areas. In this work, two of the existing Apache Spark-based acceleration frameworks for deep learning (SparkNet and DeepSpark) are compared and analyzed in terms of the training accuracy and the time demands. In the authors" experiments with the CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100 benchmark datasets, SparkNet showed a more stable convergence behavior than DeepSpark; but in terms of the training accuracy, DeepSpark delivered a higher classification accuracy of approximately 15%. For some of the cases, DeepSpark also outperformed the sequential implementation running on a single machine in terms of both the accuracy and the running time.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?좏뻾 ?곌뎄 3. ?ㅽ뿕 諛⑸쾿Large-Scale Text Classification with Deep Neural Networks

湲곗〈 ?쇰Ц[1]?먯꽌??Fillmore??Case Grammar瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 媛앹껜 異붿텧 諛?紐⑤뜽留?諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?섏??? ??諛⑸쾿? ?좎뒪耳?댁뒪 異붿텧 諛?寃곗젙 諛⑸쾿??怨좊젮?섏? ?딆븯?? ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐, 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???붽뎄怨듯븰?먯꽌 ?먯뿰??泥섎━瑜??꾪빐 Fillmore???섎???諛⑸쾿??梨꾪깮?섏??? 利? 怨좉컼 ?붽뎄?ы빆?쇰줈遺???좎뒪耳?댁뒪瑜?紐⑤뜽留곹븯怨?異붿텧?섍린 ?꾪빐 Fillmore??Case Grammar瑜?媛쒖꽑?쒕떎. 媛쒖꽑??硫붿빱?덉쬁? 援ъ“?붾맂 ?덉감瑜??뺤쓽?섍퀬 ?쒓컖???쒓린踰뺤쓣 ?섑뻾?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?좎뒪耳?댁뒪??蹂듭옟?깃낵 愿?⑤맂 Goal 吏???붽뎄怨듯븰(GoRE)??湲곕컲?쇰줈 異붿텧???좎뒪耳?댁뒪?먯꽌 ?좎뒪耳?댁뒪 ?ш린瑜??앸퀎?섎뒗 ?좎뒪耳?댁뒪 寃곗젙 留ㅽ듃由?뒪(Use Case Decision Matrix)瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ??留ㅽ듃由?뒪?먯꽌 ?좎뒪耳???ㅻ? ?곗꽑?쒖쐞???쒕떎. ?щ??곌뎄濡????ATM ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?곸슜?섏???Our previous research[1] suggested object extraction and modeling method based on Fillmore``s case grammar. This approach had not considered of use case extraction and method. To solve this problem, we adopt Fillmore``s semantic method as linguistic approach into requirement engineering, which refine fillmore``s case grammar for extracting and modeling use cases from customer requirements. This Refined mechanism includes the definition of a structured procedure and the representation of visual notations for ``case`` modeling. This paper also proposes the use case decision matrix to identify use case size from extracted use cases based on goal oriented requirement engineering(GoRE), which related with the complexity of use case, and also prioritizes the use cases with this matrix. It demonstrates our proposal with the bank ATM system.?ш뎄?깆씠 媛?ν븳 ?꾨쿋?붾뱶 ?쒖뒪???뚯뒪???ㅽ뻾湲?

蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???멸컙 援먯궗瑜?紐⑥궗?섎뒗 "而댄벂??援먯궗" ??븷???섎뒗 ?좊땲硫붿씠?????쒗꽣留??ㅼ씠?쇰줈洹??먯씠?꾪듃瑜?援ы쁽?섍퀬 珥덈벑?숆탳 怨쇳븰怨?援먯닔-?숈뒿 ?먮즺? ?듯빀?쒖폒???먯뿰?대? 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ???쇰?????붾? ?듯븳 援먯닔 ?숈뒿???대（?댁???援먯닔-?숈뒿 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 媛쒕컻?섏??? 媛쒕컻??援먯닔???ㅼ씠?쇰줈洹??먯씠?꾪듃???숈뒿?먯쓽 ??듭쓣 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬, ??肄붿뒪?⑥뼱瑜??숈뒿???꾩뿉 珥덈벑怨쇳븰 ?숈뒿怨쇱젣?먯꽌 ?붽뎄?섎뒗 ?깆랬 ?섏?怨?鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 ?곸젅??吏덈Ц?대굹 ??듭쓣 ?쒓났?섎뒗?? TTS(Text-to-Speech) 湲곕뒫???댁슜?섏뿬 ?숈뒿?먯뿉寃?援ъ뼱泥대줈 吏덈Ц?대굹 ??듭쓣 二쇰뒗 湲곕뒫??媛뽮퀬 ?덉쑝硫??좊땲硫붿씠?????멸컙 援먯궗???쇨뎬???듯븯???숈뒿?먯뿉寃??쇰뱶諛깆쓣 ?쒖떆?????덈룄濡??섏??? 援ы쁽????뷀삎 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ뒗 6?숇뀈 珥덈벑?숈깮 64紐낆뿉寃??꾩옣 ?ㅽ뿕???섏??? ?꾩옣 ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 鍮꾧탳吏묐떒蹂대떎 ?ㅽ뿕吏묐떒???숈뒿 ?깆랬?꾧? ?됯퇏 10.797?먯씠 ?μ긽?⑥쓣 蹂댁뿬二쇱뿀?? ?대윭???숈뒿?④낵??湲곗〈????肄붿뒪?⑥뼱? ?щ━ ?쒕Щ怨??듯븯?붴?怨쇱젙怨??멸컙 援먯궗??媛먯젙???댁? ?좊땲硫붿씠????罹먮┃?곕? ?듯븯???숈뒿?먮뱾???멸린?ъ쓣 ?먭레?섏뿬 蹂대떎 ?쎄쾶 援먯닔-?숈뒿 怨쇱젙??紐곗엯?섍쾶 ?⑥쑝濡쒖꽌 ?숈뒿 ?④낵瑜?利앹쭊?쒗궓 寃곌낵濡??먮떒?쒕떎.In this research, we have developed a "computer tutor" that mimics the human tutor with animated tutoring dialog agent and the agent was integrated to teaching-learning material for elementary science subject. The developed system is a natural language based teaching-learning system using one-to-one dialogue. The developed pedagogical dialogue teaching-learning system analysis student's answer then provides appropriate answer or questions after comparing the student's answer with elementary school level achievement. When the agent gives either question or answer it uses the TTS(Text-to-Speech) function. Also the agent has an animated human tutor face for providing more human like feedback. The developed dialogue interface has been applied to 64 6th grade students. The test results show that the test group's average score is higher than the control group by 10.797. This shows that unlike conventional web courseware, our approach that "ask-answer" process and the animated character, which has human tutor's emotional expression, attracts students and helps to immerse to the courseware.?붿빟 ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?2.1 ?쇨뎬 ?쒖젙??愿???곌뎄?⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??댁슜???숈뒿 ?μ븷 吏꾨떒?쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎 諛?援ы쁽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫援먯쑁?숉쉶, ?숉쉶 , [2005] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

?좏뻾?곌뎄瑜??듯빐 ?꾩텧????13媛쒖쓽 ?꾨Т? 75媛?怨쇱뾽??鍮꾩꽌 吏곷Т瑜?鍮꾧탳??寃곌낵 AI 媛?곷퉬?쒕뒗 11媛쒖쓽 ?ㅼ뼇???꾨Т瑜??섑뻾?????덉쑝???쇱젙愿由ъ? ?꾪솕?묐? ?깆쓽 怨쇱뾽??吏묒쨷?섏뼱 珥덇린 鍮꾩꽌??媛쒕뀗???⑥닚 ?낅Т蹂댁“?먮줈???쇰컲鍮꾩꽌??吏곷Т??웾???⑥뵮 誘몄튂吏 紐삵븿???뺤씤?????덉뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄??AI 媛?곷퉬?쒖쓽 二쇱슂 湲곕뒫???쇰컲鍮꾩꽌? ?좎엫鍮꾩꽌??吏곷Т? 鍮꾧탳??遊꾩쑝濡쒖뜥 ?꾩옱 AI 媛?곷퉬?쒖쓽 ??웾??遺??ㅼ졇 ?덉뿀?뚯쓣 ?뺤씤??二쇨퀬, 吏곷Т 鍮꾧탳?쒕? ?듯빐 鍮꾩꽌吏?醫낆궗?먮뱾????媛뺥솕?댁빞 ?섎뒗 ??웾???쒖떆??二쇱뿀?ㅻ뒗 ?곗뿉 ?섏쓽媛 ?덉쑝硫? 誘몃옒鍮꾩꽌??????꾨Ц??援먯쑁怨?寃쎈젰媛쒕컻 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??湲고쉷?섎뒗 ?곗뿉 洹?湲곗큹媛 ?섎뒗 ?먮즺濡??ъ슜?????덉쓣 寃껋쑝濡?湲곕??쒕떎.The beginning of artificial intelligence technology aiming to have human being?셲 sensibleness and thoughtfulness has been continuously developing the technical area by its own learning. The AI virtual assistants??services have reached the extent to provide services by recognizing the user?셲 voice by understanding natural language and analyzing user?셲 life patterns and situational contexts. This study reviews the functions of various AI virtual assistants, such as Alexa, Bixby, Home, Siri, and Zenbo robots. This study compares the duties and tasks of AI virtual assistants, administrative assistants, and executive administrative assistants and discusses the results of the comparison of job competencies, secretarial occupation?셲 image in Korean society, and the value of secretarial jobs.
The results from examining 13 duties and 75 tasks of secretaries??job description demonstrates that current AI virtual assistants are able to perform 11 duties, whilst mainly focusing on scheduling and telephone management tasks. Considering the narrow range of AI virtual assistants??tasks, this equates to a low-level clerical worker.
This study contributes to understanding the genuine positioning of AI virtual assistants in the administrative assistants occupation group and provides task areas that administrative assistants consider to strengthen. In addition, the study is expected to be used as a groundwork for administrative assistants??training and career development programs.援?Ц珥덈줉 ?? ?쒕줎 ?? AI 媛?곷퉬?쒖뿉 ????대줎??怨좎같 III. ?뚰봽?몄썾?닿? ?먯젏 蹂듭옟?댁?怨???뺥솕?⑥뿉 ?곕씪???ъ슜?먯쓽 ?붽뎄媛 留ㅼ슦 ?ㅼ뼇?댁?怨??덉쑝硫? ?쒗뭹?????湲곕? ?섏????믪븘吏怨??덈떎. 洹몃윭誘濡? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?붽뎄 ?ы빆???뺥솗??遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 ?④낵?곸쑝濡?媛쒕컻 ?④퀎???곸슜?섎뒗 寃껋? 留ㅼ슦 以묒슂?섎떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰?대줈 ?쒗쁽?섎뒗 ?붽뎄 ?ы빆 臾몄꽌??遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뿉 ?섑??섎뒗 ?ㅻ쪟瑜??④낵?곸쑝濡?以꾩씠怨? ?섏젙?섎뒗???ъ슜?????덈뒗 ?붽뎄 遺꾩꽍 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖? 臾몄꽌媛??좎궗??痢≪젙???섑빐??臾몄꽌媛꾩쓽 ?섏〈??dependency) 遺꾩꽍??吏?먰븯怨?臾몄옣媛??좎궗??痢≪젙???섑빐???붽뎄 ?ы빆媛꾩쓽 ?곌퀎??traceability), 以묐났??redundancy), 遺덉씪移섏꽦(inconsistency), 洹몃━怨?遺덉셿?꾩꽦(imcompleteness)??諛쒓껄?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 吏?먰븳?? ?먰븳 紐⑦샇??臾몄옣??異붿텧?섏뿬 ?붽뎄?ы빆??遺덈챸?뺤꽦 (ambiguity)??諛쒓껄?섎뒗 湲곕뒫???쒓났?쒕떎. 臾몄꽌媛??좎궗??痢≪젙???꾪빐???ъ슜???됱씤 諛⑸쾿? ?щ씪?대뵫 ?덈룄??紐⑤뜽怨??섏〈 援ъ“ 紐⑤뜽??寃고빀??寃껋쑝濡?媛?紐⑤뜽??媛吏???⑥젏???④낵?곸쑝濡?蹂댁셿?????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??臾몄꽌媛? 臾몄옣媛??좎궗??痢≪젙 湲곕쾿???⑥쑉?깆쓣 ?ㅽ뿕???듯빐 寃利앺븯??쇰ŉ 援ы쁽???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?듯빐 遺꾩꽍 泥섎━?섎뒗 怨쇱젙??蹂댁뿬二쇨퀬 ?덈떎.As software becomes more complicated and large-scaled, user's demands become more varied and his expectation levels about software products are raised. Therefore it is very important that a software engineer analyzes user's requirements precisely and applies it effectively in the development step. This paper presents a requirements analysis system that reduces and revises errors of requirements specifications analysis effectively. As this system measures the similarity among requirements documents and sentences, it assists users in analyzing the dependency among requirements specifications and finding the traceability, redundancy, inconsistency and incompleteness among requirements sentences. It also extracts sentences that contain ambiguous words. Indexing method for the similarity measurement combines sliding window model and dependency structure model. This method can complement each model's weeknesses. This paper verifies the efficiency of similarity measure techniques through experiments and presents a proccess of the requirements specifications analysis using the embodied system.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. 臾몄꽌媛??좎궗??痢≪젙 湲곕쾿蹂묐젹 媛앹껜吏???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 寃利?

Especially it is one of characteristic solving problems of NLP(Natural Language Processing). This paper focuses on lexical ambiguity including affix-bound ambiguity words. Korean ambiguity words are appeared by combined affixes(Josa and Omi). Especially affix-bound ambiguity words include ??irregular-verb ambiguity ??contraction-type ambiguity ??coinage ambiguity ??suffix-bound ambiguity.
Korean disambiguation of NLP have three steps ; First, Using parts of speech information is available for unit of sentence construction disambiguation. Second, it needs assigning semantic features to its ambiguity words. Finally, context information are available for solution of ambiguity words concerning NLP.?? ?ㅼ뼱媛硫??? ?뺣낫泥섎━???덉뼱???쒓뎅??以묒쓽?깆쓽 ?뱀쭠 1. 以묒쓽?깆쓽 媛쒕뀗 2. 以묒쓽?깆쓽 ?좏삎 ?? ?꾨줈洹몃옒諛띿뼵?댁쓽 ?뺤떇 ?ъ뼇 以?援щЦ??????뺤떇 ?뺤쓽??愿??湲곕쾿???쇳뻽?? 湲곗〈??BNF 臾몃쾿???댁슜???뺤떇 ?뺤쓽??Chomsky?????뺤씤 context-free ?몄뼱援곗뿉 援?븳?섏뼱 ?덇린 ?뚮Ц???쒖빟 議곌굔?ㅼ? ?먯뿰?대? 鍮뚯뼱 ?ㅻ챸???섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?ш린?쒕뒗 BNF蹂대떎 ?⑥뵮 ?쒓린?μ씠 媛뺥븳 VWF-G(?먮뒗 2?④퀎 臾몃쾿)???뺤쓽?섍퀬 洹몄뿉 ????뱀꽦?쇰줈???洹쒕え 臾몃쾿???ш린瑜?異뺤냼?쒗궗 ???덇퀬 ??context-sensitive 臾몃쾿???쒓린?????덉쓬??蹂댁???Formal Specifications of programming languages can affect language designers, implementers, and users.
For programming language designers, they improves languages design, for implementers, they help to produce a compilers or interpreter for a programming language. If the language is rigorously formalized, it is easy to verify program correctneess. Users need a definite document to take advantage of the languages facilities.
BNF-Grammar is a well-known formalism describing the syntax of programming languages. But BNF-G expresses only the class of context-free grammars.
In this paper another formalism, two-level-G(or VWF-G), is presented, which is more powerful than BNF and more capable of manipulating context-sensitive languages.Interation of a Maximal Function with Weights

蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???멸컙 援먯궗瑜?紐⑥궗?섎뒗 "而댄벂??援먯궗" ??븷???섎뒗 ?좊땲硫붿씠?????쒗꽣留??ㅼ씠?쇰줈洹??먯씠?꾪듃瑜?援ы쁽?섍퀬 珥덈벑?숆탳 怨쇳븰怨?援먯닔-?숈뒿 ?먮즺? ?듯빀?쒖폒???먯뿰?대? 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ???쇰?????붾? ?듯븳 援먯닔 ?숈뒿???대（?댁???援먯닔-?숈뒿 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 媛쒕컻?섏??? 媛쒕컻??援먯닔???ㅼ씠?쇰줈洹??먯씠?꾪듃???숈뒿?먯쓽 ??듭쓣 遺꾩꽍?섍퀬, ??肄붿뒪?⑥뼱瑜??숈뒿???꾩뿉 珥덈벑怨쇳븰 ?숈뒿怨쇱젣?먯꽌 ?붽뎄?섎뒗 ?깆랬 ?섏?怨?鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 ?곸젅??吏덈Ц?대굹 ??듭쓣 ?쒓났?섎뒗?? TTS(Text-to-Speech) 湲곕뒫???댁슜?섏뿬 ?숈뒿?먯뿉寃?援ъ뼱泥대줈 吏덈Ц?대굹 ??듭쓣 二쇰뒗 湲곕뒫??媛뽮퀬 ?덉쑝硫??좊땲硫붿씠?????멸컙 援먯궗???쇨뎬???듯븯???숈뒿?먯뿉寃??쇰뱶諛깆쓣 ?쒖떆?????덈룄濡??섏??? 援ы쁽????뷀삎 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ뒗 6?숇뀈 珥덈벑?숈깮 64紐낆뿉寃??꾩옣 ?ㅽ뿕???섏??? ?꾩옣 ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 鍮꾧탳吏묐떒蹂대떎 ?ㅽ뿕吏묐떒???숈뒿 ?깆랬?꾧? ?됯퇏 10.797?먯씠 ?μ긽?⑥쓣 蹂댁뿬二쇱뿀?? ?대윭???숈뒿?④낵??湲곗〈????肄붿뒪?⑥뼱? ?щ━ "臾산퀬-?듯븯?? 怨쇱젙怨??멸컙 援먯궗??媛먯젙???댁? ?좊땲硫붿씠????罹먮┃?곕? ?듯븯???숈뒿?먮뱾???멸린?ъ쓣 ?먭레?섏뿬 蹂대떎 ?쎄쾶 援먯닔-?숈뒿 怨쇱젙??紐곗엯?섍쾶 ?⑥쑝濡쒖꽌 ?숈뒿 ?④낵瑜?利앹쭊?쒗궓 寃곌낵濡??먮떒?쒕떎.In this research, we have developed a "computer tutor" that mimics the human tutor with animated tutoring dialog agent and the agent was integrated to teaching-learning material for elementary science subject. The developed system is a natural language based teaching-learning system using one-to-one dialogue. The developed pedagogical dialogue teaching-learning system analysis student's answer then provides appropriate answer or questions after comparing the student's answer with elementary school level achievement. When the agent gives either question or answer it uses the TTS(Text-to-Speech) function. Also the agent has an animated human tutor face for providing more human like feedback. The developed dialogue interface has been applied to 64 6th grade students. The test results show that the test group's average score is higher than the control group by 10.797. This shows that unlike conventional web courseware, our approach that "ask-answer" process and the animated character, which has human tutor's emotional expression, attracts students and helps to immerse to the courseware.?⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??댁슜???숈뒿 ?μ븷 吏꾨떒?쒖뒪???ㅺ퀎 諛?援ы쁽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫援먯쑁?숉쉶, ?숉쉶 , [2005] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???대윭???대줎???쇱쓽瑜?諛쒗꽣 踰ㅼ빞誘쇨낵 ?꾨━?쒕━???ㅽ??ъ쓽 留ㅼ껜 誘명븰???듯빐???댄렣蹂닿퀬???쒕떎.The recent generalized digital society has already passed the point of pursuing ?쁟omputer literacy?? Recent discussions have developed a new discussion on Digital Text Studies in connection with the so-called ?쁡igital humanities??concept. The concept of text in the digital age that we perceive will be a means of communication understood under an integrated semantic relation. In the digital aspect, text will be understood in terms of information provision. That is, an attempt to read out the tension relations existing between the interests more interestingly should be the point of digital text studies. In the case of cognitive theory based on the concept of digital text, it facilitates copying, manipulation and analysis based on the digitization of literature / text. On the other hand, the digital task of ?쁃igital Text Studies??is probably to make a futuristic and innovative hypothesis and problem consciousness in the humanistic field through this digital text concept. In this study, I will try to clarify this theoretical discussion from the viewpoint of Walter Benjamin and Friedrich Kittler?셲 media aesthetics.[援?Ц珥덈줉] ?? ?붾씪 ?ㅽ겕由쏀닾?? ?붾씪 ?ㅽ겕由쏀닾???쇰젆?몃줈?댁뭅 ?? ?섑뙆?곗뒪?몄쓽 ?꾩떇???뱀? 臾명븰??湲곗옱?쒖뒪???? ?꾨궇濡쒓렇 臾명뿄?숆낵 ?붿???湲?곌린 ?? 臾명뿄?숈쓽 ??? ?ㅽ뀒濡쒗넗?쇱븘 ?뱀? 寃뚯씠?몄썾?대줈?쒖쓽 臾명븰?꾨옉?섏븘 紐⑤━?낆쓽 ?묓뭹 ???쒖궗? ?먭린?깆쓽 臾몄젣 - ?롫룆?щ춬移?Le N흹ud de vip챔res?뤿? 以묒떖?쇰줈

KBimCode ?앹꽦 硫붿빱?덉쬁???듭떖???쇰━洹쒖튃泥닿퀎?붿쓽 ??媛吏 援ъ꽦?붿냼(媛앹껜?띿꽦, ?⑥닔, 臾몄옣 ?댁쇅 愿怨????곕씪 援ъ껜?곸씤 遺꾩꽍??吏꾪뻾?섏??? 洹?寃곌낵, ?ㅼ뼇??以묎뎅 嫄댁텞踰뺢퇋 臾몄옣??KBimCode濡?蹂?섑븷 ???덉뿀?쇰ŉ, 蹂?섏쓽 怨쇱젙 以??ㅼ쓬???꾩텧?????덉뿀?? 1) 嫄대Ъ 媛앹껜 諛?洹몄뿉 ?곕Ⅸ ?띿꽦??????뺤쓽??媛?援??留덈떎 ?곸씠?섎?濡? ?대? 怨좊젮??媛앹껜 ?뺤쓽 諛??띿꽦 泥섎━ 諛⑸쾿???꾩슂?섎ŉ, 2) ?쇰? 臾몄옣? ?쒖닠遺 諛?臾몄옣 愿怨꾨? 泥섎━?섍린 ?꾪븯???덈줈???⑥닔 諛?愿怨??좏삎 ?뺤쓽媛 ?꾩슂?섎ŉ, ?대뒗 KBimCode???쒖??붾맂 ?⑥닔 諛?愿怨??좏삎 ?꾩텧 洹쒖튃 ?덉뿉???뺤옣 媛?ν븯?? 蹂??곌뎄瑜??듯빐 ?꾪? ?덈줈????곸쓽 蹂?섍낵?뺤뿉?쒖쓽 臾몄젣???깆쓣 ?닿껐?섎뒗 怨쇱젙???듯빐 KBimCode??媛?μ꽦???쇰? 寃利앺븯??쇰ŉ, ?ㅼ뼇??????뺣?瑜??듯빐 ?쒖??곸씠怨?援?젣?곸씤 ?묒슜??湲곕??쒕떎.As one of empirical research and developments on BIM applications to improve design quality and productivity of building, efforts have been devoted to automated compliance checking of building design for building permit. KBimLogic is a mechanism that translate Korean Buidling Act to the computational language called KBimCode. KBimCode aims to standardized and neutral language that can be applied to various design rules. This paper focuses on testing expandability of KBimCode by appling it on Chinese Building Act. We analyzed Chinese national regulation on fire protection and evacuation, based on 1) Object쨌property, 2) function for predicate processing, 3) relationship of sentences. As a result, Chinese Building Act were successfully translated to KBimCode with some important implications for further application. Based on the finding of the paper, KBimCode is expected to be applicable to kinds of design rules.?꾨Ⅴ諛붿씠???⑤씪??援ъ쭅援ъ씤 臾명솕??????щ? ?곌뎄: ?뚮컮泥쒓뎅????븷怨?紐⑺몴濡??섎뒗 ?ъ슜??寃쏀뿕??以묒떖?쇰줈

?덇컻 ?깆쓽 ?곹뼢??諛쏅뒗 ?쒖＜濡??쒖젙? 鍮꾪뻾?μ뿉????났湲??댁갑瑜숈쓽 媛???щ?瑜?寃곗젙?섎뒗 二쇱슂 吏?쒖쨷 ?섎굹?대떎. ?댁넚????났湲곌? ?댄빆?섎뒗 怨듯빆??寃쎌슦 ?쒖＜濡??쒖젙???ы븿??二쇱슂 援?? 湲곗긽 ?덈낫瑜??쒗뻾?섎ŉ, ?대? ??났醫낆궗?먭? ?뺤씤?????덈룄濡??섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? 理쒓렐 ?곸긽 泥섎━, ?뚯꽦 ?몄떇, ?먯뿰??泥섎━ ?깆쓽 ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞???곸슜?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?ъ링?좉꼍留앹쓣 ?쒖＜濡??쒖젙 ?덉륫???곸슜?섏뿬 援?? 鍮꾪뻾?μ쓽 ?쒖＜濡??쒖젙 ?덉륫 紐⑤뜽??媛쒕컻?섍퀬 ?대? ?쒖슜???덉륫???섑뻾?섏??? ?곸슜 ???鍮꾪뻾?μ쓽 怨쇨굅 ?ㅼ젣 湲곗긽 愿痢?媛믪쓣 ?쒖슜?섏뿬 ?좉꼍留??숈뒿 ???쒖젙??????덉륫???섑뻾?섏?怨? 湲곗〈 愿痢??곗씠?곗? 鍮꾧탳??寃곌낵 鍮꾧탳???뺥솗???덉륫 寃곌낵瑜??뺤씤?섏??? ?먰븳 媛쒕컻??紐⑤뜽? 蹂꾨룄???덈낫 湲곕뒫???녿뒗 ?대떦 鍮꾪뻾?μ뿉??李멸퀬?????덈뒗 湲곗긽?뺣낫瑜??앹꽦?섎뒗???ъ슜?????덉쓣 寃껋씠??The runway visual range affected by fog and so on is one of the important indicators to determine whether aircraft can take off and land at the airport or not. In the case of airports where transportation airplanes are operated, major weather forecasts including the runway visual range for local area have been released and provided to aviation workers for recognizing that. This paper proposes a runway visual range estimation model with a deep neural network applied recently to various fields such as image processing, speech recognition, natural language processing, etc. It is developed and implemented for estimating a runway visual range of local airport with a deep neural network. It utilizes the past actual weather observation data of the applied airfield for constituting the learning of the neural network. It can show comparatively the accurate estimation result when it compares the results with the existing observation data. The proposed model can be used to generate weather information on the airfield for which no other forecasting function is available.???諛섏궗硫?援ъ“瑜??댁슜??Low Profile Ku諛대뱶 ?뚮씪蹂쇰씪 ?덊뀒?섏쓽 ?ㅺ퀎

Therefore Patent has actively researched. In the patent IR, almost researchs bring keyword into focus, that one of example is NLP (Natural Language Processing). Actually, the kewords of patent is important because this one decide right of patent. And It is true that studies of petent topology are not enough. Unlike traditional web search environment, Patent network has feature of time series becase of reference network, and also referece rules differ from country to country. It is imposible to analysis using one reference network including whole kind patent. In this paper, we introduce new patent network as patent informations convert heterogeneous information network that all kind patent can expressed, and compute patent similarity. finally we suggest new homogeneous network that is non reference network.怨듦났?뺣낫?붿궗?낆쓽 ?좉린???곸슜?꾪솴怨??뺣낫?먯썝愿由??꾨왂

In this paper, we propose the association model for the opinion mining which can analyze customer opinions posted on web. The association model is to modify the association rules mining model in data mining in order to apply efficiently and effectively the association mining techniques to the opinion mining. We designed and implemented the opinion mining systems based on the modified association model and the grouping idea which would enable it to generate significant rules more.援??湲곗긽 紐⑤땲?곕쭅???꾨뱶?쒕쾭瑜??꾪븳 ?뚮윭???쇱슦???꾨줈?좎퐳??援ы쁽

ICT 愿???ㅼ썙??16媛쒕? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 援??怨쇳븰湲곗닠?뺣낫?쇳꽣(NDSL)?먯꽌 理쒓렐 20??1996??2015?????쇰Ц 359?몄쓣 ?섏쭛?섏??? ?대떦 ?쇰Ц????곸쑝濡??섍꼍 遺꾩빞 諛?ICT 愿???먯뿰?대? 泥섎━?섏뿬 留먮춬移?Corpus)?⑥쐞濡?遺꾨쪟泥닿퀎瑜??ш뎄?깊븯??? ?꾩닠??遺꾨쪟泥닿퀎???ㅼ썙?쒕? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?띿뒪??留덉씠??遺꾩꽍 湲곕쾿??鍮덈룄 遺꾩꽍, ?ㅼ썙??遺꾩꽍, ?ㅼ썙??媛??곌?洹쒖튃???뺤씤?섏??? 洹?寃곌낵 `?섍꼍 ?쇰컲` 諛?`湲고썑` 遺꾩빞???ㅼ썙??異쒗쁽 鍮덈룄媛 ?꾩껜??77 %, ICT??`怨듦났?듯빀?쒕퉬?? 諛?`?곗뾽?듯빀?쒕퉬??媛 ??30 %??鍮꾩쑉??李⑥??섏??? ?쒓퀎??遺꾩꽍???듯빐 ?섍꼍 遺꾩빞?먯꽌??ICT ?쒖슜 ?곌뎄??理쒓렐 5??2011??2015???ъ씠??湲됱쬆?섏뿬 怨쇨굅(1996??2010??怨?鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 ??2諛??댁긽 愿???곌뎄媛 利앷???寃껋쑝濡??섑??щ떎. ?ㅼ썙?쒓컙 ?곌? 洹쒖튃???앹꽦?섏뿬 ?섍꼍 遺꾩빞瑜?湲곗??쇰줈 ?섑??댁뿀???? `?섍꼍 ?쇰컲`? 16媛? `湲고썑`??`14`媛쒖쓽 ICT 湲곕컲 湲곗닠??二쇰줈 ?쒖슜?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 寃껋쑝濡??뺤씤?섏???This study quantitatively analyzed the research trends in the use of ICT of the environmental field using the text mining technique. To that end, the study collected 359 papers published in the past two decades (1996-2015) from the National Digital Science Library (NDSL) using 38 environment-related keywords and 16 ICT-related keywords. It processed the natural languages of the environment and ICT fields in the papers and reorganized the classification system into the unit of corpus. It conducted the text mining analysis techniques of frequency analysis, keyword analysis and the association rule analysis of keywords, based on the above-mentioned keywords of the classification system. As a result, the frequency of the keywords of `general environment` and `climate` accounted for 77 % of the total proportion and the keywords of `public convergence service` and `industrial convergence service` in the ICT field took up approximately 30 % of the total proportion. According to the time series analysis, the researches using ICT in the environmental field rapidly increased over the past 5 years (2011-2015) and the number of such researches more than doubled compared to the past (1996-2010). Based on the environmental field with generated association rules among the keywords, it was identified that the keyword `general environment` was using 16 ICT-based technologies and `climate` was using 14 ICT-based technologies.?꾩꽦?곸긽???쒖슜???숇룞媛??쇨컖二??곗븞?ъ＜??硫댁쟻 諛?遺?좏눜?곷Ъ ?띾룄 蹂??遺꾩꽍

?쒖뒪?쒖씠 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 遺꾩빞媛 ?먯젏 蹂듭옟?댁?怨???뺥솕?⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?쒖뒪??媛쒕컻???덉뼱 ?ъ슜???붽뎄 ?ы빆???щ컮瑜?遺꾩꽍怨??쒖닠??以묒슂?섍쾶 ?몄떇?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? ?명꽣??internet)??諛쒖쟾?쇰줈 遺꾩궛 ?섍꼍?먯꽌???붽뎄 ?ы빆 異붿텧 諛?遺꾩꽍???꾩슂?깆씠 ??먮릺怨??덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???먯뿰?대줈 ?쒗쁽?섎뒗 ?붽뎄 ?ы빆 臾몄옣???좎궗??痢≪젙 湲곕쾿???댁슜?섏뿬 二쇱젣蹂꾨줈 踰붿＜??categorization)?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 遺꾩궛 ?섍꼍?먯꽌 ?섏쭛???붽뎄 ?ы빆 臾몄옣??遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪븳 湲곗큹瑜??쒓났?????덈뒗 ?붽뎄 ?ы빆 異붿텧 吏???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞???쒖뒪?쒖? ?⑥뼱媛? 臾몄옣媛꾩쓽 ?좎궗??痢≪젙 湲곕쾿???댁슜?섏뿬 ?섏쭛???붽뎄 ?ы빆 臾몄옣?ㅼ쓣 二쇱젣蹂꾨줈 ?먮룞?쇰줈 遺꾨쪟?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?붽뎄 ?ы빆 遺꾩꽍 ??珥덇린 ?묒뾽???대젮???以꾩씠怨??좎냽?섍퀬 ?뺥솗?섍쾶 遺꾩꽍 ?묒뾽???섑뻾?섎룄濡?吏?먰븷 寃껋씠?? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???⑥뼱媛? 臾몄옣媛??좎궗??痢≪젙 湲곕쾿???댁슜??踰붿＜??湲곕쾿???⑥쑉?깆쓣 ?ㅽ뿕???듯빐 寃利앺븯??쇰ŉ 援ы쁽???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?듯빐 異붿텧, 泥섎━?섎뒗 怨쇱젙??蹂댁뿬二쇨퀬 ?덈떎.As a software becomes more complicated and large-scaled, it is very important for a software engineer to analyze user's requirements precisely and apply them effectively in the development stage. Due to the growth of the internet, the necessity of requirements elicitation and analysis in distributed environments has also become larger. This paper proposes a requirements elicitation supporting system that offer the basis for effectively analyzing requirements collected in distributed environments. The proposed system automatically categorizes collected requirements sentences into selected subject fields by measuring their similarity using a similarity measurement technique. Therefore, it reduces the difficulties in the initial stage of requirements analysis and it supports rapid and correct requirements analysis. This paper verifies the efficiency of the proposed system in similarity measurement techniques through experiments, and presents a process for requirements specifications elicitation using the embodied system?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?붽뎄 ?ы빆 臾몄옣 踰붿＜??湲곕쾿肄붾컮 ?댄뵆由ъ??댁뀡???숈쟻 遺??遺꾩궛???꾪븳 ?ㅼ떆媛?紐⑤땲?곕쭅 湲곕쾿 諛?硫뷀듃由?뒪

蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌?? ?쒓컖 ?λ㈃ ?댄빐????臾몄젣濡쒖꽌, ?낅젰 ?곸긽?ㅻ줈遺???λ㈃ 洹몃옒?꾩? ?곸긽 罹≪뀡???숈떆???앹꽦?섎뒗 臾몄젣瑜??ㅻ，?? ?λ㈃ 洹몃옒?꾨뒗 ?곸긽 ??臾쇱껜?ㅺ낵 洹몃뱾 媛꾩쓽 愿怨꾨뱾???섑??대뒗 ?뺥삎 吏???쒗쁽?대ŉ, ?곸긽 罹≪뀡? 二쇱뼱吏??곸긽???닿릿 ?λ㈃???쒖닠?섎뒗 ?먯뿰??臾몄옣?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???대윭??臾몄젣瑜??④낵?곸쑝濡??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐, 留λ씫 ?뺣낫瑜??쒕줈 援먰솚?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?쒕줈 ?ㅻⅨ ??媛吏 ?쒗쁽???곹샇蹂댁셿?곸쑝濡??앹꽦?섎뒗 ?덈줈???ъ링 ?좉꼍留?紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽? 臾쇱껜 ?먯?, 愿怨??먯?, 罹≪뀡 ?앹꽦 ??媛곴린 ?ㅻⅨ ??媛吏 怨꾩링?ㅻ줈 援ъ꽦?섎ŉ, 媛?怨꾩링? 洹?怨꾩링??遺?щ맂 ?묒뾽???깃났?곸쑝濡??섑뻾?섍린 ?꾪빐 留λ씫?뺣낫瑜??곸젅???쒖슜?쒕떎. ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽???깅뒫???됯??섍린 ?꾪빐, ?洹쒕え 踰ㅼ튂留덊겕 ?곗씠??吏묓빀??Visual Genome???댁슜???ㅼ뼇???ㅽ뿕?ㅼ쓣 ?섑뻾?섏??? ?대윭???ㅽ뿕?ㅼ쓣 ?듯빐, 留λ씫 ?뺣낫瑜??쒖슜?섎뒗 ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽??湲곗〈??寃쎌웳 紐⑤뜽?ㅼ뿉 鍮꾪빐 ?믪? ?깅뒫 ?μ긽???덉뿀?뚯쓣 ?뺤씤?????덉뿀??In this paper, as a visual scene understanding problem, we address the problem of generating corresponding scene graphs and image captions from input images. While a scene graph is a formal knowledge representation expressing in-image objects and their relationships, an image caption is a natural language sentence describing the scene captured in the given image. To address the problem effectively, we propose a novel deep neural network model, CSUN(Context-based Scene Understanding Network), to generate two different representations in a complementary way, by exchanging useful contexts with each other. The proposed model consists of three different layers, such as object detection, relationship detection, and caption generation, each of which makes use of proper context to accomplish its own task. To evaluate performance of the proposed model, we conduct various experiments on a large-scale benchmark dataset, Visual Genome. Through these experiments, we demonstrate that our model using useful contexts, achieves significant improvements in accuracy over state-of-the-art models.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿?⑥뿰援?3. 罹≪뀡 諛??λ㈃ 洹몃옒???앹꽦 紐⑤뜽?뺤쟻, ?숈쟻 遺꾩꽍諛⑸쾿??寃고빀?섎뒗 諛붿씠?덈━ 肄붾뱶 痍⑥빟??遺꾩꽍 ?꾨젅?꾩썙??

?뚰봽?몄썾??媛쒕컻怨??댁쁺??遺꾩궛?? ??뺥솕?⑥뿉 ?곕씪 ?뺥솗?섍퀬 ?꾩쟾???붽뎄?ы빆??異붿텧怨?紐낆꽭???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛??以묒슂???붿냼媛 ?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?먰븳 ?명꽣?룹쓣 ?듯븳 怨듬룞?묒뾽 ?섍꼍?먯꽌 怨꾩냽?곸씤 ?쒖뒪??蹂寃쎌슂泥?? ?붿슧 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?붽뎄?ы빆 愿由щ? ?꾩슂濡??쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???대윭??怨듬룞?묒뾽 ?섍꼍?먯꽌 ?먯뿰??湲곕컲 ?붽뎄?ы빆 紐낆꽭? 愿由ъ쓽 ?⑥쑉?깆쓣 ?μ긽?쒗궎湲??꾪븳 ?붽뎄?ы빆 紐낆꽭援ъ“? 湲곕쾿 ?깆쓣 ?뺤쓽?섍퀬, ?붽뎄怨듯븰 ?쒕룞怨?二쇨린瑜?諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?섎뒗 ?붽뎄怨듯븰 ?꾨줈?몄꽌? ?섍꼍???쒖븞?쒕떎. 洹몃옒??CSCW(Computer Supported Cooperative Work) ?섍꼍?먯꽌 ?붽뎄?ы빆???뺥솗?섍쾶 異붿텧?섍퀬 ?⑥쑉?곸쑝濡?愿由ы븯硫?遺꾩꽍?④퀎濡??먯뿰?ㅻ윭???꾩씠媛 媛?ν븯?꾨줉 ?쒕떎.According to distributed, large-caled environment of software development and operation, the elicitation and specivication of correct and complete requrement is the most important factor for the system. In addition contiuous and dramatic systerm canging requests in cooperative environment with internet require more efficient, requirement management. In this paper we detine the specification architecture and techruques for requrements, so that we improve the efficiency ofnatural language-based requirement speciticationand management in a cooperatie work environment. Also, we propose a software requirement engineering process model and environment based on requirements in a CSC@(Computer Supported Cjooperative Work) environment, therefore transfer them into analysis phase.PARSEC???댁슜??遺꾩궛怨듭쑀硫붾え由??ㅼ쨷?꾨줈?몄꽌 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫遺꾩꽍

?명꽣?룹쓽 諛쒖쟾?쇰줈 ???곸뿉 ?섎쭖? 臾몄꽌 諛??뺣낫媛 議댁옱?섎뒗 ?곹솴?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?먭? ?먰븯???뺣낫瑜??댁? ??臾몄꽌瑜?寃?됲븯??二쇰뒗 ???뺣낫 寃??湲곗닠? 留ㅼ슦 以묒슂?섍쾶 ?섏뿀?? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌?????뺣낫 寃???쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?깅뒫 ?μ긽???④낵?곸씤 紐?媛吏 二쇱슂??湲곗닠???쒖븞?섏??? 湲곗〈 ?쒖뒪?쒕뱾? 二쇰줈 臾몄꽌? 吏덉쓽???좎궗?꾨? 怨꾩궛?섏뿬 ?대? 二쇱슂 ?뺣낫濡??댁슜?섏??? 洹몃윭??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ш린?먯꽌 ??嫄몄쓬 ???섏븘媛 臾몄꽌 ?덉쓽 媛?臾몄옣?ㅼ씠 吏덉쓽? ?쇰쭏???좎궗?쒓?瑜?怨꾩궛?섏뿬 ?대? ?댁슜?섎뒗 湲곕쾿???쒖븞?섏??? ?대윭??臾몄옣-吏덉쓽 ?좎궗?꾨? ?깆닕???먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠 ?놁씠 洹쇱궗?곸쑝濡?怨꾩궛?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???뚭컻?섏??? 洹몃━怨???怨꾩궛 ?묒뾽? 臾몄꽌 ?섏쓽 利앷????좏삎?곸씤 怨꾩궛?됱쓽 利앷?瑜?媛???댁쓣 蹂댁엫?쇰줈???ㅼ슜?곸씤 ??⑸웾 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉?쒕룄 ?ъ슜?????덉쓬??蹂댁??? 洹??ㅼ쓬?쇰줈 ?쒖븞??二쇱슂??湲곗닠? 異쒕젰 臾몄꽌???쒖쐞?붿뿉 怨꾩링?곸씤 媛쒕뀗???꾩엯?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ??湲곕쾿???ъ슜?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 ?곷떦???깅뒫 ?μ긽???대０ ???덉쓬??蹂댁??? 洹??몄뿉????臾몄꽌???뱀쭠???섏씠??留곹겕 ?뺣낫? ??댄? ?뺣낫瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?대뒓 ?뺣룄???깅뒫 媛쒖꽑??媛?몄삱 ???덉쓬??蹂댁??? ?대윭??湲곗닠?ㅼ쓽 ??뱀꽦???낆쬆?섍린 ?꾪빐 ??⑸웾 ???뺣낫寃???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 媛쒕컻?섍퀬 ?ㅽ뿕?섏???Prosperity of Internet led to the web containing huge number of documents. Thus increasing importance is given to the web information retrieval technology that can provide users with documents that contain the right information they want. This paper proposes several techniques that are effective for the improvement of web information retrieval. Similarity between a document and the query is a major source of information exploited by conventional systems. However, we suggest a technique to make use of similarity between a sentence and the query. We introduce a technique to compute the approximate score of the sentence-query similarity even without a mature technology of natural language processing. It was shown that the amount of computation for this task is linear to the number of documents in the total collection, which implies that practical systems can make use of this technique. The next important technique proposed in this paper is to use stratification of documents in re-ranking the documents to output. It was shown that it can lead to significant improvement in performance. We furthermore showed that using hyper links, anchor texts, and titles can result in enhancement of performance. To justify the proposed techniques we developed a large scale web information retrieval system and used it for experiments.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 湲곕낯 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 援ъ꽦 3. 臾몄옣 - 吏덉쓽 ?좎궗?꾩쓽 ?댁슜以묐났 異붿쿇 臾몄젣瑜?諛섏쁺???ㅼ쨷 罹좏럹?몄쓽 理쒖쟻??

Convention on Biological Diversity made for conserve resources and enhance the value in many countries around the world. Each country is in the process of building a database for to protect the native biological resources and establish sovereignty. This studies analyzed the distribution of such traditional knowledge of native biological resources and builded a database through using standardized form of collected data made by our research. The result, almost native biological resources used for food and medical treatment.?붿빟 Abstract I. ?쒕줎 II. 蹂몃줎 III. 寃곕줎?쇳빐?먯땐寃⑹쭊?좎쓽 ?댁슜 諛?諛⑸쾿?????鍮꾪뙋??寃??- ?щ━?숈쟻 愿?먯쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈 -

ITU-T, ISO ?깆뿉 ?섑빐 ?쒖젙???쒖?沅뚭퀬?덉? ?듭떊留?援ъ꽦?붿냼?ㅺ컙???⑥닚???듭떊洹쒖튃???뺤쓽?섎뒗 寃??몄뿉 ?듭떊留?愿由ъ뿉 ?꾩슂???먯썝?ㅼ쓽 ?띿꽦怨??숈쟻 ?뱀꽦?????異붿긽?붾맂 ?쒗쁽, 洹몃━怨??듭떊留?援ъ꽦?붿냼?ㅼ뿉 ???愿由ш린?μ쓣 ?ш큵?곸쑝濡?洹쒖젙?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 洹몃윭???쒖??듭떊留?援ъ꽦?붿냼以?愿由ш컼泥댁뿉 ?숈옉???곹뼢??誘몄튂???λ룞???붿씤?ㅺ낵 ?숈옉?덉감 諛?洹몄뿉 ?곕Ⅸ ?듭? 諛쒖깮 ?깆쓽 怨쇱젙?ㅼ씠 ?쁁EHAVIOUR" ?쒗뵆由용궡???먯뿰?대? ?댁슜?섏뿬 留ㅼ슦 ?ш큵?곸씠硫?媛꾨왂??湲곗닠?섏뼱 ?덉뼱, 愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?숈옉 議곌굔?대굹, 寃곌낵 ?깆씠 紐낇솗???쒗쁽?섏? 紐삵븯??臾몄젣?먯쓣 媛吏怨??덈떎. ?먰븳 愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?숈쟻 ?뱀꽦? ?λ룞???뱀꽦?몄뿉 ?쒓컙吏???뱀꽦???곕씪 ?숈옉 ?덉감媛 ?щ씪吏????덈떎. 諛섎났?곸씠怨?二쇨린?곸씤 ?뺤쟻???쒓컙 湲곕뀗 肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲???ㅻⅨ 愿由ъ옄???띿꽦???곕씪 ?ъ슜沅뚰븳??寃곗젙?섍굅???뱀젙湲곌컙 ?숈븞?먮쭔 沅뚰븳??遺?щ릺???숈쟻???쒓컙媛쒕뀗??泥④??쒕떎硫?愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?λ룞???뱀꽦???붿슧 媛뺥솕?????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???뺤쟻???쒓컙愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?쒕룞???쒖뼱?섎뒗 ?쒖?沅뚭퀬?덉쓽 ?ㅼ?以꾨쭅 愿由ш컼泥댁뿉 ?숈쟻???뱀꽦??異붽??섏??쇰ŉ 愿由ш컼泥?湲곗닠???쒖???GDMO ?쒗쁽踰뺤뿉 ?섑빐 ?숈쟻?뱀꽦??吏?먰븯???ㅼ?以꾨쭅 愿由ш컼泥대? 湲곗닠?섏??? ?먰븳 愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?숈쟻 ?뱀꽦 湲곗닠???꾪빐 ?덈∼寃??뺤쓽?? ?숈쟻 ?쒓컙吏??湲곕뒫??異붽???BDL???댁슜?섏뿬 ?숈옉?덉감瑜?湲곗닠?섏??? 洹몃━怨??숈쟻 ?쒓컙吏???뱀꽦??吏?먰븯??愿由ш컼泥대? ?由ъ옄 愿由?湲곕뒫 紐⑤뜽???곸슜?섏뿬 泥닿퀎?곸씠怨??뺥삎?곸씤 湲곗닠諛⑸쾿?꾩쓣 ?쒖떆?쒕떎.Recommendations of ITU-T and ISO stipulate the managerial abstraction of static and dynamic characteristics of network elements, management functions as well as management communication protocol. The current recommendations provide the formal mechanism for the structural parts of managed objects such as managed object class and attributes. But the current description method does not provide the formal mechanism for the behavioral characteristics of managed objects in clear manner but in natural language form, the complete specification of managed objects is not fully described. Also, the behaviour of managed objects is affected by their temporal and active properties. While the temporal properties representing periodic or repetitive internals are to describe managed objects behaviour in rather strict way, it will be more powerful if more dynamic temporal properties determined by external conditions are added to managed objects. In this paper, we added dynamic features to scheduling managed objects, and described, in GDMO, scheduling managed objects that support dynamic features. We also described behaviour of managed objects in newly defined BDL that has dynamic temporal properties. This paper showed that dynamic temporal managed objects provide a systematic and formal method in agent management function model.?ㅼ감??吏由ъ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥???꾪븳 ??κ린踰?諛?遺꾨━????κ뎄議?
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 諛뺣룞?? [2000]

In this paper, schemes on effectively collecting big data generated from social network service are proposed. Then, follower reaction index is defined as a weighted sum of likes, replies, and shares on posts by a specific user, and influencer is extracted by using the follower reaction index. Finally, the superiority of the proposed influencer extraction scheme is validated by quantitative comparison with real-time issue keyword of portal sites and qualitative comparison by applying natural language processing based unstructured text keyword analysis methodology.?붿빟 Abstract I. ?쒕줎 II. ?쒖븞 ?쒖뒪??III. 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 ?섏쭛 諛⑹븞Ka????꾩꽦?듭떊 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕 ?ㅺ퀎瑜??꾪븳 ?꾩꽦?듭떊 留곹겕 媛뺤슦媛먯뇿 遺꾩꽍

These writer-critics started appearing in the literary review sections of two major magazines of the time: Kaebyok (New Dawn, 1920-26) and Choson Mundan (Choson Literary World, 1924-27). Lacking any professional training, what critical terms did they utilize in their reviews? Here, I conduct a detailed investigation into the language they used, through the method of computational linguistics. 1) This article extracts frequently appearing words and phrases associated with literary criticism, identifying co-occurring words with an algorithm called Word2Vec which locates words that are physically distant but semantically close. 2) This allows the magazines to be closely scrutinized, tracing the contexts of literary reviews, and demonstrating the different ways in which the selected terms were used This article will, I believe, contribute to revealing some hitherto forgotten terms in the history of literary criticism which were in active use by the writer-critics in the early stages of modern literature in Korea.硫붿씠濡쒖퓼???롥뀷鹽? 吏?앹씤???쇱쓽???섑????ㅼ뼇?깃낵 怨듭〈??臾몄젣

The coding process has been done manually. Such manual work is very labor and cost intensive and it usually causes inconsistent results. This paper proposes an automatic coding system based on example-based learning. The system converts natural language input into corresponding numeric codes using code generation system trained by example-based learning after applying manually built rules. As experimental results performed with training data consisted of 400,000 records and 260 manual rules, the proposed system showed about 76.69% and 99.68% accuracy for occupational code classification and industrial code classification, respectively.?⑹븸?먯꽌 Zn(II)?댁삩怨?tetraaza 嫄곕?怨좊━ 由ш컙?쒖쓽 李⑸Ъ
?쒓뎅?고븰湲곗닠?숉쉶, 怨좉킅?? [2006] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

ITU-T, ISO ?깆뿉 ?섑빐 ?쒖젙???쒖?沅뚭퀬?덉? ?듭떊留?援ъ꽦?붿냼?ㅺ컙???⑥닚???듭떊洹쒖튃???뺤쓽?섎뒗 寃??몄뿉 ?듭떊留?愿由ъ뿉 ?꾩슂???먯썝?ㅼ쓽 ?띿꽦怨??숈쟻 ?뱀꽦?????異붿긽?붾맂 ?쒗쁽, 洹몃━怨??듭떊留?援ъ꽦?붿냼?ㅼ뿉 ???愿由ш린?μ쓣 ?ш큵?곸쑝濡?洹쒖젙?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 洹몃윭???쒖??듭떊留?援ъ꽦?붿냼以?愿由ш컼泥댁뿉 ?숈옉???곹뼢??誘몄튂???λ룞???붿씤?ㅺ낵 ?숈옉?덉감 諛?洹몄뿉 ?곕Ⅸ ?듭? 諛쒖깮 ?깆쓽 怨쇱젙?ㅼ씠 ''''BEHAVIOUR'''' ?쒗뵆由용궡???먯뿰?대? ?댁슜?섏뿬 留ㅼ슦 ?ш큵?곸씠硫?媛꾨왂??湲곗닠?섏뼱 ?덉뼱, 愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?숈옉 議곌굔?대굹 ?덉감, 寃곌낵 ?깆씠 紐낇솗???쒗쁽?섏? 紐삵븯??臾몄젣?먯쓣 媛吏怨??덈떎. ?먰븳 愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?숈쟻 ?뱀꽦? ?λ룞???뱀꽦 ?몄뿉 ?쒓컙吏???뱀꽦???곕씪 ?숈옉 ?덉감媛 ?щ씪吏????덈떎. 諛섎났?곸씠怨?二쇨린?곸씤 ?뺤쟻???쒓컙 媛쒕뀗 肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲???ㅻⅨ 愿由ъ옄???띿꽦???곕씪 ?ъ슜沅뚰븳??寃곗젙?섍굅???뱀젙湲곌컙 ?숈븞?먮쭔 沅뚰븳??遺?щ릺???숈쟻???쒓컙媛쒕뀗??泥④??쒕떎硫?愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?λ룞???뱀꽦???붿슧 媛뺥솕?????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???뺤쟻???쒓컙愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?쒕룞???쒖뼱?섎뒗 ?쒖?沅뚭퀬?덉쓽 ?ㅼ?以꾨쭅 愿由ш컼泥댁뿉 ?숈쟻???뱀꽦??異붽??섏??쇰ŉ 愿由ш컼泥?湲곗닠???쒖???GDMO ?쒗쁽踰뺤뿉 ?섑빐 ?숈쟻?뱀꽦??吏?먰븯???ㅼ?以꾨쭅 愿由ш컼泥대? 湲곗닠?섏??? ?먰븳 愿由ш컼泥댁쓽 ?숈쟻 ?뱀꽦??湲곗닠???꾪빐 ?덈∼寃??뺤쓽?? ?숈쟻 ?쒓컙吏??湲곕뒫??異붽???BDL???댁슜?섏뿬 ?숈옉?덉감瑜?湲곗닠?섏??? 洹몃━怨??숈쟻?쒓컙吏???뱀꽦??吏?먰븯??愿由ш컼泥대? ?由ъ옄 愿由?湲곕뒫 紐⑤뜽???곸슜?섏뿬 泥닿퀎?곸씠怨??뺥삎?곸씤 湲곗닠諛⑸쾿?꾩쓣 ?쒖떆?쒕떎.Recommendations of ITU-T and ISO stipulate the managerial abstraction of static and dynamic characteristics of network elements, management functions as well as management communication protocol. The current recommendations provide the formal mechanism for the structural parts of managed objects such as managed object class and attributes. But the current description method does not provide the formal mechanism for the behavioral characteristics of managed objects in clear manner but in natural language form, the complete specification of managed objects is not fully described. Also, the behaviour of managed objects is affected by their temporal and active properties. While the temporal properties representing periodic or repetitive intervals are to describe managed objects'''' behaviour in rather strict way, it will be more powerful if more dynamic temporal properties determined by external conditions are added to managed objects. In this paper, we added dynamic features to scheduling managed objects, and described, in GDMO, scheduling managed objects that support dynamic features. We also described behaviour of managed objects in newly defined BDL that has dynamic temporal properties. This paper showed that dynamic temporal managed objects provide a systematic and formal method in agent management function model.?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪 / ?ㅼ감??吏由ъ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥???꾪븳 ??κ린踰?諛?遺꾨━????κ뎄議?
?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, 諛뺣룞??Dong Seon Park), [2000]

吏湲덇퉴吏 ?띿뒪?몄뿉 ????댁슜蹂몄쐞 寃??湲곕쾿??留롮씠 ?쒖븞?섏뿀?? ?곗씠?踰좎씠??遺꾩빞?먯꽌??洹?以묒뿉?쒕룄 ?붿빟 ?붿씪 湲곕쾿??二쇰줈 ?ъ슜?쒕떎. 洹몃윭??醫낅옒???곷Ц???⑥뼱 ?꾩＜ 諛⑹떇?쇰줈 ?몃뜳?깊빐 ???붿빟 ?붿씪 湲곕쾿? 蹂듯빀紐낆궗媛 ?щ윭媛吏 ?꾩뼱?곌린瑜?媛吏????덈뒗 ?쒓? ?섍꼍?먯꽌??吏덉쓽??遺?⑸릺???띿뒪?몃? 紐⑤몢 寃?됲븯吏 紐삵븯??寃쎌슦媛 留롮씠 諛쒖깮?쒕떎.
???쇰Ц?먯꽌??2?뚯젅 ?⑦꽩???댁슜?섏뿬 ?꾩뼱?곌린??愿怨꾩뾾??愿?⑤맂 ?쒓? ?띿뒪?몃뱾??紐⑤몢 寃?됲븷 ???덈뒗 ?쒓??붿빟 異붿텧 湲곕쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ??諛⑸쾿???ъ슜?섎뒗 ?먯뿰??泥섎━??怨좉툒???꾩슂媛 ?녿떎. ??湲곕쾿怨??⑥뼱 ?꾩＜ 湲곕쾿媛꾩쓽 ?섑븰??遺꾩꽍怨??ㅽ뿕???섑븳 鍮꾧탳瑜??듯븯???쒖븞 諛⑸쾿???깅뒫??蹂댁씤??Many content-based text retrieval methods have been proposed. Among them, signature file methods are generally used in the field of databases. However, traditional word-oriented signature file methods cannot retrieve all the relevant text items in the Korean text environment where a compound noun can have variable word-spacing forms.
This paper describes a Korean signature extraction method using 2-syllable patterns that can retrieve all the relevant text items irrespective of the word-spacing forms. This method does not require high level natural language analysis. The advantages of this method are presented by mathematical analysis and experimental performance comparison with a word-oriented methods.?붿빟 ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?곷Ц ?붿빟 ?붿씪 諛⑸쾿 3. 2?뚯젅 ?⑦꽩???댁슜???쒓? ?붿빟蹂묐젹泥섎━瑜??꾪븳 ?ㅼ뼇???⑥닔???섑뻾諛⑹떇??媛뽰텣 ?쇳빀???꾨줈洹몃옒諛?紐⑤뜽怨??몄뼱

???쇰Ц? ?섎━?쇰━瑜??곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ쓽 ?ㅺ퀎???묒슜?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?ㅻ，?? ???묒슜? 蹂댄넻???곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ? ?곗뿰???곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ뿉 ???곸슜?쒕떎. ?섎━?쇰━???곗씠?踰좎씠???곌뎄瑜??꾪븳 媛쒕뀗?곸씤 ????쒓났?쒕떎. 泥섏쓬 遺遺꾩뿉?쒕뒗 ?쇰━? ?곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ????곹샇愿寃뚯뿉 ??댁꽌 以묒젏???붾떎. ?쇰━???뚮줈洹몃옒諛띿뼵?대줈?? 吏덉쓽?대줈???곗뿰???묒슜???섍린?꾪빐?? ?곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ쓽 ?쒖닔?깆쓣 蹂댁〈?섍린 ?꾪빐?? 遺???뺣낫瑜??ㅻ（湲??꾪븳 ?뺤떇???쒓났?섍린 ?꾪빐?? ?ъ슜?섏뼱 吏덉닔 ?덈떎. ?쇰━ ?곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ쓽 ?뺤꽦怨??먯뿰??吏덉쓽 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ??댁꽌 湲곗닠?쒕떎.This paper presents the application of the mathematical logic to the design of databases.
the application is for the conveltional databases and the deductive databases. mathematical logic provides a conceptual framework for the study of databases.
On the first part I concentrate on the interaction between logic and databases.
Logic can be used as a programming language, as a query language, to do deductive actions, to maintain the integrity of databases, to provide a formalism for handling negative information.
On the later part, I descrive the evolution of logic databases and the natural language query system.Note on Quaternionic CR-Submanifolds of a Quaternionic Projective Space

?곌뎄 寃곌낵, ?꾨Ц媛 紐⑤뱢?먯꽌???ㅼ뼇???숈뒿 怨쇱젣?ㅼ쓣 援ы쁽?섍퀬 ?쒗쁽?????덈뒗 諛⑸쾿?????媛?μ꽦???쒖떆?섏뿀?쇰ŉ, 援먯닔 紐⑤뱢? ?ㅼ뼇???숈뒿 ?먮━? ?꾨왂???ъ슜, ?멸컙 援먯닔?먭? 援ъ궗?섎뒗 ?붾쾿??愿???꾨왂???꾩슂??寃껋쑝濡??섑??щ떎. ?명꽣?섏씠??紐⑤뱢?먯꽌??鍮꾩뼵?댁쟻 而ㅻ??덉??댁뀡 諛⑹븞???섏슜 諛⑸쾿怨??由ъ씤(agent)???쒖슜?섎뒗 媛?μ꽦???쒖떆?섏?怨? ?숈뒿??紐⑤뱢?먯꽌???쒖닠??紐⑤뜽怨??덉륫??紐⑤뜽???꾩슂?? 洹몃━怨??쒖뒪?쒖뿉 諛섏쁺 媛?ν븳 ?ㅼ뼇???숈뒿???뱀꽦?????怨좊젮媛 ?꾩슂??寃껋쑝濡??섑??щ떎. 留덉?留됱쑝濡?紐⑤뱺 紐⑤뱢? SCORM ?쒖??덉쓣 ?섏슜?섏뿬 媛쒕컻?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 而⑦뀗痢좎쓽 ?ъ궗?⑷? 媛쒕컻???⑥쑉?깆쓣 ?믪씠???꾨왂???꾩닔?곸씤 寃껋쑝濡??곌뎄 寃곌낵 ?꾩텧?섏뿀??As computer and software technology have remarkably developed, intelligent tutoring system (ITS) has been proposed as a major technological advance that can offer significant support for learning. ITS can be an advanced learning system that mimics human tutor by adapting its instructional approach to each individual students needs (Ulusar, 2000). In order to develop ITS to provide individualized instruction, the computer should be able to diagnose learner responses, level of knowledge, level of skills, and the pattern of progress during learning through computer, and to deliver the most suitable instructional contents in the most effective and efficient way. The conventional ITS, however, has not been able to provide the aforementioned services due to the difficulty in communication with computers, the lack of practical knowledge and techniques to diagnose student learning problems, and the limitation of time and cost.
In recent years there has been a rapid increase in the capability of computer technology, and it is feasible again to develop ITS. In addition, virtual reality (VR) technology has supported the human interaction with computers in a easier way. With the consideration of the current advances, it is time to investigate potentialities of ITS in the virtual reality learning environments.
The paper reviews the definition, concept, feature, and components of ITS to understand the adaptive instructional system. The paper also reviews Steve (Soar Training Expert For Virtual Environments) and Jacob. They are VR programs employing the concept of ITS. Steve employs apprenticeship model to explore the use of intelligent tutoring system in VR, and Jacob involves an integration of tutoring system and agent technology.
The study suggests that various ways to present different types of instructional tasks should be integrated in the expert module. In the tutorial module, various learning principles and instructional strategies should be employed. Furthermore, it is suggested to apply the speech strategies of human tutor depending upon the student answers. In the interface module how to develop and use the educational agents should be investigated more deeply, and it is suggested to accept both verbal and nonverbal communications. In the student module, it is suggested to develop the descriptive and predictive model based on the individual student differences. Finally, all the modules should be developed according to SCORM (Share of Contents Object Reference Model) standards to re-use effectively and efficiently.
Since using computers in educational settings, many educators have been interested in adaptive instructional systems. Recently rapid technology development stimulates to look into ITS with different insights. In the future, more research works will be needed to utilize ITS in the learning process and verify the effects and issues of ITS in the virtual reality learning environments.媛???꾩떎 ?숈뒿 ?섍꼍?먯꽌 吏?ν삎 ?숈뒿 泥닿퀎(ITS: Intelligent Tutoring System) 援ъ텞??????대줎??怨좎같
?댄솕?ъ옄??숆탳 援먯쑁怨쇳븰?곌뎄?? ?쒖젙??Jung-Sun Hahn), [2003]

理쒓렐 諛섎젮?숇Ъ???ㅼ슦??媛?뺤씠 留롮븘吏硫댁꽌 諛섎젮?숇Ъ怨?愿?⑤맂 ?쒕퉬???섏슂媛 ?섏뼱?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 洹?以??좎셿?숇Ъ??嫄닿컯 쨌 ?섎즺? 愿?⑤맂 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ뒗 ?뱁엳 ?꾨Ц?깆씠 媛뺥븳 遺꾩빞???숇Ъ蹂묒썝???꾨땶 怨녹뿉???쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?쒓났諛쏄린 ?섎뱾?? ?먰븳 ?섎즺 愿??遺꾩빞?먯꽌???숇Ъ??利앹긽???곕씪 留욎땄???쒕퉬?ㅺ? ?쒓났?섏뼱?쇳븯湲??뚮Ц???ъ슜?먮줈遺??諛쏆? ?낅젰???곸젅??遺꾩꽍???뺥솗???뺣낫瑜??쒓났?섎뒗 寃껋씠 以묒슂?섎떎. ?댁? 媛숈씠 ?꾨Ц?깆쓣 ?꾩슂濡??섎뒗 遺꾩빞??????붾（?섏쑝濡?蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???ъ슜?먯쓽 利앹긽 ?낅젰???곕씪 ?곸젅??異붾줎 怨쇱젙??嫄곗퀜 吏꾨떒?섍퀬 ?꾨Ц?곸씤 吏?앹쓣 ?쒓났?섎뒗 ?꾨Ц媛?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 ?ъ슜???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ъ슜?먮뒗 ?먯뿰?대? ?댁슜?섏뿬 梨꾪똿 ?뺥깭濡??쒖뒪?쒓낵 ?뚰넻?⑥쑝濡쒖꽌 ?뺣낫 ?쒓났???섏썡?깆쓣 蹂댁옣??肉??꾨땲???ъ슜?먮줈遺??寃곌낵??????쇰뱶諛깆쓣 諛쏆븘 異붾줎???쒖슜?섏뿬 吏꾨떒???뺥솗???μ긽??袁?쒕떎.Demand for services related to pets is increasing recently as more families raise their companion animals. Since the expertise of the services related to health and medical care of pets are strongly required, it is difficult to provide services in places other than veterinary hospitals. Also, it is important to analyze the input received from the user to provide accurate information because customized services should be provided according to the symptoms of the animal in the medical field. In this study, we propose the use of expert system that provides expert knowledge through appropriate inference process according to the symptom entered by the users. The effectiveness of information provision can be ensured by communicating with the system in chat mode using natural language and the accuracy of diagnosis can be improved by getting feedback on the results from the user and utilizing it for inference.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 愿?⑥뿰援??? ?좉껄 嫄닿컯愿由??쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒖슂A Study on the Preference and Recognition of Game Character by Expression Characteristics: Focusing on League of Legends
?쒓뎅?붿??몄퐯?먯툩?숉쉶, 諛뺥삙誘? [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

?⑦넧濡쒖?(Ontology)???щ엺??媛꾩쓽 ?뺥솗???섏궗?뚰넻??媛?ν븯寃??섍퀬 ?쒖뒪???ъ씠???곹샇?댁슜?깆쓣 ?ъ꽦?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?꾧뎄濡쒖꽌 ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 留롮? 湲곕?瑜?諛쏄퀬 ?덈뒗 湲곗닠?대떎. ?⑦넧濡쒖????щ엺?ㅼ씠 ?몄긽????섏뿬 蹂닿퀬 ?ｊ퀬 ?먮겮怨??앷컖?섎뒗 寃껋뿉 ??섏뿬 ?쒕줈 媛꾩쓽 ?좊줎???듯븯???⑹쓽瑜??대， 諛붾? 媛쒕뀗?곸씠怨?而댄벂?곗뿉???ㅻ０ ???덈뒗 ?뺥깭濡??쒗쁽??紐⑤뜽濡? 媛쒕뀗????낆씠???ъ슜?곸쓽 ?쒖빟議곌굔?ㅼ쓣 紐낆떆?곸쑝濡??뺤쓽??湲곗닠濡??뺤쓽???섏엳?? ?⑦넧濡쒖????쇰떒 ?⑹쓽??吏?앹쓣 ?섑??대?濡??대뒓 媛쒖씤?먭쾶 援?븳?섎뒗 寃껋씠 ?꾨땲??洹몃９ 援ъ꽦?먯씠 紐⑤몢 ?숈쓽?섎뒗 媛쒕뀗?대떎. 洹몃━怨??꾨줈洹몃옩???댄빐?????덉뼱???섎?濡??щ윭媛吏 ?뺥삎?붽? 議댁옱?쒕떎. ?⑦넧濡쒖????먯뿰?댁쓽 湲곌퀎 踰덉뿭怨??멸났吏??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?쒖슜?섎ŉ, 理쒓렐?먮뒗 ?뱀젙 遺꾩빞???명꽣???먯썝怨?洹??ъ씠??愿怨꾨? 湲곗닠?섎뒗 ?⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??ъ슜?섎뒗 ?쒕㎤???밴낵 ?닿쾬?먯꽌 ?뚯깮???쒕㎤?????쒕퉬???깆쓽 ?듭떖 ?붿냼濡쒖꽌 二쇰ぉ諛쏄퀬 ?덇퀬, ?꾩옱 而댄벂?곕? ?쒖슜??吏?앷낵 ?뺣낫 泥섎━瑜??꾪빐 ?⑦넧濡쒖?瑜?援ъ텞?섍퀬 ?쒖슜?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?곌뎄媛 ?대（?댁?怨??덉쑝???꾩옱源뚯????⑦넧濡쒖? 媛쒕컻 諛⑸쾿 諛??⑦넧濡쒖? 援ъ텞 ?꾧뎄???⑦넧濡쒖? 媛쒕컻 紐⑹쟻???곕씪 ?쒗븳?곸씤 遺遺꾩뿉???곌뎄?섏뼱 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 洹몃윭誘濡?媛쒕컻?섎젮???⑦넧濡쒖? ?뱀꽦???곕Ⅸ ?곸젅???⑦넧濡쒖? 援ъ텞 ?꾨줈?몄뒪? ?꾧뎄媛 ?꾩슂?섎떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??李쎌뾽 ?쒖뒪???щ?瑜??듯븳 ?⑦넧濡쒖? 媛쒕컻 諛?援ъ텞???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??댁슜??李쎌뾽 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 媛쒕컻? 李쎌뾽 ?곸뿭?먯꽌 ?쒕퉬???쒖뒪??援ы쁽???좊?媛 ??寃껋씠??Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 2.1 ?⑦넧濡쒖? 媛쒕컻 ?꾧뎄 2.2 ?⑦넧濡쒖? 援ъ텞 諛⑸쾿ERP ? 議곗쭅 媛꾩쓽 Fit 怨?Customization ??ERP 援ы쁽 ?깃났??誘몄튂???곹뼢: 議곗쭅 硫붾え由??대줎??諛뷀깢?쇰줈

寃뚯엫?먯꽌 ??붾뒗 湲곕낯?곸씤 ?뺣낫?꾨떖 ?섎떒?쇰줈?쒖쓽 ??븷 肉??꾨땲??寃뚯엫??吏꾪뻾??愿?⑦븯???ㅽ넗由ы뀛留?story-telling)?????붿냼媛 ?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ??붾? ?듯빐 寃뚯엫????닿?????뷀삎 ?대뱶踰ㅼ쿂 寃뚯엫?먯꽌 ??붾뒗 而ㅻ??덉??댁뀡 洹??댁긽????븷???섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫?MMORPG寃뚯엫?먯꽌???섏뒪??Quest)??諛쒖깮 諛?臾몄젣?닿껐??????쒗븳???뺣낫瑜??쒓났?섎뒗 ??븷源뚯? ?섑뻾?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 紐곗엯???좊룄?섎뒗 留ㅼ슦 以묒슂???붿냼?댁?留??꾩옱源뚯???寃뚯엫 ??NPC?????붾뒗 湲곗〈??留덈젴??寃뚯엫?쒕굹由ъ삤??洹쇨굅?섏뿬 ?⑦꽩???섑븳 ?⑥“濡쒖슫 ?대깽???뺤떇?쇰줈 援ъ꽦?섏뼱 ?붿쓣 肉먯씠?? ?댁뿉 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??醫 ???ъ떎?곸씤 而ㅻ??덉??댁뀡???꾪빐 ?멸났吏??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?먯뿰??泥섎━?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?묒슜????붿떆?ㅽ뀥?????遺꾩꽍怨??④퍡 ?대? 寃뚯엫???곸슜?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿??????곌뎄?섏???Communication is an element of the story-telling in processing of the game as well as basic role of information exchange. In case of communication-based adventure games which are processed through communication, the communication is playing the role beyond its basic role up to providing a limited information on quests and solutions in Massively Multiplay Online Role Playing Game(MMORPG). Even though the communication is one of most important element for absorbtion into game, current communications with Non Playable Characters in games are just monotonous event-driven method following pattern based on prepared game scenario. In this research, we have analyzed natural language processing systems which are being used in the area of Artificial Intelligence for the purpose of more realistic communications in games, and have studied methods to apply these communications on games.?붿빟 Abstract ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 蹂몃줎 ?? 寃곕줎MMORPG ?ъ슜???쒕??덉씠??媛쒕컻

蹂멸퀬???ㅻЦ??諛곌꼍 ?숈뒿?먯쓽 ?댁쨷?몄뼱 援먯쑁??珥덉젏??留욎떠 ?곌뎄 ?깃낵???꾩＜?뚯? ?꾩냽 ?곌뎄??諛⑺뼢?깆쓣 議곕쭩?섍퀬???섏??? 蹂??곌뎄??2018??8?붾????먮즺 ?섏쭛諛?遺꾩꽍???쒖옉?섏??쇰ŉ 2019??1?붽퉴吏 ?숈닠?곌뎄?뺣낫?쒕퉬??RISS)瑜??듯빐 寃?됰맂 ?ㅻЦ??愿???댁쨷?몄뼱 援먯쑁 遺꾩빞???쇰Ц????곸쑝濡??곌뎄 ?숉뼢???뚯븙?섏??? 援ъ껜 ?곸쑝濡쒕뒗 ?섎떎臾명솕??諛??섏씠以묒뼵??援먯쑁?숈씠?쇰뒗 二쇱젣?대? 以묒떖?쇰줈 2008?꾨???2018??源뚯? 吏꾪뻾???곌뎄??????곕룄蹂? ?곌뎄 諛⑸쾿 諛??곌뎄 ??? ?곌뎄?댁슜???곕씪 遺꾩꽍 ?섏??? 蹂멸퀬??遺꾩꽍 ????쇰Ц???곌뎄?댁슜??珥덉젏???먭퀬 援먯닔?? ?뺤콉 諛??꾪솴怨??몄뼱沅?蹂??곌뎄 ?숉뼢???댄룉?? 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿? 遺꾩꽍???洹쇨굅??湲곗〈???곗뿭???묎렐 諛⑹떇怨??붾텋???쇰Ц ?듭떖?댁뿉 ????먯뿰??泥섎━ 怨쇱젙??嫄곗퀜 ?곌뎄 怨쇱젙??媛앷??깆쓣 ?쒓퀬?섍퀬 ?곗뿭??遺꾩꽍寃곌낵瑜?洹?⑺븯??? 遺꾩꽍寃곌낵, ?꾩쭅 援먯쑁???쇱꽑?먯꽌 ?ㅽ뻾 媛?ν븳 援먯닔??諛??댁슜?숈뿉 ????곌뎄媛 誘몄쭊?⑥쓣 ?????덉뿀怨??꾩쭅 ?ㅻЦ???곸뿭???댁쨷?몄뼱 援먯쑁???ㅼ젣媛 援ъ텞?섏? ?딆? ?ㅼ젙?댁?留?蹂멸퀬??遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵瑜??듯빐 ?ㅻЦ??援ъ꽦?먮뱾???댁쨷?몄뼱 援먯쑁??????꾩슂??諛?以묒슂?깆씠 異⑸텇???뺤씤?섏뿀怨??꾩냽 ?곌뎄??諛⑺뼢?깆뿉 ????ㅺ컖?곸쑝濡??쒖븞?섏??뚯뿉 ?섎?瑜??????덈떎.This study focuses on the bilingual education of multicultural background learners and examines the current status of research achievement and the direction of subsequent studies. This study began data collection and analysis in August 2018, and analyzed the research trends of papers on bilingual education related to multicultural fields until January 2019 through the Research Information Sharing Service (RISS). Specifically, the research focused on the keywords ?쁬ulticultural and ?쁞ilingual education conducted from 2008 to 2018 and carried out research according to the year, research method, research subjects, and research contents. This paper focuses on the research contents of the papers, and examines the trends in curriculum, policies and status, and research trends by nationality. The analysis method used the existing deductive approach based on the analysis framework. Then, through the natural language processing method, the objectivity of the research process was enhanced and this method induces the result of deductive analysis. As a result of the analysis, it can be seen that there is not much research on practical parts and content studies at the education field. The actual situation of bilingual education in multicultural areas has not been established yet. But this study confirms the need for this type of research and proposes various directions for subsequent study.?? ??濡??? ?좏뻾?곌뎄 ?? ?곌뎄 諛⑸쾿 ?? 遺꾩꽍寃곌낵 ?? 寃곕줎 諛??쒖뼵?뚯냽 ?숆탳???숆탳??젰??묒뿭?됱뿉 ????몄떇??以묓븰?앹쓽 ?숆탳?앺솢留뚯”?꾩뿉 誘몄튂???곹뼢
?숈뒿?먯쨷?ш탳怨쇨탳?≫븰?? 源?섏쁺(Kim Nayoung), [2019] [KCI?깆옱]
????곷Ц???좎쓽쨌?좊줎?숈뒿?먯꽌 ?깆같 ?좏삎 吏묐떒蹂??숈뒿 寃곌낵 遺꾩꽍怨??숈뒿 ?④낵 諛륁젣?덉궗??뿉 ???吏덉쟻 遺꾩꽍

蹂??곌뎄??紐⑹쟻? ?뚮퉬?먮뱾???뱀젙 湲곗뾽?????蹂댁씠肄㏃뿉 李몄뿬?섎룄濡??섎뒗 ?숆린?붿씤怨?蹂댁씠肄?李몄뿬??遺?뺤쟻 ?곹뼢??誘몄튂???듭젣?붿씤??洹쒕챸?⑥뿉 ?덉뼱 湲곗〈???곌뎄????ㅻⅨ 愿?먯쑝濡??묎렐?섏뿬 ?뚮퉬?먮뱾??媛吏怨??덈뒗 ?ㅼ뼇???숆린?ㅼ쓣 ?꾩텧?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?먰븳, 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???뚮퉬?먯쓽 ?됰룞 ?숆린瑜?遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?덈줈??諛⑸쾿???듯빐 蹂댁씠肄?李몄뿬 ?숆린?붿씤怨??듭젣?붿씤???꾩텧?섏뿬 ?뚮퉬?먯쓽 蹂댁씠肄??됰룞 ?곌뎄???숇Ц???곸뿭???볧엳怨?蹂댁씠肄?二쇱껜? 湲곗뾽???꾪븳 ?ㅻТ?곸씤 ?쒖궗?먯쓣 ?쒓났?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 媛?곸쓽 蹂댁씠肄??쒕굹由ъ삤瑜??묒꽦 ????숈깮 珥?243紐낆쓣 ??곸쑝濡?硫댁젒???뺤떇?쇰줈 ?몄텧??蹂댁씠肄?硫붿떆吏?????蹂댁씠肄?李몄뿬 ?먮뒗 遺덉갭 ?щ?? 蹂댁씠肄??섎룄?????援ъ껜???댁쑀瑜?鍮꾩젙?뺤쟻 ?먮즺???뺥깭濡??섏쭛?섏뿬 遺꾩꽍???댁슜?섏??? ?섏쭛???먮즺???먯뿰??泥섎━怨쇱젙??嫄곗튇 ???꾨줈洹몃옒諛??꾧뎄 R(version 3.4.4)???댁슜?섏뿬 ?띿뒪??遺꾩꽍(text analysis), ?곌껐留?遺꾩꽍(network analysis) 洹몃━怨??곌껐留?吏묐떒??遺꾩꽍(network clustering)???ㅼ떆?섎뒗 3?④퀎 怨쇱젙???듯빐 遺꾩꽍?섏뿀??
遺꾩꽍寃곌낵 泥レ㎏, 蹂댁씠肄?李몄뿬 諛?遺덉갭???숆린???곹뼢??誘몄튌 ???덈뒗 ?좎옱???붿씤???뺤씤???듯빐 蹂댁씠肄?李몄뿬 吏묐떒怨?鍮꾩갭??吏묐떒 媛꾩뿉 ?섑??섎뒗 李⑥씠瑜??뺤씤?섏?怨? ?섏㎏, 蹂댁씠肄?李몄뿬 吏묐떒怨?鍮꾩갭??吏묐떒???숆린?붿씤?쇰줈??以묒슂???섎?瑜?媛吏???띿뒪??keyword)???뱀꽦?????遺꾩꽍???ㅼ떆?섏??? ?뗭㎏, ?곌껐留?吏묐떒??遺꾩꽍???듯빐 理쒖쥌?곸쑝濡?蹂댁씠肄?李몄뿬 ?숆린?붿씤 11媛? ?듭젣?붿씤 9媛쒕? ?꾩텧?섏뿬 ?쒖떆?섏??? 蹂??곌뎄??寃곌낵瑜?諛뷀깢?쇰줈 寃곕줎 遺遺꾩뿉??3?④퀎 ?곌뎄??嫄몄퀜 ?곗텧??寃곌낵?ㅼ뿉 ????숇Ц???쇱쓽? ?ㅻТ???쒖궗?먯쓣 ?쒓났?섍퀬 ?덈떎.The purpose of this study is to identify the motivational and suppressor factors that influence consumers??boycott participation. In contrast to previous research, this study used new methodological approaches in the social sciences to understand consumers??inner thoughts and the reasons behind their boycott decisions.
Qualitative data were collected from undergraduate students through multiple interviews. A fictitious boycott message was shown to them; additionally, a record was made of every individual?셲 decision to participate in the ongoing boycott and the specific reasons behind that decision. The qualitative data thus collected were transformed into electronic inputs and analyzed using the programming language R (version 3.4.4). A three-step approach was employed in this study: (1) a text analysis of the responses submitted by boycott participants and non-participants, (2) a network analysis of their decision-making process, and (3) a clustering of the two groups to identify motivational and suppressor factors.
First, the text analysis of the responses submitted by participants and non-participants show meaningful differences between the two groups. Second, the output of the network analysis yields key words that have the potential to influence decisions relating to consumers??boycott participation. Third, clustering analysis reveals 11 motivational factors and 9 suppresser factors that affect consumers??boycott decisions. Based on these results, academic discussions and managerial implications for both consumerists and corporations are provided in the Conclusion.?붿빟 ?? ?쒕줎 ?? ?대줎??諛곌꼍 諛??곌뎄臾몄젣 ?ㅼ젙 ?? ?곌뎄諛⑸쾿 ?? ?곌뎄寃곌낵?쒓뎅???뚮퉬?앺솢吏??媛쒖꽑 諛???뱁솕
?쒓뎅?뚮퉬?먯썝, ?⑸?吏?Whang Meejin), [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

In this research, it has been shown that how the computer can recognize and understand spoken natural language and its symbolization using VoiceXML and Grammar Specific Language in developing telephone based conversational automatic speech recognition flight information system. ?쒕㎤???뱀? ?⑥닚??臾몄꽌?ㅼ쓽 留곹겕媛 ?꾨땶 臾몄꽌?ㅼ쓽 ?섎?? 愿怨꾨? ?쒗쁽?섎뒗 ?뱀쑝濡??뚰봽?몄썾???먯씠?꾪듃媛 ?댄빐?????덈룄濡?援ъ꽦?섏뼱 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 寃?됰갑?앹? ?⑦넧濡쒖?湲곕컲??異붾줎???듯븳 ?쒕㎤??寃?됰갑踰뺤쑝濡??ㅼ쓬怨?媛숈? ?뱀쭠??媛뽯뒗?? 泥レ㎏, 寃?됲궎?뚮뱶? 臾몄꽌???ㅼ썙?쒓? ?ㅻⅤ?붾씪???섎??곸쑝濡?媛숈쑝硫??⑦넧濡쒖???異붾줎???듯빐 寃?됱씠 媛?ν븯寃??쒕떎. ?섏㎏, 洹쒖튃湲곕컲??蹂?섍린媛 ?쒕줈 ?ㅻⅨ ?⑦넧濡쒖???而⑥뀎???뺥솗??留ㅼ튂(exact match)媛 ?꾨땲?대룄 ?좎궗??而⑥뀎?쇰줈 異붾줎?????덇쾶 ?쒕떎. ?뗭㎏, ?⑦넧濡쒖?媛 寃???ㅼ썙?쒖쓽 ?섎?瑜??쒕졆?섍쾶 ?뺤쓽?????덉쑝誘濡??⑥닚???ㅼ썙??留ㅼ묶怨?鍮덈룄留뚯쑝濡?寃?됲븯?붽쾬 蹂대떎 ?뺥솗??寃?됱씠 媛?ν븯?꾨줉 ?쒕떎. ?룹㎏, 理쒖쟻?붾맂 吏덉쓽臾??먮룞 ?앹꽦???꾨찓???⑦넧濡쒖?瑜??듯빐 媛?ν븯誘濡??먯뿰?댁? ?좎궗??寃?됱쁺??낵 ?뺥솗?깆쓣 媛뽮쾶 ?쒕떎. ?ㅼ꽢吏? ?먯씠?꾪듃媛 ?⑥닚???ㅼ썙?쒓? ?ы븿??臾몄꽌留뚯쓣 李얜뒗 寃껋씠 ?꾨땲???⑦넧濡쒖????쒗쁽?섏뼱 ?덈뒗 ?뺣낫瑜??좊?濡??ъ슜?먭? ?먰븯???뺣낫? 吏?앹쓣 ?먮룞?곸쑝濡?李얘쾶 ?쒕떎. ?대윭??諛⑹떇? ?곗씠?踰좎씠?ㅼ쓽 吏덉쓽臾몄쓣 ?ъ슜?섍굅???쇰컲?곸씤 ?ㅼ썙?쒓린諛섏쓽 ?뺣낫寃??湲곕쾿???ъ슜?섏뿬 ?먮즺瑜?寃?됲븯??湲곗〈??寃???쒖뒪?쒕낫???뺥솗??寃?됱쓣 媛?ν븯寃??쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???⑦넧濡쒖?瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 異붾줎???곸슜???쒕㎤??寃?됱떆?ㅽ뀥????섏뿬 臾몄꽌寃?됱뿉 珥덉젏??留욎텛???곌뎄 寃곌낵瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎.The semantic web is the web paradigm that represents not general link of documents but semantics and relation of document. In addition it enables software agents to understand semantics of documents. We propose a semantic search based on inference with ontologies, which has the following characteristics. First, our search engine enables retrieval using explicit ontologies to reason though a search keyword is different from that of documents. Second, although the concept of two ontologies does not match exactly, can be found out similar results from a rule based translator and ontological reasoning. Third, our approach enables search engine to increase accuracy and precision by using explicit ontologies to reason about meanings of documents rather than guessing meanings of documents just by keyword. Fourth, domain ontology enables users to use more detailed queries based on ontology-based automated query generator that has search area and accuracy similar to NLP. Fifth, it enables agents to do automated search not only documents with keyword but also user-preferable information and knowledge from ontologies. It can perform search more accurately than current retrieval systems which use query to databases or keyword matching. We demonstrate our system, which use ontologies and inference based on explicit ontologies, can perform better than keyword matching approach.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?⑦넧濡쒖?湲곕컲 ?쒕㎤??異붾줎 寃?됱쭏??媛먯꽦 ?쒖떆?먯? ?좎궗???쇰뱶諛깆쓣 ?댁슜??媛먯꽦 ?곸긽 寃??
