?먯뿰?몄뼱瑜??댁슜??????명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ쓽 湲곕낯 紐⑹쟻? ?먯뿰?ㅻ윭???멸컙????붾? ?듯븳 ?멸컙怨?而댄벂?곌컙???섏궗?뚰넻?대떎. ?멸컙怨???붾? 吏꾪뻾?섍쾶 ?섎뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?ъ슜??諛쒗솕???섎?瑜??뚯븙???쇳븿? 臾쇰줎?닿퀬 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?섎룄, ???紐⑹쟻 ?깆쓣 ?뚯븙?????덉뼱???쒕떎. ??붿떆?ㅽ뀥? ??붾え?몄쓣 ?듯빐 ??붾? ?먯뿰?ㅻ읇寃?吏꾪뻾??媛????덇퀬 ?곸젅???쒖뒪??諛쒗솕瑜?寃곗젙?????덉쑝硫? ?섏븘媛 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?ㅼ쓬 諛쒗솕瑜??덉륫 媛?ν븯寃??쒕떎. 洹몃윭?? ?곹샇 ?낅┰?곸씤 ?щ윭 媛쒖쓽 ?곸뿭?쇰줈 援ъ꽦?섏뼱 ?덈뒗 ?ㅼ쁺??????쒖뒪?쒖쓽 寃쎌슦 ?⑥씪 ?곸뿭 ??붿????щ━ ?곸뿭 ?곹샇媛?李몄“瑜??꾪븳 ??붿쓽 以묐떒怨??ш린?꾩긽??鍮덈쾲??諛쒖깮?쒕떎. ?뱁엳 ?뚯꽦 ?몄떇怨??듯빀?섏뼱 ?ㅼ떆媛꾩쑝濡??댁슜?섍쾶 ?섎뒗 ?ㅼ쁺???먯뿰?몄뼱 ????명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ쓽 ??붾え?몄? ?덉젙?? ?⑥쑉?깃낵 ?붾텋?? 異붽?濡??ㅼ쨷 ?곸뿭 ??붿쓽 蹂묐젹 ????꾩긽???쒖뼱湲곕뒫??媛뽰텛?댁빞 ?쒕떎??寃껋씠?? 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ㅼ떆媛??뚯꽦 ?몄떇???댁슜???먯뿰???명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ뿉 ?곹빀???ㅼ쁺????붾え?몄쓣 ?꾪빐 ??뷀쓲由꾨룄瑜??댁슜?????吏꾪뻾 湲곕쾿???쒖븞?섍퀬. ?ㅼ쨷 ?곸뿭 ??붿뿉??鍮덈쾲?섍쾶 諛쒖깮?섎뒗 ??붿쓽 以묐떒, ?ш린 ?꾩긽???쒖뼱?????덈뒗 ?ㅼ쨷 ???留λ씫???좎?媛 媛?ν븳 ??붾え?몄쓣 ?쒖븞?쒕떎.Natural language dialogue interface techniques allow users to communicate with computers using human languages. A dialogue interface system should not only understand users utterances but also detect the users intentions. A dialogue interface system must have proper strategies for dialogues, called a dialogue model, for target domains. With a dialogue model, it can control dialogues in natural manner, decide the next utterances, and, most importantly, predict the users following utterances. A dialogue model usually strongly tied with domain knowledge of a target domain. In a multi-domain dialogue interface system, however, a user can make utterances in several domains in one dialogue. During a dialogue, furthermore, the user makes an interrupt to get some information in other domains and resumes dialogue with the information. To make a real-time speech dialogue interface system reliable and efficient, it is important to design a dialogue model so that it can control over the parallel dialogue phenomena frequently occurred in multi-domain dialogues. In this paper, we suggest a processing model for natural language interface using real-time speech recognition. We also propose a new dialogue model that maintains multi-dialogue threads that can solve dialogue interrupts and resume phenomena we often see in multi-domain dialogues.?붿빟 Abstract 1.?쒕줎 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?ㅼ쁺????붾え?몄쓽 怨좊젮?ы빆Elided Postpositions in Spoken Korean and their Implications on Center Management

According to anti-corruption & civil rights commission, 88% of respondents are suffered from stress due to floor noise. To tackle floor noise problem, it is important to identify the national status of floor noise. However, there are no existing studies about identifying the national status of floor noise. This research aims to identify the national status of floor noise using social media. We collected text from social media and conducted natural language processing, location prediction, text categorization. Through this process, we identified the national status of floor noise and developed a floor noise map by city, gun, and gu.誤곫뿨 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 痢듦컙?뚯쓬 吏???묒꽦 諛⑸쾿 3. 痢듦컙?뚯쓬 吏???묒꽦 ?ㅽ뿕 諛?寃곌낵臾댁씤??났湲곕? ?댁슜??怨좏빐?곷룄, 怨좎꽑紐??곸긽??珥ъ쁺 諛?怨좎젙諛 ??났?쇨컖痢〓웾

The advantages of computer animation products are high added-value and technological impact. However, due to lengthy and complicated design process and high production cost, it also involves high initial investment and training cost. For this reason, there is growing need for new design tool with high accessibility and usability. In this study, we suggest new design interface based on the natural language, requiring no complicated keyframing actions of the existing commercial software. By running usability test of the implemented tool and examining the final outcome, we identified relative strengths and weaknesses of text-based interface in comparison to the graphical user interface-based interface.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 臾명뿄 怨좎같 3. ?꾨줈洹몃옩 援ы쁽?ъ슜???μ긽???꾪븳 ?숇Ъ???명룷硫붿씠??蹂대뱶 媛쒖꽑??- ?쒖슱?숇Ъ?먯쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈 -

理쒓렐 ?덈줈??而ㅻ??덉??댁뀡 梨꾨꼸濡?梨쀫큸(Chatbot) 湲곗닠??二쇰ぉ諛쏄퀬 ?덈떎. ?뱁엳 湲곗〈 ?꾨Ц媛 ?쒖뒪??Expert System)怨?鍮꾧탳?섏?????吏덈Ц-?묐떟???댁슜?섏뿬 ?ㅼ뒪濡??곗씠?곕? ?섏쭛?섍퀬 湲곌퀎?숈뒿(Machine learning)???????덈떎???먯뿉?? 梨쀫큸 湲곗닠? ?꾨Ц 吏?앹쓣 ?붽뎄?섎뒗 ?섑븰, 踰뺥븰 ?⑤씪???곷떞?먮룄 ?④낵?곸쑝濡??묒슜?????덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌?? IBM ?볦뒯???쒓났?섎뒗 Watson Conversation ?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?쒖슜???몃룞踰??곷떞 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?쒖븞?섏??? 蹂??쒖뒪??媛쒕컻???꾪빐 怨좎슜 ?몃룞踰??먮즺瑜??섏쭛????梨쀫큸???숈뒿?????덈뒗 ?뺥깭濡??곗씠?곕? 遺꾨쪟 諛?泥섎━?섏??? ?대? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?낅젰??Intents(?섎룄), Entities(媛쒖껜), Dialog(???濡??몃텇?뷀븯???먯뿰??泥섎━瑜?吏꾪뻾?섏??? ?먰븳, AWS(Amazon Web Service)瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 援ы쁽???쒕쾭 ?좏뵆由ъ??댁뀡怨?移댁뭅?ㅽ넚 ?뚮윭??移쒓뎄 湲곕뒫???댁슜?섏뿬 ?쒕퉬???묎렐???⑹씠?섍쾶 ?섏??? 蹂??쇰Ц???곌뎄 寃곌낵??梨쀫큸???쒖슜???ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞???곷떞 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?곸슜?????덈떎.Recently, Chatbot technology is getting more attention as a new communication channel. Especially, when compared with the existing expert system, in terms of being able to collect data and learn machine learning by using query response, Chattbot technology can be effectively applied to online consultation of medicine and law requiring expert knowledge. In this paper, we proposed a labor law consulting system using Blue Mix and Watson Convergence services provided by IBM Watson. In order to develop this system, we collected Labor law data and classified and processed the data in a form that can be learned by the Chatbot. Based on the processed data, the user's input was divided into Intents, Entities, and Dialog. Then natural language processing was performed. In addition, it facilitates service access by using server application based on AWS (Amazon Web Service) and friend function of KakaoTalk Plus. The results of this study can be applied to various counseling systems using Chatbot.Study on the design of game Horror character - Focused on the graft design Method of creatures
?쒓뎅?붿??몄퐯?먯툩?숉쉶, Pan Xiao Tian(諛섏냼泥?, [2019] [KCI?깆옱]
Design and Implementation of Interworking System for Device Interaction in a Virtual Reality Setting
?쒓뎅?붿??몄퐯?먯툩?숉쉶, Rae-Young Jang(?λ옒??, [2019] [KCI?깆옱]
Human-Centric Security Capability Enhancement in ICT Convergence Environment
?쒓뎅?붿??몄퐯?먯툩?숉쉶, Onechul Na(?섏썝泥?, [2019] [KCI?깆옱]

Text analysis technique for natural language processing in deep learning represents words in vector form throughword embedding. In this paper, we propose a method of constructing a document vector and classifying it into spamand normal text message, using word embedding and deep learning method.
Automatic spacing applied in the preprocessing process ensures that words with similar context are adjacentlyrepresented in vector space. Additionally, the intentional word formation errors with non-alphabetic orextraordinary characters are designed to avoid being blocked by spam message filter.
Two embedding algorithms, CBOW and skip grams, are used to produce the sentence vector and the performanceand the accuracy of deep learning based spam filter model are measured by comparing to those of SVM Light?λ윭?앹뿉???먯뿰??泥섎━瑜??꾪븳 ?띿뒪??遺꾩꽍 湲곕쾿? ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?듯빐 ?⑥뼱瑜?踰≫꽣 ?뺥깭濡??쒗쁽?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌?붿썙???꾨쿋??湲곕쾿怨??λ윭??湲곕쾿???댁슜?섏뿬 SMS 臾몄옄 硫붿떆吏瑜?臾몄꽌 踰≫꽣濡?援ъ꽦?섍퀬 ?대? ?ㅽ뙵 臾몄옄 硫붿떆吏? ?뺤긽?곸씤 臾몄옄 硫붿떆吏濡?遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?섏??? ?좎궗??臾몃㎘??媛吏??⑥뼱?ㅼ? 踰≫꽣 怨듦컙?먯꽌 ?몄젒??踰≫꽣 怨듦컙???쒗쁽?섎룄濡??섍린 ?꾪빐 ?꾩쿂由?怨쇱젙?쇰줈 ?먮룞 ?꾩뼱?곌린瑜??곸슜?섍퀬 ?ㅽ뙵 臾몄옄 硫붿떆吏濡?李⑤떒?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?쇳븯湲??꾪븳 紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?뚯젅???먮え瑜??뱀닔湲고샇濡??쒓끝?섏뿬 留욎땄踰뺤씠 ?뚭눼???곹깭濡??⑥뼱 踰≫꽣? 臾몄옣 踰≫꽣瑜??앹꽦?섏??? ?먰븳 臾몄옣 踰≫꽣 ?앹꽦 ?쏞BOW? skip gram?대씪????媛吏 ?뚮뱶 ?꾨쿋???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???곸슜?섏뿬 臾몄옣 踰≫꽣瑜??쒗쁽?섏??쇰ŉ, ?λ윭?앹쓣 ?댁슜???ㅽ뙵臾몄옄 硫붿떆吏 ?꾪꽣留곸쓽 ?깅뒫 ?됯?瑜??꾪빐 SVM Light? ?뺥솗?꾨? 鍮꾧탳 痢≪젙?섏???A Fall Detection Technique using Features from Multiple Sliding Windows

BIM(Building Information Modeling) ?꾩엯 珥덇린?④퀎??援?궡 BIM?뚰봽?몄썾???쒖슜 ?꾪솴? ?ㅺ퀎?④퀎肉먮쭔 ?꾨땲???쒓났?④퀎源뚯? ?遺遺?援?쇅 BIM ?뚰봽?몄썾?대? ?쒖슜?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? 援?궛 BIM?뚰봽?몄썾?대뒗 ?꾨Т???ㅼ젙?대떎. BIM ?뚰봽?몄썾?대뒗 媛앹껜?ㅼ쓣 議고빀?섏뿬 紐⑤뜽留??섎뒗 紐⑤뜽?ъ? 留뚮뱾?댁쭊 紐⑤뜽???덉쭏寃利앹쓣 ?꾪븳 泥댁빱 洹몃━怨?BIM?쒖슜?섎뒗 ?묒슜 ?댄뵆由ъ??댁뀡?쇰줈 援щ텇?????덈떎. 蹂??곌뎄??援?궡 怨듦났湲곌??먯꽌 ?쒓났??BIM吏移⑥쓣 ??곸쑝濡?BIM紐⑤뜽???덉쭏寃?좊? ?꾪빐 WBS(World Best Software) 而⑥냼?쒖뾼?먯꽌 媛쒕컻?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 Rule 湲곕컲 BIM 紐⑤뜽 泥댁빱??Rule ?⑦꽩??媛쒕컻?섎뒗??紐⑹쟻???덈떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 援?궡 BIM 吏移⑥쓣 議곗궗 遺꾩꽍?섏뿬 BIM紐⑤뜽???덉쭏寃????ぉ???꾩텧?쒕떎. ?꾩텧???덉쭏寃?좏빆紐⑹쓣 ??곸쑝濡??먯뿰?대? 援ъ“?뷀븯怨? 援ъ“?붾맂 Rule?먯꽌 ?⑦꽩???꾩텧?섏뿬 Rule Set???쒖옉?????덈뒗 ?⑦꽩???쒖떆?쒕떎. 蹂??곌뎄??BIM紐⑤뜽???덉쭏寃?좊? ?꾪빐 BIM吏移⑥쓣 寃?좏븷 ???덈뒗 Rule ?⑦꽩???쒖떆?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥, 援?궛 ?뚰봽?몄썾?대? ?쒖슜?섏뿬 ?ㅺ퀎?④퀎BIM紐⑤뜽???덉쭏???믪씪 ???덉쓣 寃껋쑝濡??щ즺?쒕떎.The present condition of domestic BIM(Building Information Modeling) software utilization has been using oversea BIM software in the design phase as well as construction phase in the early BIM introduction stage. It has been the absence of domestic BIM software. BIM software is divided into Modeler that is modeling by combining object, Checker that is checking BIM model for quality check, and Application that using BIM model. This study aimed at rule patterns development of rule-based BIM model checker for quality check of BIM model targeting BIM guidelines by domestic public organizations. For this study, we investigated domestic BIM guidelines and identified quality check items for BIM model. And we structured natural language targeting those items and derived patterns in the structured rule. So patterns were suggested making rule object. This study expects to be improved quality of BIM model by using domestic BIM software in design phase.?쇰Ц : ?ㅻ쭏???붾컮?댁뒪 ?띾낫愿 怨듦컙 ?붿옄???붿냼??愿???곌뎄
?붿옄?몄쑖蹂듯빀?숉쉶, 諛뺤닔誘?( Su Min Park ), [2012] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
?쇰Ц : ?뚮퉬?뱀꽦???곕Ⅸ ?꾩옄?쒗뭹留ㅼ옣???붿옄???좏샇?뱀꽦 ?곌뎄
?붿옄?몄쑖蹂듯빀?숉쉶, ?먰씗二?( Hee Joo Son ), [2012] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
?쇰Ц : 湲곕뒫 議고빀???듯븳 李⑤궡?뺣낫?쒖뒪??(IVIS)?????酉?援ъ꽦??愿???곌뎄
?붿옄?몄쑖蹂듯빀?숉쉶, ?곕챸??( Myeong Heum Yeoun ), [2012] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

Sentiment analysis is the processing task that involves collecting and classifying opinions about a specific object. However, it is difficult to grasp the subjectivity of a person using natural language, so the existing sentimental word dictionaries or probabilistic models cannot solve such a task, but the development of deep learning made it possible to solve the task. Self-attention is a method of modeling a given input sequence by calculating the attention weight of the input sequence itself and constructing a context vector with a weighted sum. In the context, a high weight is calculated between words with similar meanings. In this paper, we propose a method using a modeling network with self-attention and pre-trained contextualized embedding to solve the sentiment analysis task. The experimental result shows an accuracy of 89.82%.媛먯꽦 遺꾩꽍? ?뱀젙 ??곸뿉 ????섍껄???섏쭛?섍퀬 遺꾨쪟?섎뒗 怨쇱젙?대떎. 洹몃윭???먯뿰?댁뿉 ?ы븿???щ엺??二쇨????뚯븙?섎뒗 ?쇱? ?대젮???쇰줈?? 湲곗〈??媛먯꽦 ?⑥뼱 ?ъ쟾?대굹 ?뺣쪧 紐⑤뜽? ?대윭??臾몄젣瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?대젮?좎쑝?????щ떇??諛쒖쟾?쇰줈 臾몄젣 ?닿껐???쒕룄?????덇쾶 ?먮떎. ????댄뀗??self-attention)?二쇱뼱吏??낅젰???먯떊????섏뿬 ?댄뀗?섏쓣 怨꾩궛?섍퀬 媛以묒튂 ?⑹쑝濡?臾몃㎘ 踰≫꽣瑜?留뚮뱾??紐⑤뜽留곹븯??諛⑸쾿?대ŉ, 臾몃㎘??鍮꾩듂???섎?瑜?媛吏??⑥뼱??媛꾩뿉 ?믪? 媛以묒튂媛 怨꾩궛?섎뒗 ?④낵媛 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???ъ쟾 ?숈뒿??臾몃㎘ ?쒗쁽???쒓뎅??媛먯꽦 遺꾩꽍???쒖슜?섍퀬, ????댄뀗?섏쑝濡?紐⑤뜽留곹븯??諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, NSMC??寃쎌슦 ?뺥솗??89.82%, ?ㅼ쓬移댁뭅?ㅼ쓽 寃쎌슦 92.25%???깅뒫??蹂댁????뺤텞 湲곕컲 ?뚯씪 ?쒖뒪???곗씠???쇨????좎? 湲곕쾿

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?μ??? [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

In this paper, we propose a new deep neural network model for dense video captioning.
Dense video captioning is an emerging task that aims at both localizing and describing all events in a video. Unlike many existing models, which use only visual features extracted from the given video through a sort of convolutional neural network(CNN), our proposed model makes additional use of high-level semantic features that describe important event components such as actions, people, objects, and backgrounds. The proposed model localizes temporal regions of events by using LSTM, a recurrent neural network(RNN). Furthermore, our model adopts an attention mechanism for caption generation to selectively focus on input features depending on their importance. By conducting experiments using a large-scale benchmark dataset for dense video captioning, AcitivityNet Captions, we demonstrate high performance and superiority of our model.蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??怨좊???鍮꾨뵒??罹≪뀡 ?앹꽦???꾪븳 ?덈줈???ъ링 ?좉꼍留?紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. 怨좊???鍮꾨뵒??罹≪뀡 ?앹꽦? ?섎굹???낅젰 鍮꾨뵒?ㅻ줈遺???ㅼ닔???대깽??援ш컙?ㅼ쓣 李얠븘?닿퀬, ?대뱾 媛곴컖??愿???먯뿰???ㅻ챸 臾몄옣???앹꽦?섎뒗 ?묒뾽?대떎. 湲곗〈??紐⑤뜽?ㅼ뿉?쒕뒗 ?⑹꽦怨??좉꼍留앹쓣 ?듯빐 ?낅젰 鍮꾨뵒?ㅼ쓽 ?쒓컖 ?뱀쭠 留뚯쓣 異붿텧?섏뿬 ?ъ슜??寃껉낵???щ━, 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽?먯꽌???됱쐞, 臾쇱껜, 諛곌꼍, ?щ엺 ??以묒슂???대깽??援ъ꽦 ?붿냼?ㅼ쓣 ?④낵?곸쑝濡??쒗쁽?????덈뒗 怨좎닔以???섎? ?뱀쭠?ㅼ쓣 異붽??곸쑝濡??쒖슜?섏??? ?먰븳 ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽?먯꽌???쒗솚 ?좉꼍留앹씤 LSTM???댁슜?섏뿬 鍮꾨뵒???덉뿉 ?ы븿???대깽???쒓컙 ?곸뿭?ㅼ쓣 ?먯??섏??? ?? ?쒖븞 紐⑤뜽?먯꽌??以묒슂?꾩뿉 ?곕씪 ?좏깮?곸쑝濡??낅젰 ?뱀쭠?ㅼ뿉 吏묒쨷?????덈룄濡? 罹≪뀡 ?앹꽦 怨쇱젙??二쇱쓽吏묒쨷 硫붿빱?덉쬁???곸슜?섏??? 怨좊???鍮꾨뵒??罹≪뀡 ?앹꽦???꾪븳 ??⑸웾 踰ㅼ튂留덊겕 ?곗씠??吏묓빀??ActivityNet Captions ?곗씠??吏묓빀???댁슜???ㅼ뼇???ㅽ뿕???듯빐, 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌 ?쒖븞??紐⑤뜽???믪? ?깅뒫怨??곗닔?깆쓣 ?뺤씤?????덉뿀??Beyond Head-mounted Display: Extended Field of View using Sparse Peripheral Display Techniques

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 理쒕??? [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

This paper attempts to provide a preliminary approach to the fate and ontology of the author, which has recently been raised through a case study of creative writing through computer artificial intelligence.
This paper analyzes the algorithm of natural language processing used in the novel ?쐔he days when computers write novels?? focusing on this novel created by artificial intelligence produced by Professor Satoshi Sato, professor at Nagoya University. ?쏷he Day when a Computer Writes a Novel??has created novels by imitating and replacing sentences of existing novels for machine learning, or by juxtaposing dialogue novels made up of short conversations through several existing novels. However, with this methodology, the computer could not learn how to write a completely creative novel on its own, which shows the limitations of writing through artificial intelligence.???쇰Ц? 而댄벂???멸났吏?μ쓣 ?듯븳 李쎌쓽?곸씤 湲?곌린???щ? 遺꾩꽍???듯빐 理쒓렐 ?쒓린?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?묎????대챸怨?議댁옱濡좎뿉 ????쒕줎?곸씤 ?묎렐???섍퀬???쒕떎. ?쇰낯 ?섍퀬?쇰??숆탳 ?ы넗 ?ы넗??援먯닔???곌뎄?ㅼ뿉???쒖옉???멸났吏?μ씠 李쎌옉???뚯꽕 ?뚯뺨?⑦꽣媛 ?뚯꽕???곕뒗 ???녈꺍?붵깷?쇈궭?뚦컦沃с굮???뤸뿥)?띿쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈 ???뚯꽕???ъ슜???먯뿰??泥섎━???뚭퀬由ъ쬁??遺꾩꽍?섍퀬, 洹??뚯꽕???깆랬瑜??됯??섍퀬???덈떎. ?뚯뺨?⑦꽣媛 ?뚯꽕???곕뒗 ?졼띿? 湲곌퀎 ?숈뒿???꾪빐 湲곗〈 ?뚯꽕??臾몄옣??紐⑤갑?섍퀬 移섑솚?섍굅?? 吏㏃? ?뚰솕濡??대（?댁쭊 ??붿껜 ?뚯꽕??湲곗〈 ?뚯꽕???щ윭 踰덉쓣 ?듯빐 蹂묒튂?쒗궎??諛⑸쾿?쇰줈 ?뚯꽕??李쎌옉???붾떎. 洹몃윭???대윭??諛⑸쾿濡좎쑝濡?而댄벂?곗뿉寃??꾩쟾??李쎌쓽?곸씤?뚯꽕???ㅼ뒪濡??곕뒗 諛⑸쾿???숈뒿?쒗궗 ?섎뒗 ?놁뿀?쇰ŉ, ?대뒗 ?멸났吏?μ쓣 ?듯븳 湲?곌린媛 媛吏???쇱젙???쒓퀎瑜?蹂댁뿬以??AI(artificial intelligence) ?쒕? ???쒓뎅 臾명븰, ?섏갹議겸숉븯???묎??먯꽌 ?섎같移섃숉븯???묎?濡쒖쓽 ?댄뻾

1930?꾨? ?꾨컲湲??꾨·?덊?由ъ븘 臾명븰???좊뜑? ?쒓뎅臾명븰?э펾?닿린?곸쓽 ?롪퀬?γ뤾낵 媛뺢꼍?좎쓽 ?롮씤媛꾨Ц?쒌뤿? 以묒떖?쇰줈竊?
?쒓뎅?꾨??뚯꽕?숉쉶, 諛곗긽誘? [2017] [KCI?깆옱]

The amount of trajectory data collected from humans and vehicles is growing rapidly owing to the improvement in sensor-based technologies. Many researchers have actively attempted to draw meaningful insights from trajectory data. Recently, deep learning-based methods, which demonstrated high performance in other fields such as natural language processing have been used to tackle this issue. However, there is little effort on the development of effective methods to encode trajectory data. This paper introduces five trajectory encoding methods along with their normalization and compares their performance through an extensive evaluation. In the experiments on LSTM-based transportation mode classification using Microsoft Geolife data, merging of embedding and one-hot encoding along with normalization demonstrated the highest performance in terms of performance and model convergence speed.?쇱꽌湲곗닠??諛쒕떖濡??먮룞李⑤굹 ?щ엺?쇰줈遺???섏쭛?섎뒗 ?대룞寃쎈줈 ?곗씠?곗쓽 ?묒씠 湲됱쬆?섍퀬 ?덈떎.

?곗꽭??숆탳 ?몄뼱?뺣낫?곌뎄??援??곗꽭??숆탳 ?몄뼱?뺣낫媛쒕컻??, 源二쇱긽 ( Ju Sang Kim ), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
洹쇳쁽?湲??쇰낯臾몃쾿?쒖뿉 ?섑???"臾몃쾿"???곗엫怨?媛쒕뀗??異붿씠
?곗꽭??숆탳 ?몄뼱?뺣낫?곌뎄??援??곗꽭??숆탳 ?몄뼱?뺣낫媛쒕컻??, ?ㅼ쁺誘?( Young Min Yun ), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
?섏〈(?? 紐낆궗瑜??ы븿?섎뒗 ?쒓뎅?닿탳??臾몃쾿??ぉ ?곌뎄 - 援먯쑁??臾몃쾿??ぉ ?좎젙???곸젏??以묒떖?쇰줈 -
?곗꽭??숆탳 ?몄뼱?뺣낫?곌뎄??援??곗꽭??숆탳 ?몄뼱?뺣낫媛쒕컻??, 媛뺥쁽??( Hyounhwa Kang ), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

Conflict that requires enormous economic cost and time to solve are one of the important management factors in modern construction management. This study derives conflict components from public construction projects based on unstructured data. The authors collected 21,788 online news articles reported by the media through web-crawling techniques. Based on this, 12 conflict related issues were extracted through natural language processing and clustering process, and the following results were obtained. First, each cluster showed the structure of conflict (conflict summary, conflict issues, conflict expression, conflict management) in project life cycle. Second, the extracted words were classified according to the issues raised during the project execution. The quantitative methodology used in this study is expected to overcome limitations of existing qualitative research in future conflict analysis and enable researchers to generalize through multiple cases analysis.?닿껐??留됰????ы쉶?겶룰꼍?쒖쟻 鍮꾩슜怨??쒓컙???꾩슂濡??섎뒗 媛덈벑? ?꾨? 嫄댁꽕愿由ъ뿉??以묒슂??愿由??붿냼 以??섎굹?대떎. 蹂??곌뎄??怨듦났 嫄댁꽕?ъ뾽?먯꽌 諛쒖깮?섎뒗 媛덈벑 援ъ꽦?붿냼瑜?鍮꾩젙?뺣뜲?댄꽣瑜?湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?꾩텧?섏??? ?곌뎄??곸쑝濡??쒖＜?닿뎔湲곗? 媛덈벑 ?щ?瑜??좎젙?섍퀬, ???щ·留?湲곕쾿?쇰줈 ?몃줎??蹂대룄??21,788嫄댁쓽 ?⑤씪???댁뒪 湲곗궗瑜??섏쭛?섏??? ?대? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 怨쇱젙 諛?援곗쭛??怨쇱젙???듯빐 12媛쒖쓽 媛덈벑 愿???댁뒋瑜??꾩텧?섍퀬 ?ㅼ쓬怨?媛숈? 寃곕줎???살뿀?? 泥レ㎏, 媛?援곗쭛? ?ъ뾽 怨쇱젙?먯꽌 諛쒖깮??媛덈벑??援ъ“(媛덈벑 媛쒖슂, 媛덈벑 ?곸젏, 媛덈벑 ?쒖텧, 媛덈벑 愿由?瑜??섑??덈떎. ?섏㎏, ?꾩텧???⑥뼱???ъ뾽 怨쇱젙?먯꽌 ?쒓린???댁뒋蹂꾨줈 遺꾨쪟?섏뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌 ?ъ슜???뺣웾??諛⑸쾿濡좎? 異뷀썑 媛덈벑 遺꾩꽍?먯꽌 湲곗〈 ?뺤꽦???곌뎄媛 吏???쒓퀎瑜?洹밸났?섍퀬 ?ㅼ닔???щ? 遺꾩꽍???듯븳 ?쇰컲?붾? 媛?ν븯寃???寃껋쑝濡?湲곕??쒕떎.?덉닠濡쒖꽌???????ㅼ썝二쇱쓽 ?쒕????섏떆誘쇰맖??

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?좎갔??Chan-Su Shin), [1997]
?좏삎?쇰━?먯쓽???뚮줈 移댄뀒怨좊━?ㅽ쁽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?좏솉泥?Shin Hong-Choll), [1997]
?쇨컖遺꾪븷???뚮┰ 嫄곕━(Flip Distance) 臾몄젣
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?띿꽍??Seok-Hee Hong), [1997]

The voice recognition technology is to recognize the voice of an user and execute the command. Recently, the voice recognition is evolving to the artificial intelligence voice recognition by adding the scheme of the natural language processing. The AI voice recognition is exploited to control the IoT devices or provide the information, such as the news or the wether. The University Information which is one of fields serviced by the information provider is mainly presented on the web. However, since too much information are presented on the web, it is difficult for an user to find efficiently the specific information which the user want to know. In this paper, we design and implement the university guidance system to recognize the user voice searching the information and provide the result using the voice. To do this, we classify the university data and design the lambda function to provide the data.?뚯꽦?몄떇 湲곗닠? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 ?뚯꽦???몄떇?섏뿬 紐낅졊???ㅽ뻾?섎뒗 湲곗닠濡??꾩옱???먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곕쾿怨??묐ぉ?섏뼱 ?멸났吏???뚯꽦?몄떇 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ줈 ?쒓났?섏뼱 吏怨??덈떎. ?대윭???멸났吏???뚯꽦?몄떇 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ뒗 IoT湲곌린瑜??쒖뼱?섍굅???댁뒪 ?먮뒗 ?좎뵪? 媛숈? ?뺣낫 ?쒓났 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?쒖슜?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?뺣낫 ?쒓났 遺꾩빞???섎굹??????뺣낫??二쇰줈 ?뱀쓣 ?듯븯???쒓났?섎굹 ?덈Т 留롮? ?곗씠?곕? ?쒓났?섍린 ?뚮Ц???ъ슜?먭? ?좎냽?섍쾶 ?먰븯???뺣낫瑜?寃?됲븷 ???녿뒗 臾몄젣媛 ?덈떎. ???쇰Ц?먯꽌???ъ슜?먭? 李얘퀬???섎뒗 ?뺣낫瑜??뚯꽦?쇰줈 ?몄떇?섍퀬 ?쒓났?섍린 ?꾪븳 ????덈궡 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 ?ㅺ퀎?섍퀬 援ы쁽?쒕떎. ??숈젙蹂대? 媛?二쇱젣蹂꾨줈 遺꾨쪟?섍퀬 ?대? ?쒓났?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?뚮떎 ?⑥닔瑜??ㅺ퀎?쒕떎. 洹몃━怨??뚮젆???ㅽ궗 ?ㅽ듃瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 ?몃뱶?쒖씠?먯뒪濡?援ы쁽??紐⑤뱢???꾨쭏議댁쎒?쒕퉬?ㅼ뿉 ?낅줈?쒗븯???뚯꽦?몄떇???댁슜?섏뿬 ????뺣낫瑜??쒓났?쒕떎.Development Tendency of Altmetrics Research: Using Social Network Analysis and Co-word Analysis

Research on language should include not only linguistic phenomena, but also so-called physical reality in which we live. Concept of movement is realized differently in languages and Russian verbs of motion (VoM) become a good example showing cultural specificity of Russian. Unprefixed Russian VoM are categorized by the manner of the motion and the path is expressed in the construction of VoM. Corpus data show that the goal of a motion is more frequently realized in the construction than the source, which is called "oal-bias."The bias makes the motion constructions as a linguistic unit and the unit functions like any other natural linguistic category. Construction contains elements affecting the meaning of the whole construction such as definiteness of participant and types of transitivity, etc. It is necessary to consider all the contextual elements of a construction as well as the lexical meaning of VoM, and this paper illustrates the first step of investigating relationship of a semantic category.援?Ц珥덈줉 1. ?쒕줎 2. 蹂몃줎 3. 寃곕줎 李멸퀬臾명뿄?앹꽦怨??듯빀???쒗븰

?쒓뎅?낆뼱?숉쉶, ?섑꽣 ?덈??? [2001] [KCI?깆옱]
?쇱뒪? ?붾낵?몄쓽 湲고샇愿 鍮꾧탳
?쒓뎅?낆뼱?숉쉶, ?덉젙?? [2001] [KCI?깆옱]
?쒖꽑???섏궗?뚰넻 湲곕뒫
?쒓뎅?낆뼱?숉쉶, 源媛묐뀈, [2001] [KCI?깆옱]

We introduce a Korean business index based on the news data provided by BIG KINDS Trends. The index is compiled based on the difference between news trend data related to the business boom and recession. To check the usefulness of the newly compiled index, various analyses have been carried out. The analyses show that the index is highly correlated with the economic sentiment index and the composite leading indicator. Moreover, the forecasting performance of the logit model with BIG KINDS news business index are compared with models with different business data. The results show that models with the index outperform models with different business data. The BIG KINDS news business index would be useful in evaluating business cycles.?쒓뎅?몃줎吏꾪씎?щ떒? 1990???댄썑 ?몃줎湲곌??ㅼ쓽 ?댁뒪 湲곗궗瑜??쇰퀎濡?異뺤쟻?섏뿬 ?먯뿰??泥섎━??鍮낆뭅?몄쫰(BIG KINDS) 遺꾩꽍?쒖뒪?쒖쓣 媛쒕컻?섏뿬 怨듦컻?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂멸퀬?먯꽌???쒓뎅?몃줎吏꾪씎?щ떒??鍮낆뭅?몄쫰??異뺤쟻???댁뒪 湲곗궗 ?곗씠?곕쿋?댁뒪?먯꽌 ?명솴 諛?遺덊솴 愿???ㅼ썙?쒕뱾???붾퀎 ?댁뒪 湲곗궗?섎? 異붿텧?섍퀬 ?대뱾??諛뷀깢?쇰줈 BSI 諛⑹떇?쇰줈 鍮낆뭅?몄쫰 ?댁뒪 寃쎄린吏?섎? 媛쒕컻?섏??? 鍮낆뭅?몄쫰 ?댁뒪 寃쎄린吏?섏쓽 ?좎슜?깆쓣 ?뺣낫?섍린 ?꾪빐???댁쓽 ?쒗솚蹂?숈튂瑜?援ы븳 ???대? 怨듯몴???붾퀎 寃쎄린 愿??怨듭떇 ?듦퀎? 鍮꾧탳?섏??? 洹?寃곌낵瑜?蹂대㈃ 鍮낆뭅?몄쫰 ?댁뒪 寃쎄린吏???쒗솚蹂?숈튂??寃쎄린?좏뻾吏???쒗솚蹂?숈튂? 寃쎌젣?щ━吏???쒗솚蹂?숈튂 ?깃낵 諛?묓븯寃??吏곸씠??寃껋쑝濡??섑??щ떎. ?먰븳 濡쒖쭞紐⑦삎???듯빐 鍮낆뭅?몄쫰 ?댁뒪 寃쎄린吏???쒗솚蹂?숈튂瑜?寃쎌젣?щ━吏???쒗솚蹂?숈튂, 寃쎄린?좏뻾吏???쒗솚蹂?숈튂? 鍮꾧탳?섏??붾뜲 鍮낆뭅?몄쫰 ?쒗솚蹂?숈튂瑜??ы븿??濡쒖쭞紐⑦삎??寃쎌젣?щ━吏???쒗솚蹂?숈튂 ?먮뒗 寃쎄린?좏뻾吏???쒗솚蹂?숈튂瑜??ы븿??濡쒖쭞紐⑦삎蹂대떎 寃쎄린 ?섏텞援?㈃?????덉륫?섎뒗 寃껋쑝濡??섑??щ떎.釉뚮줈?쒕객?쒖? ?뺣낫 愿???쒕퉬?ㅼ쓽 寃쎌젣???④낵 ?곌뎄

While the number of cases submitted for the exports of nuclear-power commodity and technology is dramatically increasing, preadjudication (or prescreening to be simple) of strategic materials has been done so far by experts of a long-time experience and extensive field knowledge. However, there is severe shortage of experts in this domain, not to mention that it takes a long time to develop an expert. Because human experts must manually evaluate all the documents submitted for export permission, the current practice of nuclear material export is neither time-efficient nor cost-effective. Toward alleviating the problem of relying on costly human experts only, our research proposes a new system designed to help field experts make their decisions more effectively and efficiently. The proposed system is built upon case-based reasoning, which in essence extracts key features from the existing cases, compares the features with the features of a new case, and derives a solution for the new case by referencing similar cases and their solutions. Our research proposes a framework of case-based reasoning system, designs a case-based reasoning system for the control of nuclear material exports, and evaluates the performance of alternative keyword extraction methods (full automatic, full manual, and semi-automatic). A keyword extraction method is an essential component of the case-based reasoning system as it is used to extract key features of the cases. The full automatic method was conducted using TF-IDF, which is a widely used de facto standard method for representative keyword extraction in text mining. TF (Term Frequency) is based on the frequency count of the term within a document, showing how important the term is within a document while IDF (Inverted Document Frequency) is based on the infrequency of the term within a document set, showing how uniquely the term represents the document. The results show that the semi-automatic approach, which is based on the collaboration of machine and human, is the most effective solution regardless of whether the human is a field expert or a student who majors in nuclear engineering. Moreover, we propose a new approach of computing nuclear document similarity along with a new framework of document analysis. The proposed algorithm of nuclear document similarity considers both documentto-document similarity (慣) and document-to-nuclear system similarity (棺), in order to derive the final score (款) for the decision of whether the presented case is of strategic material or not. The final score (款) represents a document similarity between the past cases and the new case. The score is induced by not only exploiting conventional TF-IDF, but utilizing a nuclear system similarity score, which takes the context of nuclear system domain into account. Finally, the system retrieves top-3 documents stored in the case base that are considered as the most similar cases with regard to the new case, and provides them with the degree of credibility. With this final score and the credibility score, it becomes easier for a user to see which documents in the case base are more worthy of looking up so that the user can make a proper decision with relatively lower cost. The evaluation of the system has been conducted by developing a prototype and testing with field data. The system workflows and outcomes have been verified by the field experts. This research is expected to contribute the growth of knowledge service industry by proposing a new system that can effectively reduce the burden of relying on costly human experts for the export control of nuclear materials and that can be considered as a meaningful example of knowledge service application.1. 媛쒖슂 2. 愿???곌뎄 3. ?щ? 湲곕컲 異붾줎 諛⑸쾿濡?4. ?щ? 湲곕컲 異붾줎 ?쒖뒪??媛쒕컻 5. 寃곕줎 諛??쒖궗?륚 Smoothing Data Cleaning based on Adaptive Window Sliding for Intelligent RFID Middleware Systems
?쒓뎅吏?μ젙蹂댁떆?ㅽ뀥?숉쉶, ?좊룞泥? [2014] [KCI?깆옱]

?ы쉶???뚯닔?먮? 諛붾씪蹂대뒗 ??媛쒖쓽 ?쒓컖竊랁룷?ㅽ듃?앸?二쇱쓽? ?덉떇誘쇱꽦 ?대줎

議곗꽑 ?꾧린 洹쇰????묒떖 媛쒕뀗???꾩엯 寃쎌쐞? 泥쒖＜援먯쓽 ??븷
遺?곕??숆탳 ?몃Ц?숈뿰援ъ냼, 議고쁽踰?Cho, Hyeon-Beom), [2014] [KCI?깆옱]

In the modern information age, the need for recommendation algorithms using social data has significantly increased. However, conventional recommendation algorithms using social data have not achieved reasonable performance. This is because social data is natural language data, and thus background knowledge and implicit words are hidden in the data. Therefore, to develop recommendation systems using social data, hidden information in the social data should be reflected in the recommendation algorithm. To this end, we propose a novel recommendation algorithm based upon the tripartite graph. The proposed algorithm utilizes the structural characteristics of the tripartite graph, and thus it can extract hidden information in the social data. As a result, the proposed algorithm can extract more useful information than other conventional recommendation algorithms even though the amount of given data is relatively small.?뺣낫???쒕????뚯뀥 ?곗씠?곕? ?쒖슜??異붿쿇 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁? 洹??꾩슂?깆씠 留ㅼ슦 利앷??섏??? ?섏?留??뚯뀥 ?곗씠?곕? ?쒖슜??湲곗〈??異붿쿇 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁? 留뚯”?좊쭔???깅뒫??蹂댁씠吏 紐삵븳?? ?대뒗 ?뚯뀥 ?곗씠?곌? ?멸컙???먯뿰???띿뒪???곗씠???대?濡??⑥텞???섎???諛곌꼍吏???깆씠 ?곗씠???띿뿉 ?④꺼???덇린 ?뚮Ц?대떎. ?곕씪???뚯뀥 ?곗씠?곕? ?쒖슜??異붿쿇 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁??留뚯”?좊쭔??異붿쿇 ?깅뒫???닿린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?곗씠???띿뿉 ?④꺼吏??뺣낫瑜?異붿텧?섏뿬 異붿쿇??諛섏쁺?댁빞留??쒕떎. ?대? ?닿껐?섍린 ?꾪빐 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쇰텇 洹몃옒??Tripartite Graph)瑜??댁슜???덈줈??異붿쿇 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???쒖븞?쒕떎. 蹂??쇰Ц??異붿쿇 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁? ?쇰텇 洹몃옒?꾩쓽 援ъ“???뱀꽦???쒖슜???곗궛 怨쇱젙???듯빐 ?곗씠???띿뿉 ?ъ링?곸쑝濡??④꺼???덈뒗 ?뺣낫瑜?異붿쿇???곸슜?????덈떎. ?먰븳 ?쒖븞 湲곕쾿? ?곷??곸쑝濡??묒??뺣낫?먯꽌??湲곗〈??異붿쿇 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁蹂대떎 ?좎슜???뺣낫瑜???留롮씠 異붿텧?????덈떎.?뚰떚???꾪꽣 湲곕컲 ?쒓퀎???덉륫 寃고빀 紐⑤뜽???듯븳 ?꾩떆??諛⑸Ц ?몄썝 ?덉륫

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源留뚯닔, [2018] [KCI?깆옱]
媛쒖씤 留욎땄??嫄닿컯吏꾨떒???꾪븳 嫄닿컯?곗씠???섏쭛 紐⑤컮???뚮옯?쇱쓽 ?ㅺ퀎? 援ы쁽
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 源寃쎌＜, [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

There are various studies using Deep Neural Network such as CNN(Convolutional Neural Network) and RNN(Recurrent Neural Network) that utilize word embedding in document classification using natural language processing out of traditional methods. In this paper, we propose the IPC(International Patents Classification) automatic classification model of patent documents using two layers BLSTM(Bidirectional Long Short Term memory) network. The IPC is an internationally uniform standard for patent classification established by the World Intellectual Property Organization and is categorized by hand in authorized agencies in each country. For the IPC automatic classification, we use word embedding weight with Word2Vec in the input sequences. And they are classified by entering a weighted sequences into a deep neural network with two layers BLSTM. The experimental results showed that the accuracy of classification is improved by about 7% than that of CNN, and about 5% than that of single layer LSTM that is a field of RNN. Also it showed more than 5~12% higher performance than traditional methods such as Naive Bayes, Logistic and Support Vector Machine classification.?먯뿰??泥섎━瑜??댁슜??臾몄꽌 遺꾨쪟 遺꾩빞?먯꽌???꾪넻?곸씤 諛⑸쾿?먯꽌 踰쀬뼱???⑥뼱 ?꾨쿋?⑹쓣 ?쒖슜???⑹꽦怨??좉꼍留앷낵 ?쒗솚 ?좉꼍留????ъ링 ?좉꼍留앹쓣 ?댁슜???ㅼ뼇???곌뎄媛 吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??Word2Vec怨???媛쒖쓽 怨꾩링?쇰줈 援ъ꽦???묐갑???λ떒湲?湲곗뼲 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕瑜??댁슜???뱁뿀 臾몄꽌??IPC(International Patents Classification) ?먮룞 遺꾨쪟 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쇱쓽 ?쒖꽌???곗꽑 ?꾩? 議곗궗怨쇱젙???듯븯???섏쭛???먮즺瑜?諛뷀깢?쇰줈 ??吏??뼱???뚯슫泥닿퀎瑜?諛앺삍?붾뜲 ?ш쾶 ?먯쓬, ?좎쓬, ?쒖쓬, 紐⑥쓬 ????遺瑜섎줈 ?섎늻??寃???섏??? ?ㅼ쓬 ?뺥깭??寃쎄퀎?먯꽌 ?쇱뼱?섎뒗 怨듭떆?곸씤 ?뚯슫?꾩긽??洹?蹂???묒긽???곕씪 ?섍탳泥? ?덈씫, ?쎌엯, 異뺤빟?숈씠 ???좏삎?쇰줈 援щ텇?섏뿬 ?쇱쓽?섏??? ?쇱쓽瑜??듯빐 ?뚯슫泥닿퀎??以묐?諛⑹뼵怨?鍮꾧탳??蹂댁븯????/?? ?? ?? ??遺遺??먯쓬???뚭?李⑥씠瑜?鍮꾨’??苑???李⑥씠媛 ?덉뿀怨??뚯슫?꾩긽? ??李⑥씠媛 ?놁뿀?붾뜲 ?쒕턿諛⑹뼵??湲고? ?섏쐞 諛⑹뼵怨쇰뒗 ?꾩＜ 鍮꾩듂?⑥쓣 ?????덉뿀?? ?먰븳 留ㅼ껜 ?깆쓽 諛쒕떖濡?媛쒖떊?뺤씠 議댁옱?섎뒗媛 ?섎㈃ ?몄뼱?곸쑝濡??곷??곸쑝濡?怨좊┰?섏뼱 ?붽린??怨좎뼱???먯랬??留롮씠 ?⑥븘 ?덉뿀?? ?쒓뎅?댁쓽 ?ㅼ껜???먯뿰?댁쓽 ?ㅼ젣 紐⑥뒿??諛⑹뼵??????곌뎄瑜??듯빐?쒕쭔?????뺤떎??諛앺?吏????덈뒗??蹂멸퀬???쇱쓽瑜??듯빐 ?쒕턿諛⑹뼵?????섏쐞諛⑹뼵??紐⑥뒿???대뒓 ?뺣룄 ?쒕윭?щ떎?붾뜲 洹??섏쓽媛 ?덈떎.Korean phonology studies can be done through the induction of the individual dialects because the Korean sub-dialect is due to finally allow the Korean phonology study of the entire Korean when each dialect phonological and phonetic phenomenon is clearly research to be. This paper aims to analyze and describe the phonological phenomena of current Dandong Dialect.
First I establish the phonological system on the basis of the data collected through the field survey. Phoneme catalogue can be divided into four groups, including consonant inventory, liquid inventory, glides inventory, vowel inventory. Then I deal with the phonological process occurring at the morpheme boundaries in this dialect with some phonological rules. The phonological process has four subtypes such as alternation, deletion, insertion, and contraction. The phonological system, when compared with the central dialect, has considerable differences, including the difference in the phonemes of the partial consonants such as /?? ?? ??. There are new types due to development of media. Because it was relatively isolated from language, there was much trace of archaic word. But phonological phenomenon was found to be very similar to the other sub-dialect of the Northwestern dialects. There are Korean entities of which I have revealed the appearance of a sub-dialect of the Northwestern dialects degree through discussion paper to believe that it can be revealed only through research on the physical appearance of tongues of its natural significance. It is meaningful to be able to provide evidence for Korean language history research.?덇뎅臾몄큹濡앫?1. ?ㅼ뼱媛湲?2. ?뚯슫泥닿퀎 3. ?뚯슫?꾩긽 4. ?섏삤湲고븳援?뼱??援먯쑁

援?뼱援?Ц?숉쉶, 諛뺣챸??Park, Myoung-hui), [2016] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

This paper presents a Korean conversational agent system in a mobile environment using natural language processing techniques. The aim of a conversational agent in mobile environment is to provide natural language interface and enable more natural interaction between a human and an agent. Constructing such an agent, it is required to develop various natural language understanding components and effective utterance generation methods. To understand spoken style utterance, we perform morphosyntactic analysis, shallow semantic analysis including modality classification and predicate argument structure analysis, and to generate a system utterance, we perform example based search which considers lexical similarity, syntactic similarity and semantic similarity.蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???쒓뎅???뺣낫泥섎━ 湲곗닠???ъ슜??紐⑤컮???섍꼍????뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ????쇳븳?? ??뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃 ?쒖뒪??援ъ텞??紐⑹쟻? ?멸컙 ?ъ슜?먯? ?쒖뒪???먯씠?꾪듃媛꾩쓽 ?먯뿰???명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ? ?쒓났?섏뿬 蹂대떎 ?몃━???곹샇?묒슜??媛?ν븯寃??섎뒗 ???덈떎. 紐⑤컮???섍꼍????뷀삎 ?먯씠?꾪듃瑜?援ъ텞?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 援ъ뼱泥?諛쒗솕???뱁솕???ㅼ뼇???몄뼱 泥섎━ 諛??몄뼱 ?댄빐 ?붿냼?ㅼ씠 ?꾩슂?섎떎. 蹂??쒖뒪?쒖? ?낅젰 臾몄옣???ㅻ쪟泥섎━, ?뺥깭??遺꾩꽍 諛??덉궗 ?쒓퉭, ?묓깭 遺꾩꽍, ?쇳빆 ?몄떇 諛??섎??꾨젅???앹꽦, 洹몃━怨??좎궗 諛쒗솕 寃??諛??묐떟 ?앹꽦?쇰줈 援ъ꽦?쒕떎. 二쇱뼱吏??ъ슜??諛쒗솕???곸젅???묐떟???앹꽦?섍린 ?꾪빐??蹂??쒖뒪?쒖? ?ъ슜??諛쒗솕? ?덉젣 諛쒗솕 媛꾩쓽 ?댄쐶?? ?듭궗/援щЦ?? ?섎????좎궗???뺣낫瑜??쒖슜?섏뿬 ?덉젣湲곕컲 ?묐떟 寃?됱쓣 ?섑뻾?쒕떎.P2P ?섍꼍?먯꽌 蹂듯빀 ?ㅽ듃由??쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 ?⑥쑉?곸씤 ?ㅻ쾭?덉씠 硫?곗틦?ㅽ듃 ?ㅼ?以꾨쭅

?⑹꽦???듯븳 ?ъ떆?꾩뼱 ?됱꽌臾??댁쑉 援ъ“ 遺꾩꽍
?쒓뎅?몄뼱?몃Ц?숉쉶, 蹂援고쁺(Byun Koon Hyuk), [2008] [KCI?깆옱]

Developing chatbot system is a challenging problem in artificial intelligence and many people recently begin to use deep reinforcement learning in this area. In addition, policy network method has been widely used in deep reinforcement learning for chatbot. In this paper, we propose a new method of dual policy network for dialog generation in deep reinforcement learning. In dual policy network, one policy network is dedicated to a dialog policy for a specific person while the other is for other persons. The proposed model was tested using real dialog dataset and could generate more user-specific dialogue.?ъ링 ?숈뒿(deep learning)怨?媛뺥솕?숈뒿(reinforcement learning)??寃고빀???ъ링媛뺥솕?숈뒿(deep reinforcement learning)? 理쒓렐 ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?먮━ ?ъ슜?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫??뱁엳 梨쀫큸??媛쒕컻???덉뼱??以묒슂????븷???섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?대윭???ъ링媛뺥솕?숈뒿???댁슜??梨쀫큸 媛쒕컻???덉뼱?쒕뒗 二쇰줈 ?ъ링 ?щ떇?쇰줈 援ы쁽???뺤콉 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕(policy network)瑜?policy gradient 湲곕쾿???ъ슜?섏뿬 ?먯뿰???앹꽦 ?숈뒿??吏꾪뻾?쒕떎. 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???대윭??梨쀫큸(chatbot)??媛쒕컻???덉뼱????붿옄???뱀꽦???곕씪 ?숈뒿??媛?ν븳 ??媛쒖쓽 ?뺤콉 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕(dual policy network)瑜??ъ슜?섎뒗 ?덈줈???ъ링媛뺥솕?숈뒿 諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?ㅼ젣 ?곗씠?곕? ?댁슜???ㅼ뼇??????앹꽦 ?ㅽ뿕??吏꾪뻾?섏??쇰ŉ ?쒖븞??紐⑤뜽? 湲곗〈??紐⑤뜽??鍮꾪븯???붿슧 ??붿옄???뱀쭠??留욌뒗 ??붾? ?앹꽦 ?????덉쓬???????덉뿀??LED ?붿뒪?뚮젅???μ튂???섎룄媛쒖꽑???꾪븳 ?먮벑???μ긽??????곌뎄

?섏쐞 ?щ씫??寃異쒖쓣 ?듯븳 ?곗＜諛쒖궗泥?TDOA-AOA 痢≪쐞湲곕쾿???뺥솗???μ긽 ?곌뎄
??쒖쟾?먭났?숉쉶, 沅뚯닚?? [2019] [KCI?곗닔?깆옱]

The purpose of this study is to see possibility of Char2Vec as alternative of Word2Vec that most famous wordembedding model in Sentence Similarity Measure Problem by Deep-Learning. In experiment, we used the SiameseMa-LSTM recurrent neural network architecture for measure similarity two random sentences. Siamese Ma-LSTM modelwas implemented with tensorflow. We train each model with 200 epoch on gpu environment and it took about 20 hours.
Then we compared Word2Vec based model training result with Char2Vec based model training result. as a result, modelof based with Char2Vec that initialized random weight record 75.1% validation dataset accuracy and model of based withWord2Vec that pretrained with 3 million words and phrase record 71.6% validation dataset accuracy. so Char2Vec issuitable alternate of Word2Vec to optimize high system memory requirements problem.蹂??곌뎄???먯뿰??泥섎━ 臾몄젣 以??섎굹??臾몄옣 ?좎궗???먮퀎 臾몄젣瑜??λ윭?앹쑝濡??닿껐?섎뒗 ?곗뿉 ?덉뼱 Char2Vec湲곕컲?쇰줈 臾몄옣????泥섎━?섍퀬 ?숈뒿?쒖폒 洹??깅뒫???뺤씤?섍퀬 ??쒖쟻??Word Embedding 紐⑤뜽 Word2Vec瑜??泥댄븷 ???덈뒗媛?μ꽦???덈뒗吏 ?뚯븙?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?꾩쓽????臾몄옣??鍮꾧탳?????곕뒗 ?λ윭??援ъ“濡?Siamese Ma-STM ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕瑜??ъ슜?섏??? ?롫??쒕?蹂담륁쓽 ?щ윭 ?뚯꽕?ㅼ? ??좊옒?깆뼱臾몃떟????⑹뼱媛 湲곕컲?쇰줈 ?섍퀬 ?덈뜕 ?멸퀎瑜? ??댄썕媛곷퉬?, ?紐낆궗吏묒슂?, ??ъ쟾?곌뎄珥???臾몄옣泥닿퀎瑜?洹??쒗쁽?섎떒?쇰줈 ?댁꽌 援ъ껜?곸씠怨??띾??섍쾶 ?뺤긽?뷀븯??? ?⑹젣沅뚯쓽 遺뺢눼濡?以묒떖 ?녿뒗 遺꾪솕???쒖젏?ㅼ씠 ?곗옱?섍쾶 ?섏옄 ?쒖궗??湲고쉷? 二쇱껜媛 ?ㅼ뒪濡쒕? 留뚮뱾?닿???湲고쉷怨?遺꾧컙?????놁쓣 留뚰겮 源딆? 愿?⑥씠 ?덇쾶 ?섏뿀???롫??쒕?蹂담륁쓽 ?뚯꽕? ?꾩떎?멸퀎? ??븰愿怨꾨? ?좎??섎㈃???꾩떎?멸퀎瑜?二쇱껜?곸쑝濡??낇빐?섍퀬 ?≪닔?섏뿬 ?뚰솕??寃껋쓣 ?쒗쁽?섍퀬???섏??? ?뚮Ц???꾩떎?멸퀎????묒큺怨?援먰넻? 以묒슂??寃껋씠?덈뒗???대윭????븰愿怨꾧? 1910?꾩뿉 ?곗옱?섏뿀???뚯꽕???묒뼱?ㅼ뼱 源⑥?寃??쒕떎. ???쒓린??????蹂묓빀濡좎씠 援ъ껜?붾릺怨??앸??붽? 湲됱냽???대（?댁?怨??덈뜕 ?뚯?湲??뚮Ц???뚯꽕???듯빐 ?대줎二쇱껜媛 ?뺤튂??湲고쉷???쒖궗?뷀븯??寃껋씠 ?먯감 遺덇??ν빐議뚮떎. 1910?꾨? 蹂멸꺽?곸쑝濡??꾧컻?섎뒗 ?먯쑉??臾명븰愿??諛쒕떖? ?댁? 媛숈? ?앸?吏???뱀닔?깃낵 愿?⑤맂 寃껋씠?쇨퀬 ?????덈떎.This article aimed at exploring the process of how Daehanminbo had an appropriation on a discoursive space to itself and expanded self-narrative while the power of emperor collapsed and the supervision politics was implemented. For this purpose, it focused on the series of language readjustment and some of novels published in the newspaper titled Daehanminbo(1909.6.2節?910.8.31).
Daehanhyuphoe, which was in charge of publishing Daehanminbo, accepted the change in legal, political and economic system led by the Japanese Residency-General as a positive one, and Shinlaesungeomundap is a good example of this. Most of members in Daehanhyuphoe were from the middle class such as interpreters had experienced being in the transportation center or being one of the members who had planned a coup against Korean government or conducted the Gabo Reform of 1894. Thus, their experience could be related to the series, Shinlaesungeomundap. Comparing to the discourse subject who were called as national bourgeoisie or patriotic enlightenment intellectuals, they thought the differentiation of function in society, rule of law and bureaucratization as a common ground for modernity, Shinlaesungeomundap was a segment that contributed to the stabilization of modern law and legislations brought from Japan, whereas Inhungakbi, Myungsajibyo, and sajeonyeongucho were segmentes for producing the language at the syntactic level. that enabled the subjective expression on the world. These segments conducted a variety of activities: production of sentence structures with subjects and predicates, rebirth of traditional language or native words which were in the fields of words as literature language, and development a variety of final consonants.
Many novels published in Daehanminbo formed the concrete and affluent world that was a basis for the terms in Shinlaesungeomundap by using the sentenced structures in Inhungakbi, Myungsajibyo, and sajeinyeongucho. As acentric differentiated point of views became scattered due to the collapse of the power of emperor, narrative planning became relevant to the planning that the subject had been forming. And the distinction between them was hard to distinguish. A series of novels in Daehanminbo tried to express the real world which they had read and absorbed on their own, remaining in a relationship of dynamics. Therefore, contacts and communication with the real world were important. This relationship of dynamics, however, was broken when it reached to the series of novels published in 1910. This period was when annexation of Korea-Japan became actualized and Korea was rapidly colonized. Due to this time-based characteristic, it became impossible for discoursive subjects to narrate the political planning through novels. A development of autonomous point of view in literature, which was developed in 1910s, was related to the colonial characteristics.援?Ц珥덈줉 1. 1905???댄썑 蹂?뷀븯??怨듬줎??2. ???좊옒?깆뼱臾몃떟 ?????좎뼱? 臾몃챸??3. ???댄썕媛곷퉬?띉룔뚮챸?ъ쭛?붵띉룔뚯궗?꾩뿰援ъ큹??臾명븰?댁쓽 ?앹궛怨??몄뼱二쇰룄沅뚯뿉 ????뺣쭩 4. ?롫??쒕?蹂담??뚯꽕?몄뼱???먭린?앹궛留덇렇?덈툕??踰좊Ⅴ踰좊Ⅴ 臾명솕???섑????섍탳李⑥? ?쇱꽦?숈뿉 愿???뱀꽦 ?곌뎄

?ы쉶???뚯닔?먮? 諛붾씪蹂대뒗 ??媛쒖쓽 ?쒓컖竊랁룷?ㅽ듃?앸?二쇱쓽? ?덉떇誘쇱꽦 ?대줎

議곗꽑 ?꾧린 洹쇰????묒떖 媛쒕뀗???꾩엯 寃쎌쐞? 泥쒖＜援먯쓽 ??븷
遺?곕??숆탳 ?몃Ц?숈뿰援ъ냼, 議고쁽踰?Cho, Hyeon-Beom), [2014] [KCI?깆옱]

This article explores the usefulness of artificial intelligence in the context of pastoral counseling. Recently, artificial intelligence has received special attention from many people.
Artificial intelligence in regard to counselling has both postive and negative perspectives. To acquire the goal, this study analyzes the role of the artificial intelligence counselor, comparing it to the human counselor with regard to several important counseling concepts. The artificial intelligence counselor has some strengths including the aspects of unconditional positive regard, transference and countertransference, and counselor educational program.
Meanwhile, it also has limits in the areas of natural language processing, empathetic listening, self-appraisal, and theological and spiritual reflection. This study concludes that pastoral counseling observes and analyzes living human being?셲 inner pain and suffering theologically, spiritually, and biblically; so artificial intelligence has essential limitations in doing pastoral counseling. That is, the authentic healing to living human document can be realized through mutual encounter between living human beings. We cannot deny the strong effect of artificial intelligence on our life, culture, and even religion. Consequently, pastoral care and counseling should prepare for the era of artificial intelligence. This study will encourage fellow pastoral theologians and counselors to explore more research and discussion on this crucial issue.理쒓렐 ?ㅼ뼱, ?멸났吏??artificial intelligence)??怨쇳븰湲곗닠, ?섎즺, ?곗뾽 遺꾩빞??臾쇰줎 ?쇰컲?몃뱾?먭쾶 愿?ъ쓽 珥덉젏?쇰줈 ??먮릺怨??덈떎. ?멸났吏?μ씠 ?멸컙???띠뿉 誘몄튌 ?щ윭 媛吏 ?곹뼢???쒗렪?쇰줈??湲띿젙?곸쑝濡?蹂대㈃?쒕룄, ?ㅻⅨ ?쒗렪?쇰줈??遺?뺤쟻???곕젮???쒖꽑???덈뒗 寃??ъ떎?대떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? 紐⑺쉶?곷떞???덉뼱???멸났吏?μ씠 媛吏???좎슜?깃낵 ?쒓퀎?먯쓣 ?먯깋?섏??? ?대? ?꾪븯???곷떞?먯꽌 以묒슂????븷???섎뒗 媛쒕뀗??媛吏怨??멸났吏???곷떞?ъ쓽 ??븷???멸컙?곷떞?ъ? 鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 遺꾩꽍?섏??? ?멸났 吏?μ? ?대떞?먯뿉 ???臾댁“嫄댁쟻??湲띿젙???섏슜, ?꾩씠? ??쟾???덈갑 洹몃━怨??곷떞???덈젴 ?꾨줈洹몃옩 ?깆쓽 痢〓㈃?먯꽌 ?쒖슜 媛移섍? ?믪? ?μ젏??媛吏怨??덈떎. 諛섎㈃?? ?먯뿰??泥섎━, 怨듦컧??寃쎌껌, ?곷떞???먭린遺꾩꽍, ?좏븰??諛??곸쟻???깆같 ?깆뿉 ?덉뼱?쒕뒗 ?멸컙??留뚮뱺 湲곌퀎濡쒖꽌???멸났吏?μ씠 媛吏???쒓퀎?꾩쓣 蹂??쇰Ц? 諛앺엳怨??덈떎.

?먭쾶由ъ븘 ?쒕?湲?(Egeria?셲 Pilgrimage) ??湲곗닠???덈（?대젞 ?몃? ?깅???
?λ줈?뚯떊?숇??숆탳 湲곕룆援먯궗?곴낵臾명솕?곌뎄?? ?섏씤?? [2018] [KCI?깆옱]
議??섏썙???붾뜑???됲솕?ㅻ━
?λ줈?뚯떊?숇??숆탳 湲곕룆援먯궗?곴낵臾명솕?곌뎄?? ?뺤썝踰? [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

Typical algorithms of deep learning include CNN(Convolutional Neural Networks), which are mainly used for image recognition, and RNN(Recurrent Neural Networks), which are used mainly for speech recognition and natural language processing. Among them, CNN is able to learn from filters that generate feature maps with algorithms that automatically learn features from data, making it mainstream with excellent performance in image recognition. Since then, various algorithms such as R-CNN and others have appeared in object detection to improve performance of CNN, and algorithms such as YOLO(You Only Look Once) and SSD(Single Shot Multi-box Detector) have been proposed recently. However, since these deep learning-based detection algorithms determine the success of the detection in the still images, stable object tracking and detection in the video requires separate tracking capabilities. Therefore, this paper proposes a method of combining Kalman filters into deep learning-based detection networks for improved object tracking and detection performance in the video. The detection network used YOLO v2, which is capable of real-time processing, and the proposed method resulted in 7.7% IoU performance improvement over the existing YOLO v2 network and 20 fps processing speed in FHD images.???щ떇??????뚭퀬由ъ쬁?먮뒗 ?곸긽 ?몄떇??二쇰줈 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 CNN(Convolutional Neural Networks), ?뚯꽦?몄떇 諛??먯뿰??泥섎━??二쇰줈 ?ъ슜?섎뒗 RNN(Recurrent Neural Networks) ?깆씠 ?덈떎. ??以?CNN? ?곗씠?곕줈遺???먮룞?쇰줈 ?뱀쭠???숈뒿?섎뒗 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁?쇰줈 ?뱀쭠 留듭쓣 ?앹꽦?섎뒗 ?꾪꽣源뚯? ?숈뒿?????덉뼱 ?곸긽 ?몄떇 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?곗닔???깅뒫??蹂댁씠硫댁꽌 二쇰쪟瑜??대（寃??섏뿀?? ?댄썑, 媛앹껜 ?먯? 遺꾩빞?먯꽌??CNN???깅뒫???μ긽?섍퀬??R-CNN ???ㅼ뼇???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???깆옣?섏??쇰ŉ, 理쒓렐?먮뒗 寃異??띾룄 ?μ긽???꾪빐 YOLO(You Only Look Once), SSD(Single Shot Multi-box Detector) ?깆쓽 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???쒖븞?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?섏?留??대윭???λ윭??湲곕컲 ?먯? ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕???뺤? ?곸긽?먯꽌 ?먯????깃났 ?щ?瑜?寃곗젙?섍린 ?뚮Ц???숈쁺?곸뿉?쒖쓽 ?덉젙?곸씤 媛앹껜 異붿쟻 諛??먯?瑜??꾪빐?쒕뒗 蹂꾨룄??異붿쟻 湲곕뒫???꾩슂?섎떎. ?곕씪??蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌???숈쁺?곸뿉?쒖쓽 媛앹껜 異붿쟻 諛??먯? ?깅뒫 ?μ긽???꾪빐 ???щ떇 湲곕컲 ?먯? ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕??移쇰쭔 ?꾪꽣瑜?寃고빀??諛⑸쾿???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먯? ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕???ㅼ떆媛?泥섎━媛 媛?ν븳 YOLO v2瑜??댁슜?섏??쇰ŉ, ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵 ?쒖븞??諛⑸쾿? 湲곗〈 YOLO v2 ?ㅽ듃?뚰겕??鍮꾧탳?섏뿬 7.7%??IoU ?깅뒫 ?μ긽 寃곌낵瑜?蹂댁?怨?FHD ?곸긽?먯꽌 20 fps??泥섎━ ?띾룄瑜?蹂댁????뺤텞 ?곸긽 ?붿쭏 媛쒖꽑???꾪븳 ???щ떇 ?곌뎄?????遺꾩꽍

The recent generalized digital society has already passed the point of pursuing ?쁟omputer literacy?? Recent discussions have developed a new discussion on Digital Text Studies in connection with the so-called ?쁡igital humanities??concept. The concept of text in the digital age that we perceive will be a means of communication understood under an integrated semantic relation. In the digital aspect, text will be understood in terms of information provision. That is, an attempt to read out the tension relations existing between the interests more interestingly should be the point of digital text studies. In the case of cognitive theory based on the concept of digital text, it facilitates copying, manipulation and analysis based on the digitization of literature / text. On the other hand, the digital task of 'Digital Text Studies' is probably to make a futuristic and innovative hypothesis and problem consciousness in the humanistic field through this digital text concept. In this study, I will try to clarify this theoretical discussion from the viewpoint of Walter Benjamin and Friedrich Kittler's media aesthetics.理쒓렐???쇰컲?붾맂 ?붿????ы쉶???섏뺨?⑦꽣 臾명뿄?쇺숈씠 異붽뎄?섎뒗 吏?μ젏???대? 吏?섏퀜 踰꾨┛ 寃껋씠 ?꾨땶媛 ?띕떎. 理쒓렐???щ윭 ?쇱쓽?ㅼ? ?뚯쐞 ?섎뵒吏???대㉧?덊떚??媛쒕뀗怨??곌?吏?댁꽌 ?덈줈???섎뵒吏???띿뒪???ㅽ꽣?붿뒪 Digital Text Studies?숈뿉 ????쇱쓽瑜?諛쒖쟾?쒗궓諛??덈떎. ?붿????띿뒪???ㅽ꽣?붿뒪瑜??멸툒?쒕떎 ?⑥? 寃곗퐫 ?멸컙??吏???먯뿰?댁뿉 湲곕컲??吏?깆쓣 ?듬늻瑜대뒗 ?쇱씠 ?꾨땲硫? 遺덈챸猷뚰븿??????곕━???뺣쭩??紐곗븘?닿퀬???섎뒗 寃껋씠 ?꾨땲怨? 臾몄삁?숈쓣 0/1濡??대쨪吏??붿????쇰━ 泥닿퀎??媛?먮젮???쒕룄???붾뜑???꾨땲?? ?붿????띿뒪???곌뎄媛 吏?ν븯??諛붾뒗 ?꾨궇濡쒓렇???띿뒪??媛쒕뀗怨??붿????띿뒪??媛쒕뀗 ?ъ씠??湲댁옣愿怨꾨? 蹂대떎 ?섎? ?덇쾶 留뚮뱾怨좎옄 ?⑥씠?? ?곕━媛 ?몄떇?섎뒗 ?붿????쒕????띿뒪?몄쓽 媛쒕뀗? ?듯빀?곸씤 ?섎??곌??깊븯?먯꽌 ?댄빐?섏뼱吏???뚰넻???섎떒??寃껋씠硫? ?붿??몄쟻??痢〓㈃?먯꽌 ?띿뒪?몃뒗 ?뺣낫?쒓났??痢〓㈃?먯꽌 ?댄빐?섏뼱吏?寃껋씤吏??利? ?섎?? ?뺣낫?쇰뒗 ??痢〓㈃???띿뒪???댄빐 ?ъ씠??議댁옱?섎뒗 湲댁옣愿怨꾨? 蹂대떎 ?λ?濡?쾶 ?덈줈???쎌뼱?대뒗 ?쒕룄媛 ?붿????띿뒪???ㅽ꽣?붿뒪??吏?μ젏???섏뼱????寃껋씠?? ?붿??몄쟻???띿뒪??媛쒕뀗??洹쇨굅???몄????대줎??寃쎌슦??臾명븰/?띿뒪?몄쓽 ?붿??명솕??洹쇨굅??紐⑥궗? ?꾨떖, 議곗옉 洹몃━怨?遺꾩꽍???⑹씠?섍쾶 ?쒕떎. 諛섎㈃???섎뵒吏???띿뒪???ㅽ꽣?붿뒪?숈쓽 臾명뿄?숈쟻 ?꾨Т???꾨쭏???대윭???붿????띿뒪??媛쒕뀗???듯빐??誘몃옒吏?μ쟻?대ŉ ?곸떊?곸씤 媛?ㅺ낵 臾몄젣?섏떇???몃Ц?숈쟻 ?곸뿭??留뚭컻?섍쾶 ?섎뒗 寃껋씠由щ씪.

Die Studie 체ber die Beschr채nkung der Wortfolge der idiomatischen Binomialbilung wurde bisher durch die mehrschichtigen Gesichtspunkte und Prinzipien durchgef체hrt. Betrachtet man die allgemeine Tendenz, sind Abraham(1950), Moon(1998) und Gustaffson(1976) als Studie 체ber die Beschr채nkung durch die formelle Struktur zu nennen. Malkiel(1959), Cooper/Ross(1975) und M체ller gingen auf die phonetisch-phonologischen Schichten ein und die kognitiv-semantischen Bereichen wurden von Malkiel(1959), Cooper/Ross(1975) usw. mit den anderen Prinzipien behandelt. Wie bereits erw채hnt legte die phonetisch-phonologische Beschr채nkung darauf ihren gro횩en Wert, die Beschr채nkung der Stellen zwischen dem ersten Komponenten und dem zweiten Komponenten zu erkl채ren. Dabei wird angenommen, dass sie im Vergleich zu anderen Prinzipien Etwas Systematisches und eine Objektivit채t hat.
F체r die deutsche Sprache zeigte sich unter der Bedingung von 棺竊왥?der Genauigkeitsgrad von jeweils V(45.5%) > C쨀(39.1%) > P(37.6%) > F (36.8%), C짼(36.8%) > Cp(27.8%) > C쨔(18.4%). In der Beziehung zwischen der Handlung von Menschen und der Anordnung von Werkzeugen (oder Instrumenten) nach Zipf spielte die H채ufigkeit als ein wichtiger Mechanismus in Bezug auf die Wortfolge der Binomialbildung. Auf dieser Basis hat man versucht, dieses Prinzip f체r die Binomialbildung der deutschen Sprache anzuwenden. Daraus betr채gt die Beschr채nkung der Wortfolge durch die H채ufigkeit 64.7%. Dies ist am wichtigsten von allen anderen Prinzipien der Beschr채nkung. Daher wird die Beschr채nkung durch die H채ufigkeit als am 체berzeugendsten zwischen den Prinzipien der Beschr채nkung der Wortfolge in der idiomatischen Binomialbildung angesehen.愿?⑹쟻 ?댄빆援ъ“(Binomialbildung)???낆뼱?먯꽌肉??꾨땲??紐⑤뱺 ?먯뿰?댁뿉??鍮꾧탳???믪? ?ъ슜鍮덈룄瑜?蹂댁뿬二쇨퀬 ?덈떎. 洹??댁쑀????援ъ“媛 媛吏???뺤떇?곸씤 議고삎媛먭낵 諛섎났??由щ벉媛먯씠 援ъ“??源딄쾶 ?ъ쁺??寃곌낵濡?蹂댁씠硫? ?붾텋????援ъ“瑜??듯빐???쒗쁽?깆쓣 ?쒓퀬?섎뒗 ?섏궗?숈쟻 湲곕뒫???④퍡 ?묒슜?섍린 ?뚮Ц?대떎. ?泥대줈 ??援ъ“???꾪빆(first element)怨??꾪빆(second element)?쇰줈 援ъ꽦?섎ŉ, ?꾩껜?곸씤 ?섎???媛쒕퀎?댄쐶?뚯뿉???좎텛?????녿뒗 ?뱀꽦???덇린 ?뚮Ц???⑹꽦??compositionality) ???먮━媛 ?묐룞?섏? ?딅뒗 寃껋씠 ?먰븳 ?뱀쭠?대떎.Lokalbestimmungen in der deutschen und der koreanischen Sprache

?쒓뎅?낆뼱?낅Ц?숆탳?≫븰?? 沅뚯쁺寃? [2011] [KCI?깆옱]

This study examines how interactivity and usage mode of a chatbot interface affects user experience. Chatbot has rapidly been commercialized in accordance with improvements in artificial intelligence and natural language processing. However, most of the researches have focused on the technical aspect to improve the performance of chatbots, and it is necessary to study user experience on a chatbot interface. In this article, we investigated how 'interactivity' of an interface and the 'usage mode' referring to situations of a user affect the satisfaction, flow, and perceived usefulness of a chatbot for exploring user experience. As the result, first, the higher level of interactivity, the higher user experience. Second, usage mode showed interaction effect with interactivity on flow, although it didn?셳 show the main effect. In specific, when interactivity is high in usage mode, flow was the highest rather than other conditions. Thus, for designing better chatbot interfaces, it should be considered to increase the degree of interactivity, and for users to achieve a goal easily through various functions with high interactivity.蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??梨쀫큸 湲곕컲 ?명꽣?섏씠???댁슜 ???곹샇?묒슜?깃낵 ?ъ슜 紐⑤뱶媛 ?대뼸寃??ъ슜??寃쏀뿕???곹뼢??誘몄튂?붿?????섏뿬 ?뚯븘蹂댁븯?? 梨쀫큸? ?멸났吏??諛??먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠???μ긽???섏엯??鍮좊Ⅸ ?띾룄濡??곸슜?붾릺怨??덈떎. ?섏?留??遺遺꾩쓽 ?곌뎄媛 梨쀫큸???깅뒫???믪씠湲??꾪븳 湲곗닠??痢〓㈃?먮쭔 吏묒쨷???ㅼ젙?쇰줈, ?ъ슜??寃쏀뿕 痢〓㈃???곌뎄媛 ?쒓툒?섎떎. ?댁뿉 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌??梨쀫큸 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ쓽 ?ъ슜??寃쏀뿕 ?묒긽???댄뵾湲??꾪븯???명꽣?섏씠?ㅼ쓽 ?섏긽?몄옉?⑹꽦???섏?怨??ъ슜?먯쓽 ?명꽣?섏씠???곹솴???섏궗??紐⑤뱶?숆? ?대뼸寃??ъ슜?먯쓽 留뚯”, 紐곗엯, 吏媛곷맂 ?좎슜?깆뿉 ?곹뼢??誘몄튂?붿??댄렣蹂댁븯?? ?곌뎄 寃곌낵 ?곹샇?묒슜?깆? 洹??섏????믪쓣?섎줉 ???믪? ?ъ슜??寃쏀뿕???섍린?덈떎. ?먰븳 ?ъ슜 紐⑤뱶??二??④낵瑜?蹂댁씠吏???딆븯吏留? ?곹샇?묒슜?깃낵 紐곗엯????섏뿬 ?곹샇?묒슜 ?④낵瑜??섑??덈뒗?? 援ъ껜?곸쑝濡??ъ슜?먯쓽 ?명꽣?섏씠???ъ슜 紐⑺몴媛 ?쒕졆???곹솴 ?띿뿉???곹샇?묒슜?깆씠 ?믪쓣 寃쎌슦 紐곗엯??理쒕?濡??щ씪媛꾨떎??寃곌낵媛 ?꾩텧?섏뿀?? ?대? ?듯빐 湲띿젙?곸씤 ?ъ슜??寃쏀뿕???대걣???????덈뒗 梨쀫큸 ?명꽣?섏씠?ㅻ? ?붿옄?명븯湲??꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?곹샇?묒슜?깆쓣 諛섎뱶??怨좊젮?댁빞 ?섎ŉ, 援ъ껜??紐⑹쟻???섑뻾?섍만 ?먰븯???ъ슜?먯뿉寃뚮뒗 ?쎄쾶 怨쇱뾽???ъ꽦?????덈룄濡?異붽???湲곕뒫???쒓났?댁빞 ?쒕떎???ъ떎??諛앺??댁뿀???먯쑉二쇳뻾 ?④퀎蹂??쇳꽣?섏떆???붿뒪?뚮젅???ш린 諛??꾩튂??????좏샇??

?대?吏 湲곕컲 SNS???섑????대?吏???띿꽦怨??ъ슜??留뚯” -?몄뒪?洹몃옩怨???곕젅?ㅽ듃瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈-
?쒓뎅?먯씠移섏뵪?꾩씠?숉쉶, ?ㅼ??? [2019] [KCI?깆옱]

Generalized LR parsing is one of the enhanced LR parsing methods so that it overcome the limit of one-way linear stack of the traditional LR parser using graph-structured stack, and it has been playing an important role of a firm starting point to generate other variations for NL parsing equipped with various mechanisms. In this paper, we propose a Conditional Action Model that can solve the problems of conventional probabilistic GLR methods. Previous probabilistic GLR parsers have used relatively limited contextual information for disambiguation due to the high complexity of internal GLR stack. Our proposed model uses Surface Phrasal Types representing the structural characteristics of the parse for its additional contextual information, so that more specified structural preferences can be reflected into the parser. Experimental results show that our GLR parser with the proposed Conditional Action Model outperforms the previous methods by about 6~7% without any lexical information, and our model can utilize the rich stack information for syntactic disambiguation of probabilistic LR parser.?쇰컲??LR(Generalized LR, ?댄븯 GLR) ?뚯떛? ?좏삎 ?ㅽ깮???ъ슜?섎뒗 ?꾪넻?곸씤 LR ?뚯떛 諛⑹떇???쒓퀎瑜?洹밸났?섎룄濡?留뚮뱾?댁쭊 LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿???섎굹濡쒖꽌, LR 湲곕쾿???щ윭 媛吏 留ㅼ빱?덉쬁???듯빀?섏뿬 ?먯뿰???뚯떛???묒슜?섎뒗 ?묒뾽???좊?媛 ?섏뼱 ?붾떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??湲곗〈???뺣쪧??LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿??媛吏怨??덈뒗 臾몄젣瑜?媛쒖꽑??議곌굔遺 ?곗궛 紐⑤뜽(Conditional Action Model)???쒖븞?쒕떎. 湲곗〈???뺣쪧??LR ?뚯떛 湲곕쾿? 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?ㅽ깮??蹂듭옟?깆쑝濡??명빐 ?곷??곸쑝濡??쒗븳??臾몃㎘ ?뺣낫留뚯쓣 ?ъ슜?섏뿬 ?붾떎. ?쒖븞??紐⑤뜽? 遺遺??앹꽦 ?뚯뒪???쒗쁽???꾪븯???쒖링 援щЦ ???Surface Phrasal Type)???ъ슜?섏뿬 洹몃옒??援ъ“ ?ㅽ깮???ㅼ뼱 ?덈뒗 援щЦ 援ъ“瑜?湲곗닠?⑥쑝濡쒖뜥 醫 ???몃텇??援ъ“???좏샇?꾨? ?뚯꽌??諛섏쁺?쒗궗 ???덈떎. ?ㅽ뿕 寃곌낵, ?댄쐶瑜?怨좊젮?섏? ?딄퀬 ?숈뒿??議곌굔遺 ?곗궛 紐⑤뜽濡?援ы쁽??蹂?GLR ?뚯꽌??湲곗〈??諛⑹떇蹂대떎 ??6-7%???뺥솗???μ긽??蹂댁??쇰ŉ, 蹂?紐⑤뜽???듯빐 ?띾????ㅽ깮 ?뺣낫瑜??뺣쪧??LR ?뚯꽌??援ъ“??以묒쓽???닿껐???④낵?곸쑝濡??ъ슜?????덉쓬??蹂댁???JML???댁슜??Java ?먯떆 肄붾뱶????났???쒓났?숈쟻 ?묎렐

?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? 沅뚯삤寃? [2003] [KCI?깆옱]
紐낆궗 異쒗쁽 ?뱀꽦???댁슜???⑥쑉?곸씤 ?쒓뎅??紐낆궗 異붿텧 諛⑸쾿
?쒓뎅?뺣낫怨쇳븰?? ?대룄湲? [2003] [KCI?깆옱]

The purpose of this paper is to develop an unplugged education program that develops the 4C (Creativity, Critical thinking, Communication ability, Collaboration) and CT (Computational Thinking) competencies required in modern society. This study discovered ?쏤ine Dust Robot??as a theme suitable for the unplugged education program, and designed the Unplugged 4-hour education program which can develop 4C and CT competencies. The first stage motivates learning, and the second and third stages develop unplugged activity to develop CT. In the fourth stage, the algorithms created through unplugged activities were programmed through the natural language instruction card and produced the output. We developed educational materials that can be utilized in the unplugged education program. Finally, education programs were conducted for elementary school students, and pre- and post-tests of computational thinking were conducted for general students and gifted students. Educational effective was found in both groups.蹂??곌뎄???꾨??ы쉶?먯꽌 ?붽뎄?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ??웾??4C(李쎌쓽?? 鍮꾪뙋???ш퀬?? ?섏궗?뚰넻 ?λ젰, ?묒뾽)? CT(Computational Thinking)瑜??④낵?곸쑝濡?湲곕? ???덈뒗 ?명뵆?ш렇??援먯쑁 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??媛쒕컻?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?섑뻾?섏뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄???곗꽑 ?명뵆?ш렇??援먯쑁 ?꾨줈洹몃옩???곹빀??二쇱젣濡??섎??몃㉫吏 濡쒕큸?숈쓣 諛쒓뎬?섏??? ?ㅼ쓬?쇰줈 諛쒓뎬??二쇱젣???곕씪 4C? CT瑜?湲곕? ???덈뒗 ?명뵆?ш렇??援먯쑁 ?꾨줈洹몃옩 4李⑥떆瑜??ㅺ퀎?섏??? 蹂??곌뎄媛 媛쒕컻??援먯쑁 ?꾨줈洹몃옩??媛쒖슂???ㅼ쓬怨?媛숇떎. 1李⑥떆??二쇱젣瑜??몄떇?섍퀬 ?숈뒿 ?숆린瑜??좊컻?섎룄濡??섏??쇰ŉ, 2李⑥떆? 3李⑥떆???명뵆?ш렇????대? 諛뷀깢?쇰줈 CT瑜?怨꾨컻?꾨줉 ?섏??? 4李⑥떆???명뵆?ш렇????대? ?듯빐 留뚮뱺 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁???먯뿰??紐낅졊??移대뱶瑜??듯빐 ?꾨줈洹몃옒諛랁븯硫??곗텧臾쇱쓣 ?쒖옉?섎룄濡??섏??? 洹몃━怨??ㅺ퀎???명뵆?ш렇??援먯쑁 ?꾨줈洹몃옩?먯꽌 ?쒖슜?????덈뒗 援먯쑁 ?먮즺瑜?媛쒕컻?섏??? 珥덈벑?숈깮????곸쑝濡?援먯쑁 ?꾨줈洹몃옩???쒕쾾 ?곸슜???ㅼ떆?섍퀬, 而댄벂???ш퀬???ъ쟾쨌?ы썑 寃?щ? ?쇰컲?숈깮怨??곸옱?숈깮????곸쑝濡??ㅼ떆?? 寃곌낵 2吏묐떒 紐⑤몢 ?④낵?깆씠 ?뺤씤?섏뿀??珥댟룹쨷???뚰봽?몄썾???뺣낫) 援먯쑁 ?댁슜???곌퀎瑜??꾪븳 怨꾩뿴??遺꾩빞 遺꾩꽍 諛??쒖뼵
?쒓뎅李쎌쓽?뺣낫臾명솕?숉쉶, ?꾩슜二? [2019] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

?쒓뎅李쎌쓽?뺣낫臾명솕?숉쉶, 諛깆쭊?? [2019] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
珥댟룹쨷?깊븰援먯뿉???깃났?곸씤 SW援먯쑁 ?뺤갑???꾪븳 諛⑹븞 紐⑥깋 - 珥덉쨷???숈깮 諛?援먯궗??SW援먯쑁??????몄떇??以묒젏?쇰줈 -
?쒓뎅李쎌쓽?뺣낫臾명솕?숉쉶, ?쒖닚?? [2019] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

Modern literature in Korea was in its formative years in the 1920s, and some writers assumed the role of critics. These writer-critics started appearing in the literary review sections of two major magazines of the time: Kaebyo?k (New Dawn, 1920-26) and Choso?n Mundan (Choso?n Literary World, 1924-27). Lacking any professional training, what critical terms did they utilize in their reviews? Here, I conduct a detailed investigation into the language they used, through the method of computational linguistics.
1) This article extracts frequently appearing words and phrases associated with literary criticism, identifying co-occurring words with an algorithm called Word2Vec which locates words that are physically distant but semantically close. 2) This allows the magazines to be closely scrutinized, tracing the contexts of literary reviews, and demonstrating the different ways in which the selected terms were used This article will, I believe, contribute to revealing some hitherto forgotten terms in the history of literary criticism which were in active use by the writer-critics in the early stages of modern literature in Korea.1920?꾨????꾩쭅 洹쇰?臾명븰?뺤꽦湲곕줈 ?묎?媛 ?묓뭹?됯퉴吏 ?대떦?섎뒗 鍮꾪룊媛????븷???섍퀬 ?덉뿀?? 洹몃뱾? ?롪컻踰?1920節?926)怨??롮“?좊Ц?ⓦ?1924節?927)???뷀룊怨??⑺룊?뚮? ?듯빐 ?ㅼ닔???묓뭹??鍮꾪룊?섏??? ?꾩뾽 鍮꾪룊媛???덈젴???꾩쭅 諛쏆? 紐삵븳 ?롪컻踰썬뤾낵 ?롮“?좊Ц?ⓦ륁쓽 ?묎?-鍮꾪룊媛?ㅼ? ?대뼚???몄뼱濡??묓뭹 鍮꾪룊???섍퀬 ?덉뿀?꾧퉴? ?ш린?먯꽌???몄뼱?숈쟻 ?뺣웾遺꾩꽍諛⑹떇???쒖슜?섏뿬 ?묎?-鍮꾪룊媛媛 ?ъ슜?덈뜕?뱀떆??鍮꾪룊?대? 誘몄떆?곸쑝濡??댄렣蹂닿퀬???쒕떎. ??蹂??쇰Ц? ?롪컻踰썬뤾낵 ?롮“?좊Ц?ⓦ????묓뭹?됱쓣 ?좊퀎?섍퀬 ?먯뿰??泥섎━瑜??섏뿬 ?먯＜ ?깆옣?섎뒗 ?⑥뼱?ㅼ쓽 鍮덈룄瑜?援ы븳?? ???대? ?듯빐 鍮꾪룊媛?ㅼ쓽 ?대쫫怨??④퍡 鍮덈쾲?섍쾶 異쒗쁽???⑥뼱??怨듦린???김돈 沃?]??援ы븷 寃껋씠?? 怨듦린??李얘린???ъ슜???뚭퀬由щ벉? ?섏썙?쒗닾踰?Word2Vec)?숈씠?쇰뒗 寃껋씤?? ???꾨줈洹몃옩? ?곌뎄 ??곸뼱? 臾쇰━?곸쑝濡쒕뒗 硫由??덉?留??섎??곸쑝濡쒓?源뚯슫 ?⑥뼱瑜?李얠븘 二쇰뒗 ?μ젏???덈떎. ?㏂롪컻踰썬뤾낵 ?롮“?좊Ц?ⓦ륁뿉?????鍮꾪룊?닿? ?곗씤 媛곴컖??留λ씫??李얠븘 ?⑸쾿??李⑥씠瑜?援ы븷 寃껋씠?? 寃곕줎???댁빞湲고븯硫? 蹂몃끉臾몄??롪컻踰썬륁뿉???섏깮?쒋숈쓣, ?롮“?좊Ц?ⓦ륁뿉???섑깭?꾟숇씪???⑥뼱瑜?二쇰ぉ?쒕떎. ???⑥뼱紐⑤몢 怨좊퉰???⑥뼱?댁?留?洹?鍮꾪룊???⑸쾿? 李⑥씠媛 ?덈떎. ?섏깮?쒋숈? 二쇱씤怨듭씠 寃る뒗 援ъ껜???ш굔怨?洹??먯씤???ы쉶?곸쑝濡? ??궗?곸쑝濡??섎졃?섏뿬 ?대줎?뷀븯?ㅻ뒗 寃쏀뼢?닿컯?덈뜕 諛섎㈃, ?묓뭹 ?먯껜?????泥쒖갑? ?ㅽ엳??臾명븰?ъ뿉 ???뚮젮吏吏 ?딆? ?섑깭?꾟?履쎌씠 媛뺥븯??? ?뱁엳 ?쇱긽??? ?섑깭?꾟숇? ?ㅼ콈濡?쾶 ?쒖슜?섏뿬 ?뱀떆 二쇱슂 ?곸젏?대뜕 鍮꾪룊??二쇨??깃낵 媛앷??? 臾명븰???덉뼱?쒖쓽 ?섏쓽 ?섎?, ?뚯꽕?먯꽌 ?ъ긽???댄빐?섎뒗 諛⑹떇 ?깆뿉 ?곴레 愿?ы븯怨??덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц? 鍮꾪룊?ъ뿉???딇엺, 洹몃윭??1920?꾨???鍮꾪룊媛?ㅼ뿉 以묒슂?섍쾶 ?ъ슜???묓뭹 鍮꾪룊?댁쓽 ?밸????섎?瑜?諛앺엳???곗뿉 湲곗뿬??寃껋쑝濡?誘용뒗???섎뵒吏?몄씤臾????숈쓽 ?덈줈???꾩쟾??2016???????붿??몄븘移댁씠釉뙿룸뵒吏?몄씤臾명븰 援?젣?숈닠?뚯쓽 李멸?湲???

ICT 湲곗닠????섏뿬 吏곸젒?곸씤 ?곸슜 ?щ?蹂대떎??媛쒕뀗???먮뒗 湲곗닠 ?쒖슜쨌?묒슜??媛?μ꽦???吏꾪븯???뺣룄???쒖젙?섍퀬 ?덉쑝硫? ?ㅼ젣 ?洹쒕え ?섍꼍?댁뒋瑜??닿껐?섍린 ?꾪븳 吏곸젒??湲곗닠 ?곸슜 ?щ???留ㅼ슦 ?쒕Ц ?뺥렪?대떎. 利? 媛곴컖??紐⑹쟻??遺?⑸릺???섍꼍怨듦컙?뺣낫 援ъ텞怨?理쒖떊 ICT 湲곗닠???곸옱?곸냼???듯빀?섏뼱???쒕떎. ?대? ?듯븯??湲고썑蹂??諛??먯뿰?ы빐 ?깆뿉 ?섑븯??吏?띿쟻?쇰줈 諛쒗쁽?섎뒗 ?섍꼍?댁뒋???곴레?????泥닿퀎瑜?援ъ텞?섏뿬???쒕떎. ?섏㎏, 踰붾?泥??듯빀 ?곌뎄 媛쒕컻???꾩슂?깆씠?? `ICT 湲곗닠 諛??섍꼍 遺臾??듯빀 ?곌뎄 媛쒕컻`???꾪빐?쒕뒗 ?섍꼍怨듦컙?뺣낫 援ъ텞 湲곌?, ICT 湲곗닠 媛쒕컻 湲곌? ?깆쓽 ?묐젰??以묒슂?섎떎. ?ㅼ쭏???묐젰???섑뻾怨??⑥쑉???곌뎄 媛쒕컻 諛??곌뎄 ?깃낵 ?뺤궛???듯븳 ?섍꼍?댁뒋 ?닿껐???꾪븳 踰붾?泥?李⑥썝???묒쓽媛 ?꾩슂?섎떎.The purpose of this study is to converge various environmental spatial information and advanced ICT (Information and Communication Technology) technology, to develop cases that are instantly applicable to the environmental issues that have recently emerged and ultimately to suggest their efficient utilization by reforming the ways environmental spatial information is utilized. Considering the technical characteristics of the theme of this study ??the convergence and utilization of environmental spatial information and ICT ??this study reviewed the status of established environmental spatial information, relevant cases and previous studies about how ICT is being applied in the area of environment. In addition, text mining analysis, one of the big-data analysis techniques, was performed on domestically-published papers in environmental areas that utilized spatial information and ICT. By doing so, this study attempted a multifaceted analysis to empirically review measures to address environmental issues by using spatial information and ICT. Through the review of early studies and case studies of how environmental spatial information is established, it was found that the environmental spatial information that 22 public agencies (the Ministry of Environment, the Korea National Park Service, the National Institute of Ecology, etc.) have already obtained and can establish going forward accounted for 53.8% of the 837 data types of the entire system, and 74.9% in case of environmental thematic maps. To review the cases and the status of how ICT is used in environmental areas, we divided ICT into 9 categories including green ICT (public and industrial convergence services), big data (big data platforms), and artificial intelligence (AI and cognitive computing). The definition, role and market condition of each ICT was reviewed, and cases in which ICT was directly used in environmental areas in the United Kingdom, Germany, China and South Korea were collected and analyzed. For a meta analysis of the utilization of environmental spatial information and ICT in environmental areas, a text mining technique used to analyze atypical data and natural languages among big data analysis methods was employed. In total, 1,228 domestically-published papers acquired from the NDSL (http://www.ndsl.kr) were analyzed. The results of the text mining analysis are divided into two groups. First, the status of the utilization of environmental spatial information in environmental areas in South Korea was analyzed, and the results showed that the utilization of environmental spatial information has continued to increase from 1996 to 2015. The results of the keyword frequency analysis of the utilization of environmental spatial information showed that the area with the highest frequency rate was ?쐃nvironment in general??covering agriculture, environmental education, land coverage and others (40.85%). According to the results of keyword time series analysis, for the period between 1996 and 2000 the share of the studies on ?쐁limate??was the highest, but since 2001, the share of the studies on ?쐃nvironment in general??has been on the rise. The results can be attributable to the growing attention to environmental education and the application of environmental technology to areas like ?쏿griculture,??and ?쐃nvironmental education??since 2001. Through keyword correlation analysis, 80 correlation rules were generated in total. The category that generated the most correlation rules among environmental areas was ?쐃nvironment in general (17),??followed by ?쐁limate (16),???쐀iodiversity (11),???쐓oil quality (11),???쐗ater quality (9),???쏿ir quality (5),???쐌arine health (5),???쐆azardous materials & health care (3),???쐗aste (2),??and ?쐍oise (1).??Second, the status of the utilization of ICT in environmental areas was analyzed. The results showed that, for the period between 1996 and 2015, the largest amount of papers (68) among the 359 collected papers were published in 2012, and the number has gradually increased since then. The results of the keyword frequency analysis of the utilization of ICT showed that the frequency rate of the ?쐃nvironment in general??category was the highest (38.60%). The analysis results of the ?쐃nvironment in general??and ?쐁limate??categories were very high, similar to those of the utilization of environmental spatial information mentioned above. According to the results of keyword time series analysis, the share of the studies on ?쐏ublic convergence service??was the highest. The analyzed studies on ?쐏ublic convergence service??roughly covered the concepts and status of the utilization of ICT in medical, national defense, and health care fields. In other words, instead of discussing detailed measures to directly utilize ICT-based technologies in each field, they focused only on setting a conceptual direction for the improvement of such fields through the integration of ICT. Through keyword correlation analysis, 17 correlation rules were generated in the ?쐃nvironment in general??category, followed by ?쐁limate (15),???쐗ater quality (9),???쏿ir quality (7),???쐀iodiversity (4),???쐆azardous materials & health care (2),???쐌an-made disaster (2),???쐓oil quality (2),??and ?쐌arine health (1).??To provide an example of improving the utilization of environmental spatial information by reflecting ICT, the current status of South Korea`s environmental spatial information mentioned above, and the up-do-date status and applicability of ICT were reviewed. First, technology maps were formulated based on the results of the text mining analysis to obtain quantitative results. Among the contents of the technology maps, two key environmental issues (heat wave caused by climate change, and earthquake among natural disasters) were selected. Measures were suggested to address each of the two issues by converging the reviewed environmental spatial information and ICT in this study. A framework for addressing heat wave by tapping into ICT first requires 5 types of environmental spatial information that can be utilized (satellite image, climate change scenario & atmospheric observation data, disaster-related data, water resource data, and environmental statistics & spatial information). Each of the applicable spatial information is being produced and managed by public agencies including the National Geographic Information Institute, the Korea Meteorological Administration, the Ministry of Environment, the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport, and the Korea Environment Institute (KEI). Based on the information, it is possible to reform the current heat wave alert service for the public into a more detailed and consumer-centered alert service by utilizing content-based green ICT such as ?쐏ublic convergence service,???쏿rtificial intelligence cognitive computing,??and ?쐀ig data platform.??A framework to address earthquake by utilizing ICT also requires the same 5 types, in addition to information on seismic center and magnitude, and environmental infrastructure. Each of the applicable spatial information is produced and managed by public agencies such as the National Geographic Information Institute, the Korea Meteorological Administration, the Ministry of Environment, the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport, the Korea Expressway Corporation and the Korea Environment Corporation. By utilizing content-based green ICT such as ?쐏ublic convergence service,???쏿rtificial intelligence cognitive computing,??and ?쐀ig-data platform??based on the information, the current earthquake alert service can be improved to include real-time alert system, information distribution through various media, AI-based system to handle civil complaints, and social infrastructure damage estimation. Policy recommendations were made from two perspectives. The first is the necessity of R&D on the convergence of ICT and environmental areas. Early studies only focused on the concept and possibility of the utilization and application of ICT rather than discussing cases of direct application. There is almost no case where ICT was directly applied to address large-scale environmental issues. In other words, environmental spatial information needs to be established according to the purpose of each case, and to converge ICT in the right place at the right time. By doing so, a proactive response system should be established to address the issues that continue to occur due to climate change and natural disasters. The second is the necessity of pursuing R&D on convergence across agencies. For the convergence of ICT and environmental areas, it is essential to facilitate cooperation between the public agencies that establish environmental spatial information and those that develop ICT. Thus, cross-organizational collaboration is needed to promote actual cooperation and to address environmental issues through efficient R&D and the distribution of research results.吏??린諛??섍꼍蹂닿굔?뺤콉 吏??諛⑹븞 ?곌뎄(??
?쒓뎅?섍꼍?뺤콉?됯??곌뎄?? ?좎슜??( Yongseung Shin ), [2016]

?쒓뎅?섍꼍?뺤콉?됯??곌뎄?? 源?숉쁽 ( Kim Donghyun ), [2016]
以묎뎅??`?쇰??쇰줈(訝躍뜸?瓮?` ????좊씪?쒖븘 吏???섍꼍?꾨왂 ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅?섍꼍?뺤콉?됯??곌뎄?? 異붿옣誘?( Jang Min Chu ), [2016]

Due to the development of Internet, number of online documents and the amount of web services are increasing dramatically. However, there are several procedures required, before you actually find what you were looking for. These procedures are necessary to Internet users, but it takes time to search. As a method to systematize and simplify this repetitive job, this paper suggests a DotQuery based interactive search agent. This agent enables a user to search, from his computer, a plenty of information through the DotQuery service, which includes natural languages, and it executes several procedures required instead. This agent also functions as a plug-in service within general web browsers such as Internet Explorer and decodes the DotQuery service. Then it analyzes the DotQuery from a user through its own program and acquires service results through multiple browsers of its own.?명꽣?룹쓽 諛쒕떖濡??뱀긽???섎쭖? 臾몄꽌? ?뱀꽌鍮꾩뒪媛 湲됯꺽??利앷??섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?명꽣???ъ슜?먮뱾? ?뱀뿉???먰븯???뺣낫? ?쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?띾뱷?섍린 ?꾪빐?쒕뒗 媛곸쥌 釉뚮씪?곗??먯꽌 ?щ윭 ?④퀎???꾨줈洹몃옩 議곗옉 ?덉감瑜?諛섎났?섍퀬 ?ъ씠?몃쭏??怨좎쑀???쒕퉬??援ъ“?ㅼ쓣 ?댄빐???곹깭?먯꽌 ?щ윭 踰덉쓽 諛⑸Ц ?덉감?ㅼ쓣 嫄곗퀜???쒕떎. ?대윭???덉감?ㅼ? ?ъ슜?먯뿉寃?瑗??꾩슂???좏뻾 ?묒뾽?대ŉ, ?ъ슜?먭? ?ㅼ젣濡??쒕퉬???띾뱷??嫄몃━???쒓컙蹂대떎???좏뻾 ?묒뾽???뚯슂?섎뒗 ?쒓컙??????寃??꾩떎?대떎. ?대윭???쒓컙?뚯슂瑜?洹밸났?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?⑥닚 諛섎났?곸씤 ?묒뾽??蹂대떎 泥닿퀎?뷀븯怨??⑥닚?뷀븯湲??꾪븳 諛⑹븞?쇰줈 ?룻걧?대━ 湲곕컲????뷀삎 寃???먯씠?꾪듃瑜??쒖븞?쒕떎. ?쒖븞?섎뒗 ?먯씠?꾪듃???ъ슜?먯쓽 而댄벂?곗뿉???먯뿰??紐낅졊???ы븿?섎뒗 ?룻걧?대━瑜??듯빐 ?명꽣???ъ씠?멸? ?쒓났?섎뒗 ?ㅼ뼇???쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?띾뱷?섎뒗???뚯슂?섎뒗 ?щ윭 ?덉감?ㅼ쓣 ??됲븯寃??섍퀬, ?ㅼ닔???뱀궗?댄듃?????蹂묐젹 ?쒕퉬?ㅻ뱾 ?먰븳 ??됲븯寃??쒕떎. ???먯씠?꾪듃??IE? 媛숈? 踰붿슜 釉뚮씪?곗? ?댁뿉 ?뚮윭洹??몃릺???룻걧?대━瑜??대룆?섎ŉ, ?먯껜 ?꾨줈洹몃옩???듯븯?ъ꽌???ъ슜?먭? 吏?쒗븳 ?룻걧?대━瑜?遺꾩꽍?섏뿬, 蹂듭닔???먯껜釉뚮씪?곗??ㅼ쓣 ?듯빐 ?쒕퉬??寃곌낵瑜??띾뱷?섎룄濡?援ъ꽦?섏???紐⑤컮???쒕퉬?ㅻ? ?꾪븳 ?듯빀?뺣낫?쒖뒪?쒓낵 ??숈“吏??깃낵??愿???ㅼ쬆 ?곌뎄

?쒓뎅而댄벂?곗젙蹂댄븰?? 源?뺤썝, [2006] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

Question answering system (QA system) is a system that finds an actual answer to the question posed by a user, whereas a typical search engine would only find the links to the relevant documents. Recent works related to the open domain QA systems are receiving much attention in the fields of natural language processing, artificial intelligence, and data mining. However, the prior works on QA systems simply replace all words that are not in the training data with a single token, even though such unseen words are likely to play crucial roles in differentiating the candidate answers from the actual answers. In this paper, we propose a method to compute vectors of such unseen words by taking into account the context in which the words have occurred. Next, we also propose a model which utilizes inverse document frequencies (IDF) to efficiently process unseen words by expanding the system?셲 vocabulary. Finally, we validate that the proposed method and model improve the performance of a QA system through experiments.吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖? ?ъ슜?먯쓽 吏덈Ц??????듭쓣 李얠븘二쇰뒗 ?쒖뒪?쒖쑝濡? 湲곗〈??寃?됱뿏吏꾩씠 ?ъ슜?먯쓽 吏덉쓽?????愿?⑤맂 臾몄꽌??留곹겕留뚯쓣 李얠븘二쇰뒗 諛섎㈃ 吏덈Ц?????理쒖쥌?곸씤 ?듭쓣 李얠븘以?ㅻ뒗 李⑥씠?먯씠 ?덈떎. ?뱀젙 遺꾩빞??援?븳?섏? ?딄퀬 ?ㅼ뼇??吏덈Ц??泥섎━?댁＜???ㅽ뵂 ?꾨찓??吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ?꾩슂?쒖뿰援щ뱾??理쒓렐 ?먯뿰??泥섎━, ?멸났吏?? ?곗씠??留덉씠?????숆퀎???ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?ㅼ뿉???④굅??愿?ъ쓣 諛쏄퀬?덈떎. ?섏?留?愿???곌뎄?먯꽌???숈뒿 ?곗씠?곗뿉???놁뿀???⑥뼱?ㅼ씠 吏덈Ц??????뺥솗???듦낵 ?좎궗???ㅻ떟?꾧뎄蹂꾪빐?대뒗??寃곗젙?곸씤 ??븷???????덉쓬?먮룄, ?대윭??泥섏쓬 蹂대뒗 ?⑥뼱?ㅼ쓣 紐⑤몢 ?⑥씪 ?좏겙?쇰줈 移섑솚?대쾭由щ뒗 臾몄젣媛 ?덈떎. 蹂??쇰Ц?먯꽌??臾몃㎘ ?뺣낫瑜??듯빐 ?대윭??紐⑤Ⅴ???⑥뼱?????踰≫꽣瑜?怨꾩궛?섎뒗 諛⑸쾿?꾩젣?덊븳?? 洹몃━怨???Ц?뚮퉰??媛以묒튂瑜??쒖슜?섏뿬 臾몃㎘?뺣낫瑜????⑥쑉?곸쑝濡?泥섎━?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽???쒖븞?쒕떎. ?먰븳 ?띾????ㅽ뿕???듯빐 吏덉쓽?묐떟 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 紐⑤뜽 ?숈뒿 ?띾룄 諛??뺥솗?깆씠 湲곗〈 ?곌뎄??鍮꾪빐 ?μ긽?⑥쓣 ?뺤씤?섏???寃뚯엫 ?대줎???묎렐???듯븳 ?④낵?곸씤 ?덉쐢 ?붽뎄?ы빆 ?묒긽 湲곕쾿

?뉑쑌??뚣걢???뚣걢?쀣굢?띲뚣걽?띲걝?뗣띲겏?뚣겖?띲겗 ?η틠?ャ겇?꾠겍
?몃궓??숆탳, ??쨵岳? [2001]
????ャ깋?ャ긿?쀥뀻?뚪뼀?с겏?볠뿥?쒍퓗獄?
?몃궓??숆탳, ?닻젂?? [2001]

The purpose of this study was to analyze trends in standards-related research using Big Data techniques. In order to achieve the purpose of the study, Big data analysis was conducted on 441 academic materials derived from keyword search such as standard and standard education from May 1, 2017 to December 30. The types of big data analysis methods were text mining techniques. ?쁔m?? ?쁒ColorBrewer?? ?쁶ord cloud?? ?쁰cc?? ?쁊oNLP??were used package in R. It was to delete the words and symbols that do not require and by using the morphological analysis of the natural language processing technology made the statement as a minimum unit. In this paper, we analyze the frequency of word appearing in the title of academic articles and present it as a word crowd using the R program's crowding package. The results of this study are as follows. First, the most frequently mentioned word during the first period (2007 ~ 21011) was ?쁲tandard?? In addition to the standard, the most frequent words were ?쁟urriculum?? ?쁢ducation?? ?쁟ourse?? and ?쁟hildcare?? The most frequently mentioned word between the two periods (2012 ~ 2014) was education. Next, there were ?쁲tandard?? ?쁦nvention?? ?쁭ational incompetence??and ?쁟ompetence?? The word most often mentioned in the third period (2015 ~ 2017) was the ?쁯rocess?? Next, there were ?쁦nventions?? ?쁭ational incompetence?? and ?쁟ompetence?? The standardized researches showed quantitative growth through the 1 st, 2 nd, and 3 rd periods, and the key keywords were ?쁂urriculum?? ?쁄ducation?? ?쁏rocess?? ?쁂hild Care?? ?쁈nvention?? ?쁍ational Disability??And ?쁟ompetence?????곌뎄??紐⑹쟻? 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 湲곕쾿???쒖슜?섏뿬 ?쒖? 愿???곌뎄 ?숉뼢??遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 寃껋씠?덈떎. ?곌뎄??紐⑹쟻???ъ꽦?섍린 ?꾪빐 2017??5??1?쇰???12??30?쇨퉴吏 由ъ뒪?ъ쑀?먯꽌 ?섑몴以?? ?섑몴以援먯쑁???깆쓽 ?ㅼ썙??寃?됱쓣 ?듯빐 ?꾩텧??珥?441?몄쓽 ?숈닠 ?먮즺瑜???곸쑝濡?鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 遺꾩꽍?섏??? ???곌뎄?먯꽌 ?ъ슜 ??鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿? ?띿뒪??留덉씠??Text Mining)?댁뿀?? 遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 ?ъ슜???꾨줈洹몃옩? R ?꾨줈洹몃옩?대떎. 媛怨??쒗렪???댁슜???ㅼ텞 癒몄떆?앹꽱??媛怨??쒗뿕 諛⑸쾿???쒖???
?쒖??몄쬆?덉쟾?숉쉶, 源二쇳쁽, [2018] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]
援먯쑁?쒖꽕 ?뚰뼢 ?깅뒫 ?됯? 吏??諛??깅뒫 ?쒖???
?쒖??몄쬆?덉쟾?숉쉶, ?뺤젙?? [2018] [KCI?깆옱?꾨낫]

The purpose of this study is to suggest a model analysing spatio-temporal characteristics of the civil complaints for the officially assessed land price based on big data mining. Specifically, in this study, the underlying reasons for the civil complaints were found from the spatio-temporal perspectives, rather than the institutional factors, and a model was suggested monitoring a trend of the occurrence of such complaints. The official documents of 6,481 civil complaints for the officially assessed land price in the district of Jung-gu of Incheon Metropolitan City over the period from 2006 to 2015 along with their temporal and spatial poperties were collected and used for the analysis. Frequencies of major key words were examined by using a text mining method. Correlations among mafor key words were studied through the social network analysis. By calculating term frequency(TF) and term frequency-inverse document frequency(TF-IDF), which correspond to the weighted value of key words, I identified the major key words for the occurrence of the civil complaint for the officially assessed land price. Then the spatio-temporal characteristics of the civil complaints were examined by analysing hot spot based on the statistics of Getis-Ord Gi*. It was found that the characteristic of civil complaints for the officially assessed land price were changing, forming a cluster that is linked spatio-temporally. Using text mining and social network analysis method, we could find out that the occurrence reason of civil complaints for the officially assessed land price could be identified quantitatively based on natural language.
TF and TF-IDF, the weighted averages of key words, can be used as main explanatory variables to analyze spatio-temporal characteristics of civil complaints for the officially assessed land price since these statistics are different over time across different regions.???곌뎄??鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 留덉씠?앹뿉 湲곗큹?섏뿬 怨듭떆吏媛 誘쇱썝??????쒓났媛꾩쟻 ?뱀꽦??遺꾩꽍?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽???쒖떆?섎뒗 ??紐⑹쟻???덈떎. ?뱁엳 ???곌뎄???됱젙 誘쇱썝???쒓린?섎뒗 ?먯씤???숈닠???붿씤蹂대떎???쒓났媛꾩쟻 痢〓㈃?먯꽌 李얠븯怨? 洹몃윭??誘쇱썝 諛쒖깮??寃쏀뼢???쒓났媛꾩쟻?쇰줈 紐⑤땲?곕쭅?섎뒗 紐⑤뜽???쒖떆?섏???
