A Study on the Design of LADM-based Cadastral Data Model for Mongolia
?쒓뎅援?넗?뺣낫怨듭궗 怨듦컙?뺣낫?곌뎄?? 遺踰좎씠諛뷀?瑜? [2018] [KCI?깆옱]

The purpose of this study was to derive the key concepts from agriculture unit in practical arts textbooks based on big data analysis In order to achieve the purpose of this research study, we analyzed six kinds of 5th grade textbooks of practical arts in the 2009 revised curriculum The types of big data analysis methods were text mining techniques. 'Tm', 'RColorBrewer', 'word cloud', 'qcc', 'KoNLP' were used package in R. It was to delete the words and symbols that do not require and by using the morphological analysis of the natural language processing technology made the statement as a minimum unit. This was to identify the frequency of words that are addressed in practical arts textbooks. This results was expressed a word-cloud by packages in R. It could lead to significant key concept of agriculture unit in 5th grade textbooks of practical arts. Key concepts are derived by checking that all text data for agriculture unit in 5th grade textbooks of practical arts. Such key concepts derived by the method is secure the validity and reliability. The key concept was 'Animals and plants', 'life', 'utilization', 'resources', 'eco-friendly growth', 'low carbon', 'green' in agriculture unit in 5th grade textbooks of practical arts. Agriculture unit, you can see that it is stressing the importance of a resource as valuable Animals and plants and eco-friendly growth. The results of this study will have implications for the development of textbooks in the 2015 revised curriculum. On the other hand it will be able to be utilized as the basis for meaningful to teachers in practical arts education.???곌뎄??紐⑹쟻? 鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 湲곕쾿???쒖슜?섏뿬 ?ㅺ낵 援먭낵???띿뾽 ?⑥썝?먯꽌 ?듭떖 媛쒕뀗???꾩텧???대뒗 寃껋씠?덈떎. ?곌뎄??紐⑹쟻???ъ꽦?섍린 ?꾪빐 2016??3??1?쇰???3??20?쇨퉴吏 2009 媛쒖젙 援먯쑁怨쇱젙 5?숇뀈 ?ㅺ낵 寃??援먭낵??6醫낆쓣 遺꾩꽍?섏??? ???곌뎄?먯꽌 援먭낵??遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 ?ъ슜 ??鍮낅뜲?댄꽣 遺꾩꽍 諛⑸쾿? ?띿뒪??留덉씠??Text Mining)?댁뿀?? 遺꾩꽍???꾪빐 ?ъ슜???꾨줈洹몃옩? R ?꾨줈洹몃옩?닿퀬 R ?꾨줈洹몃옩???쁳m?? ?쁒ColorBrewer?? ?쁶ordcloud?? ?쁰cc?? ?쁊oNLP???⑦궎吏瑜??댁슜?섏뿬 遺덉슜?댁? 湲고샇瑜???젣?섍퀬 ?먯뿰??泥섎━ 湲곗닠 以??뺥깭??遺꾩꽍???듯빐 臾몄옣??理쒖냼?⑥쐞濡?履쇨컻???묒뾽??吏꾪뻾?섏??? ?대? ?듯빐 ?ㅺ낵 寃??援먭낵?쒖뿉??以묒젏?곸쑝濡??ㅻ（?댁?怨??덈뒗 ?⑥뼱??鍮덈룄?섎? ?뚯븙?섍퀬 ??寃곌낵瑜?R ?꾨줈洹몃옩???대씪?곕뵫 ?⑦궎吏瑜??쒖슜?섏뿬 ?뚮뱶?대씪?곕뱶濡??쒖떆?섎뒗 寃껋쑝濡??ㅺ낵 5?숇뀈 ?띿뾽 ?⑥썝???듭떖 媛쒕뀗???꾩텧?섏??? ???곌뎄?먯꽌 ?꾩텧???듭떖 媛쒕뀗? 5?숇뀈 ?ㅺ낵 寃?뺢탳怨쇱꽌 ?띿뾽 ?⑥썝??紐⑤뱺 ?띿뒪???먮즺瑜??먭??섏뿬 ?꾩텧??寃껋쑝濡?留ㅼ슦 ?믪? ??뱀꽦怨??좊ː?깆쓣 ?뺣낫?섏??ㅺ퀬 ?????덉쓣 寃껋씠?? ?곌뎄??寃곌낵濡??꾩텧???ㅺ낵 ?띿뾽 ?⑥썝???듭떖 媛쒕뀗? ?섎룞?앸Ъ?? ?섏깮?쒋? ?섏씠?⒱? ?섏옄?먥? ?섏튇?섍꼍?? ?섎냽異뺤궛臾쇄??댁뿀?? ?대? ?듯빐 ?꾩옱 ?ㅺ낵 ?띿뾽 ?⑥썝?먯꽌???먯썝?쇰줈?쒖쓽 ?숈떇臾쇱쓽 媛移섏? 移쒗솚寃쎌쟻???깆옣??以묒슂?깆씠 媛뺤“?섍퀬 ?덉쓬???????덉뿀?? ???곌뎄??寃곌낵???욎쑝濡??덉쓣 2015 媛쒖젙 援먯쑁怨쇱젙???ㅺ낵 寃?뺢탳怨쇱꽌 媛쒕컻???덉뼱 ?댁슜 吏묓븘??援ъ껜?곸씤 ?쒖궗?먯쓣 以????덉쓣 寃껋씠?? ?먰븳 援먯쑁 ?꾩옣?먯꽌 ?띿뾽 ?⑥썝??吏?꾪븯??援먯궗?먭쾶 ?듭떖 媛쒕뀗 ?꾩＜濡?援먯쑁 ?댁슜 ?곸젙???????덈뒗 吏?쒓? ?????덉쓣 寃껋씠??The Effects of a RT-based Autogenic Training Program for Children with Tic Disorder
?숈뒿?먯쨷?ш탳怨쇨탳?≫븰?? Jongun Kim(源醫낆슫), [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
?좎븘???꾩튂 臾몄젣?닿껐 ?λ젰 諛쒕떖??????곌뎄: 4, 5???좎븘瑜?以묒떖?쇰줈
?숈뒿?먯쨷?ш탳怨쇨탳?≫븰?? 媛뺣??? [2016] [KCI?깆옱]
臾댁슜?꾧났 諛뺤궗怨쇱젙??援먯쑁怨쇱젙 遺꾩꽍
?숈뒿?먯쨷?ш탳怨쇨탳?≫븰?? 沅뚯씤?? [2016] [KCI?깆옱]

This article examines poetic criticism in the period of Yusin (the 1970?셲) from the aspects of democratic value and significance. Both Changjakkwabipyung and Munhakkwajisung have performed restless struggles to expand literary politicity and autonomy confronting the propagation of fascism. This researcher regards this not simply with the perspective systemic revolution but as the planning of primary existence for subordinate subjects to reconstruct their concealed meaning and value of life. For this, the researcher focuses on the consciousness of language of both ?쁂hangjakkwabipyung??and ?쁌unhakkwajisung??first. The ?쁂HANGBI school??exclusively possesses the language for life of subordinate subjects, that is, the ?쁣olklore language??as natural language for ?쁞etter life??as well as language for liberation. This literary practice was performed in a way that the critical messages of those including Baek, Nak Cheong and the poets??realization of folklore language include and synthesize each other. Thus, it was more crucial to reproduce collective pathos for social revolution rather than to do individual depiction of folklore emotion. Meanwhile, the ?쁌unhakkwajisung school??was focused on practicing methodological language. Kim, Hyeon made a proposition with the aesthetics to embrace simultaneous expression regarding the relationship and difference of the subject and object. Next, this study devised the pedigree of the way to practice and signify ?쁣olklore language??and ?쁬ethodological language??centering around poetic criticism published in Changjakkwabipyung and Munhakkwajisung. Here, this study intends to verify critical practice is a kind of political behavior to concretize and elucidate the ideological and linguistic pursuit of the proper aesthetic group rather than simply to reexamine the ideology and individuality of the ?쁂hangjakkwabipyung schools??and ?쁌unhakkwajisung schools?? In order to increase the activeness of that periodic spirit and the width of the prospect, this study takes as its conclusion the examination on Ryu, Jong Ho?셲 culturalism and Kim, Woo Chang?셲 aesthetic reason. The subject of this article, ?쁔he freedom of multiple equality or the freedom of individual difference??was chosen so as to show that poetic criticism in the period of Yusin was based on the aesthetic value and goal to be achieved in the future.??湲? ?좎떊湲???鍮꾪룊??誘쇱＜二쇱쓽??媛移섏? ?섎???愿?먯뿉???댄렣蹂몃떎. ?롮갹?묎낵鍮꾪룊??諛??롫Ц?숆낵吏?긱륁? ?뚯떆利섏쓽 ?뺤궛??留욎꽌 臾명븰???뺤튂?깃낵 ?먯쑉?깆쓣 ?뺤옣?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?ъ웳??遺?⑦엳 ?섑뻾?덈떎. ?섎뒗 ?닿쾬???⑥닚??泥댁젣 蹂?곸쓽 愿?먮낫?ㅻ뒗 ?섏쐞二쇱껜媛 ?먯떊?ㅼ쓽 ??먮맂 ?띠쓽 ?섎?? 媛移섎? ?ш뎄?깊븯??蹂몄썝???ㅼ〈??湲고쉷?쇰줈 ?뚯븙?쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 癒쇱? ?섏갹鍮꾟숈? ?섎Ц吏?숈쓽 ?몄뼱?섏떇??二쇰ぉ?섏??? 李쎈퉬?뚮뒗 ?섏쐞二쇱껜?ㅼ쓽 ?앺솢?? ?ㅼ떆 留먰빐 ?섎?以묒뼵?닳숇? ?대갑???몄뼱?댁옄 ?섎뜑 ?섏? ?뜯숈쓽 ?먯뿰?대줈 ?숈떆???꾩쑀?섏??? ?대윴 臾명븰???ㅼ쿇? 諛깅굺泥??깆쓽 鍮꾪룊???꾩뼵怨??쒖씤?ㅼ쓽 誘쇱쨷?몄뼱??援ы쁽???쒕줈瑜??ш큵?섍퀬 醫낇빀?섎뒗 ?뺤떇?쇰줈 吏꾪뻾?섏뿀?? 洹몃윴 留뚰겮 誘쇱쨷?뺤꽌??媛쒖꽦???먮쵖蹂대떎???ы쉶蹂?곸쓣 ?꾪븳 吏묐떒???뚰넗?ㅼ쓽 ?ы쁽??以묒슂?덈떎. ?댁뿉 諛섑빐 臾몄??뚮뒗 諛⑸쾿???몄뼱???ㅼ쿇??以묒떖???먯뿀?? 源?꾩? 二쇱껜? ??곸쓽 愿怨꾩꽦 諛?李⑥씠?깆뿉 ????숈떆???쒗쁽??媛먯떥 ?덉쓬??誘명븰?쇰줈 紐낆젣?뷀뻽?? ?ㅼ쓬?쇰줈 ?섎?以묒뼵?닳숈? ?섎갑踰뺤쟻 ?몄뼱?숆? ?ㅼ쿇?섍퀬 ?섎????섎뒗 諛⑹떇???롮갹?묎낵鍮꾪룊??諛??롫Ц?숆낵吏?긱륁뿉 ?ㅻ┛ ?쒕퉬?됱쓣 以묒떖?쇰줈 怨꾨낫???섏??? ?ш린?쒕뒗 ?⑥닚??李쎈퉬?뚯? 臾몄??뚯쓽 ?대뀗怨?媛쒖꽦???ы솗?명븯湲곕낫?? 鍮꾪룊???ㅼ쿇???대떦 誘명븰??吏묐떒???대뀗怨??몄뼱 吏?μ쓣 援ъ껜?뷀븯怨??ㅽ뙆?섎뒗 ?뺤튂???됱쐞???쇱쥌?꾩쓣 ?뺤씤?섍퀬???섏??? ?대윴 ?쒕??뺤떊???쒕떖?④낵 議곕쭩???볦씠瑜?蹂대떎 ?뺤옣?섍린 ?꾪빐 ?좎쥌?몄쓽 援먯뼇二쇱쓽? 源?곗갹???щ????댁꽦?????寃?좊? 寃곕줎?쇰줈 ?쇱븯?? ?섎떎以묒쟻 ?됰벑???먯쑀 ?뱀? 媛쒖꽦??李⑥씠???먯쑀?숇씪??蹂멸퀬???쒕ぉ? ?좎떊湲??쒕퉬?됱씠 誘몃옒???깆랬??誘명븰??媛移섏? 紐⑺몴??諛뷀깢???섏뿀?뚯쓣 ?쒕윭?닿린 ?꾪빐 ?좏깮?섏뿀???뱀쭛 : ?쒓뎅臾명븰 ?띿쓽 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽, 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽???덉쑝濡?蹂??쒓뎅臾명븰; "?뺤튂 ?먯삤"??臾명솕??湲곗썝怨??좊Ц?뚯꽕???щ줎 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽 -1950?꾨? ?뺣퉬?앹쓽 ?좊Ц?뚯꽕??以묒떖?쇰줈-
怨좊젮??숆탳 誘쇱”臾명솕?곌뎄?? ?댁꽑誘?( Sun Mi Lee ), [2013] [KCI?깆옱]
?뱀쭛 : ?쒓뎅臾명븰 ?띿쓽 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽, 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽???덉쑝濡?蹂??쒓뎅臾명븰; ?ㅼ쨷???됰벑???먯쑀 ?뱀? 媛쒖꽦??李⑥씠???먯쑀 -?좎떊湲???鍮꾪룊????寃쏀뼢-

?뱀쭛 : ?쒓뎅臾명븰 ?띿쓽 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽, 誘쇱＜二쇱쓽???덉쑝濡?蹂??쒓뎅臾명븰; ?몃????먰븳怨??뺤튂?곸씤 寃? 洹몃━怨?誘쇱＜二쇱쓽 -?앸?吏 ?뺤튂?뚯꽕?ㅺ낵???곕??섏떇 ?섏뿉??蹂??좎떊湲곗쓽 ???뚯꽕-
怨좊젮??숆탳 誘쇱”臾명솕?곌뎄?? ?⑤룉洹?( Donk Yoon Hahm ), [2013] [KCI?깆옱]

Der Erwerb von Wortstellungen wurde in der Spracherwerbsforschung intensiv erforscht. Dabei stellte sich heraus, dass bestimmte Wortstellungen wie z.B. die SVO-Struktur im Englischen oder Deutschen dem Lerner kaum Schwierigkeiten bereiten, wohingegen andere Wortstellungen, z.B. die SOV-Struktur in deutschen Nebens채tzen, schwer zu erlernen sind. Die SOV-Struktur im Japanischen oder im Koreanischen scheint aber beim Erlernen kein Problem zu sein, obwohl die Wortfolge S, O, V mit der in deutschen Nebens채tzen identisch ist. Zu den genannten lernersprachlichen Ph채nomenen wurden in der Forschung Erkl채rungshypothesen im Hinblick sowohl auf Transfer als auch auf Erwerbssequenzen formuliert. Die Forschungsergebnisse zeigen zwar Indizien daf체r, dass der Lerner die Wortstellungen der bereits erworbenen Sprachen transferiert, aber es scheint nicht zuzutreffen, dass der Einfluss der bereits erworbenen Sprache wirklich den Grund f체r die andauernden Lernprobleme darstellt, die bis in sp채tere Lernphasen hinein auftreten. Die Erwerbssequenzen-Hypothese liefert ebenfalls keine schl체ssigen Erkl채rungen, da sie die Ph채nomene nicht erkl채rt, sondern lediglich beschreibt. Die vorliegende Studie bem체ht sich daher aus einer psycholinguistischen Perspektive um schl체ssige Erkl채rungshypothesen, die lernersprachliche Ph채nomene in einer konsequenten Weise erkl채ren k철nnen. Diskutiert werden hierbei verschiedene Wortstellungsph채nomene wie 1) SVO-Struktur im Englischen und Deutschen, OVS-Struktur (Inversion) im Deutschen, SOV-Struktur im Deutschen, Franz철sischen, Japanischen und Koreanischen, sowie 2) Stellung des Adverbs im Englischen, Franz철sischen und Chinesischen. Hierbei wird das Hauptaugenmerk auf die Rolle der Subjekt-Verb-Kongruenz bei der analytischen Realisierung des grammatischen Konzepts ?얭ubjekt??in der lernersprachlichen Syntax-Verarbeitung gelegt. Es wird angenommen, dass der Lerner in der Verarbeitung der Sprache, die das Ph채nomen der Subjekt-Verb-Kongruenz kennt, dazu tendiert, das Subjekt vor dem Verb zu verarbeiten und dann unmittelbar danach das Verb, da die Verbform von Merkmalen des Subjekts abh채ngt. Diese Verarbeitung gew채hrleistet gerade die Wortstellung SVO im Englischen sowie im Deutschen und SV-Adverb-O im Franz철sischen. Lernprobleme entstehen dann, wenn die Wortfolge SV gest철rt wird, wie in der Struktur OVS im Deutschen, SOV im Deutschen sowie im Franz철sischen oder in der Struktur S-Adverb-VO im Englischen. Kaum Lernprobleme bereiten hingegen die Strukturen SOV im Japanischen sowie im Koreanischen sowie S-Adverb-VO im Chinesischen, auch wenn in diesen Sprachen die Wortfolge SV gest철rt wird, da diese Sprachen das Ph채nomen Subjekt-Verb-Kongruenz nicht kennen. Auf diese Weise wird in der vorliegenden Studie gezeigt, dass sich Sprachen nicht nur im Hinblick auf die Wortfolge unterscheiden, sondern im Hinblick auch auf Realisierungsweisen bestimmter sprachlicher Ph채nomene, was wiederum zu unterschiedlichen Verarbeitungsweisen f체hren kann. Aus dieser Perspektive haben die Strukturen SVO oder SOV in einer flektierenden Sprache eine andere Qualit채t in der Sprachverarbeitung als in einer nicht flektierenden Sprache. In Frage gestellt wird daher die Typologisierung von Sprachen lediglich im Hinblick auf die 채u횩eren Merkmale aus dem Sprachprodukt, n채mlich was (S, V und O) wo steht. Problematisiert werden ebenfalls Studien in der Spracherwerbsforschung, welche auf derartigen reduzierenden Vorgehensweisen basierend lernersprachliche Ph채nomene zu erkl채ren versuchen. In der vorliegenden Studie wird f체r die k체nftige Forschung f체r eine verst채rkte Fokussierung auf Verarbeitungsaspekte pl채diert, die sich in den Sprachprodukten manifestieren.蹂멸퀬?먯꽌???몄뼱?숈뒿?먯꽌 ?숈뒿?먮뱾???숈뒿???대젮???寃れ? ?딄퀬 ?쎄쾶 ?숈뒿?섎뒗 ?댁닚怨?洹몃젃吏 ?딆? ?댁닚???낆씪?? ?곸뼱, ?꾨옉?ㅼ뼱, 以묎뎅?? ?쇰낯?? ?쒓뎅?댁뿉???섑??섎뒗 SVO/SOV ?댁닚 洹몃━怨??뱀젙 ?몄뼱???섑??섎뒗 遺?ъ쓽 ?꾩튂? 愿?⑦븯???댄렣蹂댁븯?? ?대윭??怨쇱젙?먯꽌 ?숆퀎?먯꽌 ?쒓린???꾩씠媛?ㅼ씠???댁닚?듬뱷?쒖꽌 媛?ㅼ쓣 鍮꾪뙋?곸쑝濡?怨좎같?섍퀬 ?대뱾 ?숈뒿?먯뼵???꾩긽?ㅼ쓣 ?숈뒿?먯쓽 ?몄뼱泥섎━???⑹씠?깆쓽 愿?먯뿉???ㅻ챸?섍퀬???쒕룄?섏??? ?대? ?듯븯??二쇱뼱?숈궗?쇱튂 ?꾩긽???섑??섎뒗 援댁젅?댁뿉?쒕뒗 ?몄뼱泥섎━?먯꽌 二쇱뼱? ?숈궗媛 留ㅼ슦 湲대???愿怨꾨? ?좎??섎ŉ ?④퍡 泥섎━?섎젮??寃쏀뼢???덈떎??寃껋쓣 ?????덉뿀?? ?숈뒿???⑹씠???댁닚? ?대윭??泥섎━寃쏀뼢???덉슜??二쇰뒗 ?댁닚?대씪硫??숈뒿???⑹씠?섏? ?딆? ?댁닚? ?대윭??泥섎━寃쏀뼢???덉슜?섏? ?딅뒗 ?댁닚?대씪??寃껋쓣 ?????덉뿀??
?먯뿰?대뒗 ?댁닚??痢〓㈃?먯꽌留??ㅻⅨ 寃껋씠 ?꾨땲???대뼡 臾몃쾿??媛쒕뀗(?덈? ?ㅼ뼱, 二쇱뼱)???대뼚??諛⑹떇?쇰줈 ?ㅽ쁽?섍퀬 ?덈뒗媛(?덈? ?ㅼ뼱, 遺꾩꽍???듯빀????痢〓㈃?먯꽌???ㅻⅨ 寃껋씠?? ?대윭???곸씠??諛⑹떇???ㅽ쁽? ?몄뼱泥섎━?먯꽌???곸씠??泥섎━ 諛⑹떇??媛?몄삩?ㅺ퀬 蹂????덉쓣 寃껋씠?? ?먯뿰?댁쓽 ?댁닚? ?멸컙???대윭???몄뼱泥섎━???묒긽??諛섏쁺?섎ŉ ?뺤꽦?섍퀬 蹂?붾릺????寃껋씠?쇨퀬??蹂????덉쓣 寃껋씠?? 洹몃━?섏뿬 ?곕━???욎쑝濡쒖꽌???곌뎄?먯꽌 ?몄뼱瑜??명삎???뱀쭏濡쒕쭔 援щ텇?섎뒗 ?좏삎?숈쟻 ?묎렐諛⑹떇???쒓퀎瑜??몄떇?섍퀬 ?숈뒿?먯뼵???꾩긽???곌뎄???덉뼱 ?뱀젙 ?명삎???뱀쭏?대씪???몄뼱泥섎━??寃곌낵臾쇱뿉 ?대뼚???몄?泥섎━??怨쇱젙???⑥뼱 ?덈뒗吏??醫 ??二쇰ぉ?댁빞 ??寃껋씠???섏튂???곹솕?뺤콉???앸?吏 議곗꽑?곹솕??誘몄튇 ?곹뼢 (1) - ?섏튂???곹솕?뺤콉???듯븳 ?곹솕?먮낯怨??곹솕?몃젰???듭젣諛⑹떇
?쒓뎅?낆뼱?낅Ц?숉쉶, 源湲덈룞, [2015] [KCI?깆옱]
?ㅻⅤ? 裕먮윭???롮쇅諛??ы뻾?먦륁뿉 ?섑????꾨? ?뚮퉬?ы쉶???뚯쇅? 寃쎄퀎???뺤껜??
?쒓뎅?낆뼱?낅Ц?숉쉶, ?뺣챸?? [2015] [KCI?깆옱]
?쒕????遺덊솕 洹몃━怨???젰怨?二쎌쓬???섎젅吏 竊??섏젣 ?쇱뒪而??대윭???쒕Ц???멸퀎
?쒓뎅?낆뼱?낅Ц?숉쉶, 諛뺤젙?? [2015] [KCI?깆옱]

Artificial intelligence (AI) is one of the main driving forces leading the Fourth Industrial Revolution. The technologies associated with AI have already shown superior abilities that are equal to or better than people in many fields including image and speech recognition. Particularly, many efforts have been actively given to identify the current technology trends and analyze development directions of it, because AI technologies can be utilized in a wide range of fields including medical, financial, manufacturing, service, and education fields. Major platforms that can develop complex AI algorithms for learning, reasoning, and recognition have been open to the public as open source projects. As a result, technologies and services that utilize them have increased rapidly. It has been confirmed as one of the major reasons for the fast development of AI technologies. Additionally, the spread of the technology is greatly in debt to open source software, developed by major global companies, supporting natural language recognition, speech recognition, and image recognition. Therefore, this study aimed to identify the practical trend of AI technology development by analyzing OSS projects associated with AI, which have been developed by the online collaboration of many parties. This study searched and collected a list of major projects related to AI, which were generated from 2000 to July 2018 on Github. This study confirmed the development trends of major technologies in detail by applying text mining technique targeting topic information, which indicates the characteristics of the collected projects and technical fields.
The results of the analysis showed that the number of software development projects by year was less than 100 projects per year until 2013. However, it increased to 229 projects in 2014 and 597 projects in 2015. Particularly, the number of open source projects related to AI increased rapidly in 2016 (2,559 OSS projects). It was confirmed that the number of projects initiated in 2017 was 14,213, which is almost four-folds of the number of total projects generated from 2009 to 2016 (3,555 projects). The number of projects initiated from Jan to Jul 2018 was 8,737.
The development trend of AI-related technologies was evaluated by dividing the study period into three phases. The appearance frequency of topics indicate the technology trends of AI-related OSS projects. The results showed that the natural language processing technology has continued to be at the top in all years. It implied that OSS had been developed continuously. Until 2015, Python, C ++, and Java, programming languages, were listed as the top ten frequently appeared topics. However, after 2016, programming languages other than Python disappeared from the top ten topics. Instead of them, platforms supporting the development of AI algorithms, such as TensorFlow and Keras, are showing high appearance frequency. Additionally, reinforcement learning algorithms and convolutional neural networks, which have been used in various fields, were frequently appeared topics.
The results of topic network analysis showed that the most important topics of degree centrality were similar to those of appearance frequency. The main difference was that visualization and medical imaging topics were found at the top of the list, although they were not in the top of the list from 2009 to 2012. The results indicated that OSS was developed in the medical field in order to utilize the AI technology. Moreover, although the computer vision was in the top 10 of the appearance frequency list from 2013 to 2015, they were not in the top 10 of the degree centrality. The topics at the top of the degree centrality list were similar to those at the top of the appearance frequency list. It was found that the ranks of the composite neural network and reinforcement learning were changed slightly.
The trend of technology development was examined using the appearance frequency of topics ...??李??곗뾽?곷챸???대걚??二쇱슂 ?먮룞??以??섎굹???멸났吏??湲곗닠? ?대?吏? ?뚯꽦 ?몄떇 ???щ윭 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?щ엺怨??좎궗?섍굅?????곗뼱???λ젰??蹂댁씠硫? ?ы쉶 ?꾨컲??誘몄튂寃????ㅼ뼇???곹뼢?μ쑝濡??명븯???믪? 二쇰ぉ??諛쏄퀬?덈떎. ?뱁엳, ?멸났吏??湲곗닠? ?섎즺, 湲덉쑖, ?쒖“, ?쒕퉬?? 援먯쑁 ??愿묐쾾?꾪븳 遺꾩빞?먯꽌 ?쒖슜??媛?ν븯湲??뚮Ц?? ?꾩옱??湲곗닠 ?숉뼢???뚯븙?섍퀬 諛쒖쟾 諛⑺뼢??遺꾩꽍?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?몃젰???먰븳 ?쒕컻???대（?댁?怨??덈떎. ?쒗렪, ?대윭???멸났吏??湲곗닠??湲됱냽??諛쒖쟾 諛곌꼍?먮뒗 ?숈뒿, 異붾줎, ?몄떇 ?깆쓽 蹂듭옟???멸났吏???뚭퀬由ъ쬁??媛쒕컻?????덈뒗 二쇱슂?뚮옯?쇰뱾???ㅽ뵂 ?뚯뒪濡?怨듦컻?섎㈃?? ?대? ?쒖슜??湲곗닠怨??쒕퉬?ㅻ뱾??媛쒕컻??鍮꾩빟?곸쑝濡?利앷??섍퀬 ?덈뒗 寃껋씠二쇱슂 ?붿씤 以??섎굹濡??뺤씤?쒕떎. ?먰븳, 二쇱슂 湲濡쒕쾶 湲곗뾽?ㅼ씠 媛쒕컻???먯뿰???몄떇, ?뚯꽦 ?몄떇, ?대?吏 ?몄떇 湲곕뒫?깆쓽 ?멸났吏???뚰봽?몄썾?대뱾???ㅽ뵂 ?뚯뒪 ?뚰봽?몄썾??OSS: Open Sources Software)濡?臾대즺濡?怨듦컻?섎㈃??湲곗닠?뺤궛???ш쾶 湲곗뿬?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?댁뿉 ?곕씪, 蹂??곌뎄?먯꽌???⑤씪?몄긽?먯꽌 ?ㅼ닔???묒뾽???듯븯??媛쒕컻???대（?댁?怨좎엳???멸났吏?κ낵 愿?⑤맂 二쇱슂 ?ㅽ뵂 ?뚯뒪 ?뚰봽?몄썾???꾨줈?앺듃?ㅼ쓣 遺꾩꽍?섏뿬, ?멸났吏??湲곗닠 媛쒕컻 ?꾪솴????쒕낫???ㅼ쭏?곸씤 ?숉뼢???뚯븙?섍퀬???쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪븯??源껎뿀釉?Github) ?곸뿉??2000?꾨???2018??7?붽퉴吏 ?앹꽦?쒖씤怨듭??κ낵 愿?⑤맂 二쇱슂 ?꾨줈?앺듃?ㅼ쓽 紐⑸줉??寃??諛??섏쭛?섏??쇰ŉ, ?섏쭛 ???꾨줈?앺듃?ㅼ쓽 ?뱀쭠怨?湲곗닠 遺꾩빞瑜??섎??섎뒗 ?좏뵿 ?뺣낫?ㅼ쓣 ??곸쑝濡??띿뒪??留덉씠??湲곕쾿???곸슜?섏뿬 二쇱슂 湲곗닠?ㅼ쓽 媛쒕컻 ?숉뼢???곕룄蹂꾨줈 ?곸꽭?섍쾶 ?뺤씤?섏??? 遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵, ?멸났吏?κ낵 愿?⑤맂 ?ㅽ뵂 ?뚯뒪 ?뚰봽?몄썾?대뱾? 2016?꾩쓣 湲곗??쇰줈 湲됯꺽?섍쾶 利앷??섎뒗 異붿꽭?대ŉ, ?좏뵿?ㅼ쓽 愿怨?遺꾩꽍???듯븯??二쇱슂 湲곗닠 ?숉뼢???섏븣怨좊━利섃? ?섑봽濡쒓렇?섎컢 ?몄뼱?? ?섏쓳?⑸텇?쇄? ?섍컻諛??꾧뎄?숈쓽 踰붿＜濡?援щ텇?섎뒗 寃껋씠 媛?ν븿???뺤씤?섏??? ?대윭??遺꾩꽍 寃곌낵瑜?諛뷀깢?쇰줈, ?ν썑 ?ㅼ뼇??遺꾩빞?먯꽌???쒖슜???꾪빐 媛쒕컻?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?멸났吏??愿??湲곗닠?ㅼ쓣 蹂대떎 ?곸꽭?섍쾶 援щ텇?섏뿬 ?뺤씤?섎뒗 寃껋씠 媛?ν븷 寃껋씠硫? ?④낵?곸씤 諛쒖쟾 諛⑺뼢 紐⑥깋怨?蹂??異붿씠 遺꾩꽍???쒖슜??媛?ν븷 寃껋씠??A Recidivism Prediction Model Based on XGBoost Considering Asymmetric Error Costs

?쒓뎅?뺣낫泥섎━?숉쉶, ?μ옱寃? [1998]

蹂??곌뎄???댄빐愿怨꾩옄媛꾩쓽 ?몄떇李⑥씠瑜?媛앷??뷀븯湲??꾪븯???쒓퀎?대줈 ?듭떖?대? 異붿텧?섎뒗 怨쇱젙???듯빐 ?由쎌씠??媛덈벑???댁냼?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?⑥꽌瑜??쒓났?????덈뒗 ?먮룞?붾맂 ?띿뒪?몃텇??諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 援ъ텞?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 ?꾩옱 ?쇱웳??吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?댁닔?댁닔???뚮옖?몄궗?낆뿉 愿??嫄곗떆?곸씤 愿?먯뿉??臾몄젣?몄떇??李⑥씠瑜??댄빐?섍린 ?꾪빐 吏??2媛??좊Ц?ъ? 以묒븰 3媛??좊Ц?ъ쓽 湲곗궗瑜??섏쭛?섏뿬 ?쒓퀎??肄뷀띁??corpus) 遺꾩꽍???ㅼ떆?섏??? 遺꾩꽍寃곌낵 ?댁닔?댁닔???쇱쓽???덉뼱??誘몃뵒?닿컙 ?몄떇??李⑥씠媛 議댁옱?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?????덉뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄??肄뷀띁??遺꾩꽍???덉뼱???쒓??먯뿰?댁쿂由?湲곗닠怨?TFIDF遺꾩꽍???듯븳 ?듭떖?⑥뼱??異붿텧???듯빐 ?먮룞?곸씤 ?띿뒪?몃텇???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?좊?媛 ?쒕떎???먯뿉???숇Ц?곸씤 湲곗뿬瑜??섍퀬 ?덈떎.The aims of this study is to develop an automated corpus analysis methodology for objectifying a consensus dissonance among stakeholders and providing a reference to support conflict management by proposing a topic-based time series analysis of news media. To understand a consensus dissonance on the seawater desalination plant project, news articles of two local newspapers and three major newspapers which reported about the issue are collected, and a topic-based time series analysis is conducted. As a result, this study clarified a consensus dissonance about the seawater desalination plant project. This study contributes to develop an automated corpus analysis system by applying Korean natural language processing and TFIDF analysis.援?Ц?붿빟 ?? ?곌뎄??諛곌꼍 諛?紐⑹쟻 ?? ?대줎??諛곌꼍 諛??좏뻾?곌뎄 ?? ?뺥깭?뚮텇??諛?TFIDF遺꾩꽍 ?? ?쒓퀎??TFIDF遺꾩꽍吏??궛?낃뎄議곗쓽 ?앹궛?깆씠 吏諛⑹꽭??誘몄튂???곹뼢 遺꾩꽍

蹂??곌뎄???댄빐愿怨꾩옄媛꾩쓽 ?몄떇李⑥씠瑜?媛앷??뷀븯湲??꾪븯???쒓퀎?대줈 ?듭떖?대? 異붿텧?섎뒗 怨쇱젙???듯빐 ?由쎌씠??媛덈벑???댁냼?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?⑥꽌瑜??쒓났?????덈뒗 ?먮룞?붾맂 ?띿뒪?몃텇??諛⑸쾿濡좎쓣 援ъ텞?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 紐⑹쟻?쇰줈 ?쒕떎. ?대? ?꾪빐 ?꾩옱 ?쇱웳??吏꾪뻾?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 ?댁닔?댁닔???뚮옖?몄궗?낆뿉 愿??嫄곗떆?곸씤 愿?먯뿉??臾몄젣?몄떇??李⑥씠瑜??댄빐?섍린 ?꾪빐 吏??2媛??좊Ц?ъ? 以묒븰 3媛??좊Ц?ъ쓽 湲곗궗瑜??섏쭛?섏뿬 ?쒓퀎??肄뷀띁??corpus) 遺꾩꽍???ㅼ떆?섏??? 遺꾩꽍寃곌낵 ?댁닔?댁닔???쇱쓽???덉뼱??誘몃뵒?닿컙 ?몄떇??李⑥씠媛 議댁옱?섎뒗 寃껋쓣 ?????덉뿀?? 蹂??곌뎄??肄뷀띁??遺꾩꽍???덉뼱???쒓??먯뿰?댁쿂由?湲곗닠怨?TFIDF遺꾩꽍???듯븳 ?듭떖?⑥뼱??異붿텧???듯빐 ?먮룞?곸씤 ?띿뒪?몃텇???쒖뒪?쒖쓣 援ъ텞?섍린 ?꾪븳 ?좊?媛 ?쒕떎???먯뿉???숇Ц?곸씤 湲곗뿬瑜??섍퀬 ?덈떎.The aims of this study is to develop an automated corpus analysis methodology for objectifying a consensus dissonance among stakeholders and providing a reference to support conflict management by proposing a topic-based time series analysis of news media. To understand a consensus dissonance on the seawater desalination plant project, news articles of two local newspapers and three major newspapers which reported about the issue are collected, and a topic-based time series analysis is conducted. As a result, this study clarified a consensus dissonance about the seawater desalination plant project. This study contributes to develop an automated corpus analysis system by applying Korean natural language processing and TFIDF analysis.吏諛⑹젙遺 怨듦났?ъ뾽??愿???쇨컙吏 誘몃뵒?댁옄猷뚯쓽 ?쒓퀎??肄뷀띁?ㅻ텇??

泳쒎릦沃욄뼑佯ユ뵸?녺쉪?ょ꽫沃욄뼑?뉓첑力뺞릍屋?뵸?녺쉪凉뷴댍?㎬첑?쇿늽?? ?ф뻼?쇘뤎永먩옖獒쒑첑?③윋?뗨첑?뚨쉪??Ŧ弱띷뇡壤℡폀驪뤶?葉?룾?썸쐝?쇘뵟?꾢걦沃? ?뤺い?잌썱?됪칾沃욆쿋?루㎉, ??쉪沃욆쫸?뉒쉪力쎾뙑嶺됥귝??? ?ф뻼?앭컢?볟쐦耶며퓪?끿쉪永먩옖獒쒑첑?롥??먨눣?룬쳱?꾣븥耶멨뻠鈺겹괖omplement of result is one of the most widely and frequently used in all kinds of Chinese complements. Korean does not have complicated usage on a complement like Chinese, so Korean students feel difficult in studying Chinese and make a lot of mistakes in using Chinese.
The main direction of this paper is what appears in the process of Korean students in learning and using Chinese results complement. This paper quotes the language database from character error-coded Chinese Interlanguage Corpus of Sun Yat-Sen University and the text which designed on the basis of the grammar structure difference between Chinese and Korean .
This paper is a corpus-based and text analysis-based research, whose conclusions on Chinese complement and detailed analysis on the errors from learner output, is with considerable value for both Chinese Complement study and teaching theoretically and practically.瀯뤻챿訝삡퉱?뜻쐿?썽솀?뷴솳玲삭캂轢붷뙑瓮?푶?듿뎺亦욘렋??

蹂??곌뎄??紐⑹쟻? ?댁슜??吏?μ쟻???뺣낫寃?됱쓣 ?섑뻾?섍린 ?꾪븳 吏덉쓽?뺤옣??吏?앸쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섎뒗 寃껋씠?? ?대? ?꾪빐 媛쒕뀗湲곕컲 ?뺣낫寃?됰갑踰뺢낵 ?듦퀎??湲곕컲 ?뺣낫寃?됰갑踰뺤쓣 ?댁슜??吏?앸쿋?댁뒪 援ъ텞??愿?⑤맂 ?ㅼ뼇???대줎 ?곌뎄瑜??섑뻾?섏??? ?대뱾 吏?앸쿋?댁뒪 援ъ텞諛⑸쾿???덉뼱??怨듯넻??媛?ㅼ? ?곌??⑹뼱??異쒗쁽? 臾명뿄吏묓빀?댁쓽 ?숈떆異쒗쁽 鍮덈룄?꾩쓣 ?ы솗?명븯?怨? ??媛?ㅼ쓣 洹쇨굅濡??됱씤?뚯씪 ?뚭퀬由ъ쬁怨?遺???쇰━??And ?곗궛?먮? ?댁슜?섏뿬 吏덉쓽?뺤옣??吏?앸쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섏??? 蹂?吏?앸쿋?댁뒪???ㅽ뿕 二쇱젣??援먯쑁?숈씠硫? 援먯쑁?숆컻濡좎씠? ?⑦뻾蹂몄쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ?됱씤?대뱾???곌??⑹뼱瑜??먮룞?쇰줈 ?쒖떆?댁쨪 ???덈뒗 ?ㅽ뿕??吏?앸쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞?섏??? ?ㅽ뿕??吏?앸쿋?댁뒪???먯뿰?댁깋?몃갑踰뺢낵 ?듭젣?댁깋?몃갑踰뺤쓣 ?댁슜?섏뿬 ??媛쒖쓽 吏?앸쿋?댁뒪瑜?援ъ텞??媛?吏?앸쿋?댁뒪 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 吏덉쓽?뺤옣 ?깅뒫??????됯? ?묒뾽???섑뻾?섏???This study is to develop knowledge base system for query extension to the user oriented information retrieval. This study has survey the theories of the concept-based information retrieval method and statistic based information retrieval method. In the construction method of knowledge base, the common hypothesis is that the emergence of related term is the frequency of simultaneous emergence of a set of documents. Using the subject index file algorithms and the ?쁝nd??operator of boolean logic based on this hypothesis, this study builds the knowledge base. In this research experiment, a subject of knowledge base is education. Using the book of the Introduction to Education, two experimental knowledge base systems is constructed by the different indexing method. One system has constructed by controlled language indexing method, and another system has constructed by natural language indexing method. The performance of two knowledge base system is evaluated.珥덈줉 ABSTRACT ?? ?쒕줎 ?? 吏덉쓽???뺤옣 ?쒖뒪?쒖뿉 ????대줎???곌뎄 ?? ?됱씤 ?뚯씪 湲곕컲 吏덉쓽???뺤옣 ?쒖뒪?쒖쓽 援ы쁽?뚰븳援?룄?쒓??띿젙蹂댄븰?뚯????쇰Ц ?ш퀬 洹쒖젙 ??

Therefore, demand for accurate analysis of artificial intelligence technology is continuously increasing. Therefore, in this paper, we study the statistical analysis method based on Bayesian inference for technology analysis related to artificial intelligence. We collect all patents related to artificial intelligence related patents so far, extract keywords through text mining preprocessing, and perform artificial intelligence related technology analysis using them. In order to verify the validity of the proposed method, we considered two sub-technologies which are learning from data and natural language understanding for artificial intelligence, and analyzed the possibility of actual application.?붿빟 Abstract 1. ?쒕줎 2. 踰좎씠吏???ы썑遺꾪룷瑜??댁슜???멸났吏??湲곗닠遺꾩꽍 3. ?ㅽ뿕 諛?寃곌낵理쒖쟻???뚭퀬由ъ쬁???댁슜???뺣낫?곗씠??遺꾪븷諛⑸쾿??????곌뎄

First, we focused on how the term feature and the co-link of web documents affect clustering performance. We clustered web documents by native term feature, co-link and both, and compared the output results with the originally allocated category. And we selected term features for each category using X짼, Information Gainl ((IG), and Mutual Information (MI) from training documents, and applied these features to other experimental documents. In addition we suggested a new method named Max Feature Selection, which selects terms that have the maximum count for a category in each experimental document, and applied X짼 (or MI or IG) values to each term instead of term frequency of documents, and clustered them. In the results, X짼 shows a better performance than IG or MI. but the difference appears to be slight. But when we applied the Max Feature Selection Method, the clustering performance improved notably. Max Feature Selection is a simple but effective means of feature space reduction and shows powerful performance for Korean web document clustering.珥덈줉 ABSTRACT 1. ?쒕줎 2. ?곌뎄 諛⑸쾿 3. ?ㅽ뿕寃곌낵 諛??됯?South Korean Universal Service and Korean Reunification: A Policy Analysis
Korean Society For Library And Information Science, ?뺣텇?? [2005] [KCI?깆옱]
?쒓뎅臾명뿄?뺣낫?숉쉶 ?뚯튃 ??
?쒓뎅臾명뿄?뺣낫?숉쉶, ?몄쭛遺, [2005] [KCI?깆옱]
?쒓뎅怨?誘멸뎅 怨듦났?꾩꽌愿??痍⑦븰 ???대┛?대? ?꾪븳 ?롮씠?쇨린 ?ㅻ젮二쇨린???꾨줈洹몃옩??愿??鍮꾧탳 ?곌뎄
?쒓뎅臾명뿄?뺣낫?숉쉶, ?뺥삙寃?Hye-Kyung Chung), [2005] [KCI?깆옱]

Business administration is a comprehensive study with four aspects of theory, practice, science, and technology, and various research subjects have selected and actively studied. However, in order to prevent the obsolescence of learning over time, we tried to develop into a new direction by combining with other fields. Therefore, we analyzed the keywords to quickly search for the process of exploring and disappearing new research fields. With the advent of the Internet and the rapid development of technologies and concepts that deal with unstructured data, it has become possible to derive high-quality information quickly.
In this study, a total of 8,185 papers were collected by using a web crawler in the field of business administration published in KCI (Korea citation index) list for five years from 2013 to 2017, and 4,210 papers. The keywords were compared and analyzed in two ways. It has integrated the words that are the same meaning but separate in various expressions into one word by synonyms dictionary. Moreover, we have classified them into two sets. A set of keywords (a) was a tokenized word with the smallest unit of word separation, and a set of keywords (b) in which the meanings of the words of the authors expressed as they are.
The techniques used in the analysis were to find meaningful patterns using frequency and trend analysis, machine learning methods such as association rules and hierarchical clustering. As a result of the analysis, the keywords that have actively researched for five years in the frequency analysis derived from corporate social responsibility, entrepreneurship, customer satisfaction, job satisfaction, and trust. In the trend analysis, from 2016, the start-up has risen. In the association rules, results were derived based on support and meaningful rules were found. In the hierarchical clustering, the big data was related to innovation and creativity. Consequentially, there was a significant difference between the result the keyword set (a) and (b).
In this study, the web crawler that automatically searches and collects data from web documents, natural language processing of handling text data, and applied machine learning techniques are expected to be able to derive meaningful relationships in a short time. It is expected that the web crawler and machine learning techniques will be actively applied in the field of business administration by providing the theoretical and practical implications for finding research keywords trends and patterns in the field of business administration in the future.寃쎌쁺?숈? ?대줎, ?ㅼ쿇, 怨쇳븰, 湲곗닠 ??媛吏 痢〓㈃??吏??醫낇빀?숇Ц?쇰줈 ?ㅼ뼇???곌뎄 ??곸쓣 ?좎젙?섏뿬 ?쒕컻?섍쾶?곌뎄?섍퀬 ?덈뒗 遺꾩빞?대떎. ?쒕????먮쫫???곕씪 ?숇Ц??吏꾨??붾릺??嫄?諛⑹??섍린 ?꾪빐 ?덈줈???곌뎄二쇱젣 諛쒓껄怨쇰떎瑜?遺꾩빞? ?듬났?⑺븯???덈줈??諛⑺뼢?쇰줈 諛쒖쟾???꾨え?섍퀬 ?덈떎. ?댁뿉 ?덈줈???곌뎄 遺꾩빞瑜??먯깋?섍퀬 ?뚮㈇?섎뒗怨쇱젙??鍮좊Ⅴ寃??먯깋?섍린 ?꾪빐 二쇱젣??遺꾩꽍???쒗뻾?섏??? 理쒓렐 ?명꽣?룹쓽 ?깆옣怨??洹쒕え 鍮꾩젙???곗씠?곕? ?ㅻ（?붽컻?먭낵 湲곗닠??湲됱냽?꾨줈 諛쒖쟾?섎㈃???묒쭏???뺣낫瑜??쒓컙?겶룸Ъ由ъ쟻 ?쒖빟 ?놁씠 鍮좊Ⅴ寃??꾩텧?????덇쾶 ?섏뿀??
